ʔaχbrk bkl ʃjʔ tanzijlun mːin rːabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna hl nħn bʔamaːn hnaː jwd͡ʒd bstaːn χlf mnzlnaː falamːaaː raʔaawaː baʔasanaaː qaaːluwaː ʔaːmanːaaː biaːllːahi waħdahu wakafarnaaː bimaaː kunːaaː bihi muʃrikijna maː huwa siruː aːlraqm sabʕaa ʔiinːaaː mursiluwaː aːlnːaaːqaai fitnaaan lːahum faaːrtaqibhum waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶbiʶrˤ taʕrifu fij wud͡ʒuwhihim naʶdˤrˤaʶaʶaʶ aːlnːaʕijmi laː ʔatklm aːlʕrbja bʃkl sabijli aːllːahi wajabʁuwnahaaː ʕiwad͡ʒanaː wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai kaaːfiruwna waʔiinːahu laqasamun law taʕlamuwna ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn aʶːħfðˤ aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ llʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm qm bzjaːrtj rʔajtu tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶːaʶn juħlːqu fwqa ʃd͡ʒrain sˤfʕth kfaːan ʕlaː wd͡ʒhh jaʕlamu maaː bajna ʔaajdijhim wamaaː χalfahum walaaː juʶħiʶjtˤuʶwnaʶ bihi ʕilmanaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm laː ʔaqsm bhðaː aːlbld ʔawlʔik aːlðjn kfrwaː bʔaːjaːt rbhm wlqaːʔih fħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm flaː nqjm lhm jwm aːlqjaːma wznaː samiʕtu rasuwla aːllhi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama jqwlu: ʔaajna aːld͡ʒarijdaau snħl aːlmʃkla bikatbi rizqihi waʔaad͡ʒalihi waʕamalihi waʃaqijːun ʔaw saʕijdun waqaaːla ʔaːχaru fmaː lhm laː jʔumnwn ʔilaː mn twlaː wkfr qd ʔaflħ mn tzkaː wakataba ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔilaaː ʔaabij muwsaaː aːlʔaaʃʕarijːi kalːaaː ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lˤaʶjaʶtˤʁaʶaʶː bdʔawaː aːlʕml ʕlaː aːlfwr kaðːabat qawmu lˤuʶwtˤiʶn biaːlnːuðuri mːarfuwʕaain mːuʶtˤaʶhːaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶn ʔin aːlðjn jχʃwn rbhm baːlʁjb lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kulːu ʕaqlin laaː judaaːraaː bihi aːlkulːu falajsa biʕaqlin taaːmːin ʔajmknnj sʔuaːlk ʕn aːlsbb ðlk aːllħm lħm dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ aːðhabuwaː biʶqaʶmiʶjsˤiʶj haðaaː faʔaalquwhu ʕalaaː wad͡ʒhi ʔaabij jaʔati baʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː waʔatuwnij biʔaahlikum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna hl ʔant aʶːlˤʃχsˤ aːlmsʔuwl mtaː juʁlq aʶːlˤmtˤʕm jــــaː rbaːnــــــaː aʶːħfــــــðˤ lnــــــــaː ʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt flhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlmʔawaː nzlaː bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn wlqd naːdaːnaː nwħ flnʕm aːlmd͡ʒjbwn ʕamːaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna wmaː mnaː ʔilaː lh mqaːm mʕlwm ħqaː ʔant lst ʁbjaː tbdw mrˤjdˤaʶ wbaːlljl ʔaflaː tʕqlwn waʔaanːaaː lamasnaaː aːlsːamaaːʔa fawad͡ʒadnaaːhaaː muliʔiat ħarasanaː ʃadijdanaː waʃuhubanaː kamaaː jaʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ dalijlu aːlħaaːli taʕlijlanaː wakaʃfanaː ʃkranaː ʕlaː qdwmk faʕamijat ʕalajhimu aːlʔaanbaaːʔu jawmaʔiiðin fahum laaː jatasaaːʔaluwna wkðlk nd͡ʒzj mn ʔasrf wlm jʔumn bʔaːjaːt rbh wlʕðaːb aːlʔaːχra ʔaʃd wʔabqaː waman aːstaʁnaaː fijhaaː futina ʔiinːa haðaaː larizqunaaː maaː lahu min nafaaːdin ʔajn ðhb waqaaːluwaː quluwbunaaː ʁulfun bal laʕanahumu aːllːahu bikufrihim faqalijlanaː maaː juʔuminuwna hðh mdrsa lmaːðaː ʔant mtʔaχr lkl mqaːm mqaːl wlkl zmaːn rd͡ʒaːl tsttˤjʕ qjaːda sjaːra sˤħjħ wamaaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕani aːlhawaaː hl ttðkr maː qaːlth maːðaː qlt ʔams ʔaafaraʔaajtumu aːlmaaːʔ aːlːaðij taʃrabuwna ʔin aːlðjn laː jʔumnwn baːlʔaːχra ljsmwn aːlmlaːʔika tsmja aːlʔanθaː fwrbk lnħʃrnhm waʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn θm lˤnħdˤrˤnhm ħwl d͡ʒhnm d͡ʒθjaː lqd ʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm ktaːbaː fjh ðkrkm ʔaflaː tʕqlwn flmaː d͡ʒaːʔ ʔaːl lˤwtˤ aːlmrslwn χaʶtˤhuʶ rdjʔ ʔamj ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ lwlaː ʔan tdaːrkh nʕma mn rbh lnbð baːlʕraːʔ whw mðmwm faʔiinːaka laaː tusmiʕu aːlmawtaaː walaaː tusmiʕu aʶːlˤsˤːuʶmːaʶ aːldːuʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː walːawaː mudbirijna mn laː jʕrf hðh aːlmʃkla faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ min aːlʔaaχsarijna ʔaaʕmaaːlanaː aːlːaðijna dˤaʶlˤːaʶ saʕjuhum fij aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː wafij aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʕarabu taquwlu fij ʔaamθaaːlihaaː faʔiiðaaː bariqa aʶːlˤbaʶsˤaʶrˤuʶ laː tlum fʃlk ʕlaː aʶːlˤħðˤ aːlsjʔ jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː laaː taʕtaðiruwaː aːljawma ʔiinːamaaː tud͡ʒzawna maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna ʔiðaː ʔardt ʔan tnd͡ʒħ baːlʔimtħaːn ʕljk ʔan tdrs bd͡ʒdː saʕijdu bnu ʔaabij hindin ʕan aːbni ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla jwm tblaː aːlsraːʔir ʔauχttm aːlmʔutmr qbl saːʕtjn ʔiið tabarːaʔaa aːlːaðijna aːtːubiʕuwaː mina aːlːaðijna aːtːabaʕuwaː waraʔaawuaː aːlʕaðaaːba waʶtaʶqaʶtˤːaʶʕaʶt bihimu aːlʔaasbaaːbu hðh aːlʃrka laː tbaːlj bslaːma ʕmaːlhaː ʔinh rd͡ʒl jwfj bwʕdh fbʔimkaːnk aːlaːʕtmaːd ʕljh juχrid͡ʒu aːlħajːa mina aːlmajːiti wajuχrid͡ʒu aːlmajːita mina aːlħajːi wajuħjij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ baʕda mawtihaaː wakaðalika tuχrad͡ʒuwna swf ʔaʃaːhd aːlʔaχbaːr ʕlaː aːltljfzjwn jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔiinːaka kaaːdiħun ʔiilaaː rabːika kadħanaː famulaaːqijhi qaːlwaː ħrqwh waʶːnsˤrˤwaʶː ʔaːlhtkm ʔin kntm faːʕljn qaːl llmlʔi ħwlh ʔin hðaː lsaːħr ʕljm knt ʔabħθ ʕn ʕsˤjrˤ aːlljmwn tˤjlˤaʶ aːljwm jstbʃrwn bnʕma mn aːllh wfdˤlˤ wʔan aːllh laː jdˤjʕ ʔad͡ʒr aːlmʔumnjn wqdˤjnaʶː ʔilaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl fj aːlktaːb ltfsdn fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mrtjn wltʕln ʕlwaː kbjraː wʔinh lħq aːljqjn faʔiin kaaːnat aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ ʔaaʁlaba kaaːnat ʔilaaː aːlwufuwri ʔaamjala bali aːllːaha faaːʕbud wakun mina aːlʃːaaːkirijna ʔaklnaː aːllħm jbdw saːmj χaːʔifaː dumt nwraːan whdaː lknaː ʕbaːd aːllh aʶːlˤmχlˤsˤjn hlːaː saːʕdtnj fj ʕmlj lmn ʃaːʔ mnkm ʔan jstqjm ldj kħa ʔaʶħtfðˤ bkl sˤwrˤj fj sˤndwq fj aʶːlˤtˤaʶːbq aːlʕlwj ql d͡ʒaːʔ aːlħq wmaː jbdʔi aʶːlˤbaʶːtˤlˤ wmaː jʕjd ʔaʶtˤrˤq ʕlaː aːlbaːb laː tlmsh aʶːlˤrˤːiʶdˤaʶaʶː ʕan aːllːahi ʔajn dˤrˤbtmwhm ln ʔabjʕh aːlnaːs ljswaː slʕa faʔiin kaaːna aːliaːstiħsaaːnu lˤiʶfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ aːlnːafsi ħadaθat rutbaaun saaːbiʕaaun wahija aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʕðˤaʶaʶːmuʶ rad͡ʒulun jadrij wajadrij ʔaanːahu jadrij faðalika ʕaaːlimun faaːsʔaaluwhu wakaðalika nad͡ʒzij man ʔaasrafa walam juʔumin biʔaːjaaːti rabːihi walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaaʃadːu waʔaabqaaː kaːn mħsˤwlˤ aːlʕaːm aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj sjʔiaː wltkn mnkm ʔama jdʕwn ʔilaː aːlχjr wjʔamrwn baːlmʕrwf wjnhwn ʕn aːlmnkr wʔawlʔik hm aːlmflħwn waʔaːtajnaaːhumaaː aːlkitaaːba aːlmustabijna waʶdˤaʶrˤaʶbaʶ lanaaː maθalanaː wanasija χalqahu qaaːla man juħjij aʶːlˤʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶ wahija ramijmun waaːlħilmu waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna ʔiʶfrˤaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ waʕadamihi qaːl swf ʔastʁfr lkm rbj ʔinh hw aːlʁfwr aːlrħjm χalaqa aːlʔiinsaaːna wʔin nʃʔa nʁrqhm flaː sˤrˤjχ lhm wlaː hm jnqðwn fʔalqaːhaː fʔiðaː hj ħja tsʕaː waʔaanːaaː ðˤaʶnaʶnːaʶaʶː ʔaan lan nuʕd͡ʒiza aːllːaha fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walan nuʕd͡ʒizahu harabanaː faaːltaqamahu aːlħuwtu wahuwa mulijmun fqaːlwaː ʔabʃraː mnaː waːħdaː ntbʕh ʔinaː ʔiðaː lfj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ wsʕr fʔamaː ʔin kaːn mn aːlmqrbjn km qlmaːan ʕndk hl tʕrf ʔajn saːʕtj walaaː sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn ħamijmin rbnaː ʔink d͡ʒaːmʕ aːlnaːs ljwm laː rjb fjh ʔin aːllh laː jχlf aːlmjʕaːd aːlnd͡ʒm aːlθaːqb laː ʔatðkr bʔannj tˤlˤbt mnk ʔan tbdj rʔajk aːlðj kðb wtwlaː waʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaaːʔ kuʶʃiʶtˤaʶt wmaː lj laː ʔaʕbd aːlðj ftˤrˤnj wʔiljh trd͡ʒʕwn qaaːla faʕaltuhaaː ʔiiðanaː waʔaanaaː mina aʶːlˤdˤːaʶaʶːlˤːiʶjnaʶ fakaðːabuwhu faʔiinːahum lˤaʶmuʶħdˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ jaː mljk aːlʕarbi ʔinhm ʔin jðˤhrˤwaʶː ʕljkm jrd͡ʒmwkm ʔaw jʕjdwkm fj mlthm wln tflħwaː ʔiðaː ʔabdaː fʔaðaːqhm aːllh aːlχzj fj aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː wlʕðaːb aːlʔaːχra ʔakbr lw kaːnwaː jʕlmwn ʔaumj, maːrj tdˤrˤbnj hw jħb aːlmrbaː qaaːluwaː baʃːarnaaːka biaːlħaqːi falaaː takun mina aʶːlˤqaʶaʶːniʶtˤiʶjnaʶ waʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaaːʔu kuʶʃiʶtˤaʶt mutːakiʔiijna ʕalaaː rafrafin χuʶdˤrˤiʶn waʕabqarijːin ħisaaːnin sˤbʁaʶ aːllh wmn ʔaħsn mn aːllh sˤbʁaʶ wnħn lh ʕaːbdwn kaaːna laaː jaraaː ruʔujaaː ʔiilaːaː d͡ʒaaːʔat miθla falaqi aʶːlˤsˤuʶːbħiʶ hnʔath ʕlaː nd͡ʒaːħh laaː takun mimːan jaquwlu fij aːldːunjaaː biqawli aːlzːaaːhidijna lqd nsjta bqja aːlħsaːb ʔiijlaaːfihim riħlaaa aːlʃːitaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶjfiʶ bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waʶːlˤtˤwrˤ ʔinh btˤjʔ hj tskn fj dbj wʔin mn ʃjʕth lʔibraːhjm aːrd͡ʒiʕij ʔiilaaː rabːiki rˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶaʶn maʶrˤdˤiʶjːaʶaʶaʶn fwjl jwmʔið llmkðbjn ʔinhaː qdjma kqidm aːlʕaːlm faʔiinːa aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶfrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶ daaːʕin ʔilaaː aʶːlˤtːaʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶ bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlʕaːdjaːt dˤbħaʶː wʔanaː mnaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħwn wmnaː dwn ðlk knaː tˤrˤaʶːʔiʶq qddaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤuʶ qad jaʶħsˤuʶlˤuʶ lahu biaːlnːakijri waʔiin aʶːntaʶsˤaʶrˤaʶ ʔaaw qutila waqaaːla ʔaabuw ħaaːzimin aːlʔaaʕrad͡ʒu qaːlwaː laː dˤjrˤ ʔinaː ʔilaː rbnaː mnqlbwn wqaːlwaː aːtχð aːlrħmn wldaː sbħaːnh bl ʕbaːd mkrmwn ʔad͡ʒrjt lj mqaːbla ʕml wataʔakuluwna aːltːuraaːθa ʔaaklanaː lːamːanaː kuluwaː waaːʃrabuwaː hanijʔianaː bimaaː ʔaaslaftum fij aːlʔaajːaaːmi aːlχaaːlijaai wakaðːabuwaː waaːtːabaʕuwaː ʔaahwaaːʔahum wakulːu ʔaamrin mustaqirːun laː ʔaraː mʃklaan bðlk waaːlʃːafʕi waaːlwatri waaːlʕarabu tusamːij walada aːlwaladi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶfwaʶaʶaʶ km tˤaʶːlˤbaʶnaʶː fj fsˤlˤk watad͡ʒtamiʕu lihajbatihi aːlquluwbu aːlmutafarːiqaau ʔaħb lʕb aːltns ʔiið ʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilaaː ʔaumːika maaː juwħaaː ʔinhaː tfwqnj tˤwlˤaʶːaʶn bmqdaːr kbjr ʔauwlaaːʔiika ʕalaaːaː hudanaː mːin rːabːihim waʔauwlaaːʔiika humu aːlmufliħuwna flaː tʕd͡ʒl ʕljhm ʔinmaː nʕd lhm ʕdaː waʔautbiʕuwaː fij haðihi laʕnaaan wajawma aːlqijaaːmaai biʔisa aːlrːifdu aːlmarfuwdu d͡ʒʔit mʕ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj hl tktb rsaːlaan ʔin aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt lhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlnʕjm fad͡ʒaʕala minhu aːlzːawd͡ʒajni aːlðːakara waaːlʔaunθaaː waaːlːaðijna fij ʔaamwaaːlihim ħaqːun maʕluwmun tʃrft d͡ʒdaː bmʕrftk ʔinhu sˤdjq ʔaχj qaaːla laaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː nasijtu walaaː turhiqnij min ʔaamrij ʕusranaː mn aːlmmkn ʕlaːd͡ʒ aʶːlˤsrˤtˤaʶːn ʔiðaː aːktʃf qbl fwaːt aːlʔawaːn ʕajnanaː jaʃrabu bihaaː aːlmuqarːabuwna tʕbt mn slwkh bdʔanaː nfhm ʔakθr θumːa laaː jamuwtu fijhaaː walaaː jaħjaaː qaːlwaː rbnaː ʁlbt ʕljnaː ʃqwtnaː wknaː qwmaː dˤaʶːlˤjn ʔiinːaaː ʔaanzalnaaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː laʕalːakum taʕqiluwna lmaːðaː jħdθ lj daːʔimaː nfs aːlʔamr wahal ʔaataaːka ħadijθu muwsaaː ʔinh ʁaːrq fj aːldjwn waːlðjn sʕwaː fj ʔaːjaːtnaː mʕaːd͡ʒzjn ʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb mn rd͡ʒz ʔaljm wamaaː kaaːna linafsin ʔaan tuʔumina ʔiilːaaː biʔiiðni aːllːahi wajad͡ʒʕalu aːlrːid͡ʒsa ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna laaː jaʕqiluwna aːlʔind͡ʒljzja lʁa mstʕmla fj ʔamrjkaː ʔaawalam jakun lahum ʔaːjaaan ʔaan jaʕlamahu ʕulamaaːʔu banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla wabuʃːira ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu bimawluwdin faqaaːla jrjd lħmaː ʔin fkrth ttd͡ʒaːwz qdrtj ʕlaː aːlfhm ʕmlt ʁlˤtˤaʶ kbjra baʶːlˤfħsˤ waʔiin kaaːna laaː jaraaː fijhi ħaqːanaː lajarudːanːahu waaːlʔaːχiraai faħaqijqun biaːlʕaqli ʔaan jakuwna bihi mutamasːikanaː waʕalajhi muʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː lmn aːʃtrjt aʶːlˤʕðˤm fhl ʕsjtm ʔin twljtm ʔan tfsdwaː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wtqtˤʕwaʶː ʔarħaːmkm χjr ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlftaːa: aːlʔalmaːs nðˤrˤtuʶhuʶ laː tsurː hw mthwr kaːnt ldjhm mʕaːrf mħdwda fj aːld͡ʒʁraːfjaː ln jsˤbk ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː ʔanaː ħqaːan ʔaθq bqdrth waʔaanːahum ðˤaʶnːuʶwaʶː kamaaː ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶm ʔaan lan jabʕaθa aːllːahu ʔaaħadanaː ħaʶːfðˤwaʶː ʕlaː aʶːlˤsˤlˤwaʶːt waʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ aʶːlˤwstˤaʶː wqwmwaː llh qaːntjn ʔiilahukum ʔiilahun waaːħidun faaːlːaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai quluwbuhum munkiraaun wahum mustakbiruwna limaːrj ʔakθr mn mʔia zwd͡ʒin mn aːlʔaħðja ʔinmaː ʔilhkm aːllh aːlðj laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wsʕ kl ʃjʔ ʕlmaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ liħukmi rabːika walaː takun kaʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ aːlħuwti ʔiið naaːdaaː wahuwa maʶkðˤuʶwmuʶn wwd͡ʒwh jwmʔið baːsra fqlnaː aːðhbaː ʔilaː aːlqwm aːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː fdmrnaːhm tdmjraː jbdw raːʔiʕaː nħn dˤd aːlʔaslħa aːlnwwja faʔaaʁwajnaaːkum ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː ʁaaːwijna ʔanta fqtˤ thrb mn mʃaːkl aːlħjaːa waʔiin jakun lahumu aːlħaqːu jaʔatuwaː ʔiilajhi muðʕinijna wataraknaaː baʶʕdˤaʶhuʶm jawmaʔiiðin jamuwd͡ʒu fij baʶʕdˤiʶn wanufiχa fij aʶːlˤsˤːuʶwrˤiʶ fad͡ʒamaʕnaaːhum d͡ʒamʕanaː ʔiðaaː ʕalimt falaaː tufakːir fij kaθraai man duwnak min aːld͡ʒuhːaaːli wmaː jʔatjhm mn nbj ʔilaː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn wlhm mqaːmʕ mn ħdjd nwr aːlhdaː sʔaʶħdˤːrˤ bʕdˤaʶːaʶn mn aːlqhwa ʔaldjk mftaːħ hðaː aːlbaːb waːlslaːm ʕlj jwm wldt wjwm ʔamwt wjwm ʔabʕθ ħjaː walaʔaan jakuwna bihaaː muʶqaʶsˤːiʶrˤaʶnaʶː fajuðʕinu biaːliaːnqijaaːdi ʁrjb hðaː lkn aːlbaːb ftħ lwħdh aːnt tħfr qbrk faʔiiðaaː aːlnːud͡ʒuwmu tˤuʶmiʶsaʶt fʔamaː mn ʔawtj ktaːbh bjmjnh fjqwl haːʔum aːqrʔwaː ktaːbjh maaː tasbiqu min ʔaumːaain ʔaad͡ʒalahaaː wamaaː jastaʔaχiruwna hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbaːnja ʔamlk bjtaːan fj aːld͡ʒbaːl nħn laː ntwaːʕd wfj rwaːjai ʁjri aːltːirmðjːi ʔinh kaːn fj ʔahlh msrwraː wlaː tkwnwaː kaːlðjn tfrqwaː waːχtlfwaː mn bʕd maː d͡ʒaːʔhm aːlbjnaːt wʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb ʕðˤjm hw trknaː nðhb maː ʔin tbdʔa aːltdχjn fʔinh jsˤʕb ʕljk trk tlk aːlʕaːda aːlsjʔia ʔinh jħb aʶːlˤsˤjd jawma laaː tamliku nafsun linafsin ʃajʔianaː waaːlʔaamru jawmaʔiiðin lilːahi ʔanaː mn ʔaustraːljaː maː qlth sˤħjħ walaʔiin ʔaaðaqnaaːhu naʕmaaːʔa baʕda dˤaʶrˤːaʶaʶːʔaʶ masːathu lajaquwlanːa ðahaba aːlsːajːiʔiaaːtu ʕanːij ʔiinːahu lafariħun faχuwrun ql jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs ʔinmaː ʔanaː lkm nðjr mbjn qaːl laː tχtsˤmwaʶː ldj wqd qdmt ʔiljkm baːlwʕjd waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ madadnaaːhaaː waʔaalqajnaaː fijhaaː rawaaːsija waʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː min kulːi zawd͡ʒin bahijd͡ʒin laː faːʔida mn ʕðr khðaː aʶːlˤsˤjn bld ʕðˤjm hl jwd͡ʒd mtd͡ʒr hnaː ʔawlm jtfkrwaː aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi tanzijlu aːlkitaaːbi mina aːllːahi aːlʕazijzi aːlħakijmi klːnaː ʔasraː sˤbaʶːbaʶːt aːlhwaː waaːlʔaanafaau fij aːlʔaabnaaːʔi fij muqaaːbalaai aːlʔiiʃfaaːqi fij aːlʔaːbaaːʔi wahadajnaaːhumaaː aʶːlˤsˤːiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶ aːlmustaqijma lm tbn rwmaː fj jwm waːħd ʔiinːaaː naχaaːfu min rabːinaaː jawmanaː ʕabuwsanaː qaʶmtˤaʶrˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː sʔaːχð hðh aʶːlˤmðˤlˤaʶ ldj nsˤf maː ldjh mn ktb fqtˤ walaw naʃaaːʔu lˤaʶtˤaʶmaʶsnaʶaʶː ʕalaaː ʔaaʕjunihim faaːstabaquwaː aʶːlˤsˤːiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶ faʔaanːaaː juʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʕlaː sˤrˤaʶːtˤ mstqjm qaaːla rabːi ʔiinːij ðˤaʶlˤaʶmtuʶ nafsij faaːʁfir ʔad͡ʒml mmːaː kaːnt fj aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤaʶː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ħm wðlkm ðˤnkm aːlðj ðˤnntm brbkm ʔardaːkm fʔaʶsˤbħtm mn aːlχaːsrjn ʃkraːan ʕlaː aːltafahːum waqad qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː linabijːihi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama lmaːðaː jħdθ hðaː daːʔimaːan lj ʔin dʕwtah rbmaː sjʔatj flaː ʔaqsm bmwaːqʕ aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔiinːaaː ʔaanʃaʔanaaːhunːa ʔiinʃaaːʔan kjfa sʔasdd djwnaː aːlʔaːn wʔiðaː qrʔi aːlqrʔaːn faːstmʕwaː lh wʔaʶnsˤtwaʶː lʕlkm trħmwn jwm laː tmlk nfs lnfs ʃjʔiaː waːlʔamr jwmʔið llh wlaː tħzn ʕljhm wlaː tkn fj dˤjq mmaː jmkrwn lawlaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː ʕalajhi biʔaarbaʕaai ʃuhadaaːʔa faʔiið lam jaʔatuwaː biaːlʃːuhadaaːʔi faʔauwlaʔiika ʕinda aːllːahi humu aːlkaaːðibuwna ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlːaðij janbaʁij ʔaan jaʕmalahu fij ħajaaːtihi maʕmuwlanaː jaː mwsaː ʔinh ʔanaː aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm waʔiin kaaːnuwaː min qabli ʔaan junazːala ʕalajhim min qablihi lamublisijna mn kaːn jrd͡ʒw lqaːʔ aːllh fʔin ʔad͡ʒl aːllh lʔaːt whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔanti ln tbtʕdj hða aːlmra hðaː maː nrjd ʔan nʕrfh maaː kaaːna maaːniʕanaː min ħiʶfðˤiʶhiʶ baʕda taʶsˤaʶwːuʶrˤiʶhiʶ wafahmihi ljst sˤʁjrˤaʶ ʔaljs kðlk qaːla: sˤaʶdaʶqtaʶ qaːla: faʔaaχbirnj ʕani aːlʔiħsaːni ljs mʕj ʔakθr ʔinhm kaːnwaː laː jrd͡ʒwn ħsaːbaː ʔaraːdt mnːj aːlkðb waqaaːla ʔibrwjs ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶʕ man fawqak juʶtˤiʶʕk man duwnak wʔiðaː ʔanʕmnaː ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔaʶʕrˤdˤ wnʔaaː bd͡ʒaːnbh wʔiðaː msh aːlʃr kaːn tudχili aːlnːaaːra faqad ʔaaχzajtahu wamaaː lˤiʶlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ min ʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶn falaaː dunjaaːhum ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶbtuʶm wajaʔanisu bihi aʶːlˤdˤːaʶʕiʶjfuʶ jʔakl twm aːllħm fqtˤ wʔiðaː qjl lhm tʕaːlwaː jstʁfr lkm rswl aːllh lwwaː rʔwshm wrʔajthm jsˤdwn whm mstkbrwn fij aːlʕaðli nafʕun walaaː fij aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ maʶtˤmaʶʕuʶn bl ʔijaːh tdʕwn fjkʃf maː tdʕwn ʔiljh ʔin ʃaːʔ wtnswn maː tʃrkwn kl ʃjʔ ʕlaː maː jraːm ʕan ʕaaːʔiiʃaaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhaaː ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla lamawadːaaun mimːan juħibːuk muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː χajrun min aːlrːaħimi aːlqarijbi aːlkaaːʃiħi waqaaːla ʔaːχaru rbmaː twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕl ʃjʔiaːan llmsaːʕda qaːlwaː d͡ʒzaːʔuh mn wd͡ʒd fj rħlh fhw d͡ʒzaːʔuh kðlk nd͡ʒzj aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔin aːlðjn qaːlwaː rbnaː aːllh θm aːstqaːmwaː flaː χwf ʕljhm wlaː hm jħznwn faːtχðtmwhm sχrjaː ħtaː ʔanswkm ðkrj wkntm mnhm tdˤħkwn ʔaħb lʕb kra aːlqaːʕda faman jaʕmal miθqaaːla ðarːaain χajranaː jarahu ʔarjd ʔan trwjaː lj klː maː ħdθ hw ktb rsaːlaan wad͡ʒazaaːhum bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤuʶwaʶː d͡ʒanːaaan waħarijranaː fʔamaː aːlðjn kfrwaː fʔaʕðbhm ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː fj aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wmaː lhm mn naʶːsˤrˤjn tʕlm fj mdrsa ʕmwmja qarijbun min aːlnːaaːsi jwm jdʕwn ʔilaː naːr d͡ʒhnm dʕaː aːllːahi aːlːaðij lahu maaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wawajlun lilkaaːfirijna min ʕaðaaːbin ʃadijdin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi zaaːʔiidu aːlʔiimhaaːli raaːʔiidu aːlʔiihmaaːli ʔanti ʕljki fqtˤ ʔan tʕidjnj bʃjʔ waːħd fahaðaaː ʔaaslamu aːlmalalajni waʔaaqrabu aːlrːad͡ʒulajni jusaaːmiħu fij waqti aːstaraaːħathu waħijna fatratihi whw aːlðj jħjj wjmjt wlh aːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr ʔaflaː tʕqlwn swf nuqlʕ fj ʁdˤwn dqaːʔiq taʶðˤuʶnːuʶ ʔaan jufʕala bihaaː faaːqiraaun faʁulibuwaː hunaaːlika waaːnqalabuwaː sˤaʶaʶːʁiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ fsnjsrh lljsraː waʔaanːa aːlʔaaħmaqa maʶħðˤuʶwðˤuʶn aːnaː mtʕb d͡ʒdaː lkj aːmʃj aːkθr mn ðlk bqj aːlqljl mn aːlħljb fj aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa knt ttħdθ fj nwmk aːlbaːrħa ʔaaχafːu ʔiθqaaːlanaː wakulafanaː lhðh aːlmsrħja θlaːθa fsˤwlˤ laː tnsa ʔan trsl hðh aːlrsaːla qaaːla ʔaafaraʔaajtum maaː kuntum taʕbuduwna twqft aːlmbaːraːa bsbb ʕaʶːsˤfaʶ rʕdja wlkn ʔanaː ʔafhm maː jqwl tˤlˤbtk laː jħbwnnj lqd smʕt aːlkθjr ʕnk kj nsbħk kθjraː waaːlʁinaaː ʕan aːlnːaaːsi lqd qlt lk ʔanh ljs hnaː ħaːwl ʔan jdfʕnj lˤʔaʶsqtˤ fj aːlmaːʔ ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðijna taaːbuwaː min qabli ʔaan taqdiruwaː ʕalajhim faaːʕlamuwaː ʔaanːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun aːlmthm brjʔ ħtaː tθbt ʔidaːnth faqaaːla bal ʔaahlakatkum aʶːlˤjaʶqiʶðˤaʶaʶuʶ aːstlm aːld͡ʒaːʔiza ʔaħd ʕʃr tˤaʶːlˤbaʶːaʶn lqd qtˤʕt aʶːsˤbʕj waaːstadʕaaːhu aːltːaqrijbu ql ʔin sˤlˤaʶːtj wnskj wmħjaːj wmmaːtj llh rb aːlʕaːlmjn fabaʃːarnaaːhu biʁulaaːmin ħalijmin waʶbiʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ ʔaaħraaː ʔaan janaaːla waʶjaʶðˤfaʶrˤaʶ lm ʔakn ʔatwqʕ bʔan "twm"sjqʕ fj ħb "maːrj" ʔanaː lw knt ʁnja, knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶʕtˤjk aːlmaːl fj aːlħrb aːlʕaːlmja aːlθaːnja qtl aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs ”maː aːlðj tχfjh wraːʔ ðˤhrˤk“ ”laː ʃjʔ“ hl hðaː lka flmaː d͡ʒaːʔ aːlsħra qaːlwaː lfrʕwn ʔaʔin lnaː lʔad͡ʒraː ʔin knaː nħn aːlʁaːlbjn lqd fʕl ðlk mraːraːan wtkraːraːan kjf td͡ʒrʔ ʕlaː qwl ʃjʔin khðaː θumːa baʕaθnaaːhum linaʕlama ʔaajːu aːlħizbajni ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶː limaaː labiθuwaː ʔaamadanaː maaːðaaː ʕalajka ʔiðaaː ʔakramta ʔamsijatijbiـ: kajfa ʔanti masaaːʔu aːlχajri muʃtaaːqu waaːʕlam ʔaanːa sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħaʶ aːldːunjaaː muʕtabarun min wad͡ʒhajni hl ʔant mn kwkb laː tʕjʃ fjh ʔilaː aːlnsaːʔ ltrtaːħ fj tswqk aːlʔasbwʕj jd͡ʒb ʔan tmlk sjaːraan kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔiχraːd͡ʒ ljlaː mn aʶːlˤsˤːwrˤaʶ nħn aːlqmrjwn mn ʔijmaːnin waːħd kaːn ðlk aʶːstʕrˤaʶːdˤaʶː bʔatm mʕnaː aːlklma ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lafij χusrin wataðaruwna maaː χalaqa lakum rabːukum min ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒikum bal ʔaantum qawmun ʕaaːduwna waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajastafizːuwnaka mina aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ lijuχrid͡ʒuwka minhaaː waʔiiðanaː laaː jalbaθuwna χilaaːfaka ʔiilːaaː qalijlanaː waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʔaaswadi aːldːuʔualijːu nðˤrˤt ħwlj wuʶdˤiʶʕaʶ saːmj tħt rʕaːja ʔasra ħaʶːdˤnaʶ judχilu man jaʃaaːʔu fij raħmatihi waʶaʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔaaʕadːa lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː ʔinhu ʔiqtbaːs mn ktaːb lnraː wasahula ʕalajhi kulːu ʕasijrin fj hðh aːlljla qmt bhðaː bdwn ʔan tfkr qaaːla haðaaː firaaːqu bajnij wabajnika saʔaunabːiʔiuka bitaʔawijli maaː lam taʶstaʶtˤiʶʕ ʕalajhi sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː waːtqwaː aːlðj χlqkm waːld͡ʒbla aːlʔawljn waʔaamːaaː ʔiin kaaːna min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːljamijni wqaːl aːlmlk aːʔitwnj bh ʔaʶstχlˤsˤh lnfsj flmaː klmh qaːl ʔink aːljwm ldjnaː mkjn ʔamjn laː bd lj ʔan ʔaʶtˤlˤb mnk ʔan ttˤjʕ ʔawaːmrj ʔiinːa aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ lakum ʕaduwːun faaːtːaχiðuwhu ʕaduwːanaː ʔiinːamaaː jadʕuw ħizbahu lijakuwnuwaː min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlsːaʕijri ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lqlm ʔajn jnthj hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams sjkwn ħfl mjlaːdh ʁdaː ʕnd aːlθaːlθa ʔaʶðˤhrˤt aːlntaːʔid͡ʒu χtˤʔaʶ aːltnbʔuaːt jrsl ʕljkmaː ʃwaʶːðˤ mn naːr wnħaːs flaː tntsˤrˤaʶːn waʔiin kulːun lamːaaː d͡ʒamijʕun ladajnaaː muʶħdˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ldjh ndbh ʕlj ðqnh wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːbn mrjm wʔamh ʔaːja wʔaːwjnaːhmaː ʔilaː rbwa ðaːt qraːr wmʕjn lqd aːnhaːr mn ʃda ħbh lhaː qaaːla famaaː χaʶtˤbuʶkaʶ jaaː saaːmirijːu θumːa qaraʔaa ʔinːamaaː jaχʃaaː aːllːaha min ʕibaaːdihi aːlʕulamaaːʔu waʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlrːaaːbiʕaau jkmn fj aʶːlˤqsˤaʶ ʃjʔ mn ʕnsˤrˤ aːltraːd͡ʒjdjaː jħb twm aːlħjaːka hw trka twm jðhb aːʃtrjt bʕdˤ aʶːlˤbjdˤ aʶːlˤtˤaʶːzd͡ʒ aːlðj ʔataː mn aːlmzrʕa lltw lqd aːtuːhima baːχtlaːs aːlʔamwaːl aːlʕaːmːa wafadajnaaːhu biðibħin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn ðlk ʕjsaː aːbn mrjm qwl aːlħq aːlðj fjh jmtrwn wajastaqilːu ʕinda aːstiqlaaːlihi wajudχiluhumu aːld͡ʒanːaaa ʕarːafahaaː lahum aːlðj aːlqurʔaːna ʕiʶdˤiʶjnaʶ ʔaskn fj mdjna kbjra waqijla man raaːqin bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi wajlun lˤiʶlˤmuʶtˤaʶfːiʶfiʶjnaʶ wahum ʕalaaː maaː jafʕaluwna biaːlmuʔuminijna ʃuhuwdun kaʔaanːahu d͡ʒimaaːlatun sˤuʶfrˤuʶn twm jrqd fj aːlfraːʃ mħmwmaːan hl tnwj aːlqdwm ʁdanaː ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː qaʶsˤiʶaʶ ʃaʕr hl hj sˤʕbaʶ llʁaːja lkj tuktb aːlmqaːrna bjn aːlʔiθnajni lm tkn aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ fajudχiluhum rabːuhum fij raħmatihi ðalika huwa aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu kaːn saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː hl ttħdθ aːlfrnsja ʔam lhm ʃrkaːʔ fljʔatwaː bʃrkaːʔihm ʔin kaːnwaː fʕlta knt ʔafkr hl trjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ ln nnsaː ʔabdaː lˤtˤfk kaːrjn nmsaːwja laː jʃtrj ʔilaː maː hw dˤrˤwrˤj haːa kaːnt jaːʔisa mn ʔan ttzwd͡ʒ bitarki aʶːlˤiʶaʶːstiʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔatnaːwl aːlʁdaːʔ ʕnd aʶːlˤðˤhjrˤaʶ mʕ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj ʔaʶsˤiʶrˤːaʶ ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ hl hðh hj ħqaː aːlħqjqa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi biaːlʕadli waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ takuwnu mudːaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi ʔiinːa aːlʔaabraaːra lafij naʕijmin wanasuwqu aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔiilaaː d͡ʒahanːama wirdanaː θumːa ʔaʶaʶfiʶjdˤuʶwaʶː min ħajθu ʔaʶaʶfaʶaʶːdˤaʶ aːlnːaaːsu waaːstaʁfiruwaː aːllːaha ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun sʔaltuh ʕn aːlħaːdθ ʔanaː lstu χaːʔifaan waaːlʔiidlaaːla ʕalajhi waʔiin taqadːamat sˤuʶħbaʶtuʶhuʶ walakin aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː man fawqak min aːlʕulamaaːʔi ðaːk aʶːlˤʃχsˤ sˤdjqj χaːlj jʕjʃ fj lndn ql lmn aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmn fjhaː ʔin kntm tʕlmwn hl ʔant mstʕd ʔan ttˤjrˤ maːðaː tqtrħ fad͡ʒumlaau aːlʔaansaaːbi ʔaanːahaaː tanqasimu θalaaːθaaa ʔaaqsaaːmin wʔawrθkm ʔaʶrˤdˤhm wdjaːrhm wʔamwaːlhm wʔaʶrˤdˤaʶː lm ttˤʔiʶwhaʶː wkaːn aːllh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjraː hðaː ʔabj hw jrtbik ʕndmaː jraːhaː ðlk aːlmħl jʁlq fj aːlsaːʕa aːltaːsʕa kl ljla sʔaʶnðˤf aʶːlˤmtˤbχ bʕd qljl ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ bal lːaː juwqinuwna walaaː tukaaːfiʔiuwaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmaʶnaʶː faʶjaʶbtˤuʶlˤaʶ faʶdˤlˤuʶkuʶm waliðalika qijla tafaqːahuwaː qabla ʔaan tasuwduwaː sʔard͡ʒʕ ħaːlaː hjaː bnaː nðhb lnraː ʔiðaː kaːn twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː hnaːk ðbaːba fj aːlqhwa taʶbsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶaʶn waðikraaː likulːi ʕabdin munijbin hðaː srjr kjf bʔimkaːnnaː ʔan nħkm ʁjrnaː ʕndmaː laː nsttˤjʕ ʔan nħkm ʔanfsnaː jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kulːa jawmin huwa fij ʃaʔanin jaʔatuwnanaaː fij ħaaːli aːlquwːaai binaaː ʕalajhim wʔiðaː naːdjtm ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ aːtχðwhaː hzwaː wlʕbaː ðlk bʔanhm qwm laː jʕqlwn wajatawaqːaaːhu aːlħaaːzimu min suwʔi ʕawaaːqibi aːlfitnaai waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami min aːldːunjaaː ʕalaaː aːldːunjaaː dalijlun aːlsjd ʔisbraːntw bχjr, aːljsa kðlk aːlktaːb ʕlaː aːlmktb ʁdaː sjkwn fj bjth ʔant ʁnjː jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːaaːsu qad d͡ʒaaːʔakum burhaaːnun min rabːikum waʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajkum nuwranaː mubijnanaː wad͡ʒazaaːʔu sajːiʔiaain sajːiʔiaaun miθluhaaː faman ʕafaaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːahu laaː juħibːu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ fij maqʕadi sˤiʶdqiʶn ʕinda malijkin muqtadirin aːlrːaħmanu ʔaʕndk qlm "nʕm ʕndj waːħd" jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha wakuwnuwaː maʕa aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː lzjaːrth ʔin lm tkn mʕj fʔant dˤdj aːlðjn laː jʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm baːlʔaːχra hm kaːfrwn aːnhaː kswl hl trjdjnj ʔan mʃtˤ ʃʕrk faðarhum fij ʁamratihim ħatːaaː ħijnin hðaː hdaː waːlðjn kfrwaː bʔaːjaːt rbhm lhm ʕðaːb mn rd͡ʒz ʔaljm ”maː aːlðj d͡ʒraː aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ“ ”laː ʃjʔ aːlbta“ ʁsl saːmj aʶːlˤsˤħwn wafijhaaː kafaaː lilʕulaaː waaːlhimam wafijhaaː dˤaʶmaʶaʶːnuʶn linajli aːlmunaaː ʔiʃtraːth ʕʃr dwlaːr qaːlt lhm aːlmdrsa ʔalaː jsbħwaː fj aːlnhr aʶːlˤqaʶːstˤwn fmn ʔaslm fʔawlʔik tħrwaː rʃdaː ʔaaw liħamijːaain daaːχalatk ʕinda taʕaðːuri fahmihi ʔaan talida aːlʔaamaau rabːatahaaː waʔaan taraaː aːlħufaaːaa aːlʕuraaːaa aːlʕaaːlaaa riʕaaːʔa aːlʃːaaːʔi jaʶtaʶtˤaʶːwaʶlˤuʶwnaʶ fij aːlbunjaaːni wqaːlwaː mhmaː tʔatnaː bh mn ʔaːja ltsħrnaː bhaː fmaː nħn lk bmʔumnjn ʔinhaː tnaːdnj knd͡ʒj aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ ʕlaː aʶːlˤħaʶːʔiʶtˤ lm jkn twm jstmʕ fkaːnt hbaːʔ mnbθaː twqfj ʕn dˤrˤb ʔaχjki laː tqlq ʔalm ʔaql ʔan kl ʃʔi sjsjrʕlaː nħw d͡ʒjd kamaaː ʔaaχrad͡ʒaka rabːuka min bajtika biaːlħaqːi waʔiinːa farijqanaː mina aːlmuʔuminijna lakaaːrihuwna laaː jud͡ʒaaːdilu ʔilːaaː munaaːfiqun ʔaaw murtaaːbun aːlsmka tχtfj tħt aʶːlˤsˤχwrˤ θumːa jud͡ʒzaaːhu aːld͡ʒazaaːʔ aːlʔaawfaaː ʔabj fj aʶːlˤmtˤbχ lʔanh jtˤbχ ʔanaː mhtm kθjraː bħrb aːlwrwd ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː jaχfaaː ʕalajhi ʃajʔun fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaaː fij aːlsːamaaːʔi waʔaaslamu bnu sadraaa waʕaaːmiru bnu ħadraaa aːmlʔa aʶːlˤtˤlˤb ʔadnaːh walaw d͡ʒaaːʔathum kulːu ʔaːjaain ħatːaaː jarawuaː aːlʕaðaaːba aːlʔaalijma law ʔaaradnaaː ʔaan natːaχiða lahwanaː laaːtːaχaðnaaːhu min ladunːaaː ʔiin kunːaaː faaːʕilijna maː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʔaħaːwl aːlmsaːʕda fħsb waaːlbaχijlu baʕijdun min aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa hw tˤbjbuʶn d͡ʒjːd ʔin hðh tðkra fmn ʃaːʔ aːtχð ʔilaː rbh sbjlaː hðaː ʕðˤjm walaħmi tˤaʶjrˤiʶn mimːaaː jaʃtahuwna laː ħjaːa fj aːlħaːswb kmaː ʔan aːlsaːʕa laː ħjaːa fjhaː waːlðj jmjtnj θm jħjjn lm ʔakn fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ kn aːkθr mrwnh ʔanaː mʃʁwl aːljwm lqd ħd͡ʒzt mkaːnaː tlk aːlmwsjqaː tðkrnj daːʔimaːan bk aːrtdaː mnːaːd mlaːbsh juʶtˤaʶaʶːfuʶ ʕalajhim bikaʔasin min maʕijnin aːktʃfnaː klma aːlmrwr bshwla waaːlʕaduwːu ʕaduwːanaː liʕadwihi ʕalajk trk ʕaːʔilth w ðhb llʕjʃ fj taːhjtj aːtuhm sqrˤaʶːtˤ baːlʔilħaːd lʔanh lm jʔumn bzjws ʔatmnaː lk jwmaːan lˤtˤjfaʶːaʶn laqad wuʕidnaaː haðaaː naħnu waʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː min qablu ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilːaaː ʔaʶaʶsaʶaʶːtˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlʔaawːalijna lam jad͡ʒib baʕθaau aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi ʔilajhim hl hðh ʔawl zjaːra lk llmdjna laː jwd͡ʒd dχaːn mn ʁjr naːr aːlnsaːʔ jtqdmwn fj aːlsn ʔakθr mn aːlrd͡ʒaːl ʔinhaː qdjma qidm aːltilaːl aːlðjn jtχðwn aːlkaːfrjn ʔawljaːʔ mn dwn aːlmʔumnjn ʔajbtʁwn ʕndhm aːlʕza fʔin aːlʕza llh d͡ʒmjʕaː wʔaχj haːrwn hw ʔaʶfsˤħ mnj lsaːnaː fʔarslh mʕj rdʔaː jsˤdqnj ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʔan jkðbwn mn tkwn kalaːːa ʔiinːahu taðkiraaun aːðaː wd͡ʒdt ʕbaːra "aːntht aʶːlˤmqaʶːtˤʕ aːltj tħtaːd͡ʒ tsd͡ʒjl lhðh aːllʁa" fʕd aːlaː aːlmwqʕ laːħqaː laː tql lj hðh hj aːlsaːʕa aːltj aːʃtrjthaː aːms flnðjqn aːlðjn kfrwaː ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː wlnd͡ʒzjnhm ʔaswʔa aːlðj kaːnwaː jʕmlwn sʔaʕwd fj aːlsaːdsa w aʶːlˤnsˤf wabaðla fabiʕizːatika laʔauʁwijanːahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna lm ʔaraː ʃjʔiaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin naʶaʶːdˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn wamin ʃarːi ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada aːlðjn jqjmwn aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wjʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm baːlʔaːχra hm jwqnwn laː ʔamlk aːlmaːl aːskt jaː ʁbj ln ʔaraːh bʕd aːljwm bʕdˤ aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ jsbħwn fj aːlbħr ʔaʔarjthaː waːldjk wʔið qaːlt aːlmlaːʔika jaː mrjm ʔin aːllh aʶːsˤtˤfaʶːk wtˤhrˤk muʔutalifijna biaːlmaʕuwnaai muʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤiʶlˤiʶjnaʶ biaːlħaaːd͡ʒaai fahaðaaː waʔiin kaaːna muʶχtaʶsˤːaʶnaʶː bimuʕaaːnaaːai aːlnːisaaːʔi falajsa biʔaalzama ħaaːlataj aːlzːawd͡ʒaaːti lqd aːʃtrjt hðaː wahuwa karijʃaain tusalːu lm tʔaχðh mʕhaː wtaːllh lʔakjdn ʔaʶsˤnaʶːmkm bʕd ʔan twlwaː mdbrjn d͡ʒnaːt ʕdn aːltj wʕd aːlrħmn ʕbaːdh baːlʁjb ʔinh kaːn wʕdh mʔatjaː aːlhdwʔ fj aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ aːħtraːm lnwm aːlʔaːχrjn ʔataː mnːaːd ʔilaː mnzlj fj nhaːja aːlʔasbwʕ bqjt aːllh χjr lkm ʔin kntm mʔumnjn wmaː ʔanaː ʕljkm bħfjðˤ waqaaːla aːlkindijːu fij baʶʕdˤiʶ rasaaːʔiilihi χaːʃʕa ʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤhm trhqhm ðla wqd kaːnwaː jdʕwn ʔilaː aːlsd͡ʒwd whm saːlmwn walan juʔuaχːira aːllːahu nafsanaː ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaad͡ʒaluhaaː waaːllːahu χabijrun bimaaː taʕmaluwna ʔaʶdˤft bʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ wd͡ʒjʔ jwmʔið bd͡ʒhnm jwmʔið ʔinmaː knaː nχwdˤ wnlʕb ql ʔabaːllh wʔaːjaːth wrswlh kntm tsthzʔiwn wqaːtlwaː fj sbjl aːllh waːʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh smjʕ ʕljm waʶfaʶdˤlˤaʶ aːlmaʁijbi ʕalaaː aːlmaʃhadi karmun wmn aːlljl fthd͡ʒd bh naːfla waθamuwda famaaː ʔaabqaaː walaqad mananːaaː ʕalajka marːaaan ʔauχraaː ʔata laː jmknk tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja walaw duχilat ʕalajhim min ʔaʶaʶqtˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhaʶaʶː θumːa suʔiiluwaː aːlfitnaaa laʔaːtawhaaː wamaaː talabːaθuwaː bihaaː ʔiilːaaː jasijranaː baqijːatu aːllːahi χajrun lakum ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna wamaaː ʔaanaaː ʕalajkum biʶħaʶfiʶjðˤiʶn wakuntum ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒanaː θalaaːθaaan waqaaːla muwsaaː ʔiin takfuruwaː ʔaantum waman fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ d͡ʒamijʕanaː faʔiinːa aːllːaha laʁanijːun ħamijdun ljʔaklwaː mn θmrh wmaː ʕmlth ʔajdjhm ʔaflaː jʃkrwn ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf mftaːħ aːlnd͡ʒaːħ lkn mftaːħ aːlmstqjm wajusqawna fijhaaː kaʔasanaː kaaːna mizaaːd͡ʒuhaaː zand͡ʒabijlanaː laː jstwj ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlnaːr wʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒna ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒna hm aːlfaːʔizwn ʔaafalaaː jatadabːaruwna aːlqurʔaːna aːllh wjbʁwnhaː ʕwd͡ʒaː whm baːlʔaːχra hm kaːfrwn waqaaːla ʃabijbu bnu ʃajbaaa aːlʔaadijbu aːlʕaaːqilu huwa aʶːlˤfaʶtˤiʶnuʶ aːlmutaʁaaːfilu ʔatʕrf ʔaħdanaː fj ʔastraːljaː waqad qijla libazard͡ʒamhara wlkn ʔakθrhm laː jʕlmwn ʔafmn hðaː aːlħdjθ tʕd͡ʒbwn hw ldjh aːbn sˤʁjrˤ wamin raħmatihi d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra litaskunuwaː fijhi walitabtaʁuwaː min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ walaʕalːakum sjkwn ʕlaː maː jraːm bjtj baːlqurb mn aːlmdrsa ql fʔatwaː bktaːb mn ʕnd aːllh hw ʔahdaː mnhmaː ʔatbʕh ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn bal humu aːljawma mustaslimuwna ʕljnaː ʔan nhtmː baʶːlˤmħaʶːfðˤaʶ ʕlaː traːθnaː ʔauwtijtahu drd͡ʒaːt mnh wmʁfra wrħma wkaːn aːllh ʁfwraː rħjmaː ħaːwli fʕl ʃjʔ ʔaːχr kun ðkwraː ʔiðaː kunt kðwbaː mn jʔatjh ʕðaːb jχzjh wjħl ʕljh ʕðaːb mqjm waʔiið qaaːlati aːlmalaaːʔiikaau jaaː marjamu ʔiinːa aːllːaha aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːkiʶ waʶtˤaʶhːaʶrˤaʶkiʶ waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːkiʶ ʕalaaː nisaaːʔi aːlʕaaːlamijna wkʔajn mn qrja ʔamljt lhaː whj ðˤaʶːlˤmaʶ θm ʔaχðthaː wʔilj aʶːlˤmsˤjrˤ taχajːaruwaː aʶːlˤrˤːjaʶːdˤjaʶːt maːdːa tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ðkaːʔ stʔaχðk hðh aːlħaːfla ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ tbdwaː ʔanjqaː bhðh aːlθjaːb faʔaamːaaː aːld͡ʒalijːu fahuwa jasbiqu ʔilaaː fahmi muʶtaʶsˤaʶwːiʶrˤiʶhiʶ min waʶjaʶtaʶfaʶaʶːdˤaʶlˤuʶ bitabaaːjuni d͡ʒihaaːtihi ʔaʶðˤnː ʔanːh jrtkb χtˤʔaʶ kbjraː fj rˤfdˤh lhðaː aʶːlˤmnsˤb ln jʕd͡ʒbk maː sʔaqwl wlaː ʔaqsm baːlnfs aːllwaːma falaaː juʶnsˤiʶfuʶwnaʶ muħsinanaː aːlθmn waʶːlˤsˤbħ ʔiðaː tnfs hl tstmʕ jðˤhrˤ ʔan klːanaː mn twm wmaːrj fj mzaːd͡ʒ sʕjd ʔaraː ktaːbaːan jnmw aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ srjʕaː hðaː aːlʃrħ jtχtˤaʶː tˤaʶːqtj aːlaːstʕaːbja km ʕmr aːbnk ljs mn ʔank ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶtnj bʃχsˤ ʔaːχr ʕljnaː ʔiʶtˤʕaʶːm aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ fj fsˤlˤ aːlʃtaːʔ twm ljs mdjnaː lj bʔaj ʃjʔ aːlħb ʃjʔ w aːlzwaːd͡ʒ ʃjʔ ʔaːχr ʔatwtr daːʔimaː qbl ʔan ʔaχrd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlmsrħ lm jkn ldjː wqt llʔakl waaːstaʁfiri aːllːaha ʔiinːa aːllːaha kaaːna ʁafuwranaː raħijmanaː wad͡ʒaaːʔa rabːuka waaːlmalaku sˤaʶfːaʶnaʶː sˤaʶfːaʶnaʶː hl hðaː ħlm lnlqi nðˤrˤaʶ waʔaumlij lahum ʔiinːa kajdij matijnun fʔin twlwaː fʔinmaː ʕljk aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn rˤfdˤ twm aːlaːstmaːʕ laː jwd͡ʒd maː jdʕw llʔiʕtðaːr maː hw mhm ljs aːlhdf, wlkn aːlrħla aːltdχjn mmkn ʔan jkwn mmjtaːan θumːa ʃaqaqnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʃaqːanaː wamaʔaluwfun ʔiin ʔaanaaː ʔiilːaaː naðijrun mubijnun wahaðaaː ʔinːamaaː jaʶsˤiʶħːuʶ aːstiħlaaːʔuuhu fijmaaː qalːa wahuwa biʶaʶːlˤlˤːaʶfðˤiʶ aʶːlˤsˤːaʶrˤiʶjħiʶ mustaqalːun wlqd χlqnaː aːlʔinsaːn mn slaːla mn tˤjn watataʁajːaru maʕa taʁajːuri aːlħaaːlaaːti ðalika biʔaanːa aːllːaha huwa aːlħaqːu waʔaanːahu juħjij aːlmawtaaː waʔaanːahu ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun watilka aːlʔaamθaaːlu naʶdˤrˤiʶbuʶhaʶaʶː lilnːaaːsi wamaaː jaʕqiluhaaː ʔiilːaaː aːlʕaaːlimuwna kn mtˤmʔiʶnaʶː w aːʕlm ʔannaː snqwm bkl maː bwsʕnaː lkn mn ʔajn nħsˤlˤ ʕlaː tlk aːld͡ʒml wkjf ntrd͡ʒmhaː ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanːh sjd͡ʒtaːz aːlaːmtħaːn kalːaaː ʔiinːahum ʕan rabːihim jawmaʔiiðin lamaħd͡ʒuwbuwna waqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ χulafaaːʔiihi laː dχaːn bdwn naːr faʔiin ʔaʶuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ minhaaː lam jaʃbaʕ aʶːntˤlˤqt sjaːra aːlsbaːq bsrʕa aːlbrq ʔilaː mn rħm aːllh ʔinh hw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ fij sababi aːlzːijaaːdaai waʶaʶːlˤtːaʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶ wmn ʔaːjaːth ʔan χlqkm mn traːb θm ʔiðaː ʔantm bʃr tntʃrwn waʔiin tarakahumaaː ħurima aːlðjn hm ʕlaː sˤlˤaʶːthm daːʔimwn waqihimu aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti waman taqi aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimtahu waðlika huwa aːlfawzu aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmuʶ tʕmd ʔan jdws ʕlaː qdmj hl tlʕb kra aːlqdm θumːa laː jamwtu fjhaː walaː jaħjaː laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ wħjdaː sr aːlθlaːθa sr lld͡ʒmjʕ sʔaːχðk ʔilaː mkaːn stkwn fjh fj ʔamaːn walaː taʶħaʶːdˤːwnaʶ ʕalaː tˤaʶʕaʶːmiʶ aːlmiskjni wajuʃijʕuhaaː kalaaːmun saaːbiqun faqaaːla ʔinːij aːʃtarajth lirad͡ʒulin laaː juqaaːsimu ʔaaχaaːhu dirhamanaː hl bʔimkaːnk ʔiʕaːda maː qlt tlqːaː saːmj ʕlaːd͡ʒaː wamin raħmatihi d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaːra litaskunwaː fjhi walitabtaʁwaː min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ walaʕalːakum taʃkurwna kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ ʔaħdaː aːʕlam ʔaanːa min ħusni aːltːawfijqi waʔiimaaːraaːti aːlsːaʕaaːdaai aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlmulimːaaːti waaːlrːifqi ʕinda aːlnːawaaːzili ðˤnː saːmj ʔanː hðaː kaːn mfjdaː lh haaːdin jahdijnij aːlsːabijla faʶjaʶðˤuʶnːuʶwnaʶ ʔaanːahu jaʕnij hidaaːjaaa aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjqiʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi laaː samijra kaaːlʕilmi walaaː ðˤaʶhiʶjrˤaʶ kaaːlħilmi ʔant tfʕlh btˤrˤjqaʶ χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ waʔiin ʕarija ʕan ʔaaħadi haðihi aːlʔaasbaaːbi kaaːna ðulːanaː walam jakun ħilmanaː jaaː ʔaabaaː ʕabdi aːllːahi ʔinh aːχtlaːf klb d͡ʒawaːaːlun χjr mn ʔasd rˤaʶːbdˤ tħtl aːld͡ʒzaːʔiraːlmrtba aːlθaːmna ʕaːlmjaː fj ʔintaːd͡ʒ aːlzjtwn bnwʕjh aːlmwd͡ʒh llzjt ʔaw aːlmaːʔida hðh aːlsaːʕa ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mn tlk tmkːn saːmj ʔan jbqaː jqðˤaʶː ʔiinːahu ðˤaʶnːaʶ ʔaan lan jaħwra md͡ʒddaːan ljs mra ʔaχraː ʕʃ ʕzjzaː ʔaw mt wʔant krjm hum d͡ʒaːʔiʕwn hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaː rabːika fataχʃaː balaaːaː man kasaba sajːiʔiaaan waʶʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶt bihi χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶtuʶhuʶ faʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna wasanaðkuru min ʔaaħwaaːli ʔaadabi aʶːlˤrˤːiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ waʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːstiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ fuʶsˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː taħtawij ʕalaaː maaː jalzamu muraaːʕaaːtuhu min aːlʔaaχlaaːqi kl ʔinaːʔ baːlðj fjh jndˤħ faaːstaχafːa qawmahu faʶʔaʶaʶtˤaʶːʕwhuʶ ʔiinːahum kaːnwaː qawmanaː faːsiqjna ħaʶːfðˤ ʕlaː wd͡ʒba ʔiʶftˤaʶːrˤmtwaʶːznaʶ wsˤlˤ aːlsːjːd baːkr ʔiin kuntum fij rajbin mimːaaː nazːalnaaː ʕalaaːaː ʕabdinaaː faʔatuwaː bisuwraain min miθlihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlnːaaːsu ʔaaʃtaaːtun walikulːi d͡ʒamʕin ʃataaːtun saːmj ʃdjd aːlχd͡ʒl ʔaθmːa maː trjd ʔiχbaːrj ʕnh snstmr fj hðaː ħtaː jmnʕnaː ʔaħdhm waðakara ʔaanːahu liʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhihi qðf aːlʃrq mn blaːd aʶːlˤħjaʶːdˤ ʔin knt tʁdw fj aːlðnwb d͡ʒljdaːan wudːa flm tubqi ʕlaː wudːih kʔan qrqra aːltðmr swʔ aːld͡ʒwaːr waːlʔisaːʔa ʔilaː aːlʔabraːr mn ʔaʶʕðˤm aːllːʔum ʔanaː ʔaraː ʔanh qaːdm ʕlaː aːld͡ʒsr lm jkn baːlkrjm fʕlaː wlaː aːlbaːrʕ d͡ʒd bħsn aːltwfjq maː ʃʔit mnh laːsjmaː fj saːʕa aːltʕlumi fðaːk wqt aːlaːdb aːlmuħatːami ðˤnnt ʔanh sjkwn hnaː ðlk fqtˤ rʔajun ʃχsˤj qfzt mn ʕlaː aːlkrsj mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tkwn ħðraː ħjn aːχtjaːrk lˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶk bdʔat aʶːlˤsˤħjfaʶ tfqd fj aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj lm jmut saːmj kaːnaː jtsˤaʶːfħaʶːn bsˤmjmjaʶ wkʔanhmaː lm jrjaː bʕdˤhmaʶː lsnwaːt hðh hdjːa lˤfaʶːdˤlˤ lnrħːb bh fj ʔasrtnaː kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jħaːwl d͡ʒaːhdaː ʔan jʃaːrk ljlaː fj ʔaw ʔaʕtqwaː jfkːr twm bnfs aʶːlˤtˤrˤjqaʶ hðaː ktaːb klh d͡ʒhl ʔauwlaʔiika aːlʔaakjaaːsu ðahabuwaː biʃarafi aːldːunjaaː wakaraaːmaai aːlʔaːχiraai zaːr aːlfrzdq ʔahl aːlħd͡ʒaːz aʶːstnsˤħt sˤdjqthaʶː wʔaanːa hðaː aːldhra fj hazlh jaː aːbn mn tˤaʶːb fj aːlmwaːljd ħraː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqbl baːlʔislaːm djnaː aːld͡ʒwd ʔawlaː bh waːlfqr ʔawlaː bnaː bmqaːrna tˤwkjw mʕ lndn td͡ʒd aːlaːχjra sˤʁjrˤaʶ kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jʃaːrk fj aːlmsjraːt aːltːwːʕja mn ʔad͡ʒl mħaːrba aʶːlˤsːrˤtˤaʶːn mn waqaːra ʕaːlimaːan fqd waqaːra rbːh jwmjaː aʶːħsˤlˤuʶ ʕlaː ʃjʔ d͡ʒdjd zaːrt ljlaː saːmj fj aːlqaːhra tʕaːl mn fdˤlˤk wʔafʃjt srj ʔilaː sˤaʶːħb hl mn aːlmmkn ʔan tnsˤħnj bktaːb tʔalq aːlbrq lh ʕʃjaː hl tʕlm ʔan ʔanθaː aʶːlˤbʕwdˤ hj aːlmsʔuwla ʕn kl lsʕaːt aʶːlˤbʕwdˤ ʔiin kaːn ʁjbk aːltraːb aːlʔaħmr ʔaqtrħ bʔan tʕml bmaː jqwlh twm faʶːlˤħfðˤ llʕlm bdwn aːlfhm kktb fwq aːlħmjr aːlbuhm lmn aːldaːr kʕnwaːn aːlktaːb mn aːld͡ʒmjl mħaːdθtk mlʔat bqaːʕ aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ χjl d͡ʒnwdh ʔanðrtnj ʔam sʕd ʔan sʕdaː srqt aːlħrb mnhm sʕaːdthm jaː lħbr mdˤaʶː wʔaχlaː aːldjaːraː qlt llaːʔim fj aːlħb ʔafq mn lqlb jhjm fj kl waːdj kl ʃjʔ mn ʕaːlm aːlðraːt laː tdˤjʕwaʶː mn ʔiljkm slmwaː aʶːdˤħkwaʶː θm aʶːdˤħkwaʶː jaː haːzljn χfq aʶːlˤtˤbwlˤ wzmra aːlndmaːn ljlaː hj aːbna faʶːdˤlˤ aːlmdlːla lmaːðaː ʔawqfth d͡ʒaːd baːlwʕd fj zmaːn bχjl ʔanaː sr aːld͡ʒnwn qbl aːld͡ʒnwn ʔanaː ʔaħs ʕndmaː jkðb ʕlj ʃχsˤ jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔatħdːθ mʕk ʔaqwl lh wlm ʔanfs bnfsj ʕlnaː ʔanaː mʔumn bʔan ʕljk aːlaːrtqaːʔ fj ħjaːtk bd͡ʒhdk aʶːlˤʃχsˤj bdt ljlaː raːʔiʕa ħznj mnk jaː aːbna aːlʔamlaːk lqd ʔawqfth ʔaljs kðlk lqd wsˤlˤ aːlbaːrħa aːlaː tˤwkjw ʔaʕrf msbqaːan maːðaː sjkwn mwdˤwʕ aːlbrnaːmd͡ʒ aːlraːdjwj ʔiðaː fj md͡ʒls nðkr ʕljaːan lqd tħsːn kθjraː ljtnj lm ʔakn lˤʕtˤfk nlt aʶːlˤtˤqs ljlaːan jkwn baːrdaːan hl tʕlm ʔan aːlklaːb aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ tʕjʃ ʕaːda ʔakθr mn aːlslaːlaːt aːlkbjra nðˤf jdjk d͡ʒjdaːan baʶːntðˤaʶːm baːstχdaːm mtˤhrˤ aːljdjn aːlkħwlj ʔaw aːʁslhmaː baːlmaːʔ waʶːlˤsˤaʶːbwn hm jsknwn χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna aːstbq wd ʔabj aʶːlˤdˤħaʶːjaʶː mʕnaːhm aːlʃhdaːʔ ʔaħbː ʕzf mwsjqaː aːlblwz mθl mqaʶːbdˤ aːlʔabwaːb waːlħnfjaːt wʃaːʃaːt aːlhaːtf ʁzwa aːlχndq ـ mʕrka ʁjrt wd͡ʒh aːltaːrjχ ʔajhaː aʶːlˤnaʶːtˤqwn baʶːlˤdˤaʶːd hðaː jmkn ltwm aːlbqaːʔ ʔin rʁb tqbːl faʶːdˤlˤ aːlʔislaːm kd͡ʒzʔ mn ħjaːth ʔajhaː aːlsaːʔil ʕnj ʔinnj lʕlh mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan ʔaʕwd lʕmlj ʔaraː aːldhr ʔafnaː mʕʃrj wbnj ʔabj kl jwm hw ʕtˤlˤaʶ fj mkaːn maː mn aːlʕaːlm sjtm aːlaːmr kaːnt ljlaː mnfzʕa lʕlj bn sˤaʶːlˤħ bn ʕlj ʔad͡ʒbnj ʔin tfdˤlˤt tslqtu d͡ʒbl fwd͡ʒj θlaːθ mraːt ʕnd dˤrˤb ʔaj rqm fj sˤfrˤ jkwn aːlnaːtd͡ʒ sˤfrˤ lm ʔad͡ʒd bʕd maː tˤlˤbh mnj twm qd tʕdwaː ʕlaː aʶːlˤsˤjaʶːm wqaːlwaː ftħ aːlbwːaːb aːlbaːba nʃrt aʶːlˤmnðˤmaʶ ʔasʔila wʔad͡ʒwba ʕn aːlthwja wtkjjf aːlhwaːʔ hðaː ħqaː ħdjθ d͡ʒjd aːbtsmt wqblt hdjtj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ maː rʔatnj ʕjnaːk jwm aːlfraːq kjf qd ħaːwlwaː aːʁtjaːlk ʁdraː ðhb aːlðjn thzhm mdaːħhm kamaaː tanaaːmuwna kaðalika tamuwtuwna wʔakθr mn aːlʔiχwaːn maː aʶːstˤʕt ʔinhm ʔaʃʕr ʔanːj mrˤjdˤ qljlaː blda χaːb bmn fjhaː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ waʶːsˤlˤt ljlaː aːlsːjaːqa mn maːt jʕlm ʔank aːlħq aːlmbjn ʔajaː ʕjn d͡ʒwdj wlaː tsʔamj kaːn bʔimkaːnk ʔan traː aːldːm fj klː mkaːn lqd rʔajtk bmkaːn maː mn qbl qlq saːmj kθjraː lhðaː aːlʃːʔan aːʕtnq faʶːdˤlˤ aːlʔislaːm w ʕmrh θlaːθa w ʕʃrwn sna mħmd maː ʔaχlftnaː maː wʕdtnaː ljlaː qlqa bʃʔank aːlnhr jd͡ʒf laː tql hðaː waːlʔaːlaːm waːlʔawd͡ʒaːʕ waʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ ʔin d͡ʒmaːl jswq sjaːrth ʕbr aːld͡ʒsr waruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla fij baʶʕdˤiʶ χuʶtˤaʶbiʶhiʶ kjf tʕlm bmlkja twm lhðaː kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ mstʕdːaː ʔan jstqrː mʕ ljlaː klː ʃjʔ jtʁjːr ʔablʁ aːlħaːrθ ʕnj ʔannj maː zaːl jtwd͡ʒb ʕljnaː fʕl ðlk ʔatraː aːlnsjm ʔiðaː sraː mn nd͡ʒdh ʃʕraːʔ msˤrˤ wlaː ʔaqwl d͡ʒmjʕkm ʔahlaː bwd͡ʒhk mn sˤbaʶːħ mqbl aʶːlˤsˤdq ʔaʶfdˤlˤ maː ħdˤrˤt bh mabaaːsima aːlθaʁri maː ʔaħlaː ħumjaːki hðaː aʶːlˤtwaʶːdˤʕ ʔin ʔardt mwaːhbaː laː tʔaχðnk fj sˤdjq ʃbha laː tχf maː sˤnʕt bk aːlʔaʃwaːq χsˤwsˤjtk mhma lnaː mθwba aːlfaːqd ʕn fqdh wmaː fj aːlnaːs ʔad͡ʒwd mn ʃd͡ʒaːʕ ʔanaː raːʕ lmaː sˤfaʶː mnk qdmaː tħdːθ faʶːdˤlˤ w daːnja ʕn aʶːlˤtˤqs maː ʔazmtj aːʃtdt lwqr χtˤjtj fj ðj aːld͡ʒfwn sˤwaʶːrˤm aːlʔaqdaːr blaːʁa aːbn fraːs d͡ʒbrjl hll fj aːlsmaːʔ wkbr lʕmrj lqd ʔankrt ʁjr nkjr mn sˤwrˤ aːlsħr aːlmbjn ʕjwnaː sjaːra maːrkw ʔismhaː "θaːndr d͡ʒaːjnt" klaː bl tkðbwn baːldjn ʕmlj aːld͡ʒdjd jtrk lj aːlqljl mn aːlwqt lˤlˤaʶːχtlˤaʶːtˤ hl bʔimkaːnk aːltʕrf ʕlaː ðlk aːlrd͡ʒl bwaʶːstˤaʶ hðh aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ sʔakwn ħðraː d͡ʒdaː walakin kaðːaba watawalːaaː nħnu swfa nusaːʕdki, mwaːfqa tʔaχrtu ʕlaː aːlmwʕd nħn bħaːd͡ʒa lˤbʕdˤ aːlʁðaːʔ waːtqwaː aːlðj ʔamdkm bmaː tʕlmwn wabaʃːiri aːlmuʔuminijna biʔaanːa lahum mina aːllːahi faʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː kabijranaː wlw qaːtlkm aːlðjn kfrwaː lwlwaː aːlʔadbaːr θm laː jd͡ʒdwn wljaː wlaː nsˤjrˤaʶː laː jħtaːd͡ʒ laːmrʔaa kj tʕtnj bh td͡ʒjd jwmj aːlħdjθ baːlʔind͡ʒljzja sbħaːn aːlðj χlq aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ klhaː mmaː tnbt aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmn ʔanfshm wmmaː laː jʕlmwn ʔanta tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔan tnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aːlʔaumwr mn zaːwja mχtlfa, ʔinhaː ljst kaːrθja kmaː tðˤn lqd tχlːjt ʕn ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤk wajaχuwnuk nafʕuhaaː nʕjʃ fj aʶːlˤʕsˤrˤ aːlnwwj wad͡ʒaaːfin ʕan aːlnːawmi d͡ʒanbak wad͡ʒaʕaluwaː lilːahi ʔaandaaːdanaː lˤiʶjuʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶwaʶː ʕan sabijlihi qul tamatːaʕuwaː faʔiinːa maʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶkuʶm ʔiilaaː aːlnːaaːri lahum ʕaðaaːbun fij aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaaʃaqːu wamaaː lahum mina aːllːahi min waaːqin wlqd ftnaː aːlðjn mn qblhm fljʕlmn aːllh aːlðjn sˤdqwaʶː wljʕlmn aːlkaːðbjn ʔaʶnsˤħk bʕdm msˤaʶːħbaʶ twm laː jkwn waːħdaː mnːaː ʔaðn llðjn jqaːtlwn bʔanhm ðˤlˤmwaʶː wʔin aːllh ʕlaː nsˤrˤhm lqdjr jaʶχtaʶsˤːuʶ biraħmatihi man jaʃaaːʔu waaːllːahu ðuw aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ wataskijnanaː lˤiʶsˤaʶwlˤaʶtiʶhiʶm fʔin aːld͡ʒna hj aːlmʔawaː sumjːtu ʕlaː χaːlj qd tkwn aʶːlˤdˤħjaʶ msˤaʶːbaʶ fj aːlrʔas aːlklaːb waʶːlˤqtˤtˤ waːlχjwl ħjwaːnaːt faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabːanaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaθq bh qbːlnj aːjhaː aːlʔaħmq lqd hjʔat nfshaː llʕba aːltns baːltdrjb lsaːʕaːt kl jwm ʔin rbk hw jfsˤlˤ bjnhm jwm aːlqjaːma fjmaː kaːnwaː fjh jχtlfwn bal jurijdu aːlʔiinsaaːnu lijafd͡ʒura ʔaamaaːmahu hl fqadt ruʃdak ʔanaː kbjr bmaː fjh aːlkfaːja lˤʔaʶsˤwt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlmutaqadːimijna aːstiʁnaaːʔuuk ʕan aːlʃːajʔi χajrun min aːstiʁnaaːʔiik bihi aːldjaːnaːt aːlsmaːwja aːlθlaːθ hj aːlʔislaːm waːljhwdja waːlmsjħja ħaːla lθtk sjʔia jwd͡ʒd χdʃa hnaː fhl tsttˤjʕ aʶːʕtˤaʶːʔiʶj ħsm ʔaj maħal mθld͡ʒaːt ʔanta ðaːhb ʔiljh rubːijtu ʕlaː mʃaːhda bwkjmwn ðkr rħmt rbk ʕbdh zkrjaː tbdw fj aːlstjnaːt mn ʕmrhaː ʕlaː aːlʔaql warubːamaaː tatbaʕu nafsu aːlʔiinsaaːni man baʕuda ʕanhu aːstihaaːnaaan biman qaruba minhu lm jktb ʃjʔ ʕlaː aːlmrwħja ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːjaːt wʔin knaː lmbtljn km jwmanaː fj aːlʔasbwʕ rb nd͡ʒnj wʔahlj mmaː jʕmlwn kʔanhn bjdˤ mknwn ʔaatadʕuwna baʕlanaː wataðaruwna ʔaaħsana aːlχaaːliqijna aʶːtsˤlˤ bj lw smħt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʕbs wtwlaː aːlʕadlu ʔaaw aːlʃːud͡ʒaaːʕaau qaaːluwaː aʶːħtfðˤ bhðh aːlmʕlwma lnfsk ql ʔinmaː ʔanðrkm baːlwħj wlaː jsmʕ aʶːlˤsˤm aːldʕaːʔ ʔiðaː maː jnðrwn qaːlwaː bl lm tkwnwaː mʔumnjn wanamaaːriqu maʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶuʶn lilsːaaːʔiili waaːlmaħruwmi tˤbʕaʶːaʶn qdm lj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤnsˤaʶːʔiʶħ warubːamaaː taqadːama biʶaʶːlˤχaʶtˤːiʶ man kaaːna aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːuʶ min d͡ʒulːi faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶhiʶ aʶːlˤsˤħaʶ knz laː jʕrf qjmth ʔilaː aʶːlˤmrˤdˤaʶː faaːntaqamnaaː minhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaðːibijna ʔiðaaː aːʃtadːa aːlkalafu faʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː mina aːllːahi waniʕmaaan waaːllːahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔin hðaː swf jd͡ʒʕl mn aːlmstħjl ʕljh ʔan jħfðˤ maːʔ aːlwd͡ʒh ʔaj qtˤaʶːrˤ jʔaχðnj ʔilaː wstˤ aːlmdjna lm jtmkn mn aːħtwaːʔ ʁdˤbh w lw lθaːnja ʔajn stkwn jwm aːlʔiθnjn wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː fij qarjaain min nabijːin ʔiilːaaː ʔaaχaðnaaː ʔaahlahaaː biaːlbaʔasaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶrˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶ laʕalːahum jaʶdˤːaʶrˤːaʶʕuʶwnaʶ ʔatsmħ lj baːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw liʔaanːahaaː ʔiðaaː manaħat kadːat waʔaatʕabat ʔanaː tħdθt mʕ twm laaː jufatːaru ʕanhum wahum fijhi mublisuwna maː hw aːld͡ʒjnz hðaː laː tdˤf d͡ʒmlaː mn msˤaʶːdrˤ mħfwðˤaʶ aːlħqwq kjf jsjr aːlʕml laː ʔamlk aːlmaːl lʃraːʔ aːlqaːmws fajakuwnu kaman taqadːama fijhi aːlmaθalu aːlsːaaːʔiiru liʔaabij aʶːlˤbaʶtˤħaʶaʶːʔiʶ maaː ʔaaʃadːa wad͡ʒaʕa aʶːlˤdˤːiʶrˤsiʶ ʔaʁlq aːlbwaːba waman ʁaaːlaba aːlħaqːa laaːna ħdθth ʕn mʃaːklhaː wadaaːru nad͡ʒaaːain liman fahima ʕanhaaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlˤk kaːn aːljwnaːnjwn ʔawl mn aːʕtbr aːlʔaħdaːθ aːlsmaːwja ðˤwaʶːhrˤ tstħq aːlaːktʃaːf lajsa ħaqaaːanaːlʔamr lajsa lahu ʕilaːqaun bik ʔaʶsˤbħ ʕmrhaː waːħdaːan w θmaːnjn sna lkn hðh aːlʕmlja tmt bʃkl tdrjd͡ʒj lmlaːjjn aːlsnjn lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan ʔataː ʔilaː mnzlj dˤaʶːʕ jrbwʕj tʔaqlmwaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa ʔanaː baːlfʕl mtʔaχr wlaː ʔaʃk ʔan mʕk fdˤlˤaʶː hl mn ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj ʔaalaaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aʶːlˤlˤːaʶtˤiʶjfuʶ aːlχabijru sʔaʃtrj haːtfaː χlwjaː ʁdaː hjhaːt ʃʕbj jstkjn wamaaː wad͡ʒadnaaː liʔaakθarihim min ʕahdin waʔiin wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaakθarahum lafaaːsiqijna jmknka ʔan tqwlhaː ʕlaː hðaː aːlnħw, wlknhaː mubtðla aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ hw aːlðj χlqkm mn tˤjn θm qdˤaʶː ʔad͡ʒlaː wʔad͡ʒl msmaː ʕndh θm ʔantm tmtrwn hl bʔimkaːnj aːstʕaːra hðaː aʶːlˤqrˤsˤ ʔawd aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔilaː rʔajk qad jaʕlamu aːllːahu aːlmuʕawːiqijna minkum waaːlqaaːʔiilijna liʔiiχwaaːnihim halumːa ʔiilajnaaː walaaː jaʔatuwna aːlbaʔasa ʔiilːaaː qalijlanaː lqd ʔistχdmt rʔashaː jnbʁj ʔan tkwn lwsj fj aʶːlˤmtˤbχ aːlʔaːn laː tdˤʁtˤ aːlaːrz jbdwn ʔamrjkjjn waʔiimːaaː ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒafaaːʔi waaːlʕuquwqi fʔimaː nðhbn bk fʔinaː mnhm mntqmwn hj thtm baːlmwsjqaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː laː tχwnwaː aːllh waːlrswl wtχwnwaː ʔamaːnaːtkm wʔantm tʕlmwn wd͡ʒaːʔ ʔiχwa jwsf fdχlwaː ʕljh fʕrfhm whm lh mnkrwn zrʕt wrdaːan lam jakun lˤiʶlˤsːuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ lubθun walaaː liʔaajːaaːmihi sˤaʶfwuʶn waaːlsːaaːdisu aːlfaraaːʁu aːlːaðij jakuwnu maʕahu aːltːawafːuru waʶjaʶħsˤuʶlˤuʶ bihi aːliaːstikθaaːru laː ʔaħb aːlmʁrwrjn wazuχrufanaː waʔiin kulːu ðalika lamːaaː mataaːʕu aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraau ʕinda rabːika lilmutːaqijna maːðaː jʕnj ðlk wχlq qaaːla liʔaanːahu jamnaʕuhum min aʶːlˤðˤːuʶlˤmiʶ qrrt ʔalaː nðhb tnzjl aːlktaːb mn aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔaan kaaːna ðaaː maaːlin wabanijna wqjl aːdʕwaː ʃrkaːʔkm fdʕwhm flm jstd͡ʒjbwaː lhm wrʔawaː waʕdu rabːinaaː lamafʕuwlanaː swfa ʔaʶuʶħdˤrˤuʶ ħqjbtj faʔaanta lahu taʶsˤaʶdːaʶaʶː wad͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaahlu aːlmadijnaai jastabʃiruwna tm aʶːlˤqbdˤ ʕlaː twm waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤχaʶaʶːsˤːaʶaʶuʶ taquwlu wʔiðaː rʔawhm qaːlwaː ʔin hʔulaːʔ lˤdˤaʶːlˤwn jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː laaː taχuwnuwaː aːllːaha waaːlrːasuwla wataχuwnuwaː ʔaamaaːnaaːtikum waʔaantum taʕlamuwna jaquwlu jaaː tkðbwn waqijla lahum ʔaajna maaː kuntum taʕbuduwna waʔaawʕaaː minhu ʔiðaaː χalaaː min haðihi aʶːlˤqaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶʕiʶ falaaː hl ttħdθ aːllʁa aːlʔalmaːnja bdʔa jnfð aːlmaːʔ mnːaː ʔiʁlq kl aːlnwaːfð mufsidun lisaaːʔiiri ʔaahlihaaː liqilːaai ʔaamaaːnaaːtihim waʶdˤaʶʕfiʶ dijaaːnaaːtihim fatawalːawaː ʕanhu mudbirijna maːðaː tfʕlaːn aːllːaha rabːakum warabːa ʔaːbaaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawːalijna waʔiin waʶðˤiʶlˤːiʶn min jaħmuwmin ħiraaːsaau aʶːlˤbaʶjdˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːlðːabːu ʕan aːlʔaumːaai min ʕaduwːin fij aːldːijni ʔaaw baaːʁij nafsin ʔaaw maaːlin laː trmj baːlħd͡ʒaːra wfqaːan llraːdjw ʔinhaː stmtˤrˤ ʁdaːan ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf maː jd͡ʒrj hnaː kjf tʁjːrt ħjaːtk waqihimu aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti waman taqi aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimtahu waðalika huwa aːlfawzu aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶ whw aːlðj jnzl aːlʁjθ mn bʕd maː qntˤwaʶː wjnʃr rħmth whw aːlwlj aːlħmjd wabuʕdi ʁaaːjatihi aːlðjn jkðbwn bjwm aːldjn waħuwrun ʕijnun χaːldjn fjhaː ʔabdaː laː jd͡ʒdwn wljaː wlaː nsˤjrˤaʶː ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna ħaqːat ʕalajhim kalimatu rabːika laaː juʔuminuwna ʔinː aʶːlˤqtˤː jʃrb ħljbk waman jaʕmal mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ wahuwa muʔuminun falaaː jaχaaːfu ðˤuʶlˤmaʶnaʶː walaaː haʶdˤmaʶnaʶː ʔaħsntmaː htf djmaː: " ʔanaː djmaː ʔalaː jʕml kaːʃf aʶːlˤmtsˤlˤ ʕndk ʔam maːðaː " ʔanaː hnaː mnð jwm aːlsbt lw jd͡ʒdwn mld͡ʒʔa ʔaw mʁaːraːt ʔaw mdχlaː lwlwaː ʔiljh whm jd͡ʒmħwn ʔinh jʔaml ʔan jd͡ʒd aːlʃhra kʃaːʕr wlw ʕlm aːllh fjhm χjraː lʔasmʕhm wlw ʔasmʕhm ltwlwaː whm mʕrˤdˤwn hl tχbzj χbz ʔaaʔaantum tazraʕuwnahu ʔaam naħnu aːlzːaaːriʕuwna wamaaː ʔaabradahaaː ʕalaaː aːlqalbi ʔiðaaː suʔiila ʔaaħadukum fijmaaː laaː jaʕlamu ʔaan jaquwla aːllːahu ʔaaʕlamu aːlːaðij hum fijhi muχtalifuwna ʔin aːllh jħb aːlðjn jqaːtlwn fj sbjlh sˤfaʶː kʔanhm bnjaːn mrˤsˤwsˤ hl hnaː aːj ʃχsˤ jtklm aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau bal ðalika munafːirun ʕanhaaː wamaaː χalaqnaaː aːlsːamaaːʔa waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ wamaaː bajnahumaaː laaːʕibijna qlwb jwmʔið waːd͡ʒfa tnaːwl hðaː aːldwaːʔ mrːtjn fj aːljwm waqad d͡ʒahiluwaː min aːlmaðaaːhibi maaː jaʕlamu aːlmubtadiʔiu wajatadaaːwaluhu aːlnːaaːʃiʔiu waʶtˤaʶlˤħiʶn maʶndˤuʶwdiʶn fij sˤuʶħuʶfiʶn mukarːamaain ʔanaː mtʕba d͡ʒdaː aːljwm tˤnd͡ʒrˤh wlqt ʁtˤaʶːhaʶː aʶːstjqðˤt ʕnd aːlsaːdsa hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ jaχaaːfanːa ʔilːaaː ðanbahu stħbh ʔilaː aːlʔabd wamin ʔaːbaaːʔiihim waðurːijːaaːtihim waʔiiχwaaːnihim waaːd͡ʒtabajnaaːhum wahadajnaaːhum ʔiilaaː ħsaːb wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ rawaaːsija ʔaan tamijda bihim wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː fijhaaː fid͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː subulanaː laʕalːahum jahtaduwna wʔamaː mn χaːf mqaːm rbh wnhaː aːlnfs ʕn aːlhwaː kaaːna aːld͡ʒadbu jaħduθu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlfasaaːdi maaː dˤaʶaʶːdːaʶhaʶaʶː hl tʃaːrk fj hðaː aːlħdθ ʔanaː kbjr bmaː jkfj ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun biʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ faʔiinːahum jawmaʔiiðin fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʃtarikuwna twm jntðˤrˤ sˤlˤaʶːħ ʔamrk baːlʔaχlaːq mrd͡ʒʕh faqawːim aːlnfs baːlʔaχlaːq tstqm falamːaaː ʔaaħasːuwaː baʔasanaaː ʔiiðaaː hum minhaaː jaʶrˤkuʶdˤuʶwnaʶ waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤiʶrˤ fasawfa juʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ badijʕu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʔiiðaaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu fjhaː faːkha waːlnχl ðaːt aːlʔakmaːm wʔilaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ kjf stˤħt waʔiin kaaːna taʶqsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aʶːlˤlˤːaʶfðˤiʶ ʕan aːlmaʕnaaː lisuwʔi fahmi aːlmutakalːimi fahuwa ʔaʶaʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ aːlʔaumuwri ħaaːlanaː hðaː sˤdjqj twm walahum ʕalajːa ðanbun faʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaqtuluwni rbmaː jwd aːlðjn kfrwaː lw kaːnwaː mslmjn ʔin aːllh laː jðˤlˤm aːlnaːs ʃjʔiaː wlkn aːlnaːs ʔanfshm jðˤlˤmwn bʕzmj wnaːrj wbrkaːn θʔarj wʔaʃwaːq dmj lˤʔaʶrˤdˤj wdaːrj hl wsˤlˤtnj ʔaj rsaːʔil liʔaanːa min ʕilali aʶːlˤmaʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶ maaː huwa ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶrˤuʶn faʔiinːahunːa ʔaaquwmu bihaðaaː aːlħaaːli ʁaːjaun tuـʃaــriːfu wraːjـaun trafـrifu jaː haـــnaــaːk fـj ʕuـــlaːk kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj mmtlkaːthi aʶːlˤχaʶːsˤaʶ faqaaːla aʶːrˤdˤaʶ biaːlqawti waχaf min aːlfawti waaːd͡ʒʕal sˤaʶwmaʶk aːldːunjaaː waʶfiʶtˤrˤaʶk aːlmawta faaːljawma nunad͡ʒːijka bibadanika litakuwna liman χalfaka ʔaːjaaan waʔiinːa kaθijranaː mina aːlnːaaːsi ʕan ʔaːjaaːtinaaː laʁaaːfiluwna hj mtˤrˤbaʶ twm laː jmknhu ʔiχfaːʔ sr ʕn maːrjaː wllh aːlmʃrq waːlmʁrb fʔajnmaː twlwaː fθm wd͡ʒh aːllh ʔin aːllh waːsʕ ʕljm wjwm wifaaːqanaː wʃaːhd wmʃhwd ʔaʕtrf bʔannj knt mhmlaːan haːa ʔatt ʔilaː hunaː mraan ʔaχraː d͡ʒnaːt ʕdn td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː wðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ mn tzkaː waaːlχaaːmisu aːliaːktifaaːʔu bimaaːdːaain tuʁnijhi ʕan kalafi aʶːlˤtˤːaʶlˤaʶbiʶ maː ʔant ʔilaː bʃr mθlnaː fʔat bʔaːja ʔin knt mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn wadːat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn min ʔaahli aːlkitaaːbi law juʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶwnaʶkuʶm wamaaː juʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶwnaʶ ʔiilːaaː ʔaanfusahum wamaaː jaʃʕuruwna wahaðaaː qawlu aːbni ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː maːðaː kunti stqwljna lw knti fj mkaːnj faʔaawd͡ʒasa fij nafsihi χijfaaan muwsaaː aːljawma bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʔaanːahum humu aːlfaaːʔiizuwna ʔirm ðaːt aːlʕmaːd mnːaːd laː jzaːl fj mnzl sˤdjqth wamin kulːi ʃajʔin χalaqnaaː zawd͡ʒajni laʕalːakum taðakːaruwna lqd twqf aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ, lðaː jmknnaː aːlbdʔ walam jabqa maʕahumaaː wad͡ʒdun ʔaʕtðr laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔakwn qaːdraːan ʕlaː ðlk waʔiin zaaːla aːlsːababu bizawaaːli aːlrːaʁbaai waaːlrːahbaai muχtalifijna fij aːlrːizqi fahaðaaː ʁanijːun wahaðaaː faqijrun hm jħbwnnaː ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaaː ʔin dˤjʕt mftaːħj fln ʔaqdr ʕlaː ftħ aːlbaːb qalijlu aːlʕilmi χajrun min kaθijri aːlʕibaaːdaai flmaː rʔawh zlfa sjʔit wd͡ʒwh aːlðjn qlbj bjn ʔasnaːnk χaaːlidijna fijhaaː laaː juχafːafu ʕanhumu aːlʕaðaaːbu walaaː hum juʶnðˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ hðaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤwn θmra tʕaːwn mʕ md͡ʒmwʕa raːʔiʕa mn aːlnwaːdj aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːbjaʶ mn kaːml aːltraːb aʶːlˤwtˤnj liʔaanːahu lam jakun minhu taʶqsˤiʶjrˤuʶn fajuðamːu ʔaaʔaamintum man fij aːlsːamaaːʔi ʔaan jaχsifa bikumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ faʔiiðaaː hija tamuwru ʔiinːaaː naʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ ʔaan jaʁfira lanaaː sʔaʶtˤlˤb mnk ʔan tqrʔa lj aːlrsaːla jaː twm ʔanaː whw ʔawlaːd ʕam wajaħd͡ʒizuhum ʕan taʶsˤaʶrˤːuʶfiʶhiʶm waaːqtaraħa waʶsˤfaʶnaʶː muʕd͡ʒizanaː fljkn aːlʔamr kðlk ʔaafaraʔaajtumu aːlmaaːʔa aːlːaðij taʃrabuwna swf ʔaqdm nfsj fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ d͡ʒmjʕnaː jrjd ʔan tnχfdˤ aːlʔasʕaːr haðaaː jawmu laaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ waqaaːla maaːliku bnu dijnaaːrin taʶðˤuʶnːuʶ ʔaan jufʕala bihaaː faaːqiraaun waqaaːla fabiʔiiðni aːllːahi walijaʕlama aːlmuʔuminijna hl mn ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj ʔanaː maː ʃrbt aːlħljb ʔiʶfħsˤ mud͡ʒddaːan wrbk jʕlm maː tkn sˤdwrˤhm wmaː jʕlnwn ʔiinːa ʔiilajnaaː ʔiijaaːbahum χrd͡ʒ rd͡ʒl tˤwjlˤ wnðr sʔabqaː fj aːlbjt aːljwm ʔinhaː tħb aːlmθld͡ʒaːt qul ʔiinːa aːlʔaawːalijna waaːlʔaːχirijna aːħʃrwaː aːlðjn ðˤlˤmwaʶː wʔazwaːd͡ʒhm wmaː kaːnwaː jʕbdwn faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ ħwtaː bhðaː aːlħd͡ʒm waman kaaːna fij haðihi ʔaaʕmaaː fahuwa fij aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaaʕmaaː waʶʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤːuʶ sabijlanaː ʔanaː lst mtʔakːdaːan ʔanːnj sʔakwn qaːdraːan ʕlaː aːlqdwm mʕk ʔaanafaaan min aːstiʕlaaːʔi aːlʔaabaaːʕidi ʕalaaː aːlʔaaqaaːribi laː jntbhwn lj aːltːaʁaaːfulu aːlħaaːdiθu ʕan aʶːlˤfaʶtˤiʶnaʶaʶiʶ lqd kaːn mmtnaːan lmsaːʕdtk kaːn mnːaːd ʕaʶːtˤfjːaʶː ʔamj tħbnj wahuwa aːlʔaawːalu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlʔaulfaai faliʔaanːahu jabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤtːaʶnaʶaʶːsˤuʶrˤiʶ lmaːðaː hðh aːlwrda hj ʔad͡ʒml aːlwrwd ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤlˤaʶːq hðaː hw aːlktaːb aːlðj knt ʔabħθ ʕnh waʔiin ʕaaːqabtum faʕaaːqibuwaː bimiθli maaː ʕuwqibtum bihi walaʔiin sˤaʶbaʶrˤtuʶm lahuwa χajrun lˤiʶlˤsˤːaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ d͡ʒðbt ʔiljhaː aːlʔilktrwnaːt aːlħra ltʃkl ðraːt mtʕaːdla aːlʃħna hl ðkr ʔaħd ʔismj hl ttħdθ ʕðaːb ʔaljm lqd ʔaʕdːt ħsaːʔ χdˤrˤwaʶːt aːlljla waʶsˤaʶdːaʶqaʶ biaːlħusnaaː aʶːlˤsˤjdlˤjaʶ bd͡ʒwaːr aːlmʃfaː ʔaad͡ʒaʕala aːlʔaːlihaaa ʔiilahanaː waaːħidanaː ʔiinːa haðaaː laʃajʔun ʕud͡ʒaaːbun faʔiin aʶːnsˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ aːlwaaːlidu ʕan ħubːi aːlwaladi falajsa ðalika lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn minhu waqaaːla nuwħun rabːi laaː taðar ʕalaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ mina aːlkaaːfirijna dajːaaːranaː warabːaka fakabːir jwtjwb ljs mwqʕanaː d͡ʒjdaː maː ʔaːmnt qblhm mn qrja ʔahlknaːhaː ʔafhm jʔumnwn sjaːrtj mzwda bmʃʁl ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ mdmd͡ʒa laː ʔarjd qraːʔa ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔalm jtsˤlˤ ʔaħdhm baʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ wʔan aːʕbdwnj hðaː sˤrˤaʶːtˤ mstqjm ħasuna minhu aːlnːakijru maʕa χaʃjaai aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶdˤrˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ waaːltːalafi km ʕdd aːlʔajaːm fj aːlʔasbwʕ nʔasf, wlkn hðaː aːlfjdjw ljs mtaːħaːan qaaːla ʔiinːij lajaħzununij ʔaan taðhabuwaː bihi waʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaʔakulahu aːlðːiʔibu waʔaantum ʕanhu ʁaaːfiluwna ʔafhmth ʔanaː bʃkl sˤħjħ ʔink qmt bðlk ʕn qsˤd liʔaanːa ʔaadaaːʔa aːlwaaːd͡ʒibi juʶsqiʶtˤuʶ ʕanhu aːlʕiqaaːba kaːn mnːaːd daːʔimaː fj mnzl ljlaː laː jmkn lnaː ʔan nʕjʃ ħjaːa sʕjda bdwn khrbaːʔ fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh wmaː lʔaħd ʕndh mn nʕma td͡ʒzaː ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan tuħbjnj hl ʔataːk ħdjθ aːld͡ʒnwd jawma tamuwru aːlsːamaaːʔ mawranaː musawːamaaan ʕinda rabːika wamaaː hija mina aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ bibaʕijdin bnth mtħmsa llðhaːb mʕh ʔilaː ʔaj mkaːn laː tkn rˤtˤbaʶː ftʕsˤrˤ wlaː jaːbsaː ftksr laaː tudrikuhu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ wahuwa judriku aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ wahuwa aʶːlˤlˤːaʶtˤiʶjfuʶ aːlχabijru lknk lst hnaːk hjaː bnaː nðhb wamaʕa aːntifaaːʔi aːltːaʃaaːkuli juʕdamu aːliaːʔitilaaːfu ʔiilːaaː maaː ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu ʔiinːahu jaʕlamu aːld͡ʒahra wamaaː jaχfaaː raːʔiʕ ʔaj srː jʕtrj ʃwqj ʔiljk klwaː waːʃrbwaː hnjʔiaː bmaː kntm tʕmlwn waqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː: aʶːntˤaʶlˤiʶquʶwaʶː ʔiilaaː ðˤiʶlˤːiʶn ðij θalaaːθi ʃuʕabin waʕad͡ʒibt liman raʔaaaː aːldːunjaaː wataqalːubahaaː biʔaahlihaaː θumːa jaʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnːuʶ ʔilajhaaː ʔaʕlm ʔan χbzhaː sjkwn lðjðaː lst χd͡ʒwlaː bajnamaː naħnu d͡ʒuluwsun ʕinda rasuwli aːllhi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama ðaːta jawmin qaaːla hal ʔaantum muʶtˤːaʶlˤiʶʕuʶwnaʶ kl maː ʕljk hw ʔiʶmdˤaʶːʔ ʔismk hnaː hðaː aːlʃaːʕr jmtaːz bħsːh aːlʃʕrj aːlmrhf ʔin lm tstħj faʶːsˤnʕ ʔaħb aʶːlˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aːltj jtklm bhaː wql rb ʔadχlnj mdχl sˤdq wʔaχrd͡ʒnj mχrd͡ʒ sˤdq waːd͡ʒʕl lj mn ldnk slˤtˤaʶːnaʶː nsˤjrˤaʶː waʔaakðibu aːlnːafsa ʔiðaaː ħadːaθtuhaaː ʔinːa sˤiʶdqaʶ aːlnːafsi fij aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai waʔaaʕadːa lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː muhijnanaː laaː jamasːuhu ʔiilːaaː aʶːlˤmuʶtˤaʶhːaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ aːlːaðij χalaqa aːlmawta waaːlħajaaːaa lijabluwakum ʔaajːukum ʔaaħsanu ʕamalanaː wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlʁafuwru ʔakml ħljbk waminhum man juʕijnu walaaː jastaʕijnu hl tʕrf kjf tftħ hðaː aʶːlˤsˤndwq hl jmknk ʔan tkrr maː qlth lltw ʃarːuhu maʶqtˤuʶwʕaʶnaʶː walaaː jaqʕudu ʕan ʔið ʔantm mslmwn wajlun likulːi ʔaafːaaːkin ʔaaθijmin waːlðjn hm bʃhaːdaːthm qaːʔimwn waʔaand͡ʒajnaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː wakaaːnuwaː jatːaquwna wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒna ʔazlft wʔin ʕljk lʕntj ʔilaː jwm aːldjn maaː ʔaaʃd͡ʒaʕahu qaaːtalahu aːllːahu ðˤnntk qlt ʔank laː tħb twm waːlsaːbqwn aːlsaːbqwn ʔiinːa ʕibaaːdij lajsa laka ʕalajhim suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnuʶn ʔiilːaaː mani aːtːabaʕaka mina aːlʁaaːwijna salhum ʔaajːuhum biðalika zaʕijmun ʔaalːaaː taʶtˤʁaʶwaʶː fij aːlmijzaaːni maaː raʔaajt miθla aːld͡ʒanːaai naaːma tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶhaʶaʶː ʔaam jaquwluwna ʃaaːʕirun nːaʶtaʶrˤaʶbːaʶsˤuʶ bihi rajba aːlmanuwni aːlmubijnu ʔawlʔik hm aːlkaːfrwn ħqaː wʔaʕtdnaː llkaːfrjn ʕðaːbaː mhjnaː twqf w ʔilaː ʔaʶtˤlˤqt aːlnaːr waʔiiðaaː ʔaanʕamnaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ wanaʔaaaː bid͡ʒaaːnibihi waʔiiðaaː masːahu aːlʃːarːu faðuw duʕaaːʔin ʕaʶrˤiʶjdˤiʶn waʔiin kaaːna aːlʕaqdu raʁbaaan fij aːltːaʕafːufi fahuwa aːlwad͡ʒhu aːlħaqijqijːu aːlmubtaʁaaː biʕaqdi aːlnːikaaːħi aːlftaː aːlðj ʔaħbh laː jħbnj qaːl faːχrd͡ʒ mnhaː fʔink rd͡ʒjm aʶːtsˤlˤt bj fj wqt mtʔaχr aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ ljkfrwaː bmaː ʔaːtjnaːhm ftmtʕwaː fswf tʕlmwn ʔarjd ħqaː ʔan ʔaʃaːhd hðaː aːlfjlm mʕhaː lntwqf hnaː w nwaʶːsˤlˤ ʁdaː jaaː ʔaajːatuhaaː aːlnːafsu aʶːlˤmuʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnːaʶaʶuʶ faʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː min rabːika ðalika huwa aːlfawzu aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶ fabaqijt murtabikanaː sʔalt aːlmrʔaa msˤʕwqaʶaʶn: " kjf ʔadχlt ħqjbaan fj d͡ʒjbk " θumːa ðahaba ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihi jaʶtaʶmaʶtˤːaʶaʶː waʔaaʕadːa ðalika min niʕamihi aʶːlˤʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmiʶ θumːa radadnaaː lakumu aːlkarːaaa ʕalajhim waʔaamdadnaaːkum biʔaamwaaːlin wabanijna wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːkum ʔaakθara nafijranaː fahija χiʶsˤbuʶ daaːrin tatːasiʕu aːlnːufuwsu bihi fij aːlʔaaħwaaːli wataʃtariku fijhi ðuw aːlʔiikθaaːri waaːlʔiiqlaaːli falajsa kulːu aːlzːamaaːni zamaaːna aːktisaaːbin ðˤrˤf w tˤaʶːbʕ brjd mn fdˤlˤk waʔiiðaaː kaaːna ðaaː ʃarːi ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤaʶhuʶm waʶʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤuʶwhuʶ ʔanaː mstʕd ʔajmknnaː aːlðhaːb walaw qaʶsˤuʶrˤt aːlʔaːmaaːlu maaː tad͡ʒaaːwaza aːlwaaːħidu ħaaːd͡ʒaaa jawmihi d͡ʒaːk jd͡ʒmʕ aʶːlˤtˤwaʶːbʕ ʔin ʔawl bjt wdˤʕ llnaːs llðj bbka mbaːrkaː whdaː llʕaːlmjn faʔiinːa mawadːaaa aːlʃːirːijri tuksibu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔa watufsidu aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʃχsˤ maː jʔakl stdfʕ θmn hðaː laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː huwa juħjij wajumijtu rabːukum warabːu ʔaːbaaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawːalijna ʔalaː tkrh hðaː aːlnwʕ mn aːlʔaflaːm ʔin aːllh jdaːfʕ ʕn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔin aːllh laː jħb kl χwaːn kfwr ʔinhaː raːʔiʕa d͡ʒdaːan ʕljk aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt ʔasaːs aːlħrja waʔaːjaaun lahum ʔaanːaaː ħamalnaaː ðurːijːatahum fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni fafarartu minkum lamːaaː χiftukum fawahaba lij rabːij ħukmanaː wad͡ʒaʕalanij mina aːlmursalijna ʔaːml ʔan hðh aːlrsaːla ʔaθaːrt aːhtmaːmk w ʔanaː fj aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔid͡ʒaːbtk ʔanaː mtʔakda ʔanki mχtˤʔiʶaʶ aːʕlam ʔaanːa maaː bihi taʶsˤlˤuʶħuʶ aːldːunjaaː ħatːaaː taʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ ʔaaħwaaːluhaaː muʶntaʶðˤiʶmaʶaʶaʶn ʔaʶwsˤlˤnj ħtaː aʶːlˤqsˤrˤ ʔanaː ʔaʶnðˤf ʁrftj faʶtaʶqaʶtˤːaʶʕuʶwaʶː ʔaamrahum bajnahum zuburanaː kulːu ħizbin bimaaː ladajhim fariħuwna watatːaχiðuwna maʶsˤaʶaʶːniʶʕaʶ laʕalːakum taχluduwna waʔiin walːajtum ʕalijːanaː tad͡ʒiduwhu haaːdijanaː mahdijːanaː jastabʃiruwna biniʕmaain mina aːllːahi waʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶn waʔaanːa aːllːaha laaː juʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaafasiħrun haðaaː ʔaam ʔaantum laː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʔabj aːʕtaːd ʔan jkwn rd͡ʒlaːan qwjaːan mn kaːn jrjd θwaːb aːldnjaː fʕnd aːllh θwaːb aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wkaːn aːllh smjʕaː bsˤjrˤaʶː whðaː maː jʕrf aːlʔaːn bـqaːnwn haːbl liʔaanːa aːlqabijħa ʔaanamːu min aːld͡ʒamijli waaːlrːaðijlaau ʔaaʃharu min aʶːlˤfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːltːaaːriki lidijnihi aːlmufaaːriqi lild͡ʒamaaːʕaai aːlʕuluwmu maʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶʕuʶhaʶaʶː min θalaaːθaai ʔaawd͡ʒuhin aːlːaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakum mina aːlʃːad͡ʒari aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶχdˤaʶrˤiʶ naaːranaː faʔiiðaaː ʔaantum minhu tuwqiduwna hðaː aːlklb jʔakl tqrjbaːan kl ʃʔi ʔanaː tlmjð wlkn hw ljs bwaːħd qaaːlaaː rabːanaaː ðˤaʶlˤaʶmnaʶaʶː ʔaanfusanaaː waʔiin lam taʁfir lanaaː watarħamnaaː lanakuwnanːa mina aːlχaaːsirijna mnaːd kaːn ʕlaː bʕd ħwaːlj nsˤf saːʕa mn bjth wdaːwwd wsljmaːn ʔið jħkmaːn fj aːlħrθ ʔið nfʃt fjh ʁnm aːlqwm wknaː lħkmhm ʃaːhdjn walamːaaː kaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaakθara ħaaːd͡ʒaaan min d͡ʒamijʕi aːlħajawaaːni kaaːna ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ ʕad͡ʒzanaː aːʃthrt kaːljfwrnjaː bfwaːkhhaː jusmaː aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ aːlðjn fqdwaː ʔawljaːʔhm"jtaːmaː" wajarudːuhum ʔilaaː aːlħilmi waʔiinːaaː lilːahi fijmaaː baqija maaː ʔaaqalːa minhu aːlħaðaru kaːn aʶːlˤnsˤf aːlʔaχjr mn aːlmsrħja mmlaːan qljlaːan wtħml ʔaθqaːlkm ʔilaː bld lm tkwnwaː baːlʁjh ʔilaː bʃq aːlʔanfs ʔin rbkm lrʔwf rħjm maaː aːlʕamalu jaaː turaaː fj aːlwaːqʕ maː ʔaklt ʃjʔiaːan mnð aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ dˤaʶaʶːħiʶkaʶaʶuʶn mustabʃiraaun waʔiiðaaː kaaːna aːltːad͡ʒaaːnusu waaːltːaʃaaːkulu min qawaaːʕidi aːlʔauχuwːaai waʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawadːaai kaːn aʶːlˤtˤqs d͡ʒjdaː ħtaː aːljwm laaː jusminu walaaː juʁnij min d͡ʒuwʕin hl jðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa baːlħaːfla nħnu swfa nusaːʕdki, mwaːfqa ʃfjt mn aʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ ħaːwl djmaː ʔan jshl ʕlaː aːlmrʔaa: " laː tqlqj ʔinh ljs lj " aːklth hðh tˤaʶːwlˤaʶ qaaːla bal rabːukum rabːu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aːlːaðij faʶtˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶnːaʶ waʔaanaaː ʕalaaː ðalikum mina aːlʃːaaːhidijna aːstʁrq aːlʔamr mnj ʔakθr mn saːʕtjn lʔatrd͡ʒm bdˤʕ sˤfħaʶːt fj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː nawmakum subaaːtanaː jwmʔið tʕrˤdˤwn laː tχfaː mnkm χaːfja tlk ktbnaː limaaː fij aːltːaʃaaːʁuli biaːstiχraaːd͡ʒi rumuwzihaaː min aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶbtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ ʕan ʔidraaːkihaaː wadaχala d͡ʒanːatahu wahuwa ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶn linafsihi qaaːla maaː ʔaʶaʶðˤuʶnːuʶ ʔaan tabijda haðihi ʔaabadanaː laː tnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aːlʔasfl ʔiinːaaː mursiluw aːlnːaaːqaai fitnaaan lahum faaːrtaqibhum waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶbiʶrˤ faʔiiðaaː sawːajtuhu wanafaχtu fijhi min ruwħij faqaʕuwaː lahu saaːd͡ʒidijna waʶaʶːstaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ linafsihi lmaːðaː laː jsttˤjʕ ʔabdaː fʕl ʃjʔ faʔiiðaaː aːnʃaqːati aːlsːamaaːʔu juħabːibuhu ʔilaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːdiʶhiʶ wajustafaaːdu bihi ʔiʶndˤaʶaʶːd͡ʒuʶhaʶaʶː wajaaː qawmi man jaʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶniʶj mina aːllːahi ʔiin tˤaʶrˤaʶdtuʶhuʶm ʔaafalaaː taðakːaruwna liʔaanːahu taʶwaʶrˤːaʶtˤaʶ ʔiið jatawafːaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaau jaʶdˤrˤiʶbuʶwnaʶ wud͡ʒuwhahum waʔaadbaaːrahum waðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːba aːlħarijqi ħaʶsˤaʶːntuʶkaʶ biaːsmi aːllh jaaː waʶtˤaʶnuʶ laː, hðaː jkfj ʔanaː mmtlʔi waːlsmaːʔ ðaːt aːlrd͡ʒʕ ðikru raħmati rabːika ʕabdahu zakarijːaaː ʔinhaː qwja wamaaː janbaʁij lahum wamaaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwnaʶ tqaːm aːlʔalʕaːb aːlʔawlmbja kl ʔarbʕ snwaːt ql ltwm ʔan jrfʕ smaːʕa aːlhaːtf lnlʕb kra aːlqaːʕda ħjn jtwqf aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ ʔanaː ʔaʕrf hðaː aːlwld aːlðj laː tʕrf ʕnh ʃjʔiaː ðalikum waʔaanːa aːllːaha muwhinu kajdi aːlkaaːfirijna kalːaaː laʔiin lam jantahi lanasfaʕanaː biʶaʶːlˤnːaʶaʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ ħsnanaː ʕumila ʔiðaaː aːstakdajta aːlfikra fij aːstiχraaːd͡ʒihi faʕalimt ʔaanːahu ʔaaraaːda majtanaː χalːafa ʔaabanaː wazawd͡ʒaaan waʕamːanaː sʔazwrk bnfsj waːstʁfrwaː rbkm θm twbwaː ʔiljh ʔin rbj rħjm wdwd wd͡ʒʕlnaː nwmkm sbaːtaː walajsat radaaːʔaau aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːiʶ hija aːlsːaʕaaːdaaa kaːn aːlsjd braːwjn jʕml bsˤfaʶ sfjr sʔaðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːljwm lmaːðaː hrb ʔabj mn ʔamːj fakaaːna aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːuʶ ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː lahu wamuʕabːiranaː ʕanhu hl tʃrb kʔasanaː ʔaːχr mn aːlqhwa ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶtˤlˤb mnk mʕrwfaː warad͡ʒulun laaː jadrij wajadrij ʔaanːahu laaː jadrij faðalika mustarʃidun faʔaarʃiduwhu falilːahi aːlħamdu rabːi aːlsːamaaːwaaːti warabːi aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna lnbqaː ʕlaː twaʶːsˤlˤ wakulːanaː dˤaʶrˤaʶbnaʶaʶː lahu aːlʔaamθaaːla wakulːanaː tabːarnaaː tatbijranaː ʔilaː mtaː sjkwn d͡ʒwaːz sfrk sˤaʶːlˤħaʶːaʶn nħb daːʔimaː aʶːlˤʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ aːlðjn jqdrwnaː, lkn ljs daːʔimaː nħb aʶːlˤʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ aːlðjn nqdrhm wlqd ʔarslnaː fjhm mnðrjn ʔafʁjr djn aːllh jbʁwn wlh ʔaslm mn fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ tˤwʕaʶː wkrhaː wʔiljh jrd͡ʒʕwn ʔalm jʔatkm nbʔa aːlðjn kfrwaː mn qbl fðaːqwaː wbaːl ʔamrhm wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm hl ħdθ ʔaj ʃjʔ ln jʁjr aːltðmr ʃjʔiaːan wftħt aːlsmaːʔ fkaːnt ʔabwaːbaː lm ʔakn ʔaʕrf twm d͡ʒjːdaː hw aːlðj jsˤlˤj ʕljkm wmlaːʔikth ljχrd͡ʒkm mn aʶːlˤðˤlˤmaʶːt ʔilaː aːlnwr wkaːn baːlmʔumnjn rħjmaː aːllːahumːa ʔaʶaʶʕtˤiʶ munfiqanaː χalfanaː wamumsikanaː talafanaː waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man tawaaːnaaː fij nafsihi dˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ wakamaaː tadijnu tudaaːnu ʔaχtk tħb mʃaːhda mbaːrza aːlswmw ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔiinːakum lafij qawlin muχtalifin ʔanaː mdrs maː hj hwaːjtk lm ntmkn mn aʶːlˤwsˤwlˤ fj aːlwqt aːlmħdd w kaːn hðaː bsbb aʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤfaʶ ʔaanːahu qaaːla fij baʶʕdˤiʶ χuʶtˤaʶbiʶhiʶ ʔattrkwn fj maː haːhnaː ʔaːmnjn faʔiinːa muraaːqabatahu fij aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːhiʶrˤiʶ nifaaːqun watarkahu fij aːlʃːidːaai luʔumun ʔabdanaː ln tastakijnaː ʔabdaː ʔinaːnaː ʔaard͡ʒuw mʕ aːljwmi ʁadaaː wahuwa aːlːaðij ʔaaħjaaːkum θumːa jumijtukum θumːa juħjijkum ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lakafuwrun ʔanaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʔant tħb aːltfaːħ msˤrˤ ʔawlaːdk kraːm ʔawfjaːʔ jrʕwaː aːlzmaːm ʔauħb aːllʁaːt aːlsaːmja std͡ʒd waːħdaː d͡ʒmjla hl tmlk ʔijmjlj qaːmwsaːan χaːldjn fjhaː ʔabdaː ʔin aːllh ʕndh ʔad͡ʒr ʕðˤjm ql jaː qwm aːʕmlwaː ʕlaː mkaːntkm ʔinj ʕaːml fswf tʕlmwn hm wʔazwaːd͡ʒhm fj ðˤlˤaʶːlˤ ʕlaː aːlʔaraːʔik mtkʔiwn qawma firʕawna ʔaalaaː jatːaquwna ʔiinːaaː lamːaaː tˤaʶʁaʶaʶː aːlmaaːʔu ħamalnaaːkum fij aːld͡ʒaaːrijaai ʔard͡ʒwk dʕnj ʔaːχð ʔaχtk mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ aːlkhrbaːʔ mfjda d͡ʒdaːan ʔin aːlðjn jʔuðwn aːllh wrswlh ʔiqaaːmaau aːlħuduwdi ʕalaaː mustaħiqːihaaː min ʁajri tad͡ʒaaːwuzin fijhaaː ʔaam taʔamuruhum ʔaaħlaaːmuhum bihaðaaː ʔaam hum qawmun tˤaʶaʶːʁuʶwnaʶ wanad͡ʒːajnaaːhumaaː waqawmahumaaː mina aːlkarbi aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaːkl aːllħwm fqaːl aːlrd͡ʒl ʔaʶʕtˤjk dbsaːan kʔanh aːlmaːʔ aʶːlˤsˤaʶːfj ʔiinːa naaːʃiʔiaaa aːllːajli hija ʔaaʃadːu waʶtˤʔiʶaʶnaʶː waʔaaqwamu qijlanaː saːmj jʕjʃ fj ħmsˤ swrjaː hl jmknk ʔan tnsˤħnj bmtˤʕm d͡ʒjd rbmaː tsʔal lma aːld͡ʒml hðaː lʔan aːld͡ʒml mθjra llaːhtmaːm ʔakθr wlswf jʕtˤjk rbk ftrˤdˤaʶː jsbħwn aːlljl waːlnhaːr laː jftrwn wdˤrˤb lnaː mθlaː wnsj χlqh qaːl mn jħjj aʶːlˤʕðˤaʶːm whj rmjm wataaːraaan jakuwnu biʔaasbaaːbin ħaaːdiθaain min ʁajri maʶqaʶaʶːsˤiʶdiʶ aːlʔaːdamijːijna falaaː takuwnu χaaːrid͡ʒaaan ʕan ħaaːli aːlʕadli muʶhtˤiʶʕiʶjnaʶ muqniʕij ruʔuwsihim laaː jartadːu ʔiilajhim tˤaʶrˤfuʶhuʶm waʔaafʔiidatuhum hawaaːʔun lqd rbħ twm ʕaːml aːlnaːs kmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk wlw nʃaːʔ lˤtˤmsnaʶː ʕlaː ʔaʕjnhm faːstbqwaː aʶːlˤsˤrˤaʶːtˤ fʔanaː maqaaːtiluhu lqd rʔajt ðlk mn qbl ʔiinːa aːllːaha laʕana aːlkaaːfirijna waʔaaʕadːa lahum saʕijranaː jmknk trd͡ʒma ðlk baːlnsba lj tʃaːd͡ʒrt mʕh θm dˤrˤbth hðaː aʶːlˤqtˤ jħtaːd͡ʒ llmsaːʕda kj jnzl mn aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ hl tsttˤjʕ aːltħdθ baːllʁa aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja hl ʔanta sʕjd fj mnzlk ʔaħbː aːlħjwaːnaːt χaʶːsˤːaʶ aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ sʔuaːl d͡ʒjd ʔanaː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlnrwjd͡ʒ waʃarːa aːlʔaːbaaːʔi man daʕaaːhu aːlbirːu ʔilaaː aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶfrˤaʶaʶːtˤiʶ dχlnaː ʔilaː aːlmktb fwd͡ʒdnaː ʔimjt w ʔirkjn jmsħaːn aːlnwaːfð wamina aːlnːaaːsi man jud͡ʒaaːdilu fij aːllːahi biʁajri ʕilmin walaaː hudanaː walaaː kitaaːbin munijrin θumːa ʔaarsalnaaː muwsaaː waʔaaχaaːhu haaːruwna biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waʶsuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶn mubijnin wajaʔamanu bihi aʶːlˤsːuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ ljs ldja maːl ttwjbaː: wsˤlˤtk rsaːla χaʶːsˤaʶ jðˤhrˤ ʔank fj wrˤtˤaʶ ntrd͡ʒm aːld͡ʒml ʔilaː aːllʁaːt aːlʔaχraː ʔaaθmarat mawadːatuhu nadamanaː qul huwa aːlːaðij ʔaanʃaʔaakum wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlsːamʕa waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qalijlanaː maaː taʃkuruwna qaaːla nakːiruwaː lahaaː ʕarʃahaaː naʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔaatahtadij ʔaam takuwnu mina aːlːaðijna laaː jahtaduwna qaːblth fj ʔaħd aːlʔajaːm knt mtʕbaː w maː hw ʔaswʔa mn ðlk ʔanaː nʕsaːn laː tqlq ħtaː lw ʃaribt, ln jʔuθrʕlaː qjaːdtj laː jmkn llnʕaːm ʔan jtˤjrˤ ðalikum faðuwquwhu waʔaanːa lilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːba aːlnːaaːri wʔink lʕlaː χlq ʕðˤjm ʔaʶsˤbħt aːlʔamwr ʔaʶsˤʕb mn fdˤlˤk, sˤħiʶħ lj, ʕndmaː ʔaʶuʶχtˤjʔ nħn fj ʔamaːn aːlʔaːn hðaː aʶːlˤnsˤ ljs mtrd͡ʒmaː balaaː jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi qaaːla aːmtlʔat ħqjbth baːlmaːʔ hnaːlk haːtf ʕmwmj ʕnd aːlzaːwja jaʶtˤuʶwfuʶwnaʶ bajnahaaː wabajna ħamijmin ʔaːnin aːrħlwaː mn aːlbjt d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn fbðˤlˤm mn aːlðjn haːdwaː ħrmnaː ʕljhm tˤjbaʶːt ʔaħlt lhm wbsˤdhm ʕn sbjl aːllh kθjraː qtˤaʶ mnzlnaː tħb aːlnwrj kθjranaː ʃkraːan ʕlaː sʔabqaː bʕjdaːan ʕn tˤrˤjqk ln ʔaðhb maː lm tχbrnj ʔajn ʔad͡ʒd twm waaːlsːaʕijdu laaː jarkanu ʔilaaː aːlχudaʕi wzrwʕ wnχl tˤlˤʕhaʶː hdˤjm hl ʕlj ʔan ʔad͡ʒjb ʔasʔiltk klhaː takaaːdu aːlsːamaaːwaaːtu jaʶtaʶfaʶtˤːaʶrˤnaʶ minhu watanʃaqːu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ wataχirːu aːld͡ʒibaaːlu hadːanaː ʔin aːlklb ʔaʶbjdˤ jʔatj aːlaːθnjn bʕd aːlʔaħd lqd ʔiħtaːl ʕljh aːlʔamaːzjʁ mslmwn ʕaːm sʕjd ld͡ʒmjʕ aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn walaqad fatanːaaː sulajmaaːna waʔaalqajnaaː ʕalaaː kursijːihi d͡ʒasadanaː θumːa ʔaanaaːba waʔiinːahu fij ʔaumːi aːlkitaaːbi ladajnaaː laʕalijːun ħakijmun fij sidrin mːaʶχdˤuʶwdiʶn ʔiið tastaʁijθuwna rabːakum faaːstad͡ʒaaːba lakum ʔaanːij mumidːukum biʔaalfin mina aːlmalaaːʔiikaai murdifijna rabːukum ʔaaʕlamu bikum ʔiin jaʃaʔa jarħamkum ʔaaw ʔiin jaʃaʔa juʕaðːibkum wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʕalajhim wakijlanaː ʔauwlaʔiika aːlːaðijna χasiruwaː ʔaanfusahum waʶdˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʕanhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaftaruwna sˤiʶlˤaʶaʶuʶn wamaʕruwfun qaːhiraːan ʕiـــdaːk qaːhiـraːan ʕiــdaːk maʶــwtˤiʶــniʶــj maʶــwtˤiʶــniʶــj lmaːðaː trjd ʔan tʕrf ðlk taːbʕt ʕmlhaː ldj ʔalm fj sˤdrˤj χaːldjn fjhaː wʕd aːllh ħqaː whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm maːðaː ʕlmatk trkt saːʕtj ljtm tsˤlˤjħhaʶː ʔant hw ʔad͡ʒml rd͡ʒl rʔajth fj ħjaːtj waʔiiqaːmi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶːaʶaʶiʶ wʔiijtaaːʔi aːlzːakaaːai waħad͡ʒːi aːlbajti waʶsˤaʶwmiʶ rˤaʶmaʶdˤaʶaʶːnaʶ χaaːlidijna fijhaaː waʕda aːllːahi ħaqːanaː wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu kaːn saːmj jqhqh man juʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlrːasuwla faqad ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ aːllːaha waman tawalːaaː famaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʕalajhim ħaʶfiʶjðˤaʶnaʶː waʶːsˤiʶlˤ aːlʕml tðˤaʶːhrˤ bʔanh laː jʕlm ʃjʔiaː fd͡ʒʕlnaːhn ʔabkaːraː wʔantm saːmdwn twqf ʔinh jqrʔa aːlʔaːn famakaθa kaðalika maaː ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu tħdθt bsrʕa faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʔiinːa waʕda aːllːahi ħaqːun waaːstaʁfir liðanbika wasabːiħ biħamdi rabːika biaːlʕaʃijːi waaːlʔiibkaaːri wmaː ʔakθr aːlnaːs wlw ħrˤsˤt bmʔumnjn waaːlːaðijna hum min ʕaðaaːbi rabːihim muʃfiquwna aːʁsl ʔasnaːnk d͡ʒjdaː qbl aːlnwm fahuwa birijaaːʔiihi maħruwmu aːlʔaad͡ʒri aːtːabiʕ maaː ʔauwħija ʔiilajka min rabːika laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː huwa waʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕani aːlmuʃrikijna rasuwli aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama fanahaaː ʕan ðalika waqaaːla miθla daʔabi qawmi nuwħin waʕaaːdin waθamuwda waaːlːaðijna min baʕdihim wamaaː aːllːahu jurijdu ðˤuʶlˤmaʶnaʶː lilʕibaaːdi χrd͡ʒt d͡ʒjn lltswq jʃrbn aːlħljb hj tʕml bd͡ʒd aːlbnzjn ʔakθr qaːblja llaːʃtʕaːl mqaːrna baːlmaːzwt w laː tnsaː rjː aːlmzrwʕaːt qaːblth jwmaːan maː rabːi aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaaː bajnahumaaː ʔiin kuntum muwqinijna waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mddnaːhaː wʔawfwaː bʕhdj ʔawf bʕhdkm wʔijaːj faːrhbwn aːlʃːamsu waaːlqamaru biħusbaaːnin wabarːanaː biwaaːlidatij walam jad͡ʒʕalnij d͡ʒabːaaːranaː ʃaqijːanaː stsmħ llkmbjwtr mn ntˤq aʶːlˤnsˤwsˤ aːlʕrbja waqad walijaquwluwaː darasta walinubajːinahu liqawmin jaʕlamuwna ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlbjt lʔawl mra mnð ʕʃr snwaːt maː hj aʶːlˤχtˤwaʶ aːltaːlja lˤjsˤbħ d͡ʒaːhz laː tqlq ʔanaː swf ʔaʕtnj bhaː flmaː aːʕtzlhm wmaː fj hðh aːlħaːla ʔaʕtqd ʔanh ʕlaː ħq aːlħlaːl bjːn waːlħraːm bjːn wbjnhmaː aːmwr mʃtbhaːt qaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi ʔiinːaaː lanaraaːka fij safaaːhaain waʔiinːaaː χlaːl ʔasbwʕ ʔanaː hnaː ksˤdjq knt ʔawːla ʃχsˤiʶn traːhu ʕndmaː ftħt ʕajnjhaː ʕan naaːfiʕin ʕan aːbni ʕumara rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla dfʕt lˤlˤχjaʶːtˤaʶ θmn fstaːnhaː fstaːn d͡ʒmjl waʶːχfdˤ lhmaː d͡ʒnaːħ aːlðl mn aːlrħma wql rb aːrħmhmaː kmaː rbjaːnj sˤʁjrˤaʶː fsbħaːn aːllh ħjn tmswn wħjn tsˤbħwn kaːnt tmtˤrˤ ʕnd ʔiqlaːʕnaː lkn ʕndmaː wsˤlˤnaʶː kaːn aːld͡ʒw mʃmsaː waʕalaaː aːlrːaaːħimijna ʔanaː rˤaʶːdˤ tmaːmaː bbjtj aːld͡ʒdjd fkʔajn mn qrja ʔahlknaːhaː whj ðˤaʶːlˤmaʶ fhj χaːwja ʕlaː ʕrwʃhaː wbʔir mʕtˤlˤaʶ wqsˤrˤ mʃjd ʔatðkr ʔasmh klmaː aːstmʕt ʔilaː hðh aːlʔaʁnja maːrj tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶhiʶ lm jkn ʔaħd fj aːlbjt ħatːaaː jaʶstaʶʕtˤiʶfaʶ bihi aːlquluwba aːlnːaaːfiraaa ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna juzakːuwna ʔaanfusahum bali aːllːahu juzakːij man jaʃaaːʔu walaaː juʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶwnaʶ fatijlanaː tħdθnaː blʁa aːlʔiʃaːra wkaːn rd͡ʒl mrsl mn aːllh aːsmh d͡ʒwn fajakuwnu aʶːlˤmuʶqaʶsˤːiʶrˤuʶ fij baʶʕdˤiʶhaʶaʶː taaːrikanaː lid͡ʒamijʕihaaː falaaː juħtasabu lahu maaː ʕamila liʔiiχlaaːlihi bimaaː baqija waqul rabːi ʔaadχilnij mudχala sˤiʶdqiʶn waʔaaχrid͡ʒnij muχrad͡ʒa sˤiʶdqiʶn waaːd͡ʒʕal lij min ladunka suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶnaʶː naʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː fj aːlljla aʶːlˤðˤlˤmaʶːʔ jftqd aːlbdr waːlðj hw jtˤʕmnj wjsqjn d͡ʒʔit ʔabħθ ʕnk hajhaaːta hajhaaːta limaaː tuwʕaduwna wakaaːnuwaː janħituwna mina aːld͡ʒibaaːli bujuwtanaː ʔaːminijna lmaːðaː aːlsmaːʔ zrqaːʔ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlsːalafi aːllːahu aːlmustaʕaaːnu ʕalaaː ʔaalsinaain hw ðhb llnwm fj tmaːm aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːdsa wmaːzaːl naːʔimaːan bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi qul jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlkaaːfiruwna mn hðaːn aːlwldaːn ʔatmnaː lk aːlʃfaːʔ aːlʕaːd͡ʒl km jsˤrˤf fj aːlʃhr faʔiin salimat aːlħaaːlu min aːlʔiidlaaːli aʶːlˤmuʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː aːlmalaaːli aːstadaaːmat aːlʔaulfaau waaːstaħkamat aʶːlˤwaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ ʔin ʔilhkm lwaːħd lqd χdʕhu maaː kaaːna lija min ʕilmin biaːlmalaʔii aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiið jaʶχtaʶsˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ maː fʕlth ʔanaː kaːn χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶːaʶn ħjθ kaːn junfq mn rajʕhaː ʕlaː ʔiʶtˤʕaʶːm aːlklaːb aːltj ljs lhaː sˤaʶːħb whðaː ktaːb ʔanzlnaːh mbaːrk faːtbʕwh waːtqwaː lʕlkm trħmwn fqlnaː jaː ʔaːdm ʔin hðaː ʕdw lk wlzwd͡ʒk flaː jχrd͡ʒnkmaː mn aːld͡ʒna ftʃqaː ʔinh nħjf aːstqlt waʔaanʃadt liaːbni aːlʕamijdi ʕndk mftaːħ "nʕm" waliðalika qijla aːlmarʔaaau rajħaaːnaaun walajsat biqahramaaːnaain ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔuuwna ql lj, kjf ʕlmta rkbt qtˤaʶːrˤ aːlʕaːʃra w aʶːlˤnsˤf aːlðj tʔaχr ʕʃra dqaːʔiq mtaːʕaː lkm wlʔanʕaːmkm qul man bijadihi malakuwtu kulːi ʃajʔin wahuwa jud͡ʒijru walaaː jud͡ʒaaːru ʕalajhi ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna qaːlwaː lm nk mn aʶːlˤmsˤlˤjn waʔaakθaru aːχtilaaːfanaː watamaaːdijanaː ʔaalakumu aːlðːakaru walahu aːlʔaunθaaː wqaːlwaː lwlaː ʔanzl ʕljh mlk wlw ʔanzlnaː mlkaː lˤqdˤj aːlʔamr θm laː jnðˤrˤwn waʶːsˤlˤ mnːaːd aːlmħaːwla wakaðalika d͡ʒaʕalnaaː likulːi nabijːin ʕaduwːanaː mina aːlmud͡ʒrimijna wakafaaː birabːika haaːdijanaː waʶnaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː d͡ʒanːaaːtu ʕadnin tad͡ʒrij min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaaːru χaaːlidijna fijhaaː waðalika d͡ʒazaaːʔu man tazakːaaː rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː aːlrħmn laː jmlkwn mnh χtˤaʶːbaʶː lðaː kl maː tħtaːd͡ʒh hw aːld͡ʒbn aːld͡ʒjd wʔinaːʔ mn mrbaː aːlkrz watad͡ʒʕaluwna lahu ʔaandaaːdanaː ðalika rabːu aːlʕaaːlamijna qtlt bjtj ʔamk ʔinh ʕlaː rd͡ʒʕh lqaːdr ʔinhu ðˤrˤjf, wlkn ʁbj χalaqa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqːi waʶsˤaʶwːaʶrˤaʶkuʶm faʔaaħsana sˤuʶwaʶrˤaʶkuʶm waʔiilajhi aʶːlˤmaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ fj d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn aːlʃaːb aːlðj kaːn hnaː ʔaʶʕtˤaʶːnj hðh lk hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbtk aːld͡ʒaːmʕa haːa wdˤʕt aːlmd͡ʒla ʕlaːa aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ ʔinhu jrjd ʔan aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ waʔaamruhum ʃuwraaː bajnahum wamimːaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr, ʔajhaː aʶːlˤtˤbjb faʶtˤaʶwːaʶʕaʶt lahu nafsuhu qatla ʔaaχijhi faqatalahu faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ mina samkahaaː fasawːaaːhaaː hðh aːlmra hdfj hw baːrjs waaːlθːaaːnij aːnqijaaːdun faʶːsˤbrˤ ʔin wʕd aːllh ħq wlaː jstχfnk aːlðjn laː jwqnwn traː maːðaː sjfʕl aːlrʔijs aːld͡ʒdjd ljs ldjk aːlħq fj aːltwqf fj hðaː aːlʃaːrʕ laː jχtlˤtˤ aːlħljb baːlmaːʔ ʔanaː ʕlaː θqa mn ʔan hðaː aːlktaːb sjkwn ðaː faːʔida ʕðˤjmaʶ lk kðbt qwm lˤwtˤ aːlmrsljn wʔarsl ʕljhm tˤjrˤaʶː ʔabaːbjl law naʃaaːʔu d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu ʔaud͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː falawlaaː taʃkuruwna ʔiinːa haðaaː lahuwa ħaqːu aːljaqijni waʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ faʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː juʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmuħsinijna aːlħq mn rbk flaː tkwnn mn aːlmmtrjn ʔinh jʕtbr aʶːntiʶðˤaʶaʶːmiʶhaʶaʶː wasalaaːmatihaaː lm ʔaraː mθl hðaː aʶːlˤbtˤjχ aːlkbjr mn qbl ʔinh mn sljmaːn wʔinh bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm wajakufːuhum ʕan ʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaaːdːi aːlːatij bihaaː qiwaaːmu ʔaawadihim waʶaʶːntiʶðˤaʶaʶːmuʶ d͡ʒumlatihim ʔalqt aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ aʶːlˤqbdˤ ʕlaː aːlrd͡ʒl aːlðj qtl aːlftaːa qaːl nwħ rb ʔinhm ʕsˤwnj waːtbʕwaː mn lm jzdh maːlh wwldh ʔilaː χsaːraː aːlbħr fj ʃwnaːn mzdħm kθjraːan jwm aːlʔaħd slaːm ʕlaː ʔil jaːsjn fij ʔaadnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wahum min baʕdi ʁalabihim sajaʁlibuwna waʔiiðaaː ʔaanʕamnaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ wanaʔaaaː bid͡ʒaaːnibihi waʔiiðaaː masːahu aːlʃːarːu kaaːna jaʔiuwsanaː llχnaːzjr bʕdˤ aːlmjzaːt aːlmʃtrka mʕ aːlbʃr ʔinh ʔamr mχtlf d͡ʒwdj trˤqsˤ d͡ʒjdaː faaːd͡ʒtamaʕuwaː ʕalajhi faqaaːla wakaðːaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa aːlħaqːu qul lastu ʕalajkum biwakijlin waaːðkur ʔiismaaːʕijla waaːljasaʕa waðaaː aːlkifli wakulːun mina aːlʔaaχjaaːri wabiaːlrːaħmaai aːlħunuwːa waaːlʃːafaqaaa lkl mqaːm mqaːl aʶːlˤlˤtˤf lʁaan jsmʕhaː aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤm wjraːhaː aːlʔaʕmaː ʔiilaaː rabːika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmustaqarːu waʔiin ʔaadrij laʕalːahu fitnaaun lakum wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaː ħijnin hl ttħdθ aːlktaːlwnja hunaaːlika aːlwalaaːjaau lilːahi aːlħaqːi huwa χajrun θawaaːbanaː waχajrun ʕuqbanaː wakaʔaajːin min daaːbːaain laaː taħmilu rizqahaaː aːllːahu jarzuquhaaː waʔiijːaaːkum wahuwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu wʕd aːllh laː jχlf aːllh wʕdh wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn lituʔuminuwaː biaːllːahi warasuwlihi watuʕazːiruwhu watuwaqːiruwhu watusabːiħuwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː dfʕ twm maːrj mn ʕlaː aːldrd͡ʒ kamaaː ʔaanːa ħirmaaːna jkðbwk fqd kðbt qblhm qwm nwħ wʕaːd wθmwd faaːlʔiiχwaaːnu hum aʶːlˤsˤːiʶnfaʶaʶːniʶ aːlʔaːχaraaːni aːllːaðaaːni man kaaːna minhum kaaːlʁiðaaːʔi wakaaːldːawaaːʔi wmaː hw bqwl ʃaːʕr qljlaː maː tʔumnwn nsˤf hðh aːltfaːħaːt faːsd wabawaaːdiri aːlħumqi aʶːlˤmuʶdˤiʶlˤːaʶaʶiʶ tðhb zwd͡ʒth mʕh ʔajnmaː ðhb ʕndmaː kaːn ʃaːbaːan kaːn ʕaːmlaːan mθaːbraːan ʔiinːa ʃaaːniʔiaka huwa aːlʔaabtaru wamaaː tasʔaaluhum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiin huwa ʔiilːaaː ðikrun lilʕaaːlamijna aːnhaː qbjħa ʔiinːij ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶ ʔaanːij mulaaːqin ħisaaːbijah ʔauwlaaːʔiika aːlːaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːlˤdˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaːaː famaaː rabiħat tːid͡ʒaaːratuhum wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muhtadijna wajurijdu aːlːaðijna jatːabiʕuwna aːlʃːahawaaːti ʔaan tamijluwaː majlanaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː maːðaː sjħsˤlˤ lljaːbaːn ʔaahum χajrun ʔaam qawmu tubːaʕin waaːlːaðijna min qablihim ʔaahlaknaaːhum ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː mud͡ʒrimijna likulːi aːmriʔiin mːinhum jawmaʔiiðin ʃaʔanun juʁnijhi jbdw kjn sʕjdaːan tktb aːlʕrbja mn aːljmjn ʔilaː aːljsaːr ʔanaː laː ʔarjd aːlʕwda kl aːlħaːflaːt mmtlʔia knt sʕjdanaː baːlʔams hðaː ktaːb llqraːʔa jaː ʔahl aːlktaːb lm tkfrwn bʔaːjaːt aːllh wʔantm tʃhdwn lijakuwna ðulːu aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai wamuhaaːnaau aːlʕad͡ʒzi jamnaʕaaːnihi min tˤuʶʁjaʶaʶːniʶ aːlʁinaaː wabaʁji aːlqudraai wʕnt aːlwd͡ʒwh llħj aːlqjwm wqd χaːb mn ħml ðˤlˤmaʶː waʶːqsˤd fj mʃjk waʶːʁdˤdˤ mn sˤwtk ʔin ʔankr aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwaʶːt taʕlamwna ʕaʶðˤjmuʶn θumːa qaʶbaʶdˤnaʶaʶːhuʶ ʔiilajnaaː qaʶbdˤaʶnaʶː jasijranaː jaʔatuwka bikulːi saħːaaːrin ʕalijmin laː td͡ʒʕlhaː rˤχjsˤaʶ hðh msʔala wqt jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiiðaaː laqijtumu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː zaħfanaː falaaː tuwalːuwhumu aːlʔaadbaaːra wd͡ʒaːʔt skra aːlmwt baːlħq ðlk maː knt mnh tħjd hðaː fljðwqwh ħmjm wʁsaːq ðhb ʔibnj ʔilaː lndn ʔajn wldt ʔant tkðb ʔaljs kðlk tqf tlk aːlmrʔaa ʔamaːm aːlmktba linursila ʕalajhim ħid͡ʒaaːraaan min tˤiʶjniʶn ql lj mn aːktʃf aːlhwaːʔ jaquwlu aːlʔiinsaaːnu jawmaʔiiðin ʔaajna aːlmafarːu ʔanaː ʔaʶtˤhw, wlkn wlaː jħjaː rb aːlmʃrqjn wrb aːlmʁrbjn maː tfʕlh mħfwf baʶːlˤmχaʶːtˤrˤ haðaaː kitaaːbunaaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕalajkum biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː nastansiχu maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna jaχrud͡ʒu minhumaaː aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sbħ llh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm hjaː bnaː ql jtwfaːkm mlk aːlmwt aːlðj wkl bkm θm ʔilaː rbkm trd͡ʒʕwn jmknk aːχtjaːr ʔajaː kaːn maː trjd faʔiin lam jakun ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶ aːlnːakijri mimːaaː jataʕalːaqu biʔiiʕzaaːzi dijni aːllːahi ʔant krjmun d͡ʒdaːan waman aːntaħala mimːaaː laaː jadrij ʔauhmila fahawaaː hl aːstħmmta ʔafħkm aːld͡ʒaːhlja jbʁwn wmn ʔaħsn aːlʕabdu ʔiinːahu ʔaawːaaːbun litaħsuna tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhaʶaʶː wsˤlˤ aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔilaː mkaːn aːlħaːdθa d͡ʒhnm jsˤlˤwnhaʶː fbʔis aːlmhaːd warawaaː ʔaabuw aːldːardaaːʔi qaaːla wʔamr ʔahlk baʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waʶːsˤtˤbrˤ ʕljhaː laː nsʔalk rzqaː nħn nrzqk waːlʕaːqba lltqwaː bʕdhaː jmknkm aːltħqq mn aːld͡ʒml jnbʁj ʔan tχd͡ʒl mn d͡ʒhlk lqd bdʔa bktaːba rwaːja ʔanta tʕrf bqja aʶːlˤqsˤaʶ ʕlaː aːlʔaraːʔik bjnnaː wbjnk mwʕdaː laː nχlfh nħn wlaː ʔant mkaːnaː swaː aːnaː lm aːʁsl ʃʕrj ʔanaː ʁaːdrt ʃaːnkaːhaːj aːlʕaːm aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj wlm ʔaʕud bʕd fj qlwbhm mrˤdˤ fzaːdhm aːllh mrˤdˤaʶː wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm bmaː waburːizati aːld͡ʒaħijmu liman jaraaː waħaaːlu ʁuluwːin waʔiisraaːfin θm ʔamaːth fʔaqbrh ʔaʕtqd ʔanh jnbʁj ʕljk ʔan tqrʔah bnfsk aːlʁaːja tbrr aːlwsjla bal quluwbuhum fij ʁamraain min haðaaː walahum fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhumu aːlʔaasfalijna faʔiinːa likulːi ʕilmin fuʶsˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː muðhilaaan waʃuðuwranaː muʃʁilaaan waman kaaːna takalːufuhu ʁajra maħduwdin faʔaaχliq bihi ʔaan jaʶdˤiʶlˤːaʶ waʶjuʶdˤiʶlˤːaʶ
