wʔalħqnj baʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn wafaaːkihaain mːimːaaː jataχajːaruwna rʔasaː jʔulmnaː qljlaː waʶaʶːχfiʶdˤ lahumaaː d͡ʒanaaːħa aːlðːulːi mina aːlrːaħmaai waqul rabːi aːrħamhumaaː kamaaː rabːajaaːnij sˤaʶʁiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː ʔinːa min ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤiʶ aːlʔaaʕmaaːli kalimaaa ħaqːin ʕinda suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶn d͡ʒaaːʔiirin wʔalqj aːlsħra saːd͡ʒdjn ʔalaː tbaːlj ʔin dχnt ʔiðaː mmkn, ʔawd ʔan ʔastlm d͡ʒwaːb walaqad fatanːaaː qablahum qawma firʕawna wad͡ʒaaːʔahum rasuwlun karijmun waʶːsˤlˤ aːlmʃj lftra ʔaafaman kaaːna ʕalaaː bajːinaain min rabːihi kaman zujːina lahu suwʔu ʕamalihi waaːtːabaʕuwaː ʔaahwaaːʔahum sʔalnj aːlsjd saːtw ʕda ʔasʔila ħwl aːlaːntχaːbaːt ʔinh wħjd lm tʕd hðh aːlklma mstʕmlaan ʔiinːaaː kafajnaaːka aːlmustahziʔiijna tklm aːn ʃftjk ħmraːʔ ʔinaː nħn nzlnaː aːlðkr wʔinaː lh lˤħaʶːfðˤwn maː ʔaan jahdijani rabːij liʔaaqraba min haðaaː raʃadanaː waʔiin lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlðj jwsws fj sˤdwrˤ aːlnaːs maː aːlðj jubaθːu aːlʔaːn waqaaːla aʶːlˤd͡ʒaʶaʶːħiʶðˤuʶ ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔan jkwn hnaːk ʔaj swʔ fhm wamina aːlnːaaːsi man jaquwlu ʔaːmanːaaː biaːllːahi wabiaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri wamaaː hum bimuʔuminijna ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lħfla ʕjd aːlqdjsjjn χaʶːsˤtk fʔinhm lʔaːklwn mnhaː fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː fataʕud ʕaqijmanaː lˤʔaʶqtˤʕn ʔajdjkm wʔard͡ʒlkm mn χlaːf θm lˤʔaʶsˤlˤbnkm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn laː tfʕl ʃjʔiaː ħtaː ʔaːtj jqʕ hðaː aːlfndq fj mkaːn mnaːsb fjmaː jχsˤ aːlnql aːlʕmwmj twm ldjhi mtsʕ mn aːlwqt mudhaaːmːataaːni ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna jarmuwna aʶːlˤmuʶħsˤaʶnaʶaʶːtiʶ aːlʁaaːfilaaːti aːlmuʔuminaaːti luʕinuwaː fij aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn aːskt maːrj ʕasraːʔ aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤuʶ hajʔiaaːtun muʶtaʶwaʶsːiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna χalːatajni naʶaʶːqiʶsˤaʶtaʶjniʶ walamːaaː ħaʶdˤaʶrˤaʶ biʃra bna maʶnsˤuʶwrˤiʶn aːlmawtu fariħa rbkm aːlðj jzd͡ʒj lkm aːlflk fj aːlbħr mumlaːan d͡ʒdaːan ʔanaː lstu mʃʁwla aːlʔan mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tʁlq aːlbaːb ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʕjʃ bdwnk ħtːaaː d͡ʒalasa ʔilaː aːlnːabjːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama faʔaasnada rukbatajhi ʔiilaː rukbatajhi tnbʔa ðaːk aːlʃjχ bfwznaː waʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔaaʁlabu min aːlʔaːχari sʔaʕd lk bʕdˤ aːlqhwa fakaðalika fasaaːdu aːld͡ʒadbi ʕaaːmːun ʔinhaː draːd͡ʒtj χijaaːru ʃubːaaːnikum aːlmutaʃabːihuwna biʃujuwχikum waʃiraaːru ʃujuwχikum aːlmutaʃabːihuwna biʃubːaaːnikum θumːa lanaħnu ʔaaʕlamu biaːlːaðijna hum ʔaawlaaː bihaaː sˤiʶlˤiʶjːaʶnaʶː fjhaː ʕjn d͡ʒaːrja dʕnaː nʔaml ʔanhaː tʕml ʔanaː mn tˤwkjw ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ aːljaːbaːn waaːd͡ʒʕal lij lisaaːna sˤiʶdqiʶn fij aːlʔaːχirijna ðwqwaː ftntkm hðaː aːlðj kntm bh tstʕd͡ʒlwn hl jmknk ʔan tsaːʕdnj laː tqlq ʔanaː sʔabqaː mʕk ʔinhaː lðjða kaːn rswlaː mn ʕnd aːllh nðˤrˤjaʶː laː frq bjn aʶːlˤnðˤrˤjaʶ waʶːlˤttˤbjq lkn ttˤbjqjaʶː jwd͡ʒd frq ʔawdu ʔan ʔadʕwkj ʔilaː aːlħfla ðwq zwd͡ʒtj fj aːlfsaːtjn jχtlf ʕn ðwqj lndn, ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ ʔind͡ʒltraː, ʕlj nhr aːltjmz waʶːsˤlˤaʶt aːlbkaːʔ hw sˤbj whj ftaːa waʔiinːa laka laʔaad͡ʒranaː ʁajra mamnuwnin hl ʔant tfkr d͡ʒdjaː fj ʃraːʔ hðh aːlsjaːra aːlqdjma waaːlθːaaːnij dˤaʶbtˤuʶ maaː aːʃtabaha minhaaː biʶaʶːlˤnːuʶqaʶtˤiʶ waaːlʔaaʃkaaːli aːlmumajːazaai lahaaː θumːa baʕaθnaaːkum min baʕdi mawtikum laʕalːakum taʃkuruwna aʶːnqtˤʕ aʶːtsˤaʶːlˤj baːlʔintrnt wʔaʶmtˤrˤnaʶː ʕljhm mtˤrˤaʶː faʶːnðˤrˤ kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmd͡ʒrmjn jawma jukʃafu ʕan saaːqin wajudʕawna ʔiilaaː aːlsːud͡ʒuwdi falaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwnaʶ nuzulanaː min ʁafuwrin raħijmin hj ttdrb ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw kl jwm ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðij faʶtˤaʶrˤaʶniʶj faʔiinːahu sajahdijni ʔaʶʁdˤbthaʶː fj aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda jtħdθ aːlnaːs baːlʔind͡ʒljzja twm md͡ʒthd wjmkn aːlʔiʕtmaːd ʕljh laː jsttˤjʕwn nsˤrˤhm whm lhm d͡ʒnd mħdˤrˤwn jwd͡ʒd θlaːθa mtaːd͡ʒr fj aːlmrkz td͡ʒaːrj lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk hðaː bdaː ðlk aːlʕml shlaː d͡ʒdaː lknj aːstʁrqt fjh ʔasbwʕaː laː ʔadχn aːltfaːħa daːʔirja aːlʃkl jħtwj aːllħm ʕlaː aːlbrwtjn waaːnʕikaaːsi ħuʶðˤuʶwðˤiʶhiʶm ʔaan jaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶwaʶː ʕinda man juʕalːimuwhu mustad͡ʒhalijna waʕinda man qadːamuwhu mustarðalijna hðh ʔaχtj laː ʔaʕrf kjf lknːj fʕlthaː fkðbwhmaː fkaːnwaː mn aːlmhlkjn lqd tzħlqt ʕlaː aːlθld͡ʒ lʔawl mra man qalːa ðalːa waqaaːla qajsu bnu ʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶmiʶn waʔiimːaaː manijːaaun mufd͡ʒiʕaaun mʃt bsrʕa kj tlħq baːlʔaːχrjn ʔinaː mknaː lh fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wʔaːtjnaːh mn kl ʃjʔ sbbaː twm ljs sˤaʶːrˤmaʶːaʶn bmaː fjhi aːlkfaːja mʕ tˤlˤaʶːbh waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶnaʶʕtuʶkaʶ linafsij fj aːlħqjqa lm ʔaːkl ʔaj ʃjʔ mnð hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ waʔiið ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba waaːlfurqaaːna laʕalːakum tahtaduwna jʔakl aːlʔasd aːllħm wlʔin ʃʔinaː lnðhbn baːlðj ʔawħjnaː ʔiljk θm laː td͡ʒd lk bh ʕljnaː wkjlaː kiltaaː aːld͡ʒanːatajni ʔaːtat ʔaukulahaaː walam taʶðˤlˤiʶm minhu ʃajʔianaː wafad͡ʒːarnaaː χilaaːlahumaaː naharanaː wqaːlt ʔawlaːhm lʔaχraːhm fmaː kaːn lkm ʕljnaː mn fdˤlˤ fðwqwaː aːlʕðaːb bmaː kntm tksbwn hjaː dʕwnaː nðhb ʔilaː aːlbjt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔataː ʔamr aːllh flaː tstʕd͡ʒlwh sbħaːnh ʕinda rabːij fij kitaaːbin laaː jaʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶ rabːij walaaː jansaaː hðaː hw aːlktaːb ʕjnh aːlðj knt ʔarjd qraːʔth waʔaakθara taʕaaːwunanaː watafaqːudanaː laː tlum nfsk waqad χaaːba man dasːaaːhaaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlrːid͡ʒaaːlu kaaːlʃːad͡ʒari ʃaraaːbuhu waaːħidun waθamaruhu muχtalifun liʔaanːahaaː kaaːnat taχdumuk wahija tuħibːu ħajaaːtak ʔaħsnwaː mʕaːmla aːlrd͡ʒaːl jʔatikm aːlχaːm fj slaːm ʔaanaaː ʔaakramu ʕalaaː aːllːahi min ʔaan jad͡ʒʕalanij χaaːdima ħimaaːrin ʔiinːa saʕjakum laʃatːaaː ʁdaː snðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa kj nsd͡ʒl ʔanfsnaː fj aːldrs aːlðj nrjd aːlaːltħaːq bh fljʕbdwaː rb hðaː aːlbjt ʔafʔamnwaː mkr aːllh flaː jʔamn mkr aːllh ʔilaː aːlqwm aːlχaːsrwn jntʃr aːlʁʃ waːlχdaːʕ fj ʔajaːmnaː khðh ʔakθr mn ʔaj wqt mdˤaʶː ʔanaː lstu d͡ʒmlaan jnbʁj ʔan ʔaħðf mn ttwjbaː w ʕzfnaː nʁma aːlrʃaːʃ lħnaː raːʔiħa aːlmsk mn ʔaʶtˤjb aːlrwaːʔiħ faaːstaftihim ʔaalirabːika aːlbanaaːtu walahumu aːlbanuwna tzwd͡ʒ d͡ʒwrd͡ʒ mn ʔaχtj qul ʔiin kuntum tuħibːuwna aːllːaha faaːtːabiʕuwnij juħbibkumu aːllːahu wajaʁfir lakum ðunuwbakum waaːllːahu ʁafuwrun raħijmun aːnsij aːlʔamr ljs ldj nja fj aːlzwaːd͡ʒ fj aːlqrjb aːlʕaːd͡ʒl ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː trjd mnj hlaː ʔaʶmdˤjt qadijrun dχlt ʕlaː zwd͡ʒtj fwd͡ʒdthaː wħjda lm ʔaraː qtˤ zraːfa ħtaː aːljwm aːlðj zrt fjh ħdjqa aːlħjwaːnaːt hðh aʶːlˤmnðˤmaʶ aːlknjsja tstqbl aːllaːd͡ʒʔijn ھl ʔiʃtrjt tðkra ðhaːb wʔijaːb tsaːrʕ aːlsaːʔiq bsjaːrth ðlk ʕaːlm aːlʁjb waːlʃhaːda aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm qul maaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiilːaaː man ʃaaːʔa ʔaan jatːaχiða ʔiilaaː rabːihi sabijlanaː w lħb djnnaː waːlʕaːlm qljl fj aːld͡ʒjb χjr mn kθjr fj aːlʁjb ʔanaː aːmrʔaa biʕamalihim waʶjuʶbʁiʶdˤuʶ aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶjnaʶ wahuwa minhum flmaː blʁaː md͡ʒmʕ bjnhmaː nsjaː ħwthmaː faːtχð sbjlh fj aːlbħr srbaː tʕjʃ aːlʔajaːʔil fj bjʔiaːt mχtlfa falaʔiin kunːaaː muqirːijna ʔinːaaː liħamqaaː walaʔiin maː zaːʁ aʶːlˤbsˤrˤ wmaː tˤʁaʶː laː ʃk fj ʔan aːlʔisbraːntw mdˤjʕaʶ wqt kbjra χalaqa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqːi taʕaaːlaaː ʕamːaaː juʃrikuwna nħn daːʔimaːan knːaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ waruwija ʕan mud͡ʒaaːhidin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː hl trjdjnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː qaːl djmaː bnbra χd͡ʒila: " ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ bʕdˤ aːlmaːl " ʔaːsf lkn laː jmknnj ħdˤwrˤ aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʃχsˤjaʶː waʶjaʶtaʶʕaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶː ʕilma maaː aːuχtulifa fijhi duwna maaː aːutːufiqa ʕalajhi rʔajt dˤwʔaʶː fj nhaːja aːlnfq aːlðjn kfrwaː lhm ʕðaːb ʃdjd waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr hðaː aːlqaːmws laː jnfʕ lʃjʔ walaqad fatanːaaː aːlːaðijna min qablihim falajaʕlamanːa aːllːahu aːlːaðijna sˤaʶdaʶquʶwaʶː walajaʕlamanːa aːlkaaːðibijna hðaː ʃjʔ aːrjd aːn aːʕmlh lwħdj qaːla: θumːa aʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶqaʶ falabiθtu malijːanaːθumːa qaːla lj: ʔiinːa rabːaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʕan sabijlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadijna kun lilwudːi ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː waʔiin lam tad͡ʒid muʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː smːaːh ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔuʶh tid aːlmrʔaa lhaː χdwd d͡ʒmjla θumːa nuʶsˤħuʶhuʶ fij aːlsːirːi waaːlʕalaaːnijaai wamaaː ʔaanta ʔiilːaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː waʔiin naʶðˤuʶnːuʶkaʶ lamina aːlkaaːðibijna fahaðaaː ʔaaʕdalu aːlʔiiχwaaːni qaːl twm ʔanh laː jħlm ʔabdaː walajsa tatːafiqu ʔaaħwaaːlu d͡ʒamijʕihim ʕalaaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ħanijfanaː wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmuʃrikijna waqaaːluwaː jaaː ʔaajːuha aːlsːaaːħiru aːdʕu lanaaː rabːaka bimaaː ʕahida ʕindaka ʔiinːanaaː lamuhtaduwna ʔajn sˤndwq tabiʕaka minhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna hl sʔaʶsˤlˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ ʔin ʔaχðt hðaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq liʔaanːa aːltːabaaːjuna fij aːlnːaaːsi ʁaaːlibun aːtːabiʕuwaː man laaː jasʔaalukum ʔaad͡ʒranaː wahum muhtaduwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaalibːaaːʔi judilːu biʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aʶːlˤʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj wajansaaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶ aʶːlˤmaʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj wʔin mn ʔahl aːlktaːb ʔilaː ljʔumnn bh qbl mwth wjwm aːlqjaːma jkwn ʕljhm ʃhjdaː waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun min ʔijaaːdin lijazijda bni aːlmuhalːabi ʔakðlk twm jhrb aːðkur rːabːaka ʔiiðaaː nasijta nsmʕ ʃχsˤaʶnaʶː jsˤrˤχ maː qlth ʁjr sˤħjħ msaːʔanaː nðhb lltzħlq fj aːlʁaːba ʔaljs kðlk liʔaanːahu laaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlaain jħb "twm" "maːrj" w hj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː tħbh ʕalːamahu ʃadijdu aːlquwaaː hm jsˤnʕwn aːltlaːfz fj hðaː aʶːlˤmsˤnʕ hl kaːn twm bħaːraːan ʔin aːlmbðrjn kaːnwaː ʔiχwaːn aʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn wkaːn aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn lrbh kfwraː ʔiinːaaː naħnu nazːalnaaː ʕalajka aːlqurʔaːna tanzijlanaː tqwd btj bsrʕa ʔanti lmaːðaː tsʔaljnj kl hðhi aːlʔasʔila waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaanːahu mukaðːibijna hw ʔakl aːltfaːħa kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj aːlħjaːa ; whðaː jʕnj ʔanhu ldjhi aːlħq lˤjsˤnʕ ħjaːa mrjħa tħtaːd͡ʒ draːd͡ʒtj ʔilaː tsˤlˤjħ baːlfʕl wamaaː ʕamːa bihi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶ ʔin wud͡ʒida wʔinh lfj zbr aːlʔawljn whl ʔataːk ħdjθ mwsaː bdʔat fj aːlʔiʃʕaːʕ bfdˤlˤ ʕmlja ʔiʕaːda aːltrkjb ʔaawlaaː min ʔaan jakuwna bihaaː mud͡ʒaaːwizanaː ʔanta ldjka ʔanf kbjr waaːlmuʔuadːij ʔilaaː aːlqanaaːʕaai waaːlkafaaːfi fakuluwaː mimːaaː ʁanimtum ħalaaːlanaː tˤaʶjːiʶbaʶnaʶː waaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔin aːlðjn aːtqwaː ʔiðaː mshm tˤaʶːʔiʶf mn aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn tðkrwaː fʔiðaː hm mbsˤrˤwn qaːlt lh ʔanh kaːn mħqaː qul juħjijhaaː aːlːaðij ʔaanʃaʔaahaaː ʔaawːala marːaain wahuwa bikulːi χalqin ʕalijmun falamːaaː raʔaaaː qaʶmiʶjsˤaʶhuʶ qudːa min duburin qaaːla ʔiinːahu min kajdikunːa ʔiinːa kajdakunːa ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn wakaθijrahu ʔaaʃbahu ʃajʔin bikaθijrihi hj tmdˤj wqtaː tˤwjlˤaʶː ttmrːn ʕlaː ʕzf aːlbjaːnw qijla ʔinːa aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶ aːlħasana lajazijdu aːlħaqːa wuʶdˤuʶwħaʶnaʶː walima qaaːla ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaraː aːlnwr kaːn mtfwqaː fj aːlmwsjqaː ħtaː fj tˤfwlˤth hmaː fj aːlʁrfa tʕbt mn aːlktaːba wlw ftħnaː ʕljhm baːbaː mn aːlsmaːʔ fðˤlˤwaʶː fjh jʕrd͡ʒwn mzqt aʶːlˤsˤħjfaʶ ʔilaː qtˤʕ laː ʃjʔ baːmkaːnh zʕzʕa aʶːlˤsˤdaʶːqaʶːt aːlħqjqja jubaʃːiruhum rabːuhum biraħmaain minhu waʶrˤiʶdˤwaʶaʶːniʶn wad͡ʒanːaaːtin lahum fijhaaː naʕijmun muqijmun ʔaflm jdbrwaː aːlqwl ʔam d͡ʒaːʔhm maː lm jʔat ʔaːbaːʔhm aːlʔawljn ʔamr sχjf ʔan jbðr maːlh ʕlaː hðh aːltfaːhaːt aːtːaqi aːllha ħajθumaaː kunta waʔaatbiʕi aːlsːajːiʔiaaa aːlħasanaaa tamħuhaaː waχaaːliqi aːlnːaaːsa biχuluqin ħasanin ʔiinːa lakum fijhi lamaaː taχajːaruwna kjn jrjd draːd͡ʒa maː aːlðj jʕd͡ʒbk bʃʔanj ʔanta lst fj wdˤʕ jsmħ lkj tsʔal ʕn ʔaj ʃʔi faʔaarsala firʕawnu fij aːlmadaaːʔiini ħaaːʃirijna hl ʕazijzanaː laː ʔaʃk fj qdrth ʕlaː fʕlhaː ʔanaː ʔatʕlːm aʶːlˤsˤːjnjːaʶ fajanbaʁij ʔaan juzijla tilka aːlʃːubhaaa ʕan nafsihi biaːlsːuʔuaaːli waʶaʶːlˤnːaʶðˤaʶrˤiʶ whw aːlðj ʔanʃʔa lkm aːlsmʕ waʶːlˤʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤ waːlʔafʔida qljlaː maː tʃkrwn mtaː ʕljnaː ʔan nðhb ʁjr msmwħ lk ʔan tħdˤrˤ qtˤk ʔilaː aːlmdrsa walaaː lahu budːun min sadːi aːlχalːaai fijhaaː ʕinda ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waʶʕaʶrˤaʶdˤnaʶaʶː d͡ʒahanːama jawmaʔiiðin lilkaaːfirijna ʕaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː wnmaːrq msˤfwfaʶ waʃarawhu biθamanin baχsin daraaːhima maʕduwdaain wakaaːnuwaː fijhi mina aːlzːaaːhidijna ʔinːa aːlqalba ʔiðaaː ʕaliqa kaaːlrːahni ʔiðaaː ʁuliqa tˤwm laː jʕrf kjf jrˤbtˤ χjwtˤ ħðaːʔih wkʔajn mn daːba laː tħml rzqhaː aːllh jrzqhaː wʔijaːkm whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔinːa walada aːlʁajraaː laaː jund͡ʒibu χalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaan lilmuʔuminijna laː χjr fj ħsn aːld͡ʒswm wtˤwlˤhaʶː ʔiðaː lm jzn tˤwlˤ aːld͡ʒswm ʕqwl swf jʔaχðk ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ aːlħaːflaːt waʔiin naʃaʔa nuʁriqhum falaaː sˤaʶrˤiʶjχaʶ lahum walaaː hum junqaðuwna lnʔakl aːlswʃj maː hw fnk aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ waʔiin jakaaːdu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː lajuzliquwnaka biʶʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm lamːaaː samiʕuwaː aːlðːikra judaaːχiluhum aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbu litawaħːudihim biʶfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlʕilmi ʔaafalaaː jarawna ʔaalːaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔiilajhim qawlanaː walaaː jamliku lahum dˤaʶrˤːaʶnaʶː walaaː nafʕanaː qaaːla ʔaalqihaaː ʔaaw ħadijdanaː wʔiinːa aːllha ʔaamara aːlmuʔuminijna bimaaː ʔaamara bihi aːlmursalijna faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː: walamːaaː balaʁa ʔaaʃudːahu waaːstawaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhu ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wakaðalika biaːllːajli ʔawh laː qd aːχtfaː d͡ʒwaːz sfrj aːstlf bn ħmjd mn bqaːl kaːn ʕlaː baːb daːrh drhmjn wʔarbʕ ħbaːt ʃʕjr laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd miθlihi bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlħq wbmaː kntm tmrħwn ljs "hw ʔibnj" wlkn " ʔanaː waːldh" ðalika biʔaanːa aːllːaha nazːala aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqːi waʔiinːa aːlːaðijna aːχtalafuwaː fij aːlkitaaːbi lafij ʃiqaaːqin baʕijdin θm fij d͡ʒahanːama χaaːliduwna hl ʁslt jdjk ʔaʶsqtˤt snd jlaː frda ħðaːʔhaː ql jwm aːlftħ laː jnfʕ aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔijmaːnhm wlaː hm jnðˤrˤwn qum faʔaanðir hw aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤʁrˤ mn bjn klː ʔiχwaːnj w ʔaχwaːtj ʁslt nfsj bjt aːlsjd d͡ʒwnswn baːlqrb mn bjtj maaː ħasunat bik aːlħajaaːau waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi sˤuʶħbaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaʃraaːri tuwriθu suwʔa aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːiʶ biaːlʔaaχjaaːri nhzm aːlʃraː wnd͡ʒlj aʶːlˤʁaʶːsˤbjn knswrin aːld͡ʒwiː ʔaw ʔausd aːlʕrjn ʔiið nad͡ʒːajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna ʔaubalːiʁukum risaaːlaaːti rabːij waʔaanaaː lakum naʶaʶːsˤiʶħuʶn ʔaamijnun milk bid͡ʒdj d͡ʒwdn milkjχr χwʃi ʔaːrw sunwjmka aːik d͡ʒħaːn ldkjaː walaw kaaːnat fijhi faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn lˤaʶχaʶsˤːaʶ aːllːahu bihi man aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːhuʶ lirisaaːlatihi maːðaː tbħθ hnaːk mlʔat aʶːlˤħwdˤ maːʔaː ʔanaː ʔatnaːwl ʁdaːʔij lm ʔaχbrh baːlħqjqa χʃja ʔan jʁdˤb qaaːla ʔaabaʃːartumuwnij ʕalaaː ʔaan masːanija aːlkibaru fabima tubaʃːiruwna ʕzf ʕaːzf aːlbjaːnw mqaʶːtˤʕ ʔiʶdˤaʶːfjaʶ aːlðj ʔaʶtˤʕmhm mn d͡ʒwʕ wʔaːmnhm mn χwf jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tħkm ʕlaː aːlʔaːχrjn mn mðˤhrˤhm kaaːlrːaʕijːaai maʕa suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶhaʶaʶː bdlanaː mn ðlk sʔantql ʔilaː nqaːʃ aːlmtʁjrjːan aʶːlˤaʶːqtsˤaʶːdjjːaʶn aːllðjn ʕrfthmaː qbl qljl ʕalajkum biaːlʔaabkaaːri faʔiinːahunːa ʔaakθaru ħubːanaː waʔaaqalːu χananaː tʕd͡ʒbnj ʔamθla ʃjʃjr ʔam jqwlwn tqwlh bl laː jʔumnwn jd͡ʒb ʔan tdrk bʔannaː ln nsttˤjʕ tqdjm jd aːlʕwn litunðira qawmanaː maaː ʔaunðira ʔaːbaaːʔuuhum fahum ʁaaːfiluwna laː ʔaʶðˤnnj sʔand͡ʒħ wfaːkha wʔabaː wabiaːld͡ʒazaʕi sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː hðaː hw sbb tʔaχrj " fhmt " kðbt qblhm qwm nwħ fkðbwaː ʕbdnaː wqaːlwaː md͡ʒnwn waːzdd͡ʒr waqaaːluwaː lawlaaː jaʔatijnaaː biʔaːjaain min rabːihi ʔaawalam taʔatihim bajːinaau maaː fij aʶːlˤsˤːuʶħuʶfiʶ aːlʔauwlaaː ʔant tkðb ʔaljs kðlk kajfa takfuruwna biaːllːahi wakuntum ʔaamwaaːtanaː faʔaaħjaaːkum θumːa jumijtukum θumːa juħjijkum θumːa ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna waħurːaaːsuhu fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aːlːaðijna jaʶqbiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʔaarzaaːqahum jaðubːuwna ʕan aːlnːaaːsi walamːaaː dˤuʶrˤiʶbaʶ aːbnu marjama maθalanaː ʔiiðaaː qawmuka minhu jaʶsˤiʶdːuʶwnaʶ ʔaaʔiiðaaː mitnaaː wakunːaaː turaaːbanaː waʶʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː ʔaaʔiinːaaː lamadijnuwna walaw naʃaaːʔu laʔaarajnaaːkahum falaʕaraftahum bisijmaaːhum walataʕrifanːahum fij laħni aːlqawli waaːllːahu jaʕlamu ʔaaʕmaaːlakum waaːlːaðijna ʔiiðaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶhuʶmuʶ aːlbaʁju hum jaʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ wʔiðaː aːnqlbwaː ʔilaː ʔahlhm aːnqlbwaː fkhjn jaʕnij ʔaaʕdaaːʔan fij aːld͡ʒaaːhilijːaai faʔaalːafa bajna quluwbikum biaːlʔiislaaːmi ktb " mʕ ʔaʶtˤjb aːltħjaːt " fj ʔaːχr aːlrsaːla θm wqʕ aːsmh ʔawlʔik aːlðjn ħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm fj aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wmaː lhm mn naʶːsˤrˤjn ʔanaː ʔaʶsˤʁrˤ mnk bθlaːθa snwaːt laaː juʔuminuwna bihi waqad χalat sunːaau aːlʔaawːalijna lm ʔad͡ʒdh fj ʔaj mkaːn aʶːlˤdˤħk mn ʁjr sbb mn qla aːlʔadb maːðaː tbħθ hnaːk ʔiinːaaː naħnu nazːalnaaː aːlðːikra waʔiinːaaː lahu lˤaʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ aʶːtsˤlˤ ʕlj ħjn trd͡ʒʕ faʶbiʶðˤuʶlˤmiʶn mina aːlːaðijna haaːduwaː ħarːamnaaː ʕalajhim tˤaʶjːiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶn ʔauħilːat lahum waʶbiʶsˤaʶdːiʶhiʶm ʕan sabijli aːllːahi kaθijranaː ʕud qrjbanaː faʁaʃːaaːhaaː maaː ʁaʃːaaː km aːntqdk ħsaːdk wbqjt ʃaːmχaːan kaːlʔahraːmaːt ʔaʶtwaʶːsˤwaʶː bh bl hm qwm tˤaʶːʁwn qul ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːllːaha waaːlrːasuwla faʔiin tawalːawaː faʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː juħibːu aːlkaaːfirijna qd jkwn mrˤdˤhaʶː aʶːlˤsrˤtˤaʶːn kaːn mnːaːd d͡ʒmjlaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaaːʔu aʶːnfaʶtˤaʶrˤaʶt waʶðˤiʶlˤːiʶn mːin jaħmuwmin jaaː ʔauχta haaːruwna maaː kaaːna ʔaabuwki aːmraʔaa sawʔin wamaaː kaaːnat ʔaumːuki baʁijːanaː ʔablaː fj aːlaːmtħaːn blaːʔan ħsnaː bunija aːlʔiislaːamu ʕalaaː χamsin: ʃahaaːdaai ʔaan laːa ʔiilaha ʔiilaːːa aːllhu waʔaanːa muħamːadanaː rasuwlu aːllhi fj ħaːl tʕtˤlˤ brnaːmd͡ʒ mʕaːld͡ʒa aʶːlˤnsˤwsˤ ndˤmn lk tʕwjdˤh md͡ʒaːnaː ʔarjd maːʔaː saːχnaː ql ʔaðlk χjr ʔam d͡ʒna aːlχld aːltj wʕd aːlmtqwn kaːnt lhm d͡ʒzaːʔ wmsˤjrˤaʶː waʔiiχlaaːlahu biaːlmasnuwni jamnaʕu min ʔikmaaːli aːlθːawaaːbi laː tnsaː ʔan tʔatj ʔilaː bjtj laχalqu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔaakbaru min χalqi aːlnːaaːsi walakinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna hl tʕrf km ʕmr aːlsjda nkaːnw waʕaðaaːba aːlmud͡ʒtariʔii ʕalaaː maaː ʔaaqdama ʕalajhi min maʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶjhiʶ rqbtj tʔulmnj kθjraː hðh aːlʔajaːm fqtˤ ʔaχbrjnj maː aːlðj trjdjnhu hl ʔant mwd͡ʒwd fj aːlmnzl lqd qaːlt lh ʔanh kaːn mħqaːan wajakuwnu taaːraaan litaʕmijaain waʶmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶn jaʶqsˤiʶduʶ bihaaː aːlkaaːtibu ʔiχfaaːʔa ʁaʶrˤaʶdˤiʶhiʶ fajakθuru kaaːltːaraaːd͡ʒimi mhlaː lˤħðˤaʶ hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjhaʶː hðaː aːlkrsj aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤdˤʁtˤ rbmaː jʔudj aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm faʔaamːaaː aːlmuksibaau lilwizri sʔaʶħdˤːrˤ aːlqhwa waaːlqismu aːlθːaaːnij ʔin lm jkn mʕtˤlˤaʶː flaː daːʕj lʔan tsˤlˤħh faman taaːba min baʕdi ðˤuʶlˤmiʶhiʶ waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ faʔiinːa aʶːlˤħuʶtˤaʶmaʶaʶuʶ qaːl ʔinj ʕbd aːllh ʔaːtaːnj aːlktaːb wd͡ʒʕlnj nbjaː wʔinh lħsra ʕlaː aːlkaːfrjn kjf tʕrf hðaː min aːld͡ʒahli sˤuʶħbaʶaʶuʶ ðawij aːld͡ʒahli ħsb maː ʔaʕrf aːlrwaːja ʁjr mtrd͡ʒma ʔilaː aːljaːbaːnja ʔilaː rbk mnthaːhaː kaːn mnːaːd fj aːlqaːhra ʔinhaː θaːnj ʔaʕlaː aːlmuʕdalaːt fj aːlʕaːlm fwd͡ʒdaː ʕbdaː mn ʕbaːdnaː ʔaːtjnaːh rħma mn ʕndnaː wʕlmnaːh mn ldnaː ʕlmaː ʔaʕtqd ðlk ldja fkra ʔaʶfdˤlˤ wajastaʕd͡ʒiluwnaka biaːlʕaðaaːbi walan juχlifa aːllːahu waʕdahu waʔiinːa jawmanaː ʕinda rabːika kaʔaalfi sanaain mimːaaː taʕudːuwna waqulnaaː min baʕdihi libanij ʔiisraaːʔiijla juʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ sˤfq aːld͡ʒmjʕ qaaːla falaaː dˤaʶjrˤaʶ ʔinːamaaː jaʔasaaː ʕalaaː aːlħubːi aːlnːisaaːʔu jsˤlˤwnhaʶː jwm aːldjn lˤiʶjuʶnaʶaʶːðˤiʶrˤaʶ ʕalaaː aːlχilaaːfi wahuwa laaː jaʕrifu rabːukum ðuw raħmaain waaːsiʕaain walaaː juradːu baʔasuhu ʕani aːlqawmi aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔaatutrakuwna fij maaː haaːhunaaː ʔaːminijna waaːalːaðij jaʶχtaʶsˤːuʶwnaʶ bihi aːlħamijːaau aːlbaaːʕiθaau ʕalaaː aʶːlˤnːuʶsˤrˤaʶaʶiʶ maː mn ʃχsˤ laː jmkn aːlaːstʁnaːʔ ʕnh twm ʔaraːd ʔan jʁjr ħjaːthu faʔiiðan tastawij kaʔiiqaaːmaai aːlħuduwdi waaːstijfaaːʔi aːlħuquwqi wtwkl ʕlaː aːlħj aːlðj laː jmwt wsbħ bħmdh wkfaː bh bðnwb ʕbaːdh χbjraː jʃkw tˤwlˤ aːlwqt qul ʔiinːamaaː juwħaaː ʔiilajːa ʔaanːamaaː ʔiilahukum ʔiilahun waaːħidun fahal ʔaantum muslimuwna hðaː χtˤaʶːb mn kndaː aːljwm laː ʁdaː nʕm tsˤlˤaʶː aːlklaːb tnbħ waːlqaːfla tsjr mn mrˤjdˤ θumːa jaʃtaʁila bihi fij aːlkibari fajastaħij ʔaan jabtadiʔia bimaaː jabtadiʔiu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶʁiʶjrˤuʶ faʔiinːahum ʕaduwːun lij ʔiilːaaː rabːa aːlʕaaːlamijna ʕlaː ʕn aːltdχjn ʔaθnaːʔ aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ waqul d͡ʒaaːʔa aːlħaqːu wazahaqa aʶːlˤbaʶaʶːtˤiʶlˤuʶ ʔiinːa aʶːlˤbaʶaʶːtˤiʶlˤaʶ kaaːna zahuwqanaː ðuw mirːaain faaːstawaaː aːlfrnsja jtħdθ bhaː fj frnsaː walaʔiin min ʔaːjaaːti rabːihim ʔiilːaaː kaaːnuwaː ʕanhaaː muʶʕrˤiʶdˤiʶjnaʶ qadːara ʔaaħwaaːla χalqihi fahadaaː ʔilaaː sabijli aːlχajri waaːlʃːarːi waqaaːla aːbnu masʕuwdin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː lm ʔabħθ ʕnk linafsihi ʔiinːa aːllːaha laʁanijːun ʕani aːlʕaaːlamijna lqd wuldt kj ʔaħbk lqd aːftqdtk kθjraːan qaaːluwaː laʔiin lam tantahi jaaː nuwħu latakuwnanːa mina aːlmard͡ʒuwmijna ʔanaː χaːʔifa ħrjːatj fj ʔanːanj ʕzaːaːbj waːlðj ʔaχrd͡ʒ aːlmrʕaː qaːl hl jsmʕwnkm ʔið tdʕwn θm ʔin lhm ʕljhaː lʃwbaː mn ħmjm laaː juħibːu aːllːahu aːld͡ʒahra biaːlsːuwʔi mina aːlqawli ʔiilːaaː man ðˤuʶlˤiʶmaʶ wakaaːna aːllːahu samijʕanaː ʕalijmanaː walahaaː jastaʕidːu faʔaamːaaː aːlmuktasabaau biaːliaːtːifaaːqi fahija ʔaawkadu ħaaːlanaː ؛ liʔaanːahaaː tanʕaqidu ʕan ʔaasbaaːbin taʕuwdu ʔilajhaaː ʔilaː mn aːstrq aːlsmʕ fʔatbʕh ʃhaːb mbjn hl ʔataː baʶːlˤbaʶːsˤ ʔam baʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ faqad qijla laaː judriku aːlʕilma man laaː juʶtˤiʶjlˤuʶ darsahu wajakudːu nafsahu tˤuʶrˤd saːmj mn aːlmnzl fnðˤrˤ nðˤrˤaʶ fj aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔalaː ʔin ʔawljaːʔ aːllh laː χwf ʕljhm wlaː hm jħznwn wsˤaʶːħbth wʔaχjh jatanaaːzaʕuwna fijhaaː kaʔasanaː lːaː laʁwun fijhaaː walaː taʔaθijmun wlkl ʔama ʔad͡ʒl fʔiðaː d͡ʒaːʔ ʔad͡ʒlhm laː jstʔaχrwn saːʕa wlaː jstqdmwn wqaːlwaː ʔaʔiðaː dˤlˤlˤnaʶː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔaʔinaː lfj χlq d͡ʒdjd bl hm blqaːʔ rbhm kaːfrwn jaaː ʕamːi maaː ʕindak fijmaaː jaquwlu haʔuulaaːʔi dˤaʶaʶːħiʶkaʶaʶuʶn mːustabʃiraaun waːstkbr hw wd͡ʒnwdh fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ bʁjr aːlħq wðˤnwaʶː ʔanhm ʔiljnaː laː jrd͡ʒʕwn tˤflˤj aːld͡ʒdjd wsˤlˤ fχlf mn bʕdhm χlf ʔaʶdˤaʶːʕwaʶː aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waːtbʕwaː aːlʃhwaːt fswf jlqwn ʁjaː jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːrkaʕuwaː waaːsd͡ʒuduwaː waaːʕbuduwaː rabːakum waaːfʕaluwaː aːlχajra laʕalːakum tufliħuwna waʶʔaʶaʶbʁiʶdˤ baʶʁiʶjdˤaʶk hawnanaː maaː laː ʔad͡ʒjd mmaːrsa aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ wmaː ʔaʕd͡ʒlk ʕn qwmk jaː mwsaː lijawmin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔadʕ ðlk jħdθ md͡ʒddaː ʔaanːaaː sˤaʶbaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlmaaːʔa sˤaʶbːaʶnaʶː fj ʔaj wqt wsˤlˤt aːlmnzl maː nmt mnjħ baːlzwaːd͡ʒ ʔinh ðˤn ʔan ln jħwr qbːlt ʔamːun aʶːlˤtˤflˤaʶ jbdw lj mn aʶːlˤtˤbjʕj ʔan tʔaχð aːlmsʔala bʕjn aːlʔiʕtbaːr mn maːt wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið χaːʃʕa maː zaːl ʕlaː qjd aːlħjaːa waʔiinːa aːllːaha rabːij warabːukum faaːʕbuduwhu haðaaː sˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqijmun ʔilh aːlnaːs faaːlħanːaaːnaau aːlːatij taħinːu lizawd͡ʒin kaaːna lahaaː hl hðh aːlqbʕa lk wʔið qaːl mwsaː lftaːh laː ʔabrħ ħtaː ʔablʁ md͡ʒmʕ ħdˤwrˤk lʔan ʕdd aːlʔamaːkn mħdwd ʔin kaaːna ʃajʔun faχawfij ʔaan juradːa ʕalajːa ʕamalij tdrs maːrj kl jwm saːʕtjn wakifaaːʔan liħaqːihinːa fʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt fhm fj mːustaqirːun hðh mrdsa llbnaːt aʶːlˤsˤʁaʶːrˤ huwa juħjij wajumijtu waʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna ʔinh ʔant mn sʔaħb daːʔimanaː nhaːrk sʕjd ʕlaː nħw mlˤħwðˤ fhmnaː aːlmtzaːjd llmmlka mtnaːhja aʶːlˤsˤʁrˤ daːχl nwaːa aːlðra ʔiinːa haðaaː kaaːna lakum d͡ʒazaaːʔan wakaaːna saʕjukum maʃkuwranaː jχrd͡ʒ mnhmaː aːllʔulʔu waːlmrd͡ʒaːn waqaaːla muwsaaː jaaː qawmi ʔiin kuntum ʔaːmantum biaːllːahi faʕalajhi tawakːaluwaː ʔiin kuntum muslimijna lawlaaː ʔaan tadaaːrakahu niʕmaaun min rabːihi lanubiða biaːlʕaraaːʔi wahuwa maðmuwmun d͡ʒmjʕ zmlaːʔ sˤfːj χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna ld͡ʒʔat ljlaː ʔilaː bjt waːldjhaː lahu mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ juħjij wajumijtu wahuwa ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun qaːla: faʔaaχbirnj ʕani aːlsːaaːʕai jd͡ʒb ʕljk msaːʕdthaː w ʕlaː aːlfwr laː tfʕl ðlk waqaaːluwaː mahmaaː taðakːaruwna ljs sbb mn aːlχwf maː tqwlh ljs lh ʔaju mʕnaːan lj km raːʔiʕa ʔanti sjʔaχðk hðaː aʶːlˤbaʶːsˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ hðaː hw ʃkl mfsˤlˤ aːlkaːħl ʔin aːllh hw aːlrzaːq ðw aːlqwa aːlmtjn waʔiinːaaː lanaħnu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːfːuʶwnaʶ wawahabnaaː lahum min raħmatinaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː lahum lisaaːna sˤiʶdqiʶn ʕalijːanaː d͡ʒzʔ mn hðh aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mlk lj ʔant lst baːrʕanaː fj hðaː tˤuʶwbaʶaʶː liman ʔaadːaba nafsahu waħasunat χalijqatuhu waʶsˤaʶlˤuʶħaʶt sarijratuhu ʔanaː tˤaʶːlˤb fj hðh aːlmdrsa ʔiinːa ʔaawːala bajtin wuʶdˤiʶʕaʶ lilnːaaːsi lalːaðij bibakːaaa mubaaːrakanaː wahudanaː hðaː mzʕd͡ʒ hl ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʶuʶħdˤrˤ ʔaħdaːan mʕj qad naʕlamu ʔiinːahu lajaħzunuka aːlːaðij jaquwluwna faʔiinːahum laaː jukaðːibuwnaka walakinːa aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ biʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi fj ʔabrjl ʔaʕndh ʕlm aːlʁjb fhw jraː hl sbq lk w ʔan zrt aːlmksjk aːlʁrjq jtʕlq bqʃa rʔajtk ttˤbχjn wahaðaaː jakuwnu min qabuwli aːlnːafsi ʔiðaaː kufijat munaaːzaʕaaa aːlʃːahawaaːti laː tħrk bh lsaːnk waʔauχraaː lam taqdiruwaː ʕalajhaaː qad ʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶ aːllːahu bihaaː wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijranaː ʔarslt lnaː brqjaan bʔanhaː std͡ʒjʔ nrd͡ʒwaː mn aːllh msaːʕdtnaː daːʔimaːan ; aːlnd͡ʒaːħ laː jud͡ʒnaː mn aːlksl kaːn ʔiðn tˤflˤ jblʁ ʕʃra snwaːt ʃkraː d͡ʒzjlaː jaː rfaːq wasanijːi ðaχaaːʔiirihi wajumdidkum biʔaamwaaːlin wabanijna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒanːaaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaaːranaː laaː juzhidanːaka fij rad͡ʒulin ħumidat sijratahu wmaː ʔadraːk maː aːlqaːrʕa ʔinhu jbdw bħaːla d͡ʒjdaːan d͡ʒdaːan qaːl bl rbkm rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ aːlðj ftˤrˤhn wʔanaː ʕlaː ðlkm d͡ʒaːʔnj wkaːn aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn llʔinsaːn χðwlaː wtlk nʕma tmnhaː ʕlj ʔan ʕbdt bnj ʔisraːʔijl kðlk jʔufk aːlðjn kaːnwaː bʔaːjaːt aːllh jd͡ʒħdwn waaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlθːaaːminu ʔiʁfaaːlu aʶːlˤnːuʶqaʶtˤiʶ waaːlʔaaʃkaaːli aːlːatij tatamajːazu bihaaː aːlħuruwfu aːlmuʃtabihaau niʕma aʶːlˤmaʶtˤiʶjːaʶaʶuʶ aːldːunjaaː faaːrtaħiluwhaaː tubalːiʁukum aːlʔaːχiraaa walawlaaː ʔaan θabːatnaaːka laqad kidta tarkanu ʔiilajhim ʃajʔianaː qalijlanaː wbdaː lhm sjʔiaːt maː ksbwaː wħaːq bhm maː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn ʔanta laː tsttˤjʕ tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl tsttˤjʕ llkbaːr fqtˤ d͡ʒazaːʔan bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna ʕalaaː aːld͡ʒihaaːdi rˤfdˤ ʕrˤdˤj faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː haðaaː aːltːakalːufi aːlʃːanijʕi waaːltːaʕamːuqi aːlbaʃijʕi maaː aʶːʕtaʶaʶːdˤaʶ min ħajθu ʔanzil jdjk ln tsˤlˤ hnaːk ʕlaː aːlwqt ʔin lm tstʕd͡ʒl ʔant kθjr aːlnːsjaːn ʔaljs kðlk aːlbaaːbu aːlχaaːmisu ʔaadabu aːlnːafsi aːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlnːafsa mad͡ʒbuwlaaun ʕalaaː ʃijamin muhmalaain hl saːmj jtnfːs walaqad mananːaː ʕalaː mwsaː wahaːrwna smʕt ljlaː dˤd͡ʒːaʶ qwjːa wazurwʕin wamaqaːmin karjmin man d͡ʒaaːhada aːlhawaaː tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶaʶn lirabːihi waqad ðumːa aːlkalaaːmu fij mad͡ʒlisihi sumːija biðalika waʶtˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ bihi aːlʃːukra waaːlθːanaaːʔa fahuwa χaaːrid͡ʒun biʶʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ ʕan ħukmi aːlsːaχaaːʔi faʶːdˤlˤ jtklːm kθjraː aːlχajـlu waaːllːjـlu waaːlbajـdaːʔu taʕrifunـj waaːlsːjfu waaːlrːmħu waʶːlˤqrˤtˤaʶːsuʶ waaːlqalaـm laː tlʕb hnaː ʔabdaːan ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʕaːlimu ʁajbi aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiinːahu ʕaljmun biðaːti aʶːlˤsˤːuʶdwrˤiʶ ʔiðaː tχaʶːsˤm aʶːlˤlˤsˤaʶːn ðˤhrˤ aːlmsrwq aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ muʶstaʶʔaʶsˤiʶlˤuʶ aːlħidθaaːni waʔaasbaaːbu aːlħilmi aːlbaaːʕiθaau ʕalaaː dˤaʶbtˤiʶ aːlnːafsi ʕaʃaraaun liʔaanːa nuʃuwʔa aʶːlˤsˤːiʶʁaʶrˤiʶ ʕalaaː aːlʃːajʔi jad͡ʒʕaluhu muʶtaʶtˤaʶbːiʶʕaʶnaʶː bihi ftħ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː ʔaʕtqd ʔanː hðaː aːlrːd͡ʒl aʶːlˤsˤːjnjː mslm fhw jstmʕ llqrʔaːn jubʕaθu aːlʕaaːlimu waaːlʕaaːbidu fajuqaaːlu lilʕaaːbidi ħaːwl saːmj ʔan jsmːm ljlaː bχlˤjtˤ mn ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ aːlnːwm w aːlmbjdaːt ʁajruhu jaquwlu qaaːla fafij haðaaː raaːħaaun lakum niʶsˤfuʶ dahrikum jtsʕ aːlfndq lmʔia ʃχsˤ mud͡ʒaaːnabaau aːlʁarijbi aːlwaħʃijːi ħatːaaː laaː jamud͡ʒːahu samʕun walaaː janfiru minhu tˤaʶbʕuʶn liʔaad͡ʒli ʃarahihi waaːlqanaaːʕaau biaːlmajsuwri ʕan kadːi aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶ ʔataː ʔilaː ʔamrjkaː ʕbr kndaː wqʕt snːj aːlʔamaːmja sjʔaχð dqjqa mn wqtk fqtˤ d͡ʒarajtu fij majdaaːnin fasijħin malʕuwnun ðuw aːlwad͡ʒhajni jħb aːljaːbaːnjwn aːlsfr fj md͡ʒmwʕaːt aːlbχjl ʕðˤjm aːlrwaːq sˤʁjrˤ aːlʔaχlaːq aːstmrː aʶːlˤtːwaʶːsˤlˤ bjn saːmj w ljlaː ʔin qrʔat aːlktaːb aːlmqdːs bʔakmlh flmaːðaː laː tzaːl ttnaːwl aːlkħwl aʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤuʶ mafsadaaun lildːijni waaːlmuruwʔaai ʔad͡ʒbr saːmj ljlaː ʕlaː tnðˤːjf aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː bʃʕrhaː kl maː tħtaːd͡ʒh hw aːlħb maː jħdθ mʕk mʔulm d͡ʒdːaː maðmuwmu aːlðːikri ʔahðaː kl ʃjʔ ʕuluwːu aːlhimːaai aːlwaladu jaʔakulu aːlfaaːkihaaa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man kaθura kalaaːmuhu kaθurat ʔaːθaaːmuhu ʔiinːaː kulːa ʃajʔin χalaqnaːhu biqadarin qlt lh ʔan jtwqːf ʕn aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤk snttˤrˤq ʔilaː hðaː aːlʔamr bʕd lˤħðˤaʶːt srk ʔasjrk fkr fj sna wtklm fj θaːnja baːlkaːd jsttˤjʕ ktaːb aːsmh niʕmatuhu ħatːaaː aːltaħafa biaːlʔaamni waaːldːaʕaai waaːstamtaʕa biaːlθːarwaai waaːlsːaʕaai ʔaʕtqd ʔanːh ln jʔatj smħ saːmj bʔan tʔatj ljlaː wtʔaχð aːlmχdːraːt md͡ʒaːnanaː aːlbustaːnijːu jad͡ʒmaʕu aːlʔaazhaːra waaːlːaðjna laː jaʃhadwna aːlzːwra waʔiiðaː marːwaː biaːllːaʁwi marːwaː kiraːmanaː ʕalːamahu aːlbajaːna jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jtnaːwl ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤh tʕrːf saːmj ʕlaː ftaːa mslma wqʕ fj ħbːhaː w tzwːd͡ʒhaː mawfuwra aːlrːaðaaːʔiili lm tkn ldaː saːmj ʔaʶðˤaʶːfrˤ walaaː jaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ fij aːstiwaaːʔin faʔiin kaaːna sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶnaʶː faljuwqid naaːrajni waʶlˤjaʶnðˤuʶrˤ hal tuʶtˤfiʶʔiʶuʶ ʔiħdaaːhumaaː aːlʔauχraaː bjtk ʔakbr mn bjtj θlaːθ mraːt wajastabqijhi lilaðːatihi laʕanahu aːllːahu walaw ʃiʔinaː labaʕaθnaː fj kulːi qarjaain naðjranaː fqdt mħfðˤtj faqaaːla rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama kajfa taʕdiluwna maʕa aːlʔaaqaaːribi jmdˤj saːmj klː jwm fj aːlħaːna ʔaʶuʶsˤjbt kaːjt baːlbrd ʔaχð braːjn bʕdˤ aːlwrwd ʕaːd ʔilaː aʶːlˤmrˤsˤd wamaː jaʔatjhim min ðikrin mina aːlrːaħmni muħdaθin ʔiilːaː kaːnwaː ʕanhu muʶʕrˤiʶdˤjnaʶ tabijtu aːlbuħajraau haaːʔiid͡ʒaaan faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ fardanaː laaː juʕaaːnu biraʔajin walaaː jumadːu bimaʃuwraain waʶaʶːdˤtˤaʶrˤːaʶ ʔilaaː aːstijdaaːʕi sirːihi walajtahu kufija aʶːlˤiʶaʶːdˤtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lhðaː mn ʔad͡ʒl aːχtbaːr ħml ʔarjd aːlmzjd mn aʶːlˤʕsˤjrˤ kaːn ʕnd saːmj w ljlaː aːlʕdjd mn aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlmʃtrkjn bal huwa ʔaːjaːtun bajːinaːtun fj sˤuʶdwrˤiʶ aːlːaðjna ʔawtuwaː aːlʕilma wamaː jad͡ʒħadu biʔaːjaːtinaː ʔiilːaaː aʶːlˤðˤːaʶːlˤiʶmwnaʶ ʔaaw ħaaːdiθaain qad kadːahu aːlhamːu bihaaː faʔiinːa aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤaʶ ʕalajhaaː jaʕqubuhu miθli ʔarjd ʔan ʔasaːfr lʔakml tχsˤːsˤj famudːaau aːllːahwi taʶnqaʶtˤiʶʕuʶ waʕaaːrijːaau aːldːahri turtad͡ʒaʕu maaː dˤaʶrˤːaʶniʶj walam janfaʕ ʁajrij lajta aːlfaaːkihaaa naʶaʶːdˤiʶd͡ʒaʶaʶuʶn faʶbiʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ fij haðaaː tanfatiħu wud͡ʒuwhu aːlʔaːraaːʔi walilʕaqli muʶdˤaʶaʶːdːuʶn waaːðkur rabːak ʔiðaaː nasijta qaaːla ʕikrimaau aːlːaðj ʕalːama biaːlqalami ʔiinːa hðaː lahuwa aːlfawzu aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmuʶ ʔaaw liaːtːifaaːqin mustaħsanin waqaaːla ʔaːχaru aʶːlˤħaʶrˤiʶjsˤuʶ ʔaasijru mahaaːnaain laaː jufakːu ʔaasruhu hðaː ljs ʔamraː mhmːaː aːlaːsʕaːr tnχfdˤ km ʁrfa fj bjtk baːlkaːd jmknnj aːlmʃj wd͡ʒdt hðaː aːlχaːtm fj aːlʃaːrʕ hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ jaʃhaduhu aːlmuqarːabwna aːlbustaaːnu d͡ʒamijlun waman juʶtˤiʶjquʶ haðaaː jaaː ʔaabaaː ħaaːzimin qaaːla wahuwa sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħuʶ bnu ʕabdi juʶʕtˤaʶaʶː maaː jastaħiqːuhu biʶsuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶhiʶ waʕuluwːi jadihi ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm faʔiinːa aːlqaraaːʔiiħa ʔiðaaː aːnfaradat aːstakadːahaaː aːlfikru waaːstafraʁahaaː mudhaːmːataːni waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man faʕala maaː ʃaaːʔa laqija maaː lam jaʃaʔa waʶjuʶsˤaʶħːiʶħuʶ himːatak knt mdrːsaː hnaːk warubːamaaː aːntafat aːlrːijbaau biħusni aːlθːiqaai waaːrtafaʕat aːltːuhmaau biʶtˤuʶwlˤiʶ aːlχibraai naaːma aʶːlˤtˤːiʶflˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlsːarijri kjf ʔaːkl hðaː ʔaqwl ðlk mn qlbj ʔiinːa aːlharama qadijmun wakaaːna muħadːiθanaː ʕaːd saːmj llʕjʃ hnaː waqad ʔaataaː aːbnu aːlrːuwmijːi biʔaablaʁa min haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fij ʃaʕrihi faqaaːla ʕlaː aːlbaːʁj tdwr aːldwaːʔir laaː naʶqsˤuʶn ʔin lm ttrknaː w ʃʔannaː saʶːtːsˤlˤ baʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ walaaː ʔaan taχtalifa aːlʕuqalaaːʔu fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhaʶaʶː wafasaaːdihaaː walaː ʔaanaː ʕaːbidun maː ʕabadtum qaːl saːmj hðaː lˤmmrˤːdˤaʶ ndmt ʕlaː ʕdm ħdˤwrˤj aʶːlˤχtˤbaʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʁarasa ʃad͡ʒaraaa aːlħilmi aːd͡ʒtanaaː θamaraaa aːlsːilmi faʔaajna taðhabwna ħb aʶːlˤwtˤn mn aːlʔijmaːn jabijʕu aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru aːlbunːa wafj θamwda ʔiið qjla lahum tamatːaʕwaː ħatːaː ħjnin kl aːld͡ʒbl jtʁjr bʔalwaːnh fj aːlχrjf faʔiinːa aːlsːunːaaa laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔaan tarida biʔiibaaːħaai aːlkaðibi jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jntðˤrˤ waʔiinːa nafaaːða ʔaamrik maʕa kalaaːmik tʕbt qljlanaː rʔaaː saːmj ðlk aːlmnzl taʕd͡ʒijluhu waʶtaʶsˤʁiʶjrˤuʶhuʶ wasatruhu wamuraaːʔiij aːlmaħaaːsini waaːlʕujuwbi waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai bimaaː kaaːna juʶdˤmiʶrˤuʶhuʶ ʔaχð saːmj klː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːbwn mʕh lqd tħqqt mn aːlaːmr waʔaakjdu kajdanaː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlħilmu ħid͡ʒaaːbu aːlʔaːfaaːti wrħaː aːlmnjːa ttˤħn fabadːala aːlːaðijna ðˤaʶlˤaʶmuʶwaʶː qawlanaː ʁajra aːlːaðij qijla lahum ʔiinːahaː laʔiiħdaaː aːlkubari ʔajn ʔaqrb mʕrˤdˤ fnj tˤaʶʕaʶːmuʶ aːlʔaaθjmi aːird͡ʒʕ ʔilaː aːlbjt qbl aːlsaːdsa janbaħu aːlkalbu rkːzt ʕlaː ʃjʔ waːħd waaːlquluwba bihaaː waaːθiqaaun waqaːlwaː jaː wajlanaː hðaː jawmu aːldːjni twm jħaːdθ maːrj ʕlaː aːlhaːtf saːmj mn ʔasra jhwdjːa θrjːa wakalːafahaaː luzuwma aʶːlˤfaʶsˤaʶaʶːħaʶaʶiʶ waaːlnːad͡ʒmu waaːlʃːad͡ʒaru jasd͡ʒudaːni man ʃakaraka ʕalaaː maʕruwfin lam tusdihi ʔilajhi faʕaaːd͡ʒilhu biaːlbirːi waʔiilːaaː aːnʕakasa faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ ðamːanaː dʕaː saːmj ljlaː lldːχwl ʔaχbr saːmj aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ ʔanːh qd aːrtukbt d͡ʒrjma wamadχalun makrihi χafijːun liʔaanːa aʶːlˤsˤːiʶdqaʶ jadʕuw ʔilajhi ʕaqlun muwd͡ʒibun waʃarʕun muʔuakːadun qijla fakam bajna aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi qaaːla masijraau jawmin lilʃːamsi faʃaːribwna ʕalajhi mina aːlħamjmi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man saaːsa nafsahu saaːda naaːsahu wajuʔuθiru aːlwuquwfa ʕalajhi aːntqlj llʕjʃ hnaː aːlʕfw ʕnd aːlmqdra laː nstqbl aːlzwːaːr aːljwm wataʕfuw ħilmanaː wajabqaː wad͡ʒhu rabːika ðuw aːld͡ʒalaːli waaːlʔiikraːmi θumːa kaːna ʕalaqaaan faχalaqa fasawːaː rʔajt aːlnaːs qd maːlwaː ʔilaː mn ʕndh maːl wafuruʃin marfwʕaain wajazilːa bihaaː saaːhijanaː liʔaanːa aːlʔiinsaaːna qad juðijʕa sirːa nafsihi bibaaːdiraai lisaaːnihi waʔaamːaː man ʔawtija kitaːbahu biʃimaːlihi fajaqwlu jaː lajtanj lam ʔawta kitaːbijah ʔiið hum ʕalajhaː quʕwdun kaːn jkðb bʃkl sˤaʶːrˤχ mn ʔajn ħsˤlˤ ʕlaː hðaː aːlħdaːʔ aːlʁrjb aːlzam aʶːlˤsˤːaʶmtaʶ faʔiinːahu juksibuk sˤaʶfwaʶ aːlmaħabːaai ʔaħbː tʔamːl aːlnːd͡ʒwm laː jsttˤjʕ saːmj aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan rʔaaː ʃjʔiaː mmaːθlaː fj ħjaːth kaːn aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːlˤħaʶ mtaː wulidt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlzam aʶːlˤsˤːaʶmtaʶ tuʕadːu ħakijmanaː d͡ʒaaːhilanaː kunta ʔaaw ʕaaːlimanaː dmːr zlzaːl ʕjaːda saːmj kaːn saːmj jχtls aʶːlˤnːðˤrˤ ʕbr taħmilu aːlʃd͡ʒrau θimaːranaː naʶaʶːdˤiʶd͡ʒaʶaʶaʶn ʔafsd saːmj aːlħfl aːld͡ʒmhwrja aːld͡ʒzaːʔirja aʶːlˤdjmqrˤaʶːtˤjaʶ aːlʃʕbja waaːallːahi jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi laqad ʕalima ʔaanːij χajrun mimːaaː waʶsˤaʶfaʶ walakin ħasadanij aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː maaː nazala min makruwhin ʔaaw ħalːa min ʔaamrin maχuwfin liʔaanːahaaː fij aːlʕuquwli maʕquwlaaun ʔajn hj aːlsːfaːra aːlʔalmaːnjːa hunajhaun ljs hðaː maː ʔardt mnk rʔujth ħaːwlt ʔan ʔansaːhaː lkn lm ʔaufliħ mud͡ʒaaːlasatuhu mihnaaun aːlʕql sˤfaʶːʔ aːlnfs waːld͡ʒhl kdrhaː bdʔa saːmj ħjaːa d͡ʒdjda jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔinːa min ʕibaaːdatihi lm ʔant ʕaːbs ʔajmknk aːllʕb mʕj liʔaanːa aʶːlˤħaʶsˤrˤaʶ juʶdˤaʶʕːiʶfuʶ aːlħud͡ʒːaaa bajna niʕmatajni qdːm saːmj ʃhaːdth aːldːad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaau taʶbiʶjdˤuʶ kulːa jawmin bjdˤaʶaʶn ʔaamaaː taʃbaʕu min haðihi aːlʕuluwmi faqaaːla nuʕmaaːk fijhim ʔaatimːahaaː wadaʕ ʔaamarnaaː ʔinːa aːlmuhimːa muqadːamu faqaaːla ʕubajdu aːllːahi jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanuwaː aːðkuruwaː aːllːaha ðikranaː kaθjranaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː jufsiduk aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːuʶ ʕalaaː sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶk aːljaqijnu lahu waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aʶːlˤdˤːaʶrˤuʶwrˤaʶaʶuʶ tuwaqːiħu aʶːlˤsˤːuʶwrˤaʶaʶaʶ waʔiinːakum latamurːwna ʕalajhim muʶsˤbiʶħjnaʶ nawmu χaraqin wahija aʶːlˤsˤːuʶbħaʶaʶuʶ fj d͡ʒanːaːtin waʕujwnin liʔaanːahu laaː jaħsudu aːlʔaakfaaːʔu man danaaː ħatːaː zurtumu aːlmaqaːbira saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lħðaːʔ d͡ʒdjd fakulːu maaː χarad͡ʒa ʕindahum ʕan aːlmaaːli kaaːna faaːriʁanaː aːlːaðj χalaqa fasawːaː ʔaχj saːʕdnj fj ħl waːd͡ʒbj aːlʃwka aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ lˤlˤslˤtˤaʶ waːlkbjra llwd͡ʒba aːlrʔijsja ʕn maːðaː knːaː ntħdːθ waʶʔaʶaʶqsˤaʶrˤaʶ min ʕinaaːnihi aːlqaːnwn aːldaːχlj walaaː tud͡ʒaaːhirhum biaːlmuχaaːlafaai lahum fajuʕaaːduwk lajsa lahum tˤaʶʕaʶːmuʶn ʔiilːaː min dˤaʶrˤjʕiʶn km ʔant mzʕd͡ʒ ʔiinːaː lˤaʶnaʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶ rusulanaː waaːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː fij aːlħajaːai aːldːunjaː wajawma jaqwmu aːlʔaaʃhaːdu man taʁajːara ʕalajk fij mawadːatihi fadaʕhu ħajθu kaaːna qabla maʕrifatihi waaːlːaðjna d͡ʒaːhadwaː fjnaː lanahdijanːahum subulanaː waʔiinːa aːllːaha lamaʕa aːlmuħsinjna ʔiin jaʃaʔa juðhibkum wajaʔati biχalqin d͡ʒadjdin waqaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama limuʕaaːðin kaːn ldjː mdrːswn d͡ʒjːdwn wabiaːlħirmaaːni ħaqijqanaː kaːn saːmj jlqj χtˤaʶːbaʶː fj aːlqsm ʔaaw ʕalaaː ʕiʶrˤdˤiʶhiʶ min malaaːmaain waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlˤfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ man kafara niʕmaaa aːlmufijdi aːstawd͡ʒaba ħirmaaːna aːlmazijdi muʶsˤaʶnːiʶfuʶ aːlkitaaːbi sjsaːʕd saːmj ljlaː kj tqwm bχdʕa sħrjːa χtˤjrˤaʶ qaaːla aːltːaʁaaːbunu lˤiʶlˤdˤːaʶʕiʶjfiʶ jaː mwsaː ʔiinːahu ʔaanaaː aːllːahu aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu ʔaʕdh ʁdaː mn fdˤlˤk jad͡ʒuwlu aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru fij aːlbilaːdi man rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ biʶqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː lam jaʶsχaʶtˤhuʶ ʔaaħadun aːntħr saːmj waðahaba ʔaːχaruwna ʔilaaː taʶfdˤiʶjlˤiʶ aːlfaqri ʕalaaː aːlʁinaaː jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaʕwd aːlaː aːlmstʃfaː waman qaʶsˤuʶrˤaʶ ʕanhu baχijlanaː wakaaːna lilðːamːi mustawd͡ʒibanaː waqaaːla biʃru bnu aːlmuʕtamiri wajamnaʕu min aːltːawafːuri ʕalaaː aːlʕibaaːdaai ʕaːd saːmj ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda falaaː jaʔatija bikalaaːmin mustakrahi aʶːlˤlˤːaʶfðˤiʶ walaaː muχtalːi aːlmaʕnaaː faʔaːmanwaː famatːaʕnaːhum ʔiilaː ħjnin θumːa ʔaaqrartum waʔaantum taʃhaduwna θumːa ʔaaχaðtu aːlːaðjna kafarwaː fakajfa kaːna nakjri kaðːabat qawmu lˤwtˤiʶn biaːlnːuðuri falaː ʔauqsimu bimaː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ waʃajnu aːlhaðari ʔaaʃnaʕu warubːamaaː kaaːna fij aːlʁaaːlibi ʔaaχwafa aʶːlˤsˤːuʶwrˤaʶaʶuʶ d͡ʒamijlaau faħasbuk suwʔanaː rad͡ʒulun janfaʕu ʕaduwːahu waʶjaʶdˤuʶrˤːuʶ nafsahu hazaztu aːlʃːad͡ʒaraaa kaj jaʶsquʶtˤaʶ θamaruhaaː ʃukraːan "ʕafwaːan" walakin laaː janbaʁij ʔaan jud͡ʒʕala ðalika tˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː aːliaːstirsaaːli waljakun aːlħaðaru ʕalajhi ʔaaʁlaba θumːa latusʔaalunːa jawmaʔiiðin ʕani aːlnːaʕjmi smʕ saːmj nqra slaːħ nd͡ʒaː mn aːlħaːdθa ʃχsˤ waːħd hl stsaːʕdnj man χadamanij faaːχdimijhi falaaː ʁarwa ʔaan jumnaaː ʕalijmun bid͡ʒaaːhili famin ðanabi aːltːinːijni tankasifu aːlʃːamsu waminhaaː aːlħasuwdu lan jasuwda ʔaʶtˤlˤqt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ sraːħ saːmj waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ðaːti aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdʕiʶ wahatkaaun waʶaʶːdˤiʶħaʶaʶuʶn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔansaː hðh aʶːlˤlˤːħðˤaʶ waʔaamːaaː ʔaaðijːaau aːlmumaaːziħi faliʔaanːahu maʕquwqun biqawlin karijhin wafiʕlin muʶmdˤiʶn ʔin ʔaamsaka ʕanhu ʔaaħzana qalbahu kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jʕlm ʔanːh fj χtˤrˤ safar saʕijd faðwqwaː ʕaðaːbj wanuðuri nakaħa aːlʕad͡ʒzu aːltːawaaːnij faχarad͡ʒa minhumaaː aːlnːadaaːmaau ʔaafatuʔuminuwna biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlkitaaːbi watakfuruwna biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn baʕda aːlfawti qaːlwaː tilka ʔiiðanaː karːaaun χaːsiraaun kaðlika waʔaawraθnaːhaː qawmanaː ʔaːχarjna jaʕnij aːlzːarʕa waaːlθːaaːnij ħajaaːʔuuhu min aːlnːaaːsi warubːamaaː ʁaʶlˤiʶtˤaʶ qawmun faʶðˤaʶnːuʶwaʶː ʔaanːa aːlmunaaːfasaaa fij aːlχajri hija aːlħasadu maːðaː ʕnk wakaʔasanaː dihaːqanaː kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːlrːfjʕa fj aːlħjaːa jaʕnij min aːllːahi ؛ limaaː fijhi min muχaaːlafaai ʔaawaaːmirihi jʔaklwn baːlʃwka w aːlskjn waʔaanaaː ʔaunʃidu aːlχaaːdimu qawijːu waʶmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕiʶ aːllːuʔumi waʔiiðaaː wad͡ʒada tˤuʶwmaʶaʶːrˤaʶnaʶː ʔaamlaaːhu wajadʕuw ʔilaaː maaː jud͡ʒaaːnisuhu θumːa damːarnaaː aːlʔaːχarjna bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi hal ʔaataːka ħadjθu aːlʁaːʃijaai qaaːla laaː tantafiʕu bij maʕa suwʔi ðˤaʶnːiʶj bik wasuwʔi ðˤaʶnːiʶk bij liʔaanːahu qad d͡ʒamaʕa bajna aːlkaðibi aːlmuʕirːi waaːlʃːarːi aʶːlˤmuʶdˤiʶrˤːiʶ nʃʔa saːmj mslmaː ʔinːa aːllːaha taʕaaːlaaː d͡ʒaʕala makaaːrima aːlʔaaχlaaːqi wamaħaaːsinahaaː waʶsˤlˤaʶnaʶː bajnahu wabajnakum saːmj jnaːm hnaːk wahaðaaː jadʕuw ʔilajhi ʔaaħadu ʃajʔiajni maːlðj ʔaʶʁdˤbhm ʔinhaː tʕml fj md͡ʒaːl aːltswjq waʔaːχira maaː nazala min aːlʔiind͡ʒijli aːldjn aʶːlˤnsˤjħaʶ saːmj jħbː hðaː ðulaː mn jʁjðˤ aːlðljl bʕjʃ ðnbh ʕlaː d͡ʒnbh ðlika faʶdˤlˤuʶ aːllːahi juʔutjhi man jaʃaːʔu waaːllːahu ðuw aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ wataħarːaza min ʁawaaːʔiili ħasadihi wad͡ʒanːaːtin waʕujwnin ʕlːm saːmj aːlsːbaːħa lljlaː wanitaaːd͡ʒu ħajawaaːnin kaːn fj aːlmkaːn aːlðj qlt lj sjkwn ʔaʶðˤnː ʔanːk ʔaħmq falajsa kulːu muqilːin jaʕrifu walaaː maʕðuwrin juʶnsˤiʶfuʶ tˤlˤb aːlmdrːs mnːj aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕh kaːn saːmj fj ħsˤːaʶ aːltːaːrjχ ħatːaaː ʔinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna aːlʔaːna ʔiðaaː tad͡ʒaaːwaza maaː aːtːafaquwaː ʕalajhi minhaaː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ mud͡ʒaaːnibanaː lilʔaadabi faaːltːaːlijaːti ðikranaː wawahabnaː lahu ʔaahlahu wamiθlahum maʕahum raħmaaan minːaː waðikraː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaːbi waʔiiðaaː ʃaaːhada niʕmaaan ʕaaːnadahaaː ʔauʕd͡ʒbt ʕmtj bnd͡ʒaːħj sˤʕb ʕljː fhm aʶːlˤʔiʶjtˤaʶːlˤjaʶ ʕndmaː tuʶntˤq bsrʕa aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ fijmaaː juχʃaaː ħuduwθuhu min rahbaain jaχaaːfuhaaː qaːla jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmalaʔau ʔaajːukum jaʔatjnj biʕarʃihaː qabla ʔaan jaʔatwnj muslimjna wajabʕaθuhu aːllːuʔumu ʕalaaː aːlbaðaaːʔi bisafahihi faʔiin ʁafala ʕan aːstikfaaːfi aːlsːufahaaːʔi wajaltamisa wafqa ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waaːlːaðjna jasʕawna fj ʔaːjaːtinaː muʕaːd͡ʒizjna ʔauwlʔiika fij aːlʕaðaːbi muʶħdˤaʶrˤwnaʶ ʔiið qaːla rabːuka lilmalaːʔiikaai ʔiinːj χaːliqun baʃaranaː min tˤjniʶn ðalika maaːlij ʔaad͡ʒwadu bihi wahaðaaː ʕaqlij baχilt bihi faʔiinːa aːlħaqːa ʔaaθqalu maħmalanaː aːqtrb faʶːdˤlˤ mn daːnja w ħjːaːhaː ʔaʶʕtˤ aːlqws baːrjhaː lm tsˤdːqnj lm tχlʕ ljlaː ħd͡ʒaːbhaː qtˤː jaʶħdˤuʶrˤuʶ aːlmusaaːfiru ʕlaːma aːlkðaːb d͡ʒwdh baːljmjn mn ʁjr mstħlf jastaʕd͡ʒilwnaka biaːlʕaðaːbi waʔiinːa d͡ʒahanːama lˤaʶmuʶħjtˤaʶaʶuʶn biaːlkaːfirjna tmnːaː saːmj ʔan jdˤʕ ħznh wraːʔh kaːnt aːlmdrːsa tfdˤːlˤ tlk aːlftaːa ʕn saːʔir zmlaːʔihaː jawma takwnu aːlsːamaːʔu kaaːlmuhli kaːn saːmj jrħːb baːlzːwːaːr fj aːlaːstqbaːl waχalaqnaː lahum min miθlihi maː jarkabwna smʕ saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː jsjr χlfh liʔiibraaːhijma bni hilaaːlin aːlkaaːtibi bʕd mrwr bdˤʕaʶ ʔaʃhr ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj jtħkːm fj klː mðˤhrˤ mn mðˤaʶːhrˤ ħjaːa ljlaː nʕm kaːn ðlk mðhlaːan laː juʶsˤdq qul laː tusʔaalwna ʕamːaː ʔaad͡ʒramnaː walaː nusʔaalu ʕamːaː taʕmalwna waːd͡ʒb aːld͡ʒmjʕ ljs waːd͡ʒb ʔaħd laaː biʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤlˤiʶ waaːlħasabi ħsˤlˤ ʕlaː aːlkra kl sr d͡ʒaːwz aːlaːθnjn ʃaːʕ jaħriθu aːlfalːaːħu aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤaʶ kaj jazraʕahaaː waqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː jaʕlamuwna ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶrˤaʶnaʶː min aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː waʶtaʶsˤaʶwːaʶrˤaʶ minhaaː maaː tukinːu mn ħsn ħðˤː saːmj lm tχbr ljlaː ʔaħdaː ʕn ðlk ʔiðaː frʁ aːlfʔuaːd ðhb aːlrqaːd tlqaː aːlkθjr mn aːlmdjħ ʔaaħjaːʔan waʔaamwaːtanaː ʔaan jakuwna laʔiijma aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ χabijθa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤlˤiʶ qad ʔaaʁraaːhu luʔumu aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ ʕalaaː suwʔi aːliaːʕtiqaaːdi waqaaːla aːlʔiiskandaru lirad͡ʒulin saʕaaː ʔilajhi birad͡ʒulin waʶsˤaʶdːaʶhaʶː maː kaːnat taʕbudu min dwni aːllːahi ʔiinːahaː kaːnat min qawmin kaːfirjna jʔaχð aːlmdrːswn ʔajːaːm raːħa bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waʶaʶːlˤʕaʶsˤrˤiʶ aːlhawaaː hawaaːnun walakin ʁaʶlˤiʶtˤaʶ biaːsmihi qbl aːlmd͡ʒjʔ ʔilaː ʃjkaːʁw knt ʔaʕjʃ fj bwstn aːχtft θjaːbj laʕana aːllːahu aːlʃːaħijħa walaʕana aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmaʶ hðh aːlʔalʕaːb aːlnaːrja raːʔiʕa laː ʔaʕrf tlk aʶːlˤsˤːʁjrˤaʶ md twm aʶːlˤʁtˤaʶːʔ ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ ʔauwlʔiika hum χajru aːlbarijːaai waʔaanfaʕu maaː kasabahu waaːqtanaaːhu aːlkaaːsibu bʕd ʔan sˤfʕt ljlaː ʃʕrt baːlðːnb raħmaaan min rabːika ʔiinːahu huwa aːlsːamjʕu aːlʕaljmu naħnu naraaː qabuwla aːlsːiʕaaːjaai ʃarːanaː minhaaː kamaaː qijla lilʔiiskandari faʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕanhum waʶaʶːntaʶðˤiʶrˤ ʔiinːahum muʶntaʶðˤiʶrˤwnaʶ waaːlʔaaħmaqa bimaaː fijhi min aːlrːaðaaːʔiili nafʕun ʕalaaː faaːʕilihaaː fij aːktisaaːbi aːlʔaad͡ʒri wad͡ʒamijli aːlðːikri raħima aːllːahu aːmraʔaan ʔaahdaaː ʔilajnaaː masaaːwiʔianaaː wabaʃːiri aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔaanːa lahum d͡ʒanːaaːtin tad͡ʒrij min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaaːru salaːmun ʕalaː ʔiibraːhjma maːðaː ʕndk bʕd ðˤhrˤ ʁd ntˤq saːmj baːlʃːhaːda lkn lmaːðaː maː zaːʁa aʶːlˤbaʶsˤaʶrˤuʶ wamaː tˤaʶʁaʶː fajastaʕmilu aːlħazma fij dafʕi maaː kadːahu waʔaakmadahu lijakuwna ʔaʶaʶtˤjaʶbaʶ nafsanaː waʔaahnaʔaa ʕajʃanaː lmn hðh aːlktb kaːn ldaː saːmj klb aːsmh rwkj w kaːn jħbːh naːdraːan maː ʔaraːhaː ʔiinːaː ʔaarsalnaːka biaːlħaqːi baʃjranaː wanaðjranaː waʔiin min ʔaumːaain ʔiilːaː χalaː fjhaː naðjrun juʶbaʶsˤːaʶrˤwnaʶhuʶm jawadːu aːlmud͡ʒrimu law jaftadj min ʕaðaːbi jawmiʔiiðin bibanjhi waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ kulːi ðamːin lisuwʔi ʕawaaːqibihi faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ waʃjak aːlsːalwaai qalijla aːld͡ʒazaʕi ħasana aːlʕazaaːʔi faʕaltu ʔilajk wafaʕaltu lilkibri mud͡ʒaaːnibanaː waqijla lahu waʶaʶːʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕan aːldːunjaaː taʁnam jaaː ʁulaaːmu ʔaʶaʶʕtˤiʶhiʶ qaʶmiʶjsˤiʶj haðaaː liðalika waʶtˤaʶrˤiʶjquʶn ʔilaaː aːlʔiiʃaaːʕaai waʔaamːaaː ʃarafu aːlnːafsi faʔiinːa bihi jakuwnu qabuwlu aːltːaʔadijbi waaːstiqraaːru wajakuwnu aːlmasʔiuwlu maʶwsˤuʶwfaʶnaʶː biaːlkarami maʶlˤħuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː biaːlwafaaːʔi ʔiiðan tuqijma ʕndanaaː waħakaaː aːlħasanu bnu rad͡ʒaaːʔin miθla ðalika ʕan aːlmaʔamuwni qaaːla ʕlm laː jnfʕ kknz laː junfaqu mnh waħukija ʔaanːa tilmijðanaː saʔaala ʕaaːlimanaː ʕan baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʕuluwmi falam jufidhu ʔin aːlħjaːa ʕqjda wd͡ʒhaːd fj d͡ʒjdihaː ħablun min masadin wajukaaːfiʔia ʕalaaː aːliaːstislaaːmi bibaðli aʶːlˤnːuʶsˤħiʶ faqaaːla lahu ʔaaħsin qalijlanaː waʔaanjbwaː faʶːdˤlˤ tˤbjbaʶː baːrzaː fj aʶːlˤmntˤqaʶ laː ʔarjdh ʔan jʕlm aːlħqjqa hl tħtaːd͡ʒ lmsaːʕda faʔiinːahu laaː jabqaaː fijhi maʕa aːd͡ʒtimaaːʕi aːlqaraaːʔiiħi ʕalajhi χalalun ʔilːaaː ðˤaʶhaʶrˤaʶ walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqa aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ lajaqwlunːa χalaqahunːa aːlʕazjzu aːlʕaljmu aʶːntˤfʔaʶt aʶːlˤʔaʶdˤwaʶːʔ qlt ʔanj knt wħjdaː ʔaljs kðlk waʔaarðaluhaaː sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ ʔaʶaʶχlˤaʶsˤnaʶːhuʶm biʶχaʶːlˤiʶsˤaʶaʶiʶn ðikraaː aːldːaːri wad͡ʒaʕalnaː minhum ʔaaʔiimːaaan jahdwna biʔaamrinaː lamːaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤwaʶː wakaːnwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː jwqinwna fajuðalːilu nafsahu ʔaanafaaan ʔaamːaaː aːlʔaahlu falimumaaːsːaai aːlrːaħimi waʶtaʶʕaʶaʶːtˤuʶfiʶ aːlnːasabi waʔiinːamaaː ħaʶðˤːuʶ aːlʔaaχijri ʔaan jataʕaaːnaaː ħiʶfðˤaʶ aːlʃːaaːridi wad͡ʒamʕa aːlmuftariqi wahuwa fij aːlmaʕnaaː tamwru aːlsːamaːʔu mawranaː wakaθraaa muraaːʕaaːtihaaː waʶsˤaʶrˤfaʶ aːlhimːaai ʔilaaː aːlʕinaaːjaai lahaaː danaaːʔaaun waʶnaʶqsˤuʶn faʔaaðaːqahumu aːllːahu aːlχizja fij aːlħajaːai aːldːunjaː wajuʔuamːilu nafʕaka ʔajn sʔaʕjʃ waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ madadnaːhaː waʔaalqajnaː fjhaː rawaːsija waʔaanbatnaː fjhaː min kulːi zawd͡ʒin bahjd͡ʒin waʔiin ʕadala aːlmuʕsiru ʔilaaː zijːi aːlmuwsiri kaaːna tabðijranaː wasarafanaː qaaːla aːlzːibriqaaːnu bnu badrin jaʕnijhaaː kaːn ðlk ħlm ħjaːth ʃʕrt wkʔanː jdanaː baːrda lmstnj hl tqaːblnaː mn qbl kaːn qtˤː saːmj jχðʃ ljlaː laː jʕrf zwd͡ʒj ʔanːnj mʕk aːlqijaaːmaai bilid͡ʒaaːmin min naaːrin waʔiiðaaː laquwaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː qaaːluwaː ʔaːmanːaaː tanzjlu aːlkitaːbi laː rajba fjhi min rabːi aːlʕaːlamjna ʔiinːa ʃaːniʔiaka huwa aːlʔaabtaru kaːn ʕnd saːmj drs waːħd fqtˤ jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa baːrd kaːlθld͡ʒ walakin kulːu χaʶaʶːtˤiʶbiʶn kaaːðibun ʔiðaaː ħadːaθa ʔaaħadukum falaaː jakðibu falaaː jasmaʕu χanaaːʔan walaaː juʶsˤʁiʶj ʔilaaː fuħʃin faʔiinːa samaaːʕa aːlfuħʃi daaːʕin ʔilaaː ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶ mʃaː ʔilaː aːlbjt ʃrħh lm jkn kaːfjaːan wakaðalika limaaː bajnahumaaː min aːlbilaaːdi aːlmuχtalifaai ʕaaːdaaːtun fij aːllːibaaːsi muχtalifaaun kaːn bimaaː jaʕmaluwna jsttˤjʕ aːlrd͡ʒl ʔan jħmj aːlmrʔaa mn kl rd͡ʒl ʔilːaː nfsh waman qalːa ʕaqluhu dˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶhuʶ saːmj mʕd͡ʒb bki ʔaafamin hðaaː aːlħadjθi taʕd͡ʒabwna waχalaqnaːkum ʔaazwaːd͡ʒanaː wawuquwfik ʕalaaː ʁaʶaʶːmiʶdˤiʶ aːlħukmi tʕaːhdaː saːmj w ljlaː kj jbnjaː ʔaʶfdˤlˤ ħjaːa mmkna lʔasrthmaː aːlnːaːʃʔia ʔaalaaː ʔiinːahum humu aːlmufsiduwna walaaːkin laaː jaʃʕuruwna walilːahi mulku aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wajawma taqwmu aːlsːaːʕaau jawmaʔiiðin jaχsaru aʶːlˤmuʶbtˤiʶlˤwnaʶ ʔaχbr klː ʕmːaːl aːlʕjaːda bhðaː ʔanaː ʔaʶtːsˤlˤ baːlʕjaːda waʶtˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː ðamːihi aʶːtːsˤlˤ saːmj bsjːaːra ʔisʕaːf kaːn saːmj jħbː ʔalʕaːb aʶːlˤtˤːaʶːwlˤaʶ ʔajmknnj ʔan ʔaqwl ʃjʔiaːan kaðlika jaʶtˤbaʶʕuʶ aːllːahu ʕalaː qulwbi aːlːaðjna laː jaʕlamwna ʔaʶsˤbħaʶː saːmj w ljlaː msjħjːjn waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒibaːlu nusifat waman nuʕamːirhu nunakːishu fij aːlχalqi ʔaafalaː jaʕqilwna d͡ʒʕlnj aːlmdrːs ʔabkj wajad͡ʒʕala aːltːawfijqa lanaaː qaaːʔiidanaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʃχsˤaʶː jʕtnj bh faʔiinːa aːldːurːaaa laaː jaʶdˤaʶʕuʶhaʶaʶː muhaaːnaaan ʁaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶsˤuʶhaʶaʶː baʕda ʔaan taʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ ʕujuwbuhu χaʶlˤaʶsˤaʶ biaːliaːstiraaːħaai min ʕad͡ʒzihaaː wakalaaːlihaaː qaːlwaː jaː wajlanaː ʔiinːaː kunːaː tˤaʶːʁjnaʶ ʔaan taquwla falaaː tuʶbtˤiʶʔiʶaʶ waʔaan tuʶsˤiʶjbaʶ falaaː tuʶχtˤiʶʔiʶaʶ fd͡ʒʔaa aːχtft sjːaːra saːmj faʔaataaːhu faʔaaχbarahu faqaaːla lahu muʕaaːwijaau ʔaawfi binaðrik waljarfuq aːlʃːajχu biaːlʃːajχi trk faʶːdˤlˤ daːnja χlfh ʔaamːaaː aːlrːaʁbaau ؛ faliʔaanːahu laaː jakrahu aːlzːijaaːdaaa ʕalaaː aːlkifaaːjaai ʔiðaaː sanaħat aːlmrwr mmnwʕ kaːn baʶːsttˤaʶːʕaʶ ʔaħmd tsluːq aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr aːlʕaːlja ʕndmaː kaːn tˤflˤaʶːaʶn hm laː jnswn ʔabdaː dfʕ ʔijd͡ʒaːrhm ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlmktb mħmd rswl aːllhʕljh aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waːlslaːm ʔatmʃːaː kl jwm nħn ʕlaː wʃk aʶːlˤhbwtˤ lˤiʶlˤtˤːaʶːʁjnaʶ maʔaːbanaː ʕajnanaː fjhaː tusamːaː salsabjlanaː kalːaː law taʕlamwna ʕilma aːljaqjni bunjt hðh aːlʕjaːda mn tˤrˤf rd͡ʒl ʔaʕmaːl θrj laː tðˤn ʔan twm sjtsˤlˤ bk md͡ʒddaː aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ klː tlk aːlmdːa dwmanaː d͡ʒaːʔiʕ sʔaʕrːfk ʔiljh ʔið kaaːnat aːldːunjaaː tanqulu min sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶn ʔilaaː sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶn waʶtaʶsˤiʶlˤuʶ sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶnaʶː waʔiinːahu ʕalaː ðlika laʃahjdun brʃaːqa aʶːlˤqtˤː qfz nħw aːlrːf lknːh ʔaχfq w sqtˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wadurːin ʔaaħrazahu ʁajru d͡ʒaaːlibihi qaːla rabːi ʔiinːj qataltu minhum nafsanaː faʔaaχaːfu ʔaan jaqtulwni kaːnt hnaːk lˤtˤχaʶːt dm fj klː mkaːn mn aːlʁrfa ʔiilaː qadarin maʕlwmin waʔiinːaː ʔiilaː rabːinaː lamunqalibwna tʕθːr aːlmdrːs baːlsːlk waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man ʔaalifa aːlmasʔaalaaa ʔaalifahu aːlmanʕu fj fsˤlˤ aːlʃːtaːʔ faaːlhawaaːnu bihi ʔaawlaaː waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤuʶ ʕanhu ʔaʶaʶsˤwaʶbuʶ ʕawaaː aːlðːiʔibu waqad ðakara aːlmuʁijraau bnu ʃuʕbaaa ʕumara bna aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ faqaaːla wahuwa muʁnijanaː ʕan aːlʔaadabi lakaaːna ʔaanbijaaːʔu aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕan ʔaadabihi mustaʁnijna ʔaʶmdˤjt rsaːla saːmj aːlhaːtfjːa bħrf aːlfaːʔ faqaːlwaː ʔaabaʃaranaː minːaː waːħidanaː natːabiʕuhu waʶlˤaʶaʶːnqaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶ ʕanhum biʶaʶːnqiʶrˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶhiʶm faʔaaχaða aːbnu ʕawfin haðaaː aːlkalaaːma faʶnaʶðˤaʶmaʶhuʶ ʃiʕranaː faqaaːla ʔibħθ sbʕ snwaːt qbl ʔan tsˤdq χbraːan ʔaʶħdˤrˤ saːmj klbh zʕm wamuhmalu aːlʔiiħsaaːni dˤaʶaʶːlˤːuʶn waʶsˤaʶdːaʶqaʶhaʶaʶː faʔaad͡ʒaaːbathu tʕaʶːtˤj saːmj llmχdːraːt jmkn ʔan jd͡ʒlb aːntbaːh aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ ʔaan jaqnaʕa biaːlbulʁaai min dunjaaːhu aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj stːa ʔaʃhr ʔaχraː lmħ saːmj mnzlaː waʔiin kaaːna ħaqijranaː liqilːaai ʔaanafatihi wamaː ʔaadraːka maː hijah qul faʔatwaː bikitaːbin min ʕindi aːllːahi huwa ʔaahdaː minhumaː ʔaatːabiʕhu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ waaːlʃːukru ʕalaaː aːlnːuʕmaaː ʔanaː ʔaʕjʃ ʕjʃa ʃrjfa lm tʕd ldjː bnt bhðaː aːlʔism lqd tbrːʔat mnhaː ʔaʶsˤjb saːmj bd͡ʒrħ χtˤjrˤ waːħd fqtˤ aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːmtiθaaːli maaː ʔaamara aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː bihi falilːahi aːlħamdu rabːi aːlsːamaːwaːti warabːi aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ rabːi aːlʕaːlamjna aːlklaːb tnbħ waːlqaːfla tsjr qaːla laʔiini aːtːaχaðta ʔiilhanaː ʁajrj laʔaad͡ʒʕalanːaka mina aːlmasd͡ʒwnjna qijla lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man jaʕrifu kulːa aːlʕuluwmi faqaaːla kulːu aːlnːaaːsi kaːn saːmj sˤdjqaʶː lˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ljlaː waħukija ʔaanːa qawmanaː maʃawaː χalfa ʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu faqaaːla hl mn d͡ʒdjd waʕilːaau haðaaː aːlqawli ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn fijhi sitːaau taʔawijlaaːtin waminhaaː maaː laħiqahu min ʃaqaaːʔi d͡ʒamʕihi wanaaːlahu min ʃʕr saːmj ʔanː ħjaːa ljlaː kaːnt fj χtˤrˤ tbdw aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mblwla juʔufaku ʕanhu man ʔaufika waman tafahːama aːzdaaːda aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ ʔaaw jaðːakːaru fatanfaʕahu aːlðːikraː lm jħdːθ saːmj tˤbjbaʶː qtˤː ħwl hðaː aːlʔamr ljs hðaː maː ʔardt ʔiχbaːrk ʕnh aːlːaðjna kafarwaː lahum ʕaðaːbun ʃadjdun waaːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun kabjrun laː tasmaʕu fjhaː laːʁijaaan maːðaː ʕn aːljwm bʔimkaːnk aːlqdwm mʕj twqːf saːmj mn tqdjm aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ lljlaː mħaːwla mnh kj jqtlhaː aːlmslmwn jʕbdwn aːllh walaaː ʔilaaː maaː jantahij ʔilajhi aːlʕud͡ʒbu min aːld͡ʒahli ʁaaːjaaun ʔant tʕrf ʔannj ln ʔaʕwd ʔaljs kðlk ʔaalam nad͡ʒʕal lahu ʕajnajni aːʕtqd saːmj ʔanː ħbː ljlaː lh kaːn dwn qjd ʔaw ʃrˤtˤ aːlʔaʕwr fj wstˤ aːlʕmjaːn mlk farijdun jad͡ʒrij fij aːlʃːaaːriʕi waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶː qaljlanaː waʔaakdaː ʔaʃʕa aːlʃms hj aʶːlˤmsˤdrˤ aːlrʔijsj lfjtaːmjn d ʔinːa ʔaaħaqːa maaː taʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ ʕalajhi maaː lam tad͡ʒid ʔilaaː dafʕihi sabijlanaː wamin d͡ʒasadik ʔaan jaχifːa wafij miθli haðaaː aːlχabari qawlu aːlʃːaaːʕiri wataqalːubaka fij aːlsːaːd͡ʒidjna rʔajthm jbkwn raħima aːllːahu aːmraʔaan ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ min lisaaːnihi ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla ʃdjda aːllːhd͡ʒa lˤlˤmsˤrˤf aːlʃːarːa biaːlʃːarːi juʶtˤfaʶʔaʶuʶ walaaː jaʕraaː min aʶːlˤnːaʶqsˤiʶ ʔilːaaː baʕda ʔaan jastawfijahaaː wahija ʔaarbaʕaaun waaːlqalba raaːʔiidu aːlħaqːi waaːlħaqːa min dawaaːʕij aːlʕaqli fahaðihi ʔaarbaʕaau ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶn mataaː ʔaaχalːa aːlmutakalːimu biʶʃaʶrˤtˤiʶn minhaaː faqad ʔaawhana faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶ baaːqijhaaː lst mtʔakdaː kjf ħdθ ðlk wamaː taʃaːʔwna ʔiilːaː ʔaan jaʃaːʔa aːllːahu ʔiinːa aːllːaha kaːna ʕaljmanaː ħakjmanaː ʕmj jdχn kθjranaː d͡ʒdaː wlaː ʁnaː lh ʕn aːltbʁ ʔalaː tbaːlj ʔin dχnt maːðaː tʕlːmtnː ʔiʕrf ʕdwk wʔiʕrf nfsk hw jʁsl sjaːrth lħb ʔaʶrˤdˤnaʶː aːlʔam jðhb waːldjh ʔilaː aːlknjsa kl jwm ʔaħd tbdw ljlaː qbjħa jd͡ʒb ʔan tħaːwl ʔan tkwn ʔakθr ʔadbaːan wʃrwh bθmn bχs draːhm mʕdwda wkaːnwaː fjh mn aːlzaːhdjn faʕaqaruwhaaː faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħuʶwaʶː naaːdimijna wʔin jkaːd aːlðjn kfrwaː ljzlqwnk bʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤhm lmaː smʕwaː aːlðkr wjqwlwn ʔinh lmd͡ʒnwn wabusːati aːld͡ʒibaaːlu basːanaː swf tθq bk ʁdaːan sjhbtˤ ʕlaː aːlkʕba bjt aːllːah lknhm sjsˤdmwn ħtmaː baːlaːktʃaːfaːt aːltj wsˤlˤ ʔiljhaː nðˤrˤaʶːʔuʶhm aːljwm ʔiinːa ʕalajnaaː lalhudaaː dˤaʶħk aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʕlaː ʁlˤtˤtiʶhiʶ ʔinhaː ʔaχtj hl aːlʔamr sjːʔ ʔilaː hðaː saaːħirun ʔaaw mad͡ʒnuwnun fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhunːa ʔaabkaaːranaː mlʔa aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa baːlmaːʔ dʕnaː nqsm aːlfaːtwra bʔarbʕa tˤrˤq waʔiimːaaː ʔilaaː aʶːlˤnːuʶqsˤaʶaʶːniʶ waaːlzːawaaːli wbdaː lhm sjʔiaːt maː ʕmlwaː wħaːq bhm maː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn dʕwnaː nnsaː hðaː jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː hal ʔaadulːukum ʕalaaː tid͡ʒaaːraain tund͡ʒijkum min ʕaðaaːbin ʔaalijmin ʃkraː ʕlaː hdjtk aːllːahu subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː waχuliqa aːlʔiinsaaːnu dˤaʶʕiʶjfaʶnaʶː aʶːlˤmħjtˤ jmtd ħtaː aːlʔafq aːlbʕjd θumːa ʔaaqbala aːlmustadilːu ʕalajːa waqaaːla lij hl rʔajt haːtfj aːlχljwj " ʔinh fwq aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ " jaː llʔiħraːd͡ʒ bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi n waaːlqalami wamaaː jaʶstˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ θumːa ʔiiðaaː ʃaaːʔa ʔaanʃarahu wmaː jntˤq ʕn aːlhwaː kaːn twm sʕjdaː hj ʁaːdrtnaː nħn swf nsdd hðaː aʶːlˤqrˤdˤ btˤrˤjqaʶ ʔaw bʔaχraː waqaaːla aːlːaðij ʔaːmana jaaː qawmi aːtːabiʕuwni ʔaahdikum sabijla aːlrːaʃaaːdi χð jdj qaaːla mawʕidukum jawmu aːlzːijnaai waʔaan juħʃara aːlnːaaːsu bðˤlˤaʶːmhaʶː ʔiilaːːa ʕalaaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒihim ʔaaw maaː malakat ʔaajmaaːnuhum faʔiinːahum ʁajru maluwmijna aːlʔikθaːr mn ʃrb aːlmskr sjsˤjbk baʶːlˤmrˤdˤ waʶaʶːlˤfuʶdˤuʶwlˤuʶ ʔinːamaaː jaʶntˤaʶlˤiʶquʶ ʕalaaː maaː zaaːda ʕalaaː qadri aːlkifaaːjaai ʔanaː aːħb aːllʁaːt ʔaχʃaː ʔan ʔaʶsˤlˤ mtʔaχraː twm ʁaːʔib lajsa fij aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ ʔaan jakuwna maaː lajsa fij aʶːlˤtːaʶtˤaʶbːuʶʕiʶ mn aʶːlˤaʶːfdˤlˤ ʔan sˤaʶːmtaʶː ʔiðaː lm tkn tʕlm ʃjʔiaː ʕn hðaː aːlʔamr hl tʕlm maːhw lwn "twm" aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ ʔinhu jʔumn baːlħjaːa aːlʔaːχra drdʃwaː tˤwjlˤaʶnaʶː ʕn aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj tʕaːl bʕd ʁd waʔiismaaːʕijla waʔiidrijsa waðaaː aːlkifli kulːun mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ ql llh aːlʃfaːʕa d͡ʒmjʕaː lh mlk aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ θm ʔiljh trd͡ʒʕwn kaman aʶːqtaʶsˤaʶrˤaʶ fij aːlʕibaaːdaai ʕalaaː fiʕli waaːd͡ʒibaaːtihaaː fʔaqblwaː ʔiljh jzfwn maːðaː ʃrbt ʔatklm aːlʔawzbkja wjwm nsjr aːld͡ʒbaːl wtraː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ baːrza wħʃrnaːhm flm nʁaːdr mnhm ʔaħdaː rsmat sˤwrˤaʶ d͡ʒmjla lwaːldthaː kaːna qmjsˤhuʶ rmaːdjaːan wrˤbtˤaʶuʶ ʕunqhi sˤfrˤaʶːʔaʶ waman d͡ʒaaːʔa biaːlsːajːiʔiaai fakubːat wud͡ʒuwhuhum fij aːlnːaaːri hal tud͡ʒzawna ʔiilːaaː maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna slbj ʔiinːahum ʔiin jaʶðˤhaʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʕalajkum jard͡ʒumuwkum ʔaaw juʕijduwkum fij milːatihim walan tufliħuwaː ʔiiðanaː ʔaabadanaː ʔiinːa naaːʃiʔiaaa aːllːajli hija ʔaaʃadːu waʶtˤʔaʶnaʶː waʔaaqwamu qijlaː ʔinh jʃrb aːlmaːʔ jmknk ʔan tʕtmd ʕljh ln jχðlk ʔabdanaː wʔalqt maː fjhaː wtχlt faqulnaaː jaaː ʔaːdamu ʔiinːa haðaaː ʕaduwːun laka walizawd͡ʒika falaaː juχrid͡ʒanːakumaaː mina aːld͡ʒanːaai fataʃqaaː hðaː hw aːlsbb ʔan ʔauʃaːrk hðh aːlʔaχbaːr laː tqlq bʃʔan maː fʕlth ʔiinːahum ʕani aːlsːamʕi lamaʕzuwluwna haː hw ktaːbk aːlðj d͡ʒmʕ maːlaː wʕddh fakajfa jakuwnu ʕilmu ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶ aːlmaðhabi mastuwranaː wahuwa sarijʕun ʕalajhi aːld͡ʒawaaːbu ħtaː ʔiðaː blʁ bjn aːlsdjn wd͡ʒd mn dwnhmaː qwmaː laː jkaːdwn jfqhwn qwlaː slaːm qwlaː mn rb rħjm baːltwfjq jaː tlmjdj maːðaː knti stfʕaljna lw knti fj mkaːnj jaaː aːbna ʕimraaːna taʕalːam aːlʕilma litaʕmala bihi ʔanaː sˤdjqh w sʔabqaː kðlk laː ʔatðkr maː ħsˤlˤ rbmaː jkwn aʶːlˤqtˤ mχtbʔiaː tħt aːlsrjr tarmijhim biħid͡ʒaaːraain min sid͡ʒːijlin hn jstħqnhaː faaːrtaqib ʔiinːahum murtaqibuwna faaːχtalafa aːlʔaaħzaaːbu min bajnihim fawajlun lilːaðijna kafaruwaː min maʃhadi jawmin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn waːmrʔath ħmaːla aʶːlˤħtˤb jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tnhj hðaː aːlʕml qbl aʶːlˤðˤhrˤ ʔaaw mwaʶːtˤnj aːljaːbaːn bjrw hj θaːlθ dwl ʔamrjkaː aːld͡ʒnwbja msaːħaan bʕd aːlbraːzjl waːlʔard͡ʒntjn jsˤnf aʶːlˤnsˤ aːlmktwb baːllʁa aːlʕrbja aːlaː θlaːθ tsˤnjfaʶːt aʶːnsˤt w ʃaːhd waːbqaː haːdʔi waaːlːaðijna jabijtuwna lirabːihim sud͡ʒːadanaː waqijaaːmanaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːfːaʶaʶːtiʶ sˤaʶfːaʶnaʶː lmaːðaː trjd ʃraːʔ hðaː aːlktaːb wqd χlqkm ʔaʶtˤwaʶːrˤaʶː ttwjbaː: ʔasmʕt bħrwb aːld͡ʒumal saːbqanaː ʔad͡ʒl hðh mtʕtnaː ʔinnj mʃʁwla d͡ʒdaːan laː ʔaʕrf ʔin knaː nħtaːd͡ʒ ðlk twm lm jlms ʔaj ʃjʔ fħmlth faːntbðt bh mkaːnaː qsˤjaʶː ðalika aːlkitaaːbu laaː rajba fijhi hudanaː lilmutːaqijna daʕ twm jðhb maːðaː jrjd ʔan jfʕl aːlmuslimu man salima aːlmuslimuwna min lisaaːnihi wajadihi lmn hðh aːlħqjba hw ʔakbr mnhaː snaː bθlaːθ snwaːt jsttˤjʕ kl tˤflˤ fʕl ðlk nħfðˤ aːlswdaːn fj hðj aːlqlwb nftdjh mn ʃmaːl ʔaw d͡ʒnwb kl aːltlaːmjð tqrjbaː kaːnwaː fj aːlqsm ʔanaː fχwra d͡ʒdaː bʔabj ldjh rqm qjaːsj fj aːlsbaːħa maː aːlðj traːhu hju fjh hl ttħdθ aːld͡ʒwrd͡ʒja rˤfdˤ aːld͡ʒndj ʔan jtˤlˤq bndqjth ʕlaː aːlʕdw aːlqaːʕda laː ttˤbq fj hðh aːlħaːla latarawunːa aːld͡ʒaħijma w ħmlnaː raːja aːltħrjr fkra ljs ʕndj ʔilaː nsˤf ʕdd ktbh ʕljk ʔan ttˤjʕ waːldjk km raːʔiʕ ʔanta fkfrwaː bh fswf jʕlmwn fmaː jkðbk bʕd baːldjn hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt aːlbaːrħa qul taʶrˤaʶbːaʶsˤuʶwaʶː faʔiinːij maʕakum mina aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶrˤaʶbːiʶsˤiʶjnaʶ aːldwla aːlqwmja hj mn mχrd͡ʒaːt ʕljh ʔan jfʕl hðaː hw sˤbwrˤ maːðaː trjdjn ʔanaː ʔarjd ħjwaːn waqaaːla θaʕlabun ʔawd aːltħdθ ʔilaː rʔijsa aʶːlˤmmrˤdˤaʶːt ʔin jwm aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ mjqaːthm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn falamːaaː ʔaaslamaaː watalːahu ʔaðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔan θumːa lamːaaː kaaːna aːlʕaqlu daaːlanaː ʕalaaː ʔaasbaaːbi maaː tadʕuw ʔilajhi aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau jd͡ʒb ʕljk aʶːlˤaʶːndˤmaʶːm lj hðaː aʶːlˤsˤndwq ljs kbjraː kðaːk kaːn mnːaːd mnfʕlaː ʕaʶːtˤfjːaʶː ʔatħdθ lʁa ʔijdw dʕjnaː laː ntħdθ aːlħub qwj, wlkn aːlmaːl ʔaqwaː ʔinhaː tmtˤrˤ hnaːk qaːl ʔaʶnðˤrˤnj ʔilaː jwm jbʕθwn aːχtfaː mnːaːd mn aːlqaːhra wasalima aːlʕaaːlimu min aːld͡ʒihatajni tlk aːldraːd͡ʒa draːd͡ʒtj χrd͡ʒt aːlʕaːʔila klːhaː lttmʃːaː walaqad naʕlamu ʔaanːaka jaʶdˤiʶjquʶ sˤaʶdrˤuʶkaʶ bimaaː jaquwluwna maːrj, ʔanti ftaːa mskjna, ʔajn knti maːðaː ħdθ lki bdʔat ʔaʃrb mbkːraː ʔinʃaːʔ mwqʕ ʔilktrwnj bdwn ʔaj tklfa wlqd rʔaːh nzla ʔaχraː wamina aʶːlˤʃːaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjniʶ man jaʶʁuʶwsˤuʶwnaʶ lahu wajaʕmaluwna ʕamalanaː duwna ðalika wakunːaaː lahum ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶjnaʶ twm ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mnaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː maaː jaquwluwna wasabːiħ biħamdi rabːika qabla tˤuʶlˤuʶwʕiʶ aːlʃːamsi waqabla aːlʁuruwbi wamin ʃarːi ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada twm hw mn bwstwn knt ʔaʃaːhd aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ jd͡ʒb ʔan ndaːfʕ ʕn aːlqaːnwn hw jstmʕ daːʔimaː llʔaχbaːr baːlmðjaːʕ lstmaː aːlwħjdaːn aːlðaːn waːd͡ʒhaː hðaː aːlmʃkl ʕljkmaː ʔan tqblaːh w ʔan ttχtˤjaʶːnh sʔaʶsˤlˤjh sqr dʕwnaː ntqaːsm aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːrˤjf ʔanaː ʔaħbːu ʔan ʔadrsa aːllʁaːta aːlʔad͡ʒnbjaa ʔanaː qaːdmun aːljwm faqad qijla man wadakːa liʃajʔin tawalːaaː maʕa aʶːnqiʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕiʶn θamːa ʔaamijnin θm twljtm mn bʕd ðlk flwlaː fdˤlˤ aːllh ʕljkm wrħmth lkntm mn aːlχaːsrjn flaː tdˤrˤbwaʶː llh aːlʔamθaːl ʔin aːllh jʕlm wʔantm laː tʕlmwn aːʁlq aːlnaːfða qbl ʔan tʁaːdr sˤʕd qtˤaʶːn ʕlaː aːlkrsj ʔanta jmknka ʔan tʔatj mʕnaː sajaðːakːaru man jaχʃaaː knt friħanaː baːlʔams ʔanaː ʕmlt fj hðaː aʶːlˤmsˤnʕ maː aːlðj trjdhu haː jd͡ʒb ʕljka ʔan laː tħkm ʕlaːa ʃχsˤ mn mðˤhrˤhuʶ waːlsaːrq waːlsaːrqa faʶːqtˤʕwaʶː ʔajdjhmaː d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː ksbaː nkaːlaː mn aːllh waːllh ʕzjz ħkjm maː tðr mn ʃjʔ ʔatt ʕljh ʔilaː d͡ʒʕlth kaːlrmjm tʕrft ʕlaː aːlʕdjd mn aʶːlˤsˤdjqaʶːt aːld͡ʒdd waʔiiðaaː qijla lahum laaː tufsiduwaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ qaaːluwaː ʔiinːamaaː naħnu muʶsˤlˤiʶħuʶwnaʶ tʕtˤjnaʶː aːlʃmsu aʶːlˤdˤwʔaʶ waːlħraːraa sjðkr mn jχʃaː wqaːl aːlrswl jaː rb ʔin qwmj aːtχðwaː hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mhd͡ʒwraː dʕh jðhb wlkl drd͡ʒaːt mmaː ʕmlwaː wmaː rbk bʁaːfl ʕmaː jʕmlwn falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlχunːasi lijawmi aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ maː zlt nʕsaːn sˤħjħ laː tsttˤjʕ aːkl aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ kjf tʕrf aːðaː lm td͡ʒrb aːbdaːan wajka jaː man raaːma taqjjda aːlfalak ʔaaːuː nad͡ʒmin fj aːlsaːmaː jaʶχdˤaʶʕuʶ lak ʔant nfsk laː tʕrf maː trjd ʔin aːlðjn ftnwaː aːlmʔumnjn waːlmʔumnaːt θm lm jtwbwaː flhm ʕðaːb d͡ʒhnm wlhm ʕðaːb aːlħrjq lqd ʔaʶsˤaʶːb qdmh aːljsraː ʕndmaː sqtˤ ʔanti ksrti aːlqwaːʕd ʔiʶfħsˤ kul waːħd wʔaqm aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ tˤrˤfj aːlnhaːr wzlfaː mn aːlljl ʔin aːlħsnaːt jðhbn aːlsjʔiaːt ðlk ðkraː llðaːkrjn laː ʔaqdr jawma aʶːlˤrˤfdˤ wmaː hw ʕlaː aːlʁjb bdˤnjn fd͡ʒʕlnaː ʕaːljhaː saːflhaː wʔaʶmtˤrˤnaʶː ʕljhm ħd͡ʒaːra mn sd͡ʒjl lmaːðaː laː trdn ʔan tqln lnaː aːlħqjqa tktb ʔijmjlj rsaːlaan aːbtʕtu lhaː saːʕa sajaʕlamuwna wahum mukramuwna sʔafʕl ʔajː ʃjʔ lʔad͡ʒlk jaː maːrj ʔalaː tðˤnː ʔanː ʕljk ʔaχð qstˤiʶn mn aːlraːħa lqd χdʕnk hðh aːlsla mljʔia baːlfwaːkh fijhaaː ʕajnun d͡ʒaaːrijaaun ʔanaː ʔamrjkj ʔaʶtˤfʔiʶ twm mχaʶːdˤiʶ ʔin aːlðjn ħqt ʕljhm klmt rbk laː jʔumnwn ʔaχðnaːk ʕhdaː ħmlnaːk wʕdaː wnhdjk sʕdaː ld͡ʒjl ʔaʶtˤlˤ fʔant ʕnh tlhaː saːmj lm jʁlq ʔaj baːb fj aːlbjt kl maː rˤsˤdh aːlflkjwn mn χlaːl aːltlskwbaːt aʶːlˤmttˤwrˤaʶ jwmaː bʕd jwm hj thtm baːlmwsjqaː wmaː ʔanzlnaː ʕljk aːlktaːb ʔilaː ltbjn lhm aːlðj aːχtlfwaː fjh whdaː wrħma lqwm jʔumnwn aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt maːda mθjra llaːhtmaːm waʔaaqbaħa aːnfiraaːdahumaaː jbdw ʔanh rd͡ʒl ʔamjn sjʔatj ʔin kaːn jrʁb ðlk flnkn sˤrˤħaʶːʔ smʕ aːħmd baʶːlˤtχfjdˤ ʔalm tr ʔilaː aːlðjn jd͡ʒaːdlwn fj ʔaːjaːt aːllh ʔanaː jsˤrˤfwn ʕaːʃ fj ʔisbaːnjaː sraːan fklwaː mmaː ʁnmtm ħlaːlaː tˤjbaʶː waːtqwaː aːllh ʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm haːa lm tkn tʕrf ʔan hnaːk trd͡ʒma llqrʔaːn baːlʕbrja lilʃːaaːfiʕijːi rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu faːlq aʶːlˤʔiʶsˤbaʶːħ wd͡ʒʕl aːlljl sknaː waːlʃms waːlqmr ħsbaːnaː ðlk tqdjr aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm sʔal aʶːlˤsˤaʶːʔiʶb: " ltuʕjːn mħaːmjanaː d͡ʒjːdanaː " aːlmwz ʔaʶsˤfrˤ aːlːaðijna jaχʃawna rabːahum biaːlʁajbi wahum mina aːlsːaaːʕaai muʃfiquwna kaðːabat qawmu lˤuʶwtˤiʶn aːlmursalijna wd͡ʒʕlnj mbaːrkaː ʔajn maː knt wʔaʶwsˤaʶːnj baʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waːlzkaːa maː dmt ħjaː walajsa liman bulija bihi ʔilːaaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ waaːlʔiiqlaaːlu hnaːk ʔazmaːt tdknaː wʔaχraː tχrd͡ʒ mn aːlʔaʕmaːq ʔaʶfdˤlˤ maː fjnaː ʔaʃʕl ʕwd θqaːb kamaaː qaaːla aːlʔaawːalu wʔaːja lhm aːlljl nslχ mnh aːlnhaːr fʔiðaː hm mðˤlˤmwn waʔiinːij laʁafːaaːrun liman taaːba waʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː θumːa aːhtadaaː wʔaːtjnaːh fj aːldnjaː ħsna wʔinh fj aːlʔaːχra lmn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn laaː tad͡ʒʔaaruwaː aːljawma ʔiinːakum minːaaː laaː tuʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ wlaː jħsbn aːlðjn kfrwaː sbqwaː ʔinhm laː jʕd͡ʒzwn waʔiinːaaː ʕalaaː ʔaan nurijaka maaː naʕiduhum laqaaːdiruwna ʔiðaː lm tkn mʕnaː fʔant dˤdnaʶː bʔan rbk ʔawħaː lhaː hl ʔant tʕlm ʔaʕrf kjf ʔalʕb kra aʶːlˤmdˤrˤb wasaχːara lakumu aːlʃːamsa waaːlqamara daaːʔiibajni wasaχːara lakumu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra qaaːla ʔaataʕbuduwna maaː tanħituwna ʔinaː ʔarslnaːk baːlħq bʃjraː wnðjraː wlaː tsʔal ʕn ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiið qaaːla rabːuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinːij χaaːliqun baʃaranaː min tˤiʶjniʶn faːkhjn bmaː ʔaːtaːhm rbhm wwqaːhm rbhm ʕðaːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔaχrd͡ʒ dftranaː waliʁajrik nuwruhu ʔajn aːlktb snbqaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ħtaː aːlmwt ʔanti ksrti qlbj aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶwaʶaʶːdˤiʶʕuʶ min tˤuʶlˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlʕilmi ʔaakθaruhum ʕilmanaː liʔaanːa aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːba bihi juʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː ħaaːlatajni maðmuwmatajni warad͡ʒulun jadrij walaaː jadrij ʔaanːahu jadrij faðalika naaːsin faðakːiruwhu lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlnːakijru ʔiðaaː χaʃija tnaːwltu lltw wd͡ʒba aʶːlˤftˤwrˤ ʔanta kjf ʕrfta ðlk twmaːs jʃaːhd fjlmaːan ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤrˤaʶːblˤs ljbjaː ðlk bʔan aːllh hw aːlħq wʔanh jħjj aːlmwtaː wʔanh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr hðaː hw aːlktaːb aːlðj tbħθwn ʕnh waqul rabːi aːʁfir waaːrħam waʔaanta χajru aːlrːaaːħimijna qrrt ʔan ʔaʕml lħsaːb ʃrka fj ʔamrjkaː tbdw w kʔank rʔajt ʃbħaː ʔanaː ʔaʕml hnaː lst zaːʔiraː lwsmħt laːtnsaː ʔan twqðˤnj ʁdaː fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa lm jtwqːʕ twm ʔajːa msaːʕda mn maːrj ql hl nnbʔikm baːlʔaχsrjn ʔaʕmaːlaː ʔajn jʕjʃ χaːlk mn tðˤn nfsk daʕwaaːhum fijhaaː subħaaːnaka aːllːahumːa wataħijːatuhum fijhaaː salaaːmun waʔaːχiru daʕwaaːhum ʔaani aːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna ʔiðhbj ʔilaːa ʁrqtik wʔanhm ðˤnwaʶː kmaː ðˤnntm ʔan ln jbʕθ aːllh ʔaħdaː ʕn ʕumra rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: jbdw saːmj lˤtˤjfaʶː man juʶsˤrˤaʶf ʕanhu jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimahu waðalika aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu walawlaaː faʶdˤlˤuʶ aːllːahi ʕalajkum waraħmatuhu waʔaanːa aːllːaha raʔuwfun raħijmun waʔiinːamaaː aːlsːaʕaaːdaau ʔaan laaː jakuwna lahu sˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶfuʶn ʕan aːlʕilmi qaːrn bjn ʔasaːljb tlk aːlrsaːʔil tnmw hðh aːlʃd͡ʒra baːlqrb mn bjthaː ʔasrʕ wʔaʕlaː wʔaqwaː ʔaʶnðˤrˤ maːðaː ʔaʶħdˤrˤt lj fj ʕjd mjlaːdj kwbj kaːml hl ʔanta tsʕl dmaːʔ hðaː ljs d͡ʒjdaːan rˤkdˤ aːlklb ʕqb aʶːlˤqtˤ hjaː dʕnaː nðhb ʔilaː aːlbjt nħn ðaːhbtaːn ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤbχ lm nħb bʕdˤnaʶː aʶːlˤbʕdˤ dʕwnaː nstʕd llðhaːb lw kntu mkaːnk, kntu sʔafʕl nfs aːlʃʔi km aːlmda wʔanta tuʕlm aːlʔisbaːnja kalːaaː ʔiinːaaː χalaqnaaːhum mimːaaː jaʕlamuwna kuwnuwaː lilʕilmi ruʕaaːaan wajaħduθu biʶχuʶlˤuʶwsˤiʶ aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːaʶiʶ wafaaːʔun wamuħaaːmaaːaun maː kntu dwnhmaː fj aːlʃʕri mqtdraːan waʔiin taʕudːuwaː niʕmaaa aːllːahi laaː tuʶħsˤuʶwhaʶaʶː ʔiinːa aːllːaha laʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔaami aːtːaχaða mimːaaː jaχluqu banaaːtin waʶʔaʶaʶsˤfaʶaʶːkuʶm biaːlbanijna twm ʕaʶːtˤlˤ ʕn aːlʕml ħaːljaː ʔalaː tbʕd jdk ʕnj ʔarjd ʔan ʔatħdθ mʕk bmwdˤwʕ lkl nbʔi mstqr wswf tʕlmwn hudanaː waðikraaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi aːklnaː bjdˤ ʔiinːamaaː jaʔamurukum biaːlsːuwʔi waaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waʔaan taquwluwaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna wakulːun biaːlʔaaθari jawmuhu ʔaaw ʁaduhu ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai χaaːlidijna fijhaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna twm jqwm bqrʔaːʔa ktaːb taːrjχ marfuwʕaain muʶtˤaʶhːaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶn ql ʔin ʔadrj ʔaqrjb maː twʕdwn ʔam jd͡ʒʕl lh rbj ʔamdaː waaːlːaðijna hum biʃahaaːdaaːtihim qaaːʔiimuwna aʶːħtfðˤ bh fj mkaːn baːrd aːalʕad͡ʒalaa mina aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːn ʔam lkm slˤtˤaʶːn mbjn aːstmrwaː fj aːlħdjθ lsaːʕaːt lma ʔabqjth sranːaː waʕalaaː taʶnaʶqːuʶsˤiʶhiʶ ʔaaħraaː fʔalqaː ʕsˤaʶːh fʔiðaː hj θʕbaːn mbjn srq mnj kl maːlj ʔaajːumaaː ʔaaħabːu ʔilajk rad͡ʒulun qalijlu aːlðːunuwbi qalijlu aːlʕamali hw tˤflˤ aːlʕaːʔila qaːl nʕm wʔinkm lmn aːlmqrbjn maː kðb aːlfʔuaːd maː rʔaaː maː aːlχjaːraːt aːlʔaχraː aːltj ʔamaːmj faʶːtˤmaʶ jaaː rasuwla aːllaːhi kajfa jaʔatijka aːlwaħju tħbnj kl ʕaːʔiltj kaːn d͡ʒbjnj jʁlj mn aːlħmaː ʔin hj ʔilaː mwttnaː aːlʔawlaː wmaː nħn bmnʃrjn hl sbq lk ʔan ðhbt ʔilaː aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda laː ʔaʕrf ʃjʔianaː aːlbtːa mustakbirijna bihi saaːmiranaː tahd͡ʒuruwna aːljwm hw aːlʔaħd wafirʕawna ðij aːlʔaawtaaːdi ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabːuka biʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlfijli waʔiilajk nasʕaaː kjf ʔaʕaːwdk w hðaː ʔaθr fʔask waminhunːa mamnaʕun taʶdˤuʶrˤːuʶ walaaː tanfaʕu tbdw rd͡ʒlanaː sˤdwqaʶnaʶː jmknk aʶːjdˤaʶː aːlmsaːhma fj aːlmsaːbqa mn χlaːl tqjjm w aʶːdˤaʶːfaʶ d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda ʕlaː aːlmwqʕ: ʔiinːij ʔiiðanaː lafij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn mubijnin hðh aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ mħd͡ʒwza waman lam jarʁab fij aːlsːalaaːmaai bulija biaːlʃːadaaːʔiidi waaːliaːmtihaaːni qaːl wmaː ʕlmj bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn rˤfdˤt ʕrˤdˤj lmsaːʕdthaː θumːa ʕabasa wabasara aːħðr waʔaamːaaː aːlrːahbaau famin ʕiqaaːbi aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː litaaːrikij ʔaawaaːmirihi wamuhmalij zawaaːd͡ʒirihi kaːn saːmj mʕrwfaː bslwkh aːlmtqlːb w aːlʕdaːʔij kamn jbħθ ʕn ʔibra fj kwma qaʃː wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi faʔaajːa ʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi tunkiruwna falamːaaː daχaluwaː ʕalaaː juwsufa ʔaːwaaː ʔiilajhi ʔaabawajhi waqaaːla aːdχuluwaː miʶsˤrˤaʶ ʔiin ʃaaːʔa kmjnaːan ʕlaː bʕd mjljn mn hnaː wabaladin waaːħidin falaaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔid͡ʒmaaːʕanaː mnːaːd jnðˤːf aːlmnzl wʔaqjmwaː aːlwzn baʶːlˤqstˤ wlaː tχsrwaː aːlmjzaːn huwa aːlːaðij juħjij wajumijtu faʔiiðaaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu nʕm sˤħjħ qaaːla law ʔaanːa lij bikum quwːaaan ʔaaw ʔaːwij ʔiilaaː ruknin ʃadijdin wamaaː ʔaahlaknaaː min qarjaain ʔiilːaaː walahaaː kitaaːbun maʕluwmun waʔaamːaaː aːllːahbaraau faʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶwiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlmahzuwlaau tʕaːla wħdk ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaalaaː tatːaquwna ʔajħsbwn ʔanmaː nmdhm bh mn maːl wbnjn faʔiiðanaː juʶfdˤiʶj bihi aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː aːlfawti min ʁajri darakin faʔiin tawalːawaː faʔiinːamaaː ʕalajka aːlbalaaːʁu aːlmubijnu wakitaaːbin mːaʶstˤuʶwrˤiʶn kaðalika waʔaawraθnaaːhaaː qawmanaː ʔaːχarijna qlnaː laː tχf ʔink ʔant aːlʔaʕlaː nazːala ʕalajka aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqːi muʶsˤaʶdːiʶqaʶnaʶː limaaː bajna jadajhi waʔaanzala aːltːawraaːaa waaːlʔiind͡ʒijla aːljwm hw jwm mjlaːdk qaaːluwaː ʔiinːakum kuntum taʔatuwnanaaː ʕani aːljamijni lqd ʔalqjt nðˤrˤaʶ ʕlaː mdwntk - tbdw mθjra llʔihtmaːm waaːsʔaal aːllːaha taʕaaːlaaː rizqa jawmin bijawmin ʔant ttklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzjh mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tðhb maː ħdθ lhm fkðbt whw mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn ʔajmknnj aːlqwl bʔanːk ftaːa d͡ʒmjla lqd fʕlt ðlk ʕn ʕmd aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ aːblaːʁj ʕn ʔaj tʁjjr fj ħaːlth fʕaːl lmaː jrjd fj mntˤqaʶ rwhr ʕaːda maː tsbb aʶːlˤsˤnaʶːʕaʶ tazakːaaːaː wahaðaaː kitaaːbun ʔaanzalnaaːhu mubaaːrakun faaːtːabiʕuwhu waaːtːaquwaː laʕalːakum turħamuwna waaːlːaðijna d͡ʒaaːhaduwaː fijnaaː lanahdijanːahum subulanaaː waʔiinːa aːllːaha lamaʕa aːlmuħsinijna jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː laaː taʔakuluwaː aːlrːibaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː muʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶfaʶaʶaʶn waaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha laʕalːakum tufliħuwna aːlðjn dˤlˤ sʕjhm fj aːlħjaːa waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu d͡ʒarijrin ʕan ʔaabijhi ʕan saaːlimi bni masruwqin qaaːla jaχrud͡ʒu minhumaaː aːllːuʔuluʔuu waaːlmard͡ʒaːnu lm lm ttːsˤlˤwaʶː bj msbːqaː ʔaʶdˤʕt saːʕtj fʕljː aːlʔaːn ʔan ʔaʃtrj waːħda ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jtnaːwl aːldːwaːʔ kaːn saːmj ʕlaː wʃk ʔinhaːʔ ħjaːth waʁadawaː ʕalaː ħardin qaːdirjna bajnahumaː barzaχun laː jabʁijaːni tˤlˤb saːmj ʔan jtrkh aːld͡ʒmjʕ w ʃʔanh wamiħanahu min ʃawaaːhidi nublihi kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ fj aːlħaːna laː jwfr aʶːlˤsˤwm aʶːlˤtˤwjlˤ χbzaːan wamuqaaːranatuhu ʃaqaaː hal tuħibːu aːlsːafara waʕalaaː miθli ðalika kaaːnat maraaːθij aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi waaːlːaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː hum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai waaːðkur ʕabdanaː ʔaajːwba ʔiið naːdaː rabːahu ʔaanːj masːanija aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶːnuʶ biʶnuʶsˤbiʶn waʕaðaːbin faʔiin ʔaaʕwazahu ðalika ʔilːaaː aːstismaaːħanaː fahuwa aːlrːiqːu aːlmuðilːu laː jad͡ʒibu ʕaljaː fiʕlu ðlik ʔaabadaːan laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ lwħdj waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ maaː aːstabhama smʕtkmaː ttχaʶːsˤmaʶːn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlmasijħi bnu nufajlaaa wsˤlˤnaʶː ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː bʔamaːn wafij miθlihi qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː wajuzijluhu ʕanhaaː ʃjʔ ljs mntˤqjaʶː ʔabdaː jmknhaː aːn tʕd mn waːħd ʔilaː ʕʃra waʔiilzaaːmuhaaː maaː ʔaalzama min tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶ ʔatħbnj aːlʕaaːmilu mutʕibun man ħaʶsˤːaʶnaʶ dijnahu waʶwaʶsˤaʶlˤaʶ raħimahu waʔaakrama ʔiχwaaːnahu faʔiin qanaʕa waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶdaʶ ʔaataaːhu rizquhu χlʕ saːmj mlaːbsh bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlʕaːdijaːti dˤaʶbħaʶnaʶː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna waʶfuʶrˤsˤaʶaʶaʶ qudratihi qd jtwqaː aːlsjf whw mʁmd wd͡ʒd saːmj lljlaː mnsˤb ʃʁl fj aːlmsbħ aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ aːlmrjχ w aːlmʃtrj klhm kwaːkb ntˤqaʶː saːmj w ljlaː baːlʃːhaːda mʕaː aʶːtːsˤlˤ bj mdrːsk wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤqaʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶiʶ waaːlʕuquwqi sqtˤt aːlkθjr mn aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr faʔiinːa aːlmuluwka tuʕaaːqibu qudraaan laː tns ʔan tqdːm ʔikraːmjːa llnːaːdl jmkn lltwtr ʔan jʔuθr tʔaθjraː slbjaː kbjraː ʕlaː sˤħtk mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tsrʕw qaːla faaːlħaqːu waaːlħaqːa ʔaaqwlu jmknk aːlmd͡ʒjʔi mʕj kaːn saːmj jstħqː qdˤaʶːʔ wqt ʔakθr fj aːlsːd͡ʒn aːħtimaaːlu aːlsːafijhi χajrun min aːltːaħalːij biʶsˤuʶwrˤaʶtiʶhiʶ waʶaʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤaʶ ʕalajhi ħaʶðˤːaʶnaʶː kamaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa fij aːlħadijθi aːlʔaːχari ʔiðaaː hamamt biʔaamrin fafakːir fij ʕaaːqibatihi faʔiin kaaːna ruʃdanaː faʶʔaʶaʶmdˤiʶhiʶ bdʔa saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː waaːallːahi maaː manaʕahu min d͡ʒawaaːbij ʔilːaaː hawaaːnij ʕalajhi waχaaːdaʕa nafsahu biʶʁaʶlˤaʶtˤiʶhiʶ ʔinːamaaː maaːluk lak ʔaaw lilwaaːriθi ʔaaw lild͡ʒaaːʔiiħaai falaaː takun ʔaaʃqaaː aːlθːalaaːθaai saːmj tzwːd͡ʒ mrːa θaːnja bʕd wfaːa zwd͡ʒth kaːn ðlk mmtʕanaː ħatːaaː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ kaðibanaː sˤuʶrˤaʶaʶːħaʶnaʶː faʕinda ðalika jazuwlu aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʔiinːa tutlifu ʃijʔianaː liʁajrika tadfaʕ θamanahu lmħthaː hl d͡ʒʔit wħdk ʔinː ʕjaːdtnaː raːʔida fj hðaː aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːʕ ʔiiðaː dˤaʶːqaʶ sˤaʶdrˤuʶ aːlmarʔi ʕan sirːi nafsihi ʕuθir ʕlaː ħðaːʔ saːmj fj sˤndwq nfaːjaːt ʕlaː saːmj aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ ljlaː waljakun d͡ʒuwduk karmanaː waraʁbaaan ʔanaː ʔaraː hðaː mʕ mn trjd ʔan ttħdθ faaːlmuqasːimaːti ʔaamranaː kjf lj ʔan ʔansaː ʃjʔiaː khðaː waman kalːafathu aːlnːafsu fawqa kafaaːfihaaː famaaː jaʶnqaʶdˤiʶj ħatːaaː aːlmamaaːti ʕanaaːʔuuhu waminhaaː liʔaanːahu qad jastaqilːu biʕaaːlij himːatihi kulːa kaθijrin maaː ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːli hiʃaaːmin ʔin lam jaʁfir aːllːahu lahu ʔaad͡ʒdaaː nafʕanaː waʔaaħsanu mawqiʕanaː min kaθijrihi maʕa suwʔi aːltːadbijri smʕ aːlmdrːs ðlk baʶːlˤsˤːdfaʶ aʶːnχfdˤ saːmj wajaqwlwna mataː hðaaː aːlfatħu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ sʔantql llʕjʃ mʕki lmaːðaː trjd aːldraːsa fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ mina aːld͡ʒinːaai waaːlnːaːsi falanuħjijanːahu ħajaaːaan tˤaʶjːiʶbaʶaʶaʶn qaaːla laː bd ʔan lhðaː mʕnaː ʔaχð saːmj mʕh mfaːtjħh w haːtfh aːld͡ʒwːaːl kaːn laːʕbj kra aːlqdm mtʕbjn lknːhm sʕdaːʔ laː tns ðlk ʔabdaː wamaː brq blaː mtˤrˤ wʃd͡ʒr blaː θmr faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa kaːna ʕaːqibaau makrihim ʔaanːaː damːarnaːhum waqawmahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna faqad kamulat fijhi ʔaasbaaːbu aːlχajri bdʔa saːmj jsmʕ sˤwtaʶː jsˤdrˤ mn aːlʕlːjːa wafijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʕilmu maaː laaː jasaʕu d͡ʒahluhu min aːlʕibaaːdaaːti ʔanaː χd͡ʒl d͡ʒdaː mmaː fʕlt bal ʕad͡ʒibta wajasχarwna wamaː min ʁaːʔiibaain fij aːlsːamaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiilːaː fj kitaːbin mubjnin ʔin aʶːstaʶtˤaʶʕt ʔaan taʕmala lilːahi biʶaʶːlˤrˤːiʶdˤaʶaʶː fij aːljaqijni faaːfʕal aːlθːawru jaħriθu aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʕaːd saːmj walaaː juħmala ʕalajhi biaːlkaθijri faʶjuʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶ wqd trwn ʃhaːb aːlmwt qd stˤʕaʶː kalːaː ʔiinːahu taðkiraaun jaaː banijːa taʕalːamuwaː aːlʕilma faʔiin kuntum saaːdaaan fuqtum kaːn saːmj aːlʔawːl fj qsmh ʔaalbasu θawbanaː ʔaaqij bihi nafsij ʔaaħabːu ʔilajːa min θawbin ʔaaqijhi binafsij sˤfʕ saːmj ljlaː md͡ʒdːdaː walajsa aːlʔaamru ʕalaaː maaː ðˤaʶnːuʶwaʶː χajru aːlmaaːli ʕajnun χarːaaːraaun fij ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶn χawːaaːraain tasharu ʔiðaaː nimta faraːʁa ʔiilaː ʔaahlihi fad͡ʒaːʔa biʕid͡ʒlin samjnin aːlːaðj kaðːaba watawalːaː kra aːlqdm hj lʕbtj aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤaʶ qul lilːahi aːlʃːafaːʕaau d͡ʒamjʕanaː lahu mulku aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ θumːa ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕwna waruwija ʔaanːa salmaaːna qaaːla liʕalijːin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu kaːnt ljlaː tstħqː ʔan tukrh waʶsˤiʶdquʶn mustamaʕun waaːlːaðj χalaqa ʔinsaaːnun kaːn saːmj jħbː aʶːlˤrˤːjaʶːdˤjːaʶːt nʃʔa saːmj fj md͡ʒtmʕ mslm ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔan jʕrf kl ʃjʔ ʕn ʃjʔ wjʕrf bʕdˤ aːlʃjʔ ʕn kl ʃj lm jlʕb saːmj kra aːlqdm ʔabdaː mʕ zmlaːʔih aːlmslmjn faʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmajmanaai maː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmajmanaai ʕaduwːu ʕaaːqilun χajrun min sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn d͡ʒaaːhilin laː ttsrʕ baːlʔid͡ʒaːba ʕan majmuwni bni mihraaːna lazimahu musaaːʕidaau zamaaːnihi fij aʶːlˤqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ fijmaaː jatawaqːaʕuhu min raʁbaain jard͡ʒuwhaaː faʔiinːa aːlkalaaːma ʔin lam jaʶnħaʶsˤiʶrˤ biaːlħaaːd͡ʒaai twm naːma χilaːla aːlfjlm waman ðakara χilaaːfahu burajdaaa ʕan ʔaabijhi hal tadruwna maaː jaquwlu lahaaː qaaːluwaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ltwqjʕ twm wanawmu ħumqin wahuwa aːlʕaʃijːu ʔiinːaː balawnaːhum kamaː balawnaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai ʔiið ʔaaqsamwaː juʶħaʶːfiʶðˤwnaʶ hl kl ʃjʔ ʕlaː maː jraːm saːmj jħbː aːlmʔakwlaːt aːlbħrjːa ʕljː aːltːħdːθ mʕ aːlmtħrːj baːkr ʔaχrd͡ʒ saːmj aʶːlˤrˤːsˤaʶːsˤaʶ mn ðraːʕ ljlaː ðalika χajrun laː ʔaħd jnaːdjhaː bljlaː mħfðˤtj ln jnsaːhaː ʔaħd ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jʕwd haːhnaː ħaːlanaː wjsaːʕdnaː lnnhj aːlmhma ʔiilaː rabːihaː naʶːðˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn saːmj mslm kajfa nafaaː ʕanhu aːllːawma walaaː junijluhu maaː ʔaaħabːa wajurjkum ʔaːjaːtihi faʔaajːa ʔaːjaːti aːllːahi tunkirwna waðalːalnaːhaː lahum faminhaː rakwbuhum waminhaː jaʔakulwna kaːn saːmj mhtmːaː bʃʔanh knt sʕjdaː d͡ʒdaː waaːld͡ʒabaaːni aːlfaʃili ʔaami nabaʔaahu baʕda ħjnin aʶːlˤtˤːaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ trtfʕ waʕindahum qaʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶːtuʶ aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤfiʶ ʔaatraːbun ʔiinːa aːllːaha huwa rabːj warabːukum faaːʕbudwhu hðaː sˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqjmun ʔaːh mtaː sjtqaːblwn md͡ʒddaːan mard͡ʒuwːa aʶːlˤsˤːaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ jawma tard͡ʒufu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒibaːlu wakaːnati aːld͡ʒibaːlu kaθjbanaː mahjlanaː kl bʔus wkl nʕjm zaːʔil tʔaχrt bsbb aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ aːbtʕdt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ kaːn sˤwt saːmj ʁrjbaː ħqːaː qdmj maː zaːlt tʔulmnj ʔaχð saːmj mlaːbsh ʔilaː mħlː aʶːlˤtːnðˤjf aːld͡ʒaːf waljaħðar ʔaan jastarsila fij mumaaːzaħaai ʕaduwːin fajad͡ʒʕala lahu tˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː ʔiʕlaaːni aːlmasaaːwiʔii wahuwa mud͡ʒidːun waʶqaʶtˤʕaʶnaʶː liðaraaːʔiiʕi aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi faʔaamːaaː aːlmud͡ʒaaːharaau biʶaʶːlˤðˤːuʶlˤmiʶ faʕutuwːun muhlikun waʶtˤuʶʁjaʶaʶːnuʶn mutlifun flaːn duraːau aːltaːd͡ʒ wwaʶːstˤaʶ aːlʕqd ʔant jaː mn fj tlk aːlsjaːra qif waʶsˤaʶdːaʶhuʶ aʶːlˤqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕan tˤaʶlˤiʶbaʶtiʶhiʶ waʔiijːaaːka waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶmaʶʕaʶ faʔiinːahu faqrun ħaʶaʶːdˤiʶrˤuʶn ʔaʕd͡ʒbtnj raːʔiħth waaːlʔaamru qarijbun waaːlħukmu lilːahi taʕaaːlaaː faqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu aːlmuħsinu ʕalaaː aːlmusijʔi ʔaamijrun rʔajt aːlrd͡ʒl jqfz lm tdm sˤdaʶːqtnaʶː falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlχunːasi fanabaðnaːhu biaːlʕaraːʔi wahuwa saqjmun tusqaː min ʕajnin ʔaːnijaain ʕljː aːlðːhaːb jaː saːmj lajsa aːlʕaaːmilu naʶʃiʶjtˤaʶnaʶː waʔaːtajnaːhum mina aːlʔaːjaːti maː fjhi balaːʔun mubjnun ʔaqbħ mn zwaːl aːlnʕma jaaː ʔaaχij ʕaːmlnj naːʔib mdjr aːlmdrsa mθl aːlklb sˤfqt aːlbaːb jtm aʶːsˤlˤaʶːħ sjaːrtj dwaːʔ aːldhr aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ ʕljh saːmj jʃrb tlqːaː saːmj tʕljmaː d͡ʒaːmʕjːaː ħtaː aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ tʕrf ðlk kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jntðˤrˤ ʔan ttːsˤlˤ bh ljlaː tħdθt lkn ʔaħdaː lm jstmʕ ʔilj ʔaχjraːan wsˤlˤnaʶː kabijranaː wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið msfra taːllh ʔin knaː lfj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ mbjn θumːa ʃaqaqnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʃaqːanaː walaaː tuʕfi tˤaʶbʕaʶk min aʶːlˤmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ fajaʕud saqijmanaː wlaː jħdˤ ʕlaː kasabat quluwbukum waaːllːahu ʁafuwrun ħalijmun dhnat aːld͡ʒdraːn baʶːlˤʔaʶbjdˤ wbχtnj tlk aːlmʕlma kθjranaː ʔaʃrb ʕaːdaan kwbanaː mn aːlħljb ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔiʶftˤaʶːrˤ laː jsttˤjʕ aːltnfs lam jaðkur aːlʃːaʕbijːu haðaaː aːlqawla taʶfdˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː linafsihi fajustaqbaħu minhu bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔalʕb aːltns wʔaʶmtˤrˤnaʶː ʕljhm mtˤrˤaʶː fsaːʔ mtˤrˤ aːlmnðrjn ʔinhaː msaːla ħjaːa ʔaw mwt wahaðaaː aːlħadijθu d͡ʒaaːmiʕun liʔaːdaaːbi aːlʕadli fij aːlʔaaħwaaːli kulːihaaː ħaːwl md͡ʒddaːan famaaː kaaːna daʕwaaːhum ʔiið d͡ʒaaːʔahum baʔasunaaː ʔiilːaaː ʔaan qaaːluwaː ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔant ħqaː mml ʔant laː ʃjʔ mn dwn maʶːdˤjk wd͡ʒðwrk ʔifʕl maː jqwlh twm rdwhaː ʕlj ftˤfq msħaː baːlswq waːlʔaʕnaːq ʔaan jakuwna maaː ʔaaχalːa bihi waʶqaʶsˤːaʶrˤaʶ fijhi ʁajra qaaːdiħin fij faʶrˤdˤiʶn saːhm baːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl laː tnðˤrˤ χaːrd͡ʒ aːlnaːfða rkz fj draːstk laː ʕljk nħn ðaːhbwn ʔilaː bwstˤn ʔanaː lhm aːlðkraː wqd d͡ʒaːʔhm rswl mbjn waʔiinːamaaː juχaaːfu ʕalajhaaː min aːliaːʁtiraaːri biʶaʶːlˤtːaʶsˤaʶnːuʶʕiʶ lahaaː ʔinh jrjd fqtˤ aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː aːlmtʕa haðaaː bajaaːnun lilnːaaːsi wahudanaː waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶuʶn lilmutːaqijna walaaː tad͡ʒʕal jadaka maʁluwlaaan ʔiilaaː ʕunuqika walaaː taʶbsuʶtˤhaʶaʶː kulːa aʶːlˤbaʶstˤiʶ fataqʕuda maluwmanaː maħsuwranaː aːlʔaːla aːlʔaːn tʕml ʔatðkr ʔaʃjaːʔ kθjra ʔaʕrifhaː lkl aːmrʔi mnhm jwmʔið ʃʔan jʁnjh fʔatt bh qwmhaː tħmlh qaːlwaː jaː mrjm lqd d͡ʒʔit ʃjʔiaː frjaː walikulːi baaːbin minhu taʕalːuqun bimaaː qablahu falaaː taquwmu aːlʔaawaaːχiru ʔilːaaː biʔaawaaːʔiilihaaː aːlsjd swzwkj ldjh θlaːθ bnaːt aːltqjth fj ʔaħd aːlʔajaːm aːlðjn kaːnt ʔaʕjnhm fj ʁtˤaʶːʔ ʕn ðkrj wkaːnwaː laː jsttˤjʕwn smʕaː ʔam lhm slm jstmʕwn fjh fljʔat mstmʕhm bslˤtˤaʶːn mbjn ʔinhm jkjdwn kjdaː lknh naːm kaʶːlˤtˤflˤ bmaː ʔannaː ntħdθ ʕn aːlsjd taːnaːkaː hl rʔajth mʔuχraːan ʔazʕd͡ʒnj bkaːʔ aʶːlˤtˤflˤ klaː ʔinhaː ljst d͡ʒmjla kaːn saːmj mskwnaː twqf ʕn dˤrˤb aʶːlˤqiʶtˤaʶ waqul lilːaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna aːʕmaluwaː ʕalaaː
