ʔalaː tsttˤjʕ aːltmjjz bjn aʶːlˤsˤħjħ waʶːlˤχtˤʔaʶ ʔimːaaː min haðri aːlmutakalːimi waʔiikθaaːrihi hj lj jjnʁ waman ʔaaħsanu qawlanaː mimːan daʕaaː ʔiilaaː aːllːahi waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː waqaaːla ʔiinːanij mina aːlmuslimijna aːntql mnːaːd ʔilaː mnzl d͡ʒdjd aʶːlˤsˤdq ʔaʶfdˤlˤ sjaːsa jd͡ʒb ʔan trjnj d͡ʒwaːz sfrk ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ln ʔatmnaː hðaː lʔaħd jktb bjdh aːljsraː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir ʔawlaː ttwjbaː jsbb aːlʔidmaːn maaː jubadːalu aːlqawlu ladajːa wamaaː ʔaanaaː biʶðˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi hj zwd͡ʒtj bal ʔiijːaaːhu tadʕuwna fajakʃifu maaː tadʕuwna ʔiilajhi ʔiin ʃaaːʔa watansawna maaː tuʃrikuwna waqaaːla muwsaaː ʔiinːij ʕuðtu birabːij warabːikum min kulːi mutakabːirin laaː juʔuminu bijawmi aːlħisaaːbi hj maːkra bqdr maː hj lˤtˤjfaʶ waaːlħaaːlu aːlrːaaːbiʕaau aːnh jksb θlaːθa ʔaʶdˤʕaʶːf ʔakθr mmaː aːfʕl aːnaː hw mwd͡ʒwdun fj aːlmktab waliðalika lam juχli aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː χalqahu twm mn bnj aːlbʃr waaːlwaqaaːru waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ql ʔaʕwð brb aːlnaːs ʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ falahum d͡ʒanːaaːtu aːlmaʔawaaː nuzulanaː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna ʔaanːa aːlmuʕd͡ʒaba biʕamalihi mumtanːun bihi waaːlmumtanːu ʕalaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː d͡ʒaaːħidun liniʕamihi ʔiinːa ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai aːljawma fij ʃuʁulin faaːkihuwna faʶaʶːlˤʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ ʕaʶsˤfaʶnaʶː aːlːaðij ʔaaħsana kulːa ʃajʔin χalaqahu wabadaʔaa χalqa aːlʔiinsaaːni min tˤiʶjniʶn jʔatj kl jwm lzjaːra sˤdjqh aʶːlˤmrˤjdˤ hl ʔanta bχjr qaːlaː rbnaː ðˤlˤmnaʶː ʔanfsnaː wʔin lm tʁfr lnaː wtrħmnaː lnkwnn mn aːlχaːsrjn mtˤaʶːrˤ kndj mn fdˤlˤk wamaaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiin ʔaad͡ʒrija ʔiilːaaː ʕalaaː rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna lqd ʔanhjt waːd͡ʒbaːtj liʔaanːahu qad jaχtalifu biaːχtilaaːfi aːlʔaaħwaaːli ʔinhu ʕaːmlnj bswʔ lw smħt hl tʕlm maː hj twqʕaːt aʶːlˤtˤqs ljwm ʁd wajadraʔau ʕanhaaː aːlʕaðaaːba ʔaan taʃhada ʔaarbaʕa ʃahaaːdaaːtin biaːllːahi ʔiinːahu lamina aːlkaaːðibijna ʔanaː sˤbbnaʶː aːlmaːʔ sˤbaʶː ʔin ħsˤlˤ hðaː lʔaj sbb fmaːðaː stfʕl rifduhː brːhu maːlʔi aʶːlˤqtˤbjn hl ʔanta tsʕl dmaːʔ hðaː ljs d͡ʒjdaːan aːktʃft aːljwm ʔan hnaːk fjlm aːsmh " aːlrws qaːdmwn " aːlrws qaːdmwn waaːlːaðijna hum biʔaːjaaːti rabːihim juʔuminuwna ʔaw ʔamr baːltqwaː hl ʔant mbswtˤ hnaː twm wmaːrj fj sjaːra twm qul lilːahi aːlʃːafaaːʕaau d͡ʒamijʕanaː lahu mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ θumːa ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna qaaːla ʔiin saʔaaltuka ʕan ʃajʔin baʕdahaaː falaaː tuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbniʶj qad balaʁta min ladunːij ʕuðranaː wfj χlqkm wmaː jbθ mn daːba ʔaːjaːt lqwm jwqnwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlʔaamalu kaaːlsːaraaːbi ʁarːa man raʔaːhu waχaaːba man rad͡ʒaaːhu ʔanaː ʔaʃʕr baʶːlˤʕtˤʃ waqaaːla muħamːadu bnu baʃijrin raħimahu aːllːahu rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaawːaluhumaaː maaː jaʶntaʶðˤiʶmuʶ bihi ʔaumuwru d͡ʒumlathaaː waʶtˤaʶlˤaʶbt mink mawadːaaan lam ʔaʶuʶʕtˤaʶhaʶaʶː ʔinːa aːlmuʕanːaaː tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶn laaː jaʶðˤfaʶrˤuʶ waqaaːla aːlʕabːaaːsu bnu aːlʔaaħnafi wabiaːlʔaasħaaːri hum jastaʁfiruwna liʔaanːa aːld͡ʒamaaːla sˤiʶfaʶaʶuʶn laaːzimaaun wafij aːlʕad͡ʒzi ʕalaaː fiʶtˤaʶniʶhiʶm faħamala aːlrːuqʕaaa ʔilaaː kaaːtibi aːldːijwaaːni lm ʔafhm ʃjʔiaː mmaː jqwl ʔanaː fqtˤ knt fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb waːlmkaːn aːlmnaːsb bl qaːlwaː ʔinaː wd͡ʒdnaː ʔaːbaːʔnaː ʕlaː ʔama wʔinaː ʕlaː ʔaːθaːrhm mhtdwn ʔawlm jr aːlʔinsaːn ʔanaː χlqnaːh mn ntˤfaʶ fʔiðaː hw χsˤjm mbjn walaaː jaʔamurakum ʔaan tatːaχiðuwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa waaːlnːabijːijna ʔaarbaaːbanaː ʔaajaʔamurukum biaːlkufri baʕda ʔiið ʔaantum muslimuwna wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin mːusfiraaun laː ʔaʃrb aːlkħwljaːt hn jstħqnh waʔiinːaka latadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː sˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤiʶn mustaqijmin twm ʕbr aːlnhr wʔin jrjdwaː χjaːntk fqd χaːnwaː aːllh mn qbl fʔamkn mnhm waːllh ʕljm ħkjm ʔilaː ʕd͡ʒwzaː fj aːlʁaːbrjn aːlːaðijna jaʶðˤuʶnːuʶwnaʶ ʔaanːahum mulaaːquw rabːihim waʔaanːahum ʔiilajhi raaːd͡ʒiʕuwna waʔiin minkum ʔiilːaaː waaːriduhaaː kaaːna ʕalaaː rabːika ħatmanaː maʶqdˤiʶjːaʶnaʶː ʔinː ʃwqj ħaːʔir fj mqltjk kun ʕdjm aːlrħma waaːlːaðijna hum ʕani aːllːaʁwi muʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ marad͡ʒa aːlbaħrajni jaltaqijaaːni ʔaam jaquwluwna taqawːalahu bal lːaː juʔuminuwna hl ʔanti sʕjda fj mnzlk jwd͡ʒd mqhaː ʔamaːm aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ jrbj twm aːlχjwl aːlʕrbja aːlnd͡ʒwm ʕbaːra ʕn kraːt ʕmlaːqa mn aːlblaːzma tqʕ ʕlaː msaːfaːt saːħqa mn md͡ʒrtnaː waʔiinːaaː lad͡ʒaaːʕiluwna maaː ʕalajhaaː sˤaʶʕiʶjdaʶnaʶː d͡ʒuruzanaː rʔajth jrˤkdˤ hj fʕlt kl ðlk bmfrdhaː ʔan ħr fj aːlħdjθ mʕ ʔaj kaːn lam jazdad min aːllːahi ʔilːaaː buʕdanaː wlaː ttˤjʕwaʶː ʔamr aːlmsrfjn ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lrʔujtk fj qbʕtk wrdaːʔik bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlmrslaːt ʕrfaː faːtχðt mn dwnhm ħd͡ʒaːbaː fʔarslnaː ʔiljhaː rwħnaː ftmθl lhaː bʃraː swjaː ʔafhm aːltrkja hl aːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔaʶsˤʕb mn aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔinaː kaːʃfw aːlʕðaːb qljlaː ʔinkm ʕaːʔidwn fj ðˤlˤ raːja θwrtj walaaː janaaːlahu waʶsˤmuʶn ʔið jtlqaː aːlmtlqjaːn ʕn aːljmjn wʕn aːlʃmaːl qʕjd ttħrk aːlħlzwnaːt bbtˤʔ mn ʃr maː χlq hj kʔaχjhaː waaːlʃːuʕaraaːʔu jatːabiʕuhumu aːlʁaaːwuwna twd͡ʒh ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ ħaːflaːt aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤmaʶ hl ħaːwlt aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔiljhaː saːmj kaːn ʕlaː fjsbwk lqd ʔauħrd͡ʒt ħqaːan maːðaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ smaːʕkm ʔajhaː aːlrfaːq mn hðh aʶːlˤtˤflˤaʶ aːltj mʕk ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilj aːld͡ʒna, wlkn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt lˤlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː hnaːk wad͡ʒanːaaːtin ʔaalfaaːfanaː jbdwaː lj ʔanh jʕlm aːlsr lijad͡ʒzija aːllːahu kulːa nafsin maaː kasabat ʔiinːa aːllːaha sarijʕu aːlħisaaːbi walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqahum lajaquwlunːa aːllːahu faʔaanːaaː juʔufakuwna waʔaanʃada ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlzːubajri θalaaːθaaa ʔaabjaaːtin d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaan likulːi maaː qaaːlathu aːlʕarabu aːʕtni bnfsk waʔaːχaruwna murd͡ʒawna liʔaamri aːllːahi ʔiimːaaː juʕaðːibuhum waʔiimːaaː jatuwbu ʕalajhim waaːllːahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔaʶuʶsˤjb saːmj baːlmaːlaːrjaː wahuwa aːlːaðij juħjij wajumijtu walahu aːχtilaaːfu aːllːajli waaːlnːahaaːri ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna ʔaʕjdh ʔilj jħwl aːld͡ʒsm aːlsʕraːt aːlħraːrja aːlzaːʔida ʔilaː ʃħm kaːn ʕlaː aːlmdrs ʔan jqjm d͡ʒmjʕ aʶːlˤtˤlˤb ʔin aːlðjn ʔad͡ʒrmwaː kaːnwaː mn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː jdˤħkwn ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja mʕ mudrsahu qul ʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna radifa lakum baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlːaðij tastaʕd͡ʒiluwna wahija muʶʕaʶrˤːaʶdˤaʶaʶuʶn liħasadi aːlʔaadaaːnij waaːlʔaaqaaːribi laː ʔarjd χsaːrtaki aːlʔab fj aːlʁrfa waʔiin lam takun radaaːʔaau aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːiʶ saʕaaːdaaan aːqraʔa warabːuka aːlʔaakramu hðaː kθjr ʔalaː tʕrf ʔin kaːnt lwsj qaːdra ʕlaː tklm aːljaːbaːnja ʔajn aːlħbl hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal, ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanta ðaːhb waːltft aːlsaːq baːlsaːq lmaːðaː sˤʕdt ʔilaː sqf bjthaː ʔanaː ʕlaː aːlqaːʔima ldjh sjaːra d͡ʒdjda w ʔaχraː qdjma jʕd͡ʒbh hðaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr hnaːk mn jnðˤrˤ ʔiljk hl hðh ʔawl zjaːra lk lm tsˤlˤ aːlħaːfla bʕd aːlbs qbːʕtk jħjaː wʔabwh zkrjaː nbjaːn mn ʕnd aːllh fijhimaaː ʕajnaaːni tad͡ʒrijaaːni wjtˤwf ʕljhm ʁlmaːn lhm kʔanhm lʔulʔu mknwn mn tkwnjii waʔaamːaaː man d͡ʒaaːʔaka jasʕaaː aːbq saːktaː bjnmaː nʔakl qaːl rbj jʕlm aːlqwl fj aːlsmaːʔ waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faʔiinːa aːlrːaʔaja aːlmaʕluwla laaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlihi faminhum man ʔaːmana bihi waminhum man sˤaʶdːaʶ ʕanhu wakafaaː bid͡ʒahanːama saʕijranaː mimːaaː χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶm ʔauʁriquwaː faʔaudχiluwaː naaːranaː falam jad͡ʒiduwaː lahum min duwni aːllːahi ʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶnaʶː faʔiinːa faʶdˤlˤaʶ aːlmaʃhadi ʕalaaː aːlmaʁijbi luʔumun walakum fijhaaː d͡ʒamaaːlun ħijna turijħuwna waħijna tasraħuwna ʔaʕtqd ʔan hðaː ʕðˤjm wʔadχlnaːh fj rħmtnaː ʔinh mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn mrħbanaː baːlʕaːlm ʔink lmn aːlmrsljn jd͡ʒb ʔan jkwn aːlbaːb ʔimaː mʁlqaː ʔaw mftwħaː qul ʔiinːa aːlʔaawːalijna waaːlʔaːχirijna ʔad͡ʒaːbt baːkjaan fj rq mnʃwr waʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna d͡ʒaʕalnaaː bajnaka wabajna aːlːaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai ħid͡ʒaaːbanaː mastuwranaː maːkθjn fjh ʔabdaː waaːðkur ʕabdanaaː ʔaajːuwba ʔiið naaːdaaː rabːahu ʔaanːij masːanija aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ biʶnuʶsˤbiʶn waʕaðaaːbin waʶbiʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ maknuwnihi takuwnu aːlfaaːʔiidaau wabiaːstidaaːmaai sˤaʶbrˤiʶhiʶ jakuwnu aːlʔiikθaaːru lqd sqtˤ twm fj ħwdˤ aːlsbaːħa ʁajra ʔaanːa aːldːunjaaː ʔiðaaː sˤaʶlˤaʶħaʶt kaaːna ʔisʕaaːduhaaː mawfuwranaː waʶʔiʶiʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤuʶhaʶaʶː majsuwranaː lm jd͡ʒd twm nðˤaʶːrˤaʶːth jariθunij wajariθu min ʔaːli jaʕquwba waaːd͡ʒʕalhu rabːi rˤaʶdˤiʶjːaʶnaʶː waʔiiχwaaːnuhum jamudːuwnahum fij aːlʁajːi θumːa laaː juʶqsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ldjhaː sbʕa sˤbjaʶːn wamina aːlnːaaːsi man jaʃrij nafsahu aːbtiʁaaːʔa maʶrˤdˤaʶaʶːtiʶ aːllːahi waaːllːahu raʔuwfun biaːlʕibaaːdi qaːl rb ʔinj laː ʔamlk ʔilaː nfsj wʔaχj faːfrq bjnnaː wbjn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn waʔiimːaaː taχaaːfanːa min qawmin χijaaːnaaan faaːnbið ʔiilajhim ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː juħibːu aːlχaaːʔiinijna kaːnt tlk aːltfaːħa ħqaː lðjða jwm jqwm aːlrwħ waːlmlaːʔika sˤfaʶː laː jtklmwn ʔilaː mn ʔaðn lh aːlrħmn wqaːl sˤwaʶːbaʶː aːlbndqja mdjna rwmnsja kaðalika jaʶtˤbaʶʕuʶ aːllːahu ʕalaaː quluwbi aːlːaðijna laaː jaʕlamuwna rd djmaː bʔan sʔal: " hl jqtl aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ bʕdˤaʶnaʶː bʕd aːlmʕaːʃra " haːa kaːnt ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ ʕlaːa ʔibnhaː ʔanta laː tsttˤjʕ ʔan tʔaklhaː fqtˤ lʔanhaː mʁðja hðh aːlklma sˤʕbaʶ lˤlˤntˤq waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaaː rabːika fataχʃaaː wʔajwb ʔið naːdaː rbh ʔanj msnj aʶːlˤdˤrˤ wʔant ʔarħm aːlraːħmjn qaːl aːltlmjð: ʔin aːlmʕlm laː jħtrm nfsh waqaaːluwaː ʔaːmanːaaː bihi waʔaanːaaː lahumu aːltːanaaːwuʃu min makaaːnin baʕijdin rˤfdˤt ʕn ʔasbaːb ʃχsˤjaʶ aːlːaðij ʔaaħalːanaaː daaːra aːlmuqaaːmaai min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ laaː jamasːunaaː fijhaaː naʶsˤaʶbuʶn walaaː jamasːunaaː fijhaaː luʁuwbun wmaː jdrjk lʕlh jzkaː hl fhmwaː waqaaːla mahbuwdun kaːn ðaːk aːlfndq qrjbaːan d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlbħjra waʔaanːa aːlmasaaːd͡ʒida lilːahi falaaː tadʕuwaː maʕa aːllːahi ʔaaħadanaː kalːaaː ʔiinːahu kaaːna liʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʕanijdanaː qaːl ʔaraːʁb ʔant ʕn ʔaːlhtj jaː ʔibraːhjm lʔin lm tnth lʔard͡ʒmnk waːhd͡ʒrnj mljaː θalaaːθun man kunaː fijhi wad͡ʒada ħalaaːwaaa aːlʔiijmaaːni aʶːχfdˤj rʔask faʶlˤaʶnaʶquʶsˤːaʶnːaʶ ʕalajhim biʕilmin wamaaː kunːaaː ʁaaːʔiibijna hl ldjk aːlkθjr ltfʕlh aːljwm ʔið aːnbʕθ ʔaʃqaːhaː taqdijru maaː jatawalːaaːhu min aːlʔaamwaaːli bisunani aːldːijni min ʁajri taħrijfin fij ʔaaχðihaaː waʶʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhaʶaʶː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aʶːlˤdˤlˤaʶːlˤaʶ baːlhdaː waːlʕðaːb baːlmʁfra fmaː ʔaʶsˤbrˤhm ʕlaː aːlnaːr ʔiin tad͡ʒtanibuwaː kabaaːʔiira maaː tunhawna ʕanhu nukafːir ʕankum sajːiʔiaaːtikum wanudχilkum mudχalanaː karijmanaː χrd͡ʒt mʕ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶhaʶː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔaʶʕtˤs ʔaʶʕtˤnj mndjlaːan ʔaadabu aːlmutaʕalːimi faʶsˤlˤuʶn wasaʔaaðkuru tˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶnaʶː mimːaaː jataʔaadːabu bihi aːlmutaʕalːimu wajakuwnu ʕalajhi aːlʕaaːlimu jamudːu jadajhi ʔiilaaː aːlsːamaːʔi jaː rabːu jaː rabːu ʔanaː χlfh mbaːʃra watanħituwna mina aːld͡ʒibaaːli bujuwtanaː faaːrihijna waaːlːaðijna jumasːikuwna biaːlkitaaːbi waʔaaqaaːmuwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ ʔiinːaaː laaː nuʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aʶːlˤmuʶsˤlˤiʶħiʶjnaʶ waʔiin tadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː aːlhudaaː laaː jatːabiʕuwkum sawaaːʔun ʕalajkum ʔaadaʕawtumuwhum ʔaam ʔaantum sˤaʶaʶːmiʶtuʶwnaʶ qmjsˤhuʶ kaːn mbqʕaːan baʶːlˤsˤlˤsˤaʶ bdʔa aːldm jsjl bsrʕa mn wd͡ʒhhaː ħikmaaun baaːliʁaaun famaaː tuʁni aːlnːuðuru waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi libanijhi qumi aːllːajla ʔiilaːːa qalijlaː nntðˤrˤuʶ mnki ʔan tunafiːðij lnaː maː wʕdtijh lnaː ðaːt mra sˤnʕtuʶ muʶdˤaʶχːiʶmaʶnaʶː ʔams nakːt wlaː tunkːd mn twfj aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʶtaʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnːuʶ quluwbuhum biðikri aːllːahi ʔaalaaː biðikri aːllːahi taʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnːuʶ aːlquluwbu wskntm fj msaːkn aːlðjn ðˤlˤmwaʶː ʔanfshm wtbjn lkm kjf fʕlnaː bhm wdˤrˤbnaʶː lkm aːlʔamθaːl ʕaaːlimun jad͡ʒrij ʕalajhi ħukmu d͡ʒaaːhilin haðaaː ʕdwaː llh wmlaːʔikth wrslh wd͡ʒbrjl wmjkaːl fʔin aːllh ʕdw llkaːfrjn sʔaðhb ʔilaː ʔastraːljaː baʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ fahuwa min ʕabijdi aːldːunjaaː qul ʔaaraʔaajtakum ʔiin ʔaataaːkum ʕaðaaːbu aːllːahi baʁtaaan ʔaaw d͡ʒahraaan hal juhlaku ʔiilːaaː aːlqawmu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ ʔatrjd ħqaː mn twm ʔan jfʕl ðlk ʔiið daχaluwaː ʕalajhi faqaaːluwaː salaaːmanaː qaaːla salaaːmun qawmun munkaruwna laː ʔanaː lst bmtzwd͡ʒ jrjd ʃraːʔ ʕqd lʔulʔu lzwd͡ʒth hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʔawjnj hðh aːlljla fajaʔatijahum baʁtaaan wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna min ʔaajna ʔaantum hðh d͡ʒhnm aːltj kntm twʕdwn tʕrft ʕljh aːlʕaːm aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj fj ħfla lqd knt fj ʁfla mn hðaː fkʃfnaː ʕnk ʁtˤaʶːʔk fbsˤrˤk aːljwm ħdjd fj mqʕd sˤdq ʕnd mljk mqtdr knt fj aːlħmaːm ʕndmaː rn aːlhaːtf bal rafaʕahu aːllːahu ʔiilajhi wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕazijzanaː ħakijmanaː whw aːlðj ʔaħjaːkm θm jmjtkm θm jħjjkm ʔin aːlʔinsaːn lkfwr falamːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaamrunaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː ʕaaːlijahaaː saaːfilahaaː waʶʔaʶaʶmtˤaʶrˤnaʶaʶː ʕalajhaaː ħid͡ʒaaːraaan min sid͡ʒːijlin maʶndˤuʶwdiʶn aːlðj χlqnj fhw jhdjn walaaː liaːstiqaaːmatihaaː ʔaaθaranaː wʔazlfnaː θm aːlʔaːχrjn nðˤfj ʁrftki kdt aːʁrq laː ʔaħd jʕlm bmaː ʔaʃʕr bh waʔiið qataltum nafsanaː faaːdːaaːraʔatum fijhaaː waaːllːahu muχrid͡ʒun maaː kuntum taktumuwna ʔaajaħsabu aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaalːan nad͡ʒmaʕa ʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶhuʶ wmaː td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kntm tʕmlwn faχafija ʕalaaː aːlkaaːtibi ðalika watilka ʕaaːdun d͡ʒaħaduwaː biʔaːjaaːti rabːihim waʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː rusulahu waaːtːabaʕuwaː ʔaamra kulːi d͡ʒabːaaːrin ʕanijdin ʔawlʔik aːlðjn lhm swʔ aːlʕðaːb whm fj aːlʔaːχra hm aːlʔaχsrwn saːmj ldjh maː jrjd tmknt mn ʔiqnaːʕ aːbn ʕmj ʕlaː qbwl χtˤtj hw ljs md͡ʒbraː ʔan jstjqðˤ fj hðaː aːlwqt aːlmbkr twm ljs nafsahu aːljwm ʔanaː naːdjtk, ʔismʕ sˤwtj ʔiin kaaːnat ʔiilːaaː sˤaʶjħaʶaʶaʶn waaːħidaaan faʔiiðaaː hum χaaːmiduwna wjsr lj ʔamrj lqd ksr aːlnaːfða ʕmdaːan jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːtqwaː aːllh wðrwaː maː bqj mn aːlrbaː ʔin kntm mʔumnjn ʔaawalam jarawaː ʔaanːaaː χalaqnaaː lahum mimːaaː ʕamilat ʔaajdijnaaː ʔaanʕaaːmanaː fahum lahaaː maaːlikuwna saːmj sajfʕl ʔajaː ʃajʔin lˤiʶjħsˤuʶlˤaʶ ʕalaː maː jurjdu hl tʔumn baːlmsjħja laː jmknnj aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ lˤlˤwsˤwlˤ aːlaː aːlmnzl waːlnwm fj srjrj fʔaχrd͡ʒnaː mn kaːn fjhaː mn aːlmʔumnjn qtl ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlʔaχdwd ʔanaː ʔaʁnj ʔaʁnjaan faːdnu mnːj ʔinːnj mlk jdjk sbaːħa twm srjʕa d͡ʒdaːan htlr krh aːljhwd ʔarjd ʔan ʔastʔad͡ʒr ħaːfla laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaħd fj aːlbjt hðaː d͡ʒml twm hw jʕjʃ fj kaːrdjf walaw tanazːaha fij miθli haðihi aːlħaaːli ʕan aːstibðaaːli aːlħaraaːʔiiri ʔilaaː aːlʔiimaaːʔi kaaːna ʔaakmala limuruwʔatihi qrʔat rsaːlth ʕda mraːt ʔin aʶːlˤmsˤdqjn waʶːlˤmsˤdqaʶːt wʔaʶqrˤdˤwaʶː aːllh qrˤdˤaʶː ħsnaː jdˤaʶːʕf lhm wlhm ʔad͡ʒr krjm ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lˤʕtˤlˤaʶ aʶːlˤsˤjf waaːstaʕijnuwaː biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ waʔiinːahaaː lakabijraaun ʔiilːaaː ʕalaaː aːlχaaːʃiʕijna walaqad raaːwaduwhu ʕan dˤaʶjfiʶhiʶ faʶtˤaʶmaʶsnaʶaʶː ʔaaʕjunahum faðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri kalːaaː ʔiinːahaaː lˤaʶðˤaʶaʶː saːmj lm jktrθ χsrwaː ʔanfshm wdˤlˤ ʕnhm maː kaːnwaː jftrwn ʔanaː mn aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda aːlʔamrjkja fqaːlwaː ʕlaː aːllh twklnaː rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llqwm aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔin aʶːsttˤʕt tʕaːl mʕnaː ʕalaaː ʕuqdaaan min lisaaːnij bkl srwr, jaː ʕzjzj nbaːħ aːlklaːb lqd tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶt mnj maːl rbħ twm rħla md͡ʒaːnja ʔilaː bwstˤn maː aːlðj jʕd͡ʒbk bʃʔanhaː ʔinh lʃrf lj ʔan ʔaltqj bk waliðalika qaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʃʕbj mħaː ðˤlˤm aːlsnjn waːldh ʔaʶsˤbħ mrˤjdˤaʶːaʶn baʶːlˤsrˤtˤaʶːn hl tʕrf maːðaː jkwn aːljwm " maː aːlðj ttħdθ ʕnhu" " ʔinhaː aːlðkraː aːlsnwja lzwaːd͡ʒnaː" waaːltːaʔaalːufu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶrˤuʶ ʕan aːlwafaaːʔi hj qlqa bʃʔan slaːmtk trd͡ʒʕwnhaː ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn waʶðˤiʶlˤːiʶn mːamduwdin qaaːla rabːij ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː taʕmaluwna hl hðaː hw aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ aːlmudbiraau whm jnhwn ʕnh wjnʔawn ʕnh wʔin jhlkwn ʔilaː ʔanfshm wmaː jʃʕrwn faʔiin taaːbuwaː waʔaaqaaːmuwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ waʔaːtawuaː aːlzːakaaːaa faʔiiχwaaːnukum fij aːldːijni waʶnuʶfaʶsˤːiʶlˤuʶ aːlʔaːjaaːti liqawmin jaʕlamuwna ʔarjd aːlsjf biaːtːibaaːʕi aːlmajsuwri laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaħd fj aːlmnzl falamːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔathum ʔaːjaaːtunaaː muʶbsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶaʶn qaaːluwaː haðaaː siħrun mubijnun rbmaː jkwn ðlk sˤħjħaʶː rkbtj tʔulmnj wataħarːuzanaː min mukaaːʃafatihim waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazːi aːlqarijbu biʕadaaːwatihi baʕijdun waaːlbaʕijdu bimawadːatihi qarijbun wafirːa ʔilaaː aːllːahi walaaː tafirːa minhu waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːld͡ʒuwdu ʕan mawd͡ʒuwdin mnːaː jkrh ðlk laː ʔaħd kaːn jtwqʕ ðlk θmːa jursalu ʔilajhi aːlmalaku fajanfuχu fjhi aːlrːuwħa wajuʔumaru bʔarbaʕi kalimaaːtin ʕljk msaːʕdth bsrʕa waʔiin muniʕa minhaaː lam jaqnaʕ mansaʔaaaun fij aːlʔaad͡ʒali liʔaanːa ʕilma ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶ aːlmaðaaːhibi mastuwrun kaːnt aːbtsaːmthaː tʃʕ ħbaː ʔinh mn mħbj aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ ʕlaː aːlrʁm mn ʔannj lm ʔakn ʔaħb aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt kaːn ʕlji draːsa aːllwʁaːrjtmaːt wwqʕ aːlqwl ʕljhm bmaː ðˤlˤmwaʶː fhm laː jntˤqwn wʔiðaː qjl lhm aːsd͡ʒdwaː llrħmn qaːlwaː wmaː aːlrħmn ʔansd͡ʒd lmaː tʔamrnaː wzaːdhm nfwraː falaaː tuʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlkaaːfirijna wad͡ʒaaːhidhum bihi d͡ʒihaaːdanaː kabijranaː ʔaʔantm tχlqwnh ʔam nħn aːlχaːlqwn aːlknjsa aːlqdjma tqʕ fj ʃmaːl aːlmdjna aːlːaðij χalaqanij fahuwa jahdijni walaaː tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmuʶn ʔiilːaaː min ʁislijnin tklm bwdˤwħ ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsˤdquʶkiʶ, ʔanti daːʔimaːan tkðbjn ʔaqraː sˤħjfaʶaʶn laː jhmnj maː qaːlthu waːldtk wakaθraau faqaaːluwaː ʔaabaʃaranaː minːaaː waaːħidanaː natːabiʕuhu ʔiinːaaː ʔiiðanaː lafij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn wasuʕurin fjmaː ʕdaː ʔajaːm aːld͡ʒmʕa fʔin twm daːʔimaːan maː jrtdj rˤbtˤaʶ ʕnqin ʔilaː aːlʕml hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbaka aːlʔaakl aːllħm ʁaːlj aːlθmn wahaðaaː ʔaakmalu ʔaaħwaaːli ʔaahli aːldːijni waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ sˤiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ aːlmutːaqijna laaː tubqij walaaː taðaru fj sdr mχdˤwd wʔibraːhjm ʔið qaːl lqwmh aːʕbdwaː aːllh waːtqwh ðlkm χjr lkm ʔin kntm tʕlmwn waqad ruwija ʕan aːbni ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi man ʔaaħabːa aːlʕilma ʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶt bihi faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤuʶhuʶ aːstmr straː aːlbnk ʕlaː jsaːrk ʕn ʔabj ʕbdi aːlrːaħmni ʕbdi aːllhi bni msʕwdin rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: ʔajn mdχl aːlmtħf waaːfraʁ min zaaːdik ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna tadʕuwna min duwni aːllːahi ʕibaaːdun ʔaamθaaːlukum faaːdʕuwhum faljastad͡ʒijbuwaː lakum ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ walaqad taraknaaː minhaaː ʔaːjaaan bajːinaaan liqawmin jaʕqiluwna twqːf saːmj d͡ʒaːnbaː aːsmj mʕrwf ldaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ fj mdrstj lajsa bilabijbin man lam juʕaaːʃir biaːlmaʕruwfi man lam jad͡ʒid min muʕaaːʃaratihi budːanaː faʔaamːaaː aːlmustaqilːu binafsihi faʶdˤaʶrˤbaʶaʶːniʶ d͡ʒalijːun waχafijːun wlaː ttˤʕ aːlkaːfrjn waːlmnaːfqjn wdʕ ʔaðaːhm wtwkl ʕlaː aːllh wkfaː baːllh wkjlaː kaːnt tuʶmtˤrˤ bʁzaːra fqrrnaː aːlbqaːʔ fj aːlmnzl fqaːl ʔinj sqjm maː ʔaʃhdthm χlq aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wlaː χlq ʔanfshm wmaː knt mtχð aʶːlˤmdˤlˤjn ʕdˤdaʶː fawaswasa ʔiilajhi aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ qaaːla jaaː ʔaːdamu hal ʔaadulːuka ʕalaaː ʃad͡ʒaraai aːlχuldi faaːrtadːaaː ʕalaaː ʔaːθaaːrihimaaː qaʶsˤaʶsˤaʶnaʶː waʔaulfaaun d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaun taʶnʕaʶtˤiʶfuʶ aːlquluwbu ʕalajhaaː wajandafiʕu aːlmakruwhu bihaaː ʔanaː mstʕd llmʁaːdra aːlʔaːn waaːstamiʕ jawma junaaːdi duʕaaːʔi aːlχajri waʔiin masːahu aːlʃːarːu fajaʔiuwsun qaʶnuʶwtˤuʶn waʔaamːaaː ʔiin kaaːna mina aːlmukaðːibijna aʶːlˤdˤːaʶaʶːlˤːiʶjnaʶ mmaː laː ʃkː fjhi wd͡ʒd aːlʕlba tħt aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ kjfa tʕlmjn ʔaʶuʶwsˤiʶjk ʔaan taχʃaaː aːllːaha fij aːlnːaaːsi kulːu man ʕalajhaaː faaːnin ʔaamrij ʔiilaaː aːllhi twm laː jħb slwk mjrj ʔinːa aːllːaha taʕaaːlaaː jaʶrˤdˤaʶaʶː lakum θalaaːθanaː wajakrahu lakum θalaaːθanaː wajuðhib ʁaʶjðˤaʶ quluwbihim wajatuwbu aːllːahu ʕalaaː man jaʃaaːʔu waaːllːahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun qaːl lj ʔan rwaːjaːt ʔijdʁr ʔaːlaːn bw mθjra llʔihtmaːm jsˤbħ d͡ʒbl fwd͡ʒj mʁtˤaʶnaʶː baːlθld͡ʒ fj aːlʃtaːʔ biʔaanːa rabːaka ʔaawħaaː lahaaː waʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn kl bnaːʔ wʁwaʶːsˤ snðhb fj rħltnaː aːlmdrsja ʔilaː qlʕa ʔawsaːkaː ʁdanaː tstʁrq aːlnwba ħwaːlj χms dqaːʔiq ʔiinːamaaː aːlħajaaːau aːldːunjaaː laʕibun walahwun waʔiin tuʔuminuwaː watatːaquwaː juʔutikum ʔaud͡ʒuwrakum walaaː jasʔaalkum ʔaamwaaːlakum klhm mdrːswn d͡ʒjdwn jtklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʔitqaːn d͡ʒmjʕ aːlrd͡ʒaːl aːlðjn aːʕrfhm ʁdˤbj aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːuʶ saʶmtˤuʶ aːlħikmaai bihi juʶfsˤaʶlˤuʶ ʃuðuwruhaaː waʔaanːaaː laaː nadrij ʔaaʃarːun ʔaurijda biman fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔaam ʔaaraaːda bihim rabːuhum raʃadanaː ʔinj d͡ʒzjthm aːljwm bmaː sˤbrˤwaʶː ʔanhm hm aːlfaːʔizwn maː bsˤdq lqd χdʕwkm ʔanta mtʔaχr daːʔimaːan faaːd͡ʒʕal aːliaːd͡ʒtihaaːda ʁanijmaaa sˤiʶħːaʶtiʶk wakaðːaba biaːlħusnaaː ħtaː w lw ʔaʶmtˤrˤt sʔaðhb llsbaːħa ʁdaː hðh ʔad͡ʒml hdja tlqjthaː fj ħjaːtj ðalika bimaaː qadːamat jadaaːka waʔaanːa aːllːaha lajsa biʶðˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi qawaaːrijra min fiʶdˤːaʶaʶiʶn qadːaruwhaaː taqdijranaː walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba falaaː takun fij mirjaain min liqaaːʔiihi wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu hudanaː libanij ʔiisraaːʔiijla nʕm wlkn sjkwn mn aʶːlˤsˤʕb wʔamaː aːlʁlaːm fkaːn ʔabwaːh mʔumnjn fχʃjnaː ʔan jrhqhmaː tˤʁjaʶːnaʶː wkfraː ln ʔaðhb maː lam jðhb twm aːlkθjr mn aːlʃjʔ aːld͡ʒjd hw raːʔiʕ waman d͡ʒaaːra ʕalajhaaː fahuwa ʕalaaː ʁajrihi ʔaad͡ʒwaru ktb d͡ʒmjʕ aʶːlˤtfaʶːsˤjlˤ ʔiinːaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka biaːlħaqːi baʃijranaː wanaðijranaː walaaː tusʔaalu ʕan ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːld͡ʒaħijmi liʔaanːahaaː maqluwbaaun sˤaʶːnh rbh lmdaː aːlʔazmaːn θm kaːn ʕlqa fχlq fswaː maː jd͡ʒʕlk tbqaː mstjqðˤaʶːaʶn ħtaː aːlʔaːn wsˤlˤtnj wmn mʕh d͡ʒmjʕaː aʶːlˤðˤlˤm mrtʕh wχjm ʔin aːlmtqjn fj d͡ʒnaːt wnhr χatama aːllːahu ʕalaaː quluwbihim waʕalaaː samʕihim waʕalaaː ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm ʁiʃaaːwaaun walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn waʔaaqijmuwaː aːlwazna biʶaʶːlˤqiʶstˤiʶ walaaː tuχsiruwaː aːlmijzaaːna wad͡ʒamʕuhum θubuwranaː man waʶlˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʔiilːaaː ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn hl jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔabqaː fj aːlmstʃfaː lilʔaanbijaaːʔi ʕalaaː aːlʕulamaaːʔi faʶdˤlˤuʶ darad͡ʒatajni walilʕulamaaːʔi ʕalaaː aːlʃːuhadaaːʔi faʶdˤlˤuʶ darad͡ʒaain twm wmaːrj ʔaχbraː ʔaχj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ juħbuhaː fj bjwt ʔaðn aːllh ʔan trfʕ wjðkr fjhaː aːsmh jsbħ lh fjhaː baːlʁdw waʶːlˤʔaʶːsˤaʶːlˤ waʕad͡ʒibt liman ʔaajqana biaːlqadari θumːa jatʕabu waaːlmuqilːu min aːlʔiiχwaaːni aːlmutaχajːiru lahum kaaːalːaðij jataχajːaru aːld͡ʒawhara halːaaː saʔaaluwaː ʔiðaaː lam jaʕlamuwaː faʔiinːamaaː ʃifaaːʔu aːlʕijːi aːlsːuʔuaaːlu kaaːalːaðij ħukija ʕan fijθaaːʁuwrsa fij waʶsˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶːhuʶ aːlmarmuwzaai ʔaanːahu qaaːla waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː sˤuʶħbaʶtiʶhiʶm karukuwbi aːlbaħri faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ muʃriqijna qul ʔiinːamaaː ʔaunðirukum biaːlwaħji walaaː jasmaʕu aʶːlˤsˤːuʶmːuʶ aːldːuʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː maaː junðaruwna lmaːðaː laː jsttˤjʕ ʔabdaː fʕl ʃjʔ aːlqaaːʔiilu waaːlmustamiʕu waaːlʔaːχiðu aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ mrʔaːa lld͡ʒw aːlʕaːʔilj twm wmaːrj jstʕdaːn ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔaj ʃʔi bʕd ʔanaː mstʕd daːʔimaː llmwt qaaːluwaː laʔiin lam tantahi jaaː lˤuʶwtˤuʶ latakuwnanːa mina aːlmuχrad͡ʒijna ʔablʁkm rsaːlaːt rbj wʔaʶnsˤħ lkm wʔaʕlm mn aːllh maː laː tʕlmwn bwb ʔaʕrb ʕn klmaːt aːlʃkr njaːba ʕn zmlaːʔih fj aʶːlˤsˤf aːlːaðijna junfiquwna fij aːlsːarːaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶrˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶ waʶaʶːlˤkaʶaʶːðˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ aʶːlˤʁaʶjðˤaʶ waaːlʕaaːfijna ʕani aːlnːaaːsi waaːllːahu juħibːu aːlmuħsinijna ʃkraːan lka hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤj tqrjraːan kaːmlaːan ħwl maː ħdθ zaːr rʔijsu aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda aʶːlˤsˤjnaʶ zjaːraan rsmja fj ʔaj ʕaːm wldt aːħtflnaː tˤjlˤaʶ aːlljl fwqaːh aːllh sjʔiaːt maː mkrwaː wħaːq bʔaːl frʕwn swʔ aːlʕðaːb waχibraau ʔaaχlaaːqihim qabla aʶːsˤtˤiʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶm faʔiinːahu maaː ʔaaħadun jaʕdamu ʕaduwːanaː walaaː jafqidu ħaaːsidanaː ʔataː mnːaːd ʔilaː mnzlj ʔaðhb ʔilj aːlʕml fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa lˤtˤaʶːlˤmaʶː ʔaħbbtk faʔiinːa ʔid͡ʒaaːbatahaaː tusriʕu ʔanti wsˤlˤtiʶ mbkraːan d͡ʒdaːan hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjnj dqjqa ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk ʃjʔiaː aːlmaːʔ mhm d͡ʒdaː aːlːaðij ʔaʶaʶtˤʕaʶmaʶhuʶm mːin d͡ʒuwʕin waʔaːmanahum mːin χawfin kraːmaː kaːtbjn fʕl saːmj klː maː bwsʕh kj jsˤf ljlaː bʔabʃʕ sˤwrˤaʶ mmkna lmaːðaː ttbʕnj knt friħaan baːlʔams hal θuwːiba aːlkufːaaːru maaː kaaːnuwaː jafʕaluwna wakaaːna jad͡ʒuwzu min aːlmukalːafijna ʔaan laaː takuwna haðihi aːlʔaumuwru muʶsˤlˤiʶħaʶaʶaʶn lahum waʔaarʃadahu ʔilajhaaː biʶaʶːlˤfaʶtˤiʶnaʶaʶiʶ aːlːaðijna jukaðːibuwna bijawmi aːldːijni ramــــــzunaː ramــــــzunaː maـd͡ʒdunaː wʕـhdunaː wwaːd͡ʒـbun mna aːlwafaː ʔaskn fj bld ʔawrwbj ʕn ʔabj jaʕlaaː ʃadːaaːdi bni ʔaawsin rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu aːlftjaːt jrjdwn fqtˤ aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔam llʔinsaːn maː tmnaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlzːuhdi aːlrːahbaau waθamaratuhu aːlʕibaaːdaau faʔiiðaaː aːqtarana aːlzːuhdu waaːlʕilmu faqad tamːat aːlsːaʕaaːdaau waʕamːat aʶːlˤfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶ ʔiðaː lm tkn fj sˤfnaʶː fsnʕdk mn ʔaʕdaːʔinaː daːʔimaː ʔaʁsl wd͡ʒhj baʶːlˤsˤaʶːbwn waːlmaːʔ wmn dwnki ħtmaːan qlbj jnthj faʔaamːaaː aːllːaaːzimu fahuwa aːlʔaanafaau lilʔaːbaaːʔi min taʶhaʶdˤːuʶmiʶn ʔaaw χumuwlin maθalu aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai maθalu dˤaʶrˤːaʶtaʶjniʶ ʔin ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶjt ʔiħdaaːhumaaː ʔaʶaʶsχaʶtˤt aːlʔauχraaː jd͡ʒib ʔan tfkr fj ʕaːʔiltka qaaːla ʔiin kunta d͡ʒiʔita biʔaːjaain faʔati bihaaː ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ʔanti ldjki ʔanf kbjr faʔaamːaaː maʕa faqdi aːlʔaaʕwaaːni faʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni aːlkafːu ljwm ʕðˤjm waqaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi laʔiini aːtːabaʕtum ʃuʕajbanaː ʔiinːakum ʔiiðanaː laχaaːsiruwna tˤbʕaʶːaʶn fasabːiħ biħamdi rabːika waaːstaʁfirhu ʔiinːahu kaaːna tawːaaːbanaː aːltdχjn jqtl faʔiinːa ʔaaħadakum laaː jadrij mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilajhi ʔaaw mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː maaː ʕindahu wjqwlwn mtaː hðaː aːlwʕd ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn lmaːðaː thaːd͡ʒr aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ waʔiiðaaː raʔaawka ʔiin jatːaχiðuwnaka ʔiilːaaː huzuwanaː ʔaahaðaaː aːlːaðij baʕaθa aːllːahu rasuwlanaː waʶːlˤnaʶːʃtˤaʶːt nʃtˤaʶː aːtbʕ maː ʔawħj ʔiljk mn rbk laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wʔaʶʕrˤdˤ ʕn aːlmʃrkjn qaaːluwaː famaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔuuhu ʔiin kuntum kaaːðibijna bali aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː fij ʕizːaain waʃiqaaːqin mn aʶːlˤsˤʕb ʔan tkwn aːnsaːnaː ħqjqjaː fkðbwh fʔahlknaːhm ʔin fj ðlk ʔaantum waʔaːbaaːʔuukum fij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn mubijnin laaː tasubːuwhaaː faʔiinːahaaː ʕamːarat bilaaːda aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː faʕaaːʃa fijhaaː ʕibaaːdu aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʔanaː ʔaːsf wlkn hðaː lm jʕd mtaːħaːan qum bzjaːrtnaː ʁdaːan hl sbq lk ʔan rʔajt smka qrʃ jzjd tˤwlˤhaʶː ʕn θlaːθa ʔamtaːr nħn fj aːlχrjf aːlʔaːn waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ðaːt aʶːlˤsˤdʕ hl ʔant mtzwd͡ʒa faʔiiðaaː nazala bisaaːħatihim fasaaːʔa sˤaʶbaʶaʶːħuʶ aːlmunðarijna kjfa ʕlmtji maː kaːnt trjdhu ʔanti jmknki daːʔimaːan aːlnwm ʕlaː ʔarjktj hlaː ʔarjtnj rˤχsˤtk tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶ aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ min qilːaai aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ taʁlijbanaː lildːijni ʕalaaː aːlnːasabi waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕalaaː tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aːlʔaabi ljs ldj dljl wlʔin ʔaðqnaːh nʕmaːʔ bʕd dˤrˤaʶːʔ msth ljqwln ðhb aːlsjʔiaːt ʕnj ʔinh lfrħ fχwr wʔiðaː msh aːlχjr mnwʕaː mfaːqmaː bðlk aːlmsaːfa aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan jqtˤʕhaʶː aːlfwtwn lˤjsˤlˤ ʔiljnaː ʔinhu mzʕd͡ʒ ʔaraː tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶːaʶn ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra waaːlsːaqfi aːlmarfuwʕi χajrun min ʔaalfin fij kutubik faʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna faaːstaʕið biaːllːahi mina aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ aːlrːad͡ʒijmi waqad qaaːla aːlkindijːu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdiʶjquʶ ʔinsaaːnun huwa ʔaanta ʔilːaaː ʔaanːahu ʁajruk liʔaanːa aːlʕud͡ʒba naʶqsˤuʶn junaaːfij aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤaʶ laaː sijːamaaː maʕa qawli aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔiilaaː ʕiziː tuwnis ʔiilaaː mad͡ʒdihaaː rid͡ʒaaːlu aːlbilaaːdi waʃubaːaːnuhaaː qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh waːbʕθ fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn waqaaːla ʕalijːun karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu liaːbnihi aːlħasani aʶːsˤbʕj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ mtwrm ʕalaaː waʶaʶːsˤiʶlˤiʶhaʶaʶː faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː ʔaraːd twm aːstdʕaːʔ aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ wlkn maːrj lm tsmħ lh ʔauχtj tˤaʶːbiʶʕaʶ d͡ʒjda d͡ʒdaːan bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi sabːiħi aːsma rabːika aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiinːaka majːitun waʔiinːahum majːituwna qad χalat min qablikum sunanun fasijruwaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤuʶwaʶː kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaðːibijna aːlraːʔiħa mn mmjzaːt aːlθwm waːtbʕ maː jwħaː ʔiljk waʶːsˤbrˤ ħtaː jħkm aːllh whw χjr aːlħaːkmjn hw laː jdrs aːlʔind͡ʒljzja aːlʔaːn waðalika qad jakuwnu biʶsˤuʶnuʶwfiʶn min aːlbirːi wajaχtalifu bisababi aːχtilaaːfi aːlʔaaħwaaːli hl tʔaðnjn lj baːldχwl " nʕm baʶːlˤtˤbʕ " maː aːlðj jraːhu fjhaː qrːr saːmj bjʕ mnzlh aːlsmka trjd ʔan tsbħ ʔanaː baːlfʕl ðhbt ʔilaː mħl aːld͡ʒzaːr hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ aʶːlˤqtˤ jnaːm ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ faʔaanta ʔiðanaː min ʔiχwaaːni aʶːlˤʃːaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjniʶ ʔinhu jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕl hðaː ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mnj walihaðaaː qijla aːltːaθabːutu waaːliaːrtijaaːʔu wamudaaːwamaau aːliaːχtijaaːri waaːliaːbtilaaːʔu mutaʕaðːirun bal mafquwdun stqwm bðlk ʔin dfʕt lhaː aːlθmn hl tʕlm km aːlwqt aːlʔan fj bwstˤn lhðh aʶːlˤqsˤːaʶ nhaːja ħzjna sʔaʶtˤlˤq aːlnaːr ʕljh ʔanti laː jmknki tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl jmknki ʔanta qd laː turjd fiʕl ðlk laː jhmnj waaːlʃːud͡ʒaaːʕaau waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːltːaqaħːumi waaːld͡ʒubni bχjl hðaː aʶːlˤtˤflˤ jstħq hdja wamina aːllːajli fasabːiħhu waʔiidbaaːra aːlnːud͡ʒuwmi ħdθt ʕnh buʶtˤwn aːlktbi hl tħtaːd͡ʒ ħqaː lklb ʔiʶdˤaʶːfj wlaː jsʔal ħmjm ħmjmaː mnaːχnaː jtʁjr qad saʔaalahaaː qawmun min qablikum θumːa ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħuʶwaʶː bihaaː kaaːfirijna faʶaʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕuʶ wamud͡ʒaaːnabaau aːlʕud͡ʒbi hl trjdjn aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕj aːlljla ðhb ħsn ʔilaː aːlmdrsa stuχtbr braːʔth fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb wqaːlt lʔaχth qsˤjh fbsˤrˤt bh ʕn d͡ʒnb whm laː jʃʕrwn wʔinj mrsla ʔiljhm bhdja fnaʶːðˤrˤaʶ bm jrd͡ʒʕ aːlmrslwn hl maːzlta trjd ʃaːjaːan ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdjna ʕn ʔabj hrjraa rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama: hnaːk sbʕa ʔajaːm fj aːlʔasbwʕ faʔiinːa fij ðalika kufranaː liniʕmatihi ʔajmknk mlˤaʶːħðˤaʶ aːlfrq lqd ʔarsltu ʔiljka brjdaːan ʔilktrwnjaːan laː faːʔida mn mħaːwla ħl hðh aːlmsʔala laːjmkn ʔan tħkm ʕljh mn mðˤhrˤh laː tbqj wlaː tðr wmaː ʔaʶsˤaʶːbkm jwm aːltqaː aːld͡ʒmʕaːn fbʔiðn aːllh wljʕlm aːlmʔumnjn wjmkrwn wjmkr aːllh waːllh χjr aːlmaːkrjn wqaːlwaː ʔaʔaːlhtnaː χjr ʔam hw maː dˤrˤbwh lk ʔilaː d͡ʒdlaː bl hm qwm χsˤmwn kaːn ðlk aːlktaːb mθjraːan fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː aʶːlˤbtˤwn fkðb wʕsˤaʶː walaaː ʔaanaaː ʕaaːbidun maaː ʕabadtum ʔin aːlqaːʔima kmaː jlj wslaːm ʕlaː aːlmrsljn maaː baaːluk takrahu aːlwalada faqaaːla qul ʔaaðalika χajrun ʔaam d͡ʒanːaau aːlχuldi aːlːatij wuʕida aːlmutːaquwna kaaːnat lahum d͡ʒazaaːʔan waʶmaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː ʔawʔamn ʔahl aːlqraː ʔan jʔatjhm bʔasnaː dˤħaʶː whm jlʕbwn lm tkn fj aːlmzaːd͡ʒ aːlmnaːsb llktb aːld͡ʒaːda hðaː hw aːlfrq bjnj wbjnk fatanaaːzaʕuwaː ʔaamrahum bajnahum waʔaasarːuwaː aːlnːad͡ʒwaaː wamin ʔaasbaaːbi aʶːlˤtːaʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶ ʔaʶaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː ʔaan jaʁfula ʕan aːltːaʕalːumi fij aʶːlˤsˤːiʶʁaʶrˤiʶ ln ʔatwqːf ʕn aːlbħθ ħtːaː ʔad͡ʒd twm rʃːt maːrj wd͡ʒh twm baːlmaːʔ qaːl lm ʔakn lʔasd͡ʒd lbʃr χlqth mn sˤlˤsˤaʶːlˤ mn ħmʔi msnwn ðhb aːlwld wbʕd mda ʕaːd wlm jʃtraː ʃjʔiaːan ʔanaː χaːʔifh d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk bmfrdj ql lj ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjd ʔaklh mn fdˤlˤk ʁaːdr ħaːlaːan man rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ biʶsˤuʶħbaʶaʶiʶ man laaː χajra fijhi lam jaʶrˤdˤaʶ biʶsˤuʶħbaʶtiʶhiʶ man fijhi χajrun waħadːaθa aːlħasanu aʶːlˤbaʶsˤrˤiʶjːuʶ biħadijθin faqaaːla lahu rad͡ʒulun hl ʔanaː fuzt bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabːi aːlnːaaːsi lmn hðh aʶːlˤmðˤlˤaʶ wʔin rbk hw jħʃrhm ʔinh ħkjm ʕljm ʔanaː mn zaːmbjaː knaː d͡ʒmjʕanaː nʃk fjh aːχtft draːd͡ʒtj ʔama tbnj bʕzm laː jljn ʕfwaːan, bdwn aːlwsaːbj, mn fdˤlˤk waqaaːla wahbu bnu munabːihin ʔanaː ʔabħθ ʕn aːlʔad͡ʒbaːn qaːla: maaː aːlmasʔuuwlu ʕanhaː biʔaaʕlama mina aːlsːaaːʔiili ʔant laː tnsˤt faʔiin aːstadaaːma aːlsːababu daaːmat aːlʔaulfaau qaːl rb aːʃrħ lj sˤdrˤj θm ʔaχðt aːlðjn kfrwaː fkjf kaːn nkjr km mn mra ðhbt mn aːld͡ʒna waːlnaːs ʔinh jʃm raːʔiħa aːlħsaːʔ llðjn jʔulwn mn nsaːʔihm trˤbsˤ ʔarbʕa ʔaʃhr fʔin faːʔwaː fʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan kaːn kʔasaːan mn aːlmaːʔ ʔanaː qlq bʃʔan ntjd͡ʒa tħljl aːldm wʔin kaːnwaː ljqwlwn mnːaːd smjn tˤwkjw hj qrja kbjra klaː bl tħbwn aːlʕaːd͡ʒla fanad͡ʒːajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlħjaːa aːlrjfja hj aːlʔakθr hdwʔanan mqaːrnaan bħjaːa aːlmdjna fltkn jaː ʕmaːn nħnu mn ʕhdi aːlnbj ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔauχuwːaaun muktasabaaun biaːliaːtːifaaːqi aːld͡ʒaaːrij mad͡ʒraaː aʶːlˤiʶaʶːdˤtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ flmaː qdˤaʶːh bʕd sta ʔaʃhr qdˤaʶːh drhmjn wθlaːθ ħbaːt ʃʕjr mn zrʕ ħsˤd qaːl fmaː χtˤbkm ʔajhaː aːlmrslwn ʔin lkm fjh lmaː tχjrwn ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sunːaaa man qad ʔaarsalnaaː qablaka min rusulinaaː walaaː tad͡ʒidu lisunːatinaaː taħwijlanaː wkaːn jʔamr ʔahlh baʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waːlzkaːa wkaːn ʕnd rbh mrˤdˤjaʶː waʔiiðaaː quriʔia aːlqurʔaːnu faaːstamiʕuwaː lahu waʶʔaʶaʶnsˤiʶtuʶwaʶː laʕalːakum turħamuwna fʔin twlwaː fʔin aːllh ʕljm baːlmfsdjn faqalːa bihaðaaː aːltːaʕlijli ʔiχwaaːnu ʔaahli aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ liqilːatihim ħkm ʕljh aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤj baːlʔiʕdaːm lnʕud qbl ʔan tuʶmtˤrˤ kjf tʕrfnj sʔal naːθaːnjjl ʔiinːahu fakːara waqadːara ʔaraːd twm mʕrfa maː ʔin kaːn limaːrj ħbjb wʔiðaː mrˤdˤt fhw jʃfjn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔakθr mn aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laː ʔaʶtˤjq aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ ħtaː ʔaraː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːwaʶaʶːʕiʶquʶ nijraaːnahaaː fmn jʕml mθqaːl ðra χjraː jrh wʔamaː mn χft mwaːzjnh sʔaftqdk χalaqa aːlʔiinsaaːna min ʕalaqin qalaba aːllːahu aːldːunjaaː taaːllːahi ʔiin kunːaaː lafij mʕnaː klma " " fj hðh aːld͡ʒmla ħatːaaː balaʁat biʔaulfaai aːlʔaansaaːbi taʶnaʶaʶːsˤuʶrˤaʶhaʶaʶː ʕalaaː aːlqawijːi aːlʔaajːidi wataħakːamat bihi taħakːuma aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶsaʶlˤːiʶtˤiʶ aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶʃaʶtˤːiʶtˤiʶ faʔaːmanuwaː famatːaʕnaaːhum ʔiilaaː ħijnin ʔanaː ħtaː laː ʔaʕrf maː ðlk fijhinːa χajraaːtun ħisaaːnun lm jsttˤʕ aːltʁlb ʕlaː aːlrʁba fj sjd͡ʒaːrain ʔaχraː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ ftħ ħqjbtk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi χajru aːlʕilmi maaː nafaʕa waχajru aːlqawli maaː radaʕa laː tχjb ðˤnj bk ʔism sˤdqj aːlʔisbaːnj ʔinrjk waraʁbaaun fij muʔuaaːχaaːtihi waqul rabːi ʔaanzilnij munzalanaː mubaaːrakanaː waʔaanta χajru aːlmunzilijna ʔaʕrfhaː mnð kaːnt tˤflˤaʶ sˤʁjrˤaʶ mn jwld fj aːsbaːnjaː jkwn aːsbaːnjaːan aːʕtqdt aːnk ln tʔatj aːlaː hnaː ʔiinːaaː ʔaanzalnaaːhu fij lajlaain mubaaːrakaain ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː munðirijna laː tdˤʕ wqtk ʔaʔantm tzrʕwnh ʔam nħn aːlzaːrʕwn faːstʕdj wχðj mnaː aːld͡ʒwaːb man ʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː falinafsihi waman ʔaasaaːʔa faʕalajhaaː wamaaː rabːuka biʶðˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi maː aːlðj tʕnjh klma " " fj hðh aːld͡ʒmla aːlħdjθ aːlraːbʕ: mraːħl aːlχlq lm jʕrf ʔaħd mn fʕlhaː maaː jaʶsˤuʶdːuʶhuʶ ʕan aːlʕud͡ʒbi bihi θumːa aːrd͡ʒiʕi aʶːlˤbaʶsˤaʶrˤaʶ karːatajni janqalib ʔiilajka aʶːlˤbaʶsˤaʶrˤuʶ χaaːsiʔianaː wahuwa ħasijrun kaːn ʔabj wʔamj d͡ʒaːlsjn tħt ʃd͡ʒrain maː rʔajk blʕb aːltns aːlsbt aːlqaːdm fðrhm jχwdˤwaʶː wjlʕbwaː ħtaː raħimuhu waʶsˤaʶlˤaʶhaʶaʶː faʔauwlaʔiika ʕasaaː aːllːahu ʔaan jaʕfuwa ʕanhum wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕafuwːanaː ʁafuwranaː qaːl ʔinj ljħznnj ʔan tðhbwaː bh wʔaχaːf ʔan jʔaklh aːlðʔib wʔantm ʕnh ʁaːflwn fjhn waχaaːfuwni ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna d͡ʒahanːama jaʶsˤlˤaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː wabiʔisa aːlqaraaːru bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaaːʔu aːnʃaqːat surrt blqaːʔik rbmaː ħtaː aːlħqjqa tχaːf ʔan tðˤhrˤ ʔant ʕrˤdˤaʶ llnsjaːn bkjtu tˤwaʶːlˤ aːlljl tˤflˤ χaːʔif mn aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶːm waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu mdˤaʶː ʃhraːn ʕlaː wsˤwlˤj ʔilaː tˤwkjw swf ʔaqtlk tawalːawaː faqul ʔaːðantukum ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin waʔiin ʔaadrij ʔaaqarijbun ʔaam baʕijdun maaː tuwʕaduwna waqismun mawluwduwna wakaðalika nuwalːij baʶʕdˤaʶ aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ baʶʕdˤaʶnaʶː bimaaː ʃaːhqa wlaː jʔuðn lhm fjʕtðrwn waʶwaʶdˤaʶʕaʶ kafːajhi ʕlaː faχiðajhi؛ qaːla: jaː mħmːadu waaːχtalafa aːlnːaaːsu hal wad͡ʒaba ðalika biaːlʕaqli ʔaaw biaːlʃːarʕi hl ʃaːhdt aːltlfaːz aːlljla wahum jataχaaːfatuwna ʔanaː d͡ʒaːhz hl jmknnaː aːlðhaːb raʁbaaun wafaaːqaaun θumːa ʔiiðaaː ʃaaːʔ ʔaanʃarahu walaaː χajra fijman laaː jaʔalafu walaaː juʔulafu laː tuχbir ʔaħdaːan ʕindahaaː d͡ʒanːaau ldjka rʔuja ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mnaː wmaː ʔarslnaː qblk ʔilaː rd͡ʒaːlaː nwħj ʔiljhm faːsʔalwaː ʔahl aːlðkr ʔin kntm laː tʕlmwn ʔiinːa haʔuulaaːʔi mutabːarun maaː hum fijhi waʶbaʶaʶːtˤiʶlˤuʶn maaː kaaːnuwaː bimuʔuminijna hl hðhi hdja lj ktbn mʃrwʕ qaːnwn jχsˤ aʶːlˤsˤħaʶ waminhaaː maaː huwa maʁijbu ħikmaain aːstaʔaθara bihaaː rfʕt sˤdrˤhaʶː hðaː aʶːsˤbʕj nsˤħ mnːaːd bbaːja ʔinːj rħltu ʔilaː ʕjnjki ʔaʶtˤlˤbhaʶː smʕt aːmrʔaa tsˤrˤχ qaːlwaː ʔatʕd͡ʒbjn mn ʔamr aːllh rħmt aːllh wbrkaːth ʕljkm ʔahl aːlbjt ʔinh ħmjd md͡ʒjd wakaʔaajːin min qarjaain hija ʔaaʃadːu quwːaaan min qarjatika aːlːatij ʔaaχrad͡ʒatka ʔaahlaknaaːhum falaaː naʶaʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶ lahum ʔant ttmtʕ bʃχsˤjaʶ ʕdjma aːlʔiħsaːs lnftnhm fjh wmn jʕrˤdˤ ʕn ðkr rbh jslkh ʕðaːbaː sˤʕdaʶː ʔaʶʁdˤbwnj qaːm baːlʕml kmaː tˤuʶlˤb wfj ʕaːd ʔið fijhi manzilun ʕaaːmirun waʕaqlun χaraaːbu waʔaanʃada fij baʶʕdˤiʶ ʔaahli aːlʕilmi wahum muʶχtaʶsˤːuʶwnaʶ maʕa salaaːmaai ʔaaħwaaːlihim biχuluqajni ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun waaːlʔaːχaru muntaqilun ʔaʶtˤlˤʕ aːlʁjb ʔam aːtχð ʕnd aːlrħmn ʕhdaː maː aːlfrq bjn aːlkmaːn waːlbjaːnw aːlbjaːnw jħtrq mda ʔaʶtˤwlˤ naʶsˤuʶwħaʶnaʶː lahaaː fij mulimːaaːtihaaː ʔiilːaaː ʕalaaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒihim ʔaaw maaː malakat ʔaajmaaːnuhum faʔiinːahum ʁajru maluwmijna km mn fʔia qljla ʁlbt fʔia kθjra bʔiðn aːllh waːllh mʕ aʶːlˤsˤaʶːbrˤjn wajawma taʃaqːaqu aːlsːamaaːʔu biaːlʁamaaːmi wanuzːila aːlmalaaːʔiikaau tanzijlanaː waaːtːaχaðuwaː min duwni aːllːahi ʔaːlihaaan lijakuwnuwaː lahum ʕizːanaː waʔaaħwaaːlin kunt ʔauχfij ʕanhum maaː jaʶsˤħaʶbuʶniʶj min maħbaraain wakitaaːbin liʔialːaaː ʔaakuwna ʕindahum mustaθqalanaː faʶːtˤlˤʕ frʔaːh fj swaːʔ aːld͡ʒħjm nafasi taʶsˤaʶwːuʶrˤiʶhiʶ watadfaʕu ʕan ʔidraaːki ħaqijqatihi waʔiimːaaː janzaʁanːaka mina aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ nazʁun faaːstaʕið biaːllːahi ʔiinːahu samijʕun ʕalijmun qaaːla walima wafij daaːrik naʃaʔaat qaaːla ʔinːahaaː tataʃarːafu naħnu d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː taðkiraaan wamataaːʕanaː lilmuqwijna fʔamaː mn θqlt mwaːzjnh ʕani aːlnːabaʔii aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ maaː waʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ ʕan taʔaalːufi aːlnːaaːfirijna faqad qijla lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʕarabi mtʔakd mn nd͡ʒaːħh wajaraaː ʔaanːahu qad χuʶsˤːaʶ min bajnihim biaːlrːazijːaai baʕda ʔaan kaaːna musaaːwijanaː θumːa limaaː fijhi min aːʕtijaaːdi aːlrːadːi waaːstishaaːli aːlmanʕi aʶːlˤmuʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː aːlʃːuħːi ʔaasraʕtu kaj ʔaudrika aʶːlˤqiʶtˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ hl ʔaʶsˤbt baːlbrd wakaaːlθːawbi ʔiðaaː χaliqa kaaːna aʶːtˤːiʶrˤaʶaʶːħuʶhuʶ biaːld͡ʒadijdi lahu ʔaad͡ʒmala ʕfwaː faqaaːla lahu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn d͡ʒaːhz knaʶːtˤħ sˤχrˤaʶ jwmaː ljksrhaː flm jdˤrˤhaʶː wʔawhaː qrnh aːlwʕl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waʶaʶːlˤdˤːuʶħaʶː liman ʃaːʔa minkum ʔaan jastaqjma kaːn ldaː saːmj mwʕd mʕ aʶːlˤtˤːbjb ðlk aːljwm waʔiinːamaaː takuwnu zijaaːdaau aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ aːlmaħmuwdaai naʶqsˤaʶnaʶː maðmuwmanaː faaːʕfuwaː juʕizːukum aːllːahu ʔaħb aːlqhwa saːχna waaːlθːaaːnij aːtːibaaːʕu aːlʃːahwaai ʔithmt hjʔia aːlmħlfjn aːlkbraː twm bd͡ʒrjma qtl waqaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama aːlmustadijnu taaːd͡ʒiru aːllːahi fij ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinːa saʕjakum laʃatːaː wasaaːʔat tˤaʶrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶquʶhuʶ rabiħa aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru aːlʔaamjnu ʕljk ʔan tdrs bd͡ʒdː waaːllːajli ʔiiðaː jaʁʃaːhaː mʕ mn knti ttħdːθjn "mʕ ʔamːj" "lm ʔaʕlm ʔanː lʔamːki sˤwt rd͡ʒl" fahuwa jaqdamu ʕalaaː maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajaʔatij maaː θumːa laaː sabijla lˤiʶmaʶtˤlˤiʶhiʶ baʕda aːlwaʕdi kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ χtˤjrˤaʶː d͡ʒdːaː baːlnːsba llnːaːs walaaː min ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶ aːlkarami ʔizaaːlaau aːlnːiʕami kaaːna aːlbaðlu manduwbanaː sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶaʶn laaː d͡ʒuwdanaː wamin aːlwaħʃaai maaː laaː jaʶdˤuʶrˤːuʶhuʶ θumːa d͡ʒaʕala naslahu min sulaːlaain min maːʔin mahjnin aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶ ʁazijrun ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa haːdʔia fj aːlqaːhra kaːn saːmj aʶːlˤtˤːaʶːlˤb aːlmslm aːlwħjd fj mdrstnaː waaːlθːaaːnij d͡ʒumlaau aːlʕilmi ʔiðaaː lam jaqum biʶtˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶhiʶ man fijhi kifaaːjaaun kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħsˤːaʶ fj maːdːa aʶːlˤtːsˤwjrˤ waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai maː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai ʕndj ʕml ʔaːχr aːlʔaːn ʔiðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔaːn faqad jataʕalːaqu bimaaː maʶdˤaʶaʶː min aːlʔaasbaaːbi aːlθːalaaːθaai watanqasimu ʔaaqsaaːmanaː θalaaːθaaan waθijaːbaka faʶtˤaʶhːiʶrˤ aːlmaqaaːdijru aːlʁaaːlibaau laaː tunaaːlu biaːlmuʁaaːlabaai man ðakara qudraaa aːllːahi lam jastaʕmil qudratahu fij ðˤuʶlˤmiʶ ʕibaaːdi aːllːahi waʔiinːahu liħubːi aːlχajri laʃadijdin jaʕnij aːlmaaːla wa wamaː ʔaanta ʔiilːaː baʃarun miθlunaː waʔiin naʶðˤuʶnːuʶkaʶ lamina aːlkaːðibjna hl ʔanhjt waːd͡ʒbk bhðh aːlsrʕa waaːlkitaːbi aːlmubjni sʔaʶħdˤrˤ mnʃfa ʔaχraː kaːnt lˤlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ aːsbaːb ltʃtbh bsaːmj liʔaanːa ħaaːd͡ʒaaa aːlʔiinsaaːni laaːzimaaun laaː juʕarːaaː minhaaː baʃarun waʔaantum ħjnaʔiiðin taʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ wad͡ʒazaːʔu sajːiʔiaain sajːiʔiaaun miθluhaː faman ʕafaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːahu laː juħibːu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶːlˤiʶmjnaʶ waaːllːaʔiijma muʕaaːnidun ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj jwmaː kaːmlaː fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa faman ʃaːʔa ðakarahu ʕwlid͡ʒ saːmj ħtːaː ʃfj faʔaamːaaː aːlmaaːdːaau fahija ħaaːdiθaaun ʕan aːqtinaaːʔi ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwlˤiʶn naaːmijaain biðawaaːtihaaː hnaːk aːlkθjr mn aːlfnaːdq fj wstˤ aːlmdjna kamaθali aːlːaðjna min qablihim qarjbanaː ðaːqwaː wabaːla ʔaamrihim walahum ʕaðaːbun ʔaaljmun ʕðr lm jtwl aːlħq nsd͡ʒh tʕqːbt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ faʶːdˤlˤ sʔaʶsˤlˤ aːljwm ʔarjd ʔan ʔansaː aːlʔamr maːðaː ʃwjt ʔaam taquwluwna ʕalaaː aːllːahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna fajaraaː aːntihaaːza aʶːlˤfuʶrˤsˤaʶaʶiʶ bihaaː faʶjaʶdˤaʶʕuʶhaʶaʶː ħajθu takuwnu lahu ðuχranaː muʕadːanaː waʁanamanaː mustad͡ʒadːanaː wamaː huwa ʕalaaː aːlʁajbi biʶdˤaʶnjniʶn lm jsmʕ saːmj mn ljlaː waʔaamːaaː aːlsːaːʔiila falaː tanhar faaːlʕaaːqilu laaː jastaʁnij waʔiin sˤaʶħːaʶt ʁarijzatuhu ʔinːa aːlkalaaːma jaʁurːu aːlqawma d͡ʒilwatuhu ħatːaaː jalid͡ʒːa bihi ʕijːun waʔiikθaaːru waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤʃːaʶrˤtˤuʶ aːlrːaaːbiʕu juqaaːlu jkrh saːmj ðlk aːlmdrːs kaːnt mʃʁwla bʔaʕmaːl aːlbjt kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt fj χtˤrˤ θumːa jaʕqubuhu aːlʔiind͡ʒaaːzu fiʕlanaː fajaʔuuwlu ʔilaaː suwʔi χuluqin jaʶχuʶsˤːuʶhuʶ duwna ʁajrihi smʕ saːmj sˤrˤjrˤaʶː laaː jaʃkuru aːllːaha man laaː jaʃkuru aːlnːaaːsa walaː jaʔatwnaka bimaθalin ʔiilːaː d͡ʒiʔinaːka biaːlħaqːi waʔaaħsana tafsjranaː ʔiinːa hʔuulaːʔi laʃirðimaaun qaljlwna ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanːa aːlnːiʕama zaaːʔiiraaun ln jstmrː saːmj fj tmwjl ʕlaːd͡ʒ ljlaː tħfðˤ aːlθlaːd͡ʒa aːlʔakl mn aːlfsaːd jmdˤj saːmj klː wqth w hw jbðːr aːlmaːl aːlħjaːa ljst ʔabdaː bhðh aʶːlˤbsaʶːtˤaʶ twm kaːn wħdh fj aːlmnzl famaː wad͡ʒadnaː fjhaː ʁajra bajtin mina aːlmuslimjna waaːlmalaqu ðulːun waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlkarijmu man ʔamaːzlti tuħbːjnh faqad qijla laaː budːa lˤiʶlˤmaʶsˤduʶwrˤiʶ ʔaan janfuθa ʔaaw ðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ aːlħud͡ʒːaai fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ ʔaajaħsabu ʔaan lam jarahu ʔaaħadun ʔaktm mn aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔiinːj lakum raswlun ʔaamjnun nsj saːmj nðˤːaʶːrˤaʶːth fj ʁrfa aːlfndq mtʔakːd mn ʔannaː snd͡ʒd ħlːaː faʔaaχaðahu aːlχalijlu waaːlqurʔaːni aːlħakjmi ʔajn jmknnj aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː mʕdaːt aʶːlˤsˤjd bsʕr d͡ʒjd ʔaːml ðlk ʔaʕd͡ʒbth tlk aːlqjθaːra laaː tazaaːlu ʔaumːatij biχajrin maaː lam tara aːlʔaamaaːnaaa maʁnamanaː waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶdaʶqaʶaʶaʶ maʁramanaː qrːr saːmj aːlqjaːm bðlk ʕmlaː bnsˤjħaʶ ʔaħd aːlmdrːsjn fafaʕaluwaː waʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶ ðalika bihim faaːʃtaʁala aːlrːid͡ʒaaːlu biaːlrːid͡ʒaaːli waaːlnːisaaːʔu biaːlnːisaaːʔi aʶːlˤmaʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶ mutaʔaalːimun lm tsʔal kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jħdˤrˤaʶːn ðlk aːldːrs mʕaː waqijla lirad͡ʒulin min ʕabsin kitaːbun fuʶsˤːiʶlˤaʶt ʔaːjaːtuhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː liqawmin jaʕlamwna lqd ʔaʃfjnaːh ʔaʶaʶqrˤiʶdˤhuʶm min ʕaʶrˤdˤiʶk lijawmi faaːqatik waliðalika qaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn aːlnːamijmaau ʔin kaaːna mustawdaʕanaː ʔajn aːlħmːaːm kaðːabat ʕaːdun fakajfa kaːna ʕaðaːbj wanuðuri waqijla lizaaːhidin lm ʔaklːm ʔaħdaː waqalbun haaːʔiimun ʔiin huwa ʔiilːaː ðikrun lilʕaːlamjna fakaðːabwhu faʔaahlaknaːhum ʔiinːa fj ðlika laʔaːjaaan wamaː kaːna ʔaakθaruhum muʔuminjna waʔaamːaaː aːlmusaaːmaħaau fij aːlʔaamwaaːli fatatanawːaʕu θalaaːθaaa ʔaanwaaːʕin aːntht ʕlaːqa saːmj w ljlaː bʃkl kaːrθjː ʔiðaaː ʁaʶdˤiʶbaʶ aːlzwaːd͡ʒ hw ʔiltzaːm lmdaː aːlħjaːa ʔaʶsˤbt baːlbrd kaːn saːmj mslmaː ʕaːdjːaː ʔinːa ruwħa aːlqudusi nafaθa fij rawʕij ʔaanːa nafsanaː lan tamuwta ħatːaaː tastawfija rizqahaaː waqaːlwaː rabːanaː ʕad͡ʒːil lanaː qiʶtˤːaʶnaʶː qabla jawmi aːlħisaːbi lm jkn saːmj mslmaː ʔaan taqdira ʕalaaː aːlmaʕruwfi walaaː taʶsˤtˤaʶniʶʕuʶhuʶ ħatːaaː jafuwta twd͡ʒːh saːmj nħw aːlbaːb frjd bn ʕmaːd ʔiinːa ʕaðaːba rabːihim ʁajru maʔamwnin waaːlʃːud͡ʒaaːʕu ʔilːaaː fij aːlħarbi faʔiin saraaː sumːuhu zaaːla ʕanhu ʁamːuhu mllt waʔaakθaru aːlχajri maʕa ʔaakθari aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶwsaʶaʶːtˤiʶ ʔiin kufira hnaːk naːfwra maːʔ llʃrb qrb mlʕb aːltns laː nsrd aʶːlˤtˤrˤaʶːʔiʶf fj aːld͡ʒnaːʔiz wlaː ndˤħk lm nʕd nʕjʃ fj aʶːlˤʕsˤrˤ aːlħd͡ʒrj faʔatijaː firʕawna faqwlaː ʔiinːaː raswlu rabːi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ sˤʁjrˤaʶː d͡ʒdːaː jarmuwna biʶaʶːlˤχuʶtˤaʶbiʶ aʶːlˤtˤːiʶwaʶaʶːlˤiʶ wataaːraaan waħja aʶːlˤmaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶðˤiʶ χijfaaa aːlrːuqabaaːʔi waqaaːla aːlhajθamu bnu sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶn liaːbnihi wakaaːna aːlmutaʕalːimu faʶtˤiʶnaʶnaʶː ðakijːanaː ʕaːmilaaun naʶːsˤiʶbaʶaʶuʶn watawahːamuwaː ʔaanːa maaː tamijlu ʔilajhi nufuwsuhum min aːlʔaamwaaːli aːlmuqtanaaːai aːlʔafʕaːl ʔablʁ mn aːlʔaqwaːl walilːahi d͡ʒunwdu aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wakaːna aːllːahu ʕazjzanaː ħakjmanaː saːmj hw mn tsbːb bðlk aːlħml ruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla junaaːdij munaaːdin jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waħukija ʔaanːa sulajmaaːna bna daaːwud ʕalajhimaaː aːlsːalaaːmu fakun ʔaanta aːlmuʕtaðiru ʕanhu biʶsˤaʶfħiʶk waʶaʶːlˤmuʶtaʶnaʶsˤːiʶlˤuʶ lahu biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶk waqaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu liaːbnihi aːlħasani fij waʶsˤiʶjːaʶtiʶhiʶ lahu aːlʕaːql laː jstqbl aːlnʕma bbtˤrˤ wlaː jwdʕhaː bd͡ʒzʕ waaːlmubaðːiru juʶχtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fij aːld͡ʒahli ðˤlˤ jrˤkdˤ walaaː jaʕrif tˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː walaaː ʕaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː saːmj ʕljh aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔakθr ʔaldjk btˤaʶːqaʶ ʔiʔitmaːn ʔaafaman jamʃj mukibːanaː ʕalaː wad͡ʒhihi quwːaaan min qarjatika aːlːatj ʔaaχrad͡ʒatka ʔaahlaknaːhum falaː naʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶ lahum ʔajmknk msaːʕdtj kaaːna ʔaawlaaː ʔaan jad͡ʒuwda bimaaː χarad͡ʒa ʕan jadihi faʶtˤaʶaʶːbaʶ nafsanaː bifiraaːqihi laː jrjd saːmj aːʕtnaːq aːlʔislaːm aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶ fawqa aːlʃːad͡ʒaraai maː hw ʔaʶfdˤlˤ tˤʕaʶːmk aːlχfjf aːktʃf saːmj ʃjʔiaː mqlqaː aːstmʕ saːmj lltːsd͡ʒjl w smʕ sˤwt rd͡ʒl fj aːlχlfjːa θumːa ʔiinːahum lˤaʶsˤaʶːlˤuʶw aːld͡ʒaħjmi aːlktaːb mktwb bʔind͡ʒljzja bsjtˤaʶ lðaː qraːʔth shla saːmj mdrːsnaː fj rˤqsˤ aːlhjbhwb kamaaː kataba aːlħasanu aʶːlˤbaʶsˤrˤiʶjːuʶ ʔilaaː ʕumara bni ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː waʔiin ʕadala aːlrːafijʕu ʔilaaː zijːi aːldːanijʔi kaaːna mahaaːnaaan waðulːanaː faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ kaʶdˤaʶrˤiʶjrˤiʶn jaruwmu taʕalːuma aːlkitaaːbaai zaːd aːltːfaːhm bjnhmaː fanaʕuwðu biaːallːahi min aːlbaʁji waʶmaʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶʕiʶhiʶ waʶaʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ wamakaaːʔiidihi wahuwa ħasbunaaː waʕalajhi tawakːulunaaː tlqːaː saːmj aʶːtːsˤaʶːlˤaʶː ʁrjbaː mn ʃχsˤ lm jtʕrːf ʕljh walakum fjhaː manaːfiʕu walitabluʁwaː ʕalajhaː ħaːd͡ʒaaan fj sˤuʶdwrˤiʶkuʶm waʕalajhaː waʕalaaː aːlfulki tuħmalwna tlqːt ljlaː ħkmaː baːlsːd͡ʒn aːlmʔubːd hðaː maː twʕadwna lijawmi aːlħisaːbi aːlnːaaːsu kaʃad͡ʒaraain ðaaːti d͡ʒananaː wajuwʃiku ʔaan jaʕuwduwaː kaʃad͡ʒaraain ðaaːti ʃawkin ʔin naaːqadtahum naaːqaduwka hl ʔanti aːbna saːmj waħukija ʔaanːa muʕaaːwijaaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu saʔaala ʕumara ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla wamin ʔaːjaːtihi manaːmukum biaːllːajli waaːlnːahaːri waaːbtiʁaːʔuukum min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinːa fj ðlika laʔaːjaːtin liqawmin jasmaʕwna kamaaː qaaːla ʕabdu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶmaʶdiʶ bnu aːlmuʕadːali liʔaabij tamːaaːmin aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjːiʶ wahaðaaː ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːlanaː min aːlnːawʕajni aːlʔaawːalijna ʔahlaːan kjf ħaːlk kʃf ʕn ħbh ln ʔaχsr kaðːabat θamwdu waʕaːdun biaːlqaːriʕaai waqad qijla aːlʕad͡ʒabu liʁaflaai aːlħusːaaːdi ʕan salaaːmaai aːlʔaad͡ʒsaaːdi kaːn saːmj ʕlaː χtˤʔaʶ saːmj ħqːaː ʔaħmq kθra aːlʕtaːb tfrq aːlʔaħbaːb waʔaaχbaaːri aːlquruwni aːlχaaːlijaai faljusʕid aʶːlˤnːuʶtˤquʶ ʔin lam tusʕad aːlħaaːlu waʔiin kaaːna laaː jaraaːhaaː d͡ʒwla aʶːlˤbaʶːtˤlˤ saːʕa wd͡ʒwla aːlħq ʔilaː qjaːm aːlsaːʕa wabariʔiuwaː min ʕajbihi wataħtamilu min aʶːlˤdˤːuʶrˤːiʶ maaː aːħtamalat lqd wrˤːtˤt nfsk fj mʃkl χtˤjrˤ ʔaʕlm maːðaː fʕl twm bmaːrj rawaaː ʔaabuw ʔidrijsa aːlχawlaaːnijːu ʔaaħbabtu ħubːa aːlχajri ʕan ðikri rabːij jaʕnij aːlmaaːla hl ʔant mtʔakːd mn ʔanːnaː lm ntqaːbl qbl aːljwm sʔaðhb lˤaʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb saːmj mn mnzl ljlaː faʔaamːaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlbaðlu waʶaʶːlˤʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕan suʔuaaːlin faʶʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤuʶhuʶ muʕtabaraaun min wad͡ʒhajni wamaʕnaaː qawlihi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama muhraaun maʔamuwraaun ʔaaj kaθijraau aːlnːasli faʔiin ʔaaʁnathu aːliaːstiʕaaːnaau biaːld͡ʒaaːhi ʕan aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai biaːlmaaːli fasalaːmun laka min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ aːljamjni sʔalt aʶːlˤmmrˤːdˤaʶːt aːlʔaχrjaːt lknːhn lm jtmkːnː mn ʔijd͡ʒaːdhaː qaːla naʕam waʔiinːakum ʔiiðanaː lamina aːlmuqarːabjna faʔiinːamaː hija zad͡ʒraaun waːħidaaun faʔiiðaː hum jaʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ wajaʕbudwna min dwni aːllːahi maː laː janfaʕuhum walaː jaʶdˤuʶrˤːuʶhuʶm wakaːna aːlkaːfiru ʕalaː rabːihi ðˤaʶhjrˤaʶnaʶː waʔiið qad waʶdˤaʶħaʶ aːlqawlu fij ʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaaːdːi wad͡ʒihaaːti aːlkasbi waruwija ʕan ʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu ʔaanːahu qaaːla aːntqlwaː ʔilaː hnaː man kaaːna lahu bajtun waχaaːdimun fahuwa malikun aːlrʔuaː qd tdfʕnj lld͡ʒnwn rakiba ʔiibraaːhijmu aʶːlˤħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnaʶ kaːn saːmj fj sˤfːj liʔaanːahaaː qad tamnaʕu man faʕala maaː kaaːna mustakrahanaː aːlfaqri waʶbaʶtˤrˤiʶ aːlʁanijːi aːlːaðij balaʁa maaː laaː jabluʁuhu sˤaʶrˤiʶjħuʶ aːlsːuʔuaaːli waman aːltamasa aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa biaːlrːijaaːʔi aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda liʔaanːa aːlkufra aʶːlˤtːaʶʁtˤiʶjaʶaʶuʶ maː mstwaːk fj aːllʁa aːlʕrbja wabihi nazala aːlkitaaːbu wad͡ʒaaːʔat aːlsːunːaau waʁanaaːʔiimi ʔimkaaːnihi nħn nsaːmħ aːlχjaːna lkn laː nnsaːhaː walaʔiin tuʶsˤiʶbkaʶ muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ lahaaː ʕaʶðˤuʶmaʶt muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶ mubtalin laaː jaʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ waqaaːla ʔaːχaru waaːstuʕd͡ʒima d͡ʒawaaːbuhu falam jud͡ʒibhum maːðaː nsjt walaaː sabijla ʔilaaː ʔiʶtˤrˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ wamutaaːrakatihi lm jrd saːmj qdˤaʶːʔ wqt fj aːlsːd͡ʒn waʔiibraːhjma ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi aːʕbuduwaː aːllːaha waaːtːaqwhu ðlikum χajrun lakum ʔiin kuntum taʕlamwna jħbː saːmj aːlqjaːm bhðaː dχl aːlmdrːs ʔilaː aːlqsm walajsa bisababin ʔaan jafʕala ðalika liʁajri maaː sababin waʔiinːamaaː hija sad͡ʒijːaaun qad fuʶtˤiʶrˤaʶ ʕalajhaaː kaːn saːmj jsbħ fj msbħh waʔaanʃadt liʔaabij aːlfatħi aːlbustijːi waʔaːχiruhaaː χizjun jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː maaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶk ʔinːa ðalika min ʕazmi aːlʔaumuwri tqwl ʁraːʔib laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafhm wajuqaaːbila dawaaːʕija ʃirːatihi biħazmihi fajarudːuhaaː d͡ʒazaːʔan wifaːqanaː ʔiðaaː maaː kunta ðaaː bawlin sˤaʶħiʶjħiʶn ʔaalaaː faʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb bihi wad͡ʒha aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbiʶjbiʶ waliðalika ʕilːataaːni ʔaʶsˤnʕ mn dwd aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdrˤiʶ ʔaaħtarimu aːlmuʕalːima saːmj aʶːsˤtˤħbaʶːh waːldjh ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj aːlmʕlːm aːlrːwħj lljlaː waʔaaqjmuwaː aːlwazna biʶaʶːlˤqiʶstˤiʶ walaː tuχsiruwaː aːlmjzaːna qad ʔaaflaħa man tazakːaː biaːlsːijraai aːlʕaaːdilaai juqharu aːlmuʕaaːdij ʕani aːlmud͡ʒrimjna wamaaː faʶdˤaʶlˤaʶ ʕan miqdaaːri aːliaːħtimaaːli limaːðaː kaðabta hal jaʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ ʔiilːaaː aːlsːaːʕaaa ʔaan taʔatijahum baʁtaaan aːldːwaːʔ lljlaː qaːm saːmj bmaː tˤlˤbth mnh ljlaː ʔinːa aːlrːad͡ʒula lajadχulu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤsːuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ wamaʕahu dijnuhu fajaχrud͡ʒu wamaaː maʕahu dijnuhu nuqil saːmj ʔilaː mstʃfaː msˤrˤj ʔiið baʶːhdˤaʶː lljlaː hw fj mwqf aːlsːjːaːraːt lm jqm saːmj bʔajː ʃjʔ kj jstħqː ðlk walaaː taʔanaf min aːliaːstirʃaaːdi ðˤnnt twm mjːtaː aːχtfaː saːmj θaːnjaan wajaː qawmi maː lj ʔaadʕwkum ʔiilaaː ʕanhum wahum fjhi mubliswna jaʕnij ħasada ʔiblijsa liʔaːdama ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu waʔaawːalu ðanbin ʕuʶsˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu bihi fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ qjla aːdχuli aːld͡ʒanːaaa qaːla jaː lajta qawmj jaʕlamwna ʕad͡ʒibtu liman d͡ʒaraaː fij mad͡ʒraaː aːlbawli marːatajni kajfa jatakabːaru ʔaam jurjdwna kajdanaː faaːlːaðjna kafarwaː humu aːlmakjdwna kaːn aːlksaːd aːlkbjr aʶːlˤʕsˤrˤ aːlðːhbj zilzaːlahaː waħaðaranaː min aːstiħqaaːqi aːlðːamːi waaːlʕiqaaːbi aʶːlˤtˤbjb ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd aːlʔaːn llʔasf walaaː liman wuʶsˤiʶmaʶ bihi χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn walaaː miqdaaːrun ʔiðaː rklk mn χlfk fʔiʕlm ʔank fj aːlmqdma tarʁijbuhaaː fij aːlħalaaːli ʕiʶwaʶdˤaʶnaʶː sirːuk ʔaasijruk faʔiin takalːamt bihi sˤiʶrˤt ʔaasijrahu ʔaan juχfijahu ħatːaaː laaː jantaʃira fijhi maʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕuʶ aːlsːufahaaːʔi faʶjaʶtaʶwaʶsˤːaʶlˤuʶwnaʶ ʔilaaː aːd͡ʒtiðaaːbihi bisabːihi falaaː jad͡ʒidu sˤiʶdqaʶnaʶː juʕðabu walaaː ħadijθanaː juʶstaʶðˤrˤaʶfuʶ wafasaaːdu rawijːatihi waʔiið qad maʶdˤaʶaʶː aːlkalaaːmu fij aːlmaʔakuwli waaːlmaʃruwbi fajanbaʁij ʔad͡ʒraː saːmj bʕdˤ aːltːħqjqaːt ʕn ljlaː waaːʕlam ʔaanːa min aːlʔaasraaːri maaː laaː justaʁnaaː fijhi ʕan muʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn musaaːhimin aːlskrtjra mtʕba mn aʶːlˤtˤbaʶːʕaʶ wahuwa jaquwlu fħsˤ saːmj d͡ʒrħ ljlaː ʔaqwm baːltmaːrjn aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶ lˤʔaʶħaʶːfðˤ ʕlaː sˤħtj saːmj jstħqː ʕtˤlˤaʶ qsˤjrˤaʶ aʶːsˤnaʶʕ aːlχajra ʕinda ʔimkaaːnihi jabqaaː lak ħamduhu ʕinda zawaaːlihi waʔiin jukaðːibwka faqad kaðːaba aːlːaðjna min qablihim d͡ʒaːʔathum rusuluhum biaːlbajːinaːti wabiaːlzːuburi wabiaːlkitaːbi aːlmunjri sˤrˤχt ʕlaː aːlmdrːsa kaːnt rsaːla saːmj mljʔia baːltːðmːr waʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶaʶːlˤːaʶaʶaʶ laaː tutraku liðilːaai waaːd͡ʒidihaaː maaː lak waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʔinːamaaː ʔaanta baʃarun ʔaaqalːu maaː jad͡ʒibu lilmunʕimi biħaqːi niʕmatihi ʔaan laaː jaʶtaʶwaʶsˤːaʶlˤaʶ bihaaː ʔilaaː maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶtiʶhiʶ χð ħbtjn bʕd aːlʔakl ʔinː tˤlˤaʶːq saːmj sjklːfh aːlkθjr wataħðijruhaaː maaː ħaðːara min maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶtiʶhiʶ ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ aːlnːahimu maʶrˤiʶjdˤaʶnaʶː hnaːk swq kbjra llqhwa ʕlaː saːmj aːlaːstqaːla ʔard͡ʒwki saːmħjnaː waʶsˤuʶhaʶjbuʶn saaːbiqu aːlrːuwma kaːnt ljlaː tʕjʃ ħjaːa raːʔiʕa walakin ʔaan jakuwna lilnːafsi ʁaluwbanaː tʕaːl w fatakuwnu suruwranaː liman waʶsˤaʶlˤaʶthuʶ waħuznanaː liman faaːraqathu aːlʕlm kaːlsraːd͡ʒ mn mr bh aːqtbs mnh ʔaamarahu bimuʃaaːwaratihim lijastanːa bihi aːlmuslimuwna wajatbaʕahu fijhaaː aːlmuʔuminuwna waʔiin kaaːna ʕan maʃuwratihim ʁanijːanaː waaːlʔaːχaru ʔinːamaaː huwa sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ kadːin waʔaːlaau mihnaain waman ʔauʁfila taʔadijbuhu fij aʶːlˤsˤːiʶʁaʶrˤiʶ kaaːna taʔadijbuhu fij aːlkibari ʕasijranaː ʔaadːi aːlʔaamaaːnaaa ʔilaaː man aːʔitamanak walaaː taχun man χaaːnak ʕljː ʔan ʔatklːma mʕh baːʕ krmh waːʃtraː mʕsˤrˤaʶ aːstdaːr aːlmdrːs ħmːaːmk d͡ʒaːhz ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː sˤdfaʶ ʔijːaːk ʔan ttħrːk mn mkaːnk faʔiin sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕaʶnaʶː waʔiilːaaː aːħtamala hamːaaː laaːzimanaː waʶsˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ kaaːrihanaː ʔaːθimanaː wakafːuhu ʕan musaaːʕadatihaaː waman kaaːnat wilaaːjatuhu duwna qudraain taʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶ lahaaː waman bariʔia min aːlkibri naaːla aːlkaraaːmaaa sʔalnj twm ʔin knt ʔaʕrf ʔajn kaːnt tʕjʃ maːrj aːibqa haːdʔiaːan ʕnd ʃrħ aːldrs waʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ wamimːaː razaqnaːhum junfiqwna laː jhmː mn ʔajn ʔataː ʔaʶaʶjqaʶðˤaʶ aːlrːaʕdu aːlnːaaːʔiima qaːbl saːmj mslmjn mn bldaːn mχtlfa ʔilːaaː aːmtalaʔaat taraħanaː maʶħsˤuʶwrˤaʶnaʶː fij taqsijmin d͡ʒaaːmiʕin wahuwa janqasimu qismajni mrrnaː bsaːnt lwjs fj tˤrˤjqnaʶː ʔilaː njw ʔawrljnz ʔið lam jaʶħfaʶðˤ aːlħurmaaa wajastur aːlʕawraaa maː lakum laː taʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ waaːlsːaqfi aːlmarfwʕi maaː jasudːu d͡ʒawʕatak waqifwhum ʔiinːahum masʔiwlwna maaː ʔaamara aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː biʃajʔin ʔilːaaː waʔaaʕaaːna ʕalajhi θumːa taħawːalnaaː ʕanhaaː ʔilaaː ʔauχraaː faqalːat fijhaaː ʔaamwaaːlunaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶ min aːlkalaaːmi nawʕaaːni ʔiinːahumaː min ʕibaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminjna ðhbt ljlaː llmdrsa kj tsˤbħ mmrˤːdˤaʶ ðaːt ʃhaːda waʔiiðaaː aːustuʕinta faʔaaʕin waaːnʃaqːati aːlsːamaːʔu fahija jawmaʔiiðin waːhijaaun χajru aːlʔaumuwri ʔaʶaʶwsaʶaʶːtˤuʶhaʶaʶː ʔarslt aːlʕjaːda faːtwra ʔaχraː klmaː kθr aːlðbaːb haːn qtlh ʔiðaː knt tdrj ftlk msˤjbaʶ wʔin knt laː tdrj faʶːlˤmsˤjbaʶ ʔaʶʕðˤm d͡ʒaaːʔiiʕun rudːwhaː ʕalajːa faʶtˤaʶfiʶqaʶ masħanaː biaːlsːwqi waaːlʔaaʕnaːqi bʔis aːlʃʕaːr aːlħsd ʔanaː ʔaʶrˤkdˤ tbdw ktfaːħa ʔinː d͡ʒmaːl ljs qdːjsaː "baːlrːʁm mn ðlk ʔanaː ʔaθq bh" ðalika limaʕrifaai aːlʕulamaaːʔi bimanfaʕaai aːlmaaːli wad͡ʒahli aːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔi lˤiʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʕilmi lkaːn ʔamraː msljaː ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bnmtˤ aːlħjaːa fj aːlrːjf liʔaanːa nafʕa maaː siwaaː aːlmutaʕabːadaaːti muʶχtaʶsˤːuʶn biaːldːunjaaː aːlʕaaːd͡ʒilaai qaaːla rabiː ʔiiniːj wahana aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤmuʶ miniːj tˤaʶwaʶt aːlbintu aːlθːawba fasanujasːiruhu lilʕusraː walaqad ʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajka ʔaːjaaːtin bajːinaaːtin wamaaː jakfuru bihaaː ʔiilːaaː aːlfaaːsiquwna jaʶqtˤiʶfuʶ ʕalijːun aːlʔaazhaaːra ʃkraːan d͡ʒzjlaːan ʔastχdm aːlħaːswb lm jkn hnaːk dljl d͡ʒjnj ʕlaː aːlrːsaːla faqad rawaaː ʔaanasu bnu maaːlikin ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla limaaː fijhi min aːrtijaaːħi aːlnːafsi binajli ʃahawaaːtihaaː ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː mn aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ kaːn saːmj jχtˤːtˤ lʕmljːa aʶːχttˤaʶːf qaːlwaː naʕbudu ʔaʶaʶsˤnaʶːmaʶnaʶː faʶnaʶðˤaʶlˤːuʶ lahaː ʕaːkifjna walahu aːlħamdu fij aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʕaʃijːanaː waħjna tuʶðˤhiʶrˤwnaʶ waaːmtaːzuwaː aːljawma ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimwna jaqraʔau saʕijdun aːlkitaaːba waʶʔaʶaʶsˤʕuʶbuʶ markabanaː faʔiin ʔaaʃkala ʕalajhi ʔaamraaːni aːd͡ʒtanib ʔaaħabːahumaaː ʔilajhi fakaːna ʕaːqibatahumaː ʔaanːahumaː fij aːlnːaːri χaːlidajni fjhaː waðlika d͡ʒazaːʔu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶːlˤiʶmjnaʶ man qawija ʕalaaː nafsihi tanaaːhaaː fij aːlquwːaai kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁlˤjðˤ trk saːmj tlk aːlħjaːa χlfh ʔaʶðˤnː ʔanː hðaː aːlflm jstħqː aːlmʃaːhda mrːtjn biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ jutawaqːaʕu aːlfard͡ʒu waman judminu qarʕa baaːbin jalid͡ʒu waʔiin lam jaʶsˤiʶħːaʶ aːumtuhina laaː jakuwnu faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶn walaaː juʔuθira danijːanaː ʕalaaː ʃarijfin waʔaaqlaʕa ʕan saaːlifi zalalihi lijatimːa lahu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶ watastadijma lahu aːlsːaʕaaːdaau ʔaʁlqaː aːlʔabwaːb w aːlnːwaːfð aːntqlj ʔilaː hnaː hl ʔant d͡ʒdjd hnaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt waaːlʃːuʕaraːʔu jatːabiʕuhumu aːlʁaːwwna waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man kaθura ʃaʶtˤaʶtˤuʶhuʶ kaθura ʁaʶlˤaʶtˤuʶhuʶ qdˤaʶː saːmj maː tlaːhaː mn snwaːt jbnj ħjaːth aːltj kaːdt tnthj bsbb tlk aːlħaːdθa ʔinhm jqwlwn ʔanhm ln jmkθwaː wabaaːʕiθin jaħduwhu kaːnt qd bdʔat tðˤlˤm jʃkl aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ aːlθaːlθ nhaːja aːlbdaːja fj aːlktaːb twqf hnaːk waːqrʔa tʕljqaːt aːlnaːqd qdːm faʶːdˤlˤ ljlaː lraːmj kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ ljlaː dχlt ʔaχt saːmj aːlmstʃfaː ldjh aːld͡ʒnsjːa aːlʔawkraːnjːa warawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla saːmj ʔaqlːaːh waːldjh wamajla aːlnːufuwsi ʔilajhi kaːn ldaː saːmj d͡ʒhaːz tnsˤːt tħt mlaːbsh wasamiʕa aːbnu aːlrːuwmijːi rad͡ʒulanaː jaʶsˤiʶfuʶ rad͡ʒulanaː wajubaaːliʁu fij madħihi faʔaanʃaʔaa jaquwlu jarbaħu aːlsːaaːbiqu d͡ʒaaːʔiizaaan ʔaʶχtˤrˤ saːmj aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ aːn lm jkn aːlaːn, mtaː aːstmr χtˤaʶːbh lθlaːθa saːʕaːt aːlːaðj ʔaaħsana kulːa ʃajʔin χalaqahu wabadaʔaa χalqa aːlʔiinsaːni min tˤjniʶn faʔaaχaðahu aːllːahu nakaːla aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʔawlaː liʔaanːahaaː maħbuwbaaun tad͡ʒuwru ʔidlaaːlanaː wataʁurːu makranaː θumːa kalːaː sajaʕlamwna faʔaamːaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlwaqtu mutːasaʕanaː waaːlzːamaaːnu mumtadːanaː fataʕd͡ʒijlu aːlsːuʔuaaːli luʔumun waʶquʶnuʶwtˤuʶn d͡ʒmʕt fjdjwhaːt mqaːlb saːmj aːlmlaːjjn mn aːlnːqraːt ʔiinːaː ʔaanzalnaːhu fj lajlaain mubaːrakaain ʔiinːaː kunːaː munðirjna waaːllːajli ʔiiðaː sad͡ʒaː waaːlːaðjna ʔiiðaː ðukːirwaː biʔaːjaːti rabːihim lam jaχirːwaː ʕalajhaː sˤuʶmːaʶnaʶː waʕumjaːnanaː faqad taʕadːaaː ʕalaaː aːldːahri biʶʃaʶtˤaʶtˤiʶhiʶ fakaaːna haðaaː taʶfaʶdˤːuʶlˤaʶnaʶː minhu wataʔaalːufanaː ʔaʶħdˤrˤ saːmj sˤdjqaʶ mʕh kaːnt ʕnd ljlaː ʕlba mχfwq ħljb bðwq aːlfrwla faʔiiðaaː aːχtaaːra waʔaard͡ʒuw ʔaan juwafːaqa liliaːχtijaaːri lndʕuhm ʔilaː aːlʕʃaːʔ waman faqada aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbaʶ fij aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi aʶːlˤmuʶʁdˤiʶbaʶaʶiʶ ħatːaaː aːstawat ħaaːlataaːhu qabla aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːbiʶ wabaʕdahu lahum maː jaʃaːʔwna ʕinda rabːihim ðlika d͡ʒazaːʔu aːlmuħsinjna sˤuʶħuʶfiʶ ʔiibraːhjma wamwsaː aʶːntˤaʶlˤiʶqwaʶː ʔiilaː maː kuntum bihi tukaðːibwna kaːn zmjl saːmj fj aːlzːnzaːna mslmaː samiʕtu aʶːlˤnːaʶsˤiʶjħaʶaʶaʶ walakin juχmiduhaaː ʔaan laaː tad͡ʒida ħaʶtˤaʶbaʶnaʶː jtħrkwn mn mkaːn ʔilaː ʔaːχr lma jħdθ hðaː θaːnjaan ʔiinːa aːlmutːaqjna fj maqaːmin ʔaamjnin wdˤʕ aːlktaːb ʕlaː aːlrf limaaː fijhimaaː min ʔiʶsqaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlʃːukri waʔiilaaː aːlχawfi min taʶsˤdiʶjqiʶ aːltːuhami ʔaaqraba aːlħikami kaθraau maaːli aːlmajːiti tuʕazːij waraθatahu ʕanhu aːlħiðaːʔu d͡ʒadijdu nsjt klː maː jtʕlːq bdraːstj w ħlmj kj ʔaʶsˤbħ waʔiinːamaaː aːstad͡ʒaaːza sˤuʶhaʶjbuʶn ʔaan juʶʕaʶrˤːiʶdˤaʶ lirasuwli aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama biaːlmazħi fij d͡ʒawaaːbihi jħsn saːmj aːlsːbaːħa mθl ljlaː tqrjbaː wajufsiduwna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔauwlaaːʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna ʔinːa aːlnːafsa laʔaamːaaːraaun biaːlsːuwʔi kaːn saːmj jtmtːʕ baːlħjaːa waʔiiðaaː sˤaʶʁːaʶrˤtaʶhuʶ ʕaʶðˤːaʶmtaʶhuʶ waaːʕlam ʔaanːa biħasabi faʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʔiinsaaːni waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ aːlnːiʕmaai ʕalajhi jakuwnu ħasadu aːlnːaaːsi lahu watad͡ʒanːabuwaː aːlkaðiba waʔiin raʔaajtum ʔaanːa fijhi aːlnːad͡ʒaaːaa faʔiinːa fijhi aːlhalakaaa sttzwːd͡ʒjn w stnd͡ʒbjn aːlkθjr ðlika ʔaamru aːllːahi ʔaanzalahu ʔiilajkum waman jatːaqi aːllːaha jukafːir ʕanhu sajːiʔiaaːtihi waʶjuʶʕðˤiʶm lahu ʔaad͡ʒranaː wajarawnahu kaʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶdaʶaʶː ʔin radːa tarʁijbanaː qaranahu biaːllːijni waʶaʶːlˤlˤːuʶtˤfiʶ wabadaː lahum sajːiʔiaaːtu maː kasabwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna ðˤnː saːmj ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt sttˤlˤq ʕljh aːlnːaːr kaːn saːmj aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔilaː qjlaː slaːmaː slaːmaː lqd qtˤʕt ʔiʃaːra ħmraːʔ wllʔaːχra χjr lk mn aːlʔawlaː lqd ʔaʶuʶsˤbt baːlχjba waħukija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː qaaːla waʔaaʕraaːbijːun ħaʶaʶːdˤiʶrˤuʶn waːlqmr lqd tm qsˤf aʶːlˤmntˤqaʶ aʶːlˤmħjtˤaʶ hnaː lamaaː saaːra ʕanhu ʔanaː ħqaːan lstu d͡ʒaːʔiʕa maːrj ʔaʕdt kʕka dwn ʕlm ʔamhaː tʕjʃ ħraː ʔin lm jkn ʕndk smʕa tχsrhaː ʔinhu ʁaʶːdˤb mʕj ʃrb mnaːd limiθlihi ʔaabadanaː ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna hl trʁb fj tlqj rsaːla mn fdˤlˤk ʔanaː lm ʔara ʃjʔiaːan mθl hðaː faʔaamːaaː maaː kaaːna min ðaaːtihi fajatanawːaʕu nawʕajni wmaː jðkrwn ʔilaː ʔan jʃaːʔ aʶːdˤtˤrˤrˤt llmsjr ʔilaː aːlbjt tħt aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ rˤkdˤt lmsaːfa mjl ʔanaː bχjr w ʔant wjwm tqwm aːlsaːʕa jwmʔið jtfrqwn fʔin taːbwaː wʔaqaːmwaː aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wʔaːtwaː aːlzkaːa fʔiχwaːnkm fj aːldjn wnfsˤlˤ aːlʔaːjaːt lqwm jʕlmwn ʔinmaː ʔamrh ʔiðaː ʔaraːd ʃjʔiaː ʔan jqwl lh kn fjkwn fʔin ʕsˤwk fql ʔinj brjʔ mmaː tʕmlwn tlk aːlmrʔaa aːlʕd͡ʒwz tskn bmfrdhaː hl ldjk fkra ʕn sbb krh "twm" lj waaːlːaðijna hum ʕalaaː sˤaʶlˤaʶːtiʶhiʶm juʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ tðˤn ʔan jfʕl bhaː faːqra faðarhum jaʶχuʶwdˤuʶwaʶː wajalʕabuwaː ħatːaaː julaaːquwaː jawmahumu aːlːaðij juwʕaduwna tʕml aːlsjaːra baːlkhrbaːʔ fijhimaaː faaːkihaaun wanaχlun warumːaaːnun ʔawqfwaː aʶːlˤtsˤwjrˤ ql ʔarwnj aːlðjn ʔalħqtm bh ʃrkaːʔ klaː bl hw aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔaawːalu sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ haðihi aːlʔaumːaai biaːlzːuhdi waaːljaqijni fj ħlh w trħaːlh waaːlmuʔutafikaaa ʔaahwaaː wakaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː kiðːaaːbanaː lam janfaʕuwka ʔiilaːːa biʃajʔin qad katabahu aːllhu laka wad͡ʒaʕalahaaː kalimaaan baaːqijaaan fij biwud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʕaqli qaaːla biwud͡ʒuwbi baʕθaai aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi maːrj tqblt kl ʃjʔ bdwn tðmr maːðaː jʕnj hðaː ʔiinːahu jaʕlamu aːld͡ʒahra mina aːlqawli wajaʕlamu maaː taktumuwna tlk ʔaːjaːt sabʕuwna ðiraaːʕanaː faaːslukuwhu laː ttrkj sˤbjk jsˤrˤχ kaːn ʃd͡ʒaːʕaːan ħsˤlˤ ʔamsaːan ʔaʁrb ʃjʔ dʕwnaː nqsm aːlfaːtwra bʔarbʕa tˤrˤq waʔiiðaaː fahima aːlmaʕaaːnija saʶqaʶtˤaʶ ʕanhu kulfaau wjqwlwn mtaː hðaː aːlftħ ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn ldj ʔalm fj ðˤhrˤj hðaː blaːʁ llnaːs wljnðrwaː bh wljʕlmwaː ʔanmaː hw ʔilh waːħd wljðkr ʔawlw aːlʔalbaːb tstfjd ʃrktnaː mn aːlʔintrnt mʕdtaː tʔulmnj wmaː d͡ʒʕlnaːhm d͡ʒsdaː laː jʔaklwn aʶːlˤtˤʕaʶːm wmaː kaːnwaː χaːldjn ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː biaːlðːikri lamːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahum waʔiinːahu lakitaaːbun ʕazijzun ʔaʕrf aːlfrq bjn aʶːlˤbtˤ waːlʔiwz ʕlaː maːðaː jħtwj waqaaːla aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː laaː tasmaʕuwaː lihaðaaː aːlqurʔaːni waaːlʁawaː fijhi laʕalːakum taʁlibuwna aːlmstqbl baːlfʕl hnaː ʔinh fqtˤ ʁjr mwzʕ baːltsaːwj ʔinh mʃhwr d͡ʒdaː aːnaː ʕalaaː ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶhiʶ fij wud͡ʒuwdi ʔaaʕwaaːnin jaʶsˤlˤuʶħuʶwnaʶ lahu wlqd ʕlmnaː aːlmstqdmjn mnkm wlqd ʕlmnaː aːlmstʔaχrjn qaaːlat ʔiiħdaaːhumaaː jaaː ʔaabati aːstaʔad͡ʒirhu ʔiinːa χajra mani aːstaʔad͡ʒarta aːlqawijːu aːlʔaamijnu ʔalaː tʕtqd ʔan aːlwqt qd ħaːn ltstqr wlaː jħznk qwlhm ʔin aːlʕza llh d͡ʒmjʕaː hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm laː tsmʕ fjhaː laːʁja ʔanaː bχjr ʃkraː hlaː tfdˤlˤ ʔaħd lftħ ðw ʕlm walakin kaðːaba watawalːaaː fqwlaː lh qwlaː ljnaː lʕlh jtðkr ʔaw jχʃaː haðaaː jawmu aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ aːlːaðij kuntum bihi tukaðːibuwna ʔaafabihaðaaː aːlħadijθi ʔaantum mːudhinuwna aːlðjn ʔiðaː ʔaʶsˤaʶːbthm msˤjbaʶ qaːlwaː ʔinaː llh wʔinaː ʔiljh raːd͡ʒʕwn min aːlshl mʕrfa sbb ħbː aːlnaːs litwm bʔimkaːn bwb ʔan jtˤbχ ʔaldjk ʔaj dljl lhðaː aːllʁz ʔanaːdjh maːjk ʔaaʕadːa aːllːahu lahum faaːktubnaaː maʕa aːlʃːaaːhidijna ðhbat ʔilaː baːrjs sʔadχr aːlmzjd mn aːlmaːl ʔanta ħsˤlˤt ʕlaː hʔulaːʔ mn aːlħql liʔaanːa aːld͡ʒaaːhila jaraaː aːlʕilma takalːufanaː walawmanaː twqf ʕn mdˤaʶːjqaʶ ʔauχtk kl nfs ðaːʔiqa aːlmwt θm ʔiljnaː trd͡ʒʕwn maː aːsm hðaː aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤ baːlʔind͡ʒljzja bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlsmaːʔ waʶːlˤtˤaʶːrˤq wjwm tʃqq aːlsmaːʔ baːlʁmaːm wnzl aːlmlaːʔika tnzjlaː fqadim aːlθʕlb aːlmkːaːr wħaːwl ʔan jfhm sbb ʃd͡ʒaːrhmaː hl ʔamkm fj aːlmnzl ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːlsfr lwħdj wznwaː baʶːlˤqstˤaʶːs aːlmstqjm hw aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤwlˤ fj aʶːlˤsˤf aːlzwd͡ʒa aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶ χjr mn aːlmiħraːθ aːlðhbj aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ tħb aːlsmk ʔakθr mn aːllħm ln tsˤdːq maː qaːlth lj biaːʕtidaaːlin χuruwd͡ʒanaː ʕan aːlʕadli ʔilaaː maaː lajsa biʕadlin kaːn waːldaː lnkwln fqjrjn tˤwlˤ ħjaːthmaː wʔaʶħaʶːtˤt bh χtˤjʔiʶth fʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlnaːr hm fjhaː χaːldwn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːlʃms likulːi ʃajʔin fatraaun hðh ljst aːlmra aːltj fjhaː hðh aːld͡ʒmla wakaaːnat aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ ʔaaʃadːahum taʶqaʶaʶːtˤuʶʕaʶnaʶː wataʕaaːdijanaː falaaː julaaːmu bimalaaːmaai ʁajrihi ðalika aːljawmu aːlħaqːu faman ʃaaːʔa aːtːaχaða ʔiilaaː rabːihi maʔaːbanaː walaaː dijnakum ʔaabqajtum wlh aːld͡ʒwaːr minhu waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi aːldːunjaaː manaaːzilu faraaːħilun wanaaːzilun faʔiinːamaaː ʔaahlaka aːlːaðijna min qablikum kaθraau masaaːʔiilihim waːχtilaːafuhum ʕalaaː ʔaanbijaaːʔiihim waʔaad͡ʒalːa fij aːlnːufuwsi maʶwdˤiʶʕaʶnaʶː lm jsbq lnaː w ʔan rʔajnaː aːntħaːraː khðaː malʕuwnijna ʔaajnamaaː θuqifuwaː ʔauχiðuwaː waqutːiluwaː taqtijlanaː wd͡ʒħdwaː bhaː waːstjqnthaː ʔanfshm ðˤlˤmaʶː wʕlwaː faʶːnðˤrˤ kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmfsdjn laː ʔarjdk ʔan tqlq bʃʔanj msaːʔ aːlχjr kjf ħaːlk bʕd ʔan ʔanhjt ʕmlj χrd͡ʒt lʔatnzh ʕndj qtˤaʶːn waruwija ʕanhu ʔaanːahum banuw aːmraʔaaai aːlrːad͡ʒuli min ʁajrihi wmn jtˤʕ aːllh wrswlh wjχʃ aːllh wjtqh fʔawlʔik hm aːlfaːʔizwn wldt fj "flˤstˤjn aːlmħtlh" ʔiilːaaː aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶlˤːiʶjnaʶ wlʔin qtltm fj sbjl aːllh ʔaw mtm lmʁfra mn aːllh wrħma χjr mmaː jd͡ʒmʕwn ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja lʔiustaːðh hl aʶːsttˤʕt ħl aːlmʃkla mn aːld͡ʒmjl ʔan ʔakwn fj aːlmkaːn aːlmnaːsb lstu ʕaːd͡ʒzaː tˤlˤaʶːb aːlmdrsa aːlθaːnwja jðaːkrwn fj aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ ldjh maː laː jql ʕn θlaːθmʔia ktaːb dʕnaː nnhj aʶːlˤwðˤjfaʶ waqaaːla ʔaːχaru aːllːajlu waaːlnːahaaːru jaʕmalaaːni fijk faaːʕmal fijhimaaː wakajfa taʔaχuðuwnahu waqad ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶaʶː baʶʕdˤuʶkuʶm ʔiilaaː baʶʕdˤiʶn waʔaaχaðna minkum mijθaaːqanaː ʁaʶlˤiʶjðˤaʶnaʶː ʔaj fstaːn ʔanta tuʶfdˤiʶlˤ ʔakθr wabimiθli ðalika waʶsˤːaʶaʶː rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶhuʶ wlaː jsttˤjʕwn lhm nsˤrˤaʶː wlaː ʔanfshm jnsˤrˤwn ʔatðkr ʔanh sbq w ʔan rʔajthaː fj aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj mn saːʕd twm ʔilaː rbhaː naʶːðˤrˤaʶ naħnu naʶquʶsˤːuʶ ʕalajka nabaʔaahum biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːahum fitjaaun ʔaːmanuwaː birabːihim wazidnaaːhum hudanaː ʔið lajsa aːlwaaːħidu min aːlʔiiχwaaːni jumkinu aːliaːstiʕaaːnaau bihi fij kulːi ħaaːlin kun mħddaːan samiʕtu rswla aːllhi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama jqwlu: ʔiðaaː ʔaaχaðuwaː fij muʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ aʶːlˤχuʶsˤuʶwmiʶ ðˤaʶhaʶrˤaʶ kalaaːmuhum ljs ldjnaː khrbaːʔ ʔinhaː ʃd͡ʒaːʕa wʔin ʕaːqbtm fʕaːqbwaː bmθl maː ʕwqbtm bh wlʔin sˤbrˤtm lhw χjr lˤlˤsˤaʶːbrˤjn faːstmsk baːlðj ʔawħj ʔiljk ʔink ʕlaː sˤrˤaʶːtˤ mstqjm aːlmd͡ʒd lʔawkraːnjaː haaːruwna ʔaaχij maː ʔantm ʕljh bfaːtnjn waʔaanːa ʔiilaaː rabːika aːlmuntahaaː ʔanwaːʕ kθjra mn aːlħjwaːnaːt aːχtft mn aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ln jsjʔ lkm ʔaħd wjʕlmh aːlktaːb waːlħkma waːltwraːa waːlʔind͡ʒjl hj qdmt lj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤtˤʕaʶːm surqt mnj saːʕtj aːlbaːrħa lˤaʶːħðˤ wd͡ʒwda θqbin fj strth lknh ħaːwl td͡ʒaːhlh wlqd χlqnaː aːlʔinsaːn wnʕlm maː twsws bh nfsh wnħn ʔaqrb ʔiljh mn ħbl aːlwrjd ʔalm tkn ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm fkntm bhaː tkðbwn waʶaʶːlˤsˤːuʶbħiʶ ʔiiðaaː tanafːasa faʶaʶːtˤːaʶlˤaʶʕaʶ faraʔaːhu fij sawaaːʔi aːld͡ʒaħijmi waaːlʕamala fuʶrˤsˤaʶaʶaʶ faraaːʁik wʔiðaː rʔawk ʔin jtχðwnk ʔilaː hzwaː ʔahðaː aːlðj bʕθ aːllh rswlaː waaːlθːaaːnijaau ʔaan juʶqaʶsˤːiʶrˤaʶ fijhaaː juʕaðːibu man jaʃaaːʔu wajarħamu man jaʃaaːʔu waʔiilajhi tuqlabuwna naːqʃnaːh ʕn aʶːlˤχtˤaʶ ʔafʔant tsmʕ aʶːlˤsˤm ʔaw thdj aːlʕmj wmn kaːn fj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ mbjn nħn ʕlaː mʕrfa bʔahlh wʔiðaː twlaː sʕaː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ljfsd fjhaː wjhlk aːlħrθ waːlnsl waːllh laː jħb aːlfsaːd walaʕamrij ʔinːa aːlnːaaːsa ʕalaaː maaː waʶsˤaʶfaʶhuʶm laaː aːlʔiiχwaaːnu minhum jħb aːlʔaːnsaa smjθ d͡ʒmjʕu tˤlˤaʶːbhaʶː aːnaː fqtˤ aːfʕl maː bwsʕj faqad saaːwaaː aːltːaaːrikijna fij aːstiħqaaːqi aːlwaʕijdi tmnaː twm lw ʔanh lm jraː lm laː tdʕwnj ʔilaː tˤʕaʶːmk waʔaan laaː taʕluwaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːij ʔaːtijkum biʶsuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶn mubijnin hnaːk wrqa bjdˤaʶːʔ ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ faːstfthm ʔahm ʔaʃd χlqaː ʔam mn χlqnaː ʔinaː χlqnaːhm mn tˤjn laːzb lħsn aʶːlˤħðˤ kaːn hnaːk mħl " ʔarmaːnj " qrjbanaː mn aːlrwaːq aːlðj naːm fjh djmaː faʔaamːaaː aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔiiðaaː maaː aːbtalaaːhu rabːuhu faʔaakramahu wanaʕːamahu fajaquwlu rabːij ʔaakramani bχsˤwsˤ hðh aːlmsʔala ʔanaː rˤaʶːdˤ tmaːmaː ʔaaʔiinːakum lataʔatuwna aːlrːid͡ʒaaːla ʃahwaaan min duwni aːlnːisaaːʔi bal ʔaantum qawmun tad͡ʒhaluwna waʶaʶːlˤqaʶsˤduʶ fij aːlʁinaaː waaːlfaqri ldjhaː ʃʕr mtmwd͡ʒ bl kðbwaː baːlħq lmaː d͡ʒaːʔhm fhm fj ʔamr mrjd͡ʒ ʔiinːa jawma aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ mijqaaːtuhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna waʔiiðaaː aːlʕiʃaaːru ʕuʶtˤːiʶlˤaʶt waʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb lahum maθalanaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ aːlqarjaai ʔiið d͡ʒaaːʔahaaː aːlmursaluwna θm nnd͡ʒj rslnaː waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː kðlk ħqaː ʕljnaː nnd͡ʒ aːlmʔumnjn ʔinhu aːllaħm aːlðj jʔakulhu aʶːlˤtˤflˤ θm ʔaʁrqnaː aːlʔaːχrjn nʕm, aːnhaː tʔulm hl aʶːtsˤlˤ bj ʔaħd ʕndmaː knt fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ lqd twfj mnð θlaːθ snwaːt qum faʔaanðir maaː baqijt hl tʕrf kjf tstʕml aːlħaːswb dʕwnaː nχrd͡ʒ mn hnaː qbl ʔan jraːnaː twm ʔanaː twm whðh maːrj ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ sjfaː ʔaʕd ʔiljː zwd͡ʒj fakajfa ʔiiðaaː tawafːathumu aːlmalaaːʔiikaau jaʶdˤrˤiʶbuʶwnaʶ wud͡ʒuwhahum waʔaadbaaːrahum lm ʔark mnð snwaːt wmaː ʔadraːk maː aːlʕqba lχlq aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔakbr mn χlq aːlnaːs wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn waʔaanːa aːlfaaːsida aːlrːaʔaji muʶsˤaʶaʶːbuʶn lʕlnaː ntbʕ aːlsħra ʔin kaːnwaː hm aːlʁaːlbjn ʔalaː trʁb fj ʔinhaːʔ ʕʃaːʔik kaːn hnaːlk θlaːθa rd͡ʒaːl ħd͡ʒzt hðh aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ laː ʔabaːlj ʔin kaːn aːld͡ʒw baːrdaː nwʕaː maː laː jnbʁj ʔan tdχn ʕndmaː tʕml hkðaː tʕaːrfnaː wkjf tsˤbrˤ ʕlaː maː lm tħtˤ bh χbraː ʃkraːan lki ʕlaː ʔihtmaːmik frk aːld͡ʒrħ baːlmlħ faraaːʁa ʔiilaaː ʔaːlihatihim faqaaːla ʔaalaaː taʔakuluwna lnħtfl fajawmaʔiiðin laaː janfaʕu aːlːaðijna ðˤaʶlˤaʶmuʶwaʶː maʕðiratuhum walaaː hum justaʕtabuwna laː bʔas wlknnj mtʕb qljlaː kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː kulːihaaː faʔaaχaðnaaːhum ʔaaχða ʕazijzin muqtadirin hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbraːntw sˤaʶːrˤt ʕjwnuki ʔalħaːnaːan lʔaʁnjtj waqad qaaːla zuhajrun ndfʕu aːlrːdaaː nsˤduʶː mn ʕdaː kaaːnuwaː qalijlanaː mina aːllːajli maaː jahd͡ʒaʕuwna wamaaː lija laaː ʔaaʕbudu aːlːaðij faʶtˤaʶrˤaʶniʶj waʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna tzwd͡ʒt rd͡ʒlaːan ʕd͡ʒwzaːan wθrjaːan twnj jlʕb ʔanaː ʔaːsf, ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʔanhu lm jkn jnbʁj ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː ʔinthaː aːlʔamr ʕlaː χjr hl hðh aːltrd͡ʒma sˤħjħaʶ aːlːaðij kaðːaba watawalːaaː wʁdwaː ʕlaː ħrd qaːdrjn laː ʔaʕlm ʔajn ʔanaː ʔanaː laː ʔaskn fj hðh aːlmdjna ʕʃt fj aʶːlˤʔaʶwtˤaʶːn llـʕlـaː ʕnwaːn ʔaʔantm ʔaʃd χlqaː ʔam aːlsmaːʔ bnaːhaː waʔaabʕaduhaaː aːstiχraaːd͡ʒanaː hw jtd͡ʒnb msˤaʶːħbaʶ hðh aːlsjdaːt wʔanh lmaː qaːm ʕbd aːllh jdʕwh kaːdwaː jkwnwn ʕljh lbdaː ʔaamːaaː tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi faʔiinːahu jazdaaːdu lilrːaħmani rˤiʶdˤaʶnaʶː wabiħasabi aːlrːaaːħaai jakuwnu aːltːaʕabu aːtːbʕ tʕljmaːt aʶːlˤmmrˤdˤaʶ mn fdˤlˤk qbrhaː hnaːk wʔilhkm ʔilh waːħd laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ql ʔinj ʔamrt ʔan ʔaʕbd aːllh mχlˤsˤaʶː lh aːldjn faʔaanta ʕanhu talahːaaː jwm jkwn aːlnaːs kaːlfraːʃ aːlmbθwθ wlqd sˤdq ʕljhm ʔibljs ðˤnh faːtbʕwh ʔilaː frjqaː mn aːlmʔumnjn kaθjr mn aːlrid͡ʒaːl, kθjr mn aːlʕqwl kjf kaːnt aːlmqaːbla jħtrq aːlχʃb bshwla ldjh sjaːraːtaːn ʔiħdaːhmaː d͡ʒdjda w aːlʔaχraː qdjma warabːuka jaχluqu maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajaχtaaːru maaː kaaːna lahumu aːlχijaraau subħaaːna aːllːahi wataʕaaːlaaː ʕamːaaː juʃrikuwna ʔaʕrf rd͡ʒlaː jħsn tklm aːlrwsja aːlʔaraːnb tħb ʔakl aːld͡ʒzr waman qaʕada ʕanhaaː ʔaatathu laː ʔaħd mn zmlaːʔij jʕjʃwn baːlqrb mn hnaː lst mʕtaːdaː ʕlaː mʃj msaːfaːt tˤwjlˤaʶ aːlmʃkla ʔanhm laː jmlkwn maːlaː aʶːtsˤlˤt btwm waʔaajːuwba ʔiið naaːdaaː rabːahu ʔaanːij masːanija aʶːlˤdˤːuʶrˤːuʶ waʔaanta ʔaarħamu aːlrːaaːħimijna baːjaː qaːmt bʕml ħaːd͡ʒbjhaː waʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilaaː muwsaaː ʔaan ʔaalqi ʕaʶsˤaʶaʶːkaʶ faʔiiðaaː hija talqafu maaː jaʔafikuwna hl trjdnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔan ħukija ʔaanːa baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi raʔaaaː ʃajχanaː kabijranaː juħibːu aʶːlˤnːaʶðˤaʶrˤaʶ fij aːlʕilmi wajastaħij faqaaːla lahu qlnaː jaː naːr kwnj brdaː wslaːmaː ʕlaː ʔibraːhjm twm qaːdmun ʔilaː mdrstnaː ʁdaːan hðaː qlm rˤsˤaʶːsˤ aːlħjaːa d͡ʒmjla ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjd ʔan tʔakl famaaː zaaːlat tilka daʕwaaːhum ħatːaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum ħaʶsˤiʶjdaʶnaʶː χaaːmidijna ʔinaː ʔanzlnaː ʔiljk aːlktaːb baːlħq faːʕbd aːllh mχlˤsˤaʶː lh aːldjn bχjl aːlʃtaːʔ waʶːlˤsˤjf waqad qijla wħmjm wqd zaːd ʕdd d͡ʒraːʔim aːlqtl twm daːʔimaː maː jrtdj rˤbtˤaʶ ʕnq ʔilaː aːlʕml fjmaː ʕdaː jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa ʔanaː qd tʕlmt ʔan ʔaktb baːlʔabd͡ʒdja ljs hnaːk mkaːn llaːχtbaːʔ km hðaː raːʔiʕ laː tqlq bʃʔan ðlk, ʔanaː sʔaðhb bnfsj kjf ʔaʃʕl twm aːlnaːr kl aːbn ʔaːdm χtˤaʶːːʔ fj d͡ʒzrnaː aːlqmrja ʔiinːaaː kaðalika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʕani aːlmud͡ʒrimijna aːʕðrnj ʕlaː aːltʔaχjr qaːl rb aːlmʃrq waːlmʁrb wmaː bjnhmaː ʔin kntm tʕqlwn ʔanhjt qraːʔa aːlktaːb aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ laː ʔaʶðˤnh mnaːsbaː lhðaː aːlʕml laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔatħml ʔakθr mn hðaː mʕ mzjd mn aʶːlˤʕtˤʃ waːlʔalm ʔaajna raħmaau aːllːahi qaaːla aːftħ aːlχzaːna ʕlaː jsaːrk std͡ʒd aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒaːt hnaːk aːndlʕ ħrjq aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ wd͡ʒaːʔt kl nfs mʕhaː saːʔiq wʃhjd waʔiin jakaaːdu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː lajuzliquwnaka biʶʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm lamːaaː samiʕuwaː aːlðːikra wajaquwluwna ʔiinːahu lamad͡ʒnuwnun walaaː tabluʁuwna maaː tahwuwna ʔilːaaː bitarki maaː taʃtahuwna lm ʔatʕmd d͡ʒrħhm qd aʶːsˤbħt ʔaan ʔalm jʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh jʕlm srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm wʔan aːllh ʕlaːm aːlʁjwb lqd lftt aːntbaːhj waʔaaslamak ʔaahluk waħaʃamuk aːlχbr aːlsʕjd hw ʔanh bʔimkaːnnaː msaːʕdtk klaːmh laː jtmaːʃaː mʕ ʔafʕaːlh sʕa aːlχzaːn χmswn d͡ʒaːlwnaːan ʔilaː ʔaj mħtˤaʶ stðhb sna mn qd ʔarslnaː qblk mn rslnaː wlaː td͡ʒd lsntnaː tħwjlaː wlw traː ʔið fzʕwaː flaː fwt wʔaχðwaː mn mkaːn qrjb jaː bnj aːlswdaːn hðaː rmzkm waaːlʕaaːqibaau liltːaqwaaː waʔaːtuwaː aːlnːisaaːʔa sˤaʶduʶqaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶnːaʶ niħlaaan faʔiin tˤiʶbnaʶ lakum ʕan ʃajʔin minhu nafsanaː fakuluwhu hanijʔianaː marijʔianaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʶsˤbħ tˤbjbaʶ ʔaw wataðaruwna aːlʔaːχiraaa ʔin kaːn ldjk maː tqwl fqulh ʔinːa haðihi dalaaːlaaun faaːsidaaun waʶʔaʶaʶʁtˤaʶʃaʶ lajlahaaː waʔaaχrad͡ʒa dˤuʶħaʶaʶːhaʶaʶː lqd aːdχrt maːʔih dwlaːr wmaː kaːn d͡ʒwaːb qwmh ʔilaː ʔan qaːlwaː ʔaχrd͡ʒwhm mn qrjtkm ʔinhm ʔanaːs jttˤhrˤwn aːlkl jʃaːhd krh aːlqdm ʔiin kulːu nafsin lːamːaaː ʕalajhaaː ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶn himːaau aːlsːufahaaːʔi aːlrːiwaaːjaau wahimːaau aːlʕulamaaːʔi aːlrːiʕaaːjaau hðaːn aːltwʔamaːn ldjhmaː wd͡ʒhaːn mtmaːθlaːn ʕjsaː rswl mn aːllh ʕinda aːliaːmtiħaaːni jukramu aːlmarʔu ʔaaw juhaaːnu faʔaamsaka ʕan d͡ʒawaaːbij faʔaad͡ʒmiʕuwaː kajdakum θumːa
