ʔaaʕwaza fijhi whw jχʃaː ʔaħb daːʔimaː ʔan ʔastmʕ llmwsjqaː aːlklaːsjkja ʕndmaː jkwn ldj wqt faːrʁ aːlðjn tˤʁwaʶː fj aːlblaːd lqd kaːn aːlrd͡ʒl aːlʔanaːnj mkrwhaː mn tˤrˤf zmlaːʔih qaaːluwaː ʔaanuʔuminu laka waaːtːabaʕaka aːlʔaarðaluwna aːlqnaːa aːlkubraː hj aːlmd͡ʒraː aːlmaːʔij aːlrʔijsj lmdjna aːlbndqja waaːʕlam ʔaanːa lilʔiinsaaːni fijmaaː kulːifa min ʕibaaːdaaːtihi θalaaːθa ʔaaħwaaːlin jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha waquwluwaː qawlanaː sadijdanaː twm lm jrd ʔan jrˤqsˤ mʕ maːrj hðh stkwn mhma χtˤjrˤaʶ d͡ʒdaːan waʔaanʃadt ʕan aːlrːabijʕi lilʃːaaːfiʕijːi rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔiinːaaː naħnu nariθu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ waman ʕalajhaaː waʔiilajnaaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna jħbː aːljaːbaːnjːwn ʔakl aːltwnaː ldjnaː mktba mdrsja d͡ʒmjla aːsmj saːlj tawaqːaf ʕan zijaaːraai kulːi jawmin ʔiðaaː ʔaakθart malːaka man tazuwru waqaaːla ʔaːχaru ʕndj θmaːnja ʔiχwa waʔaaqbala baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʕalaaː baʶʕdˤiʶn jatasaaːʔaluwna fʔaθaːbhm aːllh bmaː qaːlwaː d͡ʒnaːt td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː wðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ aːlmħsnjn ʕaaːlimu aːlʁajbi falaaː juʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶ ʕalaaː ʁajbihi ʔaaħadanaː wllh mlk aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waːllh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr waʔaafʕaaːlu aːlχajri taʶtaʶwaʶsːaʶtˤuʶ bajna raðijlatajni ʔanaː ʔafkr fjk tˤwaʶːlˤ aːljwm waaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlθːaaːliθu laaː juʶsˤaʶdːaʶʕuʶwnaʶ ʕanhaaː walaaː junzifuwna hl jmknk aːn tsaːʕdjnj fsbħ baːsm rbk aʶːlˤʕðˤjm aːld͡ʒmjʕ jmwt aʶːʕrˤdˤ lnaː baʶːχtsˤaʶːrˤ ħaːltk aːʃrb aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːʔ ħqaː jd͡ʒb ʔan nqwm bʃjʔ ħjaːl hðaː aːlʔamr rbmaː twm ldjhu ʃjʔiaːan lʔiχfaːʔih aːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʔiilːaaː mubaʃːiranaː wanaðijranaː lm ʔaʶsˤduʶq mʕk tmaːmaː qad ʔaaflaħa man zakːaaːhaaː wtwkl ʕlaː aːllh wkfaː baːllh wkjlaː aːnhjt ʕmlj aːljwm w mqr baːld͡ʒmjl twfjt ʔamj ʕndmaː knt sˤʁjrˤaʶː w sˤmwd ʃq llʔinsaːn drbh ʔatðkrnj ʔaanːahu kaaːna laaː jatruku aːlmarʔa mufrad͡ʒanaː ħatːaaː jaʶdˤuʶmːaʶhuʶ ʔilaaː qabijlaain jakuwnu fijhaaː fj hðaː aːlnaːdj χmswn ʕdˤwaʶː aːld͡ʒw baːrd hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ ʔinhaː sˤʁjrˤaʶ qaaːla lahum muwsaaː ʔaalquwaː maaː ʔaantum mulquwna wmaː ʔamrnaː ʔilaː waːħda klmħ baʶːlˤbsˤrˤ waqaaːla aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjːuʶ sʔad͡ʒʕlk sʕjdanaː ʔanaː aːltqjt frjd ʕlaː aːlʃaːrʕ blʁt snː aːlzwaːd͡ʒ aːlʔaːn hw ljs tˤbjbaʶː qtˤb twm ħaːd͡ʒbjh d͡ʒaːʔ aʶːlˤtˤaʶːlˤb mn lndn walam jaʕduhaaː ʔilaaː bidʕaain ʔanaː wd͡ʒdt aːlbnaːʔ famaaː tanfaʕuhum ʃafaaːʕaau aːlʃːaaːfiʕijna walajsa fij haðaaː aʶːlˤqaʶsˤdiʶ taʔaθijrun fij dijnin walaaː qadaħun fij muruwʔaain aːlkθjr mn aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ jnthj bhm aːlʔamr ʔilaː aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq swf ʔaʕaːwd aʶːlˤʔiʶtsˤaʶːlˤaʶ laːħqaːan twm laː jθq bmaːrj bʕd aːlʔaːn waaːtːaquwaː aːlːaðij ʔaamadːakum bimaaː taʕlamuwna twm mħsˤn lkn maːrj ljst kðlk jaʕnij ʔaanːa ħubːahu jaʶlˤtaʶsˤiʶquʶ biʶniʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlqalbi qaːl mwʕdkm jwm aːlzjna wʔan jħʃr aːlnaːs dˤħaʶː ʔin jsʔalkmwhaː fjħfkm tbχlwaː wjχrd͡ʒ ʔaʶdˤʁaʶːnkm bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlm ʔanaː ʔaħbːkm w ʕlaː ʔaʃlaːʔinaː nsˤnʕ md͡ʒdaː mlʕwnjn ʔajnmaː θqfwaː ʔaχðwaː wqtlwaː tqtjlaː waʶlˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔiinːakum lataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa maaː sabaqakum bihaaː min ʔaaħadin mina aːlʕaaːlamijna waman kaaːna naʶðˤaʶrˤuʶhuʶ fij ʁajri aːʕtibaaːrin faqad sahaaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔinaː ʔaʶʕtˤjnaʶːk aːlkwθr jrjd aːlklb lħmaː sjsaːʕdk hðaː aːlktaːb fj draːstk twm laː jsttˤjʕ aːlbqaːʔ tˤwjlˤaʶː flnbdʔa aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ hðaː nsˤ ʔind͡ʒjlj waqijla fij baʶʕdˤiʶ aʶːlˤmaʶwaʶaʶːʕiʶðˤiʶ qrrt ʔan ʔatrk aːlmdrsa aːlʕaaːlimi ʁarijbun waʔiiqlaaːlahu ʕad͡ʒijbun bima nilt haðaaː aːlʕilma qaaːla waʶʕaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤiʶ aːlʃːahawaaːti sʔaltnj ʔijmjlj sʔuaːlaːan hðh aːlʔaqsaːm ljst ʕaːzla lˤlˤsˤwt ħqanaː wlqd zjnaː aːlsmaːʔ aːldnjaː bmsˤaʶːbjħ wd͡ʒʕlnaːhaː rd͡ʒwmaː lˤlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn wʔaʕtdnaː lhm ʕðaːb aːlsʕjr hl ʔanta maːljzj jaː saːmj ʔaantum waʔaːbaaːʔuukumu aːlʔaaqdamuwna ʔiinːa ʕaðaaːba rabːihim ʁajru maʔamuwnin rabːi muwsaaː wahaaːruwna lm trd ʔan jbqaː hnaːk lmda ʔaʶtˤwlˤ rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔam jħsbwn ʔanaː laː nsmʕ srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm blaː wrslnaː ldjhm jktbwn hw jrd͡ʒʕ ʔilaː bjth waʕalaaː aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤtːaʶχsˤiʶjsˤiʶ dalijlanaː sʔabqaːa hnaː ʔilaː ʔan trd͡ʒʕ aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤwn aʶːlˤaʶːftrˤaʶːdˤj lˤlˤħaʶːsˤlˤjn ʕlaː aːlbaːkaːlwrjaː ʔiilːaaː raħmaaan minːaaː wamataaːʕanaː ʔiilaaː ħijnin kaːn saːmj bʃʕr md͡ʒʕd hl trjd qhwa walilʔaːχiri biaːlʔaawːali muzdad͡ʒaranaː maː aːlqaːrʕa ʔaldjk mn hðaː ʔalwaːn ʔaχraː walaw kaaːna maaː taʶdˤaʶmːaʶnaʶ haðajni aːlnːawʕajni bjnj wbjnk tˤrˤjqaʶ tfkjrh dˤħlˤaʶ wnaːdwaː jaː maːlk lˤjqdˤ ʕljnaː rbk qaːl ʔinkm maːkθwn hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbraːntw ħaːwl twm qtlj watuʕaaːnidu ʔaahlahu haðaaː aːlʕinaaːda mtaː tstjqðˤ kl jwm waqaaːluwaː ʔinːa aːlrːad͡ʒula ʔiðaaː ʔaakraha aːlmarʔaaaa wahija maðʕuwraaun θumːa ʔaaðukirat ʔaand͡ʒabat kiraaːmin bararaain hl tʕrf kjf tqwd sjaːra ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʶsˤbħ mʕlmaː mn aːlʁaːʔib kðbt ʕaːd fkjf kaːn ʕðaːbj wnðr aːnh lˤtˤjf sddt baːlnqd mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔalaː tχbraː ʔabaːkmaː baːlħaːdθ lqd trʕrʕ bʃda hðaː aːlmwqʕ mfjd d͡ʒdaː hw jstħiq ʔan jusd͡ʒan aːʕtraf baːlħqjqa fd͡ʒʔaaan bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːqtrb llnaːs ħsaːbhm whm fj ʁfla mʕrˤdˤwn ʔanaː ʔaʶʕaʶːrˤdˤ ʔistχdaːm aːlmwt kʕqwba, w ʔaʶʕaʶːrˤdˤ ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʔistχdaːmhu kmkaːfʔaa walilːahi maaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wakafaaː biaːllːahi wakijlanaː faaːlsːaaːbiqaaːti sabqanaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒħjm sʕrt faʔaaχaðahu ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai faqaaːla bħθt ʕn aːld͡ʒzaːʔir fj d͡ʒwd͡ʒl fqtˤ ʔawqf hðaː sʔaʶðˤlˤ bʕjdaːan ʕn drbk ʔanta qd trʁb fj aːltħduθ ʔilaː twm fij quluwbihim mːaʶrˤaʶdˤuʶn fazaaːdahumu aːllːahu maʶrˤaʶdˤaʶnaʶː walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakðibuwna ʕljnaː ʔibqaːʔ hðh aːlmʕlwmaːt fj tˤj aːlktmaːn fj aːlwqt aʶːlˤħaʶːdˤrˤ waʔaanʃada ʔaabuw aːlqaaːsimi aːlʔaːmidijːu θm ʔin ʕljnaː bjaːnh maː hj aːllʁa aːltj jtklmwnhaː fj aːlmksjk waːħll ʕqda mn lsaːnj ʔaʃk ʔannj sʔanhj hðaː aːljwm waaːlrːibħu χusraaːnanaː wʔin lk lʔad͡ʒraː ʁjr mmnwn dˤħk aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʕlaː d͡ʒaːk ʔinh ljs mnːaː hjaː nsˤnʕ td͡ʒaːra waaːnʃaqːati aːlsːamaaːʔ fahija jawmaʔiiðin waaːhijaaun aʶːlˤmtˤrˤqaʶ waːlmnd͡ʒl jrmzaːn llʃjwʕja tilka ʔiiðanaː qismaaun dˤiʶjzaʶaʶː nħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː sjaːra ʔafmaː nħn bmjtjn waaːlsːamaaːʔi ðaaːti aːlħubuki maː aːlðj traːhu fjh twd͡ʒd χtˤʔaʶ fj aːld͡ʒmla mnːaːd jħbː aːlʕhraːt sʔalathu wrdː binʕm hl ʔanta sˤdjqj waqaaːla aːlχalijlu bnu ʔaaħmada ʔan aːʕml saːbʁaːt wqdr fj aːlsrd waːʕmlwaː sˤaʶːlˤħaʶː ʔinj bmaː tʕmlwn bsˤjrˤ wʔawħjnaː ʔilaː mwsaː ʔan ʔasr bʕbaːdj ʔinkm mtbʕwn fðkr fmaː ʔant bnʕmt rbk bkaːhn wlaː md͡ʒnwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmaːn aːlrħjm faʶsˤlˤuʶn waʔaamːaaː aːlmuʔuaaːχaaːau biaːlmawadːaai fahal d͡ʒazajthaaː qaaːla laaː walaaː bizafraain waaːħidaain wql aːlħmd llh sjrjkm ʔaːjaːth ftʕrfwnhaː wmaː rbk bʁaːfl ʕmaː tlaːms aːlsmaːʔ ħdwd aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waʔiiðaaː quriʔia ʕalajhimu aːlqurʔaːnu laaː jasd͡ʒuduwna wzʕ ʕljnaː aːlwrq aːlsmaːʔ mnftˤrˤ bh kaːn wʕdh mfʕwlaː ʔiinːa fij ðalika laðikraaː liman kaaːna lahu qalbun ʔaaw ʔaalqaaː aːlsːamʕa wahuwa ʃahijdun ʔiinːa ʕaðaaːba rabːika lawaaːqiʕun aːstmrwaː bmkaːfħa aːlħrjq ʕlaː ħsaːb ħjaːthm kjf trjdh walaʔiin ʔaarsalnaaː rijħanaː faraʔaawhu muʶsˤfaʶrˤːaʶnaʶː hðaː aːld͡ʒsr hl trjd smkaːan maː χtˤbk aːlljla jaː twm jrsl aːlsmaːʔ ʕljkm mdraːraː twfj ʔabj qbl ʕaːmjn hðaː aːlktaːb ʔaħmr fj ħaːl tʕtˤlˤ brnaːmd͡ʒ mʕaːld͡ʒa aʶːlˤnsˤwsˤ ndˤmn lk tʕwjdˤh md͡ʒaːnaː biʔaajjikumu aːlmaftuwnu ʔanta aːnzl ʕn drːaːd͡ʒtj hl tqwmwn bʔiʕaːda aʶːlˤtsˤnjʕ hl hj mjta waθamaraau aːlqalbi aːlwaladu jmθl aʶːlˤaʶːnqrˤaʶːdˤ d͡ʒzʔaː mn aʶːlˤttˤwrˤ waʔaːχaru min ʃaklihi ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒun hkðaː sʔaʶdˤrˤb ʕsˤfwrˤjn bħd͡ʒr waːħd daːrwjn ʁjra kl ʃjʔ llaːsf jaː ʔamj ﺃʕtqd ðlk ʔaʶsˤbħ rʔijsaː llʃrka fj sn aːlθlaːθjn hn jstmʕn llmðjaːʕ ʔiinːahu ʕalaaː rad͡ʒʕihi laqaaːdirun ðhb lʃrb aːlbjra mʕ aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ʔinhaː lwrj kaːn aʶːlˤqrˤaʶːsˤnaʶ jsthdfwn aːlsfn aːltd͡ʒaːrja ʁjr aːlmslħa aːθnj rkbtjk ʔink tχjfnj fj bʕdˤ aːlʔaħjaːn hl tʕtqd aːn twm jfʕl hðaː aːlʔan tqbl mnj ʔaʶtˤjb aːltħjaːt wbnjn ʃhwdaː wamaaː tilka bijamijnika jaaː muwsaaː tbdw mtʕbaː aːlrħmn ʕlaː aːlʕrʃ aːstwaː faaːdχulij fij ʕibaaːdij faːʃhdwaː faːʃhdwaː faːʃhdwaː ʔatnaːwl daːʔimaː kwbaː mn aːlħljb qbl ʔan ʔanaːm jasʔaaluwnaka ʕani aːlsːaaːʕaai ʔaajːaaːna mursaaːhaaː hl trjd ʔan tstmʕ ʔanaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fʕl hðaː liʔaanːahaaː maʶwdˤuʶwʕaʶaʶuʶn ʕalaaː aːltːaʁjijri waaːlfanaaːʔi waʔiiðaaː ʔaaʕsart tarakuwk wmaː ʔahlknaː mn qrja ʔilaː lhaː mnðrwn hl hj sˤdjqaʶ hl tʃaːrk fj hðh aːlfʕaːlja hum ħtaːa laː jʕrfwn mn sjltqwn walilzːuhdi fijhi tarkun kalːaaː sajaʕlamuwna ʔaʁlbja aːlfnaːdq mftwħa tˤwaʶːlˤ aːlʕaːm hðaː ħsˤaʶːn jmknk aːltdχjn hnaː wajusaaːwija aːlkabijra aːlmuntahij tħtfðˤ kjt bklb wmaː jʁnj ʕnh maːlh ʔiðaː trdaː ħaːwlt ʔan ʔansaːk ʃkraːan lki ʕlaː lˤtˤfkiʶ aːltqjt bmaːrj aːlbaːrħa mnːaːd jħaːwl ʃraːʔ mnzl aːlnaːs laː jmkn ʔan tʕjʃ ʔilaː aːlʔabd lm jkn twm aːkbrmn maːrj bkθjr ʔanaː ʔadːχr aːlmaːl lʃraːʔ sjaːra balaaː qaaːdirijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nusawːija banaaːnahu waaːlːaðij huwa juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶniʶj wajasqijni naːnsj tmlk bjaːnw aːlmdrs jtklm bhdwʔ aːsmj haːʃjmwtw fakajfa kaaːna ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri ʔanaː ħtaːa lstu mtʔakdaːan ʔin kaːn hðaː mftaːħj aːlχaːtm laː jdχl fj ʔiʶsˤbʕj fʃil bsbb qla aːlmaːl ħdjθun ħasanun rwaːh aːltːirmðjːu wʁjruh hkðaː kaːn mnaːd jnðˤf aːlbjt ljs mhmaː maː tqwlh bl maː tfʕlh ʔajmknk ʔan tʔatj lʔaχðj mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ man lam jaʶtːaʶʕiʶðˤ bimawti waladin ðawaaːtaaː ʔaafnaaːnin jusqawna min raħijqin maχtuwmin ʔaafalaaː jaʕlamu ʔiiðaaː buʕθira maaː fij aːlqubuwri bʔimkaːn d͡ʒaːk tħdθ aːlfrnsja ʃadjdu sawaːdi aːlʃːaʕri swf ʔaːtj ʁdaː mra ʔaχraː waːrtdaː md͡ʒd aʶːlˤħdˤaʶːrˤaʶːt wʃaːħaː tʕd͡ʒbnj aːllʁa aːljaːbaːnja kθjraː hðaː sjʔi ʔaːml ʔan jsttˤjʕ ʔan jʔatj ʔawd ʔan ʔaraːh ʔiinːahu min ʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaʕtnq aʶːlˤmstwtˤnwn aːldjaːna aːlmsjħjːaːa aːllʁa aːlʕrbja ljst sˤʕbaʶ wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːlnhaːr mʕaːʃaː aːbtsmt naːnsj bsʕaːda qjaːsaːt mqraːb haːbl aːldqjqa waːlʔad͡ʒhza aːlʔaχraː wmmn χlqnaː ʔama jhdwn baːlħq wbh jʕdlwn aːlklː ʕlaː maː juraːm wamaaː jastawij aːlʔaaʕmaaː waʶaʶːlˤbaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ hj trkthu jðhb sʔaʶntðˤrˤ fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ lm jbqa ʃjʔ fj aːlθlaːd͡ʒa aːlwaladu mabχalaaun mad͡ʒhalaaun bifaaːkihaain kaθijraain waʃaraaːbin laaː d͡ʒarama ʔaanːa aːllːaha jaʕlamu maaː jusirːuwna wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʔiinːahu laaː juħibːu aːlmustakbirijna waʔiilaaː aːld͡ʒibaaːli kajfa nuʶsˤiʶbaʶt aːlħjaːa ʔanaː ðhbt ʔilaː sjnmaː baːlʔams ftnaːzʕwaː ʔamrhm bjnhm wʔasrwaː aːlnd͡ʒwaː ʔiʶfħsˤ ðlk aːllːahu jaħkumu bajnakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai fijmaaː kuntum fijhi taχtalifuwna wmn χft mwaːzjnh fʔawlʔik sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶnaʶː d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaaw ʕaduwːanaː ʕaaːqilanaː jurijduwna ʔaan jaχrud͡ʒuwaː mina aːlnːaaːri wamaaː hum biχaaːrid͡ʒijna minhaaː walahum ʕaðaaːbun muqijmun wkaːn lh θmr fqaːl lˤsˤaʶːħbh whw ʃafratahu waljuriħ ðabijħatahu ʔiʶntðˤrˤ dqjqa, jaː twm tbrːʕa baːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl laː ʔaʶsˤdq ʔan ʕljː ʔaχð aːχtbaːr jwm aːlʔaħd km jwd͡ʒd mn sʔuaːl ʔinh jtħdθ aːlʔan mʕhaː wajaʕmalu fijhaaː ʕamala waqad ʕaʶsˤaʶjtaʶ qablu wakunta mina aːlmufsidijna ʔanaː fj qaːʕa aʶːlˤʔiʶntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔanaː mstʕda ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa waʔaamsaka min qawlihi wawasiʕathu aːlsːunːaau χð maː tʃaːʔ mn aːlwqt aʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa faʶdˤːaʶlˤnaʶaʶː baʶʕdˤaʶhuʶm ʕalaaː baʶʕdˤiʶn walalʔaːχiraau ʔaakbaru darad͡ʒaaːtin waʔaakbaru taʶfdˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lrħla aːltzld͡ʒ χaʶːsˤtnaʶː raːtbj laː jsmħ lnaː ʔan nʕjʃ brfaːhja aːlʔaːn ʔaʕrf kjf sʔaħaːrbk qaːl ʕlj ʕljh aːlslaːm: twʁr aːlqlwb w twħʃ aʶːlˤaʶːsˤħaʶːb ʔin fj ðlk lðkraː lmn kaːn lh qlb ʔaw ʔalqaː aːlsmʕ whw ʃhjd ʔanaː mʕd͡ʒbaun bmhaːrth fj aːlqjaːda faʔiiðaaː faraʁta faʶaʶːnsˤaʶb btlaːtun tttˤaʶːjrˤ fj aːlrjħ ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf kjfja aːstχdaːmhaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlnːaaːziʕaaːti ʁarqanaː ʔiinːa haðaaː lahuwa aːlbalaaːʔu aːlmubijnu nmr mftrs ʔamaːmk χjr mn χaːʔin wraːʔik ʕalajk biaːlʕilmi waaːlʔiikθaaːri minhu faʔiinːa qalijlahu ʔaaʃbahu ʃajʔin biqalijli aːlχajri dʕnj ʔaʶdˤjf aːlmaːʔ laː tqlq ʔanaː ldj tʔamjn maaːlanaː mamduwdanaː aːlðj χlqk fswaːk fʕdlk bdwn aːlmwsjqaː, aːlʕaːlm sjkwn kmaːn mumil wahaðihi aːlħaaːlaau ʔaaqwaaː min aːlːatij baʕdahaaː lˤiʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ aʶːlˤsˤːiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤuʶwbaʶaʶiʶ min ʁajri takalːufin lˤiʶtˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶhaʶaʶː lm ʔakn ʔatwqʕ ʔannj sʔabħθ jwmanaː maː ʕn " fjaːʁraː " fj wjkjbjdjaː ʕndmaː samiʕa aːlʔaχbaːr, tħwla ʃaːħbaːan θm d͡ʒʕlnaːk ʕlaː nbtljh fd͡ʒʕlnaːh smjʕaː bsˤjrˤaʶː wʔamaː aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔaflm tkn ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm faːstkbrtm wkntm qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn kitaaːbun ʔaunzila ʔiilajka falaaː jakun fij sˤaʶdrˤiʶkaʶ ħarad͡ʒun minhu litunðira bihi waðikraaː lilmuʔuminijna qtˤk laː jrjd ʔan jnzl mn mktbj waʔiinːa ʔaand͡ʒaba aːlnːisaaːʔi aːlfaruwku ʔauħibːu ʔaalaːː ʔaaqwma biʃajʔin χilaːla aʶːlˤʕuʶtˤlˤaʶiʶ wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː sid͡ʒːijnun sajaquwluwna lilːahi qul ʔaafalaaː tatːaquwna aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs jd͡ʒhlwn ʔan aʶːlˤmdˤaʶːdaʶːt aːlħjwja ljst ldjhaː tʔaθjr ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔaʶmrˤaʶːdˤ aːlfjrwsja tdχl fjmaː knt ʔaqwm bh fkðbwh fʕqrwhaː fdmdm ʕljhm rbhm bðnbhm fswaːhaː wahuwa bikulːi ʔaaħadin qabijħun wabiaːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔaaqbaħu maaː baʕaθa aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː min baʕdihi nabijːanaː ʔilːaaː fij θarwaain min qawmihi waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu masʕuwdin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu lijaʕlama ʔaan qad ʔaablaʁuwaː risaaːlaaːti rabːihim waʶʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶ bimaaː ladajhim waʶʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶː kulːa ʃajʔin ʕadadanaː ʔaaraaːhum biwud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʃːarʕi laː jsˤlˤaʶːhaʶː ʔilaː aːlʔaʃqaː kaːn mnːaːd mnd͡ʒðbaː ʔilaː klaː aːld͡ʒnsjn lm jd͡ʒd twm mftaːħh fj ʔaj mkaːn jʔatwk bkl sħaːr ʕljm ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf θlaːθa lʁaːt ʁtˤst fj aːlmsbħ ʔinhm jtd͡ʒaːhlwnnj χlq aːlʔinsaːn mn sˤlˤsˤaʶːlˤ kaːlfχaːr hðaː mwsm aʶːlˤbtˤjχ bismi aːllhi maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ wsjla lˤlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː mnzl twm mn hnaː ʔinhaː lʔiħdaː aːlkbr ʔin ʔaθql mnh bkθjr ʔanaː ʔabħθ ʕn mraːsla frnsja dʕwnaː fqtˤ nsˤbħ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aʶːntðˤrˤ χaːrd͡ʒ aːlbjt mn fdˤlˤk ʔarjd ʔan ʔatχrd͡ʒ aːlrbjʕ aːlqaːdm maːðaː tʕtqd aːlʔaːn hl stltqj bʔaħd hnaː faqaaːla ʕumaru rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu qaːla hal jasmaʕwnakum ʔiið tadʕwna waʔiinːa aʶːlˤtːaʶqsˤiʶjrˤaʶ fijhi jaʶfuʶdˤːuʶ ʕank aːlmuʔuaaːnisijna aːrtdaː saːmj mlaːbs nswjːa jaaː bunajːa ʔinːa aːlʔaːdaaːba mijraaːθu aːlʔaaʃraaːfi walastu ʔaaraaː ʕindak hrb aːlwld walikulːi ʃajʔin ʕimaaːdun waʕimaaːdu aːldːijni aːlfiqhu ʔinːhaː ʃaːbːa raːʔiʕa lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbt saːmj aːlfalːaaːħu lam jaħlub baqaratahu aːħtaːd͡ʒt ljlaː llʃːʕwr bʔanːhaː mħbwba faʔiiðaaː ʕad͡ʒːaltahu hanːaʔatahu km hðaː raːʔiʕ ʔaaħabːu aːlʕafaaːfi ʔilaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕafaaːfu aːlfard͡ʒi waʶaʶːlˤbaʶtˤniʶ hl nsjt aʶːlˤʔiʶmdˤaʶːʔ md͡ʒdːdaː twm ʁaʶːdˤb d͡ʒdaː mnj aːlʔaːn ħatːaaː ʔaaχaða ʕalaaː ʔaahli aːlʕilmi aːlʕahda ʔaan juʕalːimuwaː ʁnaː aːlnfs χjr mn ʁnaː aːlmaːl faqaaːla jaaː bunajːa maaː raʔaajtu maʶwʕuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː ʔaaħaqːa biʔaan jakuwna waʶaʶːʕiʶðˤaʶnaʶː mink bdʔa saːmj bdraːsa aːlʔislaːm min ħaqːi aːlʕaaːqili ʔaan juʶdˤiʶjfaʶ ʔilaaː raʔajihi ʔaːraaːʔa aːlʕuqalaaːʔi hal jusamːaaː aːldːaaːhijaau minhum ʕaaːqilanaː ʔaam aʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕuʶ qaːla nakːirwaː lahaː ʕarʃahaː naʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔaatahtadj ʔaam takwnu mina aːlːaðjna laː jahtadwna ln ʔans ʔabdaː maː ħdθ kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jrjd qdˤaʶːʔ wqt ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː ʕaːda maː tkrh aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ aːlklaːb χlʕ saːmj ħðaːʔh ħjla aːlʕaːd͡ʒz dmwʕh faʔaanʃadt lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ ʔaahli haðaaː aʶːlˤʕaʶsˤrˤiʶ wafij aːld͡ʒahli qabla aːlmawti mawtun liʔaahlihi faʔaad͡ʒsaaːmuhum lm ʔadrs maːda aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤlˤaʶːq jaaː aːbna ʔaaχij lajtanaaː taraknaaːk mastuwranaː θumːa fj silsilaain ðarʕuhaː sabʕwna ðiraːʕanaː faaːslukwhu ʔaraːdt ljlaː mʁaːdra aːlsjaːra kaːn ʕqaːbhm qaːsjanaː wlknh ʕaːdl lwθ ðlk aːlmaːʔ baːlzjt waʔiin aʶːuʶstuʶntˤiʶqaʶ taχalːafa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔu fijhi famaaː χalaqa aːllːahu raʔaajtuhum mawtaaː faʔiiðaaː ðˤaʶfiʶrˤaʶ aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːbuʶ biʔaaħadi haðihi aːlʔaasbaaːbi taχafːafat ʕanhu ʔaaħzaaːnuhu lˤiʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶwaʶː lahu baʕda aʶːlˤχuʶsˤuʶwmaʶaʶiʶ ʔaaʕwaaːnanaː walaː tad͡ʒʕalwaː maʕa aːllːahi ʔiilhanaː ʔaːχara ʔiinːj lakum minhu naðjrun mubjnun jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jtħdːθ mʕ aːlmdrːsa bʕd aːldːrs falijastaħij aːlmarʔu faʔiinːa aːlħajaaːʔa jardaʕuhu hl stmtˤrˤ aːljwm warubːamaaː kaaːna aːlkaðibu ʔaabʕada limaaː juʔuamːilu waʔaaqraba limaaː jaχaaːfu waaːlʔiiqlaaːʕu ʔaaħadu aːlʕuðrajni kaːn ʔanf maːrj jnzf waqaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu aːlnːaaːsu ʔaabnaaːʔu maaː juħsinuwna bdʔa saːmj jd͡ʒmʕ maːl aːlʔijd͡ʒaːr mn mstʔad͡ʒirjh saːmj ʕlaː mtn ħaːfla fakaðːabwhu faʕaqarwhaː fadamdama ʕalajhim rabːuhum biðanbihim fasawːaːhaː falam ʔaad͡ʒid aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʔilːaaː taχalːuqanaː walam ʔaad͡ʒid aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶ ʔilːaaː taʶfaʶdˤːuʶlˤaʶaʶː waminhaaː aːmʃ bʔasrʕ maː jmknk laː ttˤrˤd ʔaħdaː waʔiiðaː qjla lahumu aːtːaqwaː maː bajna ʔaajdjkum wamaː χalfakum laʕalːakum turħamwna waʕabda hawanaː laaː jantahij laː laː jmknk χaːlidjna fjhaː ʔaabadanaː laː jad͡ʒidwna walijːanaː walaː naʶsˤjrˤaʶnaʶː hl fhmt "lm ʔafhm btaːtaː" faqaraʔaahu ʕalajhim maː kaːnwaː bihi muʔuminjna qaraʔatu kitaaːbanaː mufijdanaː likulːi saʶaʶːqiʶtˤaʶaʶiʶn lˤaʶaʶːqiʶtˤaʶaʶiʶn waqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin huwa ʔinfaaːqu man laaː juwqinu biaːlχalafi ʔaatuʕlamu kaj ʔaaχduma aʶːlˤwaʶtˤaʶnaʶ kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh lm jrd saːmj ʔan jkwn lˤtˤjfaʶː mʕnaː kaʔaamθaːli aːllːuʔuluʔui aːlmaknwni ʔasrʕ mn aːlrjħ liʔaanːa likulːi maqaaːmin qawlanaː ʔiinːaka laː tahdj man ʔaaħbabta walkinːa aːllːaha jahdj man jaʃaːʔu wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadjna biʔaajːi ðanbin qutilat aːlaːwlmbjaːt tqaːm kl aːrbʕa snwaːt maː ktbt rsaːlaan aːld͡ʒbaːh aːlsmr bʃr wmħba waːlljl ʔiðaː sd͡ʒaː bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔaqrʔahaː klhaː kahuwa fij ʔaawːali ħaaːlin ʔauwlaʔiika juʔutawna ʔaad͡ʒrahum marːatajni bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤuʶwaʶː wajadraʔuwna biaːlħasanaai aːlsːajːiʔiaaa wamimːaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna baːltʔakjd waːlðjn jqwlwn rbnaː hb lnaː mn ʔazwaːd͡ʒnaː wðrjaːtnaː qra ʔaʕjn waːd͡ʒʕlnaː llmtqjn ʔimaːmaː watad͡ʒʕaluwna rizqakum ʔaanːakum tukaðːibuwna wakajfa ðalika qaaːla sʔaqdːr lw wd͡ʒdt aːlwqt lmqaːbla aːlsjd fwkwkaː ʔaw ltqdjmh lʔaħdin mn ʃrkaːʔik χaːldjn fjh wsaːʔ lhm jwm aːlqjaːma ħmlaː walilːahi aːlmaʃriqu waaːlmaʁribu faʔaajnamaaː tuwalːuwaː faθamːa wad͡ʒhu aːllːahi ʔiinːa aːllːaha waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun waaːlːaðijna tadʕuwna min duwnihi laaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwnaʶ naʶsˤrˤaʶkuʶm walaaː ʔaanfusahum jaʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ kaðːabat θamuwdu aːlmursalijna waaːlʔaanʕaaːma χalaqahaaː lakum fijhaaː difʔun wamanaaːfiʕu waminhaaː taʔakuluwna mʕdtj tʔulmnj flmaː d͡ʒaːʔt qjl ʔahkðaː ʕrʃk qaːlt kʔanh hw wʔawtjnaː aːlʕlm mn qblhaː wknaː mslmjn ʔaalam nad͡ʒʕal lahu ʕajnajni walaqad sˤaʶrˤːaʶfnaʶaʶː lilnːaaːsi fij haðaaː aːlqurʔaːni min kulːi maθalin faʔaabaaː ʔaakθaru aːlnːaaːsi ʔiilːaaː kufuwranaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ liħukmi rabːika walaaː tuʶtˤiʶʕ minhum ʔaːθimanaː ʔaaw kafuwranaː hw aːlðj jħjj wjmjt fʔiðaː qdˤaʶː ʔamraː fʔinmaː jqwl lh kn fjkwn qaːl jaː qwm lm tstʕd͡ʒlwn baːlsjʔia qbl aːlħsna lwlaː tstʁfrwn aːllh lʕlkm trħmwn qaːlwaː jaː ʔabaːnaː aːstʁfr lnaː ðnwbnaː ʔinaː knaː χaʶːtˤʔiʶjn waʔiinːahu lafij zuburi aːlʔaawːalijna wʔin kl lmaː d͡ʒmjʕ ldjnaː mħdˤrˤwn ʔant ʔamjrtj ʔaafaħukma aːld͡ʒaaːhilijːaai jabʁuwna waman ʔaaħsanu mina aːllːahi ħukmanaː liqawmin juwqinuwna qwl mʕrwf wmʁfra χjr mn sˤdqaʶ jtbʕhaː ʔaðaː waːllh ʁnj ħljm waθamuwda aːlːaðijna d͡ʒaaːbuwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶχrˤaʶ biaːlwaaːdi aːlðj d͡ʒʕl lkm mn aːlʃd͡ʒr aʶːlˤʔaʶχdˤrˤ naːraː fʔiðaː ʔantm mnh twqdwn faʔaamːaaː man taaːba waʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː faʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna mina aːlmufliħijna aʶːrˤkdˤ brd͡ʒlk hðaː mʁtsl baːrd wʃraːb qaaːla kam labiθtum fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʕadada sinijna aʶːlˤsˤjn ʔakbr muntid͡ʒ llʔaurz fj aːlʕaːlm tlk ʔaːjaːt aːllh ntlwhaː ʕljk baːlħq wmaː aːllh jrjd ðˤlˤmaʶː llʕaːlmjn aʶːʕtˤjnj frˤsˤaʶ hl tħb aːld͡ʒbna wasaʔaala ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna qul huwa aːlrːaħmanu ʔaːmanːaaː bihi waʕalajhi tawakːalnaaː fasataʕlamuwna man huwa fij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn mubijnin kl maː kaːn jħtaːd͡ʒh twm kaːn ħqaːan bχsˤwsˤ ʕʃra dwlaːraːt ʔanaː sʕjda min ʔad͡ʒlihaː faʔiin kaðːabuwka faqad kuðːiba rusulun min qablika d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː biaːlbajːinaaːti waaːlzːuburi waaːlkitaaːbi aːlmunijri aːlkθjr mn aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ jnthj bhm aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːf ʔilaː aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq aʶːfdˤlˤ aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ ʔakθr mn aːlklaːb sʔaðhb ʔilaː frnsaː lʔadrs aːlrsm θumːa aːld͡ʒaħijma sˤaʶlˤːuʶwhuʶ bbsaʶːtˤaʶ hðaː hw aʶːlˤmwdˤwʕ wʔin aːlfd͡ʒaːr lfj d͡ʒħjm wad͡ʒijʔa jawmaʔiiðin bid͡ʒahanːama jawmaʔiiðin jataðakːaru aːlʔiinsaaːnu waʔaanːaaː lahu aːlðːikraaː χajru ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶk aːlmuʕijnu lak ʕalaaː dahrik lj sˤdjq ʔaːχr fj aʶːlˤsˤjn jaʕnij fij aːlʕilmi wafawqa kulːi ðij ʕilmin ʕalijmun qaaːla wadaaːnijaaan ʕalajhim ðˤiʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶhaʶaʶː waðulːilat quʶtˤuʶwfuʶhaʶaʶː taðlijlanaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin naaːʕimaaun jasʔaaluwna ʔaajːaaːna jawmu aːldːijni ʔaalːaaː jasd͡ʒuduwaː lilːahi aːlːaðij juχrid͡ʒu aːlχabʔa fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wajaʕlamu maaː tuχfuwna wamaaː tuʕlinuwna walaqad raʔaːhu biaːlʔaufuqi aːlmubijni mn fdˤlˤk dʕnj ʔaðhb maaː qaaːla rabːi bimaaː ʔaaʁwajtanij laʔauzajːinanːa lahum fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaʔauʁwijanːahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna waðalika laaː jantaqilu ʕan aːlwaaːlidi biħaaːlin waqaaːla ʔibraaːhijmu bnu aːlʕabːaaːsi ʔiinːij qataltu minhum nafsanaː faʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaqtuluwni waʔaawfara taħabːubanaː watawadːudanaː θm ʔiðaː kʃf aʶːlˤdˤrˤ ʕnkm ʔiðaː frjq mnkm brbhm jʃrkwn wamaaː ʕalajka ʔaalaːːa jazːakːaaː twaːd͡ʒh bihi jastahziʔiuwna waðalikum ðˤaʶnːuʶkuʶmuʶ aːlːaðij ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶm birabːikum ʔaardaaːkum faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħtuʶm mina aːlχaaːsirijna sʔaʃrʕ sˤjaʶːmaʶː ʕn aːlmaːʔ ʔiinːa aːlsːaaːʕaaa ʔaːtijaaun ʔaakaaːdu ʔauχfijhaaː litud͡ʒzaaː kulːu nafsin bimaaː tasʕaaː mqsˤdj dfʕ aːlʁrjm wʕlaː aːllh aːʕtmaːdj ʔanaː hdmt aːlmdrsa jaaː sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶ aːlʕilmi taʕalːam min aːlʕilmi maaː d͡ʒahilt waʕalːim aːld͡ʒuhːaaːla ʔaʕml kl jwm ʕdaː aːlʔaħd ktb hðaː aːlktaːb ʕndmaː kaːn ʕmrh ʕʃrjn sna walaqad taraknaaːhaaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min mudːakirin ʃkraːan kθjraːan nmtʕhm qljlaː θm ndˤtˤrˤhm ʔilaː ʕðaːb ʁlˤjðˤ faʔiiðaaː aːlʃr d͡ʒzwʕaː ʁurfatij tuʶtˤiʶlˤ ʕlaː aːlʃaːriʕ fanabaðnaaːhu biaːlʕaraaːʔi wahuwa saqijmun lʕlk ʔasʔat aːlfhm faʔiiðaaː aːnʃaqːati aːlsːamaaːʔ fakaaːnat wardaaan kaaːldːihaaːni wd͡ʒnwd ʔibljs ʔad͡ʒmʕwn lwlaː ħzaːm aːlʔamaːn lmaː bqjt ʕlaː qjd aːlħjaːa lˤħðˤaʶ mn fdˤlˤk waqawma nuwħin min qablu ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː qawmanaː faaːsiqijna walaqad ʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajkum ʔaːjaaːtin mubajːinaaːtin wamaθalanaː mina aːlːaðijna χalawaː min qablikum waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶaʶn lilmutːaqijna waːllðaːn jʔatjaːnhaː mnkm fʔaːðwhmaː fʔin taːbaː wʔaʶsˤlˤħaʶː fʔaʶʕrˤdˤwaʶː ʕnhmaː ʔin aːllh kaːn twaːbaː rħjmaː hlaː qdmtlj χdma mn fdˤlˤk ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ bal laaː juwqinuwna wʔamaː aːlsaːʔil flaː tnhr qadːim d͡ʒahaaːzak walaaː jadʕuwhu tarku aːlʔiiʕnaaːti lahu ʕalaaː aːltːaqlijdi fijmaaː ʔaaχaða ʕanhu wahaðaaː qawlu mud͡ʒaaːhidin wasaʕijdi bni d͡ʒubajrin ʔaam ħasibtum ʔaan tadχuluwaː aːld͡ʒanːaaa walamːaaː jaʕlami aːllːahu aːlːaðijna d͡ʒaaːhaduwaː minkum wajaʕlama aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ waʔaanːa aːʕtiqaaːdahu ħud͡ʒːaaun walaaː jaħzunka qawluhum ʔiinːa aːlʕizːaaa lilːahi d͡ʒamijʕanaː huwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu kaaːna wufuwru aːlʕaqli waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ jaʶqtaʶdˤiʶj min ħaaːli sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ qilːaaa ʔiχwaaːnihi nntðˤrˤuʶ mnka ʔan tunafːiða lnaː maː wʕdtah lnaː ðaːt mra ntlw ʕljk mn nbʔi mwsaː wfrʕwn baːlħq lqwm jʔumnwn hðh ʔaχbaːr tˤjbaʶ ħtaː ʔiðaː ftħnaː ʕljhm baːbaː ðaː ʕðaːb ʃdjd ʔiðaː hm fjh mblswn jwm jrwn aːlmlaːʔika laː bʃraː jwmʔið llmd͡ʒrmjn wjqwlwn ħd͡ʒraː mħd͡ʒwraː lm tkn tlk hj aːlħqjqa ʔilaː rħma mn rbk ʔin fdˤlˤh kaːn ʕljk kbjraː naːr aːllh aːlmwqda ʔiðaː tʁjr aːlʕnwaːn, rd͡ʒaːʔan ʔiʶtsˤlˤ bnaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔatzwd͡ʒ ftaːa mθlhaː wʔaːja lhm aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ aːlmjta ʔaħjjnaːhaː wʔaχrd͡ʒnaː mnhaː ħbaː fmnh jʔaklwn hl tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː sjaːra ʔisʕaːf jawma judaʕːuwna ʔiilaaː naaːri d͡ʒahanːama daʕːanaː walalʔaːχiraau χajrun laka mina aːlʔauwlaaː sawdaaːʔu waluwdun χajrun min ħasnaaːʔa ʕaaːqirin jqaːl ʔan aːlnbj mħmd nsˤħ msaːfrjn mrˤdˤaʶː bʃrb bwl aːlʔibl kʕlaːd͡ʒ wʔiðaː aːlkwaːkb aːntθrt wamud͡ʒaaːnabaai aːlʔiidlaaːli ljs ldj aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt ʔanaː mwaʶːtˤn ʔamrjkj waʶħuʶsˤːiʶlˤaʶ maaː fij aʶːlˤsˤːuʶduʶwrˤiʶ faʔaaðaaːqahumu aːllːahu aːlχizja fij aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna laaː sijːamaaː waʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi muʕaaːnun hl sjaːrtk baːlqrb mn bjtk waʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaafalam takun ʔaːjaaːtij tutlaaː ʕalajkum faaːstakbartum wakuntum qawmanaː mud͡ʒrimijna fsʔalh ʔabwh ʔajn aːllħm waaːlːaðijna jaquwluwna rabːanaaː aʶːsˤrˤiʶf ʕanːaaː ʕaðaaːba d͡ʒahanːama ʔiinːa ʕaðaaːbahaaː kaaːna ʁaraaːmanaː ʔaʕtqd ʔanh d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaː hðaː nðjr mn aːlnðr aːlʔawlaː wqtˤʕnaʶːhm fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔammaː mnhm aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħwn wmnhm dwn ðlk wblwnaːhm baːlħsnaːt waːlsjʔiaːt lʕlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn dʕnj ʔasaːʕdk ʔimːaaː ʔaan jakuwna liʕilːaain fij aːlkalaaːmi aːlmutard͡ʒami ʕanhaaː lqaːlwaː ʔinmaː skrt ʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤnaʶː bl nħn qwm msħwrwn bʔimkaːnkm ʔan tχtaːrwaː ʔajː tˤrˤjq trjdwnh warawaaː ʔaabuw hurajraaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaanːa aːlnːabijːa sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaaːla km θqjl ʔant ʔiiðaaː raʔaathum min makaaːnin baʕijdin samiʕuwaː lahaaː taʶʁaʶjːuʶðˤaʶnaʶː wazafijranaː fajadʕuw ðalika ʔilaaː aːlʔiiʃkaaːli ʔið tstʁjθwn rbkm faːstd͡ʒaːb lkm ʔanj mmdkm bʔalf mn aːlmlaːʔika mrdfjn aːbnj jħb aːllʕb baːlsjaːraːt aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ kjf tqwl " wdaːʕanaː " baːllʁa aːlʔalmaːnja kʔanhm ħmr mstnfra nħn mdrswn hl aːlħmːaːm d͡ʒaːhz faʔaamːaaː aːlkabijru faaːld͡ʒahlu bihi ʔaaqbaħu aːʕtqdt ʔan aːlmlaːbs kaːnt ʔakθr tklfa hj waaːlːaðijna min qablikum laʕalːakum tatːaquwna lknk lm tχbrnj ʕn hðaː qtˤ nrjd ʔan ntħdθ ʔilaː twm jd͡ʒb ʕljk td͡ʒnb mθl hðh aʶːlˤaʶːχtˤaʶːʔ ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa lˤʔaʶħsˤlˤ ʕlaː qaʶsˤiʶaʶ ʃaʕr waltakun minkum ʔaumːaaun jadʕuwna ʔiilaaː aːlχajri wajaʔamuruwna biaːlmaʕruwfi wajanhawna ʕani aːlmunkari waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmufliħuwna laː tqlq jmknk aːlʔiʕtmaːd ʕlj km ʔahlknaː mn qblhm mn qrn fnaːdwaː wlaːt ħjn mnaʶːsˤ faʔiinːa ðalika maʶtˤiʶjːaʶaʶuʶ aːlnːawkaaː waʕuðru aʶːlˤmuʶqaʶsˤːiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ sjtm aːstχdaːmhaː lkl aːlaːʕlaːnaːt aːlmhma w lˤtnðˤjm aːlmsaːbqa aːlʔanwaːr mtˤfaʶːaʶ d͡ʒjn ldjhaː χms tuʶsˤrˤaʶfuʶwnaʶ wajustadfaʕu bihi ʔaʶaʶdˤrˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶhaʶaʶː jdrs twm fj aːlmktba aːlʔaːn rkbtj tnzf qul ʔiinːa sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːtiʶj wanusukij wamaħjaaːja wamamaaːtij lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna θumːa taχfijfu aːlʔaaθqaaːli ʕanhu wlqd ʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm ʔaːjaːt mbjnaːt wmθlaː mn aːlðjn χlwaː mn qblkm wmwʕðˤaʶ llmtqjn qaaːla ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶhuʶm ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum lawlaaː tusabːiħuwna dˤħk djmaː taʃkuruwna aːχtr ʃχsˤaʶːaʶn waːħdaːan ʔiinːahu laqurʔaːnun karijmun ðˤlˤt maːrj ʕzbaːʔ tˤwaʶːlˤ aːlftra aːltj ʕaːʃthaː fj aːljaːbaːn ʔatmnaː ʔan ttqbl tˤlˤbj fahija ʕadlun ʃaaːmilun jadʕuw ʔilaaː aːlsbaːħa bmθl srʕth ldj sˤʕwbaʶ fj fhm hðaː aːlsʔuaːl ʔabq aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ bʕjdaː ʕn aːlʔadwja watantahija ʕan aːlʁajːi ʔiðaaː zad͡ʒarahaaː ʔinːa haðihi aːlʔaːdaaːba nawaaːfiru tanidːu ʕan ʕaqli ʔalaːʔ wakulːa ʔiinsaaːnin ʔaalzamnaaːhu tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤaʶhuʶ fij ʕunuqihi wanuχrid͡ʒu lahu jawma aːlqijaaːmaai kitaaːbanaː jalqaaːhu manʃuwranaː walaqad ʔaaχaðnaaːhum biaːlʕaðaaːbi famaaː wataʕaaːlaaː ʕamːaaː juʃrikuwna ʃms wmtˤrˤ, qws quzħ waaːlbaʁja mustawlin ʕalajhi ʔiðaaː qadara bjtj mrjħ ʔakθr mn bjtk ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʔams ʔanti jmknki aʶːlˤrˤqsˤ, ʔaljs kðlk bjdˤaʶːʔ lða fjwfjhm ʔad͡ʒwrhm waːllh laː jħb aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn sʔantql ʔilaː mnzl d͡ʒdjd w ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lʕlb lħzm ʔaʶʁrˤaʶːdˤj qaːlwaː fmaː d͡ʒzaːʔuh ʔin kntm kaːðbjn ʃkraːan ʕlj twdˤjħk maː ðlk aːlmbnaː aʶːlˤtˤwjlˤ ʔaafalajsa ʔiðaaː suʔiila aʶːlˤmaʶnaʶaʶːðˤiʶrˤuʶ faʶʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶʔaʶaʶ baaːna naʶqsˤuʶhuʶ hðaː aːlktaːb lj waːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː waːstkbrwaː ʕnhaː ʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlnaːr hm fjhaː χaːldwn whw fdˤlˤkm ʕlaː aːlʕaːlmjn hl bʔimkaːnj ʔijqaːf sjaːrtj hnaː lqd thtu hl bʔimkaːnk msaːʕdtj mn ʔajn ʔiʃtrjti hðaː aːlθwb waʶaʶːdˤmuʶm jadaka ʔiilaaː d͡ʒanaaːħika taχrud͡ʒ baʶjdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ min ʁajri wmaː nħn bmbʕwθjn χðnj ʔilaː qaːʔidkm aʶːqtaʶdˤaʶt aːlħaaːlu ðikra ʔaasbaaːbihaaː nħn mstʕdwn baʶːlˤftˤrˤaʶ lmfaːd͡ʒʔaːt tfwq ʔaʶqsˤaʶː mχjltnaː ʔaafalaaː jatadabːaruwna aːlqurʔaːna ʔaam ʕalaaː quluwbin ʔaaqfaaːluhaaː ʔajn aːlkrjma aːlmχfwqa hw ʔatrʕa aːlkʔas ʔaafaʔaamina ʔaahlu aːlquraaː ʔaan jaʔatijahum baʔasunaaː bajaaːtanaː wahum naaːʔiimuwna ʔaafaman ħaqːa ʕalajhi kalimaau aːlʕaðaaːbi ʔaafaʔaanta tunqiðu man fij aːlnːaaːri aʶːtsˤlˤ haːrj ʕlaː mnzl tˤwnj hl ttħdθ aːllʁa aːlʔalmaːnja aːfʕl klː maː jqwlhu lk wlˤwtˤaʶː ʔið qaːl lqwmh ʔatʔatwn aːlfaːħʃa wʔantm tbsˤrˤwn ʔarjd ʔan trwwaː waʔaːtuwaː aːlzːakaaːaa waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrːasuwla laʕalːakum turħamuwna wajantafij ʕanhum taʶbaʶaʶːʁuʶdˤuʶ aːlʕadami wahija ʔaaχbaθu ʔaaħwaaːli aːlmukalːafijna ʔajmknk ʔan ttħdθ bbtˤʔiʶ mn fdˤlˤk ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj ʕaːʔiltj laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa jʕrfnj ʔadʕmh wmaː χlq aːlðkr waːlʔanθaː wfj θmwd ʔið qjl lhm tmtʕwaː ħtaː ħjn hl ttħdθ aːlmqdwnja waːlðjn jʔumnwn bmaː ʔanzl ʔiljk wmaː ʔanzl mn qblk wbaːlʔaːχra hm jwqnwn aːχtbʔa aːlʔarnb χlf aːlʃd͡ʒra ldj qtˤ waːħd fj aːlwaːqʕ rʔajtk bʕd mda tˤwjlˤaʶ kaːnt sˤwfjaʶː ʔakwla aːdχuluwaː ʔaabwaaːba d͡ʒahanːama χaaːlidijna fijhaaː fabiʔisa maθwaaː aːlmutakabːirijna ʔinh jʃbh ʔamh aːlðjn kðbwaː baːlktaːb wbmaː ʔarslnaː bh rslnaː fswf jʕlmwn maːrj hj skrtjra twm walaʔiin ʔaaðaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna minːaaː raħmaaan θumːa nazaʕnaaːhaaː minhu ʔiinːahu lajaʔiuwsun kafuwrun ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlʕilmi aːlrːaʁbaau waθamaratuhu aːlsːaʕaaːdaau jawmaʔiiðin tuʶʕrˤaʶdˤuʶwnaʶ laː taχfaaː minkum χaaːfijaaun mfaʶːsˤlˤj tʔulmnj jaː ʔajhaː aːlʔinsaːn maː ʁrk brbk aːlkrjm d͡ʒmjʕ ʔafraːd ʕaːʔiltj χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna min waraaːʔiihi d͡ʒahanːamu wajusqaaː min maaːʔin sˤaʶdiʶjdiʶn jʕjʃ saːmj fj ħlb swrjaː hl tʕtqd ʔannaː snd͡ʒd bjthaː lazimathu twm ʔajaː mn klaːm maːrj ʔauwlaʔiika lahum rizqun maʕluwmun χuruwd͡ʒanaː ʕan aːlʕadli ʔilaaː maaː lajsa biʕadlin maː aːsmuk mn ʔaj ʃjʔ χlqh fʔin kaːn lkm kjd fkjdwn maːðaː trjd ʔan tʔakl aːljwm ʔajznhaːwr bwʕdh knt mʕlmaː ljs ldjnaː ħdjqa waʔaumuwruhaaː ʕalaaː mamarːi aːldːuhuwri muʶntaʶðˤiʶmaʶaʶaʶn ʔiinːahu lajsa lahu suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnuʶn ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕalaaː rabːihim fʕl hðaː lw smħt ʔalaː tlʕb aːltns baʕijdun min aːld͡ʒanːaai tʕaːl ltzwrnj wqaːl aːlðjn kfrwaː laː tsmʕwaː lhðaː aːlqrʔaːn waːlʁwaː fjh lʕlkm tʁlbwn laː ʔaħd jstmʕ ʔiljː jðˤn twm ʔan ʕlaː maːrj aːlaːʕtðaːr mn d͡ʒwn qul laaː tusʔaaluwna ʕamːaaː ʔaad͡ʒramnaaː walaaː nusʔaalu ʕamːaaː taʕmaluwna hl ʔaʶsˤbt bʕjaːr naːrj waðalika qabijħun fij aːlʕaqli ʔaan jaʶtaʶʕaʶrˤːaʶdˤaʶ lahu ʔafrʔajtm aːllaːt waːlʕzaː wqaːlwaː aːtχð aːllh wldaː sbħaːnh bl lh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ kl lh qaːntwn wlm tkn lh fʔia jnsˤrˤwnh mn dwn aːllh wmaː kaːn mntsˤrˤaʶː ʔanaː d͡ʒbaːn ldrd͡ʒa ʔannj naːdraː maː ʔazwr tˤbjb aːlʔasnaːn waqaaːla ʕalajhi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶuʶ waaːlsːalaaːmu aʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa kaðabuwaː ʕalaaː ʔaanfusihim waʶdˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʕanhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaftaruwna twm jrjd ʔiqaːma ʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʔaχtj tsttˤjʕ aːlsbaːħa bsrʕa kθjra ʔinh jsˤaʶːb baːlzkaːm bshwla d͡ʒdaː walaaː juʶsqiʶtˤuʶ ħurmatahu biʶaʶːlˤðˤːuʶnuʶwniʶ kulːamaaː ʔaaraaːduwaː ʔaan jaχrud͡ʒuwaː minhaaː min ʁamːin ʔauʕijduwaː fijhaaː waðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːba aːlħarijqi ʔanaː ʔanaːm fj aːlsaːʕa aːlʕaːʃra ʔaʶʕtˤnaʶː hðaː aʶːlˤqtˤ laː ðˤlˤjlˤ wlaː jʁnj mn aːllhb wd͡ʒʕlnaː fjhaː rwaːsj ʃaːmχaːt wʔasqjnaːkm maːʔ fraːtaː maː hj ʔakθr d͡ʒmla mħbba ʔilaː qlbk fʔiðaː nzl bsaːħthm fsaːʔ sˤbaʶːħ aːlmnðrjn wamaaː jaʔatijhim min nabijːin ʔiilːaaː kaaːnuwaː bihi jastahziʔiuwna lqd ʔaʁmrhaː baːlmdħ lqd ʔaʕddt hlaːmaː waaːlmaħduwdu ʔaaqalːu waːlsmaːʔ wmaː bnaːhaː lilquluwbi ʃahwaaun waʔiiqbaaːlun wafatraaun waʔiidbaaːrun faʔatuwhaaː min qibali ʃahwatihaaː walaaː ʔanaː ʔauħb kulaːan mn aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ waːlklaːb hal ʔaataaːka ħadijθu aːld͡ʒunuwdi wmaː ʔaʶðˤn aːlsaːʕa qaːʔima wlʔin rddt ʔilaː rbj lʔad͡ʒdn χjraː mnhaː mnqlbaː wʔamaː aːlðjn aʶːbjdˤt wd͡ʒwhhm ffj rħma aːllh hm fjhaː χaːldwn wmn ʔaħsn qwlaː mmn dʕaː ʔilaː aːllh wʕml d͡ʒibrijla ktaːb fsˤlˤt ʔaːjaːth qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː lqwm jʕlmwn ʔanaː lst aːlmʃkla ʕlaː km aːlsaːʕa bʔimkaːnj aʶːlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː hnaːk jʕjʃ zwd͡ʒhaː aːlʔaːn fj tˤwkjw qrjbaː sjsˤdrˤ fjlm ʕn aːlhnd fj fðrhm ħtaː jlaːqwaː jwmhm aːlðj fjh jsˤʕqwn tzwd͡ʒth mn ʔad͡ʒl maːlh wahuwa aːlːaðij χalaqa aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra waaːlʃːamsa waaːlqamara kulːun fij falakin jasbaħuwna laː aːltdχl θumːa jarudːu muʃfiquwna ʔanaː mmtn llʁaːja lmsaːʕdtk d͡ʒahanːama jaʶsˤlˤaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː fabiʔisa aːlmihaaːdu aːrd͡ʒw dʕwa kl aːlnaːd͡ʒħjn aːlaː hðaː aːlmnʃwr w mʃaːrkth lˤjsˤlˤhm lw ʔardnaː ʔan ntχð lhwaː laːtχðnaːh waʔaaħabːuwhu tʕlːmtu aːlʕjʃ dwnhaː nħn lsnaː ʔamrjkjjn ʔauqdm aːstqaːltj laʕalːanaaː natːabiʕu aːlsːaħaraaa ʔiin kaaːnuwaː humu aːlʁaaːlibijna wllh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt wmaː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wʔilaː hw aːsm klb aːlsjda taːnaːkaː wkl sˤʁjrˤ wkbjr msttˤrˤ qaːlwaː nʕbd ʔaʶsˤnaʶːmaʶː fnðˤlˤ lhaː ʕaːkfjn ʔant mtʔaχr ʔatmnaːa ʔan aʶːlˤsˤjf laː jnthaːi aːbdaːan ʃkraːan lka ʕlaː lˤtˤfk faman ʃaaːʔa muʶχaʶaʶːlˤaʶtˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaʃraaːri ʕalaaː χaʶtˤaʶrˤiʶn wahuwa biaːlʔaufuqi aːlʔaaʕlaaː hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal, ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanta ðaːhb hl wd͡ʒdta wðˤjfaʶ mθjra llʔihtmaːm flˤstˤjn dwla ʕrbjːa ʔanaː tˤwkjw hl wldt fj ʃhr maːjw twm ldjh ʃʕr rmaːdj sʔalt aːlmrʔaa: " qsˤaʶ " " maːðaː tqsˤd " mtaːa ʔatjta wanad͡ʒhala nafʕa ʔiħsaaːnihi ʔilajnaaː walaaː tamnaʕuwhaaː ʔaahlahaaː faʶtaʶðˤlˤiʶmuʶwhuʶm aːlmftaːħ ʕlj aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ tbaː ʔajn wdˤʕt mfaːtjħ mnzlj aːnfd͡ʒrt ʔanaːbjb aːlmjaːh ʕndnaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ql jaː ʔajhaː aːlkaːfrwn ql ʔin rbj jqðf baːlħq ʕlaːm aːlʁjwb ʔaʶsˤbħ ʔaχwh ʔimaːmaː mn fdˤlˤk, ʔismʕnj jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb sttħdθ d͡ʒwdj ʕn aːljaːbaːn ʁdaːan haðaaː ðikrun waʔiinːa lilmutːaqijna laħusna maʔaːbin qaaːluwaː ʔaad͡ʒiʔitanaaː biaːlħaqːi ʔaam ʔaanta mina aʶːlˤnðˤaʶːfaʶ talfaħu wud͡ʒuwhahumu aːlnːaaːru wahum fijhaaː kaaːliħuwna mʕaːdaːa aːljhwd hj aːʃtraːkja aːlħmqaː ʔinhu mn aːlmmtʕ aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕhaː ʕlaː twm ʔan jrtdj mlaːbsh kj jðhb llʕml nħn nħb btwm ʔaʶsˤbħt mn aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj kaːn saːmj jʁjːr mlaːbsh klː jwm waqaaːla aːbnu aːlrːuwmijːi laː tns ʔan ttːsˤlˤ bj aːllːjla waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlmuʕtazːi raħimahu aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː km mn waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔaakbaru min χalqi aːlnːaːsi walkinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaːsi laː jaʕlamwna naːdaːnj aːlmdrːs baːlʔaħmq waʶjaʶstaʶsˤʁiʶrˤuʶ maʕahaaː kulːa kabijrin liʔaanːa limaħmuwdihaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːdaʶnaʶː muqaaːbilaaan jusʕiduhaaː hawanaː muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶn waʃahwaaun ʁaaːlibaaun aʶːlˤmaʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶ jard͡ʒuw aːlʃːifaaːʔa waʔaaðhalanij aːlsːuruwru ʕan ħiʶfðˤiʶhaʶaʶː wawadidt ʔaanːij law ħaʶfiʶðˤthaʶaʶː fabaʃːirhum biʕaðaːbin ʔaaljmin ʔabj mhnds mdnj ʔaan jaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ min aːlmaħsuwdi faʶdˤlˤuʶn jaʕd͡ʒizu ʕanhu fajakrahu taqadːumahu fijhi waʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːsˤaʶhuʶ bihi wahaðaaː jakuwnu min sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ aːlnːafsi wakamaaːli aːlmuruwʔaai taʕrud͡ʒu aːlmalaːʔiikaau waaːlrːwħu ʔiilajhi fj jawmin kaːna miqdaːruhu χamsjna ʔaalfa sanaain nħn hnaː jartad͡ʒijka raaːʁibun waʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ biʶaʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ maʃhuwranaː salaːmun hija ħatːaː maʶtˤlˤaʶʕiʶ aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiðaaː lam takun nafsu aːlʃːarijfi ʃarijfaaan waʔiin kaaːna ðaaː qadrin falajsa lahu ʃarafu waʔaand͡ʒaħu lilmutaʕalːimi ʕndj wqt kaːf ltnaːwl wd͡ʒba ʁdaːʔ kbjra lˤħðˤaʶ ʔiinːa aːlʔaabraːra lafj naʕjmin fij waʶsˤiʶjːaʶtiʶhiʶ fij aːlbalaaːʁaai fwːt saːmj drs aʶːlˤtːsˤwjrˤ ʔiin taʶdˤrˤiʶb qiʶtˤːaʶnaʶː jaχmiʃka ʔilaː ðlk wakajfa ðalika jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi qaaːla faʕan ðalika d͡ʒawaaːbaaːni ʔiinːaka majːitun waʔiinːahum majːitwna ʔaaχrad͡ʒa minhaː maːʔahaː wamarʕaːhaː aːldnjaː ktaːb aːlmrʔaa ʔaanːahu χarad͡ʒa waqaaːla ʔaːχaru fawaqaːhu aːllːahu sajːiʔiaaːti maː makarwaː waħaːqa biʔaːli firʕawna swʔu aːlʕaðaːbi wataraknaː ʕalajhi fij aːlʔaːχirjna faʔiinːa ðalika ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ liʔaad͡ʒrihim wazaaːda ʕalaaː ħadːi aːlkifaaːjaai jbdw ʁaʶːmdˤaʶː ħwl maː ʔaraːd fʕlh ʔinhaː fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ aːlʔaːn ʕlaː aːlmrʔ ʔan jfʕl klː maː bwsʕh fahaðaaː ʔaaljaqu biʔaahli aːlmuruwʔaai waʔaaʕamːu d͡ʒadwaaː wamanfaʕaaan waʔiin aʶːstjqðˤ saːmj ʔaχjraː mn aːlʁjbwba aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj ʔilaː ħjn ʁaːdrt ljlaː ʔaalam naχluqkum min maːʔin mahjnin liʔaanːahaaː mawaaːhibu qad manaħahaaː aːllːahu man ʃaaːʔa faʶjaʶsχaʶtˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa fij qaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ ħdθ ðlk lj saːbqanaː fj kitaːbin maknwnin ħqdt ljlaː ʕlaː saːmj saːmj bkaː w bkaː w bkaː tʕrːf saːmj ʕlaː mslmjn mn dwl ʔislaːmjːa mχtlfa waqad waʶsˤaʶfaʶ baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi aːlʔiinsaaːna faqaaːla ʔaalaː ʔiinːahum min ʔiifkihim lajaqwlwna waqaaːla muʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ bnu aːlzːubajri aʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕuʶ maʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶduʶ aːlʃːarafi waman laaː jastaħiqːuhu ʃarːun min aːlχinzijri kaːn saːmj mħbːaː lʔawlaːdh aːliaːstiħjaaːʔu min d͡ʒazaaːʔi aːld͡ʒawaaːbi faʔaamːaaː aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau fatadʕuw ʔilaaː maaː sadːa aːld͡ʒuwʕa wasakːana aʶːlˤðˤːaʶmaʶʔaʶaʶ χuð aːlkitaaːba laː tns ʔiʶtˤfaʶːʔ aʶːlˤʔaʶdˤwaʶːʔ θumːa ʔaadbara waaːstakbara ʔant mħqː tmaːmaː hl bʔimkaːnnaː ʔan nnsaː ðlk waaːlʔiikθaaːri ʕalaaː miqdaaːri aːlkifaaːjaai waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːldːunjaaː ʔin baqijat lak laaː tabqaaː lahaaː ʔant btˤlˤj jaː saːmj saːmj msjħj maː mn sbb jdʕw twm lʔilaː jsˤdq maːrj hl ʕljk ʔan tʕml jwm aːlʔaħd ʔanaː ʔansaː ʔajn ʔaʶdˤʕ qbːʕtj aːlwaladu aːlmuhaðːabu juħibːuhu ʔaabuwh smʕ saːmj sˤwt ʔamːh kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ nmtˤ ħjaːa χtˤjrˤ d͡ʒdːaː nðˤːf saːmj aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː bʔimkaːnk aʶːlˤaʶːħtfaʶːðˤ bh manːaːʕin lilχajri muʕtadin murjbin jursili aːlsːamaːʔa ʕalajkum midraːranaː waqaaːla lirad͡ʒulin jumaaːʃijhi ʔiχtrqt aʶːlˤrˤsˤaʶːsˤaʶ d͡ʒsdh kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan thtmː bh aːlftjaːt ʕaːd ʔilaː kra aːlqdm aʶːtːsˤlˤ aːlmdrːs bʔamːj muruwʔaain maʕa ðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ aːlmuknaai ʔaan jakilahum ʔilaaː ʁajrihi ʔiið nad͡ʒːajnaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna laqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaːna fj kabadin ħaːwl ʔan jtqn aːlfrnsja θumːa d͡ʒaʕala ʔilaaː faqutila kajfa qadːara ʔanzl saːmj naːfðth ʕaːd aːlʔamr ʔilaː nsˤaʶːbh laː bd ʔanh ʁbj ljqwm bʃjʔ khðaː ln jfwz twm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi fij ʔiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːbiʶk raaːħaau ʔaʶaʶʕsˤaʶaʶːbiʶk fij ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwlˤiʶ aːlfiqhi waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤiʶfuʶ ʕalajhim jrjd saːmj ʔan jmdˤj bʕdˤ aːlwqt lwħdh bqija aːlwld haːdʔiaːan faman ʔaʶaʶsχaʶtˤaʶ suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶhuʶ taʶʕaʶrˤːaʶdˤaʶ lilmanijːaai waman ʔaawħaʃa aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ ʕalaaː maaː takrahu χajranaː kaθijranaː ʃkraː lˤlˤtˤfkiʶ wajuqawːimu ʕiwad͡ʒak wamajlak kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔiʁlaːq aːlʕjaːda aːrtkbtu χtˤʔaʶ faːdħaː ʕndmaː trktuki ʔanaː fqjr w laː ʔamlk aːlʔaθnjn ʕaːda maː jħdˤrˤ saːmj sˤlˤaʶːaʶ aːld͡ʒmaːʕa kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jħdˤrˤ drs aʶːlˤtːsˤwjrˤ wajuʔuminuk suwʔa aːlmaʁabːaai walam ʔaakun biduʕaaːʔiika rabiː ʃaqijːanaː walaw qaːtalakumu aːstiχraaːd͡ʒihaaː walaaː kadːin fij aʶːstiʶnbaʶaʶːtˤiʶhaʶaʶː fakajfa tatːaqwna ʔiin kafartum jawmanaː jad͡ʒʕalu aːlwildaːna ʃjbanaː fajuld͡ʒaʔaa ʔilaaː ðulːi aːltːaħrijfi lqd tnbːʔat lkj baːlsːʕaːda wasawaːʔun ʕalajhim ʔaaʔaanðartahum ʔaam lam tunðirhum laː juʔuminwna ʔawdː ʔan ʔadʕwk lrħla ln tnshaː ʔabdaː lm jʃʕr saːmj baːlrːaːħa wanurjdu ʔaan namunːa ʕalaaː aːlːaðjna aʶːstuʶdˤʕiʶfwaʶː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wanad͡ʒʕalahum ʔaaʔiimːaaan wanad͡ʒʕalahumu aːlwaːriθjna wataʃbijhun maʕluwlun kaðːaba aːlːaðjna min qablihim faʔaataːhumu aːlʕaðaːbu min ħajθu laː jaʃʕurwna waaːld͡ʒibaːla ʔaarsaːhaː jutlaː fj bujwtikunːa min ʔaːjaːti aːllːahi waaːlħikmaai ʔiinːa aːllːaha kaːna lˤaʶtˤjfaʶnaʶː χabjranaː laː ndχn ʔanaː wtwm aːlsd͡ʒaːʔir aʶːsˤbrˤ hnaːk ʔanaːs fj aːlmtnzh jandamu aːlkaslaːanu waqaːla aːlʔiinsaːnu maː lahaː waman χulafaaːʔuuk qaaːla ʕaʶtˤiʶʃaʶ aːlzːarʕu ʔaʃd͡ʒaː mn ħmaːma fahakaðaaː qad juʕdalu bihi ʕan maʶwdˤiʶʕiʶhiʶ kaːnt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ tʕtqd ʔan ljlaː kaːnt mtwrˤːtˤaʶ fj aːld͡ʒrjma bʃkl maː ʔaaqijluwaː ðawij aːlhajʔiaaːti ʕaθaraaːtihim waquli aːlħamdu lilːahi sajurjkum ʔaːjaːtihi fataʕrifwnahaː wamaː rabːuka biʁaːfilin ʕamːaː taʕmalwna qultu limaːrj ʔaannj lam ʔaafʕal aʶːlˤsːuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ mutaqasːimu aːlʔaafkaaːri mustawʕibu aːlzːamaaːni natlw ʕalajka min nabaʔii mwsaː wafirʕawna biaːlħaqːi liqawmin juʔuminwna saʶjaʶsˤlˤaʶː naːranaː ðaːta lahabin waʔiiðaaː kaaːna aːldːahri laaː juwd͡ʒiduhu maaː tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ maaː waqaaː bihi aːlmarʔu ʕiʶrˤdˤaʶhuʶ fahuwa lahu sˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶuʶn ʔaudχl saːmj ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda ʔiðaː ql maːʔ aːlwd͡ʒh ql ħjaːʔuh wlaː χjr fj wd͡ʒh ʔiðaː ql faaːlfaːriqaːti farqanaː tzwːd͡ʒ saːmj mrːa ʔaχraː ʔaan jufawːita nafsahu ʁunmanaː aːldːaaːʕij maʶħðˤuʶwrˤaʶnaʶː ljs mn aʶːlˤdˤrˤwrˤj fʕl ðlk lm jʕd ʕndnaː ʔaj skr kaːn saːmj mχtbʔiaː fj mnzl ʔamːh ʔazhaː mn tˤaʶːwws aːlːaðj d͡ʒamaʕa maːlanaː waʕadːadahu fqd saːmj ħjaːth kfː ʕn aːʕtbaːrj tˤflˤ waʶsˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶn muʃtarakaaun bajna fikrin waʕamalin faʔaamːaː θamwdu faʔauhlikwaː biʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶːʁiʶjaʶaʶiʶ waqad qaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi hðh aːld͡ʒmla ʁjr mfhwma waħukija ʕan aʶːlˤmuʶʕtaʶdˤiʶdiʶ ʔaanːahu qaaːla ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lmzjd mn aːlwqt lʔand͡ʒz frˤwdˤj falaaː jaslamu fij birːihi min muʕaaːdin waʶaʶːʃtiʶtˤaʶaʶːtˤiʶ munaaːwin rkb twm aːlsjaːra waʶʔiʶiʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶaʶiʶ aːltːadbijri wakaðalika ħuznuhu maqruwnun bisuruwri ʁajrihi waʕazmahunːa ʔilaaː aːlwahni liʔaanːa ʔiħraaːza nwdija ʔaan bwrika man fij aːlnːaːri waman ħawlahaː wasubħaːna aːllːahi rabːi aːlʕaːlamjna faʔaawħaː ʔiilaː ʕabdihi maː ʔaawħaː wakaaːna aːlħasanu aʶːlˤbaʶsˤrˤiʶjːuʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu jaquwlu fij taʔawijli ðalika waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ħajaaːau aːlwad͡ʒhi biħajaaːʔiihi kamaaː ʔaanːa ħajaaːaa aːlʁarsi bimaaːʔiihi waʔiinːahu laʕilmun lilsːaːʕaai falaː tamtarunːa bihaː waaːtːabiʕwni huwa lij lan ʔaaʕd͡ʒalahu qabla ʔaad͡ʒalihi walaw tˤaʶlˤaʶbtuʶhuʶ biquwːaai aːlsːamawaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waqad qaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː hðaː jd͡ʒʕlnj ʔaʃʕr baːlħrd͡ʒ falamːaː raʔaawhu zulfaaan sjʔiat wud͡ʒwhu aːlːaðjna kafarwaː waqjla hðaaː aːlːaðj kuntum bihi tadːaʕwna lqd aːħtrmt qraːrk liʔaanːahu d͡ʒaʕala maaː juʶqsˤaʶduʶ bihi wad͡ʒhu aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː maʶqsˤuʶwdaʶnaʶː bihi ʁajra aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː aːχrd͡ʒ mn ħjaːtj laː tubqj walaː taðaru wabiaːlħaaːʔi ʔiðaaː manaʕa aːlrːizqa wamad͡ʒdun mad͡ʒduwdin laaː juqaaːlu fijhimaaː ʔilːaaː bimaaː lam jusamːa faaːʕiluhu faminhum man jaraaː ʔaanːa sˤaʶrˤfaʶ aːlnːafsi ʕanhaaː ʔaawlaaː hðaː aːbnhaː jaː saːmj wafaːkihaain mimːaː jataχajːarwna walinad͡ʒaaːħi ħawaaːʔiid͡ʒihi raaːd͡ʒijanaː d͡ʒʕl hðaː saːmj jʃʕr baːlsːʕaːda waʔiiðaː ħuʃira aːlnːaːsu kaːnwaː lahum ʔaaʕdaːʔan wakaːnwaː biʕibaːdatihim kaːfirjna ʔiin ʔaanaː ʔiilːaː naðjrun mubjnun walakin ʔaan takuwna bimaaː bijadi aːllːahi ʔaawθaqu mink bimaaː fij jadijk ʔaani aːʁdwaː ʕalaː ħarθikum ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːrˤiʶmjnaʶ marad͡ʒa aːlbaħrajni jaltaqijaːni laaː juzhidanːak fij aːlmaʕruwfi kufru man kafarahu faqad jaʃkuru aːlʃːaaːkiru biʶʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶaʶːfiʶ d͡ʒuħuwdi aːlkaaːfiri ʔajːthaː aːlʕaːhra aːlχaːʔina maː jaʶlˤfiʶðˤuʶ min qawlin ʔiilːaː ladajhi raqjbun ʕatjdun kaːnt ʁaːʔiba bsbb aʶːlˤmrˤdˤ ʔaamaaː taʕrifunij faqaaːla aːlʔaaħmaqu kaaːlfaχːaaːri laaː juraqːaʕu walaaː juʃaʕːabu ʕljnaː aːltswq ʔaʶðˤlˤm mn ʔafʕaː laː tʔakl χbzk ʕlaː maːʔida ʁjrk mqaːrba ljlaː aːld͡ʒdjda χtˤjrˤaʶ bʃkl laː juʶsˤdːq aːnti ftaːtj aːlʔaːn kaːnt ʕnd saːmj ħsˤːaʶ rˤjaʶːdˤaʶ waʔiiðaaː taʶtˤaʶjːaʶrˤtuʶm faʶaʶːmdˤuʶwaʶː waʕalaaː aːllːahi fatawakːaluwaː ðlika biʔaanːahum ʃaːqːuwaː aːllːaha waraswlahu waman juʃaːqːi aːllːaha faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʃadjdu aːlʕiqaːbi waʔiin raʔaaaː fijhaaː suwʔanaː aːʕtaqadahu fij aːlnːaaːsi qad ʔaaflaħa man zakːaːhaː kaːn saːmj jlʕb lʕba mʕ aʶːlˤʃːjtˤaʶːn taquwlu labijbun ðuw lubːin aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤuʶ mustadijraaun kaːn saːmj aːlʔawːl fj sˤfːh ðhb aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː lzjaːra saːmj qaʶtˤaʶʕtaʶ maʶtˤaʶaʶːhuʶ law samiʕahaaː maaː ʔaaflaħa baʕdahaaː qad faʶrˤaʶdˤaʶ aːllːahu lakum taħilːaaa ʔaajmaːnikum waaːllːahu mawlaːkum wahuwa aːlʕaljmu aːlħakjmu laː ʔaʕrf ʔiðaː kaːn ldj aːlwqt aːlkaːfj lðlk w aːlʕks sˤħjħ ruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla liʕamːihi aːlʕabːaaːsi ʔin kaaːna min ʔaahli aːlmukaaːfaʔaaai ʔarq mn aːlnsjm faqaaːbala ʕalaaː aːld͡ʒafwaai aːliaːstirsaaːli waʶχaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶaʶuʶn min χaʶtˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶː aːlʔiidlaaːli faːkihjna bimaː ʔaːtaːhum rabːuhum wawaqaːhum rabːuhum ʕaðaːba aːld͡ʒaħjmi waaːlsːababu aːltːaaːsiʕu ʔiilːaː man tawalːaː wakafara falaaː jaʁtarːu biraχaaːʔin faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːhiʶrˤuʶ min madħihi kaðibanaː qijla wamaaː ʔaad͡ʒruhumaaː qaaːla miaːʔiaau maʁfiraain wamiaːʔiaau darad͡ʒaain fij aːld͡ʒanːaai ʔataː saːmj ʔilaː mwqf aːlħaːfla lˤaʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb ljlaː aːlʕnwaːn ʁjr sˤħjħ ʔinːh ʔamr bjnj w bjnki ʔakjljz btˤlˤ ʔaʶstˤwrˤj ʕnd aːlʔiʁrjq wasirːuk maaː kaaːna ʕinda aːmriʔiin wasirːu aːlθːalaaːθaai ʁajru aːlχafij waqaaːla ʔaːχaru waqad jakuwnu ðalika liʔaaħadi ʃajʔiajni waħasbuk min ħaaːdiθin biaːmriʔiin taraaː ħaaːsidijhi lahu raaːħimajnaaː waaːlχaaːmisu saːmj jnaːm hnaː hl lˤaʶːħðˤt kjf kaːn jnðˤrˤ ʔiljː tlqːaː saːmj aʶːtːsˤaʶːlˤaʶː mn aːbna frjd rʔajt ʃχsˤaʶː jqbːl twm saːmj jstrq aʶːlˤnːðˤrˤ ʕbr aːlnːwaːfð maːðaː fʕlt hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːuʶbħiʶ ʔiiðaː tanafːasa waʶtuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ man ħaramaka ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jʔaχð tlk aːldːrws kaːn mdrːs aːlfnwn sˤaʶːrˤmaʶː waaːlːaðjna ʔiiðaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶːbaʶhuʶmuʶ aːlbaʁju hum jaʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ waruwija ʕan aːbni ʕabːaaːsin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmudːaθːiru fd͡ʒʔaaan ʔaʶsˤbħt ħzjnaːan d͡ʒdaːan laaː ʔausamːijhi ʕaaːqilanaː ħatːaaː jakuwna χajːiranaː dajːinanaː wajuʃbihu ʔaan jakuwna aːlʕijːu fij maʕnaaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶmtiʶ waaːlmusaaːmaħaau nawʕaaːni fij ʕuquwdin waħuquwqin aːstmr aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ baʶːlˤhtˤwlˤ tˤwaʶːlˤ aːljwm kaːnt ljlaː daːʔimaː mʕ saːmj waʶχaʶlˤuʶsˤaʶ min faʶtˤaʶːfaʶ ʕalajhaː tˤaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn min rabːika wahum naːʔiimwna ʔaqll ʕtaːbk faːlbqaːʔ qljl χinzijrun waaːbki liʕilmin ħawaaːhu ʃirːijrun ʔaχbr saːmj ljlaː baːldːwaːʔ aːlðj qdːmh lhaː aːlqds ljs mʃklaː llmslmjn fqtˤ bl hw mʃkl dwlj bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlmursalaːti aːllʁaːt ʕjwnhaː χdˤrˤaʶːʔ hl trjd hðhi aːlbrtqaːla " laː, ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔaj brtqaːl ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤlˤaʶːq " hðh ʁlˤtˤtj watukθiru aːlmuwaaːsaaːaa waʶaʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶaʶːsˤuʶlˤaʶ ʔink laː thdj mn ʔaħbbt wlkn aːllh jhdj mn jʃaːʔ whw ʔaʕlm baːlmhtdjn klaː ʔinh kaːn lʔaːjaːtnaː ʕnjdaː wnrjd ʔan nmn ʕlaː aːlðjn aʶːstdˤʕfwaʶː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wnd͡ʒʕlhm ʔaʔima wnd͡ʒʕlhm aːlwaːrθjn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlˤfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤj tqrjraːan kaːmlaːan ħwl maː ħdθ waχalaqa aːld͡ʒaaːnːa min maaːrid͡ʒin min naaːrin kaːn mnːaːd jbjʕ aːldːrːaːd͡ʒaːt aːlhwaːʔijːa aːʕlamuwaː ʔaanːa aːllːaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi waʔaanːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun ldjnaː wrqa tθbt ʔan hðaː aːlχaːtm ʔaʶsˤlˤj bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aʶːlˤmsˤ ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna jaχʃawna rabːahum biaːlʁajbi lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun kabijrun jwm jʁʃaːhm aːlʕðaːb mn fwqhm wmn tħt ʔard͡ʒlhm wjqwl ðwqwaː maː kntm tʕmlwn bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabːuka biʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlfijli kaːn ʕljhm twqʕ ðlk falaaː jad͡ʒidu ʔilaaː aːlmuχaaːlafaai sabijlanaː jaː aːlhj ðw mra faːstwaː ʔimːaaː ʔaan jakuwna mustaqilːanaː binafsihi qul jaaː qawmi aːʕmaluwaː ʕalaaː makaaːnatikum ʔiinːij ʕaaːmilun fasawfa taʕlamuwna tħrːk mnːaːd waqaaːla aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaaʔiiðaaː kunːaaː turaaːbanaː waʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː ʔaaʔiinːaaː lamuχrad͡ʒuwna kaːn saːmj jd͡ʒtnb aːlmd͡ʒjʔ ʔilaː aːlmdjna hðaː lhw ħq aːljqjn hðaː aːlflm mljʔ baːlbkaːʔ ʔaʶʕtˤt lnaː aːlmdrsa aːlkθjr mn aːlwaːd͡ʒbaːt nħnu lsnaː aːlwħjdjn aːlðjn jʕtqdwn ʔanhu brʔi jwd͡ʒd χdʃa hnaː fhl tsttˤjʕ aʶːʕtˤaʶːʔiʶj ħsm aːðhb mstqjm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaaqrabu aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi sˤaʶrˤʕaʶaʶuʶ aʶːlˤðˤːaʶlˤuʶwmiʶ waʔaanfaðu aːlsːihaaːmi daʕwaau aʶːlˤmaʶðˤlˤuʶwmiʶ qaːl fjhaː tħjwn wfjhaː tmwtwn wmnhaː tχrd͡ʒwn walaaː wazajtuwnanaː wanaχlaː hnaːk fj wstˤ ʕjnjk aːd͡ʒd aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq ʕtl bʕd ðlk znjm ʔaawalam jara aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaanːaaː χalaqnaaːhu min nuʶtˤfaʶaʶiʶn faʔiiðaaː huwa χaʶsˤiʶjmuʶn mubijnun wahija aːlmartabaau aːlθːaaːnijaau min maraaːtibi aːlʔiiχaaːʔi lan tanfaʕakum ʔaarħaaːmukum walaaː ʔaawlaaːdukum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai jaʶfsˤiʶlˤuʶ bajnakum waaːllːahu bimaaː taʕmaluwna baʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶn walaaː waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ fahija ʔaan taχtalifa quwaaː aːlnːafsi min d͡ʒihatajni mutaqaaːbilatajni faʔiin kaaːna aːlwaladu raʃijdanaː ʔaaw kaaːna aːlʔaabu barːanaː ʕaʶtˤuʶwfaʶnaʶː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ ʔiilːaaː aːmraʔaatahu qadːarnaaːhaaː mina aːlʁaaːbirijna laː tqlq ʔinhu laː jfhm aːlʔalmaːnja aːnzʕj d͡ʒwrbjki ʔamn hðaː aːlðj jrzqkm ʔin ʔamsk rzqh bl ld͡ʒwaː fj ʕtw wnfwr tnhd djmaː wqaːl: " fhmt ʔaːsf ʕlaː aʶːlˤlˤχbtˤaʶ ʔiðn aːstmtʕ baːlfaːntaː wjwmanaː sʕjdanaː " kaːn hðaː aːlktaːb kθjraː mn aʶːlˤsˤfħaʶːt laː jsbqwnh baːlqwl whm bʔamrh jʕmlwn qaːlwaː ʔanhm lm jblʁwaː aːlθlaːθjn bʕd ʔawlʔik jaʕbuduwhaaː waʔaanaaːbuwaː ʔiilaaː aːllːahi lahumu aːlbuʃraaː fabaʃːir ʕibaaːdi ʔaaw jaʔaχuðahum fij taqalːubihim famaaː hum bimuʕd͡ʒizijna bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlr ktaːb ʔaħkmt ʔaːjaːth θm fsˤlˤt mn ldn ħkjm χbjr jaː ʔajhaː aːlnbj ħsbk aːllh wmn aːtbʕk mn aːlmʔumnjn ʔaam lam junabːaʔa bimaaː fij sˤuʶħuʶfiʶ muwsaaː ʔin ʔiljnaː ʔijaːbhm fmaː kaːn dʕwaːhm ʔið d͡ʒaːʔhm bʔasnaː ʔilaː ʔan mmd͡ʒــــــــــــــــdaː jaː taːrw rwħ wfrʃ ʔasnaːnk faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħt jalqaaːnij aːlzːamaaːnu liʔaad͡ʒlihi biʶʔiʶiʶʕðˤaʶaʶːmiʶ mawluwdin waʔiiʃfaaːqi waaːlidi faʔaamːaaː aːlmuntaqilu fahuwa aːlʔiidlaaːlu ʔaalaaː ʔiinːahum humu aːlmufsiduwna walakin laaː jaʃʕuruwna ħbjbj ʔaqdːm ʕmrj lka hdjːa hðh aʶːlˤqdˤjaʶ mʕrwfa mnð wqt tˤwjlˤ hl twd͡ʒd klma ʔaχraː jmkn aːstʕmaːlhaː bdlaː mn " mraːdf " waʕiʃnaaː fijhaaː ʁaaːfilijna ʕaːml aːlnaːs brʔaj rfjq waːlq mn tlqaː bwd͡ʒhin tˤlˤjq jawmaʔiiðin laaː tanfaʕu aːlʃːafaaːʕaau ʔiilːaaː man ʔaaðina lahu aːlrːaħmanu waʶrˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ lahu qawlanaː waqad qijla man wadakːa tˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː fijk ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤaʶk ʔiðaaː ʔaajisa mink ʕjnaː jʃrb bhaː aːlmqrbwn waθulmaaun jasudːuhaaː fij aːlmuʔuaaːzaraai waʶaʶːlˤmuʶðˤaʶaʶːfaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnːaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaaː d͡ʒaaːnːun wbraː bwaːldtj wlm jd͡ʒʕlnj d͡ʒbaːraː ʃqjaː wqaːl aːrkbwaː fjhaː bsm aːllh md͡ʒraːhaː wmrsaːhaː ʔin rbj lʁfwr rħjm faʔiin lam taʶstaʶtˤiʶʕ fabiqalbik kamaaː juqaaːlu fij ʔiθbaaːti aːlʃːajʔi huwa huwa aːlʕzr lwdfjk zaːmnhwf, aːlðj kaːn jʔaml fj twħjd kl aːlbʃrja, smaː aːbnh ʔaːdm fj aʶːlˤʕsˤwrˤ aːlqdjma aːʕtqd ʔaʁlb rˤaʶːsˤdj aːlsmaːʔ walajsa jaʕlamu ʔaanːa aʶːlˤdˤːaʶd͡ʒuʶwrˤaʶ χaaːʔiibun quli aʶːnðˤuʶrˤuʶwaʶː maaːðaaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaaː tuʁnij aːlʔaːjaaːtu waaːlnːuðuru ʕan qawmin laaː juʔuminuwna mθl aːlfrjqjn kaːlʔaʕmaː waʶːlˤʔaʶsˤm waʶːlˤbsˤjrˤ waːlsmjʕ hl jstwjaːn mθlaː ʔaflaː tðkrwn ʕaːd saːmj mn aːlqaːhra mawkuwlaaun ʔilaaː munaaːfasaai aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ waːlmʔutfka ʔahwaː laː daːʕj llqlq waaːlsːakijnaau waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aʶːlˤsːaʶχaʶtˤiʶ waʶdˤaʶʕfiʶ aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ qaːlwaː taːllh tftʔa tðkr jwsf ħtaː tkwn ħrˤdˤaʶː ʔaw tkwn mn aːlhaːlkjn laaː tad͡ʒʕal maʕa aːllːahi ʔiilahanaː ʔaːχara fataqʕuda maðmuwmanaː maχðuwlanaː waʔaamːaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu waraaːʔa ðˤaʶhrˤiʶhiʶ qaːl km lbθtm fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʕdd snjn waʶbaʶtˤaʶntaʶ ʕaqlahu ʕajbun tuʶħiʶjtˤuʶ bihi kaθraau faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶhiʶ sjstkʃf tlskwb d͡ʒjms waːb aːlkwn baːstχdaːm aːlmwd͡ʒaːt aʶːlˤtˤwjlˤaʶ baːlbħθ bʕjdaː fj aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕdj slˤtˤaʶ lðjða rˤaʶdˤuʶwaʶː biʔaan jakuwnuwaː maʕa aːlχawaaːlifi waʶtˤuʶbiʶʕaʶ ʕalaaː quluwbihim fahum laaː jafqahuwna aːqtħm twm aːlʁrfa wataraaː kaθijranaː minhum jusaaːriʕuwna fij aːlʔiiθmi waaːlʕudwaaːni waʔaaklihimu aːlsːuħta labiʔisa maaː d͡ʒw ðhbaː ʔilaː aːlmntzh ljlʕbaː aːltns aːd͡ʒlb lh bʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ ʔataː aːlsjd smjθ ʕmlhn hw td͡ʒmjl aːlfnaːnjn wajunfiqa ʔaamwaaːlahu fijmaaː laaː jaʶħsˤuʶlˤuʶ lahu θawaaːbuhu waʔaad͡ʒruhu waaːlːaðijna laaː jaʃhaduwna aːlzːuwra waʔiiðaaː marːuwaː biaːllːaʁwi marːuwaː kiraaːmanaː kjfmaː saːʔt ħaːlthaː fhj tʕml daːʔimaːan ʔanaː ʔaʶsˤdq ʔank trjd ʔan tsaːʕd juʶfdˤːlˤ ʔalaː tðhb tˤlˤb twm mnj aːlmsaːʕda ʔaħs bʔalm fj rʔasj faman kaaːnat fatratuhu ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi faqad nad͡ʒaaː hl ħqaː ʔant ʔamjra waminhum man jastad͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː fiʕli aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ wajuqdimu ʕalaaː aːrtikaaːbi aʶːlˤmaʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj waqad ʔaʶaʶfsˤaʶħaʶ labijdun maʕa ʔaaʕraaːbijːaain bimaaː tabajːana bihi ħaaːlu aːlʔaamali fij aːlʔaamrajni jawma laaː juʁnij ʕanhum kajduhum ʃajʔianaː walaaː hum juʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ raħima aːllːahu aːmraʔaan ʔaaʕaaːna waladahu ʕalaaː birːihi ʔiinːahu kaaːna fij ʔaahlihi masruwranaː ʔinnaː nʕrf ʔahlh nħn nʕjʃ fj md͡ʒtmʕ fad͡ʒaʕalahum kaʶʕaʶsˤfiʶn mːaʔakuwlin liʔaanːa aːlwaaːħida qad juqtalu qabla buluwʁi aʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤiʶ walaʕalːa maaː sˤuʶrˤiʶfaʶ ʕanhu ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ mimːaaː aːubtulija aːlmktb mkswr watamaaːmuhaaː fij aːlχaaːmisaai muʕalːimun naʶaʶːsˤiʶħuʶn waːldtj aːχðt drws frnsja mn ʕda snwaːt waʔiiðaaː qijla lahumu aːsd͡ʒuduwaː lilrːaħmani qaaːluwaː wamaaː aːlrːaħmanu ʔaanasd͡ʒudu limaaː taʔamurunaaː wazaaːdahum nufuwranaː fqlt aːstʁfrwaː rbkm ʔinh kaːn ʁfaːraː fajaðhabuwaː dˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕiʶjnaʶ waʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶwaʶː ʕad͡ʒazaaan maʶdˤʕuʶwfiʶjnaʶ laaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwnaʶ naʶsˤrˤaʶhuʶm wahum lahum d͡ʒundun muʶħdˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ sajahdijhim waʶjuʶsˤlˤiʶħuʶ baaːlahum bal matːaʕtu haʔuulaaːʔi waʔaːbaaːʔahum ħatːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahumu aːlħaqːu warasuwlun mubijnun ʔanːaː ldjhaː ʃʕr bunj kstnaːʔij, wlkn maːd͡ʒdaːljnaː ldjhaː ʃʕr ʔaʃqr tlskwb d͡ʒjms waːb aːlmrtqb aːltaːbʕ lwkaːla naːsaː w aːlwkaːla aʶːlˤfdˤaʶːʔiʶjaʶ aːlʔawrbja waːlkndja kaːn twm jrjd ʔan jkwn kʔaχjh d͡ʒwn saːmj jkrh aːlmaːʔ wlwlaː ʔan θbtnaːk lqd kdt trkn ʔiljhm ʃjʔiaː qljlaː wʔamaː ʕaːd fʔahlkwaː brjħ baːlkaːfrjn ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːlsmk ʕlaː aːllħm lðaː fʔinnaː nħb aːld͡ʒml lknnaː nħb aːllʁaːt ʔakθr ʔanaː dˤd͡ʒrˤ fahuwa aʶːlˤquʶrˤuʶwdˤuʶ jusʕifu ʕinda aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai wajastaridːu ʕinda aːliaːstiʁnaaːʔi wqaːl aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aːqtarabati aːlsːaaːʕaau waaːnʃaqːa aːlqamaru qaaːla jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmalaʔau ʔaajːukum jaʔatijnij biʕarʃihaaː qabla ʔaan jaʔatuwnij muslimijna wamin aʶːlˤsˤːaʶniʶjʕaʶaʶiʶ ʔaan tarubːa ħusna aʶːlˤsˤːaʶniʶjʕaʶaʶiʶ jawma naʶbtˤiʶʃuʶ aʶːlˤbaʶtˤʃaʶaʶaʶ aːlkubraaː ʔiinːaaː muntaqimuwna wamaaː sˤuʶdːaʶ ʕan aːlsːarafi mustadijmun ʕljnaː aːħtraːm waːldjnaː wʔiðaː dʕwaː ʔilaː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna kmaː ʔaχrd͡ʒk rbk mn bjtk baːlħq wʔin frjqaː mn aːlmʔumnjn lkaːrhwn waaːʕlam ʔaanːa aːldːunjaaː lam takun qaʶtˤːuʶ lid͡ʒamijʕi ʔaahlihaaː musʕidaaan waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː faaːrtaqib jawma taʔatij aːlsːamaaːʔu biduχaaːnin mubijnin ʕlm aːlʔinsaːn maː lm jʕlm ʔiinːa haʔuulaaːʔi juħibːuwna aːlʕaaːd͡ʒilaaa wajaðaruwna waraaːʔahum jawmanaː θaqijlanaː aʶːħaʶːtˤ mħtwaː ʔaasbaaːbuhaaː waaːqtarana biħamijːaai aːlnːasabi muʶsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːaʶuʶ aːlmawadːaai hðaː mn aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltj ʔaħbːhaː fj aːlʔislaːm waaːlχaaːmisaaa ʔaanːa ʁaʶdˤaʶbaʶ aːllːahi ʕalajhaaː ʔiin kaaːna ʔaafaʁajra aːllːahi tatːaquwna walaðːaaːtuhaaː faaːnijaaun lst ʔanaː mn ʕljh aːlʔid͡ʒaːba hðaː ħzaːm mn aːld͡ʒld hl mn ʔaħd ljsaːʕdnj ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lħfla aːlhaːlwwjn χaʶːsˤtk daːʔimaːan maː jrtdj fahuwa laaː jaʕrifu qadra aːlnːiʕmaai biʔaamnihi ħatːaaː jaχaaːfa hðaː aːlkrsj mkswr walaaː ʔauqsimu biaːlnːafsi aːllːawːaaːmaai ʔantm mħðˤwðˤwn faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː rasuwla rabːihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan baːbl fjnaː wʔaːʃwr lnaː waʔiiðaaː aːlnːufuwsu zuwːid͡ʒat qaaːla bal faʕalahu kabijruhum haðaaː faaːsʔaaluwhum ʔiin kaaːnuwaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ waːldj fj ʁrfth ʔanaː mʃʁwla aːlʔan aːtrknj w ʃʔanj dʕjnaː fqtˤ ntðˤaʶːhrˤ wkʔannaː laː nʕrf bʕdˤnaʶː aʶːlˤbʕdˤ bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlʃːamsi waʶdˤuʶħaʶaʶːhaʶaʶː maːðaː jtʕlːmn wmaː ʔanzlnaː ʕlaː qwmh mn bʕdh mn d͡ʒnd mn aːlsmaːʔ wmaː knaː mnzljn wad͡ʒaaːʔa min ʔaʶaʶqsˤaʶaʶː aːlmadijnaai rad͡ʒulun jasʕaaː qaaːla jaaː qawmi aːtːabiʕuwaː aːlmursalijna waːfq mnːaːd faaːntaqamnaaː minhum waʔiinːahumaaː labiʔiimaaːmin mubijnin fʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt fjdχlhm rbhm fj rħmth ðlk hw aːlfwz aːlmbjn laː jʕrf twm aːnnj fj hnaː klb kjn ʔaʶbjdˤ ldj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ lʔarjk wlʔin ʔaðqnaː aːlʔinsaːn mnaː rħma θm baʶːlˤdˤrˤwrˤaʶ ʔan kl maː jqwlh aːlmʕlm sˤħjħ daːʔimanaː maː hj sˤfaʶːth waʔiinːamaaː ðakarahu taʶʕðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː lilʕilmi ʕan ʔaan juʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶ bihi jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmstʔad͡ʒr dfʕ aːlaːjd͡ʒaːr llmʔud͡ʒr fj nhaːja kl ʃhr ʔaħb mmaːrsa aːlʔalʕaːb aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶ ʔajn tskn kaaːlnːaaːri justadfaʕu biaːlmaaːʔi ʔiħraaːquhaaː waminhum ʔaumːijːuwna laaː jaʕlamuwna aːlkitaaːba ʔiilːaaː ʔaamaaːnijːa waʔiin hum ʔiilːaaː jaʶðˤuʶnːuʶwnaʶ aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː haðihi aːlrːaaːħaai kajfa taʕad͡ʒːalahaaː waʔiilaaː aːlsːalaaːmaai kajfa sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ ʔilajhaaː waʔaaqimi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ tˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶjiʶ aːlnːahaaːri wazulafanaː mina aːllːajli ʔiinːa aːlħasanaaːti juðhibna aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti ðalika ðikraaː lilðːaaːkirijna ʔilaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt wtwaʶːsˤwaʶː baːlħq wtwaʶːsˤwaʶː baʶːlˤsˤbrˤ fljʔatwaː bħdjθ mθlh ʔin kaːnwaː sˤaʶːdqjn lqd dfʕt kl maː ʔamlk qaːʕda aːlbjaːnaːt hðh dˤrˤwrˤjaʶ ltmkjn aːlbaːħθjn mn ttˤwjrˤ tqnjaːt ðkaːʔ aʶːsˤtˤnaʶːʕj ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr ʔiʶjtˤaʶːlˤj ʔaafamaaː kasaba sajːiʔiaaan waʶʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶt bihi χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶtuʶhuʶ faʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna kaːbwl hj ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ ʔafʁaːnstaːn hl hw ʕlaː ʕlm baʶːlˤsˤʕwbaʶ ʔaːχara ʔiinːij lakum minhu naðijrun mubijnun faaːd͡ʒʕalhaaː tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶaʶn waʔaawlaaː aːlħasanaaːti biaːlʔaad͡ʒri waaːlθːawaaːbi ʔaamruhu wanahjuhu fij wud͡ʒuwhi aʶːlˤmaʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶ aːlʕaːʃra laː jwd͡ʒd aːstθnaːʔaːt lhðh aːlqaːʕda ʕadlu aːlʔiinsaaːni maʕa man fawqahu d͡ʒrb ħðˤk dʕwnaː nʕks aːlʕmla ʔiʶtaʶsˤaʶlˤtuʶ ʕljhaː msaːʔ aːlʔams wlknhaː lm tud͡ʒib lj d͡ʒaːr jhwdj ʔanaː ʃχsˤ aːlklaːb wmaː hw bqwl ʃjtˤaʶːn rd͡ʒjm ʔam lm jʕrfwaː rswlhm fhm lh mnkrwn ʔaan laaː jadχulanːahaaː aːljawma ʕalajkum miskijnun ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːra jhwdja ljs " hw ʔibnj " wlkn " ʔanaː waːldh " rwaːhu aːltːirmðjːu waːlnːasaːʔiijːu wqaːla aːltːirmðjːu: ħdjθun ħsanun sˤħjħuʶn mutːakiʔiijna ʕalaaː sururin maʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶiʶn wazawːad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabːanaː kaːn mnːaːd jswq aːldːraːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlqaːhra mtwd͡ʒːhaː ʔilaː mnzlh waaːd͡ʒʕal ʔaabʕada ʔaamlika baqijːaaa jawmik lm jqsˤd twm aːldws ʕlaː qdm maːrj waqismun munaaːsibuwna mn fdˤlˤk tħdθ bbtˤʔ, kj ʔafhmk dʕaːma lˤlˤnhwdˤ baːlʔamaːzjʁja ln ʔaʶqdˤj ħjaːtj mtswlaː ʕn lʁtj fj d͡ʒmhwrja tsˤf nfshaː baːlʕrbja juqalːibu aːllːahu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʕibraaan liʔauwlij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ mn fdˤlˤk ʔaʶʕtˤnj qlmaːan w bdˤʕaʶ ʔawraːq jnbʁj ʔan trd aːldjwn aːltj ʕljk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm khjʕsˤ ʔaaw mutadajːananaː bihi fij aːlʃːarʕi wad͡ʒaaːʔa firʕawnu waman qablahu waaːlmuʔutafikaaːtu biʶaʶːlˤχaʶaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶaʶaʶiʶ waaːliaːχtilaaːfu bitadbijrihi ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ wtlk ħd͡ʒtnaː ʔaːtjnaːhaː ʔibraːhjm ʕlaː qwmh nrfʕ drd͡ʒaːt mn nʃaːʔ ʔin rbk ħkjm ʕljm ʔaafamani aːtːabaʕa maaːlin wad͡ʒadahu walaaː nufuwðu ʔaamrin waʕuluwːu manzilaain ʔajn mrjm waʔiinːamaaː justakfaaː biaːltːaʔaalːufi ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶhaʶaʶː wajastanbiʔiuwnaka ʔaaħaqːun huwa qul ʔiij warabːij ʔiinːahu ʔaaħadanaː lamad͡ʒmuwʕuwna ʔiilaaː mijqaaːti jawmin mːaʕluwmin nħn klaːnaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ʔasmʕt ʔanh qd ʕaːd ʔaχjraː ʔilaː bjth ʔin kaːn ðnbj ʔanː ħbːk ʃaːʁlj ʕmːn swaːk aːlħdjθ aːlθaːmn ʕʃr: aːlχlq faʔiinːa aːlʕizːaaa lilːahi d͡ʒamijʕanaː aːlʁjra laː td͡ʒʕl ʔaħd mχlˤsˤ jħbhaː hj lˤtˤjfaʶ mʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕ fij sˤuʶħuʶfiʶn mːukarːamaain hðh ljst d͡ʒmlaan lqd qmt brħla ʕbr kndaː fj aːbrjl mn aːlsna nakaaːla aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʔauwlaaː kaːn mnːaːd jbjʕ aːldːrːaːd͡ʒaːt knt fj aːlmnzl jrjd ʔan jχrd͡ʒkm mn ʔaʶrˤdˤkm bsħrh fmaːðaː tʔamrwn walaʕamrij ʔinːa ʔiχwaaːna aʶːlˤsˤːiʶdqiʶ min ʔaanfasi jaʃʕurwna kjf ħaːl aːld͡ʒmjʕ waqad tuħdiθu aːlmanaaːzilu waaːlwilaaːjaaːtu liqawmin ʔaaχlaaːqanaː maðmuwmaaan juʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶhaʶaʶː suwʔu tˤiʶbaʶaʶːʕiʶhiʶm ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdth lmn hðjn aːlħðaːʔijn aːlʔaawːalijna kaːn saːmj laː jzaːl fj aːlʕjaːda waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj ħjaːth ʔamlt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ ʔan jqdːm saːmj bʕdˤ aːlmʕlwmaːt ʕn mkaːn twaːd͡ʒd ljlaː lijawmi aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ aːlmazːaaːħu muʶdˤiʶrˤːuʶn hw kafarwaː bihi min qablu wajaqðifwna biaːlʁajbi min makaːnin baʕjdin waqaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶ maaː laaː judraku ʕad͡ʒzun waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi jakfijk min aːlħaaːsidi ʔaanːahu jaʁtamːu fij waqti suruwrik ʔin aːlmsʔala aːlʔawlaː aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan nd͡ʒaːbhhaː hj aʶːlˤttˤrˤf aːlʕnjf bkaːfa ʔaʃkaːlh law kunːaaː naʶtˤlˤuʶbuʶ aːlʕilma linabluʁa ʁaaːjatahu kunːaaː qad badaʔanaaː aːlʕilma biʶaʶːlˤnːaʶqiʶjsˤaʶaʶiʶ hl ʔant tfkːr fj ʔiχbaːrh ʕn ðlk fajaqharu nafsahu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ raʁbaaan fij aːld͡ʒazaaːʔi waaːlθːawaaːbi qdːm saːmj lˤlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ wsˤfaʶː ʕn aːlmʃtbh bh lam juʁnihi minhaaː kaθraau maaː jad͡ʒmaʕu ʔiiði aːnbaʕaθa ʔaaʃqaːhaː wamaː huwa biaːlhazli ʔaj tˤflˤ jʕrf ðlk mħmd rswl aːllh ʔiðaː ðˤlˤmt mn dwnk flaː tʔamn ʕqaːb mn fwqk falilːahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔawlaː kaːnt ljlaː trjd ʔan tsˤbħ mmrˤːdˤaʶ waqaaːla saaːbuwru bnu ʔaardaʃijra aːlʕaqlu nawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː maʶtˤbuʶwʕuʶn waaːlʔaːχaru masmuwʕun waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤmuʶʕtˤiʶj faʔiinːahu wad͡ʒada ðalika aːtːifaaːqanaː warubːamaaː ʔaamala biaːliaːtːifaaːqi ʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː munjbjna ʔiilajhi waaːtːaqwhu waʔaaqjmuwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶːaʶaʶ walaː takwnwaː mina aːlmuʃrikjna rakːaba aːllːahu aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa min ʕaqlin bilaaː ʃahwaain mn fdˤlˤk wzːʕ aːlwrq faqaːla ʔaanaː rabːukumu aːlʔaaʕlaː ljtnj knt qaːdraː ʕlaː nsjaːn tlk aːlħaːdθa waʔiiðaː qjla lahumu aːsd͡ʒudwaː lilrːaħmni qaːlwaː wamaaː aːlrːaħmnu ʔaanasd͡ʒudu limaː taʔamurunaː wazaːdahum nufwranaː hal ʔaataːka ħadjθu mwsaː wud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin naʶːdˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn waʔiiðaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ mudːat kaːn ðlk aːlmdrːs mmlaːː fajamqutuwk waʶjuʶtˤaʶːfuʶ ʕalajhim biʔaːnijaain min fiʶdˤːaʶaʶiʶn waʔaakwaːbin kaːnat qawaːrjraː ʔiinːaː d͡ʒaʕalnaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː laʕalːakum taʕqilwna jʕml saːmj fj aːlʕjaːda aːlbldjːa faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶhiʶ fij aːlnːufuwsi maʶwdˤiʶʕuʶn ʔaan tantahija bihi aːlqanaaːʕaau ʔilaaː aːlkifaaːjaai lqd ʔawqʕ saːmj nfsh fj fχː bsbb fmh aːlθːrθaːr wabiaːlmaqti mazd͡ʒuwranaː lm jfwt twm wmaːrj waʔaalanːaː lahu aːlħadjda aːlmizaaːħu waʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶħiʶkuʶ aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlχaaːmisu fij aːlmizaaːħi waʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶħiʶkiʶ rabːanaː laː tad͡ʒʕalnaː fitnaaan lilːaðjna kafarwaː waaːʁfir lanaː rabːanaː ʔiinːaka ʔaanta aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu ʔin aːlʔajaːdj qrˤwdˤ waʶjuʶsˤlˤiʶħuʶ zajfak wafaaːsidak liʔaanːa aːlθːanaaːʔa jabʕaθu ʕalaaː aːlbaðli waħubːa aːlmaaːli jamnaʕu minhu walaqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤːaʶ minkum d͡ʒibilːanaː kaθjranaː ʔaafalam takwnwaː taʕqilwna bdʔa saːmj draːsth aːld͡ʒaːmʕjːa fj sbtmbr ʔiinːamaː nuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶkuʶm liwad͡ʒhi aːllːahi laː nurjdu minkum d͡ʒazaːʔan walaː ʃukwranaː maʶrˤiʶdˤaʶ aːlʁulaːamu lqd nsˤbaʶː ʕljː waaːlːaðj ʔaʶaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ ʔaan jaʁfira lj χaʶtˤjʔiʶaʶtj jawma aːldːjni laː jstħqː saːmj nhaːja mʔasaːwjːa khðh wamaː tud͡ʒzawna ʔiilːaː maː kuntum taʕmalwna kaːn saːmj jʃʕr baːlsːʕaːda bdaːχlh wafawaːkiha mimːaː jaʃtahwna dʕnj aːraː walaaː jadiqːu fij wahmin ljst ldjː ʔawʃaːm ʔaʶaʶtaʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ lilbalwaaː ʕazaaːʔan waχaʃjaaan fatuʔud͡ʒaru ʔaaw tasluw suluwːa aːlbahaaːʔiim wasalːama waʔaanaaː ʔaatamaθːalu bihaðajni aːlbajtajni waaːlʔaad͡ʒru ʔaad͡ʒdaru bihi min aːlʔiiθmi waaːlʕizːu ʔaaljaqu bihi min aːlðːulːi ʔaːml ʔan tʔatj ʕtˤlˤaʶ aʶːlˤsˤjf bsrʕa waqad qaaːlat daaːχilanaː kalːaː ʔiiðaː dukːati aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ dakːanaː dakːanaː kaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ bmlaːbs ʔanjqa χdˤʕ saːmj ltlk aːllːʕba aːld͡ʒnsjːa aʶːlˤχtˤjrˤaʶ mn tlk aːlbnt kaðaba aʶːlˤʕuʶsˤfuʶwrˤuʶ faʔiinːa ʁurafa dimaʃqa mabnijːaaun biʶaʶːlˤsˤːuʶχuʶwrˤiʶ laaː jaqdiru ʔaan juskinahaaː hunaaːka jurjdu ʔaan juχrid͡ʒakum min ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶkuʶm bisiħrihi famaːðaː taʔamurwna ʔatħb mwsjqaː aːlraːb ʕalːamahu nfsk liʔaanːa aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤaʶ hajʔiaaːtun muʶtaʶwaʶsːiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶtaʶjniʶ naʶaʶːqiʶsˤaʶtaʶjniʶ ʔabtsm saːmj bsχrjːa tslːq saːmj ʃd͡ʒra ʕaːlja d͡ʒdːaː naːru aːllːahi aːlmwqadaau jaː lhaː mn ftaːa d͡ʒmjla waʔiin kaːnwaː lajaqwlwna wafij ʕawaaːqibihi saaːlimanaː kulwaː waaːʃrabwaː hanjʔianaː bimaː kuntum taʕmalwna wamud͡ʒaaːnabaaa aːlʃːubhaai aːlmumaaːzad͡ʒaai lahu waʶsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶ kulːi dunjaaː aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilajhim ħasanaaːtuhum min sajːiʔiaaːtihim walakin ʔiðaaː θaaːra bihi aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʕinda hud͡ʒuwmi maaː juʶʁdˤiʶbuʶhuʶ kafːa sawratahu biħazmihi ʔanaː ʔansaː rqm haːtfk dˤaʶːħiʶkaʶaʶuʶn mustabʃiraaun fakun ʔaaħsana ħadijθin junʃaru jakun ljlaː bʕjda ʕn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ aːlðj laː jʕrf aʶːlˤsˤqrˤ jʃwjh waliʔaad͡ʒli haðaaː aːlmaħkijːi ʕan ʕumara maaː qijla qadijmanaː ʔiʶfrˤaʶaʶːtˤuʶ aːlʕaqli muʶdˤiʶrˤːuʶn biaːld͡ʒasadi ʔaːmulu ðlk man ʕalima ʔaanːa kulːa naaːʔiibaain ʔilaaː aʶːnqiʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶn ħasuna ʕazaaːʔuuhu ʕinda nuzuwli aːlbalaaːʔi faʔaaχaðahu baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi faqaaːla ʔinːa aːlħasuwda aʶːlˤðˤːaʶlˤuʶwmaʶ fij karbin jaχaaːluhu faʔaaχrad͡ʒa bihi mina aːlθːamaraaːti rizqanaː lakum falaaː tad͡ʒʕaluwaː lilːahi ʔaandaaːdanaː waʔaantum taʕlamuwna ðlk raːʔiʕ ħqaːan sˤrˤχ tˤaʶːlˤbaʶːaʶn aːlnd͡ʒda kaːn mdrːsnaː aːlbdjl ʃaːbːaː ldjnaː bʕdˤ aːlwqt aːlʔaːn zjːn saːmj aːlmktb lmaːðaː ʔant fj ʕd͡ʒla mn ʔamrk hkðaː mn jʕlm hl sbq lk aːn zrt rwmaː ʔatrjdjn ʔan ʔaqrʔa tˤaʶːlˤʕkiʶ waaːlθːaaːnij maaː kaaːna ʕan tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶn wasuʔuaaːlin hðihi d͡ʒahanːamu aːlːatj kuntum twʕadwna rˤbtˤt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ saːmj baːld͡ʒrjma ðˤnntk ʕθrt ʕlaː ʃχsˤ ʔaːχr waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlmubaaːraki tˤaʶlˤaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlʕilma lildːunjaaː fadalːanaaː ʕalaaː tarki aːldːunjaaː saːmj jħbːkm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aʶːlˤsˤːiʶdquʶ mund͡ʒijk waʔiin χifth waaːlkaðibu murdijk waʔiin ʔaaminth min ʔaajn huw waʶjaʶsˤtˤaʶniʶʕaʶ bihaaː aːlmaʕruwfa nzl aːlwld mn ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra falaaː biʶaʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ ʔaaχaða walaaː ʔilaaː aːlʕafwi ʔaaχlada laaː talawːiθ jadajka biaːlmidaaːdi wdˤʕt ljlaː ħjaːthaː w maːlhaː w mstqblhaː kʔamaːna bjn jdj faʶːdˤlˤ saːmj jħbː aːlfrwla waljaʕlam ʔaanːa likulːi ħijnin min ʔaajːaaːmi ʕumurihi χuluqanaː laaː tamnun biʕamalik tastakθir ʕalaaː rabːik ln ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːlqdwm ʁdaː lm jtχaʶːsˤmaʶː saːmj w ljlaː qtˤː ʔaħb dˤwʔ aːlʃmwʕ waliðalika qijla aːlʕurju aːlfaaːdiħu χajrun min aːlzːijːi aʶːlˤfaʶaʶːdˤiʶħiʶ wabiaːlʔaasħaːri hum jastaʁfirwna ħsbmaː thjʔ fraːʃk jkwn nwmk waʔiið qultum jaaː muwsaaːaː lan nuʔumina laka ħatːaaːaː naraaː aːllːaha d͡ʒahraaan waman qanaʕa biʶʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ lam jadχulhu ħasadun aːlʁfwraːlwdwdaːlħqaːlslaːm waʔiin kaaːna balijdanaː baʕijda aʶːlˤfiʶtˤnaʶaʶiʶ fajanbaʁij ʔaan laaː jumnaʕa min aːljasijri fajaħrumu hl jtħdθ twm aːlfrnsja aʶːjdˤaʶː lm ʔatlqːaː aːlrːsaːʔil falaʔaan tasʔaala wataslama χajrun lak min ʔaan tastabidːa watandama waqaaːla ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna liaːbnihi hurmuza waqaaːla saʕijdu bnu ʕurwaaa ʔamtlk ðaːkra kaːlsmka aːlðhbja qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕir waʔiiðaaː waʕada falaaː juχlifu laː tʔat hnaː tʃrːft blqaːʔik jaː twm mn jtklm jzrʕ wmn jsˤmt jndˤd͡ʒ faqaaːla lij qad qaʶsˤaʶdtuʶk bimasʔaalaain aːχtartuk lahaaː watanzijhanaː ʕan aːltːamalːuqi bihi ʔaakramu aːlʃːijami ʔaarʕaaːhaaː lilðːimami msaːʔ aːlχjr kθra aʶːlˤdˤħk tðhb aːlhjba maaː faʕala birðawnuk qaaːla man ʔaaraaːda waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ ʕalaaː mawaaːqiʕi aːlkurhi tudraku aʶːlˤħuʶðˤuʶwðˤuʶ liʔaanːa aːlʁunma biaːlʔiiqdaaːmi smʕ aːlmdrːs ðlk ʔanaː bkaːml aːstʕdaːdj aːlmahaaːnaau waqilːaau aːlʔaamaaːnaai nʕm sjkfj aːlħljb ħtaː jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa ʔaan jukaaːfiʔia ʕalajhaaː lqd wrθ ðlk aʶːlˤqsˤrˤ ʔaʶaʶχaʶtˤiʶjbuʶn ʔaanaaː qaaːla lst mtʔakdanaː mmaː ʔiðaː knt ʔaʶfdˤlˤ hðaː ʔam ðaːk hl ʃrbt ʕsˤjrˤ aːlbrtqaːl hðaː ʔijːaaːkum waʶaʶːlˤnːaʶðˤrˤaʶaʶaʶ baʕda aʶːlˤnːaʶðˤrˤaʶaʶiʶ faʔiinːahaaː tazraʕu fij aːlqalbi aːlʃːahwaaa wajasluba min aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ maaː aːʃtahara faʕːaːlun limaː jurjdu waʔaːjaaun lahumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ aːlmajtaau ʔaaħjajnaːhaː waʔaaχrad͡ʒnaː minhaː ħabːanaː faminhu jaʔakulwna kaːn saːmj mn ʔasra mslma mltzma waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlħasani aːlmaaːwardijːu lm jbaːl saːmj ʔan laː jkwn jwmh mljʔiaː baːlʔaʃʁaːl klː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ saːmj mn aːlʕjaːda jaaː bunajːa aːstaqilːa aːlkaθijra mimːaaː tuʶʕtˤiʶj ldjnaː dˤjf waʔiinːamaaː ðakara ðalika fijhimaaː aʶːtːsˤlˤ bj fj ʔajː lˤħðˤaʶ tħtaːd͡ʒnj fjhaː "hðaː lˤtˤf mnk jaː dktwr" waqad qaaːla aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤuʶ bnu aːlʕabːaaːsi bni ʕutbaaa bni ʔaabij lahabin waqaaːla aːbnu aːlʔaaʕraaːbijːi ljrkb aːld͡ʒmjʕ waqijla lilʕarabijːi faqaaːla maaː ħasuna ʔijd͡ʒaaːzuhu waqalːa mad͡ʒaaːzuhu waaːðkur ʕibaːdanaː ʔiibraːhjma waʔiisħaːqa wajaʕqwba ʔauwlij aːlʔaajdj waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːrˤiʶ ʔant tsthjn bh lm nχðʃ swaː stˤħ qsˤːaʶ saːmj drs saːmj fj aʶːlˤsˤːbaʶːħ maː aːlfaːʔida mn ðlk kaːn saːmj jʁaːdr aːlmdrsa ʔaksjl jrjd aːlsfr aːlaː aʶːlˤsˤħrˤaʶːʔ ldjː d͡ʒaːr mslm ʔajn aʶːlˤχtˤʔaʶ waman jaʕmal miθqaːla ðarːaain ʃarːanaː jarahu hl nðhb baːlsjaːra ʔam baːltksj sʔasaːfr ʔanaː w twm ʔilaː aːlmksjk dˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ aːlkitaaːbu ʔaʕdːwaː lklb aːlswʔ klbaː jʕaːdlh man ʔaaswaʔau aːlnːaaːsi ħaaːlanaː qaaːla ʔaasraʕu aʶːlˤqiʶtˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ ʔajmknnj ʔan ʔaʶtsˤfħ dljl aːlhaːtf laaː tastaħi min aːlqalijli faʔiinːa aːlmanʕa ʔaaqalːu minhu waqad qaaːla ʔaazdaʃijru bnu baaːbaka ʔiðaaː lam jusaaːʕidnaaː aʶːlˤqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ saaːʕadnaaːhu ʕaːdwaː mn bd͡ʒaːja saːmj mʕd͡ʒb bk waaːlmuʔutafikaaa ʔaahwaː d͡ʒaːʔt rsaːla saːmj mn msˤrˤ ʔaʕlaː aːlmmaːlk maː jbnaː ʕlaː aːlʔasl aːʕml χjraːan waːrmh aːlbħr kun muʔuadːabanaː kaj takuwna maħbuwbanaː aʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaː maː jaqwlwna waaːðkur ʕabdanaː daːwwda ðaaː aːlʔaajdi ʔiinːahu ʔaawːaːbun waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʕud͡ʒbu aːlmarʔi binafsihi ʔaaħadu ħusːaaːdi ʕaqlihi faaːlmunaaːfasaau ʔiðanaː faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn ؛ liʔaanːahaaː daaːʕijaaun ʔilaaː aːktisaaːbi aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ waaːliaːqtidaaːʔi biʔaaχjaaːri aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶfaʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤiʶ ʔaamːaaː aːlʔaawːalu min ʔaasbaaːbihaaː wahija aːlzːiraaːʕaau hðh ʔakbr ħba fraːwla rʔajthaː ħtaː aʶːlˤqsˤjrˤaʶ aːlbaχijlu kaaːlqawijːi aːld͡ʒabaaːni ʔiilːaaː aːbtiʁaːʔa wad͡ʒhi rabːihi aːlʔaaʕlaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maaː ʔaafħaʃa ħalijmun walaaː ʔaawħaʃa karijmun ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːrˤuʶhaʶː χaːʃiʕaaun hðaː ljs wqt aːlʔiħtfaːl knt ʔawaːʕd mdrːstj fj aːlθːaːnwjːa juʁarːida aʶːlˤʕaʶsˤfuʶwrˤuʶ qaaːla ʔiinːahu jaquwlu ʔiinːahaaː baqaraaun laaː faʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤuʶn walaaː bikrun ʕawaaːnun bajna ðaaːlika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai jawmaʔiiðin χajrun mustaqarːanaː waʔaaħsanu maqjlanaː aːbdʔa aʶːlˤtːsˤfjq hw mdrːsj aːlsːaːbq wamaχrad͡ʒanaː ʔilaaː aʶːlˤqaʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶiʶ waaːlʕuquwqi χuðuwaː maaː ʔaːtajnaaːkum biquwːaain waaːsmaʕuwaː θumːa talaaː faman ʕafaaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi tʕaːʃrwaː kaːlʔiχwaːn wtʕaːmlwaː kaːlʔaʁraːb wawakːala man aːstaħaqːa aːlmuqaaːbalaaa ʔilaaː ʁajrihi jkrh saːmj tlk aːlmdrːsa wanumakːina lahum fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wanurija firʕawna wahaːmaːna wad͡ʒunwdahumaː minhum maː kaːnwaː jaħðarwna mn jħb aːlħrb aːn aːnaːqʃ ħwl mrtbj wasababun likulːi luʔumin fj nhaːja aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːf wd͡ʒd saːmj nfsh fj aːlmstʃfaː kaðːabat θamwdu biʶtˤaʶʁwaʶːhaʶː wadawaaːʕij aːlkaðibi ʕaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤaʶaʶuʶn waʔaan lajsa lilʔiinsaːni ʔiilːaː maː saʕaː waʕalajhi fij tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶhiʶ θalaaːθaau ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶn waqaaːla muʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ bnu aːlzːubajri maaː qalːa sufahaaːʔu qawmin ʔilːaaː ðalːuwaː hl jmknnaː ʔan nnsaː ʔan ðlk qd ħdθ mn fdˤlˤk saːʕdnj aːllːaʔiijmaai lam jabqa maʕahu χajrun mard͡ʒuwːun walaaː sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶn maʔamuwlun laː jsttˤjʕ twm rʔuja maːrj mn mkaːnh tχaʶːsˤmaʶː saːmj w ljlaː ħwl msʔala mn sjtkfːl bʔawlaːdhmaː jaː nsaːʔ aːlʕaːlm ʕjdkn sʕjd laː ʔaħd jrjd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk saːmj hw mdrːsj aʶːlˤmfdˤːlˤ wafij aːlquluwbi maqbuwlaaun faʔaamːaaː man munija biʕuluwːi aːlhimːaai wasuliba ʃarafu aːlnːafsi faqad sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ ʕuʶrˤdˤaʶaʶaʶn liʔaamrin ʔaaʕwazathu ʔaːlatuhu ʔimːaaː maʕuwzun jaʶntaʶðˤiʶrˤuʶ wad͡ʒdahu waʔiiðaaː qijla lahum ʔaːminuwaː bimaaː ʔaanzala aːllːahu man d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlħasanaai falahu χajrun minhaː wahum min fazaʕin jawmaʔiiðin ʔaːminwna aːld͡ʒw daːfʔi aːljwm ʔaːðaː fbʔimkaːnnaː aːlðhaːb llsbaːħa fj aʶːlˤmħjtˤ aːlzːiħaːmu ʃadijdun lm ʔarʁb bbðl mzjd mn aːlwqt lʔiqnaːʕ twm bdraːsa aːlfrnsja waqahrahaaː ʕan aːtːibaaːʕi ʃahawaaːtihaaː ʔaaħraaː kaːnt ljlaː ttnaːwl dwaːʔaː kaːn bʔimkaːnh ʔan jsbːb lhaː skta qlbjːa fj ʔamaːn aːllh ʔaalastum taðhabuwna farʁanaː watard͡ʒiʕuwna maʃaaːʁijla qaaːluwaː qaːla lilmalaʔii ħawlahu ʔiinːa hðaː lasaːħirun ʕaljmun aːχrd͡ʒ mn aːlsːjːaːra mn fdˤlˤk aːltqjnaː bmdrːsnaː faðalika aʶːlˤfaʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤuʶ huwa aːlhaðru wafaaːqaaan jatamakːanu min ʔizaaːlatihaaː sˤaʶnʕaʶ aːlnːad͡ʒːaaːru kursijːanaː waaːlbajaaːnu fij maʕnaaː aːltːaʃaaːduqi aːʕtn bʔasnaːnk sʔaːχð ʔiðnaː ljwmjn faʔiinːa aːldːunjaaː ðˤiʶlˤːuʶ aːlʁamaaːmi tˤaʶjːiʶbaʶ aːlkalimaai man jafʕal aːlχajra laaː jaʕdam d͡ʒawaaːʔiizahu laaː jaðhabu aːlʕurfu bajna aːllːahi waaːlnːaaːsi waʔaanʃada aːlrːijaaːʃijːu wamuʕaaːnaaːain fij taʶsˤaʶwːuʶrˤiʶhiʶ ʔiʶsˤlˤaʶːħ aːlmwd͡ʒwd χjr mn aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ aːlmfqwd ʔiinːa aːlbaqara taʃaaːbaha ʕalajnaaː waʔiinːaaː ʔiin ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu lamuhtaduwna kasara maħmuwdun aʶːlˤʁuʶsˤnaʶ ʕalaː sururin mutaqaːbiljna aːlbas min aːlθːijaaːbi maaː laaː jazdarijk fijhi aʶːlˤʕuʶðˤaʶmaʶaʶːʔuʶ min firʕawna ʔiinːahu kaːna ʕaːlijanaː mina aːlmusrifjna ʔasrʕ mn aːlbrq qul ʔiin kaːna lilrːaħmni waladun faʔaanaː ʔaawːalu aːlʕaːbidjna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlbaχijlu ħaaːrisu niʕmatihi waχaaːzinu waraθatihi waʶqaʶtˤaʶʕaʶ ʔaaʕðaaːrahaaː lst bðaːk aːlkaːtb nd͡ʒaː saːmj mn aːlnːaːr ʕbr aːlnːaːfða ʔin ʔaaħsana ʔilaaː ʔaaħadin taraka aʶːlˤmuʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶbaʶaʶaʶ biaːlʃːukri ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːld͡ʒwd aʶːlˤʕtˤaʶːʔ qbl aːlmwʕd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːld͡ʒwd ʔan tbðl mn ʁjr msʔala waqad qaaːla aːlmutanabːij hðaː tzjjn lʃd͡ʒra ʕjd aːlmjlaːd aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn jrjdwn zʕzʕa aːlblaːd waʔaanːa aːlsːuruwra bihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbalat maʃuwbun biaːlħaðari min firaaːqihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaadbarat waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maaː hajːad͡ʒa d͡ʒaʔaʃak kaʶʁaʶjðˤiʶn ʔaad͡ʒaaːʃaka waaːtːifaaːqu aːlnːaaːsi fij aːldːawaaːʕij aːlnːaaːfiʕaai mumkinun aʶːtˤlˤbwaʶː aːlʕlm wlw fj aʶːlˤsˤjn ʔakrh ʔan ʔaraːki ħzjna faliðalika qatala aːlħuznu walam jaqtul aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ liburuwzi aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ wakumuwni aːlħuzni ʔinːij daχalt aːlbaaːriħaaa fij aːlʔaarbaʕijna waʔaanaaː ʔaastaħij min sinij ʔaʶsˤbħt aːlkra mʕh tˤmwħh ʔan jsˤbħ sfjraː qaːla hal ʔaantum muʶtˤːaʶlˤiʶʕwnaʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ waaːlħilmu tawʔaamaaːni fijhinːa tamaaːmu kulːi dijnin waaːlqadaħa fij aːlmanaaːzili waaːlʔaaħwaaːli waʶnaʶsˤiʶjbaʶnaʶː min ʔaawaaːmirihi faʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤiʶn ʔilːaaː min d͡ʒihaai naʶaʶːqiʶsˤiʶn wabalwaaː ʕaaːlimin ʔilːaaː ʕalaaː jadi d͡ʒaaːhilin ʔamskwaː bh maːðaː tʃbh waqaaːla aːbnu aːld͡ʒalːaaːli biχilaaːfi aːlnːawʕi aːlʔaawːali waʔiin katamuwhu taʶnaʶaʶːqaʶsˤaʶ wawahija laʕalːa aːlkitaaːba rˤaʶχiʶjsˤuʶn faʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlkalaaːmu laʁwanaː waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤuʶ aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwduʶ lahwanaː wajad͡ʒʕaluwna maaː junabːihuwnahu ʕalajhi min masaaːwiʔiihi ʕiʶwaʶdˤaʶnaʶː ʕan taʶsˤdiʶjqiʶ aːlmadħi fijhi waqaaːla muħamːadu bnu ʕalijːin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu tstħq ðlk juʶtˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaaħamdu ʔaabaaːh ʔiið qaːla lahum ʔaaχwhum nwħun ʔaalaː tatːaqwna aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq mn fdˤlˤk wahaðaaː maðhabu man jaraaː taʶfdˤiʶjlˤaʶ aːliaːʕtidaaːli waqad ruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi qul ʔaafaʁajra aːllːahi taʔamurwnːj ʔaaʕbudu ʔaajːuhaaː aːlʕjaːda waʕalajhaaː muʕaaːqabun ʕalimat nafsun maː ʔaʶaʶħdˤaʶrˤaʶt swf ʔafʕl klː maː bwsʕj kj ʔasʕdh waʔaaqnaaː d͡ʒaʕala lahum qunjaaan wahija ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwlˤuʶ aːlʔaamwaaːli wataʕfuwa ʕamːan walaː tˤaʶʕaʶːmuʶn ʔiilːaː min ʁisljnin lm jχbr ʕn mkaːn twaːd͡ʒdh lahum maː jaʃaːʔwna fjhaː waladajnaː mazjdun twqːf saːmj ʕn ʔiħdaːθ ðlk aʶːlˤsˤːwt wahija sitːaau fuʶsˤuʶwlˤiʶn mutafarːiʕaain waaːlʕatbu ʕanhaaː maʶwdˤuʶwʕuʶn kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn wabaʕdu fadawlaau aːld͡ʒaaːhili kaaːlʁarijbi aːlːaðij jaħinːu ʔilaaː aːlnːuqlaai kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa srːjːa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man d͡ʒaaːra ħukmuhu ʔaahlakahu ðˤuʶlˤmuʶhuʶ waʶaʶːlˤbaʶaʶːtˤiʶnuʶ min ðamːihi sˤiʶdqaʶnaʶː warawaaː muʕaaːðu bnu rifaaːʕaaa dʕaː saːmj llh kj jʁfr lh rd͡ʒʕt rjma lʕaːdthaː aːlqdjma lijuwafːijahum ʔaud͡ʒwrahum wajazjdahum min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinːahu ʁafwrun ʃakwrun ʔaaʁnaaː χalqahu biaːlmaaːli ʔið laaː jaʶsˤiʶħːuʶ ʔaadaaːʔu ʕibaaːdaain d͡ʒahila faaːʕiluhaaː sˤiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔaadaaːʔiihaaː aʶːntðˤrˤk saːmj tˤjlˤaʶ aʶːlˤðˤːhjrˤaʶ ʔaan jadfaʕa bihi saʶtˤwaʶaʶaʶ ʔaaʕdaaːʔiihi rabːanaː ʔaːtihim dˤiʶʕfaʶjniʶ mina aːlʕaðaːbi waaːlʕanhum laʕnanaː kabjranaː ʔauwlaaːʔiika aːlːaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːlˤdˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaːaː famaaː rabiħat tid͡ʒaaːratuhum wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muhtadijna ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶtiʶ aːlʁurfaau naʶðˤiʶjfaʶaʶaʶn walam juʶtˤaʶaʶːwiʶʕhaʶaʶː fijmaaː tuħibːu ʔiðaaː kaaːna ʁajːanaː muʔunaau aːlmutawaqːifi ʔaajsaru min takalːufi aːlmuʕasːafi twm wħjd lʔahlh faʶːdˤlˤ msˤrˤj aːld͡ʒw mmtˤrˤ aːljwm liʔiirsaaːli aʶːlˤχaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤiʶ aːlθːaaːqibaai waʔiid͡ʒaaːlaai aːlʔaafkaaːri aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶaʶiʶ falaaː jaʕzubu ʕanhaaː mumkinun walaaː jaχfaaː ʕalajhaaː d͡ʒaaːʔiizun jurjdwna lˤiʶjuʶtˤfiʶʔiʶwaʶː nwra aːllːahi biʔaafwaːhihim waaːllːahu mutimːu nwrihi walaw kariha aːlkaːfirwna saːmj naːʔim kaːn saːmj ʔakbr ʔabnaːʔ raːmj w ljlaː sˤaʶːdq fajaraaː taʔadijaaa aːlħaqːi ʕalajhi tˤaʶwʕaʶnaʶː ʔimːaaː ʔaanafaaan waʔiimːaaː ʃukranaː lijakuwna min ʔaasri aːliaːmtinaaːni tˤaʶlˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔaχwh mχtlf ʕnh aːbdʔa fj aʶːlˤtːsˤfjq lqd χdʕtnj tmaːmaː straː maː sjħdθ lst srjʕaːan bmaː fjh aːlkfaːja maaː duwna aːlsːaħari wafawqa aːlʃːiʕri aʶːsˤlˤaʶwhaʶː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤwaʶː ʔaaw laː taʶsˤbiʶrˤwaʶː sawaːʔun ʕalajkum ʔiinːamaː tud͡ʒzawna maː kuntum taʕmalwna tfwħ mn saːmj raːʔiħa aːldːd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ famarːa tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶn jaʶsˤiʶjħuʶ faqaaːla rad͡ʒulun min aːlqawmi waman lam jaqnaʕ kaaːna faqijranaː waʔiin kaaːna mukθiranaː kalːaː ʔiiðaː balaʁati aːltːaraːqija kaːnt ldaː saːmj ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ fj klː mkaːn waaːlχajbaaa maʕa aːlʔiiħd͡ʒaaːmi wamaː janbaʁj lahum wamaː jaʶstaʶtˤjʕwnaʶ wamiθlu ðalika qawlu baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlzːuʕamaaːʔi fij ʃiʕrihi wsˤlˤ aːlmdrːs mtʔaχːraː faʔiinːa aːlʔaamra fijhi muʕtabarun biħaaːli tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶhiʶ faʔiin kaaːna mimːan taqaaːʕada ʕalaaː maraaːtibi aːlrːuʔuasaaːʔi huwa aːlːaðj juʶsˤaʶlˤːj ʕalajkum wamalaːʔiikatuhu lijuχrid͡ʒakum mina aʶːlˤðˤːuʶlˤuʶmaʶːtiʶ ʔiilaaː aːlnːwri wakaːna biaːlmuʔuminjna raħjmanaː waliðalika qaaːla aːlnːabijːu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama waʕadaaːwatuhum lahu ħatːaaː laaː jaraaː fijhim walijːanaː laʔaaχaðnaː minhu biaːljamjni lm jrd saːmj ʔan jtχaʶːsˤm mʕ ðlk aːlrːd͡ʒl hl bdʔat tʃʕr baːlχwf faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː haðaaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbiʶjːiʶ kajfa aːstaχrad͡ʒa biʶfaʶrˤtˤiʶ ðakaaːʔiihi faʔaamːaaː man ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶt nafsuhu ʕan qabuwli nuʶsˤħiʶhiʶ falam jafid ðalika ʔilːaaː fasaaːda ʔaaχlaaːqihi min ʁajri ʔaan jakuwna fijhi sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶn liʁajrihi ʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jad͡ʒnija ʕalajːa ħumqij d͡ʒinaaːjaaan taðhabu bimaaːlij wajabqaaː ʕalajːa ħumqij ʔanaː laː ʔatrd͡ʒm jaaː haðaaː laaː tuʁriqanːa fij sabːinaaː ʕalaaː maaː junabːihuwnahu ʕalajhi min masaaːwiʔiihi aːlːatij sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶhuʶ ħasanu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːiʶ ʕanhaaː ʔanaː wtwm nʕtmd ʕlaː bʕdˤnaʶː lamaʕa fjʕrˤdˤ ðlk aːld͡ʒmjʕ lˤlˤχtˤrˤ tχrːd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlθːaːnwjːa lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbtmaː saːmj lima manaʕth faqaaːla jadu aːllhi maʕa aːld͡ʒamaaːʕaai ʔaaħaduhumaaː fij aːlsːaaːʔiili ʔaqnʕ faʶːdˤlˤ daːnja kj tntql mʕh ʔilaː aːlqaːhra faʔiinːahum ʔaamkanu naʶðˤaʶrˤaʶnaʶː liʔaanːa aːlquluwba tartaaːħu ʔilaaː aːlfunuwni aːlmuχtalifaai watasʔaamu min aːlfanːi aːlwaaːħidi qaːla kalːaː faaːðhabaː biʔaːjaːtinaː ʔiinːaː maʕakum mustamiʕwna kθra aːlʕtaːb twrθ aʶːlˤbʁdˤaʶːʔ faʔaaχaðahu aːlχalijlu faʶnaʶðˤːaʶmaʶhuʶ ʃaʕranaː faqaaːla waʔiiðaaː aːlkawaːkibu aːntaθarat waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ baʕda ðlika daħaːhaː faqad qaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama liʔaanːa aːlmuktasaba ʁajru maħduwdin wamaː hum ʕanhaː biʁaːʔiibjna kaːnt mʃʁwla bʔaʕmaːl aːlmnzl waʔaamːaaː aːlmad͡ʒlisu aːlʔaːχaru fajataʕalːamuwna rad͡ʒulanaː min kalbin faðukira aːlmad͡ʒuwsu jawmanaː ʕindahu faqaaːla waman kaaːnat aːldːunjaaː munaaːhu wahamːuhu sabathu aːlmunaaː waaːstaʕbadathu aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕuʶ waħasmu haðihi aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕiʶ ʃajʔiaaːni ʔinh md͡ʒnwn bħbk waʔaaθbata lahu aːlħud͡ʒːaaa falajsa lilðːakaaːʔi ʁaaːjaaun hl jħb aːld͡ʒmjʕ aːlmwsjqaː lħsn aʶːlˤħðˤ lm jtʔað ʔaħd ʕalajhaː tisʕaaa ʕaʃara waːħd waaːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lanudχilanːahum fij aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħjnaʶ fajaraaː ʔaanːa aːlkaðiba ʔaaslamu waʔaaʁnamu faʶjuʶrˤaʶχːiʶsˤuʶ linafsihi fijhi aːʁtiraaːranaː waʶjaʶqsˤiʶdaʶ maaː aːd͡ʒtaraħa min sajːiʔiaaːtihi dʕaː saːmj frjd w zwd͡ʒth ltnaːwl aːlʕʃaːʔ fj mnzlh jaʁsilu aːlwaladu jadajhi ldaː saːmj ħsˤːaʶ fj aʶːlˤsˤːbaʶːħ aːlbaːkr waqad ħukija ʔaanːa wamaqaːmin karjmin kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jħbː aːlmdrsa ʔataː aːlwld rˤaʶːkdˤaʶːaʶn sˤiʶfaʶaʶuʶ aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdiʶjqiʶ ʔaan jabðula lak maaːlahu ʕinda aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai bali aːlːaðjna kafarwaː fj ʕizːaain waʃiqaːqin taqabːaluwaː ʔilajːa bisitːin ʔaataqabːalu ʔilajkum biaːld͡ʒanːaai lm jrd faʶːdˤlˤ tnaːwl dwaːʔih ʕuʶrˤdˤ qsˤrˤ saːmj aːlmħbwb fj aːlsːwq mn jqrʕ "ʔinːh zwd͡ʒj" faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː d͡ʒamjlanaː wafij ħusni aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːiʶ bihaaː muʶqtaʶsˤiʶdaʶnaʶː hnaːk ʃʔi waːħd ʔaːχrʕljː fʕlh ħaːwlt rfʕ mʕnwjaːth ʃrwq aːlʃms d͡ʒmjl hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ fajaʔatij biaːlħimli ʕalaaː aːlnːafsi maaː ʔaamkana min jasijrin jasudːu bihi χalːaaan liʔaanːahaaː tad͡ʒmaʕu ʔilaaː maðamːaai aːlʁijbaai waluʔumi aːlnːamijmaai waqaaːla aːlʔaaħnafu bnu qajsin man ðˤaʶlˤaʶmaʶ nafsahu kaaːna dˤuʶrˤb saːmj w fqd wʕjh waʕinda taqaaːbulihimaaː jakuwnu aʶːlˤsˤːiʶdquʶ ʔaalzama aːlʔaamrajni waʔaamːaaː faʶdˤlˤuʶ maaː bajna aːlʕilmi waaːlʕibaaːdaai ʔiðaaː lam juχilːa biwaaːd͡ʒibin walam juʶqaʶsˤːiʶrˤ fij faʶrˤdˤiʶn waʔaamːaaː
