fanazala aːlkitaaːbu bitaʔakijdi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ fijmaaː ʔaamara bihi wanadaba ʔilajhi hl hj mrˤjdˤaʶ ttlqːaː aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ hnaː tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tkfː ʕn mtˤaʶːrˤdth aːlzːuhdu biʶsˤiʶħːaʶaʶiʶ aːljaqijni wakafaaː bihaaː lˤiʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhaʶaʶː fitnaaan wsˤlˤt ʔasʕaːr aːlʔashm ðrwthaː fj jwljw aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj ʔinːa man qanaʕa kaaːna ʁanijːanaː waʔiin kaaːna muqtiranaː wahuwa ʔaanːahu qaaːla mn aːlmmkn ʔanː saːmj sjtħdːaːh ʔabnaːʔuh faʔiinːa aːllːaha jaħtad͡ʒibu minhumaaː wakilaaːhumaaː maðmuwmun qm bʕmlk bnfsk wamaː ʔaanta bihaːdi aːlʕumji ʕan dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤaʶtiʶhiʶm ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiilːaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaːtinaː fahum muslimwna kaːnt ʕnd saːmj stː ħsˤsˤ draːsjːa fj aːljwm aːlwaːħd kaːn ʕmrnaː ħjnhaː χms ʕʃra sna fqtˤ mn hðh aːlftaːa ʕan ʕumara bni majmuwnin aʶːntðˤrˤth sˤaʶːbrˤaʶ kalːaː bal tukaðːibwna biaːldːjni waqaaːla ħasːaaːnu bnu θaaːbitin aʶːlˤtqtˤ klb aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ raːʔiħa saːmj wawaqaʕa aːlqawlu ʕalajhim bimaː ðˤaʶlˤaʶmwaʶː fahum laː jaʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ ʔaħb ʃrb aːlqhwa saːχna aːlʕz fj nwaʶːsˤj aːlχjl musaaːmaħaau ʔiʶsqaʶaʶːtˤiʶn liʕudmin aːlʔawlaːd laː jlʕbwn baːldːmaː waaːmtadaħa rad͡ʒulun aːlzːuhrijːa faʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶːhuʶ qaʶmiʶjsˤaʶhuʶ aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn hm ʔaʕdaːʔ aːlħwaːr waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒanːaau ʔauzlifat biʔaakwaːbin waʔaabaːrjqa wakaʔasin min maʕjnin ntˤq saːmj baːlʃːhaːda aːlʔasbwʕ aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj twm rd͡ʒl baːlʁ aʶːlˤlˤtˤf waːlkrm ʔarjd mnk χdma aːχtaːraː faʶːdˤlˤ ʔan ljlaː ʔan jmdˤjaʶː wqthmaː mʕaː kħbjbaːn man aːltamasa ʔaarbaʕanaː biʔaarbaʕin aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa aʶːlˤtˤːaʶːlˤʕ waminhu qawlh taʕaaːlaaː waʔaanːahu taʕaaːlaaː d͡ʒadːu rabːinaaː waman ʔaamara bimaaː laaː jaʔatamiru faqad χadaʕa aʶːntðˤrˤnj liaːstijlaaːʔiihi ʕalajhaaː lam jaʶħfaʶðˤ mħmdun darsahu jaː ħaːdja aːlʕjs ʕrːd͡ʒ kj ʔawdːʕhm wamaaː jaʶnquʶsˤuʶ min hajʔiaaːti aːlrːid͡ʒaaːli jazijdu fij bihaaːʔiihaaː waʔaalbaaːbihaaː jawma laː tamliku nafsun linafsin ʃajʔianaː waaːlʔaamru jawmaʔiiðin lilːahi ʔaʶtˤwʕ lh mn jmjnh hl smʕt mn faʶːdˤlˤ md͡ʒdːdaː nql saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda qaaːla jaaː ʔaːdamu ʔaanbiʔihum biʔaasmaaːʔiihim falamːaaː ʔaanbaʔaahum biʔaasmaaːʔiihim ħqn saːmj nfsh baːlhjrwjjn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʕaqlu sˤaʶdiʶjquʶn maʶqtˤuʶwʕuʶn waaːlhawaaː ʕaduwːun matbuwʕun qaːbl saːmj mslmjn mn mχtlf aːldːwl kaːn saːmj jmθːl ʔahmː ʃjʔ fj ħjaːa ljlaː qadiːr lirid͡ʒlika qbl aʶːlˤχtˤw mwdˤʕhaʶː ʔiinːa rabːaka lˤaʶbiʶaʶːlˤmiʶrˤsˤaʶːdiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnːaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaː d͡ʒaːnːun lkj jnʃʔa aːlʔiħsaːs jnbʁj ʔan tsˤlˤ ʃda aːlmθjr ʔilj drd͡ʒa tsmj aːlʕtba aʶːlˤmtˤlˤqaʶ ʃwhid saːmj w hw jʃrb ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤaʶː ðˤlˤ mħaʶːfðˤaʶːaʶn ʕlaː mbaːdʔih kaːn saːmj jstʕjr aːlmaːl mn ʃrkth tˤwaʶːlˤ aːlwqt walam jastaθqil min aːlqawli maaː jastaθqiluhu min aːlʕamali aʶːtːsˤlˤ saːmj baʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ jwmaː bʕd wfaːa ljlaː maːrj mʁrma bʃχsˤ ʔaːχr jrjd ʃjʔiaː baːrdaː faʕalaaː qadri aːlsːuruwri jakuwnu aːlħuznu ʕmlt naːdlanaː lθlaːθ snwaːt tʕaːnj mn mrˤdˤ mʕd wajadfaʕu χidaaːʕa ħijlatihi waqaaːla ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna libazard͡ʒamhara waʶjuʶnsˤiʶfaʶ fij aːlħikami waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaːru sud͡ʒːirat liʔaanːa ʃarafahu juθmiru ʕalaaː sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ baːlrːʁm mn ʔanː ljlaː drst fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa tħsˤːlˤt ʕlaː mnsˤb ʃʁl kχaːdma kaːnt ljlaː trtdj ħd͡ʒaːbaː ʔatt ljlaː mn mdjna skːaːnhaː mn tˤbqaʶ ʔadnaː waʶsˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ ʕamalin maaː haðihi aːlmiʃjaau aːlːatij juʶbʁiʶdˤuʶhaʶaʶː aːllːahu warasuwluhu faqaaːla aːlmuhalːabu ldaː bjl aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ liʔaanːa aːlsːaaːʔiila kamaaː aːd͡ʒtaraʔaa ʕalaaː suʔuaaːlik fasajad͡ʒtariʔiu ʕalaaː suʔuaaːli ʁajrik ʔin radadth lahu maqaːljdu aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːlːaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti aːllːahi ʔauwlʔiika humu aːlχaːsirwna ʔin aːld͡ʒwaːd qd jʕθr ʔaraːk aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm ʔakaːd ʔansaː ʔajn ʔanaː wakafijla nad͡ʒaaːħihaaː aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbiʶjbuʶ ʔinːamaaː judaaːwij aʶːlˤmaʶrˤdˤaʶaʶː ʔaʶtˤhrˤ aːlnaːs ʔaʕraːqaːan ʔaħsnhm ʔaχlaːqaːan lkm saːmj ljlaː fj wd͡ʒhhaː mtsbːbaː fj aːntfaːχ ʕjnhaː ʔilaː ħdː aːlaːnʁlaːq kaːn saːmj fj bld ʔislaːmj waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu lilʔiiskandari ʔaʶtˤfʔaʶt aːlmðjaːʕ baːlkaːd ʔaʶsttˤjʕ smaːʕk maː ʔaaʁnaː ʕanhum maː kaːnwaː jumatːaʕwna saːmj jʕrf ʔajn hw ʕaːqbh waaːlrːaʔaju saːmj llaːstd͡ʒwaːb hw jd͡ʒʕl aːlʁrfa mðˤlˤmaʶ ʕalaː qalbika litakwna mina aːlmunðirjna ʔaajːu aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi χajrun lilmarʔi qaaːla ʕaqlun jaʕijʃu bihi qaaːluwaː ʔaatatːaχiðunaaː huzuwanaː qaaːla ʔaaʕuwðu biaːllːahi ʔaan ʔaakuwna mina aːld͡ʒaaːhilijna qaaːluwaː ʔaatad͡ʒʕalu fijhaaː man jufsidu fijhaaː lima lanm jqwlwaː ʃjʔiaː ʔaraːd saːmj mqaːbla mslmjn ħqjqjːjn ʔaaw ʔaamara biaːltːaqwaː faaːlfuqaraaːʔu mawtaaː ʔilːaaː man ʔaaʁnaaːhu aːllːahu biʕizːi aːlqanaaːʕaai rad͡ʒulanaː sˤaʶħiʶjħaʶnaʶː mink maː ʔaanta biniʕmaai rabːika bimad͡ʒnwnin ʔaalam jad͡ʒʕal kajdahum fj taʶdˤlˤjlˤiʶn ʔiinːaː saχːarnaaː aːld͡ʒibaːla maʕahu jusabːiħna biaːlʕaʃijːi waaːlʔiiʃraːqi waʔaaʕqala min ʔaan juχdaʕa waaːlθːaaːnij ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤuʶhaʶaʶː fij ʁajrihi waman lam juħsin ʔilaaː aːltːaaːʔiibi qabuħat ʔisaaːʔatuhu ʔauwħija ʔilaaː ʔibraaːhijma ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu ʔaanːij ʕalijmun ʔauħibːu kulːa ʕalijmin maaː aːlːaðij salabak milkak qaaːla waaːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lanukafːiranːa ʕanhum sajːiʔiaaːtihim walanad͡ʒzijanːahum ʔaaħsana aːlːaðj kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna ʔaraːd saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː kj jʕtnj bh hðaː faljaðwqwhu ħamjmun waʁasːaːqun walaː takwnwaː kaaːlːaðjna nasuwaː mustaqirːun maaː aːsmu aːmraʔaaai ʔiblijsa laʕanahu aːllːahu faqaaːla walilkibri ʔaasbaaːbun walaaː tanqaaːdu ʔilaaː tarki maʶtˤlˤuʶwbiʶhaʶaʶː falaaː tuðʕinu liħaqːin walaaː tud͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː trd͡ʒma hðh aːld͡ʒml llrːwsjːa maaː kaaːna minhu aːbtidaaːʔun faʔaamːaaː maaː kaaːna ʕan masʔaalaain faħajaaːʔun kaːn saːmj laː jzaːl jʃʕr ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt tnðˤrˤ ʔiljh kaːnt mdrːsa sjːʔia llʁaːja maː biʔaːjaːtinaː waliqaːʔi aːlʔaːχiraai faʔauwlʔiika fij aːlʕaðaːbi muʶħdˤaʶrˤwnaʶ haðaaː maaː tˤaʶlˤaʶbt lˤtˤaʶːlˤmaʶː ʕaːnaː twm mn tlk aːlmʃkla niltahu fij laðːaain wasukuwni waaːlħaaːlu aːlθːaaːliθaau ʔaudχl ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː hnaːk bʕbʕ tħt srjrj laː tdˤjːʕ wqtk fj mħaːwla aːqnaːʕ twm jʔumn aːlmslmwn bʕjsaː w mħmːd waman bariʔia min aːlbuχli naaːla aːlʃːarafa waaːld͡ʒadːu maʶsˤdaʶrˤuʶ wud͡ʒwhuhum fij aːlnːaːri jaqwlwna jaː lajtanaː ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶʕnaʶaʶː aːllːaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤaʶʕnaʶaʶː aːlrːaswlaː waqaːlwaː ʔaaʔiiðaː dˤaʶlˤaʶlˤnaʶː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔaaʔiinːaː lafj χalqin d͡ʒadjdin bal hum biliqaːʔi rabːihim kaːfirwna hl rʔajt maː ħsˤlˤ ʔajn ttʔalːm "fj klː mkaːn" ʔaaqirːuwaː aʶːlˤtˤːaʶjrˤaʶ ʕalaaː wukunaaːtihaaː nawmaau aʶːlˤsˤːuʶbħaʶaʶiʶ maʕd͡ʒazaaun manfaχaaun maksalaaun mawramaaun mafʃalaaun mansaʔaaaun lilħaaːd͡ʒaai faʔaad͡ʒaaːbahu ʕan aːstiχbaaːrihi bimaaː juwaaːfiquhu musaaːʕidaaan lˤiʶʁaʶrˤaʶdˤiʶhiʶ walaaː jufakːiru ʔilːaaː fij ʕaaːqibatihi ʔaaw fij ʔaːχiratihi ʕurfu aːlʔaad͡ʒnaaːsi faʔiinːa lilʔaad͡ʒnaaːdi zijːanaː maʔaluwfanaː wajustafaaːda biaːldːurbaai waʶaʶːlˤmuʶʕaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ hðaː χalqu aːllːahi faʔaarwnj maːðaː χalaqa aːlːaðjna min dwnihi bali aʶːlˤðˤːaʶːlˤiʶmwnaʶ fj dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤiʶn mubjnin waʔiinːj kulːamaː daʕawtuhum litaʁfira lahum d͡ʒaʕalwaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶːbiʶʕaʶhuʶm fj ʔaːðaːnihim waaːstaʁʃawaː θijaːbahum waʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶrˤːwaʶː waaːstakbaruwaː taqdijrun liħaqːin jantabihu aːlħaːrisu brˤjtˤaʶːnjaʶː aʶːlˤʕðˤmaʶː bld aːlnblaːʔ w rkwb aːlχjl maː nwʕ aːlbjtzaː aʶːlˤmfdˤːlˤ ldjk jarʁabu aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru fij ʔaan jarbaħa lqd twqːft ħjaːa saːmj bʕd wfaːa ljlaː waʶfaʶdˤlˤaʶhuʶ junmij ʕalaaː tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶhiʶ twm mrˤtbtˤ limaaː fijhi min aːltːanfijri wad͡ʒaʕalnaː nawmakum subaːtanaː aːʃtkaː saːmj faminhum man karihahu limaaː fijhi min aːtːihaaːmi tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː ʔiðaː lm jkn ldjk ʔawlaːd bʔimkaːnk daːʔimaːan ʔan ttbnaː walajaːlin ʕaʃrin sjnðˤːf saːmj klː ʃjʔ ʔaajasurːuka ʔaan jakuwna lak miaːʔiaau ʔaalfi dirhamin wad͡ʒaʕala maaː salabahu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbiʶjːuʶ min aːlbiʃri waaːlħajaaːʔi sababanaː litaʁajːuri aːlnːaaːsi ħakaaː ħumajdun aʶːlˤtˤːaʶwiʶjlˤuʶ ʔaanːa ʕamːaaːra bna jaaːsirin ʕuzila ʕan wilaaːjaain faaːʃtadːa ðalika ʕalajhi nħn ln saːmj w kʔanː ʔaħdaː kaːn jraːqbh dˤbtˤ saːmj ljlaː w hj tnðˤrˤ ʔiljh kaːnt ljlaː tˤflˤaʶ mθaːljːa waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕuʶwaʶː aːllːaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrːaswla faʔiin tawalːajtum faʔiinːamaː ʕalaː fij aːltːuhmaai ðˤaʶlˤaʶmaʶhaʶaʶː faʔaawdaʕahaaː ðilːaaa aʶːlˤmaʶðˤlˤuʶwmiʶjnaʶ d͡ʒiʔiti kaj ʔausalːima ʕalajka aːlħqjqa kaːlnwr laː tχfaː aʶːχtlˤtˤ ħaːblhm bnaːblhm mn jdrb aːlfrjq habːat aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːb ħwl aːlʕaːlm jdrswn aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔam jrjdwn kjdaː faːlðjn kfrwaː hm aːlmkjdwn tħmːs saːmj ʔinh jmlk sjaːra fasubħaaːna aːlːaðij bijadihi malakuwtu kulːi ʃajʔin waʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna waaːlʔiinsaaːnu maʶtˤbuʶwʕuʶn ʕalaaː aːliaːftiqaaːri ʔilaaː d͡ʒinsihi hl ttklm aːlʕrbja wmnhm ʔamjwn laː jʕlmwn aːlktaːb ʔilaː ʔamaːnj wʔin hm ʔilaː jðˤnwn fijhimaaː ʕajnaaːni naʶdˤːaʶaʶːχaʶtaʶaʶːniʶ whw aːlðj fj aːlsmaːʔ ʔilh wfj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔilh whw aːlħkjm aːlʕljm hw jħbki kθjranaː ʔiinːa aːlmud͡ʒrimijna fij dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤiʶn wasuʕurin hðh χrˤjtˤaʶ kbjra lʔalmaːnjaː swfa ʔasmħ lka ʔan tðhb liʔaanːa aːlχawfa jaʶqbiʶdˤuʶ aːlnːaaːsa ʕan maʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶhiʶm hðh aːldaːr ljst kbjra w laː tnsaː sqaːja aːlmzrwʕaːt rahbaau aːlmarʔi min aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕalaaː qadri ʕilmihi biaːallːahi taʕaaːlaaː lajlaau aːlqadri χajrun min ʔaalfi ʃahrin zjws ʁaʶːdˤb liluzuwmihaaː tˤaʶbʕaʶnaʶː aːlħb hw mʕd͡ʒza aːlmdnjːa d͡ʒlst ʔilaː d͡ʒaːnbh waʔiiðaaː raʔaawhum qaaːluwaː ʔiinːa haʔuulaaːʔi lˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːlˤːuʶwnaʶ aːsq aːlbstaːn walanabluwanːakum ħatːaaː naʕlama aːlmud͡ʒaaːhidijna minkum waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ wanabluwa ʔaaχbaaːrakum wlqd χlqnaː fwqkm sbʕ tˤrˤaʶːʔiʶq wmaː ʔaadrij ʔaaqarijbun maaː tuwʕaduwna ʔaam jad͡ʒʕalu lahu rabːij ʔaamadanaː twm w maːrj jlʕbaːn aːlbwkjr bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlnːad͡ʒmi ʔiiðaaː hawaaː whkðaː ʕdt dwn ʔan ʔaʃtrj ʃjʔiaːan maː aːlðj jd͡ʒʕlk mtjqːnanaː bʔanː twm hw aːlðj srq drːaːd͡ʒtk nubawːiʔiuhum ʔaad͡ʒdaaːθahum wanaʔakulu turaaːθahum kaʔaanːaaː muχalːaduwna baʕdahum qad nasijnaaː kulːa waʶaʶːʕiʶðˤaʶaʶiʶn aːlmhbl ʔanbwb ʕdˤlˤj ttħdθ maːrjkw aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bmhaːra ʔaʔinkm ltʔatwn aːlrd͡ʒaːl ʃhwa mn dwn aːlnsaːʔ bl ʔantm qwm td͡ʒhlwn maː jlˤfðˤ mn qwl ʔilaː ldjh rqjb ʕtjd nħn nfdˤlˤ aːlbqaːʔ hnaː jmnʕ qad ʕamila aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ faʔauwlaʔiika lahumu aːldːarad͡ʒaaːtu aːlʕulaaː jbdw lj ʔanka sˤaʶːdq ʔinh ʁnj wlkn ʔaχwh aːlʔakbr fqjr jd͡ʒb aːn nkwn mstʕdjn lʔaj ʃjʔ hl jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔaχr trjd ʔan tuχbrnj bh χaːldjn fjhaː laː jχff ʕnhm aːlʕðaːb wlaː hm jnðˤrˤwn aːlmmaːrsa tʔudj ʔilaː aːlʔitqaːn wafawaaːkiha mimːaaː jaʃtahuwna sˤiʶlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlrːaħimi manmaaːaun lalʕadadi ʔin kaːnt ʔilaː faquli aːllːahu ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː taʕmaluwna χaːb dˤnj bk kaːn saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː ʔanaːnjːaː jʕjʃ wħdh ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʔin ʕsˤjt rbj ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm n laː maː hw sr aːlsʕaːda fj aːlħjaːa ʔajn jʕjʃ aʶːlˤtˤwaʶːrˤq aːlmðjaːʕ aːlbaːrħa ʔaljs kðlk ʔam lkm ʔajmaːn ʕljnaː baːlʁa ʔilaː jwm aːlqjaːma ʔin lkm lmaː tħkmwn maːrj tˤbjbaʶ laː ʔaħd hnaː ʔinmaː aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː lʕb wlhw wʔin tʔumnwaː wttqwaː jʔutkm ʔad͡ʒwrkm wlaː jsʔalkm ʔamwaːlkm waraaːdiʕin malijːin aːlːaðijna hum juraaːʔuwna walanabːaha ʕalajhi ʕan ʔabj hurjraa ʕabdi aːlrːaħmni bni sˤaʶχrˤiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: kjf tqwl " ʃkraːan lk " baːljaːbaːnja maːrj tʕlm tmaːmaːan maː aːlðj jnbʁj ʕljhaː fʕlh jaʕnij aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjqaʶjniʶ tˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ aːlχajri waʶtˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ aːlʃːarːi hl jtwd͡ʒb ʕlj aːlbqaːʔ fj aːlmstʃfaː qaaːluwaː bal ʔaantum laaː marħabanaː bikum ʔaantum qadːamtumuwhu lanaaː fabiʔisa aːlqaraaːru ljs sˤħjħaʶː hl tðˤnh ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶ ʕmdanaː lʔaʕðbnh ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː ʔaw lʔaðbħnh ʔaw ljʔatjnj bslˤtˤaʶːn mbjn hj tχfj aːlħqjqa ʕnaː sjkwn ʕljhaː ʔan tntðˤrˤh waminhunːa ʁajθun waqaʕa bibaladin faʔaamraʕa qaːlwaː rbnaː ʔamtnaː aːθntjn wʔaħjjtnaː aːθntjn faːʕtrfnaː bðnwbnaː fhl ʔilaː χrwd͡ʒ mn sbjl hnaːk ktaːb hnaː twqf ʕn dˤrˤb ʔaχwk ʔard͡ʒw ʔan tsmħ lh baːlχrwd͡ʒ naaːrun ħaaːmijaaun ʔatsaːʔl maː ʔiðaː kaːn twm wmaːrj d͡ʒaːʔiʕjn hj tsttˤjʕ ʔan tsbħ ʔiinːa aːlmutːaqijna fij d͡ʒanːaaːtin wanaʕijmin ʔalm ttʕrf ʕnhm ʔanaː msjħj ʔamaː hw fʔinh bwdj falaaː takun bimaaː nilth min dunjaaːk fariħanaː ʔanaː tħt aːlʃd͡ʒra laː tlwm nfsk wamaaː χalaqa aːlðːakara waaːlʔaunθaaː ʔinaː ʔarslnaː ʕljhm ħaʶːsˤbaʶː ʔilaː ʔaχtj ʔanta tbdw mtʕbaːan d͡ʒdaːan qaːl twm aːnh kaːn jʔaml aːn jsaːfr hw w maːrj mʕaː faʶtaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlʃːahwaau fij aːliaːbtidaaːʔi aːnaː aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn ʔatmnaː lw kaːn hnaːk aːlmzjd mn aːlnaːs mθlk χalaqa aːlχalqa bitadbijrihi waʶfaʶtˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶm bitaqdijrihi ʔaklt ʔijmjlj tfaːħaan ʔarnj wd͡ʒhk aːlħqjqj snsˤlˤ ʔilaː hnaːk bʕd saːʕa ljs kl aːlnaːs jħbwn aːlklaːb fbʃrhm bʕðaːb ʔaljm ʔinh jʁlj mn aʶːlˤʁdˤb aːlʃjʔ aːlwħjd aːlθaːbt fj hðaː aːlʕaːlm hw aːltʁjjr fqaːl jaː md͡ʒnwn ʔaslftnj baʶːlˤsˤjf fqðˤjtk fj aːlʃtaːʔ wkðlk ʔanzlnaːh ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt wʔan aːllh jhdj mn jrjd aʶːlˤtˤaʶːqaʶ aːlnwwja ʔaːmna ʔin hðaː aːlqrʔaːn jqsˤ ʕlaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl ʔakθr aːlðj hm fjh jχtlfwn wd͡ʒzaːhm bmaː sˤbrˤwaʶː d͡ʒna wħrjraː ðuw aːlʕarʃi aːlmad͡ʒijdu faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waaːlːaðijna maʕahu biraħmaain minːaaː waʶqaʶtˤaʶʕnaʶaʶː daaːbira aːlːaðijna kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muʔuminijna waaːlːaðij ʔaʶaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ ʔaan jaʁfira lij χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶtiʶj jawma aːldːijni ʔiinːa haðaaː maaː kuntum bihi tamtaruwna waaːlθːamaru min ʁajri ʁarsin laaː jud͡ʒnaaː kamaaː qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru faʔaamːaaː aːlwaaːliduwna fahum aːlʔaːbaaːʔu waaːlʔaumːahaaːtu waaːlʔaad͡ʒdaaːdu waaːld͡ʒadːaaːtu rdt sˤaʶːħbaʶ aːlmħl: " laː ʔanaː d͡ʒaːda rʔajta aːlsʕr " wamaθalu kalimaain χabijθaain kaʃad͡ʒaraain χabijθaain aːd͡ʒtuθːat min fawqi aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ maaː lahaaː min qaraaːrin hjaː ʔanti jmknki ʔan tfʕljhaː kjf fʕl klː maː tˤlˤbwaʶː mnːj fʕlh hl tħb aʶːlˤʕsˤjrˤ? wqaːlwaː qlwbnaː ʁlf bl lʕnhm aːllh bkfrhm fqljlaː maː jʔumnwn tʕaːl ltraːnj wʔið qaːl rbk llmlaːʔika ʔinj χaːlq bʃraː mn sˤlˤsˤaʶːlˤ mn ħmʔi msnwn fjʕðbh aːllh aːlʕðaːb aːlʔakbr mnʕnj aːlθld͡ʒ mn aːlχrwd͡ʒ fij d͡ʒanːaain ʕaaːlijaain ʔiqbaaːla aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶ ʔin aːlsaːʕa ʔaːtja ʔakaːd ʔaχfjhaː ltd͡ʒzaː kl nfs bmaː tsʕaː aːljawma tud͡ʒzaaː kulːu nafsin bimaaː kasabat laaː ðˤuʶlˤmaʶ aːljawma ʔiinːa aːllːaha sarijʕu aːlħisaaːbi hðaː aːlrd͡ʒl jʔakl aːlχbz qaaːla famaaː χaʶtˤbuʶkuʶm ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmursaluwna salijmanaː min aːlzːalːaaːti naːqʃnaː aʶːlˤχtˤaʶ mʕh tˤuʶrˤd twm mn mnzlh mn tˤrˤf waːldjh ʕndmaː aːʕtrf bʔanh mlħd faqaraʔaahu ʕalajhim maaː kaaːnuwaː bihi muʔuminijna faqaaːla aːlʔaaʕraaːbijːu hj lm tkun sʕjda lkl nd͡ʒaːħihaː laː jħb aːlʔaːjs krjm wd͡ʒdnaːh ħjaː taʶsˤiʶfuʶ waquluwbin taʕrifu waʔaaʕmaaːlin tuχaaːlifu jaaː banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla aːðkuruwaː niʕmatija aːlːatij ʔaanʕamtu ʕalajkum waʔaanːij faʶdˤːaʶlˤtuʶkuʶm ʕalaaː aːlʕaaːlamijna saaːʔiira ʔaaχlaaːqihi waħamida ʔaakθara ʃijamihi ؛ liʔaanːa aːljasijra maʁfuwrun waaːlkamaaːla maʕuwzun ʔiinːa ladajnaaː ʔaankaaːlanaː wad͡ʒaħijmanaː ʔaχbrnj kjf ʔaʶtsˤlˤ bh lw smħt ʔinhm lm jkwnwaː mdʕwjjn aːlmnzl jħtrq ql ʔin aːlʔawljn waːlʔaːχrjn laː ʃk fj ðlk jsˤʕb ʕljː d͡ʒdaː ʔan ʔafhm hðaː aːlktaːb tħljt bkl ʃd͡ʒaːʕtj w ðhbt ʔilaː hnaːk wlkn ʔaʶjdˤaʶː lslwk aːlmaːda waʶːlˤtˤaʶːqaʶ fj aːlmstwaː dwn aːlðrːj faʔaatat bihi qawmahaaː taħmiluhu qaaːluwaː jaaː marjamu laqad d͡ʒiʔiti ʃajʔianaː farijːanaː ʔaħb aːltħdjaːt ʔibqaː fj aːlsjaːra waqad ʔaaʃaaːra ʔilaaː maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː min ħaaːli aːlnːafsi aːlfarazdaqu fij qawlihi ʔaaw rad͡ʒulun kaθijru aːlðːunuwbi kaθijru aːlʕamali faqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaw jzwd͡ʒhm ðkraːnaː wʔinaːθaː ʕaðaaːbanaː ʃadijdanaː ʔiinːahum saaːʔa maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna ql lw ʔantm tmlkwn χzaːʔin rħma rbj ʔiðaː lʔamsktm χʃja aːlʔinfaːq wkaːn aːlʔinsaːn qtwraː hl hðaː ʔiʶsqaʶaʶːtˤuʶhuʶ ʔaʶaʶlˤfaʶaʶːðˤiʶn min ʔaaθnaaːʔi aːlkalaaːmi jaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlbaaːqij bihaaː mabtuwranaː laaː juʕrafu aːstiχraaːd͡ʒuhu qaaːla rabːi aʶːnsˤuʶrˤniʶj bimaaː kaðːabuwni ʔaaʔuulqija aːlðːikru ʕalajhi min bajninaaː bal huwa kaðːaaːbun ʔaaʃirun ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðijna taaːbuwaː min baʕdi ðalika waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħuʶwaʶː faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun rbmaː tʔatj ʁdanaː ʔaam nad͡ʒʕalu aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː d͡ʒahanːama lilkaaːfirijna ħaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː hlaː ʔatjt mʕj ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr hl tmaːnʕ fj aːlwqwf d͡ʒaːnbanaː sˤnʕ fj kaːzχstaːn maːðaː trjd jaː ʔaχj nħn θrnaː fħjaːa ʔaw mmaːt faʔatijaaː firʕawna faquwlaaː ʔiinːaaː rasuwlu rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna hðaː swaːl ʁrjb ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan ʔankan mʕnaː aːljwm falamːaaː ʔaːtaaːhum min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ baχiluwaː bihi watawalːawaː wahum muʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ wlqd ʔarslnaː ʔilaː ʔamm mn qblk fʔaχðnaːhm baːlbʔasaːʔ waʶːlˤdˤrˤaʶːʔ lʕlhm jtdˤrˤʕwn rˤfdˤt aʶːlˤdˤħjaʶ ʔiqaːma dʕwaː qdˤaʶːʔiʶjaʶ kaːn saːmj jqtˤn fj aːlqaːhra bdʔat ʔaħs baːld͡ʒwʕ ʔaumj trjd ʔan tðhb hnaːk, wlkn ʔabj jrjd ʔan jʃaːhd aːltljfzjwn ʔaʕtqd ʔanj fhmt ʔinhm jrwnh bʕjdaː ʔant waːhimun rbaːt aːlbjt fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh laː jʕrfn ʔilaː aːlʃkwaː mn aːrtfaːʕ aːlʔasʕaːr laː wsjtˤ zwaːd͡ʒ wajatad͡ʒanːabuhaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː ljs hnaːk ʔaj sˤaʶːbwn ħwr mqsˤwrˤaʶːt fj aːlχjaːm ʔilaː ʔajn tðhbjn waːfq ʃn tˤbqaʶ ʔanaː lst mʃʁwlaː aːχlʕ mlaːbsk faʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤsˤːiʶlˤaʶaʶuʶ fahija wakaθraau aːlwaraʕi hl lħqta baʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ laː tnsaː aːlqaːʕda rqm ʔiθnaːn wsbʕwn hl tsaːʕdnj ʔan ʔaħl waːd͡ʒbj waman ʔaʶaʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶ mimːan ðukːira biʔaːjaaːti rabːihi θumːa ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ ʕanhaaː daːχl ħdwd kl dwla waʔiinːa aːlmuʔumina bajna maχaaːfatajni θm lnnzʕn mn kl ʃjʕa ʔajhm ʔaʃd ʕlaː aːlrħmn ʕtjaː wanaʕmaain kaaːnuwaː fijhaaː faaːkihijna maaː ʔaantum ʕalajhi bifaaːtinijna wklaː aːlmiskijna ʔiið hum ʕalajhaaː quʕuwdun ʔardt aːlðhaːb ʔilaː mkaːn lm jsbq lj aːlðhaːb ʔiljh wʔaːχrjn mnhm lmaː jlħqwaː bhm whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔanaː ʔaʕrf maː aːlðaː tħaːwl fʕlh qaːl twm: maːrj lm tkn mtrddh fj fʕl ðlk waːðkr ʕbaːdnaː ʔibraːhjm wʔisħaːq wjʕqwb ʔawlj aːlʔajdj waʶːlˤʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤ ʔanaː fj wrˤtˤaʶ snqwm baːsʕaːdk ʔinnj ʔaθq bk χwaːn jnaːm wʕjnaːh mftwħtaːn waaːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna man juʶbʁiʶdˤuʶ aːlnːaaːsa waʶjuʶbʁiʶdˤuʶwnaʶhuʶ aːlʔaaχilːaaːʔu jawmaʔiiðin baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn ʕaduwːun ʔiilːaaː aːlmutːaqijna waʔiilaaː mataaː jaħsunu bij tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi qaaːla bkaː ʕlaː swʔ ħðˤh ʔink tʃʕrnj baːlχwf ʔaħjaːnaː ʔinːamaaː sumːija aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdiʶjquʶ sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶnaʶː lˤiʶsˤiʶdqiʶhiʶ fj ʔaj sn bdʔat ʕndk aːldwra aːlʃhrja walilːahi maaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wakaaːna aːllːahu bikulːi ʃajʔin muʶħiʶjtˤaʶnaʶː tħtwj aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʕlaː aːlmaːʔ wakajfa taʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ ʕalaaː maaː lam tuʶħiʶtˤ bihi χubranaː wafuruʃin mːarfuwʕaain qaaːla sawfa ʔaastaʁfiru lakum rabːij ʔiinːahu huwa aːlʁafuwru aːlrːaħijmu ʔan laː jdχlnhaː aːljwm ʕljkm mskjn wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːlrswl fʔin twljtm fʔinmaː ʕlaː rswlnaː aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn sʔal "twm" "maːrj" maː ʔiðaː kaːnt twd aʶːlˤrˤqsˤ ʔanta laː jmknk tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl jmknk wʔiðaː bʃr ʔaħdhm baːlʔanθaː ðˤlˤ wd͡ʒhh mswdaː whw kðˤjm ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin waʔiin kunːaaː lamubtalijna aʶːntðˤrˤ ħtaː ʔad͡ʒls ʔaaʃiʕ aːlʔisbraːntw jaː lh mn ktaːb ʃjq hl bʔimkaːnnaː aːlaːstraːħa qljlaː waqad rawaaː aːlzːuhrijːu waaːmtaaːzuwaː aːljawma ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna kl ʃʔi fij aːlquluwbi twqf ʕn tbðjr aːlmaːʔ waʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ aːlʕaduwːu muwaaːlijanaː hl ʔaaː jnðˤrˤ ʔaħd sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr ʔinhu wqt aʶːlˤʔiʶstjqaʶːðˤ tlk mdjna d͡ʒmjla ʔaʶuʶfdˤlˤ ʔan ʔad͡ʒls bd͡ʒwaːr aːlnaːfða wabuʃraaː lilmuʔuminijna wamaaː naqamuwaː minhum ʔiilːaaː ʔaan juʔuminuwaː biaːllːahi aːlʕazijzi aːlħamijdi ʔiχwtj hjـaː llʕlaː sʕjaː dʕnj ʔaʕrf ʔaajaʕidukum ʔaanːakum ʔiiðaaː mitːum wakuntum -mn bjnnaː nħn aːlχmsa- aːlʔasrʕ rˤkdˤaʶnaʶː ʔatðkru maː fʕlta aːld͡ʒmʕa aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ durb ʕlaː jd χbjr qaːl twm ʔinh jʕtqd ʔan maːrj lm tħb d͡ʒwn ʕndj aːbnaːn ʔanaː lst ʕbdk aʶːnsˤrˤf ʕnj aʶːntðˤrˤ ʔaawaman junaʃːaʔau fij aːlħiljaai wahuwa fij aʶːlˤχiʶsˤaʶaʶːmiʶ ʁajru mubijnin waħukija ʔaanːa baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlzːuhːaaːdi waqafa ʕalaaː d͡ʒamʕin fanaaːdaaː biʔaaʕlaaː sˤaʶwtiʶhiʶ jbdw ʃaːbanaː laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ʔakbr mnj wajuθnijhaaː maħabːaaan waʶaʶːnʕiʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː ʔinj ʃaːkr lk mn ʔaʕmaːq qlbj ʔant ʔakbr mnj qaːma waʔaamːaaː aːllːafuwtu faðaaːtu aːlwaladi min ʁajrik wʔin jrwaː ʔaːja jʕrˤdˤwaʶː wjqwlwaː sħr mstmr jwsf jʕqwb ʔisħaːq ʔismaːʕjl w ʔibraːhjm hm ʔanbjaːʔ aːllh jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaðhb aːlʔan jwm tbdl aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʁjr aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waːlsmaːwaːt wbrzwaː llh aːlwaːħd aːlqhaːr jd͡ʒʕlnj ʔiðaː lfj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ mbjn walajsa lilrːaaːʁibi fijhi qanaaːʕaaun biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶhiʶ faaːstaqaaːmat lahu ħaaːluhu fsaːhm fkaːn mn aʶːlˤmdħdˤjn ðuq ʔiinːaka ʔaanta aːlʕazijzu aːlkarijmu d͡ʒrb mra ʔaχraː jusmħ ʔabdaː lmnːaːd aːldːχwl lmnzl ljlaː hl tʕlm lmaːðaː ʔatjt ʔanaː aːlʔaːn fj aːlθlaːθjn mn ʕmrj ʕljk ʔan tlbs mʕtˤfaʶː hðh aːlmra sʔalʕb wsˤlˤnaʶː χbr baːrd͡ʒwʕ ʔaːχwnaː mn aːlmhd͡ʒr rʔaaː ʔijfw takalːufi maaː laaː jufijdu ʔaʕtrf ʔanj ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶt kaːn ʕaːmaː sˤʕbaʶː wamasaaːkinuhum qubuwranaː mdˤaʶː ʃhraːn mnð wsˤwlˤj ʔilaː tˤwkjw faqaaːlat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn wad͡ʒaba biaːlʕaqli ؛ liʔaanːahu walisaaːnun muʕabːirun ʔajn aʶːlˤmtˤbχ ʔajnmaː knt tʕjʃ, hnaːk aʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤmaʶ maːðaː trjd ʔan tʃtrj twm aːðj nfsh fij d͡ʒanːaaːtin jatasaaːʔaluwna aːʃtrjt lhaː fstaːnaːan d͡ʒmjlaːan warusulanaː qad qaʶsˤaʶsˤnaʶaʶːhuʶm ʕalajka min qablu warusulanaː lam naʶqsˤuʶsˤhuʶm ʕalajka wakalːama aːllːahu muwsaaː taklijmanaː ʔarjd frˤsˤaʶ θaːnja nħn mtʔakdwn ʔank stkwn ʕlaː maː jraːm ʔiilːaaː maaː ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu ʔiinːahu jaʕlamu aːld͡ʒahra wamaaː jaχfaaːaː kaːnt tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤtnaʶː tħlq fwq aːlsħb waʔiinːahu liħubːi aːlχajri laʃadijdun wakunːaaː nukaðːibu bijawmi aːldːijni ʔaaχij qaaːluwaː huwa aːlħajːu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː huwa faaːdʕuwhu muʶχlˤiʶsˤiʶjnaʶ lahu aːldːijna aːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna walaqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna min sˤaʶlˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn min ħamaʔiin masnuwnin ʕaːqbhaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔakwn tˤjaʶːrˤaʶː fj aːlmstqbl qaaːla hal jasmaʕuwnakum ʔiið tadʕuwna wʔanhm jqwlwn maː laː jfʕlwn whw aːlqaːhr fwq ʕbaːdh whw aːlħkjm aːlχbjr wajuʔuθirahu ʕalaaː nafsihi ʕinda aʶːlˤnːaʶsˤaʶbiʶ waaːlsːaʁabi td͡ʒaːhl maː qaːlh lqd kaːn jmzħ fqtˤ lj θlaːθ ʔaχwaːt bjn aːlʔiχwa kθjr mn aːltwtr ʔin ðlk lħq tχaʶːsˤm ʔahl aːlnaːr hw ʁbj wʁjr sˤaʶːdq waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʔaatʕib qadamak faʔiin taʕiba qadːamak qaːlwaː ʔinaː ʔilaː rbnaː mnqlbwn wbaːlʔasħaːr hm jstʁfrwn faʶːsˤbrˤ lħkm rbk wlaː tkn ksˤaʶːħb aːlħwt ʔið naːdaː whw mkðˤwm ʕalajkum biaːlwaduwdi aːlwaluwdi walaaː tankiħuwaː bihaaː hðaː laː jχsˤnj lmaːðaː laː trdn ʔan tχbrnnaː baːlħqjqa fawaaːllhi aːlːaðij laːa ʔiilaha ʁajruhu kaaːnat sˤuʶħuʶfuʶ muwsaaː ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu kulːuhaaː ʕibaranaː aʶːdˤrˤb waːlrjħ tsˤjħ hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbk bjtk aːld͡ʒdjd ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwaʶː ʕalaaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶwaʶaʶːtiʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ aʶːlˤwuʶstˤaʶaʶː waquwmuwaː lilːahi qaaːnitijna ʔanaː ʔaχðt tlk aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ qbl ʔisbwʕ aːstlqaː ʕlaː aːlsrjr ʔiinːahum lahumu aʶːlˤmaʶnsˤuʶwrˤuʶwnaʶ wahaðaaː ʔaaʕlaaː maraaːtibi aːlʔaulfaai fmn aːllh ʕljnaː wwqaːnaː ʕðaːb aːlsmwm ʕndmaː hb aːlrjħ aʶːntˤfʔaʶt aːlʃmʕa walajsa ħqːaːan qsˤːaʶ ħzjna rˤkdˤt maːrj waːlljl ʔiðaː ʕsʕs qlq saːmj wdˤʕ dˤʁtˤaʶːuʶ ʕlaː ʕaːʔilth ʔimaː ʔant ʔaw sˤdjqk mχtˤʔiʶ fij raqːin manʃuwrin klbj jʔakl aːlʕnb lqd tlqjnaː χbr wfaːth wnd͡ʒwmhaː lk ʔilʁi hðaː aːlmlfː hw aːlʔaːn jbħθ ʕnhaː fj bjtj ʃrfun fj aːlnsbi wʔiðaː aːlsmaːʔ frd͡ʒt tm qbwlh fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa bʕd ʔan rsb fj aːmtħaːn aːlqbwl mrtjn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wlm jlbswaː ʔijmaːnhm bðˤlˤm aːlbaːzlaːʔ wχlqnaːkm ʔazwaːd͡ʒaː kaːn mnːaːd jswq ʔiilːaaː ʕibaaːda aːllːahi aʶːlˤmuʶχlˤaʶsˤiʶjnaʶ laː tqaʶːtˤʕ ħdjθnaː ʔinhaː tbdw bħaːla d͡ʒjda d͡ʒdaːan twm daːʔimaː jtħdθ jʕrf d͡ʒaːk kjf jtklm ʔin ðlk sˤħjħ ʔirjk bdʔa baːlʁnaːʔ saʶjaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶː naaːranaː ðaaːta lahabin wfʕlt fʕltk aːltj fʕlt wʔant mn aːlkaːfrjn wʔinkm ltmrwn ʕljhm msˤbħjn kaːn saːmj jʕrf ðlk aːlʃaːʕr aːlmʕrwf ħaːwl qiʶtˤaʶ tamʔu ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra ʔamjna mn aʶːlˤdˤrˤwrˤj ʔan nħd͡ʒz mqdmanaː aːrd͡ʒʕ ʔiljhm flnʔatjnhm bd͡ʒnwd laː qbl lhm bhaː wlnχrd͡ʒnhm mnhaː ʔaðla whm sˤaʶːʁrˤwn ʔaam ʔaamintum man fij aːlsːamaaːʔi ʔaan jursila ʕalajkum ħaʶaʶːsˤiʶbaʶnaʶː fasataʕlamuwna kajfa naðijri ʔajn wuldta baːlnfــــــــــــwsi jftــــــــــــــdaː qaːlwaː rbnaː jʕlm ʔinaː ʔiljkm lmrslwn ʔinh jħb mʃaːhda aːltlfaːz watarki aːlmmlka aːlʕrbja aːlsʕwdja fasawfa jadʕuw θubuwranaː ldj aːlkθjr mn aːlʕml lʔand͡ʒzhu whl ʔataːk nbʔa aʶːlˤχsˤm ʔið tswrwaː aːlmħraːb wnfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ ðlk jwm aːlwʕjd ʔasrʕ ħaːn aːlʔawaːn kj tqsˤ ʃʕrk ʔaʕdhaː hl ʔanta bχjr lst mʕtaːdaː ʔan ʔaʕaːmala bhðh aʶːlˤtˤrˤjqaʶ ʔiinːamaaː ʔaanta munðiru man jaχʃaaːhaaː ʔantm mdrːswn sˤnʕt lj ʔamj tnwra d͡ʒmjla ʔalaː tzr waːzra wzr ʔaχraː ʔanaː lst fj aːlmdrsa wmn jʕsˤ aːllh wrswlh wjtʕd ħdwdh jdχlh naːraː χaːldaː fjhaː wlh ʕðaːb mhjn wlqd ʔaʶdˤlˤ mnkm d͡ʒblaː kθjraː ʔaflm tkwnwaː tʕqlwn aːlmlk jwmʔið aːlħq llrħmn wkaːn jwmaː ʕlaː aːlkaːfrjn ʕsjraː aːlχaaːsirijna ʔaudχul wasaaːriʕuwaː ʔiilaaː maʁfiraain min rabːikum wad͡ʒanːaain ʕaʶrˤdˤuʶhaʶaʶː aːlsːamaaːwaaːtu waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ ʔauʕidːat lilmutːaqijna ʔiinːa fij χalqi aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːχtilaaːfi aːllːajli waaːlnːahaaːri laʔaːjaaːtin liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi hal ʔaatːabiʕuka ʕalaaː ʔaan tuʕalːimani mimːaaː ʕulːimta ruʃdanaː waqijla lilχalijli bni ʔaaħmada laː fj sˤdwrˤkm wʕljhaː wʕlaː aːlflk tħmlwn nsttˤjʕ tʕlm kθjr mn aːlʔamwr ʕnd aːstχdaːmnaː aːld͡ʒumal wʔakθr bkθjr mn md͡ʒrd aːlklmaːt aːlʔintrnt msˤdrˤuʶ mʕlwmaːtin laː jqdr bθmn wjwm nħʃr mn kl ʔama fwd͡ʒaː mmn jkðb bʔaːjaːtnaː fhm jwzʕwn ʔaʶaʶfaʶnaʶdˤrˤiʶbuʶ ʕankumu aːlðːikra sˤaʶfħaʶnaʶː ʔaan kuntum qawmanaː musrifijna mn fdˤlˤk aʶːstjqðˤ ʕlaː aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ljs ldjnaː ʃjʔ lnχsrh wlaː td͡ʒʕlwaː mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ʔinj lkm mnh nðjr mbjn ʔanaː lm ʔaktb ʔilaː waːldj twqf ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχtk jaaː marjamu aːqnutij lirabːiki waaːsd͡ʒudij waaːrkaʕij maʕa aːlrːaaːkiʕijna laː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔaħd waqad aːχtalafat maðaaːhibu aːlnːaaːsi fij aːtːiχaaːði aːlʔiiχwaaːni sˤnʕ mjdlaːja mn aːlðhb ʔauwlaʔiika aːlːaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːlˤdˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaː waaːlʕaðaaːba biaːlmaʁfiraai famaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶrˤaʶhuʶm ʕalaaː aːlnːaaːri hamːaaːzin maʃːaaːʔin binamijmin liʔaanːa aːlrːad͡ʒula jaʁlibuhaaː ʕalaaː aːlʃːabaqi lizuhdihaaː fij aːlrːid͡ʒaaːli ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤrˤaʶːblˤs lbnaːn njk ldjh ʃʕr qsˤjrˤ ʔam ʕndhm χzaːʔin rbk ʔam hm aʶːlˤmsˤjtˤrˤwn ʔaan janfija ʕan nafsihi raðaaːʔiila aːld͡ʒahli biʶfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ aːlʕilmi waʁaflaaa aːlʔiihmaaːli biʶaʶːstiʶjqaʶaʶːðˤiʶ aːlmuʕaaːnaaːai waaːlːaðijna hum lifuruwd͡ʒihim ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ hl ʔant mstʕd lhaːlwjn ln tsttˤjʕ ʔaj mn ʔad͡ʒhza aːlħaːswb aːlaːstmraːr fj aːlʕml mʕ btˤaʶːqaʶ mħrwqa ql kfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː bjnj wbjnkm ʔinh kaːn bʕbaːdh χbjraː bsˤjrˤaʶː laː ʔaħd jtklm mʕj jnbʁj ʔan tkwn msʔuwlanaː ʕn ʔafʕaːlk laː jmkn td͡ʒnb nʃwb aːlħrwb maːdaːm aːlʃʕb dˤʕjf aːltʕljm aːlqhwau baːrdaun hj fχwra bʔind͡ʒaːzaːthaː aːlʕdjda fllh aːlʔaːχra waːlʔawlaː ðhb maːrkw aːlj naːdj ljlj mʕ d͡ʒaːrh ʔink tʕrf kjf ttʕaːml mʕ aːlnsaːʔ hj trktnaː sjwðˤf ʃχsˤaʶː jtħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja lm ʔakn ʔaʕlm bʔanh ʕlaː twm fʕl ðlk kalːaaː bal raaːna ʕalaaː quluwbihim maaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna jrħmk aːllh ljla aːlqdr χjr mn ʔalf ʃhr ʔant knta mdlːl tʕrd͡ʒ aːlmlaːʔika waːlrwħ ʔiljh fj jwm kaːn mqdaːrh χmsjn ʔalf sna jaʶħuʶtˤːuʶ rid͡ʒaaːlun bajna ʔaaʕjunihim sˤuʶlˤbaʶaʶː waliðalika qijla jawma laaː juʁnij mawlanaː ʕan mawlanaː ʃajʔianaː walaaː hum juʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ laː ʃkraːan lk hl sbq ʔank aːħbbt ʃχsˤaʶː laː jħbk hðaː jwm aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ d͡ʒmʕnaːkm waːlʔawljn kaːn ʁrˤdˤ aːlrsaːla hw ʔiχbaːrhaː ʔanh kaːn mrˤjdˤaʶː walikulːi qismin minhum manzilaaun min aːlbirːi waʶaʶːlˤsˤːiʶlˤaʶaʶiʶ aːbtsm djmaː: " baːltʔakjd ʔant tmzħjn " ldjhaː nbd fj wd͡ʒhhaː falilːahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔauwlaaː lm ʔaðhb lʔan aːld͡ʒw sjʔ laː ʔaħb aːstχdaːm trd͡ʒma ʁwʁl sħb jdh mn aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː ʕilːijːuwna trkthaː tðhb jd͡ʒb ʕlja ħfðˤ mn aːlsjaːsjjːn jaχlfwn wʕwdahm ln ʔatd͡ʒaːwz ʕn ʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔiʶk θaːnjaan jaʶmdˤiʶj ʔaaχuwk falaaː talqaaː lahu χalafanaː waaːlmaaːlu baʕda ðahaaːbi aːlmaaːli muktasabu waqaaːla ʔaːχaru maaː lakum laaː tuʕaaːtibuwna aːld͡ʒuhːaaːla faqaaːla ʔaʶħdˤrˤ klbh ʔilaː aːlmdrsa laː tqaʶːtˤʕnj rħma mn rbk ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔan d͡ʒd mmtn lmsaːʕdtk qaːl lw ʔan lj bkm qwa ʔaw ʔaːwj ʔilaː rkn ʃdjd ʔataː mnːaːd fʔalqj aːlsħra saːd͡ʒdjn maː hj mwaʶːsˤfaʶːth falazima liðalika ʔaan jaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔilaaː dunjaaːhu ħaʶðˤːaʶnaʶː min ʕinaaːjatihi sjkwn aːsrʕ aːðaː ðhbnaː baːlmtrw ʔinːa aːldːunjaaː kaθijraau aːltːaʁjijri ʔiirama ðaaːti aːlʕimaaːdi jaʕnij ʕaʃijraaan maaːniʕaaan wahuwa aːlχaaːmisu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlʔaulfaai faliʔaanːahu juʶwsˤiʶlˤuʶ ʔilaaː aːlquluwbi ʔaʶaʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː wanaħnu laaː natuwbu ħatːaaː namuwta laː aːχaːf aːlmwt fj fsˤlˤ aːlχrjf tʁjr aːlʔawraːq ʔalwaːnhaː w ttsaʶːqtˤ faːlntfq ʕlaː ʔan nχtlf ql hw nbʔa ʕðˤjm fahija ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ aːlʔaaħwaaːli waʔaaʕdaluhaaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːðkrwaː aːllh ðkraː kθjraː liʔaanːa minhaaː maaː jastamidːu ʔilaː ʔajn nðhb waʔiinːa haðihi ʔaumːatukum ʔaumːaaan waaːħidaaan waʔaanaaː rabːukum faaːtːaquwni fʔaθrn bh nqʕaː aːldːunjaaː jawmaaːni nʕm ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔanhaː swf tʔatj ʔilaː aːlmnzl lqd aːstʕaːd mħfðˤth aːlmsrwqa watawaqːijanaː min taʶsaʶlˤːuʶtˤiʶ aːlʁurabaaːʔi aːlʔaad͡ʒaaːnibi ʔanaː mn aːlʔikwaːdwr tˤaʶːʕaʶ wqwl mʕrwf fʔiðaː ʕzm aːlʔamr flw sˤdqwaʶː aːllh lkaːn χjraː lhm qbrh hnaːk θm tqdm mnh wqaːl χð faːstfthm ʔalrbk aːlbnaːt wlhm aːlbnwn ʔattðkr aːlmra aːlsːirːi waaːlʕalaaːnijaai faːljwm laː tðˤlˤm nfs ʃjʔiaː wlaː td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kntm tʕmlwn laː jsmʕwn fjhaː lʁwaː ʔilaː slaːmaː wlhm rzqhm fjhaː bkra wʕʃjaː faquwlaaː lahu qawlanaː lajːinanaː tud͡ʒaːdil laː ʔazaːl raːʁba fj ʔan ʔand͡ʒb ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤaʶː aːhdʔa jaː bnj ʁrdt aʶːlˤʕsˤaʶːfjrˤ θm d͡ʒʕlnaːkm χlaːʔif fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mn bʕdhm lˤnnðˤrˤ kjf tʕmlwn hm jstmʕwn llmðjaːʕ ʔan dʕwaː llrħmn wldaː wlm ʔadr maː ħsaːbjh aːlfnd͡ʒaːn ʕlj aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ twm laː jdrs aːlfrnsja aːlʔaːn jħlfwn lkm lˤtrˤdˤwaʶː ʕnhm fʔin trˤdˤwaʶː ʕnhm fʔin aːllh laː jrˤdˤaʶː ʕn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn jaː lh mn tsˤmjmiʶn d͡ʒmjl waqaaːla aːlħukamaaːʔu ʔanaː mθaːlj ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔilj ʔajn ʔanaː ðaːhb, wlknj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq waʔaamːaaː aːllːuʁzu fahuwa taħarːij ʔaahli aːlfaraaːʁi waʃuʁlu ðawij aʶːlˤbaʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔant d͡ʒmjlun ltdrjb aːlkmbjwtr ʕlaː aʶːlˤntˤq θumːa huwa sˤiʶdːiʶjquʶn ʔaaw ʕaduwːun ʔajd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaqwm bðlk ʕlaː aːlfwr ʔanaː ldj sˤdjq fj ʔind͡ʒltraː ʔabdanaː laː jfkːr twm baːlʔaːχrjn waʔiiðaaː marːuwaː bihim jataʁaaːmazuwna ʔinhaː turjd aːlʔintqaːm ʔaʕdt lj kʕka hl d͡ʒwaːr ʔaħs twm bʃjʔ jzħf ʕlaː ðraːʕh nħb mn jtd͡ʒaːhlnaː wntd͡ʒaːhlu mn jħbnaː qaːmwaː btd͡ʒrba lmʕrfa maː aːðaː kaːn aːldwaːʔ qd ħsn aːlðaːkra wʔamh wʔabjh lijakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum fatamatːaʕuwaː fasawfa taʕlamuwna sˤdq ʔaw laː tsˤdq fhj ldjhaː θlaːθa ʔabnaːʔ hl hðaː nhr aːmlʔa aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa maːʔaː mn fdˤlˤk ʔardtu ʔan ʔaʶtsˤlˤ bika wlkn lm jkun ldja rqmk ʔanaː fuzt wʔaʕtðr ʕn rˤχsˤiʶ aːlhdj waʔaaðːin fij aːlnːaaːsi biaːlħad͡ʒːi jaʔatuwka rid͡ʒaaːlanaː waʕalaaː kulːi dˤaʶaʶːmiʶrˤiʶn jaʔatijna min kulːi fad͡ʒːin ʕamijqin waːʕbd rbk ħtaː jʔatjk aːljqjn faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː d͡ʒamijlaː man ʔaanti faqaaːlat jaː ljtnj ʕndj ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ kθr waaːlqamara qadːarnaaːhu manaaːzila ħatːaaː ʕaaːda kaaːlʕurd͡ʒuwni aːlqadijmi ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶhaʶaʶː χaaːʃiʕaaun ljs hnaːk ʔaj mʃaːkl ħatːaaː laaː taʶtˤmaʶħaʶ lahu ʕajnun lirijbaain walaaː tunaaːziʕahu nafsun ʔilaaː fud͡ʒuwrin faʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶ ʕalajhaaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn mːin rːabːika wahum naaːʔiimuwna latarkabunːa tˤaʶbaʶqaʶnaʶː ʕan tˤaʶbaʶqiʶn saʔaalathu lmaːðaː kaːn jbkj ʔaʶaʶtˤːaʶlˤaʶʕaʶ aːlʁajba ʔaami aːtːaχaða ʕinda aːlrːaħmani ʕahdanaː wwfjt kl nfs maː ʕmlt whw ʔaʕlm bmaː jfʕlwn lqd ʕlqt fj aːzdħaːm mrwrj faqad jarʕawij man laaː jarwij waːlʃʕraːʔ jtbʕhm aːlʁaːwwn ʔiinːa ʔiibraaːhijma laħalijmun ʔaawːaaːhun munijbun ʔant tðkrnj bʔaχjk baːltaːlj swf ʔaʶdˤtˤrˤuʶ llqaːʔi hnaː kjfa kaːnt aːlmdrsa aːljwm waʔaamːaaː aːlsːaaːkinu faradijʔun ʔanaː hnaː mn ʔad͡ʒlk wmaː tsʔalhm ʕljh mn ʔad͡ʒr ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr llʕaːlmjn waʔaawfuwaː aːlkajla ʔiiðaaː kiltum wazinuwaː biʶaʶːlˤqiʶstˤaʶaʶːsiʶ aːlmustaqijmi ðalika χajrun waʔaaħsanu taʔawijlanaː ʔaajːumaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ aːlmaaːlu ʔaam aːlʕilmu faqaaːla fawidaaːduhu χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn waʔiiχaaːʔuuhu ʁararun aːmzħ falamːaaː raʔaawhaaː qaaːluwaː ʔiinːaaː lˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːlˤːuʶwnaʶ maaː ʔaurijdu minhum min rizqin wamaaː ʔaurijdu ʔaan juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶwniʶ hl zwd͡ʒtk tˤbaʶːχaʶ maːhra fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh bʔimkaːn ʔaj waːħd ʔan jħsˤlˤ ʕlaː aːlktb ʔajmknnk ʔan twsˤlˤnj ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ ʔanaː lbst ħðaːʔ aʶːlˤdˤjf χamsun χuðuwhunːa ʕanːij falaw rakibtum aːlfulka maaː wad͡ʒadtumuwhunːa ʔilːaaː ʕindij fasad͡ʒada aːlmalaaːʔiikaau kulːuhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕuwna kalaːːa ʔiinːahaaː lˤaʶðˤaʶaʶː twm laː jħtrm maːrjːaː tˤrˤd saːmj ljlaː mn aːlbjt tfdˤlˤ baːld͡ʒlws mn fdˤlˤk waʔaaraaːhu χaʶtˤːaʶ ʕubajdi aːllːahi waqaaːla lahu lmaːð hrb wsaːrʕwaː ʔilaː mʁfra mn rbkm wd͡ʒna ʕrˤdˤhaʶː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔaʕdt llmtqjn aːlnaːs jʕjʃwn fj d͡ʒmjʕ ʔanħaːʔ aːlʕaːlm hl qblt dʕwth aʶːntðˤrˤ lˤħðˤaʶ kl ʃχsˤ ldjh dˤʕf wqwa waʔiiðanaː qad lazima min haðajni aːlwad͡ʒhajni sabru aːlʔiiχwaaːni qabla ʔiχaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi qadːim liħaaːd͡ʒatik baʶʕdˤaʶ lad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒatik faħurːaaːsuhu fij aːlsːamaaːʔi aːlmalaaːʔiikaau waʔiinːahu laðikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa tusʔaaluwna ʔaafasiħrun haðaaː ʔaam ʔaantum laaː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ biʔaajjːikumu aːlmaftuwnu fkjf ttqwn ʔin kfrtm jwmaː jd͡ʒʕl aːlwldaːn ʃjbaː maːðaː stfʕlwn bkl hðaː aːlmaːl liʔaanːahu jaruwmu miθlahu aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ tbħθ ʕnːj ql lj, kjf ʕlmta ʔaʶsˤbħ twm btˤlˤaʶː ʔaːh maːðaː ʕsaːnj ʔan ʔafʕl fj ħaːla khðh aːlħqjqa hj d͡ʒmjla bdwn ʃk wlkn ħtaː hj aːlʔakaːðjb lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl ʃjʔiaː faʔaaχrad͡ʒnaaː man kaaːna fijhaaː mina aːlmuʔuminijna lajsa lahaaː min duwni aːllːahi kaaːʃifaaun waaːliaːntiqaaːla min aːlmaχbuwri ʔilaaː ʁajrihi χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn ʔanaː lstu qlqaːan kθjraːan bʃʔan sjrtj aːlðaːtja laː d͡ʒrm ʔanhm fj aːlʔaːχra hm aːlʔaχsrwn χsr wðˤjfth wqaːlwaː ʔin hj ʔilaː ħjaːtnaː aːldnjaː wmaː nħn bmbʕwθjn wabiaːllːajli ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna mn ʔad͡ʒl maːðaː ʔatjta ʔilaː hnaː wamin ʃarːi aːlnːafːaaːθaaːti fij aːlʕuqadi faːðkrwnj ʔaðkrkm waːʃkrwaː lj wlaː tkfrwn twqf ʕn dˤrˤb ʔaχjk aːwraːq aːlʃd͡ʒr ttʁjr lwnhaː waaːlrːaaːbiʕu aːlʃːahwaau aːlːatij jaduwmu bihaaː aʶːlˤtˤːaʶlˤaʶbuʶ walaaː jusriʕu ʔilajhi aːlmalalu waʔaablaʁu min ðalika qawlu ʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃjʔ mdʕaːa llfχr waʔaaʃhada fijhi naaːsanaː minhum ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ twm jrjd mnj ʔan ʔastqjl mn hðh aʶːlˤwðˤjfaʶ aːktʃf aːlflkjaːn haːbl χajrun minhaaː wahum min fazaʕin jawmaʔiiðin ʔaːminuwna jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmstʔad͡ʒr dfʕ aːlaːjd͡ʒaːr llmaːlk fj nhaːja kl ʃhr wamaaː jaχtalifu min ʔaaħwaaːli aːlʔaːmirijna bihi waaːlnːaaːhijna ʕanhu mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wajawma taquwmu aːlsːaaːʕaau jawmaʔiiðin jaχsaru aʶːlˤmuʶbtˤiʶlˤuʶwnaʶ ʔið jʁʃaː aːlsdra maː jʁʃaː ʕalaaː sururin mutaqaaːbilijna fðkr ʔin nfʕt aːlðkraː ʔaʶuʶsˤjb ʕndmaː sqtˤ tʕaːl ʔilaː mnzlj ljst mʕk ħjwaːnaːt ʔaw nbaːtaːt sˤħjħ maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ tˤrˤjqaʶ ltswja hðaː aːlnzaːʕ fajanbaʁij liman bulija bihi ʔaan jastadrika taʶqsˤiʶjrˤaʶhuʶ bikaθraai aːldːarsi waʶjuʶwqiʶðˤaʶ ʁaflatahu biʔiidaaːmaai aʶːlˤnːaʶðˤaʶrˤiʶ waʔiinːamaaː kaaːna ðalika kaðalika waʔiimːaaː min balaaːdatihi waqilːaai fahmihi ʔaħbk wʔarjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ mʕk hl hðaː aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʕwn ljs mhmaːan tˤwaʶː twm aːlwrqa qbl ʔan jʕtˤjhaʶː lmaːrj faʔaawːalu ħuquwqihi aːʕtiqaaːdu mawadːatihi θumːa ʔijnaaːsuhu biʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːnbiʶsaʶaʶːtˤiʶ ʔilajhi fij ʁajri muħarːamin ʔaʶsˤbħ biaːldːunjaaː kaʶmuʶtˤfiʶʔiʶiʶ aːlnːaaːri biaːltːibni waqad rawaaː muħamːadu bnu aːlmunkadiri ʕan d͡ʒaaːbirin ʔaanːa aːlnːabijːa sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaaːla qaːla laː taʶχtaʶsˤiʶmwaʶː ladajːa waqad qadːamtu ʔiilajkum biaːlwaʕjdi aːntql llʕjʃ hnaː waʔaamdadnaːhum bifaːkihaain walaħmin mimːaː jaʃtahwna walikulːi qawmin muʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶn stħsˤd maːrj qmħhaː fj tmwz maː klː hðaː aːlħmd llh rbː aːlʕaːlmjn wawahabnaː lidaːwwda sulajmaːna niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinːahu ʔaawːaːbun lm jsˤdːq ʔaħd qsˤːth walaː jamliku aːlːaðjna jadʕwna min dwnihi aːlʃːafaːʕaaa ʔiilːaː ʕaaːbahu walaaː dawlaaun lak min ʔiðaaːlaain mink kulːu ʃajʔin ʔiðaaː kaθura rˤaʶχuʶsˤaʶ ʔilːaaː aːlʕaqla faʔiinːahu ʔiðaaː kaθura ʁalaaː ħðːrthaː mn aːlmd͡ʒjʔ ʔilaː hnaː biʃukrihaaː lilːahi fij tˤaʶjːiʶ aːlmakaaːrihi kaaːminah waminhaaː jzn aʶːlˤtˤrˤd ʔakθr mn baːwnd mn aːχtrʕ aːlhaːtf jasurːunij ʔaanːa aːlzːuhraaa naʶaʶːdˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn maː kaðaba aːlfuʔuaːdu maː raʔaaː naʶðˤaʶrˤtuʶ waqad baaːnat fawalːaaː aːlʔaaʕraaːbijːu wahuwa jaquwlu fajastad͡ʒidːa min salwaai aːlʔaasaaː waħusni aːlʕazaaː maaː juχafːifu ʃad͡ʒwahu ʔinːhaː mʕd͡ʒba bk kθjraː kaːn saːmj jfkːr fj ħjaːth lm jkn saːmj aːlkalaaːmi maaː laaː juħtaaːd͡ʒu fijhi ʔilaaː aːlkalaaːmi ʔaaj jaktafij biaːlfiʕli min aːlqawli laaː tasʔaal aːlmarʔa ʕan χalaaːʔiiqihi fij wad͡ʒhihi ʃaaːhidun min aːlχabari fasimaau aːlχajri aːldːaʕaau waaːlħajaaːʔu waʔaaʃbaaːhihi min aːldːuhaaːai man ʔauʕd͡ʒiba biraʔajihi lam juʃaaːwir hl wd͡ʒdt maː knt tbħθ ʕnh waʔiilaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kajfa suʶtˤiʶħaʶt aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjqaʶaʶuʶ dˤaʶjːiʶqaʶaʶuʶn wamaː ʔaadraːka maː lajlaau aːlqadri waðalika liaːstiħkaaːmi aːlʕadaaːwaai bajnahumaaː biaːlmubaaːjanaai waħuduwθi aːliaːntiqaaːmi ؛ liʔaad͡ʒali aːltːaqadːumi ʔanaː mʕk fj hðaː qaaːla rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔant hw ħjaːtj jaː bnjː hl bʔimkaːnj aːlqjaːm bʃjʔ "laː laː bʔas sʔaʶnðˤːfh ʔanaː" wajumdidkum biʔaamwaːlin wabanjna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒanːaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaːranaː faʔiinːa qurːaaa ʕujuwni aːlkiraaːmi fij aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ wasuruwra aːllːiʔiaaːmi fij aːlʔaaχði qaʶtˤaʶfaʶ muħamːadun zahraaan laː jastawj ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaːri waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai humu aːlfaːʔiizwna aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħuʶ mtaː tzwd͡ʒt man bariʔia min θalaaːθin naaːla θalaaːθanaː walaqad zajːanːaaː aːlsːamaːʔa aːldːunjaː biʶmaʶsˤaʶːbjħaʶ wad͡ʒaʕalnaːhaː rud͡ʒwmanaː lˤiʶlˤʃːaʶjaʶːtˤjniʶ waʔaaʕtadnaː lahum ʕaðaːba aːlsːaʕjri waminhaaː maaː jaʶðˤhaʶrˤuʶ biaːlfiʕli wajaχfaaː biaːltːaʁaaːfuli waʶːdˤħ ʔanːh mðnb wakaaːna maaː taχalːala kitaaːbahu min qaʶsˤaʶsˤiʶ aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi aːlsːaaːlifaai twqːf saːmj ʕn tqdjm aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ lljlaː mħaːwlaː ʔan jqtlhaː maːðaː knt tfʕl waʶlˤwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatwna aːlfaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tuʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ ʕljk ʔan tdʕh jrbħ ʔaħjaːnaː aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ man kaaːna minhum lajsa rizquhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa faħawːilhu ʔilaaː manzilij ʔiinːaː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna dχlt aːlsːd͡ʒn bsbb sˤfʕj lljlaː kjf wd͡ʒdt aʶːlˤmnðˤrˤ aʶːlˤmtˤlˤ mn aːlfndq wad͡ʒihaaːtu aːlmakaaːsibi mutaʃaʕːibaaun man ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ walam janwi ðˤuʶlˤmaʶ ʔaaħadin ʁafara aːllːahu lahu maaː aːd͡ʒtarama bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi js tafatːiaħat aːlwardaau aːld͡ʒamijlaau falaː tuʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlkaːfirjna jasbiqa ʔilaaː ħusni aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːiʶ binafsihi ʔaanːa kulːa waaːħidin minhum jad͡ʒidu sabijlanaː ʔilaaː nafji aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai ʕan nafsihi quʶtˤiʶʕaʶt aːlħablu biaːlsːakːajni mtaː ʕjd mjlaːd saːmj tm aːlmjt ʔaanːahu χalaqahum muħtaaːd͡ʒijna waʶfaʶtˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶm ʕaaːd͡ʒizijna waʶːdˤrˤb lhm mθlaː ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlqrja ʔið d͡ʒaːʔhaː aːlmrslwn laː nħtaːd͡ʒ msaːʕdtk laː jwd͡ʒd ʃk bχsˤwsˤ ʔiʶχlˤaʶːsˤh lmaːðaː lm tstˤjʕ ʔan tʔatj baːlʔams waaːlːaðij d͡ʒaaːʔa biʶaʶːlˤsˤːiʶdqiʶ waʶsˤaʶdːaʶqaʶ bihi ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmutːaquwna lm jkn ʕljh fʕl hðaː ʔilaː aʶːlˤmsˤlˤjn faʶaʶːlˤlˤːaʶfðˤuʶ kalaaːmun juʕqalu biaːlsːamʕi waaːlmaʕnaaː taħta aʶːlˤlˤːaʶfðˤiʶ jufhamu biaːlqalbi hnaːk ħdwd bjn ʔamrjkaː waːlmksjk wsjtm trtjb aːlmʃaːrkjn ʕlaː ħsb dqa aːlnmwðd͡ʒ qwlaːi lji, kjf ʕrfti ʃʕrt baːlrjħ jhbː ʕlaː ʔaħd skjnaː ʔad͡ʒʕl aːlʔaːlha ʔilhaː waːħdaː ʔin hðaː lʃjʔ ʕd͡ʒaːb fatawakːal ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːaka ʕalaaː aːlħaqːi aːlmubijni wahuwa aːlːaðij χalaqa mina aːlmaaːʔi baʃaranaː fad͡ʒaʕalahu nasabanaː waʶsˤiʶhrˤaʶnaʶː wakaaːna rabːuka qadijranaː walaʔiin masːathum nafħaaun min ʕaðaaːbi rabːika lajaquwlunːa jaaː wajlanaaː ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ waʔiinːa lˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː lamina aːlmursalijna qlaːda mn aːlmaːs mn jtˤʕ aːlrswl fqd ʔaʶtˤaʶːʕ aːllh wmn twlaː fmaː ʔarslnaːk ʕljhm ħfjðˤaʶː fʔatbʕwhm mʃrqjn walaaː jalħaqahu fij ðalika ðamːun kabura maqtanaː ʕinda aːllːahi ʔaan taquwluwaː maaː laaː tafʕaluwna ħsˤlˤ baːlʔams ʔarwʕ ʃjʔ waʔaanːaaː minːaaː aːlmuslimuwna waminːaaː aʶːlˤqaʶaʶːsiʶtˤuʶwnaʶ faman ʔaaslama faʔauwlaʔiika taħarːawaː raʃadanaː aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ jaʕidukumu aːlfaqra wajaʔamurukum biaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waaːllːahu jaʕidukum maʁfiraaan minhu waʶfaʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː waaːllːahu waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun kaðalika aːlʕaðaaːbu walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna ʔarslwk ʔilaː hnaː lttd͡ʒss ʕljnaː waʔaamːaaː man d͡ʒaaːʔaka jasʕaaː kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan ktn mkaːn lld͡ʒlws waːlraːħa waqad ruwija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː ʔaataaː ʔilaaː aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama faqaaːla waruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla liʔaabij ðarːin ʔinhu ʁaʶːdˤb mʕki waqad qaaːla fij ðalika aːlʃːaaːʕiru ʔið dχlwaː ʕljh fqaːlwaː slaːmaː qaːl slaːm qwm mnkrwn ʕafaaː aːllːahu ʕanka lima ʔaaðinta lahum ħatːaaː jatabajːana laka aːlːaðijna sˤaʶdaʶquʶwaʶː wataʕlama aːlkaaːðibijna waqaaːla aːlʔasbwʕ hw: _ _ _ _ _ walaaː taʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶn ʕanhaaː wamaaː huwa biaːlhazli faʔaaθarna bihi naqʕanaː waqawluhu kalaaːbisi θawbaj zuwrin huwa aːlːaðij jalbasu θijaaːba aʶːlˤsˤːuʶlˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ walaqad waʔaaχːara aːldːijnu aʶːlˤnːaʶsˤiʶjħaʶaʶuʶ qulnaaː: liman qaːla: maːðaː jqwl aːlrd͡ʒl ʔiinːa rabːaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʕan sabijlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadijna watabaaːraka aːlːaðij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶtˤiʶbːaʶaʶːʔuʶ faʔiiðaaː lam nudaaːwihim biaːlʕafwi faman lahum ʔanwj ʔan ʔaʶnðˤf ʁrftj jmknh ʔan jtʕfn fj aːld͡ʒhnm ʔabʔimkaːnk ʔan tqlnj ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ waminhum man jaraaː waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biaːlħaqːi waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ fmn ʔaʶðˤlˤm mmn aːftraː ʕlaː aːllh kðbaː ʔaw kðb bʔaːjaːth ʔinh laː jflħ aːlmd͡ʒrmwn aːlʔamr mmkn baːltʔakjd ʔin ʔardt saːhwn ʔaaχlaaːqu man sabarahu waʶtaʶʕðˤiʶjmuʶhuʶ min aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶlˤfaʶaʶːðˤiʶ faqaaːla ʔiinːij ʔaaħbabtu ħubːa aːlχajri ʕan ðikri rabːij ħatːaaː tawaaːrat biaːlħid͡ʒaaːbi ʕan ʔaabij masʕuwdin ʕuqbaa fʔant md͡ʒrd ʔinsaːn jstħq aːlaːħtraːm hl ʕndk aːlwqt ltʃrb ʃjʔiaː maː hj ktˤflˤtj tmaːmaː ʔajn hj ʁrftk faqaaːla kafaaː bitarki aːlʕilmi ʔiʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶn fij aːldːunjaaː aːlʔaasχijaaːʔu wafij aːlʔaːχiraai aːlʔaatqijaaːʔu kaːn mnːaːd ħzjnaː ħamaaːki aːlʔiilahu ʃuruwra aːlzaːmaaːn qaːbltu ʃχsˤaʶnaʶː ʕlaː aːlʔintrnt hðaː mhm d͡ʒdaː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ msaːʕdtj fj mlʔ hðh aːlʔistmaːra waʕilːaau ʔiʕd͡ʒaaːbihim aʶːnsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːfuʶ naʶðˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶm ʔilaaː kaθraai man duwnahum min aːld͡ʒuhːaaːli χtˤaʶːbhaʶː ʔaθar fj aːld͡ʒmhwr ʕmaː ttħdθwn walaʔiin takuwna aːlħaaːlu bajnahumaaː naaːmijaaan ʕljk aːlqrʔaːn ltʃqaː walahu aːlħamdu fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʕaʃijːanaː waħijna tuʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ mjlaːd md͡ʒjd jbdw rd͡ʒlaː ʔamjnaː laaː jastawij ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaaːri waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai humu aːlfaaːʔiizuwna waʔiiðaaː raʔaajta θamːa raʔaajta naʕijmanaː wamulkanaː kabijranaː wlaː jχaːf ʕqbaːhaː ʔaχrd͡ʒ mftaːħanaː mn d͡ʒjb mʕtˤfh waːldj ʁjr mbaːlin baːlʔaːlaːm aʶːlˤʕaʶːtˤfjaʶ aːltj tsbb bhaː swʔ mʕaːmlth lj juχaaːdiʕuwna aːllːaha waaːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː wamaaː jaχdaʕuwna ʔiilːaaː ʔaanfusahum wamaaː jaʃʕuruwna waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ faʶdˤaʶrˤbaʶaʶːniʶ ʕaaːmːaaun waʶχaʶaʶːsˤːaʶaʶuʶn waʶaʶːsˤiʶlˤuʶn waʕabdun liʔaarħaaːmi aːlqaraaːbaai qaʶaʶːtˤiʶʕuʶ aʶːnhdˤ mn srjrk aːlmusijʔu majːitun waʔiin kaaːna fij daaːri aːlħajaaːai qaːlwaː lnaː ʔan nbqaː mkaːnnaː fj aːlwqt aːlraːhn ʔiðaːan hjaː bnaː nðhb mn faːz ʕd ʔilaː aːlmnzl bsrʕa aʶːlˤsˤqjʕ hw ndaː mtd͡ʒmːd ðhbj ʔanaː lst naːdmaːan ʕlaː md͡ʒjʔij hnaː ʁajbihi ʔaaħadanaː hðaː nuzuluhum jawma aːldːjni kaːn ʔab saːmj fj aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤh waʔiiðaː ʔaanʕamnaː ʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaːni ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ wanaʔaaː bid͡ʒaːnibihi waʔiiðaː masːahu aːlʃːarːu faðw duʕaːʔin ʕaʶrˤjdˤiʶn mʕðra jaː dktwr ʔiðaː tfrqt aːlʁnm qaːdthaː aːlʕnz aːld͡ʒrbaːʔ ʔaːrt mtʕqːb χtˤjrˤ sʔaːχð aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤfrˤ ʔaalajsa ðlika biqaːdirin ʕalaː ʔaan juħjija aːlmawtaː waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuqafːaʕi qaaːbilu aːlmadħi kamaaːdiħi nafsihi θulːaaun mina aːlʔaawːaljna maː hj tˤbjʕaʶ ʕmlk fj aːlmktb wahaðaaː jakuwnu ʕan baaːʕiθin wasababin rbmaː lm jkn ʕljnaː aːlzwaːd͡ʒ waʶjaʶqsˤuʶrˤaʶ aːlwaqtu ʕan ʔiʶbtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ faʔaawd͡ʒasa minhum χjfaaan qaːlwaː laː taχaf wabaʃːarwhu biʁulaːmin ʕaljmin aːlmdrsa ʔabʕd mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami dˤiʶħkaʶaʶuʶ aːlmuʔumini ʁaflaaun min qalbihi dʕaːnj faʶːdˤlˤ ltnaːwl mʃrwb aːʕtqd saːmj ʔanː lhðaː ʕlaːqa mʕ aːlʔamr ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jrbːj ʔawlaːdh trbja ʔislaːmjːa falaaː janbuw ʕan fahmin ʔaamsat aːlnːaaːd͡ʒiħaau masruwraaan saːmj jtχaʶːsˤm mʕj daːʔimaː waʔaablaʁa dawaaːʕij naʃrihi ʔiqrʔa aːlmqaːla wakaðlika d͡ʒaʕalnaː likulːi nabijːin ʕaduwːanaː mina aːlmud͡ʒrimjna wakafaː birabːika haːdijanaː waʶnaʶsˤjrˤaʶnaʶː aʶːdˤrˤiʶb ʕunuqa haðaaː aːlʕild͡ʒi ʔaʔanti ʕlaː mtn aʶːlˤtˤːaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ walaaː qabuwlun litaʔadijbin hal θuwːiba aːlkufːaːru maː kaːnwaː jafʕalwna aːlkalbu jaʶrˤkaʶdˤuʶ waraːʔa sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhuʶ kaːnt ldaː saːmj ʕlaːqa ʁjr ʃrʕjːa mʕ mmrˤːdˤaʶ aːsmhaː ljlaː jaʕlamu maː fij aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wajaʕlamu maː tusirːwna wamaː tuʕlinwna waaːllːahu ʕaljmun biðaːti aʶːlˤsˤːuʶdwrˤiʶ rzqwaː bwld wħjd ħjaːtj sˤʕbaʶ llʁaːja man malaka nafsahu ħijna jarʁabu kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlʔislaːm ʔinːhaː lfkra d͡ʒjːda ʔan jzwr aːlmrʔa tˤbjbaʶː mn ħjn lʔaːχr waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj sˤdaʶːqth mʕ ljlaː waʔaamːaː man χaːfa maqaːma rabːihi wanahaaː aːlnːafsa ʕani aːlhawaː aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn mmqwtwn ʔajnmaː ħlːwaː kaːnt ljlaː tqdːm drwsaː llʕraːʔis aːlmsjħjːa ʕaːdaan ʔamʃj maː ʔaurjdu minhum min rizqin wamaː ʔaurjdu ʔaan juʶtˤʕiʶmwniʶ wahaðaaː sˤaʶħiʶjħuʶn ʔaʶaʶdˤħaʶaʶː aːlʁamaaːmu kaθijfanaː ʔant tʃbh waːldk mn maːlk hðaː aːlbjt waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man daaːma kasaluhu χaaːba ʔaamaluhu waaːlqadra bihi χaaːmilun ljs hnaː waaːlrːaaːbiʕu ʔaan tunaaːsiba ħaaːla aːlsːaaːmiʕi litakuwna ʔaablaʁa taʔaθijranaː waʔaaħsana mawqiʕanaː aːlʁijbaau waaːlnːamijmaau waaːlsːiʕaaːjaau waaːlsːabːu biqaðfin ʔaaw ʃatmin lm jʃʕr saːmj qtˤː bʔanːh msjħj aʶːqtaʶsˤiʶd fij mizaaːħik faʔiinːa aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶfrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶ fijhi juðhibu aːlbahaaːʔa θumːa huwa ʔaazjadu fij rutbatihi waʔaablaʁu fij taqadːumihi ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlmarʔi ʔiʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhuʶ lilħazmi ʔaan jastadfiʕa dˤaʶrˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶ aːstdr mn fdˤlˤk ʔaʶðˤlˤm mn aːlljl falam nabluʁ minhaaː aːlmaħduwda lm jkn ldaː saːmj ʔaħd kj jsaːʕdh walaqad waʶsˤːaʶlˤnaʶː fij tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶ makaaːsibihim aʶːntˤaʶlˤiʶqwaʶː ʔiilaː ðˤiʶlˤːiʶn ðj θalaːθi ʃuʕabin ʔinhaː qaːdma hðaː aːlflm -bbsaʶːtˤaʶ- raːʔiʕ laː tlʕb hnaː lm ʔaqdr ʔan ʔafkːr ʔilaː ʔajn ʔajmknk ʔan tqtrħ fkra waʶdˤaʶaʶːqaʶt χalaaːʔiiquhu lm jχbr saːmj aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ waqijla fijhi laaː tadaʕu aːlʔaajːaaːmu d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔilːaaː ʔaadːabathu ʔabħθ ʕn qfaːzaːtj saːmj fj mrkz aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ saːmj hw mn tsbːb bklː mdrːstj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤaʶːdˤj aʶːlˤflˤstˤjnjaʶ aːlmħtla baːlmnaːsba hl zrt hwkaːjdw mn qbl waqad qijla man taaːha fij wilaaːjatihi ðalːa fij ʕazlihi aːlʔaumːu tuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶ ʔaawlaːadahaaː waʔaːdaaːbi ʔaataʔamuruwna aːlnːaaːsa biaːlbirːi watansawna ʔaanfusakum waʔaantum tatluwna aːlkitaaːba ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna wanaʕmaain kaːnwaː fjhaː faːkihjna hl hðaː hw aːlħb waʔiin kaaːna ðarijʕaaan ʔilaaː aʶːlˤtˤːbχ waʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaːʔu furid͡ʒat laː ʔaʕtqd ʔanːnj sʔansaːk klː mn aːljhwd w aːlmsjħjːjn w aːlmslmjn jtːfqwn ʔanː aːlqds mdjna mqdːsa ʕaːmlthaː kʔanhaː bntj ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː jastaħjij ʔaan jaʶdˤrˤiʶbaʶ maθalanaː maaː baʶʕuʶwdˤaʶaʶaʶn famaaː fawqahaaː aʶːlˤbjaʶːdˤ nsˤf aːlħsn bjt aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤm χraːb tudamːiru kulːa ʃajʔin biʔaamri rabːihaː faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħwaʶː laː juraː ʔiilːaː masaːkinuhum kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlqawma aːlmud͡ʒrimjna fqtˤ aːns aːlʔamr fjhinːa qaʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶːtuʶ aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤfiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnːaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaː d͡ʒaːnːun faqaaːla lahu dˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶn waaːallːahi law qult ʕaʃranaː lam tasmaʕ waaːħidaaan waʶjaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶhuʶ ʕan buʁjatihi ʔinːamaaː kuntu ʔaumaaːziħuk waminhaaː aːlʁinaaː faqad tataʁajːaru bihi ʔaaχlaaːqu aːllːaʔiijmi baʶtˤaʶrˤaʶnaʶː watasuwʔu tˤaʶrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶquʶhuʶ ʔaaʃaranaː lqd kaːn ʕjd mjlaːdj aːlθlaːθjn aːlʔasbwʕ aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj kaːn saːmj jstmtʕ baːlħjaːa bʃkl kaːml waaːmraʔaatuhu ħamːaːlaaa aʶːlˤħaʶtˤaʶbiʶ walaaː maħaaːhu bitawbatihi maːðaː laː ʔasmʕk tˤlˤbt aːlnd͡ʒda km θmnhaː waʔaawfaaː ʕahdahu faʔiinːa raʔaja ʁajri ðij aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔaaslamu sʔaqjs ħraːrtk aːlʔaːn ʃabaaːbihi fijmaaː ʔaablaaːhu d͡ʒfː aːlqlm aːlʔaaklu aːlkaθijru jaʶdˤuʶrˤːuʶ aːlmaʕidaaa saːmj jχaʶːtˤrˤ bħjaːth ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlmħkma maaː taquwlu fij aːlʕafwi waaːlʕuquwbaai qaaːla maː aːlħb ʔilaː llħbjb aːlʔawl qadːara ʔaarzaaːqa ʔaahlihaaː sawaaːʔan ʕuluwːu aːlhimːaai kaaːna aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤuʶ bihimaaː ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶrˤaʶnaʶː ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj ʕdːa ʔasaːbjʕ bsˤħbaʶ mslmjn kaːn saːmj jðhb ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa watawakːal ʕalaaː aːllːahi wakafaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum ʔaad͡ʒrun ʁajru mamnwnin laː tns nqwdk hðh hj aːlmsʔala waʔaamːaaː aːlmujaaːsaraai fanawʕaaːni aːχtfaː saːmj bdwn ʔan tusmʕ mnh klma faqaaːma faʶdˤaʶrˤaʶbaʶ bihi ʕunuqa ruwmijːin minhum fanabaaː aːlsːajfu ʕanhu laː jaðwqwna fjhaː bardanaː walaː ʃaraːbanaː raʔaajt aːllːisaaːna ʕalaaː ʔaahlihi ʔiðaaː saaːsahu aːld͡ʒahlu lajθanaː muʁijraaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlχarasu χajrun min aːlkaðibi waʶsˤiʶdquʶ aːllːisaaːni ʔaawːalu aːlsːaʕaaːdaai ʔaʶbtˤʔaʶ mn slħfaːa waaːlfaħʃaaːʔa waaːlmunkara ʔaan takuwna ʕalaaːnijatuhu ʔaaħsana min sarijratihi ʔiinːa jawma aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ mjqaːtuhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna takalːam jaaː aːbna ʔaaχij mn fdˤlˤk laː tns maː tħdːθnaː ʕnh sqtˤt aːlʃd͡ʒra mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tʁaːdr ʔin aːlwqt mtʔaχr waman d͡ʒahila mawaaːqiʕa aːlħuquwqi wamaqaaːdijrahaaː bimaaːlihi waʶʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶʔaʶaʶhaʶaʶː aːirfʕ jdk aːljmnaː faqad aːstaħaaː min aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa ħaqːa aːlħajaaːʔi walam tatakalːaf aːχtijaaːra aːlkalaaːmi aːlmanθuwri ʔiinːa d͡ʒahanːama kaːnat miʶrˤsˤaʶːdaʶnaʶː sjstʁrq aːlmʃrwʕ sna ʕlaː aːlʔaql ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbalat ʔaadbarat ʔiinːahaː ʕalajhim muʶʔuʶsˤaʶdaʶaʶuʶn sʔaʶħdˤrˤ fwtˤaʶ ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jmdˤj aːlwqt mʕ aːmrʔaa tʔaχːrt aʶːlˤtˤːaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ aːnzl mn aːlsːjːaːra mn fdˤlˤk walaqad ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilaː θamwda ʔaaχaːhum sˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːllːaha faʔiiðaː hum farjqaːni jaʶχtaʶsˤiʶmwnaʶ waaːlːaðjna juʔuðwna aːlmuʔuminjna waaːlmuʔuminaːti biʁajri maaː aːktasabwaː faqadi aːħtamalwaː buhtaːnanaː waʔiiθmanaː mubjnanaː waqad qaaːla ʕadijːu bnu ħaaːtimin faʔiinːa man ʕaʶaʶːrˤaʶdˤaʶt fikrahu ʃawaaːʔiibu aːlhumuwmi laaː jaslamu lahu raʔajun walaaː jastaqijmu lahu χaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤuʶn laː ʔaʶsˤdq maː ħdθ walaaː rawijːaaun fijmaaː takalːamuwaː bihi ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdtk subħaːna aːllːahi ʕamːaː jaʶsˤiʶfwnaʶ dχl saːmj fj ʁjbwba tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tsaːʕdh fj ħlː aːlmʃkl qijla liʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu maaː kaaːnat niʕmaau aːllːahi ʕalaaː ʔaaħadin ʔilːaaː wad͡ʒada lahaaː ħaaːsidanaː faʔaalhamahaaː fud͡ʒuwrahaaː wataqwaaːhaaː qaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu waʔiin kaaːna aːljasijru maʁfuwranaː waʶaʶːlˤχaʶaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ maʕðuwranaː kaːn ʁjwraː waqubħi aːlʔaaθari rd͡ʒaːʔ nfːð maː ʔaqwlh sʔaʶqdˤj χmsjn sna fj aːlsːd͡ʒn mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan ttˤlˤːqjnj jaʃtadːu aːlħarːu walaaː sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ ʕanhaaː maaː takrahu ʔiðaaː kaaːna ruʃdanaː twm ldjh aːlm rʔas ħaːd faqaaːla mahlanaː ʔijːaaːki waaːlʁijbaaa sˤfʕ saːmj ljlaː mn d͡ʒdjd waʕan aːlrːuʃdi zaaːd͡ʒiraaun kaːnt ljlaː tʕml fj naːd lltːʕrːj ʔawhn mn bjt aːlʕnkbwt qul ʕasaː ʔaan jakwna radifa lakum baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlːaðj tastaʕd͡ʒilwna liʔaanːahu juntid͡ʒu aːlnːamijmaaa ʕljk ʔan tbqaː sˤaʶːmtaʶː fj aːlqsm qaaːla qaaːla rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama wasaʔaala baʶʕdˤuʶ χulafaaːʔi banij aːlʕabːaaːsi d͡ʒalijsanaː lahu ʕan aːldːunjaaː faqaaːla waaːd͡ʒʕal nuʶsˤħaʶ nafsik ʁanijmaaa ʕaqlik waqaaːla ʔaaħmadu bnu juwsufa kaːn bʔimkaːn saːmj ʔan jqjm sˤdaʶːqaʶ ħtːaː mʕ sˤχrˤaʶ sjntðˤrˤ saːmj ʃamːa ʕalijun wardaaan χajru aːlmaaːli ʕajnun saaːhiraaun liʕajnin naaːʔiimaain aʶːtˤlˤb tðˤfrˤ kaːnt ljlaː qwjːa bmaː jkfj kj tʕbr aːlnːhr sbaːħa aːstqaːl saːmj mn aːlʕjaːda qtˤʕ faʶːdˤlˤ tlk aːlʃːd͡ʒra kaːn ldaː saːmj ħrs ʃχsˤj walikulːin darad͡ʒaːtun mimːaː ʕamilwaː walijuwafːijahum ʔaaʕmaːlahum wahum laː juʶðˤlˤaʶmwnaʶ qaːl saːmj ʔanː aʶːlˤʃːjtˤaʶːn hw mn ʔamrh baʶːlˤtːdˤħjaʶ bljlaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan twljh aːlftjaːt aːntbaːhhnː ʔaabʕiduwaː ʕanːij χafqa niʕaaːlikum faʔiinːahaaː mufsidaaun liquluwbi nawkaaː aːlrːid͡ʒaaːli lm jkn d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː aːnhaːr mnzl saːmj ʔadaːʔ hðh aːlsjaːra ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mn tlk mn fdˤlˤk trd͡ʒm hðh aːld͡ʒmla ʔilaː aːljaːbaːnja ʔaʕdk ʔanːj sʔatklːm mʕh ʔijmj ftaːa ħsna waʔiin lam jakun mubtadiʔianaː bihi fij ʔaawːali ħaaːlin lqd wd͡ʒdthaː ʔaχjraː saːmj mn fwd͡ʒʔi bwd͡ʒwdk hnaː falamːaaː faraʁa qaaːla biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶ lqd ʃfjt nuqilt ljlaː d͡ʒwːaː ʔilaː mstʃfaː mħlːj lijaðilːa lahu qijaaːduhaaː aːuχrud͡ʒ maʕij zid min tˤuʶwlˤiʶ ʔaamalik fij qaʶsˤiʶjrˤiʶ ʕamalik hj ttħdθ aːlqljl mn aːlʕrbja min hud͡ʒnaai musaaːwijhi qul juħjjhaaː aːlːaðj ʔaanʃaʔaahaː ʔaawːala marːaain wahuwa bikulːi χalqin ʕaljmun fajawmaʔiiðin laː juʕaðːibu ʕaðaːbahu ʔaaħadun bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi qul jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlkaːfirwna hwaːʔ sjdnj ʔaʶnðˤf mn hwaːʔ tˤwkjw faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ liħukmi rabːika walaː tuʶtˤiʶʕ minhum ʔaːθimanaː ʔaaw kafwranaː ʕnd aʶːlˤbtˤwn tʕmaː aːlʕjwn wajabqaaː ʕalajk maaː tartakibuhu min aːlmaħaaːrimi ʔaan jastashila aːlmaʕuwnaaa masruwranaː kaðːaba ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai aːlmursaljna kaːn jʕml ljlaː nhaːraː kj jsˤbħ θrjaː walibaaːsu aːltːaqwaaː aːltqjt aːlbaːrħa btwm wawufːijat kulːu nafsin maː ʕamilat wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jafʕalwna ʕijsaaː aːbna marjama aːlbajːinaaːti waʔaajːadnaaːhu biruwħi aːlqudusi qdːm saːmj aːlzːkaːa lˤfaʶːdˤlˤ wajanfuðu fijhi taʶsˤaʶrˤːuʶfuʶhuʶ ħatːaaː qaaːla harimu bnu quʶtˤbaʶaʶaʶ ħijna tanaaːfara ʔilajhi ʕaaːmiru bnu aʶːlˤtˤːuʶfaʶjlˤiʶ waʕalqamaau bnu ʕulaaːθaaa lnbdʔa baːlʔahm waaːllːahu ʔaanbatakum mina aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ nabaːtanaː ʔaafalaː jaʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ ʔiilaaː aːlʔiibili kajfa χuliqat aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ ʔinh fwqk tmaːmaː ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlsːd͡ʒn faʔiinːa aːlzːamaaːna ʁaaːdirun waʶaʶːlˤfuʶrˤaʶsˤuʶ muntahazaaun waaːlθːiqaau ʕad͡ʒzun ħfðˤ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː aʶːlˤsˤːwtjːaʶ waluzuwmu aːlʕurfi aːlmaʕhuwdi waaːʕtibaaːru aːlħadːi aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwdiʶ ʔaadalːu ʕalaaː aːlʕaqli wajatad͡ʒarːaʕu bimahaaːnaai aːlʕad͡ʒzi maraaːraaa ʁuʶsˤaʶsˤiʶhiʶ ʔinh jtklm ʔakθr mmaː jd͡ʒb wawaqːiruwaː man tuʕalːimuwnahu mdː jdh lʔaχð aːltfaːħa ðhb ʔilaː aːldkaːn jʕml ʔabj fj aʶːlˤmsˤnʕ lm jʕd͡ʒb aːlħfl saːmj lw ʔanːnj knt ʔaʕrf waminhu taʔaawːala aːlħasanu waqataaːdaau qawlh taʕaaːlaaː ʔaamarnaaː mutrafijhaaː ʔad͡ʒd ʔan fkrth ʁbjːa kaːn hnaːk ħwaːlj ʕʃrwn ʃχsˤaʶːaʶn man ʔaaħmaqu aːlnːaaːsi qaaːla twm ʕlaː ðˤhrˤ aːlsfjna laː jd͡ʒb aːn tbdlj raːjk ʔarsl saːmj lljlaː sˤwrˤaʶ lh w sˤdrˤh ʕaːr ʔaaw taqwla law ʔaanːa aːllːaha hadaːnj lakuntu mina aːlmutːaqjna bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi aːlːaðjna kafarwaː waʶsˤaʶdːwaʶː ʕan sabjli aːllːahi ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʔaaʕmaːlahum waraʔajin jusadːiduhu taħtamila lahu θalaaːθanaː kmaː ʔan aːlsʔuaːl juðiluː qwmaː kðaːk jʕz qwm baʶːlˤʕtˤaʶːʔ wahuwa biaːlʔaufuqi aːlʔaaʕlaː fakubkibwaː fjhaː hum waaːlʁaːwwna ʔinːa ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤaʶkuʶm ʔilajːa ʔakl wʃbʕ fljħmd aːllh aːlʕmr waːħd waːlrb waːħd wakitaːbin maʶstˤwrˤiʶn ʔiðaː zl aːlʕaːlimu zl bzlth ʕaːlamun twqːft sjːaːra ljlaː ʔamaːm mnzl ljlaː faradːa ʕalajhi d͡ʒawaaːba ruqʕatuhu bihaðaaː bsjːaːrth ʔilaː ʕjaːda ʔiʕaːda tʔahjl ʔinːh mhtmː bki ʔatt ljlaː w ʔaqlːtnj sʔaːχðh mʕj wdˤʕ saːmj sjːaːrth fj aːlmrʔaːb waaːlbaðaaːʔu waaːlbajaaːnu ʃuʕbataaːni min aːlnːifaaːqi ʕaːd ʔilaː mktb aːlmuʃijra ʔaaʃaaːra bimaaː d͡ʒarat bihi aːlʕaaːdaau fij aːlsːijaaːsaai ʔiinːaː lamːaː tˤaʶʁaʶaʶː aːlmaːʔu ħamalnaːkum fij aːld͡ʒaːrijaai aːlʕaaːlimu jaʕrifu aːld͡ʒaaːhila jtʕrˤːdˤ saːmj aːlhumuwmi kaaːðibaaun waʔiinːa aːlʔaaʁlaba min aːlχawfi madfuwʕun ʕani aːljamjni waʕani aːlʃːimaːli ʕizjna wakuluwaː waaːʃrabuwaː maaː ħarːamtumuwhu ʕalaaː ʔaanfusikum min aːllːaħmi waaːlwadaki laː ʔatðkːr maː qaːlh lj ʕljk baːld͡ʒna fʔin aːlnaːr fj aːlkf ʕljh maː ʕlaː ʔabj lhb falaaː tukrihuhaaː ʕalaaː aːlqaraaːri fij ʁajri maʶwdˤiʶʕiʶhaʶaʶː mutːakiʔijna ʕalaː furuʃin baʶtˤaʶːʔiʶiʶnuʶhaʶː min ʔiistabraqin wad͡ʒanaaː aːld͡ʒanːatajni daːnin aːstʕaːrt ljlaː sjːaːra saːmj aːlmuʕalːimu ħaʶːdˤiʶrˤuʶn naːdranaː maː ʔaudʕaː ʔilaː aːlħflaːt kaːn ldaː saːmj aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlðjn kaːnwaː jmlkwn sjːaːra waʔiin kaaːna maðmuwmanaː aːstadrakahu ʔin ʔaamkana waaːntahaaː ʕan miθlihi fij aːlmustaqbali kaːn ldaː saːmj mʃkl sˤħːj lm juʕaːld͡ʒ faqaaːla lahu waʕank ʔaʶuʶʕrˤiʶdˤ waʔiilaaː aːlsːamaːʔi kajfa rufiʕat liʔaanːa aʶːlˤʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ ʔiðaaː kaaːna liʁajri sababin kaaːna aːlmanʕu liʁajri sababin ʕilmu aːlrd͡ʒl wldh aːlmχalaːdu faaːtːaquwaː aːlsːaaːʕija faʔiinːahu ʔin kaaːna fij siʕaaːjatihi sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶnaʶː kaaːna fij sˤiʶdqiʶhiʶ ʔaːθimanaː ʔaʶsˤbħ aːldːktwr saːmj baːkr ʃhjraː ħjn bdʔa aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤbːaʶːʔ mn ʃtːaː ʔanħaːʔ aːlʕaːlm jtaːbʕwn ʔabħaːθh waʔaamːaaː aːld͡ʒaaːru falidunuwːi daaːrihi waʶaʶːtːiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ mazaaːrihi aːlʕarabu taquwlu aːlmslmwn jsˤlˤːwn llh ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaħml tlk aːlħqaːʔib ʕnk ʕljnaː nql saːmj bsrʕa ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda aːrtdaː saːmj bʕdˤ aːlmlaːbs w ðhb ʔilaː mħlː aːlmwaːd aːlʁðaːʔijːa faqijla lahu fij ðalika waʶtˤaʶʕaʶːmaʶnaʶː ðaː ʁuʶsˤːaʶaʶiʶn waʕaðaːbanaː ʔaaljmanaː sʔaʶʕtˤjk drsaː sttðkrh lmda tˤwjlˤaʶ aːfhm maː ʔaqwl ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanːa fij maaː wuqija min aːlrːazaaːjaaː maaː min ʕabdin ʔilːaaː bajnahu wabajna rizqihi ħid͡ʒaaːbun laaː talbas aːlmalaːabisa aʶːlˤdˤːaʶjːiʶqaʶaʶaʶ aːlːaðjna jukaðːibwna bijawmi aːldːjni nħn laː nfʕl ðlk ʕaːdaan fj ʔisbaːnjaː wasaʔaala aːlħad͡ʒːaaːd͡ʒu aːbna aːlqarjaai ʕan aːlʔiijd͡ʒaaːzi qaaːla kaːn saːmj jʔaχð drwsaː laː bd ʔan ʔaːndj tdrb kθjraːan jmknhaː aːn taʕudaː mn aːlwaːħd ʔilaː aːlʕʃra ʔarʁm faʶːdˤlˤ daːnja ʕlaː ʔan tmaːrs mʕh ʔafʕaːlaː d͡ʒnsjːa laː tuʶwsˤf faaːdʕu lanaaː rabːaka juχrid͡ʒ lanaaː mimːaaː tunbitu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ ʔaamːan hðaaː aːlːaðj jarzuqukum ʔiin ʔaamsaka rizqahu bal lad͡ʒːwaː fj ʕutuwːin wanufwrin kaːnt ljlaː tttˤlˤːʕ lˤqdˤaʶːʔ jwm mʕ ħbjbhaː faqad qaaːla aːlnːamiru bnu tawlabin kaːnt ljlaː aːlmtħd͡ʒːba aːlwħjda fj mdjntnaː kaːn saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː mθjraː waman balaʁat bihi aːlʔaaʕðaaːru ʔilaaː ʁaaːjatihaaː falaaː laaːʔiimaaa ʕalajhi waaːlmuqijmu ʕalaaː ʃiqaaːqihi baaːʁin maʶsˤrˤuʶwʕuʶn wakajfa ðaaːka jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi faqaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama waman jaqnut minkunːa lilːahi waraswlihi wataʕmal sˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː nuʔutihaː ʔaad͡ʒrahaː marːatajni waʔaaʕtadnaː lahaː rizqanaː karjmanaː maːrj ljst btˤwlˤh aʶːlˤðˤlˤm mrtʕh wχjm waʶbiʶqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ jatabarːamuwna aːlħjaːa tstmrː ʔardt ʔan ʔaʕrf mstqblj kunːaaː d͡ʒuluwsanaː ʕinda aːbni ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː stnsaːnj fj nhaːja aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːf waʔaantum saːmidwna waaːlʔiiqraaːra biʶtaʶʕðˤiʶjmiʶhiʶ ʔiðanaː ʔaabaaː ħaʶfsˤiʶn laʔaaðhabanːah faqaaːla nsˤnʕ aːlzbda w aːld͡ʒbna mn aːlħljb waʔiijtaaːʔu ðij aːlqurbaaː sˤiʶlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaarħaaːmi taħijːatuhum jawma jalqawnahu salaːmun waʔaaʕadːa lahum ʔaad͡ʒranaː karjmanaː kl maː fj aːlblaːd mn ʔamwaːl ljs ʔilaː ntjd͡ʒa aːlʔaʕmaːl klmtnj baːlʔisbaːnja aːχtft mlaːbsj θumːa latarawunːahaː ʕajna msjħjːa ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jsˤbħ mslmaː aːlʕlm fj aʶːlˤsˤiʶːʁaʶrˤiʶ kaːlnqʃ ʕlaː aːlħd͡ʒr qaaːla faʶʔaʶaʶsˤuʶwmuʶ aːliaːθnajni waaːlχamijsa fatawakːal ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːaka ʕalaaː aːlħaqːi aːlmubjni walaaː taʶtˤlˤuʶbhaʶaʶː fij ʁajri ħijnihaaː tilka ʔaːjaːtu aːllːahi natlwhaː ʕalajka biaːlħaqːi fabiʔaajːi ħadjθin baʕda aːllːahi waʔaːjaːtihi juʔuminwna faqaaːla hajhaaːta ʁalːa jadanaː wajaslama min maðamːaai aːlħaaːlajni fatakuwnu kamaaː qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru aːʃtrjt ʔaħd ʕʃr ktaːbaː sˤaʶːrˤʕ aʶːlˤmrˤdˤ wamutazajːanun bihi fij kulːi makaaːn aːntqlt ljlaː llʕjʃ fj mkaːn ʔaːχr faqaaːla qajsun dˤrˤb saːmj aːlkbʃ w ʔafqdh wʕjh waʔaaqwaaːli aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi faqaaːla jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔilːaaː man ʕadala ʔaaw jaðhabu ʕanhum sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbuʶn waqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin ldjː ħsaːsjːa llfwl wajad͡ʒibu muʕaaːnaaːtuhu min aːlʔaadabi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ naaːla aːlmunaaː waman ʃakara ħaʶsˤːaʶnaʶ aːlnːuʕmaaː ʔaaħaduhaaː ʔaanːahu aːlmaaːlu wahuwa qawlu mud͡ʒaaːhidin qaaːla liʔaanːij raʔaajtuk tuħibːu ʔaan tuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ walaaː tuħibːu ʔaan taʔaχuða qdˤaʶːʔ wqt mʕ ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤk ln jdˤrˤ kðlk ʁmr aːlmaːʔ jrwj wjʁrq dʕaː saːmj klaː ljlaː w frjd lmnzlh ”hðh sˤwrˤaʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶdaʶqaʶaʶuʶ ħirzu aːlmuwsiri aʶːtːsˤlˤ saːmj bljlaː tkraːraː w mraːraː lknː aʶːtːsˤaʶːlˤaʶːth kaːnt tħwːl ʔilaː aːlbrjd aʶːlˤsˤːwtj hm jrfʕwn aːlrːaːja rabːu aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaː bajnahumaaː aːlʕazjzu aːlʁafːaːru waaːlθːaaːnij aːlmusaaːmaħaau fij aːlħuquwqi aːlʃːafːaaːru aːlmuħarːiʃu bajna aːlnːaaːsi julqij bajnahum aːlʕadaaːwaaa faʔiinːa aːlbahaaːʔiima aːlwaħʃijːaaa taʔabaaː ðalika wataʔanafu minhu tˤlˤb faʶːdˤlˤ mn ljlaː ʔan tsˤwːb aːlmsdːs nħw raːmj ʔatħs bwd͡ʒʕ fj btˤnk faʔiiðaaː naaːzaʕathu aːlʃːahwaau tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ min aːlmaaːli maaː juʶwaʶsˤːiʶlˤuʶhuʶ wajaʕlama ʔaanːa makaaːnatahu fij nafsihi ʔaabluʁu wamin aːlħasadi ʔaabʕadu wdˤʕt dˤmaʶːdaʶ ʕlaː ʔaʶsˤbʕj aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːb aːllːahumːa ʔinːij ʔaaʕuwðu bik min tˤaʶmaʶʕiʶn jahdij dijnaaːraaːni kaʔaanːahu d͡ʒimaːlatun sˤuʶfrˤuʶn jmdˤj saːmj ʃhr rˤmdˤaʶːn lwħdh tlqːaː saːmj rsaːla mn aːmrʔaa md͡ʒhwla aːsmhaː ljlaː fj wlaːja kaːljfwrnjaː ʕljk draːsa trbja aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ aʶːlˤsˤːʁaʶːrˤ kj tʕml fj rˤwdˤaʶ aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq mtd͡ʒmd lðaː aːntbh bdʔa faʶːdˤlˤ jsˤwm baːlrːʁm mn ʔanːh lm jkn mslmaː klː nfs ðaːʔiqa aːlmwt walaaː juʁnijhim aːlkalaaːmu ʕan aːlmaaːli waʔiin kaaːna watafarːaqa ʔin knt fj mʃkl fsʔasaːʕdk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaaqlil tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː tuħmad manaaːmanaː lmn hðaː aːlqlm waʔiimːaaː liħiraaːsaai mad͡ʒdin kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jχtˤːtˤaʶːn lˤqdˤaʶːʔ ʕtˤlˤaʶ nhaːja aːlʔasbwʕ mʕaː ʔiinːa aːlʔaabraːra jaʃrabwna min kaʔasin kaːna mizaːd͡ʒuhaː kaːfwranaː lisaaːnanaː ðaaːkiranaː faʔiin kaθura faʶdˤlˤuʶhuʶ kaθura ħusːaaːduhu waʔaanːahu huwa ʔaamaːta waʔaaħjaː qaːlwaː taqaːsamwaː biaːllːahi lanubajːitanːahu waʔaahlahu θumːa lanaqwlanːa liwalijːihi maː ʃahidnaː mahlika ʔaahlihi waʔiinːaː lˤaʶsˤaʶːdiʶqwnaʶ bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʔiinːaː ʔaanzalnaːhu fj lajlaai aːlqadri laː jstħqː saːmj dmwʕki laaː luʔumanaː warahbaaan ʔiið qaːla lahum ʔaaχwhum hwdun ʔaalaː tatːaqwna hw mdrːsnaː fj aʶːlˤrˤːjaʶːdˤjːaʶːt waʔiin qalːa minhu χalaqtanj min naːrin waχalaqtahu min tˤjniʶn waʔiin kaaːna kaθijranaː saːmj jtħrːk aːlmuʔuadːij ʔilaaː χalqihi ʔaawaaːmirahu waʔaalqat maː fjhaː wataχalːat ʕʃ ʕzjzaː ʔaw mt wʔant krjm bjn tˤʕn d͡ʒibrijlu maaː haðaaː qaaːla waʔiiðaaː tˤaʶlˤaʶbtaʶ aːlʁinaaː faʶaʶːtˤlˤuʶbhuʶ biaːlqanaaːʕaai lm jʕaːnj saːmj mn aːlʔalm bsbb mrˤdˤ tˤbjʕj bl bsbb tʕrˤːdˤh lltːsmːm hl fj aːlʔamr swʔ falaaː biaːlħadːi taʶʁlˤiʶjðˤaʶnaʶː wabiaːltːafsijqi taʃdijdanaː waʶtaʶsˤʕiʶjbaʶnaʶː ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum d͡ʒanːaːtun tad͡ʒrj min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaːru ðlika ʔawaːfk zaːʔiraː jd͡ʒb aːn jħbk raːaː twm aːldmaːʔ ʕlaː aːlsd͡ʒaːda ʔahðaː hw aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq lbrljn jʕtqd ʔanh ʔarqaː mstwaː mnaː ʔink tðhb bʕjdaː aːlʔaːn lmaːðaː laː tχrs sˤbaʶːħ kl jwm stsˤlˤk rsaːla fjh mʕnaː ʔaʕd͡ʒb mr bnaː kaʶːlˤðˤbj lknh θlaːθa ʔaʃjaːʔ bhaː aːlhm jkʃf wsʔalt ʕn ħaːlj ʔiðaː faːrqth famaː kulːu man tahwaːhu jahwaːka qalbuhu wqd ʕml qaʶːdˤjaʶːaʶn fʕurf baːlʕdl waːlðkaːʔ wnrd͡ʒs kaːlθʁwr mbtsm ʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕani aːld͡ʒaːhili aːlsafjhi jd͡ʒdr bk ʔan tdˤʕ fj ħsbaːnk ʔank lm tʕd ʃaːbaː tʃrft bmʕrftk hl swf tfʕl hðaː mra ʔaχraː ʁjr mʕqwl lˤtˤfaʶːaʶn aʶːχfdˤ aʶːlˤdˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ lqd zwd͡ʒt ʔibntj bʕbaːra ʔaχraː ʔant ʔaħmq ʔinj rʔajtk ħaːlmaː ʔanʃdtnj maː saːʔnj ʔiʶʕrˤaʶːdˤh ʔinaː kl ʃjʔ χlqnaːh bqdr θumːa qutila kajfa qadːara hl jmknnj ʔan ʔaʶtˤrˤħ ʕljk sʔuaːlaː hðaː ʕlm ʔaan jutraka sudanaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː siraaːd͡ʒanaː wahːaaːd͡ʒanaː mrħbaː bk fj frjq aːltsjjr lʃrka ʔaj bj sj aːljaːbaːn jawma junfaχu fij aʶːlˤsˤːuʶwrˤiʶ fataʔatuwna ʔaafwaaːd͡ʒanaː ʔinh jʕrf kjf jlʕb aːlbwkr whw aːlðj jqbl aːltwba ʕn ʕbaːdh wjʕfw ʕn aːlsjʔiaːt wjʕlm maː tfʕlwn aːsmj laː jbdw fj aːlqaːʔima min ʃarːi maaː χalaqa ln jnd͡ʒħ ðlk manhuwmaaːni laaː jaʃbaʕaaːni ʕjnaː twm kʕjnj ʔabjh ʔaj waaːstakbaruwaː ʕanhaaː ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ʔilːaaː aːld͡ʒanːaau ʔaaw aːlnːaaːru ʔaʕd aːllh lhm d͡ʒnaːt td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː ðlk aːlfwz aʶːlˤʕðˤjm ʔaːmul ʔanka lst ʁaʶːdˤbaʶːaʶn laː jnfʕ aːlndm ʕlaː maː faːt nafsun muʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶuʶn ʔilaaː ruʃdihaaː muntahijaaun ʕan ʁajːihaaː tsˤrˤf bʔadb ljs aːlbjt bd͡ʒdjd flaː ʔaqsm bmaː tbsˤrˤwn nħn snfʕl ðlk ʁdaːan aːltqjt baʶːlˤtˤbjb aʶːlˤmrˤjdˤ sʔasaːfr ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤjn aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm lstu swaː ʃχsˤ ʕaːdjː lʔank d͡ʒjd aʶːlˤmdˤʁ srjʕ aːlblʕ wmaː ʔant ʔilaː bʃr mθlnaː wʔin nðˤnk lmn aːlkaːðbjn liʔaanːa aːlrːaʁbaaa ʔaaqwaaː aːlbaaːʕiθajni ʕalaaː aːlʕilmi ʕaqlun mawfuwrun jahdij ʔilaaː maraaːʃidi aːlʔaumuwri lw kntu ʁnjaːan, ʔawd ʔan ʔaʃtrj mnzlaːan d͡ʒmjlaːan lm ʔansk jaː twm waʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlsːaaːdisaau liʔaanːa nafʕa aːlʔiiχwaaːni ʕaaːmːun wanafʕa aːlmaaːli χaʶaʶːsˤːuʶn md͡ʒtmʕa fj mkaːn waːħd mnːaːd jʕml maːðaː fʕl llħmj ldjh qmjsˤ ʔaswd wʕd͡ʒbwaː ʔan d͡ʒaːʔhm mnðr mnhm wqaːl aːlkaːfrwn hðaː saːħr kðaːb ʔinh md͡ʒrd tˤflˤ lawaħa twm jtwfnaː aːllh fj aːlʕzh rʔajt rd͡ʒlaːan jtːd͡ʒh nħwj ʔaaj χalaqnaaː lakum maaː talbasuwna min aːlθːijaaːbi kaðalika aːlʕilmu laaː jufnijhi aːliaːqtibaaːsu walakinːa faqda aːlħaaːmilijna lahu sababu ʕadamihi ʔiinːahu min sulajmaːna waʔiinːahu bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi lqd tʁjːrt ħjaːa saːmj baːlkaːml kl klb bbaːbh jnbħ wajarudːuhu ʔilaaː qijmatihi maaː aːlːaðij laaː χajra fijhi qaaːla kaːn ʕnd saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlmslmjn fajazuwlu ʕanhu aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ bitaʁajːuri aːlʔaaħwaaːli waaːltːanaqːuli min ħaaːlin ʔilaaː ħaaːlin walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba waqafːajnaaː min baʕdihi biaːlrːusuli faʶjaʶsˤduʶquʶ fij qawlihi wajuwarːij ʕan muraaːdihi ʔarnj lˤtˤfaʶː kjf tʕml ʔaħb aːlrħlaːt hjːaː bnaː ʔilaː aːlsːjrk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man qalːa ʕaqluhu kaθura hazluhu nħn nʕlm maːðaː nkwn w lknːnaː laː nʕlm maː qd nsˤbħ hl tħb aːlfrnsja ʔaljs ʕljnaː sʔuaːl twm biʶnaʶsˤrˤiʶ aːllːahi jaʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶ man jaʃaːʔu wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlrːaħjmu jaaː rabːi kuntu ʔauħibːu lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʕaaːd͡ʒilanaː waqalːamaaː jakuwnu ðalika ʔilːaaː min χalijʕin baʶtˤiʶrˤiʶn ʔaaw murtaaːbin ʔaaʃirin kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa χfjːa ʔiʶntðˤrˤtk θumːa ʔiinːa ʕalajnaː ħisaːbahum qaːlwaː bal wad͡ʒadnaː ʔaːbaːʔanaː kaðlika jafʕalwna knt kθjr aːlnːsjaːn rʔaaː saːmj mlaːbs ljlaː hnaːk waħaaːlaau taʶsˤaʶrˤːuʶfiʶn ʔin ʔaaraħthaaː fijhaaː taχalːat θumːa ʔiinːakum ʔaajːuhaaː aʶːlˤdˤːaʶːlˤːwnaʶ aːlmukaðːibwna aːlmulku jawmaʔiiðin aːlħaqːu lilrːaħmni wakaːna jawmanaː ʕalaaː aːlkaːfirjna ʕasjranaː wamaː tafarːaqa aːlːaðjna ʔawtuwaː aːlkitaːba ʔiilːaː min baʕdi maː d͡ʒaːʔathumu aːlbajːinaau aːʃtrj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤtˤːʕaʶːm lnfsk ʔarjd ʔan ʔatqrːb mnk waʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ ʕan aːstidfaaːʕi ʔaahli aːlbaðaaːʔi lm jkn mdrːsj ʔaatadrij lima aːtːaχaðtuk χalijlanaː qaaːla ðuq ʔiinːaka ʔaanta aːlʕazjzu aːlkarjmu ʔajn hw ʔab saːmj walaaː jadaʕu aːlqurʔaːna raʁbaaan ʔilaaː maaː siwaaːhu hw jħbːnj sunːaaa aːllːahi fij aːlːaðjna χalawaː min qablu walan tad͡ʒida lisunːaai aːllːahi tabdjlanaː waʔiijːaaːka waʶfuʶdˤuʶwlˤaʶhuʶ faʔiinːahu juzilːu aːlqadama kaːn sˤwt saːmj ʁlˤjðˤaʶː d͡ʒdːaː laː ttklːm bhðh aːlnːbra mʕ ʔabjk mn fdˤlˤk fkr fj aʶːlˤmwdˤwʕ waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki tklm fqd klm aːllh mwsaː lqd aːtːχðt qraːrj tfdˤːlˤj waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʕalːim ʕilmak wataʕalːam ʕilma ʁajrik wuld faʶːdˤlˤ fj ftra aːlksaːd aːlkbjr jblʁ mtħdːθj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja mljaːr nsma sjkwn fʕl ðlk χtˤrˤaʶnaʶː θumːa ʕalaaː suwri baladihi ʕaːd mn aʶːlˤmrˤsˤd qdːm lj aːlmdrːs aːħtd͡ʒaːzaː ʔiinːa ðlika laħaqːun taʶχaʶːsˤuʶmuʶ ʔaahli aːlnːaːri ʔiin ħisaːbuhum ʔiilːaː ʕalaː rabːj law taʃʕurwna kaːn saːmj fj ʁrfa aːstʕd͡ʒaːlaːt ʔaħd aːlmstʃfjaːt ʔalaː trjd ʔijqaːf twm laːtsــtʕn baʶːlˤðˤـaʶːlˤm ʕـlaː aʶːlˤðˤـaʶːlˤm ħtـaː laːtkwn frjsـa llʔaθnjــn: faʔiiðaː nuqira fij aːlnːaːqwri juχrid͡ʒu aːlħajːa mina aːlmajːiti wajuχrid͡ʒu aːlmajːita mina aːlħajːi wajuħjij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ baʕda mawtihaː wakaðlika tuχrad͡ʒwna waraʔaajta aːlnːaːsa jadχulwna fj djni aːllːahi ʔaafwaːd͡ʒanaː aʶːlˤsˤdjq ʔimaː ʔan jnfʕ wʔimaː ʔan jʃfʕ ʔaan jusriʕa wuʶsˤuʶwlˤuʶhaʶaʶː lilfahmi hðaː ʔabʃʕ rd͡ʒl θld͡ʒj rʔajth ʔabdaː kaːnt ljlaː qd maːtt ʕndmaː wsˤlˤt sjːaːra aːlʔisʕaːf ʕljnaː ʔan nd͡ʒd ħlaːː kaːn saːmj msˤaʶːbaʶː bd͡ʒrħ fj aːlrːʔas ʔaqlː twm maːrj mn aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ fasubħaaːna man tafarːada fijnaaː biʶlˤuʶtˤfiʶ ħikmatihi faqaaːla ʔaanbiʔiuwnij biʔaasmaaːʔi haaːʔuulaaːʔi ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ waʔiiðaː maʶrˤiʶdˤtuʶ fahuwa jaʃfjni maː χaːb man aːstʃaːr ʔaaw jakuwna qad zaaːda fijhaaː ħatːaaː tad͡ʒaaːwazat maħduwdahaaː km mn aːlwqt aːstʁrqk lttrd͡ʒm hðaː aːlktaːb faqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin laaː χajra walaaː ʃarːa hw jdrs aːlfzjaːʔ qrʕ saːmj ʕlaː baːb ljlaː hl aʶːntðˤrˤt kθjraː waaːstiʃfaaːfanaː lˤiʶlˤtˤːaʶmaʶʕiʶ kaːn aːlmdrːs jtsˤrˤːf bʁraːba ʔiið ʕuʶrˤiʶdˤaʶ ʕalajhi biaːlʕaʃijːi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːfiʶnaʶːtuʶ aːld͡ʒijaːdu mataːʕanaː lakum waliʔaanʕaːmikum warawat ʔaasmaaːʔu bintu jazijda qaaːlat waʔaamːaaː aːlmunaaːsabaau fahija ʔaan jakuwna aːlmaʕnaaː jalijqu biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶlˤfaʶaʶːðˤiʶ ʔimːaaː liʕurfin mustaʕmalin aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ sˤaʶbrˤaʶaʶːniʶ aːlʕaaːd͡ʒizu man ʕad͡ʒaza ʕan sijaaːsaai nafsihi maːðaː tzrʕ fj mzrʕtk faqaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama kajːataaːni waaːʕlam ʔaanːak maaː ħajijta maʶlˤħuʶwðˤuʶ aːlmaħaaːsini maʶħfuʶwðˤuʶ aːlmasaaːwiʔii sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕuʶ aːlmaʕruwfi taqij maʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶʕaʶ aːlsːuwʔi ʕljk aːltħkm baːnfʕaːlk twm waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaanːa ðalika raaːd͡ʒiʕun ʔilaaː libaaːsi aːltːaqwaaː wamaʕnaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhi waaːlʔiisʕaaːdu biaːlnːafsi waaːlmaʕuwnaau fij aːlnːaaːʔiibaai raħima aːllːahu man qaaːla χajranaː faʁanima lm laː tʁjːr mlaːbsk ʔaawlaː laka faʔaawlaː klb saːmj ldjh braːʁjθ wakaːna fij aːlmadjnaai tisʕaau rˤaʶhtˤiʶn jufsidwna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaː juʶsˤlˤiʶħwnaʶ waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu rabːi aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaː bajnahumaaː aːlrːaħmni laː jamlikwna minhu χiʶtˤaʶːbaʶnaʶː wawud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin ʕalajhaː ʁabaraaun saːmj jnðˤːf aːlmnzl saːmj md͡ʒrm χtˤjrˤ llʁaːja aːlqraːr bjdk aːlʔaːn χrd͡ʒ aʶːlˤwdˤʕ ʕn sjtˤrˤtj ʔajn tqʕ baːrjs liʔaanːanaaː qad ðakarnaaː fij ħadːi aːlħilmi ʔaanːahu dˤaʶbtˤuʶ aːlnːafsi ʕan hajad͡ʒaaːni aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ ʔiinːahum kaːnwaː qabla ðlika mutrafjna laː tqlq ʔabdaː waʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaːʔu kuʶʃiʶtˤaʶt waʔiin kaaːnat fij aːlmaʔakuwli waaːlmaʃruwbi ʔaadʕaaː fahija ʔilaaː aːlmalbuwsi maaːsːaaun wabihaaː ʔilajhi faaːqaaun waqad maʶdˤaʶaʶː ʃawaaːhidu kulːi farijqin fij maʶwdˤiʶʕiʶhiʶ bimaaː ʔaaʁnaaː ʕan ʔiʕaaːdatihi wud͡ʒːht lsaːmj thm d͡ʒdjda baːlqtl aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː ʕanhu qijmaau kulːi aːmriʔiin maaː juħsinu wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walkin laː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ wamaaː jaʕqiluhaaː ʔilːaaː aːlʕaaːlimuwna fanafaaː ʔaan jakuwna ʁajru aːlʕaaːlimi jaʕqilu ʕanhu ʔaamranaː ʔanaː qaːdma waqijla lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ldjː ʔiħsaːs ʔanj knt hnaː mn qbl sʔaʶntðˤrˤ fj aːldːaːχl bimaaːdːaain wakasbin ʔawl aʶːlˤʁdˤb d͡ʒnwn wʔaːχrh ndm ʔaːjaau aːlʕaqli surʕaau aːlfahmi tlqːaː saːmj dʕwa ʔajn d͡ʒhaːz aːltħkːm dˤaʶrˤbaʶaʶ muʕaliːmin faliʔaanːa aːllːisaaːna ʕunwaaːnu aːlʔiinsaaːni jutard͡ʒimu ʕan mad͡ʒhuwlihi waðakara ʔaanːahaaː liʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu aːʕtrf saːmj bsˤfʕh lljlaː min ʔaaʕwaði maaː ruwija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔilaaː aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama faqaaːla hawːin ʕalajk faʔiinːamaaː ʔaanaaː aːbnu aːmraʔaaain kaaːnat taʔakulu aːlqadijda smʕ saːmj bʕdˤ klaːb tnbħ jatanaːzaʕwna fjhaː kaʔasanaː laː laʁwun fjhaː walaː taʔaθjmun waχafija ʕalajhi ʔaanːahu ʔiðaaː taʕadːaaː tˤaʶwrˤaʶhuʶ ʕazaː mn qnʕ wðl mn tˤmʕ man ʔaamːala ʃajʔianaː haaːbahu wamin d͡ʒahila ʃajʔianaː ʕaaːbahu mn aːlðj jsbqk ʔiðaː knt td͡ʒrj wħdk laː ttklm baːljaːbaːnja kaːn saːmj jʕml fj ʕjaːda lˤlˤχsˤwbaʶ laː nrjd ʔilaː ʔaχðhaː lbjthaː fqtˤ ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lqaːʔ aːlwqt mʕk waʶaʶːlˤsˤːiʶdquʶ ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ qarijnin waθamwda aːlːaðjna d͡ʒaːbuwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶχrˤaʶ biaːlwaːdi sʔimt mn smaːʕ ħkaːjaːt mdħ nfsk faʔiin ʕadala ʔaaħadun ʕan ʕurfi baladihi wad͡ʒinsihi kaaːna ðalika minhu χaraqanaː waħumqanaː dʕaː saːmj ljlaː llʔakl fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ ʔanaː sˤwt mnʃqː fj ʔisraːʔijl hðaː kitaːbunaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕalajkum biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːaː kunːaː nastansiχu maː kuntum taʕmalwna lm tstħq ljlaː ʔan tmwt kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn ʕlaː ʃjʔ maː ʔajn knt wad͡ʒaʕalnaː siraːd͡ʒanaː wahːaːd͡ʒanaː waaːltːaʔawijli duwna aʶːlˤtːaʶsˤrˤiʶjħiʶ bihi ʔaʕrfh bʔismh aːlʔawl kaːnt ħjaːa faʶːdˤlˤ stʔaχð mnʕrd͡ʒaː mʔasaːwjːaː ʃrbt ʕsˤjrˤaʶː bʕd aːlaːstħmaːm litantahija biaːltːadrijd͡ʒi ʔilaaː aːlʁaaːjaai aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤuʶwbaʶaʶiʶ watastaqirːu biʶaʶːlˤrˤːiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːltːamrijni ʕalaaː aːlħaaːli aːlmaħbuwbaai tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tʕtˤjh rqm haːtfaː walaː ʔaantum ʕaːbidwna maː ʔaaʕbudu kalːanaː ʔinːa man takalːama faʔaaħsana qadara ʕalaaː ʔaan jaskuta fajuħsina waʔaamːaaː manʕu aːlħuquwqi faʔiinːa nafsa aːlbaχijli laaː tasmaħu bifiraaːqi maħbuwbihaaː ʔaʶsˤlˤħ saːmj naːfða mksːra fj aːlħmːaːm knt ʔamtlk sjaːra njsaːn qbl ʔan ʔamtlk hðh waaːlːaðj jumjtunj θumːa juħjjni ʔaan jakuwna bajna aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶlˤfaʶaʶːðˤiʶ kaaːlqawaaːlibi limaʕaaːnijhaaː falaaː tazijdu ʕalajhaaː walaaː taʶnquʶsˤuʶ ʕanhaaː wakaaːna ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu jaquwlu saːmj jntðˤrˤ fqtˤ lm jsmʕ faʶːdˤlˤ mn ljlaː ħtaː aːlrd͡ʒaːl tbkj ʔaħjaːnaː aːstʕaːr saːmj sjːaːra ljlaː wajanʃaʔaa ʕalajhaaː walan tamtaliʔia daaːrun faraħanaː faʔaanbatnaː fjhaː ħabːanaː lajsa min ʕaaːdaai aːlkiraaːmi surʕaau aːliaːntiqaaːmi walaʕalːahu min ʔaabarːi banijhi ħaʶːfðˤ ʕlaː hdwʔik χlaːl aːldrs lilːiðːaai aːlːatij hija ʕindahu ʔaʶaʶħðˤaʶaʶː dˤrˤbnj wbkaː wsbqnj waːʃtkaː aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ faʔiiðaaː kaaːna suwʔu aːlχuluqi ħaaːdiθanaː bisababin kaaːna zawaaːluhu maqruwnanaː bizawaaːli ðalika aːlsːababi knt ʔaʃaːhd aːltlfaːz ħjnhaː hðh χdʕa qdjma ʔiinːa lilmutːaqjna ʕinda rabːihim d͡ʒanːaːti aːlnːaʕjmi baːllh ʕljk ʕljnaː aʶːlˤtbdˤʕ lm jʕd saːmj sˤdjqaʶː lljlaː waaːllːahu min waraːʔiihim muʶħjtˤuʶn jaʶsquʶtˤuʶ aːlχaaːdimu lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbtnj mkaːnk fj hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔaan juʔuθira aːlʔiiðʕaaːna bitaqdijmihi waʔiiʕlaaːmuhaaː ʔaanːahu laaː jaχfaaː ʕalajhi dˤaʶmiʶjrˤuʶn wdˤʕt ljlaː aːlmaːl fj ʕlba ʔaħðja walaqad taraknaː minhaː ʔaːjaaan bajːinaaan liqawmin jaʕqilwna ʔaʶsˤbħ twm ʃrˤtˤjaʶː rjħ sˤjf wtˤaʶːrˤq tˤjf z waħidːaai ðihnihi aːudχul aːld͡ʒanːaaa waqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː ʔimːaaː liχawfi ʃarːihi ʔaaw lilːuzuwmi ʔaamrihi waʔaanaaː ʔaʶaʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶ ʔilajhi aːljawma falaaː ʔaaraaː ðalika fij wad͡ʒhihi jmknk tdlnj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq lmaːðaː lm ttˤlˤb mnːj aːlmsaːʕda waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man kasaaːhu aːlħajaaːʔu θawbahu lam jara aːlnːaaːsu ʕajbahu waaːdχulj d͡ʒanːatj walaaː qiraaːʔaain lajsa fijhaaː tadabːurun χrd͡ʒ mn aːlmwld blaː ħuʶmːsˤ aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ rbaːħ sʔaʕaːwd aʶːlˤʔiʶtsˤaʶːlˤ bk kaːn qlb saːmj tʁmrh aːlsːʕaːda man laː mʕrfa ldjh laː qwa lh rkːzi tfkjrki mʃjt ʔanaː w hw swja waʔiibdaaːʔi aːlʃːuruwri ʕaaːlimun faaːd͡ʒirun wad͡ʒaaːhilun mutaʕabːidun kaaːna ʔaaqbaħa liðikrihi sʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt taʕrifu fj wud͡ʒwhihim naʶdˤrˤaʶaʶaʶ aːlnːaʕjmi ʁjːr saːmj aʶːlˤmwdˤwʕ mn aʶːlˤmfrˤwdˤ ʔan jkwn saːmj fj aːlqsm kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlħjaːa aːlmrjħa waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kulːamaaː kaθurat χizaaːnu aːlʔaasraaːri aːzdaaːdat dˤaʶjaʶaʶːʕaʶnaʶː tlqːaː saːmj rsaːla sˤwtjːaʶ mn ljlaː hðh aːlrsaːʔil mn waːldj saːmj ʔawaːfqk aːlrʔaj ʔan aːlmmθl mwhwb ħbl aːlwrjd karamu aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ faʔiinːa aːlkarijma musaaːʕidun laː jmknnj ʔan ʔabqaː fj aːlsːrjr tˤjlˤaʶ mdːa hðaː aːlħml ʔaudχil saːmj ʔilaː mstʃfaː lˤlˤʔaʶmrˤaʶːdˤ aːlʕqljːa ljs hðaː maː ħdθ hnaː waaːlʃːamsu tad͡ʒrj limustaqarːin lahaː ðlika taqdjru aːlʕazjzi aːlʕaljmi wamusaaːmaħaau ʔinkaaːrin liʕusraain bdʔa saːmj jmdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr fj aːlʕml walaqadi aːχtarnaːhum ʕalaː ʕilmin ʕalaaː ʔawl aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ kfr ʔawl maː ʃtˤħ ntˤħ ʔaaχbaranij rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːa fij ʕajnajk baʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶnaʶː lan jaʕuwda aːlʁaaːʔiibu aːlħasuwdu laaː jasuwdu waʔaamːaaː aːlʃːahwaau fatatanawːaʕu nawʕajni waaːχtalafa aːlnːaaːsu fijman sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ faʶdˤlˤaʶ ʕaqlihi ʔilaaː aːlʃːarːi kazijaaːdin ʔanʃʔa saːmj ʕjaːda mʔuqːta fj aːlqaːhra saːmj ʔaħmq ʕdn ʔilaː kra aːlsːlːa jaʕnij ʔaanːahu kamaaː laaː jaħilːu laħmuhu majːitanaː laaː taħilːu ʁijbatuhu ħajːanaː jaː lk mn wld d͡ʒmjl ntˤq saːmj baːlʃːhaːda lwħdh fj ʁrfth faʶjaʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶ faʔiin χaaːfa biaːlrːadːi qadħa ʕiʶrˤdˤiʶn ʔaamranaː min ʕindinaː ʔiinːaː kunːaː mursiljna kalːaː laʔiin lam jantahi lanasfaʕanaː biʶaʶːlˤnːaʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ qaːl faʶːdˤlˤ ʔanːh kaːn jsmʕ ʔaʶsˤwaʶːtaʶː fj rʔash lqd dmːr saːmj ħjaːth waʶlˤwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔiinːakum lataʔatwna aːlfaːħiʃaaa maː sabaqakum bihaː min ʔaaħadin mina aːlʕaːlamjna ʔaraː kl ʔinsaːn jraː ʕjb ʁjrh wjʕmaː ʕn aːlʕjb aːlðj hw fjh maː aːlðj d͡ʒʕlk tʔatj ʔilaː hnaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒazaʕu aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlθːaaːnij fij aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ waaːld͡ʒazaʕi jaʕnij waaːallːahu ʔaaʕlamu liqilːaai muruwʔatihi waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ ʃahwatihi faʶaʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶqwaʶː wahum jataχaːfatwna kaːlmħtmj bbjt aːlʕnkbwt qutila baːlsjf ʔaːkul tfaːħa sjfrħ ʔanaː sʕjd lsmaːʕ ʔanː ljlaː ʔaːmn mn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ waʶðˤaʶnːaʶ ʔaanːahu aːlfiraːqu faʔaamːaaː aːlnaːr lˤiʶjaʶsˤiʶlˤaʶ ʔilaaː faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlʔaamrajni biaːlmuknaai min aːljasaaːri waaːlʔiiʕsaaːri faʔiinːa lilmuwsiri fij aːlzːijːi qadranaː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man jaχun jahun aʶːtðˤrˤ saːmj fj sˤmt waaːlʃːahwaaa muʶχtaʶsˤːaʶaʶuʶn binajli aːllːaðːaai aːrd͡ʒʕ ʔilaː aːlwraːʔ mn fdˤlˤk ʃkraː ʕlaː ʔaːdχaːl aːlʁsjl jaː d͡ʒjrj rbmaː stmtˤrˤ aːlljla laaː zawaaːla lilnːiʕmaai maʕa aːlʃːukri lqd aːtːχð saːmj qraːraː w laː ʔaħd jsttˤjʕ ʔan jd͡ʒbrh ʕlaː aːltːnaːzl ln ʔaʶdˤrˤb aːmrʔaa ʔabdaː faʶaʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤiʶfaʶːtiʶ ʕaʶsˤfaʶnaʶː aːldːlaːl aʶːlˤmfrˤtˤ sjːʔ sanuqriʔiuka falaː tansaː walaaː liniʕamihi min aːlnːaaːsi ʔaahlanaː waʔaalzamahum muʶftaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶ mn jqf hnaːk faaːlʔaawlaaː fij miθlihi aːnfiraaːdu kulːi waaːħidin bifikrihi d͡ʒanaaː aːlfalaːaħu quʶtˤnaʶhuʶ wabaaːʕahu θumːa aːiʃtaraaːa biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ θamanihi maaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔiilajhi waʔaːθara aːlħajaːaa aːldːunjaː aːstʔad͡ʒr saːmj ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːlmħaːmjn kj jdaːfʕwaː ʕljh waʶaʶːnqaʶbaʶdˤaʶ ʕan munaaːfasaai aːlʔaakfaaːʔi laː jaʶsˤlˤaʶːhaʶː ʔiilːaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː ʔaalastum tastarijħuwna biaːllːajli qaaːluwaː waʔiin kunta kaaːðibanaː faqad bahatahu man lam jaʕudːa kalaaːmahu min ʕamalihi kaθurat χaʶtˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶːhuʶ waliʔaanːa fij aːlrːud͡ʒuwʕi ʕanhu min aːliaːnkisaaːri wajubarhinu ʕan maʶħsˤuʶwlˤiʶhiʶ faʔiiðaː nufiχa fij aʶːlˤsˤːwrˤiʶ nafχaaun waːħidaaun sʔaltnj km ʕmrj hj laː tzaːl fj aːlχjma waʔiiðaaː aːlqubwru buʕθirat ʔaam ʔaanaː χajrun min hðaaː aːlːaðj huwa mahjnun walaː jakaːdu jubjnu niʕma aːlmuʔuaaːzaraau aːlmuʃaaːwaraau wabiʔisa aːliaːstiʕdaaːdu aːliaːstibdaaːdu aːlmftaːħ ʕnd saːmj walaaː jalħaquhu zijaaːdaaun bifaqdi aːlħilmi man ħalima saaːda waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔiðaaː tˤaʶlˤaʶbtaʶ aːlʕizːa faʶaʶːtˤlˤuʶbhuʶ biʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ jʕtqd aːlkθjrwn ðlk aːnaː ʔaʔumn fj qdraːtj laː ʔaʕrf kjf sqtˤt mn ʕlaː aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn wahuwa mustashalu aːlkalafi ʔaam jaqwlwna naħnu d͡ʒamjʕun muʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤuʶn maː zaːlt qdmaːj tʔulmaːnnj bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʔiiðaː waqaʕati aːlwaːqiʕaau sʔaʕjdk llmnzl kj tʁjːr mlaːbsk walaaː jaʶtˤmaʶʕaʶ fijmaaː laaː jastaħiqːu aːld͡ʒmjʕ jħbː hðaː aːlmdrːs aːlbʕd d͡ʒfaːʔ hðaː ljs mn ʕaːdaːth ʔabdaː kaːnt tlk aʶːlˤtˤːflˤaʶ d͡ʒmjla fj tqlb aːlʔaħwaːl ʕlm d͡ʒwaːhr aːlrd͡ʒaːl waʔiiðaaː ħasadtum falaaː tabʁuwaː kaːn jʕd͡ʒbnj mdrːs aʶːlˤrˤːjaʶːdˤjːaʶːt lm ʔaʕlm ʔilaː ʔajn ʔaðhb ʔaw maː ʔafʕlh rʔaaː saːmj θʕaːbjnaː tχrd͡ʒ mn ðlk aːld͡ʒħr tˤuʶrˤd saːmj mn hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔaaw tawad͡ʒːaha ʕalajhi radːun nuʶwqiʶdˤaʶ ʔanaː wtwm klaːnaː mʃʁwlaːn kaːn saːmj jħtfl lst baːrʕaː fj aːlkðb jaʕnij waaːallːahu ʔaaʕlamu ʔaanːahu jakʃifu ðˤuʶlˤmaʶ aːlħijraai waʶjuʶwaʶdˤːiʶħuʶ ħaqaaːʔiiqa aːlʔaumuwri faʔiinːahu man aːstawʕaba aːlħalaaːla taaːqat nafsuhu ʔilaaː aːlħaraaːmi ðaːkrt saːʕa wakaaːna tˤaʶbʕuʶhuʶ ʔilajhi maaːʔiilanaː lijanfija ʕanhu wajukfaaːhu wajaslamu min dˤaʶrˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶ waʕadaaːwatihi dχl saːmj ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː jsˤaʶːħb aːlbrq aːlrʕd ʕaːda saaːlibaaːtu aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶjrˤaʶ maħʃwraaan kulːun lahu ʔaawːaːbun ʔijːaaːka wakaθraaa aʶːlˤdˤːaʶħiʶkiʶ faʔiinːahu jumijtu aːlqalba wajuðhibu binuwri aːlwad͡ʒhi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlbaχijlu lajsa ʔaakθamu bnu sˤaʶjfiʶjːiʶn man sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ ðˤaʶfiʶrˤaʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi bimiftaaːħi ʕazijmaai aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ tuʕaaːlad͡ʒu maʁaaːlijqu aːlʔaumuwri ʔiinːamaaː aːlħajaːau aːldːunjaː
