saːmj aːlkθjr mn aːlrːsaːʔil lljlaː waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazːi aːlħasadu daaːʔu aːld͡ʒasadi ʔaam lilʔiinsaːni maː tamanːaː ʔijnaaːsu aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶjnaʶ waaːltːawadːudu ʔilaaː aʶːlˤmuʶχaʶaʶːlˤiʶtˤiʶjnaʶ wafiʕluhu ðamijmun aːldːawaːau mamluwʔaaun masluwba aːlʕazaaːʔi ʔaʶnðˤrˤiʶ waaːstabðala sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶtaʶhuʶ ʔaχð saːmj bʕdˤ aːldːrws saːr saːmj ʔilaː tlk aːlnːaːfða bismi maʕaaːʃun sˤrˤːħ aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤbːaʶːʔ ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt ttʕaːfaː mn srˤtˤaʶːnhaʶː wataʃʁalu aːlqalba falam janfi ʕanhaaː qabijħanaː walam jahdi ʔilajhaaː ħasananaː ʔajːhaː aːlʔaħmq kjf td͡ʒrʔu ʕlaː sˤfʕj khðh kaːnt ljlaː mʃd͡ʒːʕa mθjra fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa faaːlħaqːu ʔaaqwaaː muʕijnin θumːa qaaːla waʁalaba ʕalajhi aːlχuluqu aːlðːamijmi χð ħbtjn mn aːldwaːʔ bʕd aːlʔakl waʔaamːaaː mawaaːqifu aːlrːijbaai fahija aːltːaradːudu bajna manzilataj ħamdin waðamːin waaːstaʕijnuwaː biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ waʔiinːahaaː lakabijraaun ʔiilːaaː ʕalaaː aːlχaaːʃiʕijna fj aːld͡ʒrjra tʃtrk aːlʕʃjra waʔaamːaaː sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlʕamali faqad tanqasimu qismajni ʕamalun sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕiʶjːuʶn waʕamalun bahijmijːun θumːa lamːaaː kaaːnat aːlmawaaːdːu maʶtˤlˤuʶwbaʶaʶaʶn liħaaːd͡ʒaai aːlkaaːfːaai ʔilajhaaː ʔauʕwizat biʁajri tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶn ðl mn laː sjf lh ʔatnsaː ʕaːda aːlqjaːm bwaːd͡ʒbaːt wafij haðaaː aːlnːawʕi qad jaqaʕu aːltːad͡ʒaaːwuzu waʶaʶːlˤtːaʶqsˤiʶjrˤuʶ waʶaʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶsːuʶtˤuʶ aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤuʶwbuʶ fijhi muʕtabarun min wad͡ʒhajni thaːnjː hl ʔant qaʶːsˤrˤ duħwranaː walahum ʕaðaːbun waʶːsˤiʶbuʶn ʔaχbr saːmj ljlaː bħmlj waʔaafsadathu d͡ʒahaaːlatuhu liʔaanːa aːlbalaaːʁaaa lajsat ʕalaaː maʕaaːnin mufradaain walaaː lˤiʶʔaʶaʶlˤfaʶaʶːðˤiʶhaʶaʶː ʁaaːjaaun faʕalajk minhaaː biaːlkafaaːfi qrjbaːan sjʔatj aːljwm aːlðj jsttˤjʕ fjh aːlbʃr aːlsfr ʔilaː kwkb aːlmrjχ waaːlʔiiħsaaːnu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː ʔaamrihi wanahjihi waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ aːllːahi fij sirːihi wad͡ʒahrihi jasʔaalu ʔaajːaːna jawmu aːlqijaːmaai ldjː mwʕd mʕ aːlmħrːra baːkr ʕaːd mn aːlmχbr maːðaː nfʕl hnaː waaːld͡ʒaaːhilu laaː jaʕrifu aːlʕaaːlima fakaʔaanːa haðaaː aːlʔausluwba ʁrfa llʔijd͡ʒaːr aːlbadijhaau ʔiðaaː salːama baʕda aːlfikri waaːlrːawijːaai ʔilːaaː luʔumanaː ʔin ħasuna fijhi aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːuʶ ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː tˤwkjw tuʕaaːqibu ʔaajdijnaaː wajaħlumu raʔajunaaː wanaʃtumu biaːlʔaafʕaaːli laaː biaːltːakalːumi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi hl bʔimkaːnj msaːʕdtk btˤrˤjqaʶ maː knt ʔaħbː aːlnːfaːjaːt aːltj kaːnt χlf mktb saːmj wabiaːld͡ʒamijli maðkuwranaː htf aːld͡ʒmhwr ʕndmaː sd͡ʒl hdfaːan bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi aːqtarabati aːlsːaːʕaau waaːnʃaqːa aːlqamaru ʕan ʕabdi aːlrːaħmani bni aːlmuraqːaʕi ʔaamaaː taraaː haðaaː aːldːajːina aʶːlˤfaʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤaʶ kajfa ʕuwd͡ʒila biaːltːaqrijʕi waquwbila biaːltːawbijχi min ʔaʶaʶχaʶsˤːiʶ ðawijhi ʔaan takuwna sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlfikri ʔaaʁlaba waaːlʕamalu tabaʕanaː kaaːlkitaaːbaai kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa sʕjda fj aːlqaːhra liʔaanːa aːlʃːarʕa laaː jaridu bimaaː jamnaʕu minhu aːlʕaqlu rbmaː ʕlj ʔan ʔaʶtsˤlˤ bk laːħqaː wamin ʔaːjaːtihi aːld͡ʒawaːri fij aːlbaħri kaaːlʔaaʕlaːmi aːlχajru θalaaːθu χiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn faman kunːa fijhi faqad aːstakmala aːlʔiijmaaːna kaːnt mdrːsa d͡ʒjːda liʔaanːahu jasuwʔu sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶhaʶaʶː aːnkiʃaaːfuhaaː min d͡ʒasadihi kaːn saːmj msˤaʶːbaʶː baːlrːbw waʔaamːaaː tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi lidaaːʕin jadʕuwhu liʔaanːa aːlnːaaːsa maʕa ʔaʶaʶtˤwaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm aːlmuχtalifaai kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa jaaː ʔaabati faʔiin ʔaanaaː ʔaakθartu waʔaakθart jaʕnij kalaaːmanaː waʶsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː mutːakiʔijna ʕalaː rafrafin χuʶdˤrˤiʶn waʕabqarijːin ħisaːnin watakθijrun jakuwnu haðranaː w ʔaχjraː wd͡ʒdthaː ʔiðaaː ʃakːaktahu fijhi taʃakːaka ħatːaaː jakaaːda jard͡ʒiʕu fijhi walaaː jud͡ʒijbu ʔilːaaː ʕunfanaː ʔaalːaː taziru waːziraaun wizra ʔauχraː walaaː jaχluw fijmaaː ʔaataaːhu min ʔaarbaʕi ʔaaħwaaːlin waaːstarðaluwaː ʔaahlahu kalːaː ʔiinːaː χalaqnaːhum mimːaː jaʕlamwna aʶːlˤmiʶsˤbaʶaʶːħuʶ mutːaqidun waqad ħukija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː saaːjara baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlwulaaːai faqaaːla ʔaahwaaː hawaaː aːldːijni waaːllːaðːaaːtu tuʕd͡ʒibunij fakajfa lij bihawaaː aːllːaðːaaːti waaːldːijni faqaaːlat χuð aːlʕafwa waʔamur biaːlʕurfi waʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕan aːld͡ʒaaːhilijna ʔalm tns ʃjʔiaː watad͡ʒaaːwaza qadrahu aːʕtqd saːmj ʔanː hðaː kaːn mfjdaː lh ʔaaw majlin jakuwnu ʕan ʔihmaaːlin wamaː jaʔatjhim min nabijːin ʔiilːaː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna waʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi haðihi aːlʔaabjaaːti lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan rʔaaː tˤbjbaʶː fj ħjaːth rdː saːmj fabalaʁa maaː ʔaaħabːa min ʔiχfaaːʔi nafsihi waʶsˤaʶdaʶqaʶ fij χabarihi kjf td͡ʒd aːʕtnaːqk llʔislaːm waqad qaaːla aːbnu aːlsːamːaaːki dʕmkm mqdr waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤmuʶʕtˤiʶj ʔiðaaː aːltamasa biʶʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa aːlʔaːχrwn ʕlaː wsˤwlˤ aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlsːaaːdisu fij aʶːlˤtˤːiʶjaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːlfaʔali falahum ʔaad͡ʒruhum ʕinda rabːihim walaaː χawfun ʕalajhim walaaː hum jaħzanuwna waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶlˤaʶbuʶ limuwd͡ʒibin ʔimːaaː aːntiqaaːmun jaʶsˤduʶrˤuʶ ʕan safahin ʔaaw baðaaːʔun jaħduθu ʕan luʔumin ʔanaː mn tsbːb bhðh aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː w sʔaʶnðˤːfhaʶː kfiː ʕn aːlkðb kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jħdˤrˤaʶːn drwsaː mʕaː mrħbaː aːntħrt ʕn ʕmr jnaːzh aːlθlaːθjn ʕaːmaːan bwb sˤdjqj waman qalːat sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕuʶhuʶ fij aːlʃːaaːkirijna sʔanaːm man ʔiðaaː rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ lam judχilhu rˤiʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ fij baʶaʶːtˤiʶlˤiʶn ʕinda baaːriʔiikum fataaːba ʕalajkum ʔiinːahu huwa aːltːawːaaːbu aːlrːaħijmu lmaːðaː laː tʔatj kj tʕml fj hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔaʶʕtˤnj frˤsˤaʶaʶn ʔaχraː kaːnt sˤdmaʶ qwja ʔaatabnwna bikulːi rjʕin ʔaːjaaan taʕbaθwna taʁurːu waʶtaʶdˤuʶrˤːuʶ watamurːu lijad͡ʒzija aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinːahu laː juħibːu aːlkaːfirjna wajakufːa ʕan aʶːlˤðˤːuʶlˤmiʶ wataʔaalːufahaaː biaːlmuqaaːrabaai waaːlmusaaːhalaai ʔinː aːlħjaːa laː tbdʔa w tnthj bsaːmj kaːn saːmj ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːlqaːhra kj jmdˤj bʕdˤ aːlʔajːaːm mʕ ljlaː waʔaarsaχu limaʕluwmihim waaːlʔaaħmaqu dˤaʶaʶːlˤːuʶn muʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶn ʔin ʔauwnisa takabːara hl jmknk ʔan tdlnj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq aːlaː saːmj ljlaː mnð snwaːth fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa swf tnsaːnj jwmaː maː ʔaʶʕtˤs kθjraːan waaːlmuqaaːbalaau takuwnu min wad͡ʒhajni waʔiinːaka laʕalaː χuluqin ʕaʶðˤjmiʶn tuʶsˤnaʶʕuʶ aːlʔaaħðijaaa mina aːld͡ʒaldi ʔaðːn saːmj lqd ʔanqðt ljlaː ħjaːa saːmj liʔaanːa maaː taradːada bajna ʔaamrajni faaːlmuraaːdu minhu aʶːlˤiʶaʶːʕtiʶrˤaʶaʶːdˤuʶ ʕalaaː fasaaːdihi waʔiirʃaaːdi aːlʕibaaːdi fij qasmi aːlmanaaːfiʕi bajnahum ħaːrb ʕdwk baːlslaːħ aːlðj jχʃaːh laː baːlslaːħ aːlðj tχʃaːh hl tʕrf kjf tlʕb kra aːlqdm ʕud ʔilaaː qitaaːli ʕaduwːi aːllːahi walakinːahaaː zalːaaun min zalːaaːti rdːt ljlaː saːmj waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdːuʶ ʕan ðalika ʔaan jaraaː ʔaːθaaːra aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː fij aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ faʔiinːa lahu fijhim ʕibaranaː ʔanaː ʔaʶdˤjʕ wqtj ʔaʕlnt ljlaː ʔanːhaː dˤaʶːbtˤaʶ ʃrˤtˤaʶ ʃahru bnu ħawʃabin ʕan ʔaabij ʔaumaaːmaaa qaaːla saːmj bʕjd ʕn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ aːlwaladu maʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶn man aːstaʁnaaː biaːallːahi aːktafaaː lm jkn saːmj jʕrf kjf jsˤbħ mslmaː ʕnd aːlnaːzla tʕrf ʔaχaːk hnaːk aːlʕdjd mn aːld͡ʒaːmʕaːt fj kjwtw waʔaarsalnaːhu ʔiilaː miaːʔiaai ʔaalfin ʔaaw jazjdwna wakaðlika ħaqːat kalimatu rabːika ʕalaaː aːlːaðjna kafarwaː ʔaanːahum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaːri hðh tfaːħa ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj lstːa ʔajːaːm snd͡ʒls w nntðˤrˤ ʔaraːd saːmj aːlʕjʃ fj bld ʔislaːmj qm btnsˤjb ljnks waʔaubːahaaa aːlmustaqilːijna wsˤlˤ ʔaχjraː ʔiinːa aːllːaha jaʕlamu maː jadʕwna min χajranaː lahum waaːllːahu ʁafwrun raħjmun liʔaanːa maaː jaʔatijhi biʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ min ʁajri takalːufin aːlʔibtsaːma klma mʕrwf mn ʁjr ħrwf waaːlbuʔusu marðalaaun maː rʔajki tamahːal fij aːlsːajri ʕani aːlnːabaʔii aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ sʔaqwm bʁsl aʶːlˤsˤħwn bmaː ʔank tˤbχtaʶ waʔiiðaː quriʔia ʕalajhimu aːlqurʔaːnu laː jasd͡ʒudwna walaʔiin jafʕala maaː lam jaqul ʔaad͡ʒmalu min ʔaan jaquwla maaː lam jafʕal haðaaː hal jakuwnu mansuwbanaː ʔilaaː aːlsːaχaaːʔi fajuħmadu ʔaaw χaaːrid͡ʒanaː ʕanhu fajuðamːu faaːlmulqijaːti ðikranaː lan tanfaʕakum ʔaarħaːmukum walaː ʔaawlaːdukum jawma aːlqijaːmaai jaʶfsˤiʶlˤuʶ bajnakum waaːllːahu bimaː taʕmalwna baʶsˤjrˤuʶn ʔaʶaʶħfaʶðˤuʶ aːldːarsa lm ʔakn ʔanwi ʔan ʔaχbrh hw jdrs aːlʔind͡ʒljzjːa twm jʕrf ʕljh aːlmʁaːdra lqd aʶːstjqðˤ saːmj ʔaχjraː mn ʁjbwbth waʔaamaaːnun min aːlmalaaːmaai jwsf aʶːlˤsˤdjq kaːn saːmj mdrːsaː mħtrmaː d͡ʒdːaː lqd sˤfʕth fj aːlwd͡ʒh waqaaːla aːlʃːaʕbijːu maaː ʔaadrakt ʔaumːij θumːa tuʔuawːalu ʔilaaː taʶqaʶaʶːtˤuʶʕiʶ aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤiʶlˤiʶjnaʶ waʶtaʶbaʶaʶːʁuʶdˤiʶ hl maː zaːl ðlk aːlħljb sˤaʶːlˤħaʶːaʶn llʃrb walaaː takun ʕabda ʁajrik waqad d͡ʒaʕalak aːllːahu ħurːanaː wamuħasːinaau aːlqabaaːʔiiħi smʕt waːldtj tʁnj fj aːlħmaːm liʔaanːa aːlʃːuħːa jamnaʕu min ʔaadaaːʔi aːlħuquwqi ʃadːa ʕalajhi barðaʕaaan fajasijru fajalqaaː aːlrːad͡ʒula fajaquwlu aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjquʶ qad d͡ʒaaːʔa aːlʔaamijru lahum fjhaː faːkihaaun walahum maː jadːaʕwna laː trtdi ħðaːʔaː fj aːlmsd͡ʒd hw jθjraː ʔaʶʕsˤaʶːbj ħqːaː waʶjaʶtˤwfuʶ ʕalajhim ʁilmaːnun lahum kaʔaanːahum luʔuluʔuun maknwnun walilːahi mulku aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ jaʁfiru liman jaʃaːʔu wajuʕaðːibu man jaʃaːʔu wakaːna aːllːahu ʁafwranaː raħjmanaː fahuwa ʔaan laaː jaqnaʕa biaːlkifaaːjaai waʶjaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶ aːlzːijaaːdaaa waaːlkaθraaa kaːn saːmj ʔaːtjanaː mn hnaːk waħwrun ʕjnun kaːn saːmj jlkm ljlaː ħtːaː ʕndmaː kaːnt ħaːmlaː bʕdːa ʔaʃhr warubːamaaː tawahːama baʶʕdˤuʶ man χalaaː min faʶdˤlˤiʶn kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː ljlaː lm tkn fj χtˤrˤ faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ bihaðihi aːlnːisbaai min aːlmaʕluwmaaːti aːlfikrijːaai hðh aːlsjaːra tħtaːd͡ʒ lˤʔiʶsˤlˤaʶːħ qijla ʔaafajakuwnu kaðːaaːbanaː qaaːla laaː fʔin qljl aːlħb baːlʕql sˤaʶːlˤħ wʔin kθjr aːlħb baːld͡ʒhl faːsd laː ʔadrj ʔajn mwqf aʶːlˤbaʶːsˤ ʔiin hðaː ʔiilːaː qawlu aːlbaʃari lm jkn saːmj jkrh aːlmslmjn ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔa rabːahu biqalbin saljmin ʔaʶsˤbħt ljlaː aːlʔaːn mmrˤːdˤaʶ χaʶːsˤːaʶ ln nnsaːhm ʔabdaː salaːmun qawlanaː min rabːin raħjmin aːʕtrft ljlaː ʔanːhaː tχaʶːsˤmt mʕ zwd͡ʒhaː saːmj fj aːljwm aːlðj aːχtfaː fjh ʕrˤːdˤ saːmj nfsh lˤχtˤrˤ aːlkʃf jasbaħu aːlʁulaːamu fij aːlnːahri laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ðlk sˤħjħaʶːaʶn mn aːlmstħjl ʔan jtʕlːm aːlmrʔa aːlsːbaːħa bdrws mraːsla aːllːʁa aːlʔalbaːnjːa d͡ʒmjla d͡ʒdːaː tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tʕtˤjh rqmhaː waaːllːajli ʔiiðaː ʕasʕasa tʔaχrt bsbb zħma aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq aːlʃdjda faqaaːla lilmutawakːili bihi ʔaan jaʕtamida maaː aːd͡ʒtarama min kabaaːʔiirihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi liaːbnihi hal ʃajʔun χajrun min aːlðːahabi waʶaʶːlˤfiʶdˤːaʶaʶiʶ qaaːla hʔulaːʔ aːlθlaːθa bnaːth χalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːa fj ðlika laʔaːjaaan lilmuʔuminjna ʔaʶnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aːlwld w hw jqfz kaːn ldjh mdrːs msˤrˤj ljs hnaːk maː hw ʔaswʔa mn aːlħrb ʕðˤmaʶ aːllh fj aːlkwn waqad ðahaba baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʔilaaː ʔaanːa aːlkalaaːma ʔiðaaː kaθura ʕan qadri aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔahdaːnj saːmj hðh fj ʕjd mjlaːdj saːmj fj aːlsːd͡ʒn mdaː aːlħjaːa kl wld ʕndh draːd͡ʒa hðh aːlmra td͡ʒaːwzt aːlħdwd waʶʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤːaʶhuʶ aːlħirmaaːnu ʕan maʶqaʶaʶːsˤiʶdiʶhiʶ mtaː jnthj aːldwaːm aːlmdrsjː qrʔa saːmj d͡ʒzʔaː mn aːlqrʔaːn aːlkrjm tʕrˤːdˤt ljlaː lˤlˤmdˤaʶːjqaʶ fj qsmhaː ln nfwz qalijla aːlnːufuwri wsˤlˤ saːmj lqd aːtbʕwk waʔaakwaːbun maʶwdˤwʕaʶaʶuʶn χurid͡ʒti kaj ʔaatanazːaha waqad ʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli hðaː aːlqaːmws ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mn ðaːk wd͡ʒdt lh ʕmlaː jatanaqːalu kaθijranaː fij daaːrihi min makaaːn ʔilaaː makaaːn wajunʃidu qawla ʔaabij aːlʕataaːhijaai waman lam jatanaaːha tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶhuʶ aːstadaaːma kadːuhu wataʕabuhu waʶsˤuʶhaʶjbuʶn kaaːna ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶwʕaʶ lilːahi subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː min ʔaan jakuwna bihaðihi aːlmanzilaai aːlːaðjna hum ʕan sˤaʶlˤaʶːtiʶhiʶm saːhwna lqd ħsːn aːld͡ʒhaːz kaːn saːmj jħbː ʔaflaːm aːlʔakʃn lqd kaːd ʔan jfqd saːmj ħjaːth mn jtʔalm ʔakθr sjʕrf ʔakθr ʔaʶsˤʕd saːmj naːfðth lw tzwːd͡ʒt bʔamːhaː lmaː dχlt mstʃfaː lˤlˤʔaʶmrˤaʶːdˤ aːlʕqljːa faliʔaanːa aːlmuħtaaːd͡ʒa ʔilaaː aːlnːaaːsi kulːu muʶhtaʶdˤaʶmiʶn waðalijlin mustaθqalin aːldnjaː sd͡ʒn aːlmʔumn wd͡ʒna aːlkaːfr wamaː ʔaadraːka maː sid͡ʒːjnun fabiħasabi maaː hum ʕalajhi takuwnu ʔaamθaaːluhum ʔilːaaː qurʔaːnun mad͡ʒjdun ʔiinːamaː ʔaamwaːlukum waʔaawlaːdukum fitnaaun waaːllːahu ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaʶðˤjmuʶn waʶsˤuʶnʕaʶ tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶhiʶ qaaːluwaː kulːunaaː jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aːlθːawbu kafarahu stuʁlq aːlʕjaːda aːdχli ʕzjztj maʕa wuʶdˤuʶwħiʶ qubħihaaː fij aːlʕaqli aːlmaqhuwri bihaaː aːstmr aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ baʶːlˤhtˤwlˤ lmda ʔarbʕa ʔajaːm sajuhzamu aːld͡ʒamʕu wajuwalːwna aːldːubura aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ mufsidijna waʶðˤuʶlˤiʶmaʶ faʁafara nʃʔanaː fj mnzl waːħd kaːn saːmj mhrːd͡ʒ aːlqsm kaːn saːmj qbjħaː d͡ʒdːaː maːðaː tqsˤd tˤʕmh fðˤjʕ waaːlkiraaːmu ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶrˤuʶ nufuwsanaː faqaaːla min aːlwaaːd͡ʒibaaːti aʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤuʶ waaːlʃːarahu wasuwʔu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːiʶ wamanʕu aːlħuquwqi qalijla aːlħijlaai ʔaħbt ʃaːbaː ʔaʶsˤʁrˤ mnhaː snaː saːʕdnaː bʕdˤnaʶː waqasːama muʕaaːwijaau rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ wabiaːlʔaːχiraai hum juwqinuwna baʃjranaː wanaðjranaː faʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ ʔaakθaruhum fahum laː jasmaʕwna ʔin aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤjaʶ aːlχʃbja d͡ʒmjla ʔaan juħsina ʔilajnaaː aːltːawfijqa fijmaaː manaħa tzdaːd maʶrˤaʶdˤuʶn ʔaan lan juχrid͡ʒa aːllːahu ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶːnaʶhuʶm walaw ʕazaba ʕanhu aːlħilmu ħatːaaː aːnqaaːda lˤiʶʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶhiʶ dˤaʶlˤːaʶ ʕanhu wad͡ʒhu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ fijhi ʔaʕml mʕh aːlqdwa aːlħsna χjr mn aʶːlˤwsˤjaʶ fawaːkihu wahum mukramwna wakaðːaba biaːlħusnaː faħalafa ʔaan jaʶdˤrˤiʶbaʶ bihaaː raʔasa muʕaaːwijaaa waliʔaanːa aʶːlˤʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ waaːlmanʕa ʔiðaaː kaaːnaaː liʁajri ʕilːaain ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶjaʶaʶː ʔilaaː ðamːi aːlmamnuwʕi ʔanaː laː ʔantqdk kaːn saːmj msjħjːaː qbl ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm kaːn saːmj jtklːm mʕ ljlaː laaː tazuwlu qadamaaː aːbni ʔaːdama ħatːaaː jusʔaala ʕan θalaaːθin kaðːabat qawmu lˤwtˤiʶn aːlmursaljna lqd wdˤʕt hðaː aːlmwqʕ fj mfdˤlˤaʶːtj kaðːabat qablahum qawmu nwħin waʕaːdun wafirʕawnu ðuw aːlʔaawtaːdi laː jʕrf ʔaħd aːsmh hðihi aːlnːaːru aːlːatj kuntum bihaː tukaðːibwna waʶrˤaʶaʶːbaʶtˤuʶwaʶː fijhi taʔawijlaaːni jʕml saːmj fj ʕjaːda mħlːjːa lm jsmʕ ʔaħd ʕn saːmj mnð aːld͡ʒmʕa sˤbaʶːħaʶː χaʶːfiʶdˤaʶaʶuʶn raːfiʕaaun waʶtaʶsˤaʶwːuʶrˤuʶhuʶ ħatːaaː laaː jaʕzuba ʕanhu ʔaʶtˤwlˤ mn ljl aːlʃtaːʔ kaːn hnaːk mdrːswn baːlqrb ʃrb saːmj sta kʔuws mn aːlχmr kaːn aːlmdrːs jtklːm sʔal saːmj ljlaː ʔin kaːn bʔimkaːnh aːstʕaːra aːlmzjd lm ʔant mtwtːr lhðh aːldːrd͡ʒa waχalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqːi walitud͡ʒzaː kulːu nafsin bimaː kasabat wahum laː juʶðˤlˤaʶmwnaʶ aʶːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʕjaːda ʔiʕaːda tʔahjl waʔaanʃada aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjːuʶ ʔaħbː saːmj hðaː aːlmkaːn ʔatt ljlaː w aʶːsˤtˤħbtnj walaqad dˤaʶrˤaʶbnaʶː lilnːaːsi fj hðaaː aːlqurʔaːni min kulːi maθalin laʕalːahum jataðakːarwna wafij aːltːawraaːai liʔaanːa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶdˤrˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ bihaaː ʔaaʕamːu kaːnt ljlaː ftaːa mʃhwra fj aːlθːaːnwjːa maː aːlðj ħmlhaː ʕlaː fʕl ʃjʔ khðaː walajsa ʕaʶtˤaʶbuʶn ʔilːaaː wahija lahu sababun waʕalajhi ʔaalabːu laː tns ʔan tfkːr qbl bdʔa aːlħdjθ mn ðaːk aːlrd͡ʒl saːmj mslm mnð stː snwaːt fadaʕ maaː jarijbuk ʔilaaː maaː laaː jarijbuk walajsa fijmaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶaʶː ʔilaaː waaːħidin minhumaaː χajrun jurd͡ʒaaː wahuwa d͡ʒadijrun ʔaan jakuwna ʃarːanaː jutːaqaaː maːhj χtˤtˤk ljwm aːlʔaħd ʔinːa aːlbalaaːʔa muwakːalun biʶaʶːlˤmaʶntˤiʶqiʶ twqf ʕn mħaːwla ʔibhaːd͡ʒj lqd aːknʃf aːlʔad͡ʒwba bnfsh waaːlħalijmu ʔilːaaː fij aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ walaaː tamjijzun limustaħiqːin ʔiðaː ʕurifa aːlsbb btˤlˤ aːlʕd͡ʒb hw lm jkn mdrːsj laaː ʔaaraaːk aːllːahu makruwhanaː tnaːwlt tˤʕaʶːm aʶːlˤftˤwrˤ aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa w aʶːlˤnsˤf ʕaaːbidin lim ʔaʕlam kam saʶjaʶtˤwlˤuʶ aːlʔid͡ʒtimaːʕ hl ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr waʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aːlħilmu mudabːiranaː lilʔaumuwri aʶːlˤmuʶʁdˤiʶbaʶaʶiʶ biqadrin laaː jaʕtarijhi naʶqsˤuʶn biʕadami aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ ʔaʕd͡ʒbt tlk aʶːlˤqsˤːaʶ saːmj ʔinh mwd͡ʒwd fj aːlbjt aːlʔaːn jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔaadʕu lij biaːlmaʁfiraai faʔaaðina lahu aːlʕaaːlimu waaːd͡ʒtinaaːʔi aːlʔaawzaaːri fij muχaaːlafatihi sʔaqaːtl ħtaː aːlnfs aːlʔaχjr θumːa ʕafawnaaː ʕankum min baʕdi ðaaːlika laʕalːakum taʃkuruwna rʔaaː saːmj ljlaː fj aːlʕjaːda biʔaanːa rabːaka ʔaawħaː lahaː tuqalːabu fij aʶːlˤħaʶdˤaʶrˤiʶ min ʁajri qilːaain walaaː safarin waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤiʶrˤ fasawfa juʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ kaːnt d͡ʒθːa saːmj aːlhaːmda ttˤfw fj aːlmsbħ aʶːlˤχaʶtˤaʶʔaʶuʶ fij ʔiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ maaː laaː janbaʁij wamanʕu d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaːkj hw klbj kaːn saːmj jħbː ʔan jtbaːhaː faaːltamasahaaː aːlnːaaːsu fawad͡ʒaduwhaaː faqaaːluwaː lahu qad radːa aːllːahu raaːħilatak faʶsˤaʶlˤːiʶ waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħamːadin ʔiin naːdaː saːmj klː aːlqsm bʕbaːra "ʔaʁbjaːʔ" kaːn saːmj tˤbjbaʶː jtqaʶːdˤaʶː raːtbaː mʕtbraː w jtmtːʕ bsmʕa d͡ʒjːda wamaː jastawij aːlʔaaʕmaː waʶaʶːlˤbaʶsˤjrˤuʶ ʔið lajsa jaraaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ aːllːahi ʔan jtqdːm fj ħjaːth fabalaʁa ðalika muʕaaːwijaaa faqaaːla faʔaamːaaː aːlfitnaau fij aːlʔaaʁlabi faʶtuʶħiʶjtˤuʶ biʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhaʶaʶː laː jmknnj ʔan ʔansaː aːljwm aːlðj qaːblth fjh aːlrːaħmaau aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn χrbʃwaː fj kraːsj θm qjl lhm ʔajn maː kntm tʃrkwn ʔaalːaaː tatːabiʕani ʔaʶaʶfaʶʕaʶsˤaʶjtaʶ ʔaamrij waaːðkur ʕibaaːdanaaː ʔiibraaːhijma waʔiisħaaːqa wajaʕquwba ʔauwlij aːlʔaajdij aʶːʕtˤnj frˤsˤaʶ ʔajn aːlqiʃda mtaː bdʔata draːsa aːllʁa aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja θumːa ʔaadbara jasʕaaː waliðalika qijla aːlʕulamaaːʔu ʁurabaaːʔu likaθraai aːld͡ʒuhːaaːli hl ʔant daːʔimaː fj aːlmnzl fj ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʕaːlm mn aːlʕlb ʔaqlʕ ʕn aːltdχjn aːlʕaːm aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj tlk msʔuwljtk maaː jaʶlˤfiʶðˤuʶ min qawlin ʔiilːaaː ladajhi raqijbun ʕatijdun walaː tamnun tastakθiru laqad sˤaʶrˤaʶχaʶt fij ʕuruwqinaaː aːldiːmaaː namuwtu namuwtu wajaħjaaː aʶːlˤwaʶtˤaʶn hðaː ktaːb sˤʁjrˤ faramazuwaː biʶʔaʶaʶwsˤaʶaʶːfiʶhiʶ ʔin qmt bχtˤʔiʶ ʔaːχr fstfʃl qaːlt lj aːlkθjr ʕnk hðaː baʶːlˤdˤbtˤ maː knt ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔiljh rataʕnaaː fij aːldːunjaaː d͡ʒaaːhilijna lijakuwnuwaː ʔaaqwaaː manaʕaaan wajadanaː lnltqj mra ʔaχraː qrjbaːan maaː ʔaaʕd͡ʒabu aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi faqaaːla lm aːtwqʕ ʔalbs fstaːnaːan zhrj nħn fj tˤrˤjqnaʶː ʔilaː aːlmnzl walaaː ʔilaaː aːlmubaaːjanaai waaːlmuʃaaːqːaai tˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ljs ʕndj ʔilaː ʕʃra ktb fljdʕ naːdjh ʔinaː d͡ʒʕlnaːh qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː lʕlkm tʕqlwn klnaː nrʁb baːlnd͡ʒaːħ kf ʕn aːltħdjq kjf aʶːsttˤʕt fʕl hðaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔasaːfr aːntʃr aːlχbr bsrʕa waʕamːaaː siwaaːhu ʁaaːfilun twqʕt ʔank stnbhr ldaː mnːaːd mwqf baːlqrb mn mnzlh lndχl ʔilaː aːlmnzl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aːlr tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi waqurʔaːnin mubijnin aːlʔasʕaːr mrtfʕa hl ʔant bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlmaːl ʔiilːaaː tˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ d͡ʒahanːama χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ʔaabadanaː wakaaːna ðalika ʕalaaː aːllːahi jasijranaː waːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː wlqaːʔ aːlʔaːχra ħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm hl jd͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn kðbt ʕaːd aːlmrsljn ʔiinːaaː sanulqij ʕalajka qawlaː θaqijlaː dʕ ʕnk hðaː ʔiʶjtˤaʶːlˤjaʶː bld d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː lʕlː aːld͡ʒwː d͡ʒmjl ʔarjd ʔan ʔaraː mntd͡ʒaːtkm θumːa kalːaaː sajaʕlamuwna kjfa tʕlmjn hðaː ʔinh jʃʕrnj baːlʁθjaːn wlqd ʔarslnaː nwħaː wʔibraːhjm wd͡ʒʕlnaː fj ðrjthmaː aːlnbwa waːlktaːb fmnhm mhtd wkθjr mnhm faːsqwn wld ʔiʶjtˤaʶːlˤjaʶː rabːanaaː waʔaːtinaaː maaː waʕadtanaaː ʕalaaː rusulika walaaː tuχzinaaː jawma aːlqijaaːmaai ʔiinːaka laaː tuχlifu ktbt ʕʃrjn d͡ʒmla aːljwm kjf twm ʔalm nχlqkm mn maːʔ mhjn juʶsˤhaʶrˤuʶ bihi maaː fij buʶtˤuʶwniʶhiʶm waaːld͡ʒuluwdu w hðaː maː maːðaː tʕlːmtm kuluwaː watamatːaʕuwaː qalijlanaː ʔiinːakum mud͡ʒrimuwna ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː tˤbjb ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanh sjstqjl mn mnsˤbh ldaː twm sˤdjq jʕjʃ fj bwstˤn min aːlʕilmi ʔaan laaː taħtaqira ʃajʔianaː min aːlʕilmi liʔaanːahu jaʃʁaluhum ʕan aːlʕilmi waʶjaʶqtˤaʶʕuʶhuʶm ʕan aːltːawafːuri ʕalajhi stnfʕk rħla ʔilaː aːlχaːrd͡ʒ wamahːadtːu lahu tamhijdanaː hw laː jʕlm ʔaχbrhaː maː ʔaχbrtka bh hw ʕrˤdˤnaʶː sˤwrˤaʶaʶn ʔamh θumːa latusʔaalunːa jawmaʔiiðin ʕani aːlnːaʕijmi wʔaqm aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ lðkrj faʶnaʶðˤaʶrˤaʶ naʶðˤrˤaʶaʶaʶn fij aːlnːud͡ʒuwmi jʔaml d͡ʒwn ʔan jstql ʕn waːldjh mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔalaː tqwm bʔaj ʃjʔ aːljwm tuʕd͡ʒbnj rˤbtˤaʶuʶ ʕnqka hðhi laː qdr aːllh wad͡ʒaʕaluwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa aːlːaðijna hum ʕibaaːdu aːlrːaħmani ʔiinaaːθanaː ʔaaʃahiduwaː χalqahum satuktabu ʃahaaːdatuhum wajusʔaaluwna mtaː jħjn dwrj wnqlb ʔafʔidthm wʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤhm kmaː lm kaʶaʶːlˤsˤːuʶwrˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlmumaθːalaai jaruwquk ħusnuhaaː ʔaajːumaaː ʔaaħabːu ʔilajk ʔaaχuwk ʔaaw sˤaʶdiʶjquʶk qaaːla dħwraː wlhm ʕðaːb waʶːsˤb bdt wħjda wmaː tʃaːʔwn ʔilaː ʔan jʃaːʔ aːllh ʔin aːllh ʔin knt mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn waʶjaʶʕaʶdˤːaʶ ʕalajhi naaːd͡ʒiðahu ʔaχd͡ʒl mn mnaːdaːtk baːbnj "aːlʃʕwr mtbaːdl" "maːðaː ʔiðn aːχrd͡ʒ mn bjtj" ʔin aʶːsttˤʕt tʕaːl mʕnaː hnaːk st d͡ʒml baːllʁa aːlmnʁwlja ʕlaː mwqʕ ttwjbaː ħtaː aːlʔaːn waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu aːldːunjaaː qaʶntˤaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn faaːʕburuwhaaː walaaː taʕmuruwhaaː aːlnːaaːsu kulːuhum ʕijaaːlu aːllːahi taħta dʕnaː nnqsm fʔiðaː nfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ flaː ʔansaːb bjnhm jwmʔið wlaː jtsaːʔlwn hl trjdjn mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔink ʕdaːʔij ʔaaw nurijanːaka aːlːaðij waʕadnaaːhum faʔiinːaaː ʕalajhim muqtadiruwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃafijʕu aːlmuðnibi ʔiqraaːruhu watawbatuhu aːʕtiðaaːruhu ʔanti mnfʕla jaː wajlataː lajtanj lam ʔaatːaχið fulaːnanaː χaljlanaː w ʔaχjraːan wsˤlˤnaʶː ʔilaː aːlqrja waʔiinːahu liħubːi aːlχajri laʃadjdun faʶaʶːsˤfaʶħ ʕanhum waqul salaːmun fasawfa jaʕlamwna faʶdˤlˤuʶ aːlʕilmi χajrun min faʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʕibaaːdaai bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlfad͡ʒri waʔiin kaaːna kulːun minhu kaθijranaː ʕaːda maː jsˤlˤːj saːmj sˤlˤaʶːaʶ aːlʕʃaːʔ qbjl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːlnːwm ʔafrʁ d͡ʒjbk laː ʔaħd jnsaː bldj km ʕmrh ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlrːsm qaːlwaː subħaːnaka ʔaanta walijːunaː min dwnihim bal kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna aːld͡ʒinːa ʔaakθaruhum bihim muʔuminwna faqaaːla jaaː rabːi law kaaːna lak ħimaaːrun laʕalafth maʕa ħimaaːrij wafiʕlu qalijli aːlχajri ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ min tarkihi aːlbrtqaːl jħtwj ʕlaː fjtaːmjn sj lqd ʔatʕbtnj hðh aːlrħla rʁm qsˤrˤ mdthaː ʔinːa haðaaː aːlħaqːa θaqijlun marijːun aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ ʕnd aʶːlˤsˤdmaʶ aːlʔawlaː ʔaðl aːlbχl ʔaʕnaːq aːlrd͡ʒaːl walaaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː jaquwluwna warutbaaan turtaqaaː faman kamulat fijhi fahuwa ʕanqaaːʔu muʁribin saːmj laː jħml msdːsh mʕh ldjhaː aːbn jħbh aːld͡ʒmjʕ laaː juʕrafu aːld͡ʒawaaːdu ʔilːaaː fij aːlʕusraai ʔinːhaː aːntkaːsa mrjra fij ʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶk liʔaanːa aːlmazħa hazlun lqd qaːblnaː mdrːsnaː aːntʃr χbr ðlk hd͡ʒwm wabiʔiirʁaaːbihi ʔin danaaː ðj quwːaain ʕinda ðij aːlʕarʃi makjnin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maʃuwraau aːlmuʃfiqi aːlħaaːzimi ðˤaʶfaʶrˤuʶn wamaʃuwraau ʁajri aːlħaaːzimi χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn ʔiinːaː ʔaarsalnaː ʕalajhim ħaʶːsˤiʶbaʶnaʶː ʔiilːaː ʔaːla lˤwtˤiʶn nad͡ʒːajnaːhum bisaħarin ʔaʶðˤn ʔan ʔaʕjaːd aːlmjlaːd mhma hl bʔimkaːnk aːltːklːm baːlbrtʁaːljːa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tamnaʕuwaː aːlʕilma ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinːa aːlʕilma ʔaamnaʕu lid͡ʒaaːnibihi wamanaʕa ħusna ħaaːlihi waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj smaːʕ tlk aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwaʶːt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlˤfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ quwːaau aːlminani min dˤaʶʕfiʶ aːlmunani ʕaːda maː jðkr mqwlaːt lʃjksbjr aːlmutaʕamːiqu fij aːlʕilmi kaaːlsːaaːbiħi fij aːlbaħri lajsa jaraaː ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː χajru aːlrːizqi maaː jakfij waχajru aːlðːikri aːlχafijːu walaaː ʔaan juʶʕaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤaʶhuʶ fij ʔaamrihi fajuradːu maħruwmanaː masluwbanaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃarːu aːlmaaːli maaː lazimak ʔiθmu maksabihi waħurimta ʔaad͡ʒra ʔinfaaːqihi aːlħaaːsidu muʶʁtaʶaʶːðˤuʶn ʕalaaː man laaː ðanba lahu hl jumknnj aːlbaːl jhdm aːld͡ʒbaːl waʃaaːwirhum fij aːlʔaamri laaː tukθir mina aʶːlˤdˤːaʶħiʶkiʶ kulːu ʃajʔin jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli hl hðh sˤwrˤk wataaːbiʕanaː maħquwranaː wamaː huwa biqawli ʃaːʕirin ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlqsm ʔiinːahu laqurʔaːnun karjmun ʔiʶsχaʶaʶːtˤuʶ aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː fij muʶʕaʶaʶːrˤaʶdˤaʶtiʶhiʶ baːlnsba lj fʔin klb saːmj jbdw bχjr ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa nzjha mn ktb hðh aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ salaaːmaain ʔaqnʕth ʔanh kaːn mχtˤʔiʶaʶː faʔaabdaaː sˤaʶfħaʶaʶaʶ ʕuquwqihi jqjs ħraːrth ʔaħbbnj aːlmdrːs tʕrf ʔanː d͡ʒwn kaːn jħbhaː lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔajː sˤdjq jmlk sjːaːra ʔaːnðaːk waʔaamːaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhili muʶtˤlˤaʶquʶn kulːamaaː ʃaaːʔa ʔaʶaʶtˤlˤaʶqaʶ biʔisamaaː aːʃtarawaː bihi ʔaanfusahum ʔaan jakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaanzala aːllːahu baʁjanaː kaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jʕlm ʔanː saːmj kaːn fj aːlʕjaːda waʔiinːamaaː jaʶχtaʶsˤːuʶ biħasadi min ʕalaaː ʔaħbk ʔaktb rsaːla bali aːlsːaːʕaau mawʕiduhum waaːlsːaːʕaau ʔaadhaː waʔaamarːu ħasaraaːtu aːlħasadi wasaqaaːmu aːld͡ʒasadi θumːa aʶːnsˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ masruwranaː liʔaanːahaaː χiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶn murakːabaaun min aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ falaaː jaħmilanːaka ðalika ʕalaaː aːlrːaʁbaai fij aːld͡ʒahli qdːm saːmj qrˤsˤaʶː lljlaː lijakuwna lahu maʕa tablijʁi aːlrːisaaːlaai ðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ aʶːlˤiʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːsˤiʶ bihi wamanzilaau aʶːlˤtːaʶfwiʶjdˤiʶ ʔilajhi laː ʔaʶðˤn ʔan twm bmzaːd͡ʒ aːlʕml ħaːljaː jbjn aʶːlˤwdˤʕ fj ʔafʁaːnstaːn ʔahdaːf ʔamrjkaː wħaːd͡ʒtnaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːlmʃtrk fawarabːi aːlsːamaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiinːahu laħaqːun miθla maː ʔaanːakum taʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ ʔaqbħ mn χnzjr ʔalħː saːmj ʕlaː aːlʔamr wahuwa min nafsihi fij ʕanaaːʔin ʔijːaaːkum wataħkijma aːlʃːahawaaːti ʕalaaː ʔaanfusikum faʔiinːa ʕaaːd͡ʒilahaaː ðamijmun ʔarsl ħkjmaː wlaː twsˤh lmaːðaː tχlːaː saːmj ʕnːj ʔarfʕ mn aːlsmaːʔ waðalika faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn hw fj aːlχdma ʔaʶfdˤːlˤ ʔan ʔamwt bdlaː mn ʔan ʔaʶmdˤj ħjaːtj klːhaː mʕk ʕalaaː qadri aːlmaʁaaːrisi jakuwnu aːd͡ʒtinaaːʔu aːlʁaaːrisi hj mdrːstnaː fj aːlʕrbjːa ʔaatard͡ʒuw ʔaan tasuwda bilaaː ʕanaaːʔin wakajfa jasuwdu ðuw aːldːaʕaai aːlbaχijlu waaːlsːababu aːlsːaaːdisu laː ʃjʔ mn hðaː ħdθ ðawaːtaː ʔaafnaːnin lmaːðaː laː jdʕwnh "saːmj" bklː bsaʶːtˤaʶ wamaaː laaː sababa lahu had͡ʒrun wahaðaaː farqu maaː bajna aʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤiʶ waaːlʃːarahi waʔiiðaaː aːnqalabwaː ʔiilaː ʔaahlihimu aːnqalabwaː fakihjna hnaːk ʔiħtmaːl ʔan tndlʕ aːlħrb kaːld͡ʒraːd: laː jbqaː wlaː jðr klː aːlmdrːsjn kaːnwaː hnaː waliðalika warada aːlʃːarʕu biaːlnːahji ʕan aʶːlˤwiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ bajna sˤaʶwmiʶ aːljawmajni ʕaːda mn aːlʕjaːda hnaːk χmswn mqaʶːtˤʕaʶ fj aːlʔitħaːd aːlfdraːlj faaːlʔaawlaaː biaːlʔiinsaaːni taqdijru ħaaːlajhi kaːn aːlmdrːs jsχr mn d͡ʒsmj fʕljːaː wasukuwtanaː min nufuwrihi qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru maː hw mktwb fj aːlrːsaːla waʔiinːaka latulaqːaaː aːlqurʔaːna min ladun ħakjmin ʕaljmin ʔiilhi aːlnːaːsi sʔal saːmj ljlaː ʕn sbb tχlːjhaː ʕnh sjrzqwn btˤflˤ w ʕljkm aːlslaːm jmknk aːlʕwda ʔilaː aːlbjt lw ʔardt kaħimaaːri aːlsːuwʔi ʔin ʔaaʃbaʕtahu ramaħa aːlnːaaːsa waʔiin d͡ʒaaːʕa nahaq waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu aːltːabasːumu duʕaaːbaaun kaːn saːmj mdrːs rˤqsˤ ʔarjd ʔan ʔastʕjd θqa maːrj bj ʔaʕrf tlk aʶːlˤsˤbjaʶ kaːnt ħjaːa saːmj mʕrˤːdˤaʶ sˤnaʶːʕj kun lihawaaːk musawːifanaː tanaaːfasuwaː fij aːlʕamali aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶ kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt mʕaː fj ʁrfthaː ʔatsaːʔl ʕmːaː ħdθ lh w ld͡ʒmaːl qaːla rabːukum warabːu ʔaːbaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawːaljna bdʔa dwaːʔ saːmj jʔuθːr fjh ħðˤaʶːaʶn mwfːqaːan ʔanaː mrˤtbtˤ baːlʕml kmaː jsbb aːstmraːr hðaː aːlnzaːʕ tkaːljf baʶːhðˤaʶ wmsˤaʶːʕb sjaːsja d͡ʒma fahija aːlmaaːdːaau aːlkaaːfijaau waqaaːla χaaːlidu bnu sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ liʔiijaaːsi bni muʕaaːwijaaa ʔajn aːlmʃkla ðalika χajrun fijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaafaraʔaajta aːlːaðj tawalːaː aːnhaː ljst ʁlˤtˤtj ʔinːa fij aʶːlˤmaʶʕaʶaʶːrˤiʶjdˤiʶ lamanduwħaaan ʕan aːlkaðibi ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaʶːqaʶ mʕ zmjlh fj aːlʁrfa ʔaaʔiinːakum lataʔatwna aːlrːid͡ʒaːla ʃahwaaan min dwni aːlnːisaːʔi bal ʔaantum qawmun tad͡ʒhalwna ʔad͡ʒrt ljlaː aʶːtːsˤaʶːlˤaʶː tˤaʶːlˤbaʶ sjːaːra ʔisʕaːf waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlχajru fij tarki aʶːlˤtˤːiʶjaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔanaː fj aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ aːbniki lnlʕb aːlwrq lm jkn saːmj d͡ʒzʔaː mn ħjaːtj ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmrkz aʶːlˤsˤːħːj kaaːna ħatfuhu fij ʔaaʁlabi χiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ aːlχajri ʕalajhi rawaaː ʃarijku bnu ʔaabij namirin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːliaːstiʃaaːraau ʕajnu aːlhidaaːjaai waqad χaʶaʶːtˤaʶrˤaʶ man aːstaʁnaaː biraʔajihi saːmj jmʃj ʔintħrt aːlfaʔaru jaχaaːfu mina aːlhirːi jbaːlʁ twm daːʔimaː maaː aːlħaːqːaau d͡ʒaaːda lakum hiʃaaːmun biaːldːunjaaː wad͡ʒudtum ʕalajhi biaːlbukaaːʔi liʔaanːahu jaʔatij aːlrːad͡ʒula aːlmutamakːina ʕinda aːlʔaamijri falaaː jazaaːlu jaqaʕu fijhi ħatːaaː jaqlaʕahu rmaː saːmj aʶːlˤʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ fj aːlqmaːma lmaːðaː ʔanaː aʶːlˤtˤːaʶlˤaʶbiʶ kaːn saːmj mʕrˤːdˤaʶː lħkm baːlsːd͡ʒn mdaː aːlħjaːa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʁanijːu liʔaanːa aːlmusrifa juʶχtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fij aːlzːijaaːdaai saːmj muʕħb bhðaː aːlmkaːn ʔaʶtˤlˤq aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤj rˤsˤaʶːsˤaʶ tħðjrja twm sjsˤbħ mʕlm d͡ʒjd km jwmaːan tħtaːd͡ʒ ʕaːdaan lˤlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː hnaːk faʶsˤaʶbːaʶ ʕalajhim rabːuka saʶwtˤaʶ ʕaðaːbin liʔaanːahu jastaqilːu fij aːlnːaqlaai juʔuaχːira aːllːahu nafsanaː ʔiiðaː d͡ʒaːʔa ʔaad͡ʒaluhaː waaːllːahu χabjrun bimaː taʕmalwna fj sˤuʶħuʶfiʶn mukarːamaain laː jʕlm saːmj mn tˤʕnh ʕalajhim naːrun muʶʔuʶsˤaʶdaʶaʶuʶn hw jdrs aːlħqwq fj haːrfrd ʔanaː mdrːs lltːrd͡ʒma aːld͡ʒhl mwt aːlʔaħjaːʔ walakinːaaː naʶtˤlˤuʶbuʶhuʶ lˤiʶnaʶnquʶsˤaʶ fij kulːi jawmin min aːld͡ʒahli wanazdaaːda fij kulːi jawmin min aːlʕilmi waʶjaʶħfaʶðˤaʶk ʕinda aːlmaʁijbi wafaqada min ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶ aːlmuruwʔaai sinaaːdahaaː ʔaawalajsa aːlːaðj χalaqa aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biqaːdirin ʕalaː ʔaan jaχluqa miθlahum balaː wahuwa aːlχalːaːqu aːlʕaljmu saːmj ljs md͡ʒrːd tˤbjb fqtˤ bl hw d͡ʒrːaːħ waʔaaħraaːhum biʶaʶːlˤðˤːaʶfaʶrˤiʶ fij mud͡ʒaaːhadatihi qaaːla faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶt kaʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶrˤjmiʶ man ʕaaːʃara aːlnːaaːsa biʕubuwsi wad͡ʒhihi fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː maaː ʔaasadaaːhu d͡ʒuwdanaː fij ʃakuwrin laː ʔaħd sjtzwːd͡ʒ mn faʶːdˤlˤ ʔaʶħdˤrˤ ʔawlaːdk mʕk wamaː naħnu bimuʕaðːabjna mtaː bunj hðaː aːlmʕbd kaðːabat qablahum qawmu nwħin fakaðːabwaː ʕabdanaː waqaːlwaː mad͡ʒnwnun waaːzdud͡ʒira twqːft aːbna saːmj ʕn aːrtdaːʔ aːlħd͡ʒaːb ʔaaw ħikmaain tanʃuruhaaː naʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶn kaːðibaain χaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶaʶaʶiʶn tˤlˤjnaʶː aːlmnzl baːllwn aʶːlˤʔaʶχdˤrˤ mbaːrk liʔaanːa suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ aːlhawaaː qawijːun waχuð bijadika dˤiʶʁθaʶnaʶː faʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb bihi walaː taħnaθ ʔiinːaː wad͡ʒadnaːhu sˤaʶːbiʶrˤaʶnaʶː niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinːahu ʔaawːaːbun aːlmslmwn laː jʔaklwn aːlχnzjr lʔanːh lħm fjh χtˤrˤ snltqj bhm aːlljla ʔanaː ʃkwr kθjraː lkwnj mslmaː aːljwm qaːla rabːi ʔiinːj ðˤaʶlˤaʶmtuʶ nafsj faaːʁfir lj faʁafara lahu ʔiinːahu huwa aːlʁafwru aːlrːaħjmu hl jsˤdq ʔaħd twm fʕlaː wakilaaːhumaaː maðmuwmun wahuwa fijhimaaː maluwmun ʕan ʕaaːʔiiʃaaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhaaː qaaːlat maʕa ʔaanːa aʶːlˤħaʶrˤiʶjsˤaʶ laaː jastazijdu biʶħiʶrˤsˤiʶhiʶ zijaaːdaaan ʕalaaː rizqihi siwaaː ʔiðlaaːli nafsihi waqaaːdathu ʔilajhi aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau hl hnaːk ħjaːa ʕlaː kwkb aːlmrjχ aːlklb sˤdjq aːlʔinsaːn aːlwfj waqaaːla aːbnu masʕuwdin ʔaunðirukum fuʶdˤuʶwlˤaʶ aʶːlˤmaʶntˤiʶqiʶ walahaaː aːlnːaaːsa ʕan maħaaːsini faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ bimusaaːwij ʔaadabihi jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kulːa jawmin huwa fj ʃaʔanin kamaaː qaaːla ʔaakθamu bnu sˤaʶjfiʶjːiʶn hl knt fj aːlmdrsa ħjnhaː sʔaltnj ʕn ʕmrj ʔaʁdr mn ðʔib tsˤaʶːlˤħaʶː saːmj w ljlaː fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb btzaːmnh mʕ ftra ʕjd aːlmjlaːd ʔið lam jakun lahum daaːʕin ʔilajhi waqad qaaːla bazard͡ʒamharu fajawmaʔiiðin laː jusʔaalu ʕan ðanbihi ʔiinsun walaː d͡ʒaːnːun fatuðʕinu liruʃdihaaː waʔaaðinat lirabːihaː waħuqːat aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶ kaθijrun waʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʕawdanaː wabadʔanaː ħtaː wʔin ʔardnaː aːlqjaːm bðlk fljs ldjnaː wqt jlʕb aːlʔawlaːd baːllʕb hl ðhb faʶːdˤlˤ ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː man ʕamila fij aːlsːirːi ʕamalanaː jastaħij minhu fij aːlʕalaaːnijaai falajsa linafsihi ʕindahu qadrun walajsa man ʔaamkanahu ʃajʔun min ðaaːtihi kaman aːstawd͡ʒabahu biʔaːlatihi waʔaadawaaːtihi ʔanaː laː ʔanwj mqaːblth tʕrːf faʶːdˤlˤ ʕlaː ljlaː baːlkaːd faliðalika ʔaaʕwaza aːstijfaaːʔu ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶhaʶaʶː ʔilaaː d͡ʒumalin jatanabːahu aʶːlˤfaʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤuʶ ʕalajhaaː biʶjaʶqiʶðˤaʶtiʶhiʶ ʕaːd saːmj ʔilaː ʕaːdaːth aːlqdjma jaaː bunajːa ʔiðaaː aːustuʃhidta faaːʃhad swf ʔad͡ʒʕlh jsmʕ lqd d͡ʒmʕ bjnhmaː ʔiʕd͡ʒaːb mtbaːdl fkːr d͡ʒjːdaː bmaː stfʕl linad͡ʒʕalahaː lakum taðkiraaan wataʕijahaː ʔauðunun waːʕijaaun kmn jrbj aːlðʔib tanazːalu ʕalaː kulːi ʔaafːaːkin ʔaaθjmin kaːn jtsˤrˤːf bʁraːba aːlnd͡ʒda waqad qaaːla muʕaaːwijaau rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu wabalaaːdaau aːlmad͡ʒbuwri hl aːlħqjba aːlswdaːʔ lk rʔas aːlħkma mχaːfa aːllh wajubaaːdira bihi χijfaau ʕad͡ʒzihi waʕalaaː aʶːlˤχuʶlˤaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ tanakːuranaː ʔinːamaaː bihim jahaaːbunaaː ʔaaʕdaaːʔuunaaː waʕanaaːʔin χajrin min daʕaain dˤaʶniʶjnaʶnaʶː biaːlʔaasraaːri ʕan d͡ʒamijʕi aːlχalqi dwrk jaː saːmj ʔaaχuwka lan jaʶtaʶʕaʶrˤːaʶdˤaʶ lilbardi maaː haðaaː faqijla lahaaː aʶːlˤtˤflˤ, aːlðj wsˤlˤ aːlbaːrħa, kaːn aːχj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ ʔiinːa rabːahum bihim jawmaʔiiðin laχabjrun aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ sitrun min aːlkuruwbi waʕawnun ʕalaaː aʶːlˤχuʶtˤuʶwbiʶ laː jnksr aːlblaːstjk bshwla aːlbjt mn θlaːθ tˤwaʶːbq aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ kj ttːsˤlˤ bh limiθli hðaː faljaʕmali aːlʕaːmilwna ʔafsd aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ nzhtnaː ln ʔaʕwd wafij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔaːjaːtun lilmwqinjna ʔaam lakum kitaːbun fjhi tadruswna waʶħaʶfiʶðˤaʶ tahðijbahaaː hw tˤwjlˤ d͡ʒdːaː liʔaanːahaaː tudaaːwij kulːa d͡ʒurħin maː sbb klː hðh aʶːlˤdˤːd͡ʒːaʶ faʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤʃːaʶrˤtˤuʶ aːlʔaawːalu maː aːlðj ħdθ hnaː rʔat ljlaː bndqjːa daːχl sjːaːra saːmj faʶʔaʶaʶʕðˤiʶm bihaaː minħaaan ʔaan jaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ ʕaduwːuk lak raaːħimanaː hj bħaːd͡ʒa lˤtˤbjb ttklm w kʔank rʔijsnaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jstʕjd ħjaːth mʕ mn knt ttklm hdfj fj aːlħjaːa hw ʔan ʔaʶsˤbħ kaːtbaːan rwaːʔijaːan waʶʔaʶaʶwsˤaʶlˤaʶ taʔadijbahaaː dumiːrat aʶːtˤlˤaʶːnts ʔaam lahum ʃurakaːʔu faljaʔatwaː biʃurakaːʔiihim ʔiin kaːnwaː sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ kaːn jʔatj ʔilaː hnaː kj jtlqː aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ ʔajn qrʔa hðaː ln ʔansaː ðlk aːlʃʕwr ʔabdaː twqːf faʶːdˤlˤ ʕn tnaːwl dwaːʔih ʔad͡ʒbn mn nʕaːma ʔiinːahaː ʃad͡ʒaraaun taχrud͡ʒu fj ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤiʶ aːld͡ʒaħjmi wahaðaaː ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶhaʶaʶː faʔaamːaaː aːlʕafwu ʕan aːlhafawaaːti td͡ʒaːwz faʶːdˤlˤ tlk aːlmrħla lm ʔant tbkj ʔaːfa aːlrʔaj aːlhwaː aʶːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː mn aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fj aːlʕd͡ʒla aːlndaːma w fj aːltaːnj aːlslaːma aːlʕjʃ fj aːldnjaː d͡ʒhaːd daːʔim w ʔaχjraːan ðˤhrˤ waʔiin kaaːna ʃajʔun miθlahu faaːlfaqru ʔin mfaːtjħ aːlʔamwr aːlʕzaːʔim wad͡ʒaʕalnaː ðurːijːatahu humu aːlbaːqjna kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lˤʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ ʔaːχrjn mn ħwlh ʔinːa min ʔaadabihi saːmj hw mdjr aːlʕjaːda hnaːk ʔamr maː w ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʕrfh sʔaftqd bwstˤn waðilːaai aːliaːd͡ʒtidaaːʔi falaaː jumajːizu bajna mustaħiqːin wamaħruwmin hl nsjt tħjːtj kaːn saːmj qd ʔaʕdː mlaːbsh jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔaajːu aːlnːaaːsi ʔaaʃarːu qaaːla hl nsj maːlh md͡ʒdːdaː jutlifu aːlmaħad͡ʒːaaa ʔiið nusawːjkum birabːi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn ʕljk qbwl nsˤjħth waʔaawlaaː aːlʕuluwmi aːld͡ʒhl dˤlˤaʶːm aːstrd͡ʒʕt ljlaː sˤħːthaʶː kaːn ʕlaː wʃk ʔan jfqd ʕjnh saːmj jħbːk wajatad͡ʒanːabuhaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː hðaː mkaːn aːlħaːdθa waqaaːbala aːlʕuquwqa biaːlʕuquwqi wabaʕda aːlkaʃfi waaːlrːawijːaai mustaqijmanaː faðwqwaː falan nazjdakum ʔiilːaː ʕaðaːbanaː watawaqːaaː ʔarjd ʔan tqf bd͡ʒaːnbj aːlʔiiħsaaːnu ʔilaaː aːlnːaaːsi maːðaː qaːl aʶːlˤtˤːbjb hw ʔaʶħdˤrˤhaʶː ʔilaː hnaː frjd rkl aːlkra mina aːllːahi ðij aːlmaʕaːrid͡ʒi famaːli aːlːaðjna kafarwaː qibalaka muʶhtˤiʶʕjnaʶ ʔaafahimt qaaːla tabːanaː lilðːahabi tabːanaː lˤiʶlˤfiʶdˤːaʶaʶiʶ ʔaamsaaː aːlzːahru ðaːbilanaː waʶdˤaʶʕtuʶ aʶːlˤsˤːuʶwrˤaʶaʶaʶ fij ʔiʶiʶtˤaʶːrˤiʶn bdjʕin ln ʔadʕ twmaː jðhb walam jakun aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjquʶ dˤaʶjːiʶqaʶnaʶː faʔauwasːiʕu wamina aːllːajli fasabːiħhu waʔaadbaːra aːlsːud͡ʒwdi ʔasrʕ mn aʶːlˤtˤrˤf ʔiʃfaaːqanaː ʕalajhim min kadħi aʶːlˤtˤːaʶlˤaʶbiʶ falamːaː raʔaawhaː qaːlwaː aːldːktwr baːkr wajaʔamulu waaːlχawfu ʔilajhi ʔaaqrabu watadːʕj ħubː sajfi aːldːwlـai aːlʔaumaـm u waʔaaħwaaːlanaː dˤaʶχmaʶaʶaʶn waburːizati aːld͡ʒaħjmu lilʁaːwjna qaːmt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ bʕmljːa mraːqba wawalijːuhu muʕaaːdijanaː ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabːuka biʕaːdin waʶlˤiʶdˤiʶdːiʶhiʶ aːlmulaaːʔiimi ʔaːθara faʶnaʶdˤːaʶrˤaʶ aːllːahu wad͡ʒha aːmriʔiin ʔaawd͡ʒaza fij kalaaːmihi faʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶrˤaʶ ʕalaaː ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waqad ħukija ʕan sufjaaːna aːlθːawrijːi ʔaanːahu qaaːla ʔarjd rʔuja twm qbl mʁaːdrtj kfaːka mbaːlʁa kalːaː bal laː jaχaːfwna aːlʔaːχiraaa waʶðˤiʶlˤːiʶn mamdwdin waʔiinːahu latanzjlu rabːi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh kjfmaː ħsbthaː snsˤlˤ qblhm kaːnt tktb rwaːja wahaðaaː jakuwnu min aːlħazmi wamin dwnihimaː d͡ʒanːataːni watashijlu aːlsːabijli ʕalajhim wabaðlu aːlmad͡ʒhuwdi fij rifdihim wanawmu aːlʕaʃijːi ħumqun ħaːwlt ʔan ʔansaː ʔanːhaː qd bkjt kamaaː qaaːla fij muħkimi aːlkitaaːbi laː jmknki tfwjt hðh aːlʔamsja kaaːna aːlzːiħaːmu ʃadijdanaː ʃʕr maːrjaː tˤwjlˤ wafij qawlihi laaː tutbiʕ aʶːlˤnːaʶðˤrˤaʶaʶaʶ aʶːlˤnːaʶðˤrˤaʶaʶaʶ taʔawijlaaːni aʶːtsˤlˤ bj ʁdaːan ʔanaː ʔadrs ʕdːa lʁaːt wajuqaaːlu lilʕaaːlimi hðaː ljs mnzl md͡ʒaːnjn bl ʕjaːda lˤlˤmsˤaʶːbjn baʶːlˤʔaʶmrˤaʶːdˤ aːlʕqljːa ljth kaːn hnaː jntðˤrˤnj ʔaakrahu aːlsːajra fij aʶːlˤtˤuʶrˤqiʶ aːlmuzdaħimaai ʔajmknk ʔijd͡ʒaːdhaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːljamjni maː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːljamjni χuðhaaː faʔiinːahaaː mafaaːtijħu χazaaːʔiini aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj ħtːaː aːljwm aːltːaːlj aʶːtːsˤlˤt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ bsaːmj samiʕatnij aːmraʔaaaun biʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶwaʶaʶːfiʶ maː aːlðj knt tfʕlh waaːltːad͡ʒaaːwuzu ʕanhum waʶaʶːlˤtːaʶʕaʶrˤːuʶdˤiʶ liaːktisaaːbi aːltːabiʕaaːti kjf kaːnt ʔad͡ʒwaːʔ aːlmdrsa ʔiʃtrjtu mzhrjaan zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒjaan raːħt aːlskra wd͡ʒaːʔt aːlfkra ʔajn twnj ʔaaw qubħa hid͡ʒaaːʔin muʶmdˤiʶn hw fχwr baːbnh saːmj jbħθ ʕn aːlsːʕaːda waʕan θawaaːbihi jarʁabuwna waqaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʃuʕaraaːʔi huðajlin χaːn faʶːdˤlˤ ħbjbth ʔaalaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aʶːlˤlˤːaʶtˤjfuʶ aːlχabjru walaaː jastankifu mimːaaː muniʕa ʔajmknnj aːldfʕ ʕn tˤrˤjq btˤaʶːqaʶ aːlʔiʔitmaːn ʔaqll tˤʕaʶːmk td͡ʒd mnaːmk waman ʔaafʃaaːhu kaaːna aːlχijaaːru ʕalajhi laː maʶqtˤwʕaʶaʶiʶn walaː mamnwʕaain hlaː ʔamskt bhðaː mn fdˤlˤk faqad jadʕuw ʔilaaː ðalika ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaasbaaːbin jasbaħu aːlʔaawlaːadu fij aːlbiħaːri kaːn saːmj jsˤaʶːħb ʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤaʶː χtˤjrˤjn waʶaʶːlˤmaʶwdˤuʶwʕiʶ min aʶːsˤtˤiʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ ʕaʶsˤrˤiʶhiʶ kaðːabat qawmu nwħin aːlmursaljna klaːm kaːlʕsl wwʁzun kaːlʔasl ʕlaː saːmj tnðˤjf hðh aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː waraħimak biħusni ðˤaʶfaʶrˤiʶhiʶ ʕljː ʔan ʔaʶdˤmːd d͡ʒrħ aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn ħdθ aːlʔamr ðaːth jwm aːlʔiθnjn litatimːa aːlsːaʕaaːdaau wataʕumːa aʶːlˤmaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶaʶuʶ aːlθːijaaːba aːlːatij tasturu ʕawraaːtikum kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ aːstdʕaːʔh tχrːd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlmʕhd w kaːn aːlʔawːl fj qsmh mʕ mn tðˤn ʔanhaː tskn ʔaaw niʕmaain taðkuruhaaː wakajfa jakuwnu ʕaaːranaː maaː ʔaadːaaː ʔilaaː sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶn waʶsˤaʶdːaʶ ʕan χaʶtˤaʶʔaʶiʶn faʔiiðaaː tawaaːtara aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤuʶ ʕalajhi sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aʶːlˤnːaʶqsˤuʶ fijmaaː siwaaːhu waaːlrːaaːbiʕu huwa χaʃjaau aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː wahuwa qawlu ʕurwaaa bni aːlzːubajri ʔaalam jaʕlam biʔaanːa aːllːaha jaraː liʔaanːa aːlkibra jakuwnu biaːlmanzilaai ħukija ʕan θaʕlabin qaaːla aːlaː mtaː snqf mktwfaː aːlaːjdaː mn aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔan jnswaː wʕwdhm waliðalika dˤaʶrˤaʶbaʶ aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː bihi aːlmaθala faqaaːla waaːlʔiiħsaaːna ʔaan takuwna sarijratuhu ʔaaħsana min ʕalaaːnijatihi aːntbh waqad aːχtalafa ʔaahlu aːltːaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː walaaː jakmulu ʔilːaaː maʕahaaː jaː lh mn klb kbjr walikulːi ʕilmin minhaaː faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn ttklm maːrjkw aːlʔind͡ʒljzja btˤlˤaʶːqaʶ aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli ʔaaqbaħu min aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔilaaː aːlmaaːli jasurːunij ʔaan taʶħdˤuʶrˤaʶ ʕlaː rʔash rjʃa lmaːðaː ttklm w kʔank rʔijs ʕmlnaː ʔaʶðˤn ʔannaː tħaːdθnaː ʕbr aːlhaːtf ʔiinːaː sanulqj ʕalajka qawlanaː θaqjlanaː laː tql ðlk kaːn saːmj jʕtqd ʔanː md͡ʒjdaː kaːn thdjdaː χtˤjrˤaʶː lħjaːth rabːi nad͡ʒːinj waʔaahlj mimːaː jaʕmalwna bdʔa saːmj jmdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː km ʔasrːtnj rʔuja twm ʔid͡ʒlsj jaː kjt jawma jafirːu aːlmarʔu min ʔaaχjhi ʕnd d͡ʒuhajnaaa aːlχbr aːljqjn kl maː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fʕlh hw aʶːlˤʔiʶntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla lljlaː wmaː ʔabrʔi nfsj hl sjkwn hnaːk ʔaħd baʶːntðˤaʶːrˤj laː tns ʔan tʔaχð ʔaʶʁrˤaʶːdˤk mʕk hw dˤdː hðh aːlmbaːdra qul ʔiinːamaː ʔaanaː munðirun wamaː min ʔiilhin ʔiilːaaː aːllːahu aːlwaːħidu aːlqahːaːru ðhb saːmj lˤaʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb ʔaχth mn aːlmdrsa lj sˤdjq ʔabaːh mmθl mʃhwr waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi min kamaaːli ʕaqlik aʶːstiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶk ʕalaaː ʕaqlik dʕaː saːmj ljlaː lˤqdˤaʶːʔ aːllːjl mʕh man taraaː ʔaan nuwalːijahu ħiʶmsˤaʶ faqaaːla maaː aːlqaːriʕaau maː lakum kajfa taħkumwna ʔaħb aːlmfaːd͡ʒʔiaːt wataraka zijnaaa aːldːunjaaː mlʔa saːmj kʔasaː bmdˤaʶːd aːltːd͡ʒmːd saːmj jħbː aːldːraːsa ʕlm saːmj ʔanː ljlaː lm tkn tħbːh walalkafːu ʕan ʃatmi aːllːaʔiijmi takarːumanaː ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrˤːuʶ lahu min ʃatmihi ħijna jaʃtumu lqd kðb saːmj aːʕtðr saːmj bʔimkaːnk hdm d͡ʒbl wlkn ljs bʔimkaːnk ʔiχfaːʔ aʶːlˤħtˤaʶːm aʶːiʶqtˤʕ aːlkʕka baːlskjn walaaː lˤiʶrˤiʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ ʁaaːjaaun liʔaanːahum lamːaaː lam tastaqirːa bihim daaːrun ʔaːkl mn ħwt waðahaba ʔaːχaruwna ʔilaaː wud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʃːarʕi duwna aːlʕaqli smn ʕlaː ʕsl χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna min ʕalaqin fjhaː faːkihaaun waaːlnːaχlu ðaːtu aːlʔaakmaːmi saːmj ftaː mn aːlrːjf aːdχl ʔilaː ðlk aːld͡ʒħr saːmj jħbː aːlθːld͡ʒ ʕalimt maaː raʔaajt ðhb ʔilaː aːlmħl aːltd͡ʒaːrj aːlktaːb jqrʔa mn ʕnwaːnh fajamnaʕahum min taslijmi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ lˤiʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ waʔaand͡ʒajnaː mwsaː waman maʕahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna waħukija ʕan ʔaabij sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶ bni ħasːaaːna ʔaqnʕ saːmj ljlaː kj tħdˤrˤ lh slaːħaː naːrjːaː waʔiitjaaːna aːlqurabi faʔiinːa aʶːtˤːiʶrˤaʶaʶːħaʶ muraaːʕaaːtihaaː watarka tafaqːudihaaː mahaaːnaaun waðulːun sjtzwd͡ʒ twm ʔaχjraː jusrid͡ʒu aːlχaaːdimu aʶːlˤħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnaʶ lʔad͡ʒl aːld͡ʒħjm aːbq bʕjdaː ʕnj fahaðihi aːlħaaːlaau ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶmːuʶ aːlʕujuwnu maʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶduʶ aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ bʔimkaːnh aːlaːstraːħa tilka aːldːaːru aːlʔaːχiraau nad͡ʒʕaluhaː lilːaðjna laː jurjdwna ʕuluwːanaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaː fasaːdanaː waaːlʕaːqibaau lilmutːaqjna ʕndmaː tkwn fj waʔaanːa aːlʕaqla fij aːldːijni ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶn qaːl saːmj ʔanːh lm jkn jʕjʃ hnaːk ʔaħd hw ʔamjn sˤndwq d͡ʒmʕjtnaː ʕan ʔaaʕmaaːmihi waʔaad͡ʒdaaːdihi ʔanaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶː knt mdrːsaː waaːliaːstimdaaːdu bihaaː ʔaaʕamːu nafʕanaː walikulːi binaaːʔin ʔausːun kaːn saːmj jtlˤfːðˤ ʔanfaːsh ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶrˤaʶ aːlrːad͡ʒulu aːlhilaːala famaː tanfaʕuhum ʃafaːʕaau aːlʃːaːfiʕjna waaːntiqaaːmu ʔaahli aːlʁawʁaaːʔi kulːu ʔaasfala saːfiljna sˤfʕt ljlaː wd͡ʒh saːmj bqwːa aːlʕql sˤdq aːlħkm ʕlaː aːlʔamwr saʔaaʕtaaːdu aːltːabkijra fij aːlnːawmi ʔiiðan jaʶsˤiʶħːaʶ badanuka ʁjːr saːmj rʔajh bχsˤwsˤ aːlmslmjn aʶːlˤdˤmjrˤ sˤwt haːdaːʔ jχbrk bʔan ʔaħdaːan jnðˤrˤ ʔiljk aːlʕtaːb hdja aːlʔaħbaːb laː tns trk ʔikraːmjːa lm ʔaʕrf ʔanːki hnaː aːntht ʔaːmaːl saːmj bʃkl nhaːʔijː ʔiiðaː masːahu aːlʃːarːu d͡ʒazwʕanaː aːlhawaaː maʶtˤiʶjːaʶaʶuʶ aːlfitnaai juħibːu aːlnːaaːsu aːlħaːkima aːlʕaaːdila χtˤʔaʶ walajsa fij muqaaːbalaai haðajni ħaaːd͡ʒaaun daaːʕijaaun walaaː nafʕun mard͡ʒuwːun waʶfaʶdˤlˤuʶ maaː bajna aːlʔaamrajni waʕaraaː ʕan aːmtinaaːnin wanaʃrin jaqwlwna ʔaaʔiinːaː lamardwdwna fij aːlħaːfiraai kaːnt lsaːmj aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤχsˤaʶːlˤ aʶːlˤtˤːjːbaʶ fatawalːa ʕanhum ħatːaː ħjnin laː ttdχl liʔaanːa ʁuruwra aːlhawaaː wanaaːziʕa aːlʃːahwaai jaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶaʶːniʶ aːlnːafsa ʔaan tarkaba aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤaʶ min χalaaːʔiiqihaaː ʔaan jaχtabira ʔaumuwra zamaaːnihi ʕljk ʔan tʕml bd͡ʒdː aʶːħtfðˤ saːmj brsaːla ljlaː aʶːlˤsˤːwtjːaʶ kaːn saːmj jtsˤrˤːf hkðaː qzm waːqf χjr mn ʕmlaːq raːkʕ wahadajnaːhu aːlnːad͡ʒdajni aːlʕifːaau fij aːldːijni wajubalːiʁu ħaaːd͡ʒatak faðalika sˤaʶrˤiʶjħuʶ aːllːuʔumi waʶmaʶħdˤuʶ aːldːanaaːʔaai kaːn aːlmdrːs jħbːnj mn aʶːlˤsˤːʕb nsjaːn maː ħdθ faqaaːla muʕaaːwijaau faʔaawːalu ʔaaqsaaːmihi waʔaawlaaːhaaː wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶrˤːuʶtˤiʶ fij aːlʃːubuhaaːti waʶsˤaʶniʶjʕuʶk ʕindahum zaaːkijanaː aːlklaːm jʃbh aːlnħl fjh aːlʕsl waːlʔibr qutila aːlʔiinsaːnu maː ʔaakfarahu tˤfħ aːlkjl faʔiinːahu laaː juslamu min ʕawaaːqibi ʃarːihi taːd͡ʒ aʶːlˤqjsˤrˤ laː jmkn ʔan jħmjh mn aʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ waaːʕlam ʔaanːa lilkalaaːmi ʔaːdaaːbanaː ʔin ʔaaʁfalahaaː aːlmutakalːimu ʔaaðhaba rawnaqa kalaaːmihi aːstʔad͡ʒr mħaːmj saːmj tˤbjbaʶː ʃrʕjːaː lasta ʕalajhim biʶmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶrˤiʶn faqad malakahaaː baʕda ʔaan kaaːna fij milkihaaː qdːm saːmj kʔasaː lljlj ljs kl ʔaʶbjdˤ tˤħjnaʶːaʶn jsˤːlˤj aːlmslmwn daːʔimaː w hm mtwd͡ʒːhwn nħw aːlkʕba waaːlʔaadabu maaːlun laaː χawfa ʕalajhi aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ tħtˤ kaːn saːmj jχtˤːtˤ lʔinhaːʔ ħjaːa ljlaː ʔiinːahum jakjdwna kajdanaː ðhbt ʔaχtj ʔilaː kwbj baːlʔams lm jtsˤwːrˤ saːmj ʔan jnhj ħjaːth hkðaː waqad jataʕalːaqu biaːldːijni ʕuluwmun qad bajːana aːlʃːaaːfiʕijːu faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶ kulːi waaːħidin minhaaː faqaaːla aːlːaðj jaraːka ħjna taqwmu dʕ tʕaːljqk aʶːlˤʕnsˤrˤjːaʶ lnfsk saːmj jħbː kra aːlqdm qnaːʕtk nsˤf sʕaːdtk θumːa laaː janbaʁij ʔaan jabtadiʔiahu ʔilːaaː baʕda aːliaːstidʕaaːʔi ʔaraːd saːmj mʕrfa kjfjːa ʔadaːʔ aːltːjmːm ʕddhm kbjr waʔiin ʔauhmilat ʔaasqamat θumːa ʔaatlafat waaːd͡ʒtanib ʔaahlahumaaː jsˤdrˤ hðaː aʶːlˤmsˤbaʶːħ dˤwʔaʶː saʶːtˤʕaʶː ʔaantum ʕanhu muʶʕrˤiʶdˤwnaʶ qaːlt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ ʔanːh ʕljnaː ʔan ntˤlˤq aːlnːaːr ʕlaː ðlk aːlklb fwr maː rʔajnaːh qaːl saːmj hðaː lʔiħdaː aʶːlˤmmrˤːdˤaʶːt waʔiinːamaaː justaʁrabu mimːan jald͡ʒaʔau ʔilaaː χaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤiʶhiʶ wajuʕawːilu ʕalaaː badijhatihi ʔiilːaː ʕibaːda aːllːahi aʶːlˤmuʶχlˤaʶsˤjnaʶ qaːmt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ btʕqːb faʶːdˤlˤ maːtt ʔamj fj ʁjaːbj ʔinːa ʔaabaaːk ʔaakala min ħalaaːwatihim faʶħaʶtˤːaʶ fij ʔaahwaaːʔiihim waaːllːaʔiijmu jad͡ʒtadij biaːlmahaaːnaai waaːlʕunfi sʔaqrʔa lki kfːki ʔaqlː saːmj msaːfr ʔawtwstwb bl w sʔalnj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː ʔin knt raːʁba fj aːlzːwaːd͡ʒ mnh waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi walaqad taraknaːhaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min mudːakirin ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːllːaha waaːtːaqwhu waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕwniʶ snrsl lk sˤwrˤaʶː lqd wsˤlˤ aːlsːjːd baːkr waaːlʕamala bihi aʶːdˤtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶn wanad͡ʒːajnaːhu waʔaahlahu mina aːlkarbi aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ laqad wuʕidnaː hðaː naħnu waʔaːbaːʔuunaː min qablu ʔiin hðaː ʔiilːaː ʔaʶaʶsaʶːtˤjrˤuʶ aːlʔaawːaljna kam tarakwaː min d͡ʒanːaːtin waʕujwnin aːnaː daːʔimaː aːθq fj twm krht ðlk aːlmdrːs ʔajmknk aːltħqq mn dˤʁtˤ aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤaʶːrˤ walaaː taʕd͡ʒaz ʕan aʶːlˤtˤːaʶlˤaʶbiʶ lˤiʶwaʶsˤaʶbiʶn walaaː naʶsˤaʶbiʶn wdˤʕ bʕdˤ aːlnqwd aːlmʕdnja fj aʶːlˤsˤndwq mn fdˤlˤk tnħːaː d͡ʒaːnbaːan kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lmqwːm ʔasnaːn ʔiinːa hʔuulaːʔi lajaqwlwna ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlʕqwl fj nʕjm faliʔaanːa ðaaː aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ laaː jaʕdamu ħaaːsida niʕmaain wamuʕaaːnida faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶn jaʕtarijhi aːld͡ʒahlu biʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ ʕinaaːdihi laaː bal sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː kaːn saːmj jʔaχð drwsaː d͡ʒaːmʕjːa ʕaːdjːa wahaðaaː aːlnːawʕu laaː jakuwnu ʕaaːmːanaː waʔiin kaaːna ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrˤːaʶhaʶaʶː kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁlˤjðˤ d͡ʒdːaː ʕalaː sˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤiʶn mustaqjmin waʕalimat ʔaanːa man lam jaqnaʕ biaːlqalijli lam jaqnaʕ biaːlkaθijri lam ʔaasmaʕ ʔaaʕd͡ʒaba min qawli ʕumara bni aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu waʔiiðaaː ħaʶdˤaʶrˤaʶ aːʁtaaːba waljataħarːa fij aːχtijaaːri man jaʔataminuhu ʕalajhi wajastawdiʕuhu ʔijːaaːhu ʔaafalaː taðakːarwna ʔaqlːt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ saːmj kaːn saːmj jqdˤj bjn stː w sbʕ saːʕaːt jwmjːaː w hw jtdrːb ħikmaaun baːliʁaaun famaː tuʁni aːlnːuðuru tsˤrˤːf bʃkl ʁrjb aːlnaːs fj ʁflaːthaː laː ʔaθq baʶːlˤχjaʶːtˤ juqaːl ʔanhaː wuldt fj ʔalmaːnjaː bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt mʕaː θumːa ʃaqaqnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʃaqːanaː wajataqarːaba bihaaː fij d͡ʒihaaːti aːlbirːi waaːstawʕarat sarːaaːʔuuhu waqaaːla ʕatːaaːbun aːlbaaːqij ʕalajːa waman lij biaːlʕaqli qaaːla kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ msjħjːaː mltzmaː maːðaː tʕnj kjf ʔad͡ʒdk aːnh laː jstħq tʕbk kjf thd͡ʒʔi "d͡ʒmjl" kiraːmanaː kaːtibjna liʔaanːahu jaχaaːfu fħsˤ aʶːlˤtˤːbjb ʕjnj saːmj fqtˤ knt ʔarjd ʔan ʔansaː tˤlˤbt mnh aːlmaːʔ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔaakbaru aːldːawaaːʔi taqdijru aːlʁiðaaːʔi twm lm jʔaχðhaː mʕh jaʶsˤlˤaʶwnaʶhaʶː jawma aːldːjni min dwni aːllːahi hal jaʶnsˤuʶrˤwnaʶkuʶm ʔaaw jaʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ baːlnsba lj ʔinh mhm lm ʔant ʔanaːnj lhðh aːldːrd͡ʒa qaaːla kaaːnuwaː ʔiðaaː ðakaruwaː aːlfuruwd͡ʒa kanːawaː ʕanhaaː waqad qaaːla aːlħukamaaːʔu hðh ʔakbr fraːwla rʔathaː ʕjnaːj wajawma taqwmu aːlsːaːʕaau juqsimu aːlmud͡ʒrimwna maː labiθwaː ʁajra saːʕaain kaðlika kaːnwaː juʔufakwna minhaaː walaaː jaχrud͡ʒa ʕanhaaː maaː huwa fijhaaː ln jmwt ʔaħd hnaː lnsrʕ ktb saːmj lljlaː rsaːla ħbː fjhaː stː sˤfħaʶːt slːm saːmj nfsh lˤlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ kaːnt ljlaː ħqːaː mʕd͡ʒba bsaːmj kalːaː bal laː tukrimwna aːljatjma famaː lahum ʕani aːltːaðkiraai muʶʕrˤiʶdˤjnaʶ aːd͡ʒtnb msˤaʶːħbaʶ aːlkðaːb fʔin aʶːdˤtˤrˤrˤt ʔiljh flaː tuʶsˤaʶdiʶːqhuʶ aːntqlt ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmnzl ʔiilːaː man huwa sˤaʶːlˤiʶ aːld͡ʒaħjmi ðhbnaː ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤʕm aːlʃhjr wkaːnt td͡ʒrba d͡ʒmjla wajaʃuħːu biaːljasijri min maaːlihi ʔin kaaːna ʔaaʕlaaː minːij ʕaraft lahu qadrahu waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlˤfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ aːlʔaadabu jasturu qabijħa aːlnːasabi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi min ʕalaaːmaai aːlʔiiqbaaːli aʶːsˤtˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕuʶ aːlrːid͡ʒaaːli ln ʔanshaː ʔabdaː famaaː aʶːstaʶtˤaʶːʕwaʶː min qijaːmin wamaː kaːnwaː muʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤjnaʶ kaːn aːld͡ʒw ħaːraːan d͡ʒdaːan ðˤhjrˤaʶ aːljwm twm jrbːj qtˤaʶ swdaːʔ lm jħdθ saːmj ʔajːa dˤd͡ʒːaʶ ʔiinːa ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒanːaai aːljawma fj ʃuʁulin faːkihwna jaʶsˤiʶmuʶ aːlmaaːziħa wajuʔuðij aːlmumaaːzaħa waliðalika qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu aːlʕajnaaːni ʔaanamːu min aːllːisaaːni wamaːʔin maskwbin ʔaʕln ħbh ʔaudχl aːlmstʃfaː ʔiið jaʁʃaaː aːlsːidraaa maː jaʁʃaː jʕml d͡ʒaːhdaːan ljʕjl ʔasrth aːlkbjra trk saːmj aːlʔislaːm walam naku nuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶ aːlmiskjna ftːʃ saːmj aːlmnzl bħθaː ʕn ljlaː wajastaʕd͡ʒilwnaka biaːlʕaðaːbi walawlaː ʔaad͡ʒalun musamːanaː lad͡ʒaːʔahumu aːlʕaðaːbu walajaʔatijanːahum baʁtaaan wahum laː jaʃʕurwna jaaː ʔaamijra aːlmuʔuminijna lam ʔaakun ʕalaaː rijbaain faʔaaχaaːfuk waʔiinːa min ʃjʕatihi laʔiibraːhjma ʔajn hj ʔadwaːt aːlʔakl wafasaaːdi aːltːaqdijri ʔalaː tðkr maː ħdθ aːlsna aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ ldjnaː mdrːsjn ħmqaː ʔiiðan jaðhaba aːltːaʕibu sˤlˤːaʶː saːmj sˤlˤaʶːaʶ aʶːlˤʕsˤrˤ χlf faʶːdˤlˤ ʔin sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶhaʶaʶː fij birːin lam juʔud͡ʒar ʔaʶdˤaʶːf saːmj bʕdˤ aːlfrwla lˤlˤʕsˤjrˤ sʔaħaːwl wdˤʕ ʔafkaːrj fj ktaːb knt ʔaħaːwl ʔan ʔansa klː ʃjʔ man taʶtˤaʶjːaʶrˤaʶ faljaqul aːiʃtrt ʔamj mðˤlˤaʶ sˤfrˤaʶːʔ lʔaχj walaː sˤaʶdjqiʶn ħamjmin saːmj jħbː aːlfrwla aːlbrːjːa ʔaʃʕr baːlʔirhaːq twm lm jʕd qaːdraː ʕlaː ʔadaːʔ mhaːmh maaː juʔuaaːχaðu bihi min wizrihi waʔaːθaaːmihi waaːlsːamaːʔa rafaʕahaː waʶwaʶdˤaʶʕaʶ aːlmjzaːna waqad qaaːla ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjːuʶ mn fj aːlmnzl wntd͡ʒ ʕn ðlk mzjd mn aːlχwf wʕdm aːlθqa mustaʃhidanaː min kitaaːbi aːllːahi d͡ʒalːa aːsmuhu bimaaː jaʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ kʔan ʕlaː rʔwshm aʶːlˤtˤjrˤ laaː taʶʁdˤaʶb ʔiilaː rabːika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmasaːqu lm kaːn jħdθ ðlk lm jtbqaː ʔilaː aːlqljl waʔaamːaaː aːlhawaaː fahuwa ʕan aːlχajri sˤaʶaʶːdːuʶn faʔaamːaaː dafʕu aːlʔaaðaaː bihi fawaaːd͡ʒibun biaːlʕaqli aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ ʕlaː ʔaʃkaːlhaː tqʕ kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn ʔaħjaːnaː jatʕabu aːlʔiinsaːnu fij sˤiʶʁaʶrˤiʶhiʶ kaj jartaaːħa fij kibarihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kafaaː biaːltːad͡ʒaaːribi taʔaadːubanaː wabitaqalːubi aːlʔaajːaaːmi ʕiʶðˤaʶaʶaʶn hlːaː ʔaʶʕtˤjtnj aːsmk aːlkaːml sʔaχbrk bmaː ʔarjd fʕlh waqadra aːstiħqaaːqihi lˤiʶjuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶhuʶ maaː jataħamːaluhu biðakaaːʔiihi liʔialːaaː jaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ bihi mudilːanaː baʶtˤiʶrˤaʶnaʶː waʶmuʶstaʶtˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː ʔaaʃiranaː tqwm aːld͡ʒrjda btzwjdnaː baːlʔaχbaːr saːmj jʕrf kjf jrˤbtˤ ħðaːʔh bilisaːnin ʕarabijːin mubjnin kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan tkwn ljlaː sˤaʶːdqaʶ mʕh aːlwqt kaːlsjf aːn lm tqtˤʕh qtˤʕk waʔiiðaː raʔaajta θamːa raʔaajta naʕjmanaː wamulkanaː kabjranaː qaːla faʕaltuhaː ʔiiðanaː waʔaanaː mina aʶːlˤdˤːaʶːlˤːjnaʶ kaːn saːmj ʔaʕzː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ frjd ʔajmknk ktaːba aːlrsaːla baːlʔind͡ʒljzja tħtaːd͡ʒ aːlnbaːtaːtu dˤwʔaʶ aːlʃms ltnmw kaːn ħðaːʔ saːmj dˤaʶːʔiʶʕaʶː ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶj ʔaalfaaːni jaftaħu muħamːadun aːlbaaːba ʔaʶsˤlˤħt aːldraːd͡ʒa aːlbaːrħa wajaħðifu aʶːlˤfuʶdˤuʶwlˤaʶ waaːlzːijaaːdaaa faʶaʶːlˤsˤːiʶdquʶ huwa aːlʔiiχbaaːru ʕan aːlʃːajʔi ʕalaaː maaː huwa ʕalajhi kaːn saːmj jdrːs aːlʕrbjːa fj mdrsa msjħjːa liʔaanːa aːstiχbaaːrahu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama qad kaaːna jaʶtaʶdˤaʶmːaʶnuʶ aːlmazħa saːmj ʁbjː tmaːmaː walaaː juʕijna qawijːanaː ʕalaaː dˤaʶʕiʶjfiʶn fħsˤ saːmj ħðaːʔh lltːʔakːd mn ʕdm wd͡ʒwd ʕqaːrb waaːlːaðjna fj ʔaamwaːlihim ħaqːun maʕlwmun maː zaːl ðraːʕj jʔulmnj kaːnt ħjaːa saːmj fj mftrq aʶːlˤtˤːrˤqaʶːt kaːlmstd͡ʒjr mn aʶːlˤrˤmdˤaʶːʔ baːlnaːr kjf td͡ʒrʔijn ʔan tklːmjnj bhðh aːlnːbra jaː sjːda wuʶdˤʕ saːmj fj sjːaːra ʔisʕaːf lan ʔausaaːfira waħdij ʔiðaaː zaaːla maʕahaaː aːltːad͡ʒamːulu faaːqtuluwaː ʔaanfusakum ðaaːlikum χajrun lakum waχuruwd͡ʒihi ʕan d͡ʒumlaai aːlʕawaaːmː aːlmustarðalijna watarku aːldːunjaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ min mulaaːbasatihaaː aːʁtanim χamsanaː qabla χamsin ʔastsaːʕdhm lm jtʕrːf saːmj btaːtaː ʕlaː sˤwt ljlaː ʔiinːa ʕaðaːba rabːika lawaːqiʕun qaaːla ʔaatastabdiluwna aːlːaðij huwa ʔaadnaaːaː biaːlːaðij huwa χajrun rawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin ʔaanːa ʔaːχira maaː nazala min aːlqurʔaːni ldjnaː mdrːs msnː hl ʔaʶdˤʕt ʃjʔiaːan hnaː waaːlʕuquwlu lahaaː muwaaːfiqaaun d͡ʒalasa aːlwaladu kaj jastarijħa wakulːa ʃajʔin ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶjnaʶːhuʶ kitaːbanaː naðjranaː lilbaʃari lmaːðaː tkrhnj kaːnt ljlaː tqdːm drwsaː fj mdrsa aːlʔaħd aːlsfr jwsʕ ʔaːfaːq tfkjr aːlmrʔ wajaʕlama aːlːaðjna jud͡ʒaːdilwna fj ʔaːjaːtinaː maː lahum min maʶħjsˤiʶn ʕljk ʔan tʕml bd͡ʒhd ʔakbr walaaː aʶːlˤðˤːuʶlˤuʶmaʶːtuʶ walaaː aːlnːwru waʶaʶːlˤbaʶtˤnaʶ wamaaː waʕaaː lˤiʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ aːljamjni ln ʔaðhb llmdrsa jwm aːlsbt wasuʔiila muħamːadu bnu ʕalijːin ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla aːindlʕt aːlħrb ʔaχjraːan liʔaanːa firaaːqa aːlmaʔaluwfi fij aːlʕaaːdaai ʔajn tðhb llʕml waðakara aːsma rabːihi faʶsˤaʶlˤːaʶː d͡ʒ saːmj jħbː aːlħsaːʔ ʔardt qraːʔthm hðaː ʔad͡ʒml waʔiin harabta minhum tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶwkaʶ waman χadamak faaːstaχdimijhi warawaaː saʕijdu bnu d͡ʒubajrin qaaːla ðhb saːmj ʔilaː tlk aːlnːaːfða nuzulanaː min ʁafwrin raħjmin ʔajn aːlmχrd͡ʒ tuʶsˤbiʶħuʶ aːlʁurfaau naʶðˤiʶjfaʶaʶaʶn walakinːij raʔaajt ðaaː aːlmaaːli mahijbanaː kaːn jʃʕr ʕlaː maː jraːm ʕndmaː fħsˤth θumːa biaːlʕaaːdaai jaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ kaaːlχuluqi kaːn ʕndj mdrːswn mtʕsːf laː tnsh ʔabdaː taʶðˤaʶlˤːuʶ aːlʕaaːmilaau muʃtaʁilaaan ʔilaː ʔajn ʔant ðaːhb walaaː min aːlħazmi ʔiʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ naʶsˤiʶjbiʶhiʶ min aːltːawakːuli wakunːaː nukaðːibu bijawmi aːldːjni man ʔaaraaːda birːa aːlwaaːlidajni faʶlˤjuʶʕtˤiʶ aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔa waʶsˤaʶaʶːbiʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʕaduwːakum laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːltːd͡ʒmːl fj ʃhr rˤmdˤaʶːn watarka maaː tahwaaː dawaaːʔuuhaaː waʔiin lam tuʔuminwaː lj faaːʕtazilwni rˤkdˤt ljlaː llnːd͡ʒaːa bħjaːthaː maːtwaː waːħdaː tlw aːlʔaːχr kaːnt aːlmdrːsa tbkj lm jsˤdrˤ saːmj ʔajːa dˤd͡ʒːaʶ aːlħilmu waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlrːaaːbiʕu fij aːlħilmi waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ waʶðˤaʶlˤaʶmaʶ faaːstaʁfara lm jkn saːmj jʃrb maːrj aːmrʔaa faːtna bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi tanzjlu aːlkitaːbi mina aːllːahi aːlʕazjzi aːlħakjmi waːldj saːmj mslmwn wahuwa aːlːaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːllːajla libaːsanaː waaːlnːawma subaːtanaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlnːahaːra nuʃwranaː flaːn kaːlkʕba tuzaːru wlaː tustazaːru waaːliaːstirsaaːlu fij aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai lm jsttˤʕ saːmj tħmːl ðlk aʶːlˤdˤːd͡ʒjd͡ʒ ʔanaː mtzwːd͡ʒ baːmrʔaa flˤstˤjnjaʶ dˤrˤb ʔaχmaːsaː bʔasdaːs maːðaː lw fʃil faʔiinːahum laʔaːkilwna minhaː famaːliʔiwna minhaaː aʶːlˤbuʶtˤwnaʶ jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tlʕb hl fhmt "ʔanaː lm ʔafhm btaːtaː" waqijla lilʃːaʕbijːi fij naaːʔiibaain kajfa ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħt qaaːla bal ʔaaʕrifuk qaːlwaː tˤaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶkuʶm maʕakum ʔaaʔiin ðukːirtum bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifwna θumːa ʔiinːa lahum ʕalajhaː laʃawbanaː min ħamjmin wajuwħiʃu mink aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶjnaʶ laː ttrknj wħjdaː ʔakrh rʔujtk ħzjna ʔaʶmdˤt ljlaː jwmaː kaːmlaː bdwn tnaːwl dwaːʔ ħjwjː qaːm saːmj baʶːlˤtˤːlˤb θm aʶːntðˤrˤ ʔaan jakuwna salijma aːlfikri min hamːin qaʶaʶːtˤiʶʕiʶn waʔiinːa min aːlbajaaːni lasiħranaː aːʕtnq saːmj aːlʔislaːm ħdjθaː ʔarjd aːlʕjʃ hnaː waʔiiðaaː aːlʕiʃaːru ʕuʶtˤːiʶlˤaʶt sʔal mdrːsaː ʔaːχr maʔaχuwðun biwizrihaaː wqʕ saːmj fj ħbː ftaːa ttbʕj mn fdˤlˤk wawaʕada biaːlbaðli waaːlnːawaaːli ʔaalːaː taʕlwaː ʕalajːa waʔatwnj muslimjna ʔiin ʕudta ʔiilaaː aːlðːanbi falan ʔausaaːmiħaka knt mdʕwaː lm jkn saːmj naːʔimaː walaaː tusrifuwaː biaːlmanzilaai waaːlħaaːli faʔiinːa liðij aːlmanzilaai aːlrːafijʕaai fij aːlzːijːi qadranaː waʔaaʕrabuwaː biaːlsːuʔuaaːli ʕan naʶqsˤiʶhiʶm kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔajn hw sˤfːh ʔinj ʔaʶsˤlˤj aʶːstjqðˤ saːmj brsaːla sˤwtjːaʶ mn ljlaː wadawlaau aːlʕaaːqili kaaːlnːasijbi aːlːaðij jaħinːu ʔilaaː aʶːlˤwaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶiʶ smʕ twm sˤwtaʶː ʁrjbaː kaːn saːmj jħbː d͡ʒlb aːlaːntbaːh waʔaataaː rad͡ʒulun ʕalijːa bna ʔaabij ʔaarsalnaːka ʃaːhidanaː wamubaʃːiranaː wanaðjranaː tˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aʶːlˤʕaʶsˤfuʶwrˤuʶ waʶaʶːlˤmuʶnqaʶtˤiʶʕuʶ ʕanhum waħʃijːanaː walaaː aːstawlat ʕalajhi rˤuʶtˤuʶwbaʶaʶuʶ aːlharimi wabalːiʁ biʔaawd͡ʒazi waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qaljlanaː maː taʃkurwna faʔaatbaʕwhum muʃriqjna jaðhabu aːltːilmjðu ʔiilaaː aːlmadrasaai km ʕmrk laː ʔaʕrf ʔilːaː hðaː faʔiiðaaː taqarːara lahu aːlrːaʔaju ʔaʶaʶmdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ falam maːrj" warubːamaaː kaaːnat dˤaʶaʶːrˤːaʶaʶaʶn jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jtmtːʕ bħjaːth maː hw ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mkaːn jmkn ʃraːʔ aːllːħm mnh bikam taʃtarija aːlburtuqaːlaaa man ħaaːðara lam jahlaʕ ʔinhaː ttnaːwl faʕalajhi kufruhu waman ʕamila sˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː faliʔaanfusihim jamhadwna ʔajː mnhm hw fj aːlmlʕb ʔaanːaː sˤaʶbaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlmaːʔa sˤaʶbːaʶnaʶː walaw naʃaːʔu lamasaχnaːhum ʕalaː makaːnatihim famaaː aʶːstaʶtˤaʶːʕwaʶː muʶdˤiʶjːaʶnaʶː walaː jard͡ʒiʕwna balaaː jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi waʔaabaaːħahu waʶħaʶðˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶ waqalbanaː ʃaaːkiranaː jaħtariqu aʶːlˤħaʶtˤaʶbuʶ waaːlqudraau ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ min d͡ʒiʔiti kaj ʔaataʕalːama ʔaħdhm ʕlaː aːlbaːb baːrk aːllh fjk ʔarsl saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aːlrːsaːʔil lljlaː ʔaʃd͡ʒʕ mn djk lqd tˤʕnt mdrːsj ħdːd saːmj mwʕdaː laːd͡ʒtmaːʕ ʔaːχr mʕ rʔijs aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ takalːamta faʕalajk ʔaaw lak mtaː nsˤlˤ ʔiinaːhum ʕlaː ʕlm wʔaχjranaː wd͡ʒdt mfaːtjħhaː aːlmfqwda rmaː aːlkra waaːltːaklijfu jad͡ʒmaʕu ʔaamranaː biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶn wanahjanaː ʕan maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶn waʔaamːaː ʕaːdun faʔauhlikwaː birjħin sˤaʶrˤsˤaʶrˤiʶn ʕaːtijaain kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔajn hw qsmh waʔiin kaaːna naqlu aʶːlˤtˤːiʶbaʶaʶːʕiʶ ʕasiranaː lak biʶaʶːlˤrˤːiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːltːadrijd͡ʒi jashulu minhaaː maaː aʶːuʶstuʶsˤʕiʶbaʶ rʔajt ðlk bʔam ʕjnj sjtqaːʕd ʔabj aːlrbjʕ aːlmqbl ʔaʶjqðˤ mn ðʔib ðhb saːmj lˤjsˤtˤaʶːd aːljwm aʶːlˤqiʶtˤːuʶ ʔaaluwfun jnaːsbhaː aːlfstaːn aːlʔazrq laaː tuhmil duruwsaka ʃtˤbt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ ʔasmaːʔ aːlʕdjd mn aːlmʃtbhjn baːlrːʁm mn mʃaːrka d͡ʒmjʕ skːaːn aːlmdjna fj aːlbħθ laː ʔaħd wd͡ʒd aʶːlˤtˤːflˤ aʶːlˤsˤːʁjrˤ faʶːdˤlˤ qaːlwaː rabːunaː jaʕlamu ʔiinːaː ʔiilajkum lamursalwna sʔaðhb lʔiqlaːl saːmj mn mnzl ljlaː aːqtrbt ljlaː nħw saːmj w qbːlth fj d͡ʒanːaːti aːlnːaʕjmi ʔiinːa aːlmutːaqjna fj d͡ʒanːaːtin wanaʕjmin saːmj laː jzaːl mrˤjdˤaʶː ʕndnaː hw fj aːlʁrfa aːlsːaːdsa rʔajt saːmj fj aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ hl knt tʃrb wahaðihi ħaaːlu man laaː jaraaː linafsihi qadranaː hl hðh aːlsmka laːzaːlt ħjːh ʔaχð saːmj drwsaː waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu liʔiibraaːhijma bni aːlmahdijːi kamaaː qaaːla aʶːlˤd͡ʒaʶaʶːħiʶðˤuʶ fij kitaaːbi aːlbajaaːni ʔinːij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ hudanaː laaː saaːʔiilu nadanaː qmnaː mn θwra dˤd ʔiħdaː aʶːlˤʔiʶmbrˤaʶːtˤwrˤjaʶːt fabaʃːarnaːhu biʁulaːmin ħaljmin qd jχlq mn ðˤhrˤ aːlʕaːlm d͡ʒaːhlaːan walaaː juʔuχaðu minhaaː ʕadlun walaaː hum juʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ waʔiið qulnaaː lilmalaaːʔiikaai aːsd͡ʒuduwaː liʔaːdama fasad͡ʒaduwaː ʔiilːaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaːaː waaːstakbara wakaaːna mina aːlkaaːfirijna laː tzaːl ljlaː fj χtˤrˤ jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔinːaaː nazalnaaː daaːranaː fakaθura fijhaaː ʕadadunaaː nd͡ʒħt aːlħmla wfaːz hw fj aːlʔintχaːbaːt liʁadin qaːla firʕawnu wamaː rabːu aːlʕaːlamjna lilːahi maː fij aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiinːa aːllːaha huwa aːlʁanijːu aːlħamjdu kaːnt sˤdjqaʶ saːmj tχwnh ʕlj ʃħn haːtfj aːld͡ʒwaːl waħasbu man haðaaː ʔaad͡ʒruhu ʔaan jaltamisa ʕalajhi ʔaad͡ʒranaː watasahːalat ʕalajhi ʔaaʃd͡ʒaaːnuhu lm jkn saːmj jrjd ʔan jqdˤj wqtaː fj aːlsːd͡ʒn aːlmdrsa ljst lj kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanːh kaːn fj χtˤrˤ kaːn aːlwld wld aːlwld maː salakakum fj saqara waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlrːaħmani bnu zajdin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː saːmj jħbː ʕsˤjrˤ aʶːlˤbtˤːjχ aːlʔaħmr aːdːʕaː saːmj ʔanːh mmrˤːdˤ fj mstʃfaː baːlqaːhra ʕndmaː sjtmː ʔiʁlaːq aːlʕjaːda kaːn saːmj fj ʁjbwba bsbb nqsˤ aːlsːkːr fj aːldːm maːðaː qlt ʁaaːmat aːlsːamaaːʔu walam tuʶmtˤiʶrˤ lmaːðaː tbkjn jaː maːrj ʃrb aːlqljl salaːmun ʕalaː ʔiil jaːsjna saːmj wqʕ ʕn waqubħi ðikrihi fij dahrihi lmaːðaː ʃrbt tlk aʶːlˤʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ ʔaanaaːʕimaaun hij ʔaam χaʃinaaun bjn wʕdh wʔind͡ʒaːzh ftra nbj bjnhm daːʔ aʶːlˤdˤrˤaʶːʔiʶrˤ t waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔiðaaː tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ rad͡ʒulaaːni ʔaamranaː ðˤaʶfiʶrˤaʶ bihi ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶhuʶmaʶaʶː muruwʔaaan χajrun manʃuwrun waʃarːun mastuwrun rkn saːmj sjːaːrth rtb ʁrftk watawalːa ʕanhum ħatːaː ħjnin kaːn jdˤaʶːd͡ʒʕ mdrːsth jmknk ʔan tbdʔa waʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb lahum maθalanaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːlqarjaai ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔahaaː aːlmursalwna faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː raswla rabːihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan raːbijaaan waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ wamahːilhum qaljlanaː laː tns waʔiiðaaː dˤaʶaʶːqaʶ labisa ʔaaħsanahaaː kaːn saːmj msjħjːaː ʔind͡ʒjljːaː mχlˤsˤaʶː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːltːaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː laaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː nasijtu maːðaː tqwljn waaːtːabiʕ maː jwħaː ʔiilajka min rabːika ʔiinːa aːllːaha kaːna bimaː taʕmalwna χabjranaː ʔad͡ʒml aːlʕjwn wʔakðbhaː ʕjwn aːlnsaːʔ kaːn aːld͡ʒw baːrdaːan aːlbaːrħa ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶ saːmj fj ktaːba bʕdˤ aːlklmaːt klbj χaːʔif mn aːlmaːʔ fij aːlħamjmi θumːa fij aːlnːaːri jusd͡ʒarwna fjhimaː ʕajnaːni naʶdˤːaʶːχaʶtaʶːniʶ waaːlsːuʔuaaːlu mabðalaaun nħn dˤd aːlħrb laː tns ʔanːh twd͡ʒd mlk aːlʁaːba lqd d͡ʒʔinaː ldʕwtk llʕʃaːʔ liʔaanːa maaː ʔaadːaaː ʔilaaː aːlχajri fahuwa fij nafsihi nfhm ðlk tilka ʔiiðanaː qismaaun dˤjzaʶː wamaː juʁnj ʕanhu maːluhu ʔiiðaː taradːaː walaqad ʔaarsalnaː fjhim munðirjna nql saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmrkz aʶːlˤsˤːħːj aːlbaːrħa kaːn jwm aːlχmjs ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj mdrːsj fj aːlʕlwm aːlʔislaːmjːa swf ʔaðhb lʔastdfʔi aːlθld͡ʒ jnhmr wamaː ʔaːtajnaːhum min kutubin jadruswnahaː wamaː ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilajhim qablaka min naðjrin tad͡ʒifːu aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤuʶ liʔaanːa ʁaaːjatahu ʔaan jaʕdama aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶfaʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤuʶ faʶdˤlˤaʶhuʶm jkrh saːmj klː maː jrˤbtˤh bljlaː ðlika ʕaːlimu aːlʁajbi waaːlʃːahaːdaai aːlʕazjzu aːlrːaħjmu aːlħjaːa mstmrːa baːlnːsba lsaːmj ʔarjdkmaː ʔan tsʕdaː hija waʔiin ʔaadnatnij minhaaː faqad sˤaʶaʶːnaʶtniʶj ʕanhaaː ħatːaaː rubːamaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶaʶː biʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ ʔilaaː aːltːalafi min ʁajri nikaaːjaain fij ʕaduwːin walaaː ʔiʶdˤrˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶn bimaħsuwdi walaaː nihaaːjaaun maħduwdaaun jaqnaʕu bihaaː ʔaam lahum ʔiilhun ʁajru aːllːahi subħaːna aːllːahi ʕamːaː juʃrikwna laaː tusrifuwaː fij aːltːaħrijmi wahaðaaː qawlu aːlsːudːijːi ʔanaː ʔadrs aʶːlˤtˤːb waʔiið qaaːla rabːuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinːij d͡ʒaaːʕilun fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ χalijfaaan jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi maaː ʔaʶaʶqsˤaʶrˤaʶhaʶaʶː man lahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa faljaqum aːlsjf ʔaʶsˤdq ʔanbaːʔ mn aːlktb sjf aʶːlˤslˤtˤaʶːn tˤwjlˤ tχaʶːsˤmaʶː saːmj w ljlaː fj aːlmħlː ʔamaːm aːld͡ʒmjʕ mn aʶːlˤwaʶːdˤħ ʔanː mdrːsk ljs ldjh ʔaχlaːq ʔant lst ʔad͡ʒnbjːaː fj aːlʕjaːda θumːa d͡ʒaːʔahum maː kaːnwaː jwʕadwna nħn nħb bʕdˤnaʶː aʶːlˤbʕdˤ faʔiinːa aːlrːaʁbaaa waaːlrːahbaaa ʔiðaaː aːd͡ʒtamaʕaaː ʕalaaː aːlnːafsi ðalːat lahumaaː waaːnqaaːdat laː jʕtqd saːmj ʔanː ljlaː tʕrːft ʕljh ħrs aːlħaːrs aːlljl btˤwlˤh tʕrˤːdˤ saːmj llaːħtraːq bjnmaː kaːn fj ʁjbwba waaːktisaaːbi aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ħjaːa saːmj kaːrθa brmːthaː waqaaːla baʃːaaːrun ʔaaʔaantum ʔaaʃadːu χalqanaː ʔaami aːlsːamaːʔu banaːhaː maː mn tˤrˤjqaʶ ʔaχraː waqijla lihindi binti aːlħasani waʶaʶːlˤbaʶʁdˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ tuʔuawːalu ʔilaaː aːlʕadaaːwaai kaːnt ljlaː tfwħ mnhaː raːʔiħa aːlkħwl stʃʕr btħsːn ʁdaː ʔaʕdk bðlk laaː turaaːfiq aːlʔaaʃraaːra lakum fjhaː faːkihaaun kaθjraaun minhaː taʔakulwna θumːa lijaħðar aːtːibaaːʕahu fijmaaː jud͡ʒaaːnibu aːldːijna waʶjuʶdˤaʶaʶːdːuʶ aːlħaqːa muwaaːfaqaaan liraʔajihi wamutaaːbaʕaaan lihawaaːhu tʁlːb saːmj ʕlaː mhaːd͡ʒmh w qtlh waʶaʶːħfaʶðˤuʶwaʶː furuwd͡ʒakum fahuwa fij aːχtijaaːrihi maluwmun hal jaħsunu bihi ʔaan jaraaː liwaħʃi aːlbahaaːʔiimi ʕalajhi faʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː ljlaː mmrˤːdˤaʶ ðaːt ʃhaːda "ʔaːh ʔiðn ʔanti waːħda mnːaː" ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna fatanuwaː aːlmuʔuminjna waaːlmuʔuminaːti θumːa lam jatwbwaː falahum ʕaðaːbu d͡ʒahanːama walahum ʕaðaːbu aːlħarjqi wamaː ʔaarsalnaː fj qarjaain min naðjrin ʔiilːaː qaːla mutrafwhaː ʔiinːaː bimaː ʔaursiltum bihi kaːfirwna ʔauʁlqt aːlʕjaːda kaːn saːmj jlʕn kaːn saːmj ʕaːda maː jdχl w jʁaːdr aːlmstʃfaː aːns ʔamrhm jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː ʔaʶaʶtˤjʕuʶwaʶː aːllːaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrːaswla walaː tuʶbtˤiʶlˤwaʶː ʔaaʕmaːlakum ʁaːlbaː maː ʔansaː ʔan ʔafrʃ ʔasnaːnj faðakːir ʔiin nafaʕati aːlðːikraː waman kaaːna mutawaqːiʕanaː lam jakun mutawad͡ʒːiʕanaː waqad ʔaanbaʔaa aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː fij kitaaːbihi aːlʕazijzi ʔaaχbaaːranaː waʔiiðkaaːranaː faqaaːla subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː ðhb saːmj lʔiqlaːl ʔaχth mn aːlmdrsa ʔauwlʔiika fj d͡ʒanːaːtin mukramwna waman tafraħuwaː bimaaː ʔaːtaaːkum hw jħbːhaː w hj tħbːh ʔaʶjdˤaʶː waʶjaʶsˤiʶfuʶhuʶ biʶfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶħaʶ jansubuhaaː ʔilajhi faʔiin kaaːna aːldːaaːʕij dijnijːanaː tʕrˤːdˤt ljlaː lˤdˤrˤb ʃdjd hðaː aːlmdrːs faaːlzːijaaːdaau min aːlχajri χajrun wajulbisuk θawba aːlwaqaaːri ʔaħqːaː sjðhb twm ʔilaː bwstˤn lwħdh waaːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ʕitqun ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanːa tˤaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶqaʶ aːlʔiinsaaːni min dalaaːʔiili faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ waʶħuʶsˤːiʶlˤaʶ maː fij aʶːlˤsˤːuʶdwrˤiʶ hw ljs ʁjwraː waaːlbaðaaːʔu min aːld͡ʒafaaːʔi waaːld͡ʒafaaːʔu fij aːlnːaaːri faqaaːla hija aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlbalwaaː aːlʕafwu ʕan ʕaduwːanaː qad aːstaħkamat ʃaħnaaːʔuuhu aːntbh fθmːa sjaːra qaːdma fasanujasːiruhu liljusraː kaːn saːmj jtnaːwl aːlkθjr mn aːldːwaːʔ ʔaatːaχaðnaːhum siχrijːanaː ʔaam zaːʁat ʕanhumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːrˤuʶ ʔaad͡ʒru aːlmuʕalːimi kaʔaad͡ʒri aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶmiʶ aːlqaaːʔiimi ʔin kunt maaː qult faʁafara aːllːahu lij ðarnj waman χalaqtu waħjdanaː waqaaːla naʶsˤrˤuʶ bnu ʔaaħmada aːlχubzu ʔaamːaaː baʕdu faʔiinːa ʃarafa aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤuʶwbiʶ biʃarafi nataaːʔiid͡ʒihi faqulnaaː aʶːdˤrˤiʶbuʶwhuʶ biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶhaʶaʶː kaðaaːlika juħjij aːllːahu aːlmawtaaːaː wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi laʕalːakum aːbna ðiʔibin ʔaabtaʁij aːlfiqha ʕindahu faʶtˤaʶlˤːaʶqaʶ ħatːaaː aːlbatːi tabːat ʔaanaaːmiluhu ʔaʶuʶtˤaʶlˤːiʶquʶ fij mn jdrːsk aːlfrnsja warad͡ʒulun ħaaːʔiirun biʔaamrihi laaː jaʔatamiru ruʃdanaː fjhimaː ʕajnaːni tad͡ʒrijaːni d͡ʒbaːn kaːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa waʔaani aːʕbudwnj hðaː sˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqjmun aːlθːawbu naʶðˤiʶjfuʶn ʔaqsaː mn sˤχrˤaʶ ljs baʶːlˤdˤrˤwrˤaʶ waqaaːla aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤuʶ bnu sahlin lm zmjl aːlʕml aːdʕaː ʔan aːlħaːfla faːtth aːlqrʃ aʶːlˤʔaʶbjdˤ jnfʕ fj aːljwm aːlʔaswd ʕalːimuwaː walaaː tuʕanːifuwaː faʔiinːa aːlmuʕalːima χajrun min aːlmuʕanːifi hl ʔabdw d͡ʒjːda subħaːna rabːi ʔaanaaː saaːbiqu aːlʕarabi tðkːrt ʔamwraː kθjra waaːʃtaʕala aːlrːaʔasu ʃajbanaː ʔawdː ʔan ʔaʶqdˤj aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt mʕ ʕmːtj waaːlːaðj d͡ʒaːʔa biʶaʶːlˤsˤːiʶdqiʶ waʶsˤaʶdːaʶqaʶ bihi ʔauwlʔiika humu aːlmutːaqwna saːmj jkrh hðh aːlklma kaːn ldaː ljlaː ʔarbʕa ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ mn ʔarbʕa rd͡ʒaːl mχtlfjn waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj ʔirsaːl aːlrːsaːʔil lljlaː wfj jwm mn aːlʔajaːm aːntħr waaːfzaʕ ʔilaaː aːstiʃaaːraai aːlʕulamaaːʔi faʔiinːij qarijbun maʶdˤaʶt ʔaabwaaːbun taʶdˤaʶmːaʶnaʶt fuʶsˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː raʔaajtu ʔitbaaːʕahaaː bimaaː lam ʔauħibːa aːlʔiiχlaaːla bihi ʔiinːahu huwa jubdiʔiu wajuʕjdu aːlχaaːdimu naʶðˤːaʶfaʶ aːlʁurfaaa hðh aːlbjʔia mfʕma baːlħjaːa fajaʕtaqiduwna ʔaanːa qawlahu ħaqːun mutːabaʕun qbltu rsaːltk baːlʔams kaaːalːaðij rawaaːhu ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶn ʕan d͡ʒaaːbirin qaaːla lqd aʶːtːsˤlˤt bh mslːħa w χtˤjrˤaʶ kaːd aːlfqr ʔan jkwn kfraːan kaːlʔibra tksj ʁjrhaː whj ʕrjaːna baaːta aʶːlˤmaʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶ mutaʔaalːimanaː waqad qaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn sʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlmzjd mn qaljlanaː θumːa naʶdˤtˤaʶrˤːuʶhuʶm ʔiilaː ʕaðaːbin ʁaʶlˤjðˤiʶn lm jθq faʶːdˤlˤ bðlk aːldːwaːʔ dmrt kl aːlʔadla waðukira ʔaanːa fij aːltːawraaːai maktuwbanaː jaaː aːbna ʔaːdama aːuðkurnij ħijna wahuwa ʕalaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadjrun faʔiinːa lahu maʕijʃaaan dˤaʶnkaʶnaʶː jaχrud͡ʒu min bajni aʶːlˤsˤːuʶlˤbiʶ waaːltːaraːʔiibi aːlχajru fij aːlqurʔaːni kulːihi aːlmaaːlu ʔanaː mwd͡ʒwd fj bwstn mnð tʃrjn bitadbijrihi ʔaj lwn tħb ʔakθr aːlʔazrq ʔam aːlʔaħmr hlːaː ʃaːrktnaː aːlħdjθ ʔarjd fqtˤ ʔid͡ʒaːba sˤrˤjħaʶ laː ʔakθr ql ʔaːʔaːʔaːʔaːʔaːh waʔiin kaaːnat ʔaʶaʶfsˤaʶħaʶ waʶʔaʶaʶwdˤaʶħaʶ liaːʕtijaaːdi fij aʶːlˤbuʶtˤwniʶ ʔaalaaː tasʔaalu qaaːla wawad͡ʒadaka ʕaːʔiilanaː faʔaaʁnaː ʔaaw manaħahu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶfħaʶ waaːlʕafwa ʕlm blaː ʕml kʃd͡ʒr blaː θmr ʁaːbt lʔanhaː mrˤjdˤaʶ waʔiinːahum lanaː mslm w laː jqwm bʔajː ʃjʔ mn hðaː qad aʶːqtaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶ θumːa qaʶdˤaʶaʶː faʔaaħsana ʔaʶnqdˤ saːmj ħjaːa ðlk aːlklb wasalaːmun ʕalaaː aːlmursaljna hðaː aːlmdrːs jrhb aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ ʔaħb aʶːlˤqsˤsˤ bihi ʕamanaː wakamaaː ʔaanːahu jaʶsˤuʶwnuʶ lisaaːnahu ʕan ðalika fahakaðaaː jaʶsˤuʶwnuʶ ʕanhu samʕahu waliʔaahli aːlmaʁribi zijːanaː maʔaluwfanaː tχrd͡ʒt bʔimtjaːz saːmj jʕlm ʔanː ljlaː ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ ʕljh waðwqwaː ʕaðaːba aːlχuldi bimaː kuntum taʕmalwna hw jtʕlːm aːlʔind͡ʒljzjːa aːlktaːb ʕn mlk fqd taːd͡ʒh ʔiinːa fj ðlika laðikraː liman kaːna lahu qalbun ʔaaw ʔaalqaaː aːlsːamʕa wahuwa ʃahjdun qaaːluwaː ħðfh hw ʁjwr kulːu nafsin bimaː kasabat rahjnaaun ðhb saːmj ʔilaː mstʃfaː fj nhaːra aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːf saːmj qsˤjrˤ bkθjr ʕn ljlaː jbdw ʔan aːlsjd tnaːkaː aːd͡ʒtaːz aːlʔimtħaːn falam jakun fijhi maaː kaaːna fij haðajni waʔiin sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶhaʶaʶː fij madħin lam juʃkar ʔaχj jrkb hðh aːldraːd͡ʒa futħt aːlbwaːba mn tlqaːʔ nfshaː waʔaanbatnaː ʕalajhi ʃad͡ʒaraaan min jaʶqtˤjniʶn hw fj χjmth sʔaklːmh bʃʔan aːlmwsjqaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːχbaʶ walaaː liqadrihi nihaaːjaaun wamin aːlʃːidːaai maaː tˤaʶaʶːqaʶt naʕam ʕarad͡ʒa ʕalajnaaː haðaaː biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ kaːn aːlʔalm fðˤjʕaʶːaʶn waʔiinːa rabːaka lajaʕlamu maː tukinːu sˤuʶdwrˤuʶhuʶm wamaː juʕlinwna saːmj laː jtðkːr tfaʶːsˤjlˤ aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ tˤuʶrˤjd saːmj mn aːlʕjaːda jd͡ʒnj zwd͡ʒj maːʔia ʔalf dwlaːr snwjaː ʕindahaː d͡ʒanːaau aːlmaʔawaː rbːaː saːmj ʔawlaːdh fj aːldːjn aːlmsjħj ʔajn saːmj bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʔaaraʔaajta aːlːaðj jukaðːibu biaːldːjni falamːaː kaʃafnaː ʕanhumu aːlʕaðaːba ʔiiðaː hum jankuθwna wamaaː aːstaʁnaaː mustabidːun waqaːlwaː ʔaːmanːaː bihi waʔaanːaː lahumu aːltːanaːwuʃu min makaːnin baʕjdin waħukija ʔaanːa ʕalijːa bna ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu qaaːla liʕaaːmiri bni murːaaa aːlzːuhrijːi faʔiinːahu ʔin juqadːir lak aːlsːalaaːmaaa taslam walajsa fij haðihi aːlʔaumuwri sarafun waʔiinːamaaː kaaːna ðalika minhu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʕalaaː aːlwad͡ʒhi aːlːaðij ðakarnaaːhu ʕaːd saːmj llʕjʃ fj aːlmkaːn aːlðj kaːn jʕjʃ fjh saːbqaː waaːlːaðj huwa juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶnj wajasqjni laː aːʕrf kjf ʔastχdm aːlʃwka d͡ʒjdaːan ʃaʁalanij tawaqːuʕu balaaːʔiihaaː ʕan aːlfaraħi biraχaaːʔiihaaː wqʕwaː waːħdaːan tlw aːlʔaːχr waaːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔu sukaaːraaː ʔilːaaː man ʕaʶsˤaʶmaʶhuʶ aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː bitawaqːuʕi aːlʁijari ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa raːʔiʕa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi hajhaaːta mink aːlʁinaaː ʔin lam juqniʕk maaː ħawajt aːlːaðj juwaswisu fj sˤuʶdwrˤiʶ aːlnːaːsi ʔaj ktaːb sjfj baʶːlˤʁrˤdˤ falaaː ʃajʔa ʔaawlaaː biʶtˤuʶwlˤiʶ ħabsin min lisaaːnin jaʶqsˤuʶrˤuʶ ʕan aʶːlˤsˤːaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ waqaːla aːlrːaswlu jaː rabːi ʔiinːa qawmij aːtːaχaðwaː hðaaː aːlqurʔaːna mahd͡ʒwranaː ʔinːahu jaʶχtˤuʶbuʶhaʶaʶː linafsihi wajaquwlu lahaaː zawːid͡ʒijnij nafsak ʔauskinuki ʔaajːa ʁurafi dimaʃqa ʃiʔiti ʔaχðt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ saːmj ðukira ʕinda aːlnːabijːi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama rad͡ʒulun faðakara fijhi χajranaː swf aːsʔal twm w maːrj kjf fʕlaː ðlk huwa aːlːaðj jurjkum ʔaːjaːtihi wajunazːilu lakum mina aːlsːamaːʔi rizqanaː wamaː jataðakːaru ʔiilːaː man junjbu wakaθraai aːlʔiid͡ʒraaːmi ʔajn tqtˤn baʶːlˤdˤːbtˤ ħaːwl ʔan tbtlʕ rjqk jakaaːdu aːlbarqu jaʶχtˤaʶfuʶ ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶhuʶm bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlsːamaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶːrˤiʶqiʶ «aːlʔinsaːn jwld fj ʃkl "aːlwaːw" wħjn juqawːimu nfsh jðˤn ʔanh “ʔalf” aːlʁamaaːmu kaθijfun walaaː jalzamu ʃukranaː ʕalaaː nuʕmaaː waaːstinkaaːranaː limahaaːnaai aʶːlˤnːaʶqsˤiʶ waʶmaʶdˤaʶrˤːaʶaʶiʶ aːlkaðibi ʕalajhi trjd kʔasaːan ʔaːχr mn aːlʃaːj ʔaʕddt lk kʔasaːan mnð lˤħðˤaʶːt qljla ljs ldaː saːmj drws hðaː aʶːlˤsˤːbaʶːħ baːltʔakjd laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔafʕl maː qaːm bfʕlh twm qbl qljl waʔiin taʶwaʶsːaʶtˤaʶ waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶdaʶ fijhi kaaːna maʕruwfanaː wabirːanaː maħmuwdanaː ʕml saːmj fj wzaːra aʶːlˤsˤːħːaʶ waliðalika qaaːla rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama laː jmknnj tħml tkaːljf aːlsfr lˤlˤʕtˤlˤaʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlnːawaaːʔiibi wahaðaaː ʔaaʕlaaː manaaːzili aːlqanaaːʕaai twm lm jkn jtsˤwrˤ ʔanh baːmkaːn maːrj aːlqjaːm bʔamr khðaː wamanzilaain rafijʕaain ħalːahaaː biʁajri faʶdˤlˤiʶn jabijtu aːlbaħru haaːʔiid͡ʒanaː qaaːla ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum ʔiinːij ʔaaʕlamu ʁajba aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aːstmʕ saːmj llrːsaːla aʶːlˤsˤːwtjːaʶ ljlaː tħbː aːlqjl w aːlqaːl ʔaʶdˤʕt rqm haːtfk aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ mfjda lˤlˤsˤħaʶ aːudχul aːlbustaːna wamatːiʕ nafsaka biʶmaʶnðˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶ walaaː taʕbaθ biʔaazhaːrihi waθimaːrihi θumːa ʔaahluk waqijla liʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu faqad rawaaː ʔaabuw hurajraaa qaaːla ʔinhm jraːqbwn maː jħdθ ʕn kθb faʔaaχaðatkumu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶuʶ waʔaantum taʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ wakaaːna aːlfarad͡ʒu minhu qarijbanaː waʶdˤaʶʕuʶfaʶ ʔiχaaːʔuuhu kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ hw ʃrjk raːmj aːld͡ʒdjd kalːaː bal raːna ʕalaː qulwbihim maː kaːnwaː jaksibwna ðhb twm ʔilaː bwstˤn mʕ sˤdjq maː taðaru min ʃajʔin ʔaatat ʕalajhi ʔiilːaː d͡ʒaʕalathu kaaːlrːamjmi ʔinh qlq bsbb mrˤdˤ waːldh ʃadːa aːltːilmjðu aːlħabla klb ħj χjr mn ʔasd mjt waaːllːajli wamaː wasaqa waaːlʕaqla lanaaː murʃidanaː fajuθbita maaː kaaːna muwaaːfiqanaː wasababu aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ hud͡ʒuwmu maaː takrahuhu aːlnːafsu mimːan duwnahaaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lmzjd mn aːlwqt lʔanhj waːd͡ʒbj ʔaaħsin ʔilj aːlnaːs tstʕbd qlwbhm waħijna jarhabu fad͡ʒumiʕa aːlsːaħaraau limjqaːti jawmin maʕlwmin hl aːistmtʕt bwqtk mʕ aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ mn jrjd aːlħrb ʔaʶsˤbħ faʶːdˤlˤ ʃχsˤaʶː χtˤjrˤaʶː lm jsbq lljlaː w ʔan rʔat d͡ʒmlaː fj ħjaːthaː ʕθrt ʕl twm jdχn aːlnrd͡ʒjla aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʕan aːlzːuhdi faqaaːla waʔaufrida biaːlħaaːdiθaai baʕda ʔaan kaaːna mukaaːfijanaː waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi faqaaːla ʕafːirij hðaː maː twʕadwna likulːi ʔaawːaːbin ħaʶfjðˤiʶn χajru manzilin law kaaːna aːllːahu balːaʁanij qatla ʔaarbaʕaain fataqarːabtu ʔilajhi bidimaaːʔiihim laː ljs mʕj waqijla man qalːa tawaqːijhi kaθurat masaaːwiʔiuhu laː jaʔakuluhu ʔiilːaaː aʶːlˤχaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶwnaʶ ʕaːd ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤːħrˤaʶːʔ kaːn haːtf ljlaː ʕnd saːmj aːltqjt btwm qbl aːlʔaːn waʔiiðaː tutlaː ʕalajhim ʔaːjaːtunaː bajːinaːtin qaːla aːlːaðjna kafarwaː lilħaqːi lamːaː d͡ʒaːʔahum hðaː siħrun mubjnun aːlʔaːbaːʔ jħbwn ʔawlaːdhm wajad͡ʒʕalu sitra aːlmuruwʔaai mahtuwkanaː aːlhawaaː malikun ʁaʃuwmun walaaː juwalːij makrumaaan mn mħaːsn aːlqaːmws aːlʔilktrwnj ʔanh shl aːlħml aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː maaː taʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ ʔaawqaaːtuhu min razijːaain qad ʔaad͡ʒhadahu aːlħuznu ʕalajhaaː w ʔant ʕʃ jwmaːan blaː hm tʕʃ jwmaːan χaːldaːan waqaaːla qawmun waman kataba aːlħadijθa qawijat ħud͡ʒːatuhu wamaː ʔaanta bihaːdij aːlʕumji ʕan dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤaʶtiʶhiʶm ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiilːaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaːtinaː fahum muslimwna hdːd saːmj bqtl ljlaː fj aːlʕʃraːt mn aːlrːsaːʔil aːlnːamijmaau danaaːʔaaun waaːlsːiʕaaːjaau radaaːʔaaun kaaːld͡ʒadali aːlːaðij takuwnu fijhi aʶːlˤmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶ ʔiin kaːnat ʔiilːaː sˤaʶjħaʶaʶaʶn waːħidaaan faʔiiðaː hum d͡ʒamjʕun ladajnaː muʶħdˤaʶrˤwnaʶ tfaːd͡ʒʔunj daːʔimaː jaː twm waʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶ aːlrːad͡ʒuli sirːa ʁajrihi ʔaaqbaħu min ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶ sirːa nafsihi taħarːawaː aʶːlˤsˤːiʶdqaʶ waʔiin raʔaajtum ʔaanːa fijhi aːlhalakaaa faʔiinːa fijhi aːlnːad͡ʒaaːaa ʔaalam nad͡ʒʕali aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ kifaːtanaː walaaː tastadijmu baʕdahaaː ʔin knt tðˤn aːltʕljm mklfanaː faʶːntðˤrˤ ħtaː traː maː jklfk aːld͡ʒhl twm ljs mtrd͡ʒm hl bʔimkaːnkm ʔid͡ʒraːʔ bʕdˤ aːltʕdjlaːt ʕlaː hðh aʶːlˤbdˤaʶːʕaʶ faːntqmnaː mnhm wʔinhmaː lbʔimaːm mbjn ʔam χlqnaː aːlmlaːʔika ʔinaːθaː whm ʃaːhdwn aːlʔaraːnb lhm ʔaːðaːn tˤwjlˤaʶ md͡ʒrd kwnhaː fj qaːʕda bjaːnaːt ttwjbaː laː jʕnj ʔanhaː d͡ʒmlaun hl jmkn ʔan tʔaχðnj ʔilaː aːlsjnmaː
