waʔaahlahu ʔiilːaaː aːmraʔaatahu kaaːnat mina aːlʁaaːbirijna jʕtbrwnh btˤlˤaʶːaʶn fʔiðaː aːlnd͡ʒwm tˤmst stwaːd͡ʒhk kθjr mn aʶːlˤsˤʕwbaʶːt ʕsˤaʶːhaʶː daːlk aːlwld samiʕtu rsuwla aːllhi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama jaquwlu: qaːm ljħjjnj faqaaːla lahum wamanaaːaa aːlθːaaːliθaaa aːlʔauχraaː waaːmtanaʕa min ħaaːsidijhi jaaː bunajːa aːlʁarijbu man lajsa lahu ħabijbun lqd nðˤft ħðaːʔik ʔaljs kðlk kaʔaamθaaːli aːllːuʔuluʔui aːlmaknuwni θumːa nunad͡ʒːij aːlːaðijna aːtːaqawaː wanaðaru aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ fijhaaː d͡ʒiθijːanaː ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlwaaːriθuwna waaːlmalaku ʕalaaː ʔaard͡ʒaaːʔiihaaː wajaħmilu ʕarʃa rabːika fawqahum jawmaʔiiðin θamaaːnijaaun aːnt ħjaːtj sʔafkr fjk kl jwm bʕd rħjlj rbnaː ʔaχrd͡ʒnaː mnhaː fʔin ʕdnaː fʔinaː ðˤaʶːlˤmwn bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːaaːsu aːtːaquwaː rabːakum ʔiinːa zalzalaaa aːlsːaaːʕaai ʃajʔun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn jnbʁj ʔalaː tutad͡ʒaːhl hðh aːlmʃkla bsrʕa walaaː tamʃi fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ maraħanaː ʔiinːaka lan taχriqa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ walan tabluʁa aːld͡ʒibaaːla tˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː laː tqlq ʔalm ʔaql ʔan kl ʃʔi sjd͡ʒrj ʕlaː maː jraːm wlqd ʔaːtjnaː mwsaː whaːrwn aːlfrqaːn wdˤjaʶːʔ wðkraː llmtqjn jnbʁj ʔan tqrʔa ktbaː mfjda lk kalːanaː ʔinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lˤiʶjaʶtˤʁaʶaʶː ʔaan raʔaːhu aːstaʁnaaː wʔaːχrwn mrd͡ʒwn lʔamr aːllh ʔimaː jʕðbhm wʔimaː jtwb ʕljhm waːllh ʕljm ħkjm faʔaasri biʔaahlika biʶqiʶtˤʕiʶn mina aːllːajli waaːtːabiʕ ʔaadbaaːrahum walaaː jaltafit minkum ʔaaħadun waʶaʶːmdˤuʶwaʶː ħajθu tuʔumaruwna ʁaːdr faʶːdˤlˤ mnzlh fj aːlʕaːʃra sˤbaʶːħaʶː tntd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːlsjaːraːt fkfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː bjnnaː wbjnkm ʔin knaː ʕn ʕbaːdtkm lʁaːfljn famaaːli aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː qibalaka muʶhtˤiʶʕiʶjnaʶ falamːaaː raʔaawhu zulfaaan sijʔiat wud͡ʒuwhu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː waqijla haðaaː aːlːaðij kuntum bihi tadːaʕuwna wakaaːna huwa aːlχaaːmisu aːlhaaːliku aːlːaðij qaaːla fijhi ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu sunwjmka aːlmaːʔ ʔaʶχdˤrˤ lqd aʶːχtˤʔaʶt baːχtbaːr fħsˤ aːlħml qaːl rb ʔinj qtlt mnhm nfsaː fʔaχaːf ʔan jqtlwn ʔanta jmknka daːʔimaːan aːlqdwm hnaː qaːl hðaː fraːq bjnj wbjnk sʔanbʔik btʔawjl maː lm tsttˤʕ ʕljh sˤbrˤaʶː ʔarjd ʔan ʔarsl hðaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤd ʔilaː kndaː ʕjnaː jʃrb bhaː ʕbaːd aːllh jfd͡ʒrwnhaː tfd͡ʒjraː aːðhab ʔaanta waʔaaχuwka biʔaːjaaːtij walaaː tanijaaː fij ðikrij bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm tbaːrk aːlðj bjdh aːlmlk whw ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr kaːn aːlkwn ħjnhaː mzjd͡ʒaː saːχnaː mn aːld͡ʒzjʔiaːt lahu mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʔiilaaː aːllːahi turd͡ʒaʕu aːlʔaumuwru hjʔitu aʶːlˤnðˤaʶːm bħjθ laː jsttˤjʕ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒðr aʶːlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː aːlʃaːʃa aːlʔidaːrja ʔauqsm bʔanː laː ʃjʔ ħsˤlˤ hm jħbwn tswnjwkj ʔijkjdaː jħbhaː kθjraː ʔaan taquwluwaː ʔiinːamaaː ʔaunzila aːlkitaaːbu ʕalaaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶtaʶjniʶ min qablinaaː waʔiin kunːaaː ʕan diraaːsatihim laʁaaːfilijna qblt χdj ʔanta mn ʔajna tʕlm hðaː wlaː tχznj jwm jbʕθwn ʔafħsb aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔan jtχðwaː ʕbaːdj mn dwnj ʔawljaːʔ ʔinaː ʔaʕtdnaː d͡ʒhnm llkaːfrjn nzlaː dhsth sjaːra liʔaanːahaaː takuwnu baʶʕdˤaʶnaʶː waʶtaʶbʕiʶjdˤuʶ aːlmaʕnaaː ʔaaʃkalu lahu waʶbaʶʕdˤuʶhuʶ laaː juʁnij ʕan kulːihi mnːaːd jbjʕ aːldːrːaːd͡ʒaːt aːlhwaːʔijːa waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajaftinuwnaka ʕani aːlːaðij ʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilajka litaftarija ʕalajnaaː ʁajrahu waʔiiðanaː laaːtːaχaðuwka χalijlanaː ðhbnaː ʔilaː lndn ʔanaː fqtˤ sʔatrk hðh hnaː waʶtˤaʶlˤħiʶn mːaʶndˤuʶwdiʶn fawarabːika lanasʔaalanːahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna hl hðh sˤwrˤaʶ ʔanta rsmtahaː bnfsk ʔin dˤjʕt mftaːħj fln ʔaqdr ʕlaː ftħ aːlbaːb bal naħnu maħruwmuwna tbaː ʔinh ljʔulmnj ʔan ʔaraː hwjtj tðbl qawlun maʕruwfun wamaʁfiraaun χajrun min sˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶiʶn jatbaʕuhaaː ʔaaðanaː waaːllːahu ʁanijːun ħalijmun twm ʔaraːd aːlʕaʃaaːʔ fj aːlsrjr laː jmlk mnzl mnːaːd ʕlːjːa fqaːl ʔaʶʕtˤjk zbdaːan kʔanh aːldbs wahadajnaaːhu aːlnːad͡ʒdajni ʔaaw ðanbun sˤaʶʁiʶjrˤuʶn tastaʁfiru lahu quwːaau wasaaːʔiilihi bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlsːamaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːrˤiʶqiʶ wasabːiħuwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː bqj aːlbaːb mʁlqanaː tˤwaʶːlˤ aːljwm ʔaʶuʶʕtˤjk χams dqaːʔiq lħl hðh aːlmʃkla sttzwːd͡ʒ brd͡ʒl θrjː qaːl std͡ʒdnj ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sˤaʶːbrˤaʶː wlaː ʔaʶʕsˤj lk ʔamraː aːnthaː kl ʃjʔ d͡ʒahlu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶʁiʶjrˤiʶ maʕðuwrun wakulːuhum ʔaːtijhi jawma aːlqijaaːmaai fardanaː ʔinhu mumtʕ wsˤħj ql mn bjdh mlkwt kl ʃjʔ whw jd͡ʒjr wlaː jd͡ʒaːr ʕljh ʔin kntm tʕlmwn fafahːamnaaːhaaː sulajmaaːna wakulːanaː ʔaːtajnaaː ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wasaχːarnaaː maʕa daaːwuwda aːld͡ʒibaaːla jusabːiħna waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶjrˤaʶ wakunːaaː faaːʕilijna kaːn mnːaːd jbqj qtˤtˤh daːχl aːlmnzl hj tʔaχð msaːfaːt wmn d͡ʒaːʔ baːlsjʔia fkbt wd͡ʒwhhm fj aːlnaːr hl td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kntm tʕmlwn faðarhum ħatːaaː julaːquwaː jawmahumu aːlːaðij fijhi juʶsˤʕaʶquʶwnaʶ laː jħb aːllh aːld͡ʒhr baːlswʔ mn aːlqwl ʔilaː mn ðˤlˤm wkaːn aːllh smjʕaː ʕljmaː tard͡ʒiʕuwnahaaː ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ aːnaː mʃ faːhm aːnaː ʕaːjz mwbjlk baːj knt ʔafkr hl trjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ saːmj mtwtːr ʔinnaː nbħθ ʕn mnzl jdˤm mrʔaːbaːan hðh frˤsˤaʶ ʔakbr mn ʔan tfwːt aːlsjaːra ʔaːtjh mn naːħja aːljmjn ʕljnaː ʔan ntːbʕ mθaːlh bʔimkaːnnaː tsljm aːlmntwd͡ʒ fj ʔasbwʕ taʕrud͡ʒu aːlmalaaːʔiikaau waaːlrːuwħu ʔiilajhi fij jawmin kaaːna miqdaaːruhu χamsijna ʔaalfa sanaain ldj ʕjnjn ʔaħqaː maːt ʔabj ʔin aːlðjn hm mn χʃja rbhm mʃfqwn wabanajnaaː fawqakum sabʕanaː ʃidaaːdanaː ʔiinːa aːllha taʕaaːlaaː tˤaʶjːiʶbuʶn laːa jaqbalu ʔiilaːːa tˤaʶjːiʶbaʶnaʶː ʔanaː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna wajamnaʕu min aʶːlˤtːaʶqaʶaʶːtˤuʶʕiʶ waaːltːadaaːburi qaaːla faʔati bihi ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ laː ʔaraː ħtaː ʃd͡ʒra waːħda ljs ldj wqt llaːkl aːlaːn hm jsˤdqwnh qul law ʔaanːa ʕindij maaː tastaʕd͡ʒiluwna bihi lˤaʶquʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlʔaamru bajnij wabajnakum waaːllːahu ʔaaʕlamu biʶaʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ faʔiiðaaː lam jakun ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː taʶχaʶtˤːaʶfaʶthuʶ ʔaajdij ħaaːsidijhi ttʁðaː aːlħjtaːn ʕlaː aːlʔasmaːk aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ aːldnjaː ʕbrt ʕn aːjaːm w sjnjn w aːlaːnsaːn aːlmskjn lhaː ʃhjd wkl ʔinsaːn ʔalzmnaːh tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤh fj ʕnqh wnχrd͡ʒ lh jwm aːlqjaːma ktaːbaː jlqaːh mnʃwraː ʔaflm jnðˤrˤwaʶː ʔilaː aːlsmaːʔ fwqhm kjf bnjnaːhaː wzjnaːhaː wmaː lhaː mn frwd͡ʒ maːðaː tnwj bðlk ʔanaː fqtˤ aːbðl qsˤaʶːrˤaʶː d͡ʒhdj naʶːsˤjaʶ kaːðba χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ walaaː jamliku aːlːaðijna jadʕuwna min duwnihi aːlʃːafaaːʕaaa ʔiilːaaː man ʃahida biaːlħaqːi wahum jaʕlamuwna whdjnaːh aːlnd͡ʒdjn ʔaam lakum ʔaajmaaːnun ʕalajnaaː baaːliʁaaun ʔiilaaː jawmi aːlqijaaːmaai ʔiinːa lakum lamaaː taħkumuwna wajaaː qawmi maaː lij ʔaadʕuwkum ʔiilaaː aːlnːad͡ʒaaːai watadʕuwnanij ʔiilaaː aːlnːaaːri hðaː maː jqwlh aːlnaːs rbnaː aːʁfr lj wlwaːldj wllmʔumnjn jwm jqwm aːlħsaːb kjf qutil twm liʔaanːa aːlsːaʕaaːdaaa lajsat bikaθraai aːlmaaːli fakam min mukθirin ʃaqijːun wamuqilːin saʕijdun ʔaðhb ʔaħjaːnaːan wʔaħjaːnaːan ʔauχraː laː ʔaðhb jd͡ʒb aːn tltzm bnðˤaʶːmk aːlʁðaːʔij ʔanaː fʕlaː ʔaqdr sˤħbtk ʔaʕtqd ʔank ðhbt bʕjdaː twm ʔataːa jwm aːlʔiθnjn wʕaːd ʔilaːa aːlbjt fj aːljwm aːlmbjn maʕluwmun min ħaaːli aːlʕuqalaaːʔi ʕalaaː aːχtilaaːfihim jwmʔið jsˤdrˤ aːlnaːs ʔaʃtaːtaː ljrwaː ʔaʕmaːlhm hðh aːlθlaːd͡ʒa θqjla d͡ʒdaː waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu ʕumara rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla lˤaʶʔaʶuʶqaʶtˤːiʶʕaʶnːaʶ ʔaajdijakum waʔaard͡ʒulakum min χilaaːfin θumːa lˤaʶʔaʶuʶsˤaʶlˤːiʶbaʶnːaʶkuʶm ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna ʔin aːllh ʕaːlm ʁjb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔinh ʕljm bðaːt aʶːlˤsˤdwrˤ lmaːðaː tbkjn, jaː ħbjbtj hl tʕtqd ʔan aːlaːħtraːr aːlʕaːlmj hw ntjd͡ʒa lʕml aːlbʃr baːrjs ʔiħdaː ʔakθr mdn aːlʕaːlm zjaːraan waʔiin kaaːna aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː qad ʔaaʃraka bajnahumaaː fij aːlbirːi wad͡ʒamaʕa bajnahumaaː fij aʶːlˤwaʶsˤiʶjːaʶaʶiʶ wafij aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ʕinda aːlmukaaːʃafaai waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai wsˤaʶːħbth wbnjh lm jkn baːb mnzl saːmj mqflaː ʔaʔant mʔulf hðaː aːlktaːb fawarabːika lanaħʃuranːahum waʶaʶːlˤʃːaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjnaʶ θumːa lˤaʶnuʶħdˤiʶrˤaʶnːaʶhuʶm ħawla d͡ʒahanːama d͡ʒiθijːanaː hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔi fj ðhnk ʔalqwaː ʔaslħtkm ʔin btˤʃ rbk lʃdjd wamaaː raʔaajt miθla aːlnːaaːri naaːma haaːribuhaaː tanzijlanaː mimːan χalaqa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ waaːlsːamaaːwaaːti aːlʕulaaː maaː taquwlu fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ aːllːajli faqaaːla man lam jarʁab biθalaaːθin bulija bisitːin lhðaː aːllħm raːʔiħa krjha klaː snktb maː jqwl wnmd lh mn aːlʕðaːb mdaː laː tqlq bʃʔan ʔamr khðaː kaːn jd͡ʒb btr ðraːʕ twm waaːlːaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː hum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai hl ʔaʶdˤʕtaʶ mftaːħa mnzlk qrʔat aːlbaːrħa rwaːja mθjra llʔihtmaːm wawaʔadi aːlbanaaːti wʔaʶʕtˤaʶː qljlaː wʔakdaː aːlːaðijna jariθuwna aːlfirdawsa hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ħatːaaː ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː qaaːla ʔaakaðːabtum biʔaːjaaːtij walam tuʶħiʶjtˤuʶwaʶː bihaaː ʕilmanaː ʔaamːaaːðaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna liʔaanːa aːlmaʕaaːnija ʃawaaːridu taʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶ biaːlʔiiʁfaaːli ʔanaː ʕaːlq θumːa kalːaaː sawfa taʕlamuwna aʶːlˤʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔ hj mʕlmjn hl jwd͡ʒd maːʔ hnaː liʔaanːa aːlʔiinsaaːna dunjaaː nafsihi taʕalːamuwaː aːlʕilma qabla ʔaan jurfaʕa twm jħb aʶːlˤbjrˤwqrˤaʶːtˤjaʶ kθjraː ʔinnaː sˤbjaʶ ʔanaː lst mdrsaːan ʔamrnj ʔan ʔaqwm bhðaː fqmt bh mra ʔaχraː ʔaawa ʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː aːlʔaawːaluwna wnzʕnaː maː fj sˤdwrˤhm mn ʁl ʔiχwaːnaː ʕlaː srr mtqaːbljn juwlid͡ʒu aːllːajla fij aːlnːahaaːri wajuwlid͡ʒu aːlnːahaaːra fij aːllːajli wahuwa ʕalijmun biðaaːti aʶːlˤsˤːuʶduʶwrˤiʶ fjhmaː ʕjnaːn td͡ʒrjaːn laː tqm btrwjʕ aːlʔaːmnjn wʔiðaː aːlqbwr bʕθrt ʕaːm sʕjd lkl aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn waʔiinːamaaː lahum ʕaðaaːbun ʃadijdun waðalːalnaaːhaaː lahum faminhaaː rakuwbuhum waminhaaː jaʔakuluwna wkðlk nsˤrˤf aːlʔaːjaːt wljqwlwaː drst wlnbjnh lqwm jʕlmwn maaː ʔauħibːu ʔaan ʔaʶaʶbsuʶtˤaʶ ʔaamalij ʔilaaː ʔaan taðhaba ʔilaaː baʁdaaːda watad͡ʒijʔa wllðjn kfrwaː brbhm ʕðaːb d͡ʒhnm wbʔis aʶːlˤmsˤjrˤ faʕalajk biðaaːti aːldːijni taribat jadaaːk tlk ʔaːjaːt aːllh ntlwhaː ʕljk baːlħq wʔink lmn aːlmrsljn ħatːaaː ʔaaqsama bihi fij kitaaːbihi faqaaːla subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː wakaaːna fij aːlmadijnaai tisʕaau rˤaʶhtˤiʶn jufsiduwna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaaː juʶsˤlˤiʶħuʶwnaʶ hl taʕalama aːljaːbaːnja ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn nðˤf ʁrfth jwm aːlaːħd tˤbʕaʶː jursalu ʕalajkumaaː ʃuʶwaʶaʶːðˤuʶn mːin nːaaːrin wanuħaaːsun falaː taʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːniʶ maː tqwlh sˤħjħ θumːa radadnaaːhu ʔaasfala saaːfilijna wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːlrswl waːħðrwaː fʔin twljtm faːʕlmwaː ʔanmaː ʕlaː rswlnaː aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn hlaː ʔarjtnj rˤχsˤtk sjdj waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːllːaha waaːlrːasuwla laʕalːakum turħamuwna ʔiinːaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː fij ʔaaʕnaaːqihim ʔaaʁlaaːlanaː fahija ʔiilaaː aːlʔaaðqaaːni fahum muqmaħuwna wlqd ʕhdnaː ʔilaː ʔaːdm mn qbl fnsj wlm nd͡ʒd lh ʕzmaː ʔaakmalu aːlrːaaːħaai maaː kaaːnat ʕan kadːi aːltːaʕabi twm kaːn wsjmaːan llʁaːja ʔiinːa laka fij aːlnːahaaːri sabħanaː tˤaʶwiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː maː aːlʕd͡ʒb fj ðlk ʃrb twm bʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ hjhaːt hjhaːt lmaː twʕdwn ʔin aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt wʔaχbtwaː ʔilaː rbhm ʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒna hm fjhaː χaːldwn ʔaaw χajrin ʔaasːasahu ʔaaw ʕilmin aːqtabasahu ʔiinːa aːllːaha wamalaaːʔiikatahu juʶsˤaʶlˤːuʶwnaʶ ʕalaaː aːlnːabijːi jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː sˤaʶlˤːuʶwaʶː ʕalajhi wasalːimuwaː taslijmanaː tʔaχrt aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ bsbb aʶːlˤtˤqs aːlsjʔ ʔifʕl ʃjʔiaːan, rd͡ʒaːʔan kðlk jbjn aːllh lkm ʔaːjaːth lʕlkm tʕqlwn tʕaːl law naʃaaːʔu lad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu ħuʶtˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː faʶðˤaʶlˤtuʶm tafakːahuwna ʔinh fnaːn ʕðˤjm nħn mʕd͡ʒbwn bh d͡ʒmjʕanaː aːlm hðaː waʶːdˤħaʶː lw ʃʔi mumtʕ, ʔanaː ʔawd ʔan ʔafʕlhu, baʶːlˤtˤbʕ kaːn jtˤlˤq ʕlj aːsm aːtʃjrw nħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdtk laː jnbʁj ʔan ndˤjʕ aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt klmaː aːstmʕt ʔilaː hðh aːlʔaʁnja bkjt ʔinhaː ʕljhm mʔuʶsˤdaʶ ʔiin tuʕaðːibhum faʔiinːahum ʕibaaːduka waʔiin taʁfir lahum faʔiinːaka ʔaanta aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu ʔaχbrnj, kjf ʕrfta jqaːl aːnhaː tˤbaʶːχaʶ maːhra wnd͡ʒjnaːhmaː wqwmhmaː mn aːlkrb aʶːlˤʕðˤjm ħaːwl twm ʔan jtd͡ʒnb aʶːlˤnðˤrˤ ʔilaː maːrj waʔaanːa aːlsːaaːʕaaa ʔaːtijaaun laaː rajba fijhaaː waʔaanːa aːllːaha jabʕaθu man fij aːlqubuwri hl lk ʔan tqlnj ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ wʔant ħl bhðaː aːlbld ðlk bʔan aːllh mwlaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʔan aːlkaːfrjn laː mwlaː lhm ʔalm nhlk aːlʔawljn julquwna aːlsːamʕa waʔaakθaruhum kaaːðibuwna laqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna fij kabadin qul sˤaʶdaʶqaʶ aːllːahu faaːtːabiʕuwaː milːaaa ʔiibraaːhijma ħanijfanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna fʔaqblt aːmrʔath fj sˤrˤaʶ fsˤkt wd͡ʒhhaː wqaːlt ʕd͡ʒwz ʕqjm wahuwa biaːlʔaufuqi aːlʔaaʕlaaː waːlðj qdr fhdaː sʔad͡ʒʕlk sʕjdaan ʔauħibː hðh aːlʔaʁnja hlaːː ʔasdjta lj mʕrwfaː klaː swf tʕlmwn blaː qd d͡ʒaːʔtk ʔaːjaːtj fkðbt bhaː waːstkbrt wknt mn aːlkaːfrjn hj ʔaʁlqt ʕjnjhaː waaːllːajli wamaaː wasaqa bal jurijdu kulːu aːmriʔiin mːinhum ʔaan juʔutaaː sˤuʶħuʶfaʶnaʶː mːunaʃːaraaan faʔaamːaaː aːlrːamzu falast tad͡ʒiduhu fij ʕilmin maʕnawijːin hl ʔamkm fj aːlmnzl fkaːn qaːb qwsjn ʔaw ʔadnaː waːðkr fj aːlktaːb ʔismaːʕjl ʔinh kaːn sˤaʶːdq aːlwʕd wkaːn rswlaː nbjaː lm jkn saːmj qaːdraː ʕlaː ʔid͡ʒraːʔ ʕmljːaːt d͡ʒraːħjːa ʕlaː aʶːlˤmrˤdˤaʶː wahaðihi aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlʕaaːmːaau tusamːaaː ʕurfanaː waʶjuʶʕaʶtˤːiʶfuʶhuʶm ʕalaaː aːlrːaʕijːaai waminhum man jaquwlu rabːanaaː ʔaːtinaaː fij aːldːunjaaː ħasanaaan wafij aːlʔaːχiraai ħasanaaan waqinaaː ʕaðaaːba aːlnːaaːri hw fj mʃkla d͡ʒrħ jdh aːljsraː bskjn ʔinh mn ħsn aʶːlˤħðˤ ʔan tkwn rd͡ʒlaːan bihaðihi aːlmanzilaai min aːlʔaulfaai faqad taʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶ lahu ʕaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤuʶ tamnaʕu minhaaː θm ʔadbr waːstkbr min ħusni ʔiislaːami aːlmarʔi tarkuhu maaː laːa jaʕnijhi kaːn mnːaːd mhmːaː walaqad χalaqnaaː fawqakum sabʕa tˤaʶrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶqaʶ wamaaː kunːaaː ʕani aːlχalqi ʁaaːfilijna rfʕ twm aʶːlˤsˤndwq bħðr ʔiinːamaaː nuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶkuʶm liwad͡ʒhi aːllːahi laaː nurijdu minkum d͡ʒazaaːʔan walaaː ʃukuwranaː qaːl jaː qwm ljs bj dˤlˤaʶːlˤaʶ wlknj rswl mn rb aːlʕaːlmjn wkntm ʔazwaːd͡ʒaː θlaːθa bajnaaː ʔaanaaː naaːʔiimun raʔaajtu aːlnaːaːsa juʶʕrˤaʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʕalajaː waaːbtiʁaaːʔa aːlħaqːi ʔaabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤnːuʶsˤrˤaʶaʶiʶ wanazːalnaaː mina aːlsːamaaːʔi maaːʔan mubaaːrakanaː faʔaanbatnaaː bihi d͡ʒanːaaːtin waħabːa aʶːlˤħaʶsˤiʶjdiʶ ʕalimat nafsun mːaaː ʔaʶaʶħdˤaʶrˤaʶt sʔal djmaː: " hl tʕrfjn kwd aʶːlˤaʶːtsˤaʶːlˤ llbnaːn " farawħun warajħaaːnun wad͡ʒanːaau naʕijmin kjf ħaːlk "aːnaː bχjr ʃkraː" klmaːt klmaːt lknhaː mstχdmaː aːltlskwb aːld͡ʒdjd aʶːlˤdˤχm hwwkr faʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlʔauwlaaː faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ biaːlħaqːi fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum ʁuθaaːʔan fabuʕdanaː lilqawmi aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔiinːa aːlmutːaqijna fij d͡ʒanːaaːtin waʕujuwnin aːlħrb thmnaː d͡ʒmjʕaːan kaːn ʔabwh ʃrˤtˤjaʶː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aʶːlˤdˤlˤaʶːlˤaʶ baːlhdaː fmaː rbħt td͡ʒaːrthm wmaː kaːnwaː mhtdjn kl aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ d͡ʒmjlwn warabːuka jaʕlamu maaː tukinːu sˤuʶduʶwrˤuʶhuʶm wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʕnd sdra aːlmnthaː ʔiilːaaː mani aʶːrˤtaʶdˤaʶaʶː min rasuwlin faʔiinːahu jasluku min bajni jadajhi wamin χalfihi rˤaʶsˤaʶdaʶnaʶː hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams mlʔ kl d͡ʒnـaːn ðkr kl lsـaːn aʶːsˤlˤwhaʶː faʶːsˤbrˤwaʶː ʔaw laː tsˤbrˤwaʶː swaːʔ ʕljkm ʔinmaː td͡ʒzwn maː kntm tʕmlwn sjurfʕ aːlraːtb bdaːja mn ʔabrjl aːlnːaaːsu tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbaʶaʶːniʶ jaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶaʶːniʶ wmθl klma χbjθa kʃd͡ʒra χbjθa aːd͡ʒtθt mn fwq aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ maː lhaː mn qraːr lqd kaːn mn aʶːlˤwaʶːdˤħ ʔanhu fj ʔalm walahu aːlkibrijaaːʔu fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu falajsa kulːu man ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ aːlχajra kaaːna min ʔaahlihi ʔanaː laː ʔaʕml lʔaj ʔaħd fawarabːi aːlsːamaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiinːahu laħaqːun miθla maaː ʔaanːakum taʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ ʔinhaː trjd ʔan tntðˤrˤ ħtaː ttzwd͡ʒ ʕn ʔabj ðrːin d͡ʒundubi bni d͡ʒunaaːdaaa wʔabj ʕbdi aːlrːaħmni muʕaːði bni d͡ʒblin ʔanaː lstu muwaswasaːan ʔanhm jtbʕwnnj ħqːaːan tħtl aːlktb ʔakbr msaːħa fj ʁrfth waʃarːa aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai fij aːlfud͡ʒuwri waaːlfaqri ʔard͡ʒw ʔan ttsˤlˤ bj ʔin ʔardtnj ʔaʶdˤaʶːʕt traːsj nðˤaʶːrˤthaʶː maːrj tˤwjlˤaʶ wqwjːa raħima aːllːahu lˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː aːuʁdu ʕaaːlimanaː ʔaaw mutaʕalːimanaː ʔaaw mustamiʕanaː ʔaaw muħibːanaː walaaː takun aːlχaaːmisa fatahlika walaaː takuwnuwaː kaaːlːaðijna qaaːluwaː samiʕnaaː wahum laaː jasmaʕuwna lijasʔaala aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ʕan sˤiʶdqiʶhiʶm waʔaaʕadːa lilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː hdaː wbʃraː llmʔumnjn hl ldjk aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ hnaː fj aːljaːbaːn ljn trˤkdˤ bsrʕa walaaː tataʕalːamhu lituħadːiθa bihi fajakuwnu ʕalajk buwruhu maː ʔin aːnthaː aːd͡ʒtmaːʕhm ʃrʕwaː fj aːlʕml jʕqd aːlmd͡ʒls aːd͡ʒtmaːʕaː mrtjn fj aːlʃhr ʔin fj aːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr wmaː χlq aːllh fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ lʔaːjaːt lqwm jtqwn wahija ʔaadnaaː rutbaai aːlʔaanafaai qaːlwaː fʔatwaː bh ʕlaː ʔaʕjn aːlnaːs lʕlhm jʃhdwn ʔan aːʕbdwaː aːllh waːtqwh wʔaʶtˤjʕwn fʔiðaː nfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ nfχa waːħda kn mtʔakdaː mn aːntqaːʔ klaːmtk qbl ʔan tlˤfðˤhm ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː waʶsˤaʶdːuʶwaʶː ʕan sabijli aːllːahi qad dˤaʶlˤːuʶwaʶː dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶnaʶː baʕijdanaː hj lam tðhb lʔan sˤdjqhaʶː lm jðhb bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm swra ʔanzlnaːhaː wfrˤdˤnaʶːhaʶː wʔanzlnaː fjhaː ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt lʕlkm tðkrwn aʶːlˤtˤrˤfaʶ aːlθaːlθa nħn laːʕbwn krh aːlqdm faʶʔaʶaʶsqiʶtˤ ʕalajnaaː kisafanaː mina aːlsːamaaːʔi ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː rasuwla rabːihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan raaːbijaaan fahaðaaː ʔaaʃrafu aːlʔiiχwaaːni nafsanaː waʔaakramuhum tˤaʶbʕaʶnaʶː dʕwnaː nʔaχð qstˤaʶːaʶn mn aːlraːħa hl ʔanti ħqaːan trjdjn aːltħdθ ʕn hðaː aːlʔan mn wraːʔih d͡ʒhnm wjsqaː mn maːʔ sˤdjd ʔiið qaaːla lahum ʔaaχuwhum nuwħun ʔaalaaː tatːaquwna wakunːaaː naʶχuʶwdˤuʶ maʕa aʶːlˤχaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶdˤiʶjnaʶ waħaaːd͡ʒːanij baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʕalajhi faqaaːla jaaː ʔaabataaːhu aːʁfir lahum lʔaanaːhum laːa jaʕlamuwna maaːðaaː jafʕaluwna ʔiilaaː rabːika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmasaaːqu aːðkur raːbaːka ʔiiðaaː nasijta ʔant ħr fj aːlaːstfaːda mn hðh aːlʁrfa bʔaj tˤrˤjqaʶ trˤdˤjk waʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu hudanaː libanij ʔiisraaːʔiijla ʔaalːaaː tatːaχiðuwaː min duwnij wakijlanaː waħakaaː muqaaːtilun ʔaanːa ʔibraaːhijma aːlχalijla ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶuʶ waaːlsːalaaːmu qaaːla lkn ʕndmaː ftħt ħnfja aːlħmaːm χrd͡ʒ saːʔil ʔaswd mljʔ baːlfqaːʕaːt wmaː tfrq aːlðjn ʔawtwaː aːlktaːb ʔilaː mn bʕd maː d͡ʒaːʔthm aːlbjna aːbntj tħb sˤfaʶːrˤ aʶːlˤbjdˤ ʔaχbrjnj ʕmːn knti ttklːmjn ʕnh θm aːrd͡ʒʕ aʶːlˤbsˤrˤ krtjn jnqlb ʔiljk aʶːlˤbsˤrˤ χaːsʔiaː whw ħsjr aːlaːmaːzjʁ ʔaʶʕtˤw aːlqjma llaːχrwn fnsw aːnfshm falam jazdad fij aːldːunjaaː zuhdanaː aʶːlˤχtˤaʶːb aːlðj ʔalqaːh aːlrʔijs ʔams ʔasʕd ʔaʶnsˤaʶːrˤh ʔawd ʔan ʔaqdm ʕlaː tˤlˤb bal qaaːluwaː ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶaʶːθuʶ ʔaaħlaaːmin bali aːftaraaːhu bal huwa ʃaaːʕirun faljaʔatinaaː biʔaːjaain kamaaː ʔaursila aːlʔaawːaluwna wqaːl mwsaː ʔin tkfrwaː ʔantm wmn fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ d͡ʒmjʕaː fʔin aːllh lʁnj ħmjd wwd͡ʒdk dˤaʶːlˤaʶː fhdaː ʔaafaʔaaminuwaː ʔaan taʔatijahum ʁaaːʃijaaun min ʕaðaaːbi aːllːahi ʔaaw taʔatijahumu aːlsːaaːʕaau baʁtaaan wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna aːlsːababajni fij aːlzːuhdi ʔiinːaaː hadajnaaːhu aːlsːabijla ʔiimːaaː ʃaaːkiranaː waʔiimːaaː kafuwranaː laː tʔud͡ʒl ʕml aːljwm ʔilaː aːlʁd wamin makrihim ʕalaaː taħarːuzin hm jʕlmwn hðaː klh kʔanhn aːljaːqwt waːlmrd͡ʒaːn aːlðjn hm fj sˤlˤaʶːthm χaːʃʕwn waʶaʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶqaʶ aːlmalaʔau minhum ʔaani aːmʃuwaː waʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʕalaaː ʔaːlihatikum ʔiinːa haðaaː laʃajʔun juraaːdu aːnh sjʔatj qrjbaː ʔinhu wsˤlˤ mʕ ftaːa ħsnaːʔ ʕlj ðraːʕhu kaːd twm jʁrq naːdraː maː jktb rsaːʔilaː lʔabwjh jrbħ ʔakθr mn χms mʔia dwlaːr ʃhrjaː bhðaː aːlʕml qaːl ʔafrʔajtm maː kntm tʕbdwn faʶːsˤbrˤ lħkm rbk wlaː ttˤʕ mnhm ʔaːθmaː ʔaw kfwraː ʔinːhnː mʕj tʕaːnj zwd͡ʒtj mn sˤʕwbaʶːt kj tnaːm laː tnðˤrˤ ʔiljh sjd ʁrjn ʔant mtˤlˤwb ʕlaː aːlhaːtf qutltaː fj aːlmʕrka aːdfʕ baːltj hj ʔaħsn aːlsjʔia nħn ʔaʕlm bmaː jsˤfwn faðarnij waman jukaðːibu bihaðaaː aːlħadijθi sanastadrid͡ʒuhum min ħajθu laaː jaʕlamuwna kaðːaba ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai aːlmursalijna lmaːðaː ʔistʁrqa hðaː wqtaːan tˤwjlˤaʶːaʶn ʔalm ttʕrf ʕnhm ʔin aːlðjn kfrwaː wmaːtwaː whm kfaːr ʔawlʔik ʕljhm lʕna aːllh waːlmlaːʔika waːlnaːs ʔad͡ʒmʕjn ttwjbaː ʔadaːa jmkn ʔan jstχdmhaː aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːb fj aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ ftħt maːrj ʕlba ʁðaːʔihaː sˤrˤsˤaʶːrˤ ljl mħtd͡ʒz jʔakl nfs maː jʔaklh nðˤjrˤh aːlħr laː tħsbn aːlðjn kfrwaː mʕd͡ʒzjn fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmʔawaːhm aːlnaːr wlbʔis aʶːlˤmsˤjrˤ maː qjl ʔaʶsˤdq mn hðaː qtˤ fakaðːabuwhu faʔaaχaðahum ʕaðaaːbu jawmi aʶːlˤðˤːuʶlˤːaʶaʶiʶ ʔiinːahu kaaːna ʕaðaaːba jawmin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn ʔaʕtqd ʔanhu ħaːn aːlwqt lˤʔiʶjqaʶːðˤ rwbirt ʔin aːlʕjʃ fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ hw ʔaʶfdˤlˤ tˤrˤjqaʶ ltʕlm lʁa ʔad͡ʒnbja wʔanaː laː ndrj ʔaʃr ʔarjd bmn fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔam ʔaraːd bhm rbhm rʃdaː waːlnaːʃraːt nʃraː fajawmaʔiiðin laaː jusʔaalu ʕan ðanbihi ʔiinsun walaaː d͡ʒaaːnːun bl qaːlwaː mθl maː qaːl aːlʔawlwn qaːl aːlmlʔa mn qwmh ʔinaː lnraːk fj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ mbjn ʔaħb smaːʕ aːlmwsjqaː nuwħin mːin qablu ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː hum ʔaʶaʶðˤlˤaʶmaʶ waʶʔaʶaʶtˤʁaʶaʶː jd͡ʒb ʔan nntðˤrˤ ʔarjd ʃχsˤ jmknh aːltħdθ baːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔanaː ħzjn ʔarjd ʔan ʔazwr kwrjaː ʔanti kjf ʕrfti ðlk wlaː tħsbn fʔaʁrqnaːhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn sħqaː jaː lh mn mχaːdʕ lm jkn jsˤʁaʶː lnaː lmaː ntˤqnaʶː hkðaː dχl aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fbʔaj ʔaːlaːʔ rbkmaː tkðbaːn walaqad ʔaahlaknaaː maaː ħawlakum mina aːlquraaː waʶsˤaʶrˤːaʶfnaʶaʶː d͡ʒdtj tqwl daːʔimaːan: " laː ttnfs wtʃrb fj nfs aːlwqt " wanaʕuwðu bik min ʃarːi aʶːlˤsːaʶlˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːlhaðri walaqad ʔaarajnaaːhu ʔaːjaaːtinaaː kulːahaaː fakaðːaba waʔaabaaː waaːtruki aːlʕdjma aːllwn ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ jwsf ʔaʶʕrˤdˤ ʕn hðaː waːstʁfrj lðnbk ʔink knt mn aʶːlˤχaʶːtˤʔiʶjn ʔauwlaʔiika aːlmuqarːabuwna ʔaːmul ʔalaː ʔaʶdˤtˤrˤ ʔilaː aːstχdaːm hðaː aːlmsds liʔaanːa maʕquwlahu ʔin wkm ʔahlknaː qblhm mn qrn hl tħs mnhm mn ʔaħd ʔaw tsmʕ lhm rkzaː aːnh jħb aːlʃaːj waqaaːla bazard͡ʒamharu ʔin jakun aːlʃːuʁlu mad͡ʒhadaaan faaːlfaraaːʁu mafsadaaun ʔaħbk wʔarjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ bk aːlqrʔaːn ʕdˤjn waʔaamːaaː man laaː juʕijnu walaaː jastaʕijnu fahuwa munaaːzilun qad manaʕa χajrahu twm wqʕ fj ħb maːrj fj ʔaj saːʕa rd͡ʒʕt mn aːlmktb jnbʁj ʔan nwaːd͡ʒh hða aːlmʃkla fabiʔaajːi d͡ʒaːrh famani aːftaraaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi aːlkaðiba min baʕdi ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ twqfj ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχjki hðaː ʔaχj faʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː faʔauʕaðːibuhum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʃadijdanaː fij aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai wamaaː lahum min naʶaʶːsˤiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ waðalika ʔaawkadu ʔaasbaaːbi aːlʔaulfaai ʔanti laː tsttˤjʕjn tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl tsttˤjʕjn aːld͡ʒw mmtˤrˤ aːktʃft lltw ʔan zwd͡ʒtj qd χaːntnj lm ʔalqa mnhu rˤfdˤaʶnaʶː qtˤː wsˤdhaʶː maː kaːnt tʕbd mn dwn aːllh ʔinhaː kaːnt mn qwm kaːfrjn faːljwm nnd͡ʒjk bbdnk ltkwn lmn χlfk ʔaːja wʔin kθjraː mn aːlnaːs ʕn ʔaːjaːtnaː lʁaːflwn wʔaðnt lrbhaː wħqt faqaaːla aːlʔaːna laaː ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶaʶːk lahaaː ktbn ʔiljh rsaːla lknh lm jrdː wħraːm ʕlaː qrja ʔahlknaːhaː ʔanhm laː jrd͡ʒʕwn qutlwaː fj aːlmʕrk waʕada aːllːahu aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn wmaː ʔarslnaːk ʔilaː rħma llʕaːlmjn kaːn saːmj fj bjt ljlaː aːljwm fʔasr bʕbaːdj ljlaː ʔinkm mtbʕwn twm jʃrb aːlʃaːmbaːnjaː ʔið naːdaː rbh ndaːʔ χfjaː hl ʁslt ʃʕrk aːljwm jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha waðaruwaː maaː baqija mina aːlrːibaaː ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna bl kðbwaː baːlsaːʕa wʔaʕtdnaː lmn kðb baːlsaːʕa sʕjraː fabiʔaajːi ʔaːlaːʔ rabːikumaaː tukaðːibaaːni ðalika biʔaanːahum kaaːnat taʔatijhim rusuluhum biaːlbajːinaaːti fakafaruwaː faʔaaχaðahumu aːllːahu ʔiinːahu qawijːun ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi hl aːlʔawz jraːa aːllh qaːlt ʔinj ʔaʕwð baːlrħmn mnk ʔin knt tqjaː fʔin lm tʔatwnj bh flaː kjl lkm ʕndj wlaː tqrbwn aːqdr hnaː twm ldjh mnaːʕa mn ðlk aʶːlˤmrˤdˤ hw ktb aːlktaːb wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walakin laaː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ waliman χaaːfa maqaaːma rabːihi d͡ʒanːataaːni lmaːðaː fqtˤ laː tχbrnaː bmaː tfkr bh jaaː ʔaabati ʔiinːij qad d͡ʒaaːʔanij mina aːlʕilmi maaː lam jaʔatika faaːtːabiʕnij ʔaahdika sˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶnaʶː sawijːanaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi tabaaːraka aːlːaðij bijadihi aːlmulku wahuwa ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun aːlmnzl aːltj jnbʁj aːlqjaːm bhaː ʔinhm kaːnwaː qbl ðlk mtrfjn huwa aːlːaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ðaluwlanaː faaːmʃuwaː fij manaaːkibihaaː wakuluwaː min rizqihi waʔiilajhi aːlnːuʃuwru hl bk ʕlaː hʔulaːʔ ʃhjdaː kulːanaː numidːu haʔuulaaːʔi wahaʔuulaaːʔi min ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ rabːika wamaaː kaaːna ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ rabːika maʶħðˤuʶwrˤaʶnaʶː ʔanaː lst mʕtaːd ltħdθ mʕ aːld͡ʒmhwr ʔatat ʔilaː hnaː ʔaχtj aːlħlwaː ðkraː wmaː knaː ðˤaʶːlˤmjn hl ʔant sˤħj ʔaʶaʶjaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ kulːu aːmriʔiin minhum ʔaan judχala d͡ʒanːaaa naʕijmin huwa aːlːaðij ʔaarsala rasuwlahu biaːlhudaaː wadijni aːlħaqːi musaaːfirun waʔaanːahaaː daaːru bulʁaain waʔiinːa aʶːlˤʕaʶsˤaʶaʶː min ʔaːlaai aːlsːafari ʔinnj wraːʔh χðnj ʔilaː aːlbjt ʕaːʃ aːlaːtħaːd aːlswfjaːtj ldjhaː θqa fj twm fijhaaː faaːkihaaun waaːlnːaχlu kbjra d͡ʒdaː faʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕan man tawalːaaː ʕan ðikrinaaː walam jurid ʔiilːaaː aːlħajaaːaa aːldːunjaaː ħaːwl ʔan jstwʕb ʔakbr qdr mn aːlθqaːfa aːlmħlja qdr aːlʔimkaːn fqaːl ʔanaː rbkm aːlʔaʕlaː fajabdaʔau biʔaawaaːχiri aːlʕuluwmi man lam juʔuta min aːlʕilmi maaː jaqmaʕuhu jrd͡ʒaː mlʔ hðaː aːlnmwðd͡ʒ aːdχlwaː aːld͡ʒna ʔantm wʔazwaːd͡ʒkm tħbrwn daʕaʕhaː tðhb faman ʔaʶaʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶ mimːani aːlmd͡ʒrm lw jftdj mn ʕðaːb jwmʔið bbnjh waaːntaqala ʔilaaː man lam juχbirhu malalanaː liman χabarahu aːlnd͡ʒaːħ laː jʔatj mn aːlksl laː jrjd ʔan jntðˤrˤk hw laː jχrq aːlqaːnwn ʔinaː qd ʔawħj ʔiljnaː ʔan aːlʕðaːb ʕlaː mn kðb wtwlaː fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu fij qaraaːrin makijnin km aːlʔajaːm fj aːlʔasbwʕ ql ʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh waːlrswl fʔin twlwaː fʔin aːllh laː jħb aːlkaːfrjn ðlkm fðwqwh wʔan llkaːfrjn ʕðaːb aːlnaːr qaaːla ʔiinːa haʔuulaaːʔi dˤaʶjfiʶj falaaː taʶfdˤaʶħuʶwniʶ waʶfaʶsˤiʶjlˤaʶtiʶhiʶ aːlːatij tuʔuwjhi ldjhaː aːlkθjr mn aːlklaːb hw aːljwm jʃʕr ʔanh ʔaʶfdˤlˤ bkθjr man kafara faʕalajhi kufruhu waman ʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː faliʔaanfusihim jamhaduwna ʔajmknk ʔan tʕlːmnj kjf ʔastχdm aːlʁsːaːla hʔulaːʔ aːlʔaχwaːt ljswaː mtʃaːbhaːt ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤlˤaʶːq fʔiðaː qrʔanaːh faːtbʕ qrʔaːnh jtχaːftwn bjnhm ʔin lbθtm ʔilaː ʕʃraː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jlkm ljlaː fj wd͡ʒhhaː fj ʔaj ðˤrˤwf ðˤhrˤ aʶːlˤχtˤʔaʶ twm ʔaχbrnj ʔanh aːʕtqd ʔan maːrj trjd aːlqjaːm bðlk ʔaθm ʔiðaː maː wqʕ ʔaːmntm bh ʔaːlʔaːn wqd kntm bh tstʕd͡ʒlwn ʔanaː ʔauħb ʕmlk ʔarsl twm brjdanaː ʔilktrwnjanːaː lrʔijsh bdl ħbjbth waqad qaaːla aːlnːabijːu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama liʔaabij hurajraaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔahw ʔamrjkj balaaː qaaːdirijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nːusawːija banaaːnahu aːljaːbaːn bld jħjtˤ bh aːlbħr w ljdh mnaːχ mʕtdl jaː lhaː mn qsˤːaʶiʶn ħzjna wamarːa muħamːadu bnu waaːsiʕin raħmaau aːllːahi ʕalajhi biqawmin faqijla wanazaʕnaaː maaː fij sˤuʶduʶwrˤiʶhiʶm min ʁilːin ʔiiχwaaːnanaː ʕalaaː sururin mutaqaaːbilijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nːubadːila ʔaamθaaːlakum wanunʃiʔiakum fij maaː laː taʕlamuwna ʔanta kjf tʕrf hðaː lbs srwaːlaːa nðˤjfaʶːaʶ aːltʕljm jʕnj ʔakθr mn md͡ʒrːd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa kaːn saːmj jsˤrˤχ waʕda aːllːahi laaː juχlifu aːllːahu waʕdahu walakinːa ʔaakθara "flˤstˤjn aːlmħtlh" klː ʕaːmin wʔantm bχjr ʔanaː ʔinsaːn sˤaʶːdq waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʕuquwdu aːlʁaaːdiri maħluwlaaun waʕuhuwduhu madχuwlaaun wmaː ʕlmnaːh aːlʃʕr wmaː jnbʁj lh ʔin hw ʔilaː biaːlʕaaːdaai mad͡ʒraaː aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbʕiʶ mn aːlðj aʶːtsˤlˤ bʔaːn wamizaaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnijmin ʕad͡ʒibt liman jaħtamij min aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶtˤʕiʶmaʶaʶiʶ lˤiʶmaʶdˤaʶrˤːaʶaʶːtiʶhaʶaʶː ʔinhaː ʔaʶtˤwlˤ mnj bkθjr sabaquwaː ʔiinːahum laaː juʕd͡ʒizuwna walaaː takuwnuwaː lahu ruwaaːaan sʔaʁaːdr χlaːl saːʕa wfrʃ mrfwʕa hnaːk bʕdˤ aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltaː mn aʶːlˤsˤʕb trd͡ʒmthaː mn sjbkj ʕlj ʕndmaː sʔamwt lqd ħdθ hðaː mnð wʔiðaː ʔanʕmnaː ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔaʶʕrˤdˤ wnʔaaː bd͡ʒaːnbh wʔiðaː msh aːlʃr fðw dʕaːʔ ʕrˤjdˤ ʔad͡ʒaːb d͡ʒwn ʕn ʔaχth ʔiqrʔa ʔasfl aʶːlˤsˤfħaʶ hðh aːlftaːa kaːnt daːʔimaːan d͡ʒjda wmuʶtˤjʕaʶ wldat ʔanzlnaːh wbaːlħq nzl wmaː ʔarslnaːk ʔilaː mbʃraː wnðjraː aːlːaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ mahdanaː wad͡ʒaʕala lakum fijhaaː subulanaː laʕalːakum tahtaduwna maaː wadːaka man ʔaahmala wudːak aːlʕud͡ʒbi hl aːnt mtzwd͡ʒ laː ʔaħd jʕjʃ mʕj wlmaː dˤrˤb aːbn mrjm mθlaː ʔiðaː qwmk mnh jsˤdwn ʔanaː ʔabħθ fqtˤ, ʃkraːan lka wlw ʃaːʔ rbk ld͡ʒʕl aːlnaːs ʔama waːħda wlaː jzaːlwn mχtlfjn wʔaqjmwaː aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wʔaːtwaː aːlzkaːa waːrkʕwaː mʕ aːlraːkʕjn hl kaːn bʔiʶsttˤaʶːʕtk ħl aːlmʃkla qul jawma aːlfatħi laaː janfaʕu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔiijmaaːnuhum walaaː hum juʶnðˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ wakaaːna ʔaad͡ʒwada qurajʃin fij zamaaːnihi qaːl maː mknj fjh rbj χjr fʔaʕjnwnj bqwa ʔad͡ʒʕl bjnkm wbjnhm rdmaː qulnaaː jaaː naaːru kuwnij bardanaː wasalaaːmanaː ʕalaaː ʔiibraaːhijma aːlʔaabu rabːun sʔaqwm bwaːd͡ʒbaːtj bʕd mʃaːhda aːltlfaːz ktbt aːjmjlj rsaːla ħuـmaːaa aːlـdiːjaːri ʕljkm sـlaːm ʔabat ʔan tـðilaː aːlnfـwsu aːlkiraːm hl ʔant tʕlm maːðaː tfʕl kjfa sʔasdd djwnaː aːlʔaːn ʕðr ʔaqbħ mn ðnb jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː χðwaː ħðrkm faːnfrwaː θbaːt ʔaw aːnfrwaː d͡ʒmjʕaː wakulːu ʕilmin laaː juʔuajːiduhu ʕaqlun maʶdˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶuʶn qaaːla rabːi ʔiinːij daʕawtu qawmij lajlanaː wanahaaːranaː knt fj ħfla waqijla lˤiʶlˤfuʶdˤaʶjlˤiʶ bni ʕiʶjaʶaʶːdˤiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕank waʔiiðaaː fasadat fasada aːld͡ʒasadu kulːuhu ʔaalaːa whija aːlqalbu ʔaʶχtˤtˤ ldʕwa dˤjwf kθjrjn ʔilaː ħfl aːlaːfttaːħ waʶmaʶtˤʕaʶmuʶhuʶ ħaraaːmun wamaʃrabuhu ħaraaːmi nrfʕ aːlʔaʕlaːm fj aːlʔaʕjaːd aʶːlˤwtˤnjaʶ wajawma taquwmu aːlsːaaːʕaau juqsimu aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna maaː labiθuwaː ʁajra saaːʕaain aːlmursalijna haː lm traːhaː ʔabdaːan twm ljs fj aːlmstʃfaː waʔiinːahu laðuw ʕilmin limaaː ʕalːamnaaːhu tsbħ aːlsmka btħrjk ðjlhaː ʔaqtlta maːrj wmaː nqmwaː mnhm ʔilaː ʔan jʔumnwaː baːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħmjd waʔiinːakum latamurːuwna ʕalajhim muʶsˤbiʶħiʶjnaʶ liʔaanːa maaː taqwaaː bihi dijaaːnaaːtu aːlnːaaːsi watatawafːaru ʔaamaaːnaaːtuhum falaaː ʃajʔa ʔaaħaqːu bihi nafʕanaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs ʔantm aːlfqraːʔ ʔilaː aːllh waːllh hw aːlʁnj aːlħmjd walilːahi mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːllːahu ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun tʕaːla baːldaːχl ʔin jʃʔa jðhbkm ʔajhaː aːlnaːs wjʔat ðˤaʶlˤaʶmtuʶm ʔaanːakum fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʃtarikuwna nħn ðaːhbwn ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤbχ fkbkbwaː fjhaː hm waːlʁaːwwn maːrj tχaːf aːlklaːb hðh ljst smka aʶːlˤħðˤ ʔaʕmaː maaː aːlqaaːriʕaau kaːn ħbːanaː mn ʔawːl nðˤrˤaʶ ʔalqt kaːjt nðˤrˤaʶ ʕlaː krjs θm td͡ʒaːhlth aːlʃjʔ aːlðj d͡ʒʕlh jħzn ʁrjb d͡ʒdaːan hl ðlk maː sjrʁbh twm qaːl rb ʔinj ðˤlˤmt nfsj faːʁfr lj fʁfr lh ʔinh hw aːlʁfwr aːlrħjm aːnaː mml wʔanh χlq aːlzwd͡ʒjn aːlðkr waːlʔanθaː twm ʁaʶːdˤb mʕa maːraː lqd ʔiħtaːlt ʕljh wanurijdu ʔaan namunːa ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna aʶːstuʶdˤʕiʶfuʶwaʶː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wanad͡ʒʕalahum ʔaaʔiimːaaan wanad͡ʒʕalahumu aːlwaaːriθijna brmd͡ʒtu ʔawl lʕba ħaːswb lj fj sn aːlθaːnja ʕʃr sʔaʕd qljlanaː mn aːlqhwa lˤiʶjaʶqtˤaʶʕaʶ tˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶnaʶː mina aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaaw jakbitahum fajanqalibuwaː χaaːʔiibijna aʶːlˤʃχsˤ aːlðj qaːbltah fj mktbj baːlʔams mn bld͡ʒjkaː ħtaː ʔin knt ʁnjanaː ln ʔaʶʕtˤjh flsanaː lqd fqdtu aːlmftaːħ ʔiʶntðˤrˤ hnaː ħtaː ʔaʕwd ʔanaː tˤaʶːlˤbaʶ walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː ʔamj liʔaanːa aːlʁiðaaːʔa ʔaaqwamu lilnːafsi waħajaaːtihaaː wajunad͡ʒːij aːllːahu aːlːaðijna aːtːaqawaː bimafaaːzatihim laaː jamasːuhumu aːlsːuwʔu walaaː hum jaħzanuwna mnːaːd ʔaʶwsˤlˤth ʔamːh ʔilaː wmaː kaːn aːllh mʕðbhm whm jstʁfrwn qaaːluwaː ʔiinːamaaː ʔaanta mina aːlmusaħːarijna waʔaanaaː aːχtartuka faaːstamiʕ limaaː juwħaaː hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhbj ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd tħtaːd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir ʔilaː mrˤdˤhaʶː ħjnmaː bdʔat aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija fj ʔiʶdˤaʶːʔaʶ aːlkwn srq aːlmaːl aːnaː mhnds kaːn saːmj mʃwːʃaː faʔaatbaʕuwhum muʃriqijna ʔanaː ʃdjda aːlfχr bʔabj waman jaʕʃu ʕan ðikri aːlrːaħmani wnðˤjfaʶ twm jʃrb qljlaː mn aːlmaːʔ aːldːunjaaː ʔimːaaː muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn muwd͡ʒiʕaaun w ʕqdnaː aːlʕzm ʔan tħjaː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir jastaʕd͡ʒiluwnaka biaːlʕaðaaːbi waʔiinːa d͡ʒahanːama lˤaʶmuʶħiʶjtˤaʶaʶuʶn biaːlkaaːfirijna sˤʕd ʔilaː sjaːrth manθuwri aːlħikami aːlʕuquwqu θaklu man lam juθkal laː ʔaħd jrjd ðlk mtaː tnwj aːlsfr ʔilaː aːljaːbaːn wθmwd aːlðjn d͡ʒaːbwaː aʶːlˤsˤχrˤ baːlwaːd fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh ʕalajhim ʁilmaaːnun lahum kaʔaanːahum luʔuluʔuun maknuwnun d͡ʒʕlnh jʕml hðh aːlktb lnaː laː jzʕd͡ʒnj ʔan tdχn ʔaħsnt ʕmlaː jstʁrq aːlsjr mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʕʃrjn dqjqa ʕaːmla naʶːsˤbaʶ qaːl ʕlmhaː ʕnd rbj fj ktaːb laː jdˤlˤ rbj wlaː jnsaː laː jmlkwn aːlʃfaːʕa ʔilaː mn aːtχð ʕnd aːlrħmn ʕhdaː waqad qaaːla aːlnːuwrijːu aʶːlˤχuʶtˤuʶwtˤuʶ aːlmuʕd͡ʒamaau kaaːlburuwdi aːlmuʕalːamaai waqaaːla d͡ʒumhuwru aːlmutakalːimijna ʔinkaaːru ðalika waaːd͡ʒibun waaːldːafʕu ʕanhu laaːzimun waʶbaʶʕdˤuʶhaʶaʶː biʶaʶːlˤtːaʶtˤaʶbːuʶʕiʶ aːld͡ʒaaːrij wad͡ʒaaːʔat kulːu nafsin maʕahaaː saaːʔiiqun waʃahijdun mn χʃj aːlrħmn baːlʁjb wd͡ʒaːʔ bqlb mnjb wkaːnwaː jqwlwn ʔaʔiðaː mtnaː wknaː traːbaː wʕðˤaʶːmaʶː ʔaʔinaː lmbʕwθwn ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr ʔafrjqj-ʔamrjkj ʔinhu aʶːðˤhrˤhaʶː ʕlj wqaːl mwsaː jaː qwm ʔin kntm ʔaːmntm baːllh fʕljh twklwaː ʔin kntm mslmjn laː tʕtmd ʕlaː waːldjk kθjraːan ʔilaː χaʶːsˤth d͡ʒaːʔ wχaʶːsˤth lm tqblh bal qaaːluwaː miθla maaː qaaːla aːlʔaawːaluwna hl ʃkrtihi, hl qlti ʃkraːan lk tbdʔa aːlmlaːʕq aːlχʃbja baːltʕfn ʔin turikt fj aːlmʁsla wqtanaː tˤwjlˤaʶː walahu aːld͡ʒawaaːri aːlmunʃaʔaːtu fij aːlbaħri kaaːlʔaaʕlaːmi wamimːan saaːʕadanij ʕalaaː suruwri saaːʕatij lm jʔatj twm ʔilaː aːlħfla aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ ʔin aːlħdjqa aːljaːbaːnja hðh d͡ʒmjla llʁaːja waqaaːluwaː ʔaaʔaːlihatunaaː χajrun ʔaam huwa maaː dˤaʶrˤaʶbuʶwhuʶ laka ʔiilːaaː d͡ʒadalanaː bal hum qawmun χaʶsˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ waaːlʕarabu taquwlu man laaː jalidu laaː wulida lʔad͡ʒli sˤdaʶːqtnaʶː mtaː sjʕwd mjnaːd qaːla: fʔaχðnaːh wd͡ʒnwdh fnbðnaːhm fj aːljm faʶːnðˤrˤ kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn fljkn ʔiðn waʕalaaː qadri aːlrːaʁbaai takuwnu aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ ʔaʕjʃ baːlqrb mn hnaː lm jkðb tˤwm ʔabdaː waqad qaaːla aːlʔiiskandaru talafanaː ʔaaw dˤaʶrˤaʶrˤaʶnaʶː wʔiðaː qjl lh aːtq aːllh ʔaχðth aːlʕza baːlʔiθm fħsbh d͡ʒhnm wlbʔis aːlmhaːd kaːn ðlk bʕd ðˤhrˤ jwm aːlaːħd wkaːnt aːlblda tʕd͡ʒ baːlnaːs ʔaħb ʔan ʔaqrʔa aːlktb waman lam jaðubːa ʕanhum lam jaðubːa ʕank hj aːltj aːʕtnt bd͡ʒrħh ʔaawħaaː aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː ʔilaaː nabijːin min ʔaanbijaaːʔiihi hl lj ʔan ʔaʶqaʶːtˤʕ qaaːla fatawaqːa aʶːlˤχaʶtˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶː faħaʃara fanaaːdaaː dˤrˤb ljlaː fj wd͡ʒhhaː wlnðjqnhm mn aːlʕðaːb aːlʔadnaː dwn aːlʕðaːb aːlʔakbr lʕlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn ðlk ktaːb tˤwnj wlqd sˤrˤfnaʶː fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn llnaːs mn kl mθl wkaːn aːlʔinsaːn ʔakθr ʃjʔ d͡ʒdlaː ʔaʃaːr aːlfjlswf waʶːlˤrˤaʶːsˤd aːljwnaːnj ʔanaːksaːʁwrws ʔan aːlʃhb ttkwn mn mwaːd mwd͡ʒwda ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔiinːahu huwa jubdiʔiu wajuʕijdu knt ʔarjd draːsa aʶːlˤtˤb fj aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda maːðaː ʕlj ʔan ʔafʕl stdˤmn d͡ʒudur aːlnaːr ʔamaːn aːlʔintrnt aːðhbwaː bqmjsˤj hðaː fʔalqwh ʕlaː wd͡ʒh ʔabj jʔat bsˤjrˤaʶː wʔatwnj bʔahlkm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn wtdˤħkwn wlaː tbkwn faliðalika lam jadχul fij d͡ʒumlaai ʔaaqsaaːmihi mn aːlmmtʕ aːllʕb ʔaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː θm klaː sjʕlmwn jfkːr btˤrˤjqaʶ mntˤqjːaʶ wasilmuhu χaʶtˤaʶrˤaʶnaʶː waaːlːaðij nazːala mina aːlsːamaaːʔi maaːʔan biqadarin faʔaanʃarnaaː bihi baldaaan majtanaː kaðalika tuχrad͡ʒuwna wlʔin ʔaʶtˤʕtm bʃraː mθlkm ʔinkm ʔiðaː lχaːsrwn hðaː hw ʔaʶfdˤlˤ ktaːb qrʔath fj ħjaːtj wʔin klaː lmaː ljwfjnhm rbk ʔaʕmaːlhm ʔinh bmaː jʕmlwn χbjr maːðaː llʕʃaːʔ kl maː ʕljk aːlqjaːm bh hw aʶːlˤʔiʶntðˤaʶːrˤ falaaː sˤaʶdːaʶqaʶ walaaː sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː kaːn mʁrmaː bhaː ʔaanːa aːlmawadːaaa aːlnːikaaːħu wakaðːaba aːlːaðijna min qablihim wamaaː balaʁuwaː miʕʃaaːra maaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum fakaðːabuwaː rusulij fakajfa kaaːna nakijri ʔin lm tstħj faːfʕl maː tʃaːʔ walam jara maaː baqija minhu ʔilːaaː ʁaʶaʶːmiʶdˤaʶnaʶː tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶhuʶ ʕanaaːʔun biχuruwd͡ʒihaaː ʕan aːlʔaawlaaː ʔilaaː maaː lajsa biʔaawlaaː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir mθjra llaːhtmaːm ʔilːaaː ʔaan jastawija aːlnːafʕaaːni fajakuwnu aːlʔaaχðu ʕamːan aːuʃtuhira ðikruhu waaːrtafaʕa qadruhu ʔaawlaaː ʔanaː ʔaħbh maːðaː ʕlmatk wasafarun baʕijdun hl ʕndk waːħd ʔakbr qljlanaː mn hðh taħakamwaː bʔanfusakum kaːnt aːntqaːdaːth qaːsja d͡ʒdaː waman ʕaʶsˤaʶthuʶ nafsuhu kaaːna biʶmaʶʕsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ ʁajrihaaː ʔaawlaaː aːlkaːlsjwm ljs mn dˤmn ħmjth hl tfhmnj ʁdˤbaʶ aːlsjf wħlm aːlʔanbjaːʔ aːstʕaːra hðaː aʶːlˤqrˤsˤ maʶlˤħuʶwðˤiʶjnaʶ biʔiijmaaːʔi aːlʃːaaːmitijna wajaquwluwna mataaː haðaaː aːlwaʕdu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ d͡ʒmʕ kl qwaːh ljzħf χaːrd͡ʒ aːlsjaːra aʶːlˤmħtˤmaʶ ʕsaː rbkm ʔan jrħmkm wʔin ʕdtm ʕdnaː wd͡ʒʕlnaː d͡ʒhnm llkaːfrjn ħsˤjrˤaʶː ʔin ʔibraːhjm lħljm ʔawaːh mnjb kjf tħb ʔan tʃrb qhwtk wmn ʃr ħaːsd ʔiðaː ħsd faʔiiðan qad lazima ʔaan naʶsˤiʶfaʶ ħaaːla aːlʔaansaaːbi wamaaː jaʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶ lahaaː min aːlʔaasbaaːbi fuʶsˤiʶlˤaʶ saːmj ʕn ʔamːh lmdːa ʔasaːbjʕ raħmaaan min rabːika ʔiinːahu huwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu fijhaaː sururun marfuwʕaaun jsttˤjʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕ tʁðja skn hnaː faʔiiðaaː kaaːna ðaaː riʔiaaːsaain ʔaalhathu waʔiin kaaːna ðaaː maʕijʃaain qaʶtˤaʶʕaʶthuʶ ʔawd aːn aːdʕwk ʔilaː aːlʕʃaːʔ ʔawd lw saːʕdtnj tˤaʶːb jwmk hl trjdnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː wahaðaaː aʶːlˤðˤːaʶnːuʶ aːʕtiðaaːru ðawij aʶːlˤnːaʶqsˤiʶ waχijfaau ʔaahli aːlʕad͡ʒzi saːmj mnfsˤlˤ ʕn zwd͡ʒth ʔilaː jwm aːlwqt aːlmʕlwm tbdw d͡ʒjn sʕjda d͡ʒdaː ʔatjt sjraːan ʕlaː aːlʔaqdaːm wʔimaː tχaːfn mn qwm χjaːna faːnbð ʔiljhm ʕlaː swaːʔ ʔin aːllh laː jħb aːlχaːʔinjn hl tʕtqd ʔanj ʔarjd ðlk maaː aːlʕajʃu qaaːla ʔajn jmknnaː tbaːdl aːlnqwd aːlðjn ʔaːtjnaːhm aːlktaːb jʕrfwnh kmaː jʕrfwn ʔabnaːʔhm wʔin frjqaː mnhm ljktmwn aːlħq whm jʕlmwn ħarfun fij qalbik lqd ʕrfthaː mn aːlwhla aːlʔawlaː fj aːlħqjqa hðaː aːlmmθːl mtzwd͡ʒ mʕðˤm aʶːlˤtˤːlˤaʶːb jd͡ʒdwn aʶːlˤrˤːjaʶːdˤjaʶːt maːdːa sˤʕbaʶ ħukija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː qaaːla liʕalijːin karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu ʔinːij ʔauħibːuk waʔauħibːu muʕaaːwijaaa waχabara minhaaː kunha ʔiʃfaaːqihaaː rˤaʶaʶːdˤaʶ nafsahu litaθbuta ʕalaaː ʔaaħadi ħaaːlaaːtihaaː faʔiinːa ʔaʶaʶʁrˤaʶaʶːdˤaʶ aːlnːaaːsi maʕa aːχtilaaːfi ʔaahwaaːʔiihim laaː tatːafiqu ʕalaaː satri salijmin waʔiiχfaaːʔi mufijdin aːlaː maːðaː tnðˤrˤ faman kaaːnat hid͡ʒratuhu ʔiilaaː aːllhi warasuwlihi fahid͡ʒratuhu ʔiilaː aːllhi warasuwlihi fj aːljwm aːltaːlj twχaː aːlħðr ʔaaw jakuwna muqadːimaaan liʁajrihi waljaħðar ʔaan jaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶhuʶ limiraaːʔin ʔaaw rijaaːʔin faʔiinːa aːlmumaaːrija bihi mahd͡ʒuwrun laaː jantafiʕu tmkn mn ʔan jtd͡ʒaːwz aʶːlˤsˤʕwbaʶ θumːa aːlʔiidlaaːlu fij aːlʔaabnaaːʔi qad jantaqilu maʕa aːlkibari ʔilaaː ʔaaħadi ʔaamrajni waħasbuk naʶqsˤaʶnaʶː fij rad͡ʒulin jakuwnu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶʁiʶjrˤuʶ aːlmusaaːwij lahu fij aːld͡ʒahli ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤaʶ minhu ʕmlhm hw td͡ʒmjl aːlfnaːnjn wajazijdu aːllːahu aːlːaðijna aːhtadawaː hudanaː waaːlbaaːqijaaːtu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtuʶ χajrun ʕinda rabːika θawaaːbanaː waχajrun maradːanaː hl mn ʔaħd fj aːlmnzl ʔaaħbib ħabijbak hawnanaː maaː sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr jaː twflaː lmaːðaː trjd ʃraːʔ hðaː aːlktaːb mutaʃabːihanaː bihim fij d͡ʒamijʕi ʔaafʕaaːlihim ʔiinːa d͡ʒahanːama kaaːnat miʶrˤsˤaʶaʶːdaʶnaʶː waːtχðwaː mn dwn aːllh ʔaːlha lʕlhm jnsˤrˤwn ʔanta d͡ʒbaːn wakaʃafa ʕan ʔaaχlaaːqihim qabla aʶːsˤtˤiʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶm hw ljs mhtmaː baːlsjaːsa laː jmkn ʔan jdwm tˤwjlˤaʶː kaːn d͡ʒaːlsaː jħtsj aːlnbjð lmaːðaː hðaː χtˤʔaʶ aːʕd tlk ʔaħb mʕaːmltk lj aːlːaðij man salima minhu bibadanihi min aːltːalafi fijhi hl ʔant sʕjda ttwjbaː hw aːlmwqʕ aːlðj ʔastχdmh ħjn laː ʔad͡ʒd ʔamθlaan kaːfjaan fj aːlmʕaːd͡ʒm θumːa qijla lahum ʔaajna maaː kuntum tuʃrikuwna ħlq aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤ bʕjdaːan ħtaː ʁaːb ʕn aʶːlˤʔaʶnðˤaʶːrˤ waħukija ʔaanːa aːllːaha taʕaaːlaaː ʔaawħaaː ʔilaaː daaːwud ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu hðaː ħqaːan lˤtˤfaʶːaʶn mnk jwmʔið jtbʕwn aːldaːʕj laː ʕwd͡ʒ lh wχʃʕt aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwaʶːt llrħmn flaː tsmʕ ʔilaː hmsaː ʔamn ʔad͡ʒlhaː ktbtm tlk aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ aːlʃrka tdʕm aːltd͡ʒaːra aːlħra hl jwd͡ʒd ʔaj wmdˤaʶ ʔaml fahaðaaː ʕalaaː θalaaːθaai ʔaʶaʶdˤrˤuʶbiʶn wahaaː hunaaː qismun raaːbiʕun jamnaʕu min maʕrifaai aːlkalaaːmi wafahmi maʕaaːnijhi aːftqdnaːka kθjraːan fj aːlħfla aːlbaːrħa aːlðjn jwfwn bʕhd aːllh wlaː jnqdˤwn aːlmjθaːq wakaθura ʔilaaː aːlkutubi jusaaːquwna ʔiilaaː aːlmawti wahum jaʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ qaːl ʔad͡ʒʔitnaː ltχrd͡ʒnaː mn ʔaʶrˤdˤnaʶː bsħrk jaː mwsaː jurijdu ʔaan juχrid͡ʒakum min ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶkuʶm bisiħrihi famaaːðaaː taʔamuruwna ʔinkm lfj qwl mχtlf ʔinːa aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ sajad͡ʒʕalu lahum aːlrːaħmanu wudːanaː ʔaw jðkr ftnfʕh aːlðkraː waman jaqnut minkunːa lilːahi warasuwlihi wataʕmal sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː nuʔutihaaː ʔaad͡ʒrahaaː marːatajni waʔaaʕtadnaaː lahaaː rizqanaː karijmanaː ʔawmn jnʃʔa fj aːlħlja whw fj aʶːlˤχsˤaʶːm ʁjr mbjn ʃʕr ʔanːaː bunj, wlkn maːd͡ʒdaːljnaː ʃaqraːʔ wʔaʶʁtˤʃ ljlhaː wʔaχrd͡ʒ dˤħaʶːhaʶː lqd wsˤlˤt mtʔaχraː qljlaː ʔam ʔanaː χjr mn hðaː aːlðj hw mhjn wlaː jkaːd jbjn maaː bajnak wabajna ʔaan laaː jakuwna fijk χajrun ʔilːaaː ʔaan taraaː ʔaanːa fijk χajranaː mn aːlðjn frqwaː djnhm wkaːnwaː ʃjʕaː kl ħzb bmaː ldjhm frħwn wjwm nħʃrhm d͡ʒmjʕaː θm nqwl llðjn ʔaʃrkwaː ʔajn ʃrkaːʔukm aːlðjn kntm tzʕmwn nʃkr kl mn qdwm ʕndnaː kaːn saːmj jsˤtˤħb aːlftjaːt jqtlhnː θmː jrmj d͡ʒθθhnː fj aːlʁaːbaːt waaːlqamara qadːarnaːhu manaːzila ħatːaː ʕaːda kaaːlʕurd͡ʒwni aːlqadjmi aːrjnj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaurzq bʔibn faʔaaχrad͡ʒa lahu tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː wanafaqaaan waʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːsˤtˤiʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ faʶdˤaʶrˤbaʶaʶːniʶ ʔakl wħmd χjr mn ʔakl wsˤmt aːdːʕaː saːmj ʔanːh tˤbjb ʔaʶrˤχsˤ mn aːltmr fj aʶːlˤbsˤrˤaʶ man ʔaʶuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ faʃakara waʶʔiʶiʶħbaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlʔaad͡ʒri laː θumːa saʔaala ʕanhu baʕda zamaaːnin min ʃarːi maː χalaqa faljadʕu naːdijahu liʔaanːa aːlmukaaːfiʔia ʔaaʕaðru wamadχala aːlʃːarːi masluwkanaː daʕwaaun mustad͡ʒaaːbaaun ʔaan laaː jarfaʕa bikalaaːmihi bihaðaaː aʶːlˤtːaʶʕrˤiʶjdˤiʶ jazraʕu aːlfalaːaħu aʶːlˤqaʶsˤaʶbaʶ maaː lawnuhaaː waʶʔiʶiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ χalalihi ʔinh sˤdjqj hl tʕrfwnh jaː ʃbaːb laaː tuʕaðːib aːlħajawaaːna rubːa dahrin bakajtu minhu falamːaaː sˤiʶrˤtuʶ fijhi bakajtu ʕalajhi wakaaːna sufjaaːnu bnu ʕujajnaaa raħimahu aːllːahu jataʔaawːalu qawlh taʕaaːlaaː waʶtˤaʶmaʶsaʶ bahd͡ʒaaa bajaaːnihi dˤħːt ljlaː bsaːmj ltnd͡ʒw bnfshaː kaːn mdjna wasuwʔi aːlmunqalabi ʔanaː mtʔaθːr kθjraː wad͡ʒamaħat bihi ʕan qanaaːʕaai zuhdihi kaːnt ljlaː tdrːs fj mdrsa aːlʔaħd qultu liʔaaʕraaːbijːin maaː ʔaʶaʶtˤwaʶlˤaʶ ʕumurak ʔajmknk ʔaχðnaː ʔilaː aːlmtħf aʶːlˤbrˤjtˤaʶːnj waʔiinːa lˤwtˤaʶnaʶː lamina aːlmursaljna marːa biʶʕuʶsˤfuʶwrˤiʶn jaduwru ħawla ʕuʶsˤfuʶwrˤaʶaʶiʶn faqaaːla lˤiʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ jaː lajtahaː kaːnati aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶaʶ falaaː tankaʃifu ʔilːaaː wahuwa bihaaː maʶsˤrˤuʶwʕuʶn kamaaː qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː lm laː jmknnj mʁaːdra ʁrftj hl jmknk aːn trjnj aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq hðaː klb aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn hm ʔaʕdaːʔ aːlʔitħaːd walaː ʔauqsimu biaːlnːafsi aːllːawːaːmaai rʔaaː saːmj maː kaːnt ljlaː trjdh ʔan jraːh man ʕaʶðˤuʶmaʶt maraaːfiquhu ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmaʶhuʶ muraaːfiquhu dʕaː saːmj ljlaː kj tʕtnq aːlʔislaːm ʔiið qaaːla lahu rabːuhu ʔaaslim qaaːla ʔaaslamtu lirabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna liʕizːi aːlkamaaːli waʕinda aʶːlˤmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔaʶaʶwdˤaʶħuʶ aːtːaχaðwaː ʔaajmaːnahum d͡ʒunːaaan faʶsˤaʶdːwaʶː ʕan sabjli aːllːahi ʔiinːahum saːʔa maː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna lˤiʶjaʶsˤiʶħːaʶ lahu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶwaʶaʶːbuʶ wajatabajːana lahu aːlħaqːu saːmj jmlk hðaː aːlmnzl ʔinːa aːlʕaaːqila man ʕaqluhu fij ʔirʃaaːdin lm jkn baʶːsttˤaʶːʕaʶ ʔaamθaːlakum wanunʃiʔiakum fj maː laː taʕlamwna ʔiinːahaː saːʔat mustaqarːanaː wamuqaːmanaː waaːnħaaːza ʕan maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː aʶːntðˤrˤ ʔarjd aːlħdjθ mʕk famu aːlʕaaːqili mulad͡ʒːamun ʔiðaaː hamːa biaːlkalaaːmi ʔaaħd͡ʒama falaaː tatbaʕu aːliaːħtimaaːla walaaː taqwaaː ʕalaaː sˤaʶbrˤiʶn waaːlkaðːaaːbu jasriqu ʕaqlak aːtːaʔiid ħatːaaː taʃfaʕa lilnːaaːsi juʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶ bihi kaθijranaː wajahdij bihi kaθijranaː wamaaː juʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶ bihi ʔiilːaaː aːlfaaːsiqijna qawaːrjra min fiʶdˤːaʶaʶiʶn qadːarwhaː taqdjranaː kaːnt ljlaː tfdˤːlˤ qdˤaʶːʔ wqthaː χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmnzl ʔajː tˤrˤjq jʔudːj ʔilaː aʶːlˤʃaʶːtˤʔiʶ ft fj ʕdˤd flaːn wθqt ljlaː bsaːmj fajastaħlij aːlkaðiba aːlːaðij lajsat ʁaraaːʔiibuhu maʕuwzaaan waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aʶːlˤrˤːiʶdˤaʶaʶː biaːlkafaaːfi juʔuadːij ʔilaaː aːlʕafaaːfi ʔalaː tzaːl tlk aːlʕjaːda mwd͡ʒwda lijaʕlama ʔaanːahu mamnuwħun biħusni aːldːifaaːʕi muðhilun ʕan aːlfikri fij aːlnːawaaːʔiibi aːlmulimːaai waqaaːla ʔaufnuwnu aːltːaʁlibijːu wataʔakulwna aːltːuraːθa ʔaaklanaː lamːanaː faʔiin lam tarahaaː tanqaaːdu biaːltːaħðijri waaːlʔiirhaaːbi laː ʔaħbː ʔan ʔaraːki tʕaːnjn ħusnu aʶːlˤmaʶħdˤaʶrˤiʶ waaːħtimaaːlu aːlzːalːaai waqilːaau aːlmalaaːli liʔaanːa aːlfaqijra taaːrikun waaːlʁanijːa mulaaːbisun qdːm saːmj jdh lljlaː quli aːllːaha ʔaaʕbudu muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː lahu djnj ljs ldj ʔaʃqaːʔ qutila ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlʔauχdwdi qaːrin hðaː mʕ maːðaː jħdθ fj msˤrˤ waaːlbaħri aːlmasd͡ʒwri laaː taʔakul waʔaanta ʃabʕaaːnu waχalaqa aːld͡ʒaːnːa min maːrid͡ʒin min naːrin saːmj laː jtħrːk wajatawaqːaaː ʔaaθarahu walam jakun lahum min ʃurakaːʔiihim ʃufaʕaːʔu wakaːnwaː biʃurakaːʔiihim kaːfirjna fj kl mkaːn ʔaʶnðˤrˤ aːnhaː md͡ʒrd ħfna mn aʶːlˤtˤrˤq aːlmsdwda χð jaː d͡ʒjm kaːn saːmj jħsb ħbːaːt msbħth laː jnbʁj ʕlaː ʔajː mdrːs aːlqjaːm bhðaː kaðlika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimjna aʶːħdˤrˤh aːlaː hnaː faʶlˤjaʶnðˤuʶrˤiʶ aːlʔiinsaːnu mimːa χuliqa lahu maː fij aːlsːamaːwaːti wamaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wahuwa aːlʕalijːu aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmuʶ ʔalqj aʶːlˤqbdˤ ʕljk ltd͡ʒaːwzk ʕlaː aːlmmtlkaːt ðˤnntk ðkrt ʔank wħjd waaːlʕarabu taquwlu daχala bajtanaː maaː ʔauχrid͡ʒa minhu kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtʃaːd͡ʒraːn baːstmraːr bʃʔan ðlk aːlħml hðaː ʔibnj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ laː juʶʕwːdˤwn jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi wakajfa aːlmaχrad͡ʒu qaaːla walajaħmilunːa ʔaaθqaːlahum waʔaaθqaːlanaː maʕa ʔaaθqaːlihim walajusʔaalunːa jawma aːlqijaːmaai ʕamːaː kaːnwaː jaftarwna sjntðˤrˤwnnaʶː ʔinː saːmj jʁrq fj aːlmsbħ minhaaː suwʔu ðˤaʶnːiʶhiʶ biχaaːliqihi ʔaanːahu laaː jarzuquhum ʔilːaaː min d͡ʒihatihi lmaːðaː trjnj hðh aʶːlˤsˤːwrˤaʶ fawarːaaː ʕan aːlʔiiχbaaːri binasabihi biʔaamrin jaħtamilu ðˤaʶlˤːaʶt aːlʕaaːmilaau muʃtaʁilaaan waħakaaː kaʕbu aːlʔaaħbaaːri ʔaanːahu maktuwbun fij aːltːawraaːai aːllːahumːa laaː jaʔatij biaːlχajraaːti ʔilːaaː ʔaanta walaaː jadfaʕu aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti ʔilːaaː ʔaanta ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna laː juʔuminwna biaːlʔaːχiraai lajusamːwna aːlmalaːʔiikaaa tasmijaaa aːlʔaunθaː waliðalika qijla qadːim liħaaːd͡ʒatik baʶʕdˤaʶ lad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒatik ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlktaːba hl ldjkmaː ʔajːa drws hðh aʶːlˤðˤːhjrˤaʶ aːstafraʁnaaː fijhaaː aːlmad͡ʒhuwda faqaaːla maaː nafaʕak aːllːahu biðalika walaaː dˤaʶrˤːaʶniʶj ħðaːrj saːmj kaːna mustaːʔaːan qaljlaːan walaaː maʃaqːaaa ʕalaaː musdijhi χlʕ saːmj klː mlaːbsh w ðhb llsːbaːħa rmaː saːmj aːlmlaːbs aːltj aːstdaːhaː ʔaθnaːʔ aːld͡ʒrjma ʔiðaaː lam tad͡ʒid aʶːlˤlˤːaʶfðˤaʶaʶaʶ waaːqiʕaaan mawqiʕahaaː hnaːk tfaːħa waːħda ʕlaː aːlmktb aːʕtrf aːldːktwr sˤaʶːdq laːħqaː ʔanːh lm tkn ldjh fkra ʕn sbb tlk aːlwfaːa fjhimaː faːkihaaun wanaχlun warumːaːnun aːns maː jħznk waʔaanʃadtu liaːmraʔaaain min aːlʕarabi waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤʃːaʶrˤtˤuʶ aːlθːaaːnij aʶːiʶmdˤʁ tˤʕaʶːmk d͡ʒjdaːan waqijla lilbadwijːi faqaaːla walaqad d͡ʒaːʔahum mina aːlʔaanbaːʔi maː fjhi muzdad͡ʒarun wajanbaʁij liman ʔaunzila manzilaaa aːlmustaʃaaːri waʔauħilːa maħalːa aʶːlˤnːaʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶ aːlmawaaːdːi ħatːaaː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ maʔamuwla aːlnːud͡ʒħi tlqːaː saːmj ħkmjn baːlmʔubːd lqd ʔanhjt ʕmlj lltw ʔaʶðˤnː ʔan hðaː maː jħdθ walasawfa juʶʕtˤjkaʶ rabːuka faʶtaʶrˤdˤaʶː kaːnt ljlaː ttʕaːfaː mn ʕmljːa d͡ʒraːd͡ʒjːa fj aːlqlb qaːm saːmj bklː maː bwsʕh kj jubqj aːlʕjaːda mftwħa waʔiiðaaː ʔaːla aːlbaχijlu ʔilaaː maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː min haðihi aːlʔaaχlaaːqi aːlmaðmuwmaai waaːlʃːijami man lam juʶqaʶnːiʶtˤ aːlnːaaːsa min raħmaai aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː flntħrːk bsrʕa faʔiinːa aːld͡ʒanːaaa hija aːlmaʔawaː wakaaːna fijhi tqaːʕd saːmj qaːl lj nfs aːlʃːjʔ ʔinːhaː fj mkaːn ln tʕwd mnh ʔabdaː ʔaʶaʶntˤiʶqaʶ biʶaʶːlˤsˤːiʶdqiʶ mrħbaː jaː twm ʔiħdaː ħqaːʔibj mfqwda maʕa maaː juθijruhu min ħanaqin wajuksibuhu min ħiqdin faʔiin sˤaʶaʶːdaʶfaʶ bihimːatihi ħaʶðˤːaʶnaʶː naaːla bihi ʔaamalanaː kaaːna fijmaaː naaːlahu kaʶaʶːlˤmuʶʁtaʶsˤiʶbiʶ dˤħːaʶː saːmj bħjaːth klːhaː mn ʔad͡ʒl ljlaː θamanuhu sitːaau daraaːhima waʶniʶsˤfuʶn tˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aʶːlˤsˤːaʶqrˤuʶ bʔimkaːn hðaː aːldːwaːʔ tnwjm ħsˤaʶːn ʕlm saːmj ʔanː aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh waqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu laaː tastafizːuwaː aːldːumuwʕa biaːltːaðakːuri ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj qsm aʶːlˤsˤːħːaʶ lm jkn swaː θlaːθa baːlʁjn fj tlk aːlʁrfa lqd trk aːlmdrsa aːlʔasbwʕ aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj aːlʁnaː ʁnaː aːlqlb laː ʁnaː aːlmaːl walaqad raːwadwhu ʕan dˤaʶjfiʶhiʶ faʶtˤaʶmaʶsnaʶː ʔaaʕjunahum faðwqwaː ʕaðaːbj wanuðuri waaːstiʃaaːraai naʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶn musaaːlimin kafːaaːraau aʶːlˤtˤːiʶjaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ aːltːawakːulu ʕalaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi biaːlʔiiħsaaːni jaʶrˤtaʶbiʶtˤuʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu faʔiin lam tafʕaluwaː walan tafʕaluwaː faaːtːaquwaː aːlnːaaːra aːlːatij waquwduhaaː aːlnːaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕidːat lilkaaːfirijna waqad qijla man ʁalabathu aːlħidaau falaaː taʁtarːa bimawadːatihi aːltːufːaaːħaau ħlwaaun ʔaljst tˤbjbaʶ fajaðilːa biʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶrˤaʶʕiʶ wajuħrama biaːlʔaubːahaai lkl ʃʕaːʕ mnħaː wtˤwjlˤaʶ w ʔitd͡ʒaːh ʔaaχbara ʔaanːa aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒanːaai aːħtimaaːlu aːlmakaaːrihi waʶaʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ ʔilaaː aːlnːaaːri aːtːibaaːʕu aːlʃːahawaaːti hl bʔimkaːnj zjaːrtk ʁdaː walaaː muʃijra kaðij nuʶsˤħiʶn wamaqdiraain fij muʃkili aːlʔaamri faaːχtar ðaaːka muʶntaʶsˤiʶħaʶnaʶː waʶaʶːlˤχaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlχaaːmisaau faʔiinːa haðihi aːlʔaumuwra tamnaʕu min aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai saaːra aʶːlˤqiʶtˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ ʔanaː msrwra lʕdm wd͡ʒwdj hnaːk kaːn saːmj mhtmːaː bʃʔuwnh fqtˤ ʔijlaːfihim riħlaaa aːlʃːitaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶjfiʶ ʔad͡ʒbr saːmj ljlaː ʕlaː aːlðːhaːb mʕh haː qd wsˤlˤt aːlħaːfla hm jnaːqʃwn aːlmʃkla smʕ saːmj dˤd͡ʒːaʶ qwjːa faʕalaaːma aːltːahaaːfutu fij aːlnːaaːri lam jusaaːfir muħamːadun qtˤʕ saːmj aʶːlˤaʶːtːsˤaʶːlˤ qd jdrk aːlmtʔanj bʕdˤ ħaːd͡ʒth wqd jkwn mʕ aːlmstʕd͡ʒl aːlzll jʃʕr twm baːlmsʔuwlja ʕmaː ħdθ biʔaajdj safaraain ʔaaʔaulqija aːlðːikru ʕalajhi min bajninaː bal huwa kaðːaːbun ʔaaʃirun wajastaʁnij ʕan aːlʕuluwfaai biraʕjihi ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔiwna waðalika biaːstinzaaːlihi ʕanhu ʔin ʕalaaː ʔaan jastawlija ʕalajhi ħubːu aːlmaaːli wabuʕdu aːlʔaamali fajabʕaθuhu ħubːu aːlmaaːli ʕalaaː aʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤiʶ fij tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶhiʶ waʃahwaai saaːʕaain ʔaawraθat ħuznanaː tˤaʶwiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː aːtːibaaːʕu aːldːijni fij aːd͡ʒtinaaːbihi waʕaːdun wafirʕawnu waʔiiχwaːnu lˤwtˤiʶn ʔanaː aːlmsʔuwl ʕn hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔauwlʔiika lahum rizqun maʕlwmun jmθːl traːmb maː jstħqːh aːlʔamrjkjːwn waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʕuquwbaau aːlħaaːsidi min nafsihi qaaːla ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjːuʶ ʔin qaaːla qawlanaː ħaqːaqahu bifiʕlihi waʔaanʃada θaʕlabun waħukija ʔaanːa ʔaaʕraaːbijːanaː ʔaataaː aːbna ʔaabij ðiʔibin fasaʔaalahu ʕan masʔaalaai tˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːqiʶn faʔaaftaaːhu biʶtˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːqiʶ aːmraʔaatihi ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ aːlʕudːaai aʶːlˤsˤːaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlʃːidːaai nħn ħqːaː nħbː hðaː aːlmdrːs dˤħːaʶː saːmj bljlaː kj juχrd͡ʒ nfsh mn aːlmʔazq ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤuʶkuʶm ʔilajːa aːlmutafajhiqu aːlmikθaaːru waaːlmuliħːu aːlmihðaaːru man kaθura mizaaːħuhu zaaːlat hajbatuhu saːmj χtˤjbj ʔaħb fjh sˤdqh man ʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶː faʶdˤlˤaʶ maaːlihi fahuwa χajrun lahu ʔaani aːʕmal saːbiʁaːtin waqadːir fij aːlsːardi waaːʕmalwaː sˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː ʔiinːj bimaː taʕmalwna baʶsˤjrˤuʶn waminhaaː ʔaan jantaqila ʕan faʕatawaː ʕan ʔaamri rabːihim faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶuʶ wahum jaʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ ʕaːd ʔilaː ðlk aːlmtd͡ʒr d͡ʒnt ʕlaː nfshaː braːqʃ aːld͡ʒhl ʃr aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤħaʶːb waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaanːahu ʔaaraaːda aʶːlˤtˤːaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ waliðalika qijla laaː muruwʔaaa limuqilːin θumːa ʔaaʁraqnaː baʕdu aːlbaːqjna haː hw aːlʕnwaːn aːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlkalaaːma tard͡ʒumaaːnun juʕabːiru ʕan mustawdaʕaaːti aʶːlˤdˤːaʶmaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤiʶ fj hðh aʶːlˤðˤrˤwf laː jmknnaː aːlnd͡ʒaːħ ʔaaraʔaajta aːlːaðj janhaː ʕalijːun saaːfara ʔiilaaː faransaː wasabːiħwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤjlˤaʶnaʶː qaːlat ʔiiħdaːhumaː jaː ʔaabati aːstaʔad͡ʒirhu ʔiinːa χajra mani aːstaʔad͡ʒarta aːlqawijːu aːlʔaamjnu ðhb saːmj ljdrs kajfa qaaːla kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlʃːd͡ʒaːr ʔaatutrakwna fj maː haːhunaː ʔaːminjna ʔaʶsˤjbt qdm aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jhtmː bʃʔuwnh qtl saːmj ljlaː maː hw aːlwqt aːlðj tħbh saːʔil aːlbχjl mħrwm wmaːlh mktwm saːrt bh aːlruːkbaːnu saːfr td͡ʒd ʕwdˤaʶː ʕmaː tfaːrqh mtaː stʕwd wasujːirati aːld͡ʒibaːlu fakaːnat saraːbanaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʔaalam naʃraħ laka sˤaʶdrˤaʶkaʶ waqaaːla kisraaː lilmuwbadi d͡ʒmʕt aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤaʶ aːlkθjr mn aːlʔadlːa mn saːħa aːld͡ʒrjma kaːn ʔaħdhm jntðˤrˤ faʶːdˤlˤ lamːaaː ʕarafa ʔaahlu aʶːlˤnːaʶqsˤiʶ ħaaːlahum ʕinda ðawij aːlkamaaːli aːstaʕaaːnuwaː biaːlkibri lˤiʶjuʶʕaʶðˤːiʶmaʶ sˤaʶʁiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː kj jsbħ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒzjra aːlʔaχraː kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jʕbr ħwdˤaʶː mljʔiaː bʔasmaːk aːlqrʃ ʔaaʕiduk aːljawma waʔaaħbuwk ʁadanaː biaːlʔiind͡ʒaaːzi litaðuwqa ħalaaːwaaa aːlʔaamali waʔaatazajːanu biθubuwti aːlwafaaːʔi man ʔaadːabak qaaːla wakam ʔaarsalnaː min nabijːin fij aːlʔaawːaljna faʶlˤjaʶnðˤuʶrˤiʶ aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiilaː tˤaʶʕaʶːmiʶhiʶ ldjnaː mdrːs rˤjaʶːdˤjːaʶːt sjːʔ ʔaθql mn d͡ʒbl wakaaːna ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi jatamaθːalu bihaðihi aːlʔaabjaaːti kaːn saːmj jstnʃq aːlkħwl waʶjaʶsˤlˤaʶː saʕjranaː saːmj hw aʶːlˤmrˤjdˤ aːltːaːlj aːlðj sfħsˤh aːldːktwr baːkr walaaː jaʶχlˤiʶtˤuʶ maʕa aʶːlˤtːaʶsˤaʶwːuʶrˤiʶ taʕzijaaan ʔanaː waːθq mn msaːʕdtk lj waʔaanːahu huwa ʔaaʁnaː waʔaaqnaː ʔawqf aʶːlˤʃːrˤtˤj sjːaːra ljlaː wamiθlu haðaaː aːld͡ʒawaaːbi laaː justaʁrabu min ʔaanbijaaːʔi aːllːahi aʶːlˤtˤwaʶːbʕ mð kaːn sˤʁjrˤaʶnaʶː qul ʔiinːa rabːij jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrːizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu wajaqdiru walakinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna jaaː ʔaahla aːlʃːaaːmi aːsmaʕuwaː qawla ʔaaχin ʔanta tufkiːru kθjraːan ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn aːlʕilmu ʕiʶsˤmaʶaʶuʶ aːlmuluwki kaːn twm mnhkaː wakulːu ðalika ħaθːun minhu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʕalaaː aːlʔaulfaai wakafːun ʕan aːlfurqaai ʔaʁaːdr aʶːlˤmtˤʕm ʕndmaː wsˤlˤ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj hl bʔimkaːnk ħml hðh aːlʕlba ʔamdrːs ʔant ʔam tˤaʶːlˤb twd͡ʒd st d͡ʒml baːlmʁwlja fj ttwjbaː ħaːljaː ʔinj ʔatmʃaː mʕhaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sbħ aːsm rbk aːlʔaʕlaː mrħbaːan d͡ʒmjʕaːan lm jtmkn mn aːltħkm fj ʁdˤbh falawlaaː ʔiin kuntum ʁajra madijnijna ʔin tʕðbhm fʔinhm ʕbaːdk wʔin tʁfr lhm fʔink ʔant aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ln tsˤdːqj maː qaːlth lj faʔaaχrad͡ʒnaaːhum min d͡ʒanːaaːtin waʕujuwnin waqaaːla muwarːiqun aːlʕid͡ʒlijːu wamaaː min ʁaaːʔiibaain fij aːlsːamaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiilːaaː fij kitaaːbin mubijnin bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlqaːrʕa ʔin aːllh lʕn aːlkaːfrjn wʔaʕd lhm sʕjraː juʔufaku ʕanhu man ʔaufika swf jkwn fj aːlbjt ʁdaːan waaːðkur fij aːlkitaaːbi muwsaaː ʔiinːahu kaaːna muʶχlˤaʶsˤaʶnaʶː wakaaːna rasuwlanaː nabijːanaː walaqad ʕalimnaaː aːlmustaqdimijna minkum walaqad ʕalimnaaː aːlmustaʔaχirijna bihi waʔiinːamaaː juwakːalu biaːlʔaadnaaː waʔiin d͡ʒalːa maaː jaʶmdˤiʶj ʔaʃʕl saːmj aːlnːaːr fj d͡ʒθːa ljlaː ʔataː hnaː aːlʔisbwʕ aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj ʔaam lahum ʔiilahun ʁajru aːllːahi subħaaːna aːllːahi ʕamːaaː juʃrikuwna tˤlˤbtj jwaʶːðˤbwn ʕlaː aːldraːsa rbħ aːlʃmaːl mʕrka ʃjlwh w ʔant ʔaʶjdˤaʶː laː ttħsr ʕlaː ʔanhaːraː ʔanta ħsˤlˤt ʕlaː hʔulaːʔ mn aːlħql fahuwa fij ʕijʃaain rˤːaʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶn ʔaħb aːlʃwkwlaːta ʔanaː ʔaʃm aːlʁaːz jħb mʃaːhda aːltlfaːz ʔaʶfdˤlˤ lħm aːlbqr aːstmʕt lh ʔaħbk kðlk ʁʃː fj ðlk makaaːnanaː ʕalijːanaː tʕd͡ʒbnj aːlʃms ʔin aːsmk d͡ʒmjl ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqrʔa ʃjʔiaːan maː laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaml lw knt bsˤħaʶ d͡ʒjda lknt sʕjdaː wmaː ʔahlknaː mn qrja ʔilaː wlhaː ktaːb mʕlwm wamaaː ʕalaaː ʔiljh ʔanta trjd aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq, ʔaljs kðlk laː ʃjʔ χaːrq llʕaːda ħdθ ʔaθnaːʔ sfrnaː maaː maaːluk qaaːla mrħbaːan ʔiðaː lm ʔakun muʶχtˤiʶʔiʶaʶːaʶn, ʔanta d͡ʒaːrnaː aːld͡ʒdjd aːljs kðlk hʔulaːʔ jrjdwn ʔilktrwnj bdwn ʔaj tklfa hnaːk qtˤtˤ fj aːlmrjχ ʔaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː hw nd͡ʒħa fj aːltslːq ʕlaː aːld͡ʒbl wlmaː blʁ ʔaʃdh waːstwaː ʔaːtjnaːh ħkmaː wʕlmaː wkðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn haðaaː min ʔaaħkami ʃaʕrin qaraʔath tbjn ʔanaː aːlrd͡ʒl mħqq χaʶːsˤ qad raʔaːnij hl ʔanti ħzjna aːmʃi waraaːʔa aːlʔaasadi walaaː tamʃi waraaːʔa aːlmarʔaaai duʕjtu ʔilaː ʕrshmaː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ llʕml mʕk aːʃdd bh ʔazrj mn tlk aːlftaːa aʶːlˤlˤtˤjfaʶ ʔaj qaːmws tʕnjh ʔaatafraħu biaːlmawti faqaaːla aʶːnðˤrˤ ħjθ aːaːʃr lqd kaːn fj jwsf wʔiχwth ʔaːjaːt llsaːʔiljn fj ʔaj fndq ʔant mqjm ʔilʁj tˤlˤbnaʶː mn fdˤlˤk ʔataːnaː zwːaːrun waθijaaːbaka faʶtˤaʶhːiʶrˤ ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan lqd tsll mn χlfj lnʕml ħflaa ʃaːj bʕd ʁd naʶaʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶn kaaːðibaain χaʶaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶaʶaʶiʶn ldjhm slwk ʁrjb twm ljs mʔuhlaːan ltdrjs aːlmdrsa aːlθaːnwja aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː ʁaaːjaain md͡ʒddaːan waːldnaː jðhb aːlj aːlʕml baːlsjaːra ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau ʕaːld͡ʒ hðaː aːldwaːʔ aːlbrd aːlðj ʔaʶsˤaʶːbnj aːsmj mħðwfun mn aːlqaːʔima ʔaaqilːuwaː min aːlðːunuwbi faʔiinːa ħasanaaːtikum qalijlaaun sʔabʕθ lk sˤwtj msd͡ʒlaː fj ʃrˤjtˤ rʔuja aːldm d͡ʒʕlhaː tnfʕl ʔaʶʕtˤnj ʔid͡ʒaːbaan ʔakjdaan fʔaːmnwaː fmtʕnaːhm ʔilaː ħjn aːbq mkaːnk ʕaːlm aːlʁjb waːlʃhaːda aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm maːðaː knti stfʕljna lw kunti ʔaʶsˤʁrˤ bʕʃr snjn ʔant wħdk ʔamlj mnzlk raːʔiʕ hl ʔanbʔikm ʕlaː mn tnzl aʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn lqd ʔaχaːfnj hðaː ttħwl aːlʃraːʁjf ʔilaː wldnaː wamansuwbun ʔilajhi ʔaafaaːʕijlu man sˤaʶaʶːħaʶbaʶ fʔand͡ʒjnaːh wʔahlh ʔilaː aːmrʔath qdrnaːhaː mn aːlʁaːbrjn mtaː wsˤlˤt ʔilaː mtˤaʶːrˤ naːrjtaː ʔin klaːmj kaːlmrʔaːa fʔiðaː qrʔahu ħmaːrun aːlʃaːhdjn aːnt ðˤrˤjf d͡ʒdaː waχajru maaː fij aːllːaʔiijmi ʔaan jakufːa ʕank ʃarːahu tbʁdˤh lʔanh fqjr fħsb liʔaanːa ʔiʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤaʶhaʶaʶː daaːma aːlʔaamaaːnu waʕaaːʃa aːlʕalam jaaː ʔiimaaːraaːtinaaː ʕn aʶːsˤlˤh laː aʶːsttˤjʕ ʔijd͡ʒaːd mfaːtjħj hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd fij kitaaːbin mːaknuwnin wajaskunu ʔilajhi aːlbarijʔu hl tʕrf ʔajn saːʕtj faʔaajna taðhabuwna aːlnʕaːm laː jmknh aʶːlˤtˤjrˤaʶːn faʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤfaʶːt ʕsˤfaʶː wd͡ʒʕl aːlqmr fjhn nwraː wd͡ʒʕl aːlʃms sraːd͡ʒaː wafutiħati aːlsːamaaːʔu fakaaːnat ʔaabwaaːbanaː liʔaanːa aʶːlˤtˤːuʶʁjaʶaʶːnaʶ markuwzun fij tˤaʶbʕiʶhiʶ ʔiðaaː ʔinʃaːʔ nmwðd͡ʒ ðkaːʔ aʶːsˤtˤnaʶːʕj hl ʔantj maːrj hj tħtaːd͡ʒh ʔakθr mmːaː jħtaːd͡ʒhaː wʔanbtnaː ʕljh ʃd͡ʒra mn jqtˤjn aːlsrjr aːlðj d͡ʒlst ʕljh ltwk hw srjr d͡ʒdtj qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabːi aːlfalaqi ʔanaː mslm ʔanaː maːzlt ʔaħaːwl aːn ʔaʕzf ʕlaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr mθl ʔirjk klaːbtwn qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː ʁajra ðij ʕiwad͡ʒin laʕalːahum jatːaquwna ʔard͡ʒw aʶːjdˤaʶː mn aːld͡ʒmjʕ mʃaːrka aːlmnʃwr lˤjsˤlˤ aːllːahi waaːllːahu baʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶn bimaaː jaʕmaluwna walajsa huwa min ʔaaqsaaːmi maaː juʃkilu ʕalaaː man taʶsˤaʶwːaʶrˤaʶhuʶ laː ʔaħd jʕbr nhraː dwn ʔan jbtl fʔaχð aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤj jdh wʔamsk bjd d͡ʒħaː wnd͡ʒaː aʶːlˤðˤlˤm ðˤlˤmaʶːt jwm aːlqjaːma waʕalaaː ʔaːχara man ʔaamːala aːlbaqaaːʔa waqad raʔaaaː maʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶʕaʶnaʶaʶː fahuwa maʁruwrun ʔaħb qtˤk sjkwn ʁrjbanaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ aːltħdθ mʕk ʕn ʔamr tˤaʶːrˤʔiʶ laaː sijːamaaː ʔiðaaː qalːa kl maː ʔaʕrfh hw ʔanh mn aʶːlˤsˤjn maːðaː fʕlti qaːl zjd: hðaː nhaːr d͡ʒmjl ʔaħb hðaː aːlktaːb ʔakθr mn ʁjrh hnaː ntklm baːlʔisbaːnja ʔaːtt ʕndj ftaːa tʕrf km hj ʔan juzhr ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʕnwaːnhaː mtaːʕ qljl wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm ʔabj jħb aːlbjtzaː hl tðkr aːlljla aːltj tqaːblnaː fjhaː ʔawl mra km hdjaan ttwqʕ ʔanhaː aːstlmt fj aːlʔid͡ʒaːza aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ kaːn brws ʁdˤbaʶːnaʶnaʶː ħjn trkth χljlth lknh srʕaːn maː nsj aːlʔamr ʔinmaː jstd͡ʒjb aːlðjn jsmʕwn waːlmwtaː jbʕθhm aːllh θm ʔiljh jrd͡ʒʕwn ʕalaaː sururin maʶwdˤuʶwnaʶaʶiʶn ldjnaː hr ʔaʶbjdˤ ʔanaː ʔaʃrb aːlkħwl kθjraː ʔaʶuʶsˤjb bd͡ʒrwħ fj aːlmʕrka kaːn ðlk mnð ʕda snjn ʔaj qaːmws tʕnjh waʔaalqat maaː fijhaaː wataχalːat ʔanaː nðˤrˤt fj ʔaʕjun twm wʔaχbrtau aːlħqjqa qaaːluwaː laaː dˤaʶjrˤaʶ ʔiinːaaː ʔiilaaː rabːinaaː munqalibuwna ʔaqlʕt aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ fj aːlsaːʕa aːlʕaːʃra baʶːlˤdˤbtˤ jwm aːlʔaħd hw ʔawl jwm fj aːlʔasbwʕ ʔiilaːːa aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶlˤːiʶjnaʶ ʔantan ʕljka fqtˤ ʔan tʕdunj bʃjʔ waːħd ʃjʔiaː wlaː hm jnsˤrˤwn waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuqafːaʕi sˤaʶħiʶħ aʶːlˤʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔ, ʔiðaː kaːn hnaːk ʔaj mnhaː km sʕr hðaː aːlfstaːn ʔaχj mdrs laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː ʔaqwl lʔad͡ʒʕlk tʃʕr bʃʕwr ʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔiinːa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqːi walitud͡ʒzaaː kulːu nafsin bimaaː kasabat wahum laaː juʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶwnaʶ ʔinhaː tʕml bd͡ʒd laː, lm ʔaktbhu bʕd wʔinj klmaː dʕwthm ltʁfr lhm d͡ʒʕlwaː ʔaʶsˤaʶːbʕhm fj ʔaːðaːnhm waːstʁʃwaː θjaːbhm wʔaʶsˤrˤwaʶː waːstkbrwaː aːstkbaːraː lm ʔaʕlm bhðaː aːlħdθ ħtaː aːlbaːrħa mustawd͡ʒibanaː lˤiʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶm waʶmuʶnaʶaʶːsˤaʶħaʶtiʶhiʶm tχrd͡ʒ hðh waʔaantum ħijnaʔiiðin taʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ walam nastad͡ʒiz aːlʔiiχlaaːla biðikrihi waʔaamːaaː aːlbirːu fmn aːbtʁaː wraːʔ ðlk fʔawlʔik hm aːlʕaːdwn lm jfrn ʔinh qwj kaʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn mn aːlðj rbħ wataħrijfu faaːsd͡ʒuduwaː lilːahi waaːʕbuduwaː jwm tʃhd ʕljhm ʔalsnthm wʔajdjhm wʔard͡ʒlhm bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn ʔaad͡ʒidu ðalika muzʕid͡ʒaːan ln jwðˤfkn ʔaħd ðlk d͡ʒzjnaːhm bmaː kfrwaː whl nd͡ʒaːzj ʔilaː aːlkfwr ʕalajhi wasalːama qaːla: jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔasaːʕdau tilka aːldːaaːru aːlʔaːχiraau nad͡ʒʕaluhaaː lilːaðijna laaː jurijduwna ʕuluwːanaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaaː fasaaːdanaː waaːlʕaaːqibaau lilmutːaqijna traːd͡ʒʕ mnːaːd hðh draːd͡ʒtj ʔinh ðkj sʔaʶħdˤrˤ lk qljlaː mn aːlmaːʔ jtħdθ ʔaʁlb aːlnaːs hnaː aːlfrnsja sʔalt sˤaʶːħbaʶ aːlmħl: " wlkn ʔalaː tðˤnhaʶː kbjra qljlanaː " hl maːzlti trjdjn ʃaːjaːan kθjraː mʕ ʔamːh lm ʔabħθ ʕnkn ʔabdaː baːnkwk hj ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ taːjlaːnd ʕd͡ʒbaː lk ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr jhwdj lqd faqadwaː θiqatahum fj twm hw jlʕb ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw jʕd͡ʒbnj ʕrˤdˤk lm jrd aːlrʔijs ljnkwln ʔan aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ mkaːlma haːtfja mn maːrj ʔaalam jad͡ʒidka jatijmanaː faʔaːwaaː kjfa ħaːlik nħn ðaːhbwn ʔilaː aːlmnzl aːlħaːd͡ʒa tftq aːlħjla ʔaʶʕtˤh ʔijaːh ʔanaː ʔaðaːkr θlaːθ saːʕaːt jwmjaːan ljs fqtˤ aːnt bl aːnaː aʶːjdˤaʶː knt aːlmʕnj wjklm aːlnaːs fj aːlmhd wkhlaː wmn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn ʔinhaː rqjqa hðaː aːlʕlm d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː fajaqilːu fij aːlnːaaːsi aːlħasadu waaːlmuraaːʔiija bihi maħquwrun laaː nχʃaː aʶːlˤχtˤwb kaːn saːmj jrkn sjːaːrth bd͡ʒaːnb mnzl baːja ʕad͡ʒibt liman jaħtamij min aʶːlˤtˤːaʶjːiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶ maχaaːfaaa aːldːaaːʔi maaː salakakum fij saqara laː tsttˤjʕ ʃrb maːʔ aːlbħr lʔanh maːlħ qaːl aːlʔab jaːlk mn sˤbj ʃaʶːtˤrˤ ʕzf lhaː d͡ʒjm aːlbjaːnw mhmaː ħaːwlt fʔinj lst qaːdraː ʕlaː tðkr ʕnwaːnhaː sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr, aːljwm ldjnaː tˤqsuʶ d͡ʒmjl kaːn d͡ʒwrd͡ʒ mkswr aʶːlˤχaʶːtˤrˤ hl jtħdθ ʔaħdun aːlʔind͡ʒljzja qaaːla haðaaː sˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤuʶn ʕalajːa mustaqijmun mtaː ʔaqflt hðh aːlbaːb ʔaːχr mra fnzl mn ħmjm lqd mdˤt θlaːθa snwaːt mnð wfaːth hðaː aːlktaːb ljs bd͡ʒdjdin wfd͡ʒrnaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʕjwnaː faːltqaː aːlmaːʔ ʕlaː ʔamr qd qdr aːlʕilmu χajrun min aːlmaaːli ʔanaː mn aːljwnaːn aːlktaːbu shlun wʔinaː lnʕlm ʔan mnkm mkðbjn tʕaːzjː waʕarafta faʶdˤlˤaʶhuʶ wtˤlˤħ mndˤwd qsˤft waaːlmanːaaːnaau aːlːatij tamunːu ʕalaaː zawd͡ʒihaaː bimaaːlihaaː kaːn tˤwlˤh θmaːnja ʔamtaːr maːðaː ʕsaːnj ʔan ʔafʕl bdwnk lqd zrtu baːrjs mra ʔilaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt flhm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʕulamaaːʔi aːlsːalafi θumːa ʔiinːakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai tubʕaθuwna kjjf hj ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ aːwkraːnjaː ʔanaː sʕjda ʔaʶħdˤrˤ aʶːlˤtˤʕaʶːm ʔiinːamaaː tuwʕaduwna lˤaʶsˤaʶaʶːdiʶquʶn fʔinhm janfad͡ʒir fðkr ʔinmaː ʔant mðkr wahuwa biaːlħamdi ʔaad͡ʒdaru wabiaːlθːanaaːʔi ʔaaħaqːu wlqd ftnaː sljmaːn wʔalqjnaː ʕlaː krsjh d͡ʒsdaː θm ʔanaːb θumːa maaː ʔaadraaːka maaː jawmu aːldːijni laː ʔaʶsˤdq mustaʁrabin ħjθ hnaːk ʔiraːda - hnaːk tˤrˤjqaʶ jmkn aːstχdaːmh kskjn maːðaː tqwl aːlʔimrʔaa waqijla liʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalajhimaaː aːlsːalaaːmu waħukija ʔaanːa aːlʔiiskandara qaaːla liħukamaaːʔi aːlʕaːʃra " ħjθ ʔanh jtm aʶːdˤaʶːfaʶ d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda jwmjaː jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlbnk aːljwm nazala bihi aːlrːuwħu aːlʔaamijnu ʔaʕjʃ fj qtˤrˤ sʔaðhb mʕk wamaθalanaː fij aːlʔaːχarijna mhmtk ʔan td͡ʒmʕ aːlʔawraːq aːlmjta fj aːlħdjqa kaːnt ʁrfa kbjra lm jwaːfq saːmj bal d͡ʒahiltu ʔahm ʃjʔ ʔan tkn sˤbwrˤaʶːaʶn ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlsːamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ bal laː jwqinwna kaːn saːmj hnaː fj ʔilaː ʔan tʕwd ʔilaː aːlmnzl ljs hðaː mhmaːan ʔanaː wtwm hnaː lmsaːʕdtk rbːmaː kaːn mrˤjdˤaʶː ʔiinːa rabːaka jaʶqdˤj bajnahum biħukmihi wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlʕaljmu watud͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː ʔaχjraːan aːstslm kaːn saːmj χaːʔifaː mn ʔan tdˤħk ʕljh ljlaː dχl aːlmdrːs aːlqlwb ʕnd bʕdˤhaʶː kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁrjb ħqːaː maː lwnh zaːr saːmj aːlmstʃfaː laː tns ʔan tbʕθ aːlrːsaːʔil mn mrkz aːlbrjd ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj rˤmdˤaʶːnh aːlʔawːl fj msˤrˤ ʔard͡ʒːħ ʔanːj sʔansaː ðlk kn lajiːnanaː fj ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan fj ʁjr ʕnf man ʔaawʁart sˤaʶdrˤaʶhuʶ aːstadʕajt ʃarːahu jkrh saːmj aːltːnqːl mn mnzl lʔaːχr liʔaanːa aːlnːaaːsa bimaʕrifatihi jarʃuduwna jawmaʔiiðin tuħadːiθu ʔaaχbaːrahaː aʶːlˤsˤdq jħsn baːlftaː waːlkðb jħsb mn ʕjwbh lukm saːmj fj fmh drs saːmj aːlmsrħ wamuʁrisanaː naaːmijanaː ʔaʶtˤwlˤ mn jwm aːlfraːq ʔaam ʔaabramwaː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːaː mubrimwna laː tqlq ʔanaː hnaː aːlʔaːn litaʃaaːʁulihi ʕanhaaː faʔiinːamaː jasːarnaːhu bilisaːnika laʕalːahum jataðakːarwna ʃχsˤ aːsmh aːjtwh makaaːʔiidu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ʔajn jʕjʃ aʶːlˤʃːjtˤaʶːn kaːnaː faʶːdˤlˤ w daːnja jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn bsˤwt mrtfʕ kaːnaː ljlaː w saːmj jqrʕaːn ʕlaː ʔabwaːb aːlnːaːs lnʃr aːlklaːm aʶːlˤtˤːjːb walaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhiluwna qaːlwaː ʔinaː ttˤjrˤnaʶː bkm lʔin lm tnthwaː lnrd͡ʒmnkm wljmsnkm mnaː ʕðaːb ʔaljm ʃrqnaː qlbh ʔabdaːan lbnaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jtħdθ lʁaan waːħdaan kjf ʕlmti ðlk wmaː jʔumn ʔakθrhm baːllh ʔilaː whm mʃrkwn ljs sjʔiaːan hl nsttˤjʕ ʔan nðhb wlqd ʔarslnaː mn qblk fj ʃjʕ aːlʔawljn lajsa aːlʁabijːu bisajːidin fij qawmihi lakinːa sajːida qawmihi aːlmutaʁaaːbij waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai lsʕjhaː rˤaʶːdˤjaʶ nrjd d͡ʒmlaː mktmla wnwħaː ʔið naːdaː mn qbl faːstd͡ʒbnaː lh fnd͡ʒjnaːh wʔahlh mn aːlkrb aʶːlˤʕðˤjm waʶjaʶftˤiʶnuʶ liljasijri min maaːlihi ʔin wahaaː waaːχtalːa mn ðaː aːlðj jqrˤdˤ aːllh qrˤdˤaʶː ħsnaː fjdˤaʶːʕfh lh wlh ʔad͡ʒr krjm aːlχbz d͡ʒaːf waːlmaːʔ baːrd waqaaːruwna wafirʕawna wahaaːmaaːna walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔahum muwsaaː biaːlbajːinaaːti faaːstakbaruwaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaaː kaaːnuwaː saaːbiqijna haʔuulaaːʔi zuhːaaːdun aːstʕml hðaː aʶːlˤsˤndwq aːlχʃbj kkrsj mn fdˤlˤk namuwtu wanaħjaaː ʕalaaː ʕahdihaaː ħajaaːaa aːlkiraaːmi wamawta aʶːlˤʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːm qaaːla jaaː qawmi lajsa bij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶuʶn walakinːij rasuwlun min rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna wakaðalika ħaqːat kalimatu rabːika ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaanːahum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnːaaːri waʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶtiʶhiʶ wabanijhi hl tʕrf maː aːðaː kaːn jmkn ʔan jʔatj aːljnaː ʁdaːan lwlaː jnhaːhm aːlrbaːnjwn waːlʔaħbaːr ʕn qwlhm aːlʔiθm wʔaklhm aːlsħt lbʔis maː kaːnwaː jsˤnʕwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm tbt jdaː ʔabj aːlnaːr ʔinːhu ħznun jdˤnjnj wʔantmaː tqwlaːn ʔanh jdˤnjkmaʶː waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ frʃnaːhaː fnʕm aːlmaːhdwn aːllh jsˤtˤfj mn aːlmlaːʔika rslaː wmn aːlnaːs ʔin aːllh smjʕ bsˤjrˤ hl ʃkrthu, hl qlt ʃkraːan lk tʕaːlj bʕd ʁd fajakufːu ʕan aːliaːzdijaaːdi fjhmaː mn kl faːkha zwd͡ʒaːn waqad ʔaaʕðara nabijːu aːllːahi lˤuʶwtˤuʶn ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu nafsahu ħijna ʕadima ʕaʃijraaan taʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶhuʶ wtðrwn maː χlq lkm rbkm mn ʔazwaːd͡ʒkm bl ʔantm qwm ʕaːdwn liʔaanːa aʶːlˤtːaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕaʶ ʕaʶtˤuʶwfuʶn waaːlʕud͡ʒba munafːirun mrd͡ʒ aːlbħrjn jltqjaːn qd jkwn hðaː ʔalð ʕsˤjrˤ ʃrbth fj ħjaːtj qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh wʔarsl fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn ʁajra muqalːilin walaaː sanafruʁu lakum ʔaajːuhaaː aːlθːaqalaːni qaaːla faaːχrud͡ʒ minhaaː faʔiinːaka rad͡ʒijmun waʔiið jaquwlu aːlmunaaːfiquwna waaːlːaðijna fij quluwbihim maʶrˤaʶdˤuʶn maaː waʕadanaaː aːllːahu warasuwluhu ʔiilːaaː ʁuruwranaː ʔin sʕjkm lʃtaː ʔanaː sʕjd flˤstˤjn daːrj wdrb aʶːntsˤaʶːrˤj flˤstˤjn θaːrj wʔaʶrˤdˤ aʶːlˤsˤmwd snʕrf kjf nsˤlˤħ hðaː btˤrˤjqaʶ ʔaw bʔaχraː waθamuwdu waqawmu lˤuʶwtˤiʶn waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai ʔauwlaʔiika aːlʔaaħzaaːbu wlmaː d͡ʒaːʔt rslnaː lˤwtˤaʶː sjʔ bhm wdˤaʶːq bhm ðrʕaː wqaːl hðaː jwm ʕsˤjb jraːwdnj aːlrːad͡ʒulu min aːltːuraaːbi fahamːuhu fij aːltːuraaːbi hðaː aːlbaːb ʔawtwmaːtjkj waːlʃfʕ waːlwtr hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tsaːʕdnj qljlaː waʔiin kaaːna aːlʕaqdu raʁbaaan fij aːlʔaulfaai fahaðaaː jakuwnu waθamuwda ðwaːtaː ʔafnaːn fkðbwh fʔaχðthm aːlrd͡ʒfa fʔaʶsˤbħwaʶː fj daːrhm d͡ʒaːθmjn walaqad nad͡ʒːajnaaː banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla mina aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlmuhijni maaː lakum laaː taʶnaʶaʶːsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ baːlʁdw waʶːlˤʔaʶːsˤaʶːlˤ lw kaːn hʔulaːʔ ʔaːlha maː wrdwhaː wkl fjhaː χaːldwn hl ðlk jχsˤk hl hðhi hdja lj aʶːlˤsˤjdlˤjaʶ qrjba mn aːlmstʃfaː waaːlʔiidlaaːlu fij aːlʔaabnaaːʔi fij muqaaːbalaai aːlmaħabːaai fij aːlʔaːbaaːʔi wakaaːnuwaː muluwka madjana wlqd ʔawħj ʔiljk wʔilaː aːlðjn mn qblk lʔin ʔaʃrkt lˤjħbtˤn ʕmlk wltkwnn mn aːlχaːsrjn kaðːaba aːlːaðijna min qablihim faʔaataaːhumu aːlʕaðaaːbu min ħajθu laaː jaʃʕuruwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man balaʁa ʔaaʃudːahu laaːqij min aːlʕilmi ʔaaʃudːahu jwm tkwn aːlsmaːʔ kaːlmhl laː tns d͡ʒlb ʔadwaːt aʶːlˤmtˤbχ ؛ mθl: aːlskaːkjn wʔaːnja aʶːlˤtˤbχ χmn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːʔiʶb: " ʔin kaːnwaː mn aːlsraːʕjf fnʕm " kam ʔaqmt hw jʕrf ʕʃra lʁaːt wasajud͡ʒanːabuhaaː aːlʔaatqaaː kaːnt ljlaː ħrˤjsˤaʶ ʕlaː aʶːlˤnːðˤaʶːm ʔinhaː tħb aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ ʃfjt mn aʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ falawlaaː ʔaanːahu kaaːna mina aːlmusabːiħijna wanahaaː ʔaːχarijna ʕan aːlsːuʔuaaːli wazad͡ʒara ʕanhu fqdrnaː fnʕm aːlqaːdrwn jaː ħðˤː aːlmkaːn bjk wlmn χaːf mqaːm rbh d͡ʒntaːn ʔawlʔik d͡ʒzaːʔuhm ʔan ʕljhm lʕna aːllh waːlmlaːʔika waːlnaːs ʔad͡ʒmʕjn wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːlljl lbaːsaː lqd aːsthlkt ħðaːʔk baːld͡ʒrj mn dkaːnin ʔilaː dkaːn wahuwa laaː jaʶtaʶsˤaʶwːaʶrˤuʶhaʶaʶː walaaː jafhamu maaː taʶdˤaʶmːaʶnaʶhaʶaʶː jarwij biʁajri rawijːaain wjstʕd͡ʒlwnk baːlʕðaːb wlwlaː ʔad͡ʒl msmaː ld͡ʒaːʔhm aːlʕðaːb wljʔatjnhm bʁta whm laː jʃʕrwn ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna badːaluwaː niʕmata aːllːahi kufranaː waʔaaħalːuwaː qawmahum daaːra aːlbawaaːri waːlðjn hm llzkaːa faːʕlwn aːlqnbla aːlnwwja hj slaːħ fðˤjʕ aːlthmt aːlnːjraːn mnzl ljlaː wʔatjnaːk baːlħq wʔinaː lˤsˤaʶːdqwn kun d͡ʒaːdanːaː ʔard͡ʒwk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sʔal saːʔil bʕðaːb waːqʕ wtraː kl ʔama d͡ʒaːθja kl ʔama tdʕaː ʔilaː ktaːbhaː aːljwm td͡ʒzwn maː kntm tʕmlwn ʔajn ʔaqrb fndq klːu aʶːlˤqsˤaʶːʔiʶdiʶ mn ʕjnjki ʔaqbshaː maː hj twsˤjtk jaː ħðˤː naːs tʃwfk waaːlːaðijna ʕamiluwaː aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti θumːa taaːbuwaː min baʕdihaaː waʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinːa rabːaka min baʕdihaaː laʁafuwrun raħijmun qraːrh mn aːlaːn wlaː fsˤlˤ aʶːlˤsˤjf ʔiðaː ʔaklt lqmh hjʔat lʔaχraː raqijbanaː ʕalaaː aːlnːufuwsi fij χalawaaːtihaaː klaː ʔiðaː dkt aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ dkaː dkaː qad sˤaʶdːaʶqtaʶ aːlrːuʔujaaː ʔiinːaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna whw aːlðj χlq aːlljl waːlnhaːr waːlʃms waːlqmr kl fj flk jsbħwn ʔin ʔaħbbt fsʔaʕlmk kjf tlʕb aʶːlˤʃtˤrˤnd͡ʒ mntdaː aːlsʔudd wħmـaːh twm ħsˤlˤ ʕlaː hðh aːldraːd͡ʒa mn maːrj fmaːl aːlðjn kfrwaː qblk mhtˤʕjn waqamaʕa ʃarːahu laː jʕjrwnnj aːntbaːhanaː waʔiin jurijduwaː χijaaːnataka faqad χaaːnuwaː aːllːaha min qablu faʔaamkana minhum waaːllːahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun aːʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh jħjj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ bʕd mwthaː qd bjnaː lkm aːlʔaːjaːt lʕlkm tʕqlwn ʔaʕml fj msˤnʕ ʔanaː ʔajsr lqd χdʕthu jbdw mslmaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ tˤuʶwbaʶaʶː lahum waħusnu maʔaːbin bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waʶaʶːlˤtˤːuʶwrˤiʶ waʔaajsaru tabaðːulanaː hl tʕlm ʔaj ktaːb trjd ʔan tqrʔah waqaaːla labijdun wd͡ʒʕlwaː llh ʔandaːdaː lˤjdˤlˤwaʶː ʕn sbjlh ql tmtʕwaː fʔin msˤjrˤkm ʔilaː aːlnaːr jaː lhaː mn rjħ qwja wahaðihi aʶːlˤtˤːaʶbaʶqaʶaʶuʶ mimːan laaː jurd͡ʒaaː lahaaː sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶn walaaː juʔumalu lahaaː falaaːħun waqawma nuwħin lamːaaː kaðːabuwaː aːlrːusula ʔaaʁraqnaaːhum wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum lilnːaaːsi ʔaːjaaan waʔaaʕtadnaaː lˤiʶlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː fʔarslnaː ʕljhm aʶːlˤtˤwfaʶːn waːld͡ʒraːd waːlqml waʶːlˤdˤfaʶːdʕ waːldm ʔaːjaːt mfsˤlˤaʶːt faːstkbrwaː wkaːnwaː qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn qul maaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmutakalːifijna waaːlːaðijna saʕawaː fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː muʕaaːd͡ʒizijna ʔauwlaʔiika lahum ʕaðaaːbun min rid͡ʒzin ʔaalijmun jaː ʔabt laː tʕbd aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn ʔin aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn kaːn llrħmn ʕsˤjaʶː kbr mqtaː ʕnd aːllh ʔan tqwlwaː maː laː tfʕlwn ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːltrkjz wahuwa maʃkuwrun fij maʕuwnatihi aːlkðb ħblh qsˤjrˤ dmd͡ʒ fkrtjn fj fkra waʔiiðaaː buʃːira ʔaaħaduhum bimaaː dˤaʶrˤaʶbaʶ lilrːaħmani maθalanaː ðˤaʶlˤːaʶ wad͡ʒhuhu muswadːanaː wahuwa kaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn aːnhaː raːʔiħa sjʔia qbl ʔan tktb ʃjʔianaː jnbʁj ʔan ttʔakd mn aːlħqaːʔiq faʔiinːa man nafaða ʔaamruhu fahuwa ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi ʔaaħwad͡ʒu faaːd͡ʒtabaaːhu rabːuhu fad͡ʒaʕalahu mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶjnaʶ aːlːaðijna juqijmuwna aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ wajuʔutuwna aːlzːakaaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum juwqinuwna aːljawma naχtimu ʕalaaː ʔaafwaaːhihim watukalːimunaaː ʔaajdijhim wataʃhadu ʔaard͡ʒuluhum bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna wamaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum min kutubin jadrusuwnahaaː wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilajhim qablaka min naðijrin wmn aʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn mn jʁwsˤwn lh wjʕmlwn ʕmlaː dwn ðlk wknaː lhm ħaʶːfðˤjn ʔaajuʃrikuwna maaː laaː jaχluqu ʃajʔianaː wahum juχlaquwna ðalika lijaʕlama ʔaanːij lam ʔaaχunhu biaːlʁajbi waʔaanːa aːllːaha laaː jahdij kajda aːlχaaːʔiinijna waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ðaaːti aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdʕiʶ walaaː janbaʁij ʔaan jad͡ʒhala min nafsihi mablaʁa ʕilmihaaː waʔaanzalnaaː mina aʶːlˤmuʶʕsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtiʶ maaːʔan θad͡ʒːaaːd͡ʒanaː qaaːlat ʔaanːaaː jakuwnu lij ʁulaaːmun walam jamsasnij baʃarun walam ʔaaku baʁijːanaː wʔimaː jnzʁnk mn aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn nzʁ faːstʕð baːllh ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faqulnaaː aʶːdˤrˤiʶbuʶwhuʶ biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶhaʶaʶː kaðalika juħjij aːllːahu aːlmawtaaː wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi laʕalːakum taʕqiluwna aːlʃbaːb aːlʔamd͡ʒdu falamːaaː aːʕtazalahum wamaaː jaʕbuduwna min duwni aːllːahi wahabnaaː lahu ʔiisħaaːqa wajaʕquwba wakulːanaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː nabijːanaː ʔaj hðh aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ qtˤk lqd ʔiʶstjqðˤtuʶ mtʔaχraan aːljwm ʔinːa aːlʕud͡ʒba lajaʔakulu aːlħasanaaːti kamaaː taʔakulu aːlnːaaːru aʶːlˤħaʶtˤaʶbaʶ qaaːla faman rabːukumaaː jaaː muwsaaː lʔantm ʔaʃd rhba fj sˤdwrˤhm mn aːllh ðlk bʔanhm qwm laː jfqhwn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlmuʕtazːi ʔiχwaaːnu aːlʃːarːi kaʃad͡ʒari aːlnːaaːrind͡ʒi juħriqu baʶʕdˤuʶhaʶaʶː baʶʕdˤaʶnaʶː laqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum rasuwlun min ʔaanfusikum ʕazijzun ʕalajhi maaː ʕanitːum ħaʶrˤiʶjsˤuʶn ʕalajkum biaːlmuʔuminijna raʔuwfun raħijmun mtaː aʶːstjqðˤt hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ qaaːluwaː waʔaaqbaluwaː ʕalajhim maaːðaaː tafqiduwna ðlk bʔanhm ʃaːqwaː aːllh wrswlh wmn jʃaːqq aːllh wrswlh fʔin aːllh ʃdjd aːlʕqaːb lijad͡ʒzija aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔauwlaʔiika lahum maʁfiraaun warizqun karijmun ħqqt ħlm aːlʔama ʔam lhm ʔilh ʁjr aːllh sbħaːn aːllh ʕmaː jʃrkwn hl jmknnj ʔan ʔaːkl hðaː d͡ʒaːʔt aːʔilaː aːljaːbaːn ʕndmaː kaːnt sˤʁjrˤaʶ wʔiðaː ʕlm mn ʔaːjaːtnaː ʃjʔiaː aːtχðhaː hzwaː ʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb mhjn kaːn saːmj jlʕb kra aːlqdm lmaːðaː jsˤʕd hʔulaːʔ aːlnaːs ʕlaː aːlsqf ʔiin juwħaaː ʔiilajːa ʔiilːaaː ʔaanːamaaː ʔaanaaː naðijrun mubijnun hw trknj ʔaðhb lqd ʔiltqjnaː ʕlaː aːlmmr qaːl twm: ʔinh kaːn skraːn ħjwaːnaːt aːlbaːndaː aʶːlˤdˤχmaʶ tʕjʃ fj aʶːlˤsˤjn fqtˤ waaːlːaðijna jaʶsˤiʶlˤuʶwnaʶ maaː ʔaamara aːllːahu bihi ʔaan juʶwsˤaʶlˤaʶ wajaχʃawna rabːahum wajaχaaːfuwna suwʔa aːlħisaaːbi ʔaʕrf aːlħq tʕrf ʔahlh waʔaanfaqa min faʶdˤlˤiʶn wadːuwaː law tudhinu fajudhinuwna waːlðjn hm ʕn aːllʁw mʕrˤdˤwn mlk aːlnaːs maː tsbq mn ʔama ʔad͡ʒlhaː wmaː jstʔaχrwn waʶaʶːχfiʶdˤ d͡ʒanaaːħaka limani aːtːabaʕaka mina aːlmuʔuminijna laaː jakun ħubːuk kalafanaː sjkwn qaːdraː ʕlaː ʔimdaːdnaː bmʕlwmaːt ʔakθr ʕn nʃʔaa aːlkwn wʔakjd kjdaː wʔiðaː ʔalqwaː mnhaː mkaːnaː dˤjqaʶː mqrnjn dʕwaː hnaːlk θbwraː ʔiin kulːu nafsin lamːaaː ʕalajhaaː ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶn hðaː hw aːlmkaːn aːlðj tʕjʃ fjh ʔiðaaː qaʕadt bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔaaraʔaajta aːlːaðij jukaðːibu biaːldːijni jamħuw aːllːahu maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajuθbitu waʕindahu ʔaumːu aːlkitaaːbi aːllʁa aːlʕrbjːa lʁaun d͡ʒmjlaaun ʔajhmaː d͡ʒaːʔ ʔawlaːan aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʔam aʶːlˤbjdˤaʶ bdaː aːltʕb ʕlaː naːnsj kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔiχbaːr twm bʔan jʁaːdr sajaðːakːaru man jaχʃaaːaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha judaaːfiʕu ʕani aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː juħibːu kulːa χawːaaːnin kafuwrin aːllh ʔakbr waaːlrːaʔiijsi maʕa sˤaʶħaʶaʶːbaʶtiʶhiʶ ql mn jklʔukm baːlljl waːlnhaːr mn aːlrħmn bl hm ʕn ðkr rbhm mʕrˤdˤwn lm ʔard aːstʕmaːl aːlhaːtf ʔaalam ʔaaʕhad ʔiilajkum jaaː banij ʔaːdama ʔaan laaː taʕbuduwaː aʶːlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ ʔiinːahu lakum ʕaduwːun mubijnun raːʔiħa hðaː aːllħm fðˤjʕaʶ quʶtˤuʶwfuʶhaʶaʶː daaːnijaaun sˤdjqtj hnaː aːsmj ljs fj aːlqaːʔima tuks hw tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤ mn ʔantaːrktjkaː lm jkn twm d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː ħqaː aːlʃtj aːktr fsˤlˤ bħbh mn tntðˤrˤ waʔiin tadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː aːlhudaaː laaː jasmaʕuwaː wataraaːhum jaʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʔiilajka wahum laaː juʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ jasmaʕu ʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi tutlaaː ʕalajhi θumːa juʶsˤiʶrˤːuʶ mustakbiranaː kaʔaan lam jasmaʕhaaː fabaʃːirhu biʕaðaaːbin ʔaalijmin maaː lakum laaː tard͡ʒuwna lilːahi waqaaːranaː ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna ʔauwtuwaː naʶsˤiʶjbaʶnaʶː mina aːlkitaaːbi jaʃtaruwna aʶːlˤdˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ wajurijduwna ʔaan taʶdˤiʶlˤːuʶwaʶː aːlsːabijla nħn mtˤjʕwn lhm ʕðaːb fj aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː wlʕðaːb aːlʔaːχra ʔaʃq wmaː tqnjaːt ðkaːʔ aʶːsˤtˤnaʶːʕj llʁa aːlʕrbja w aːn lm tkn mχtsˤaʶː fj blaːd aːltwaːrq jʃrb aːlnaːs ħljb aːlnaːqa ʃʕrt baːlʔasf td͡ʒaːh ðlk aʶːlˤtˤflˤ ʔaftmaːrwnh ʕlaː maː jraː faraaːʁa ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihi fad͡ʒaaːʔa biʕid͡ʒlin samijnin aːlhatːu aːlkasru waaːlbatːu aʶːlˤqaʶtˤʕuʶ fswf jdʕw θbwraː ln jsˤbkm ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː aːrw qsˤaʶ d͡ʒmjla lˤsˤdjqj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ jawma laː juʁnij ʕanhum kajduhum ʃajʔianaː walaː hum juʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ laː jmshm fjhaː nsˤb wmaː hm mnhaː bmχrd͡ʒjn faʔaaχaðnaaːhu wad͡ʒunuwdahu fanabaðnaaːhum fij aːljamːi faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aʶːlˤðˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ waqaaːla baʃːaaːru bnu burdin aːrtdaː aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤbaʶːʔ ʔaqnʕa bjdˤaʶːʔ tʁtˤj ʔafwaːhhm w ʔanwfhm ʔanaː mtħkm fj nfsj kj laː ʔafqd sˤwaʶːbj jmjl aʶːlˤʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ aːlʔanaːnjːjn ʔilaː aːtːχaːð ʔaːraːʔ θaːba ħtːaː w ʔin lm tkn sˤħjħaʶ jʃhdh aːlmqrbwn fʔamaː mn tˤʁaʶː ltrwn aːld͡ʒħjm ʔanaː mn ʔisbaːnjaː qaaːluwaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶkuʶm maʕakum ʔaaʔiin ðukːirtum bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifuwna fʔaːtaːhm aːllh θwaːb
