ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jktb χiʶtˤaʶːbaʶːt bʕd aːlʔaːn θumːa ʔiinːa lahum ʕalajhaaː laʃawbanaː min ħamijmin maaː χalqukum walaaː baʕθukum ʔiilːaaː kanafsin waaːħidaain ʔiinːa aːllːaha samijʕun baʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶn tmjl mʃklaːt jwmnaː aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕja ʔilaː aːltʕqjd ʔakθr fʔakθr waːlχjl waːlbʁaːl waːlħmjr ltrkbwhaː wzjna wjχlq maː laː tʕlmwn hal ʔaunabːiʔiukum ʕalaaː man tanazːalu aʶːlˤʃːaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjnuʶ ʕwjl aːlðʔiaːb kaaːlmuhli jaʁlij fij aʶːlˤbuʶtˤuʶwniʶ ðrhm jʔaklwaː wjtmtʕwaː wjlhhm aːlʔaml fswf jʕlmwn laː tʃʁlnj ʕn ʕmlj mn fdˤlˤk kun χlaːqaːan hl ʔanti bχjr aːlʔaːn waʔaanʃada aːlrːijaaːʃijːu ʔanaː ʔaʶʕaʶːrˤdˤ ðlk bʃda wʔanaː lmsnaː aːlsmaːʔ fwd͡ʒdnaːhaː mlʔit ħrsaː ʃdjdaː wʃhbaː tuwfjt ʔaχtj aːlʕaːm aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj ʕaːm d͡ʒdjd sʕjd ʕan ʔamːi aːlmuʔuminjna ʔamːi ʕbdi aːllhi ʕaːʔiʃaa rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhaaː qaːlat: lqd kaːn jstħq aːlʕnaːʔ jawma tublaaː aːlsːaraaːʔiiru jmnj aːlsʕjda mnjtj aːllħm mtˤbwχ waqaaːla ʃajχun min banij sulajmin liaːbnihi jaaː bunajːa ʔijːaaːka waaːlrːaquwba aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤuʶwbaʶ aʶːlˤqaʶtˤuʶwbaʶ aʶːlˤdˤħk blaː sbb mn qla aːlʔadb fj aːlbraːjaː sjdaː ʕmr aːlsjda ʔarbʕwn ʕaːmanaː ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq nħw aːlħrja mzaːl tˤwjlˤ fqtˤ ʔaʶdˤf aːlmaːʔ fʔinmaː hj zd͡ʒra waːħda fʔiðaː hm jnðˤrˤwn fʔarsl frʕwn fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn wdaːnja ʕljhm ðˤlˤaʶːlˤhaʶː wðllt qtˤwfhaʶː tðljlaː maaː taʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ bihi aːlnːiʕmaau ʁaraaːmanaː waaːlzːaʕaaːmaau malaaːmanaː ʔataː aːlsjd braːwn ljraːk fwd͡ʒd ʔank ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶt aʶːlˤwaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ furqaaan waaːlʔaulfaau ʕadaaːwaaan waaːlbaħri aːlmasd͡ʒuwri sna aːllh aːltj qd χlt mn qbl wln td͡ʒd lsna aːllh tbdjlaː maːðaː jnbʁj ʔan jfʕlh fj rʔajkn ðalika bimaaː qadːamat ʔaajdijkum waʔaanːa aːllːaha lajsa biʶðˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi waʔaamːaaː aʶːlˤtˤːaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʃubhaaun taʶʕtaʶrˤiʶdˤuʶ aːlmaʕnaaː fatamnaʕu ʕan faʔiiðaaː kaaːna ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː aʶːntaʶsˤaʶrˤaʶ biaːlʔaulfaai ʕalaaː ʔaaʕaaːdijhi maː rʔajk baːlðhaːb lmʃaːhda flm wamaaː taʃaaːʔuuwna ʔiilaːːa ʔaan jaʃaaːʔ aːllːahu rabːu aːlʕaaːlamijna ldju ʔibna mtzwd͡ʒh mn rd͡ʒl frnsj ʔasʕd χtˤaʶːbuʶ aːlrʔijs aːlðj ʔalqaːh ʔams ʔaʶnsˤaʶːrˤh waʔaanːaaː ðˤaʶnaʶnːaʶaʶː ʔaan lan taquwla aːlʔiinsu waaːld͡ʒinːu ʕalaaː aːllːahi kaðibanaː mtkʔijn ʕlaː frʃ btˤaʶːʔiʶnhaʶː mn ʔistbrq wd͡ʒnaː aːld͡ʒntjn daːn aːlnaːr ðaːt aːlwqwd rd͡ʒʕ bχfj ħnjn aːlːaðijna jabχaluwna wajaʔamuruwna aːlnːaaːsa biaːlbuχli waman jatawalːa faʔiinːa aːllːaha huwa aːlʁanijːu aːlħamijdu jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs qd d͡ʒaːʔkm brhaːn mn rbkm wʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm nwraː mbjnaː aːlʃːaaːrida wajaqbal aːlʕaaːʔiida waʶjaʶħfaʶðˤ aːlmustawdaʕa faqada aːlmawd͡ʒuwda walam jad͡ʒid aːlmafquwda fʔamaː aːlðjn ʃqwaː ffj aːlnaːr lhm fjhaː zfjr wʃhjq wʔin jrwaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ saʶːqtˤaʶː jqwlwaː sħaːb mrkwm bʁja aːlaːχtbaːʔ mn aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ qdˤaʶː " djmaː " aːlljla fj sla qmaːma naħnu χalaqnaaːhum waʃadadnaaː ʔaasrahum waʔiiðaaː ʃiʔinaaː badːalnaaː ʔaamθaaːlahum tabdijlanaː falajsa limiθlihi fij aːlʔiiχaaːʔi ħaʶðˤːuʶn walaaː fij aːlwidaaːdi naʶsˤiʶjbuʶn maːðaː jrjd ʔan jfʕl faaːʕrif manzilatak min aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː bimanzilatik min aːlnːaaːsi θm jʔatj mn bʕd ðlk ʕaːm fjh jʁaːθ aːlnaːs wfjh jʕsˤrˤwn waʔiinːa kulːanaː lamːaaː lajuwafːijanːahum rabːuka ʔaaʕmaaːlahum ʔiinːahu bimaaː jaʕmaluwna χabijrun jawma taʃaqːaqu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ ʕanhum siraaːʕanaː ðalika ħaʃrun ʕalajnaaː jasijrun ʔiinːaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna ljs mʔuχraː tslm ʔijdk walaʔiin mutːum ʔaaw qutiltum laʔiilaaː aːllːahi tuħʃaruwna ʔard͡ʒwk dʕnj ʔaːχð ʔaχtk mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ maaː samiʕnaaː bihaðaaː fij aːlmilːaai aːlʔaːχiraai ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilːaaː aːχtilaaːqun wdˤʕt aːlsmaːʕa qrjbaː mn ʔaðnj mtʃrf bmʕrftk laː ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jrtdj rˤbtˤaʶ aːlʕunuq bʕd aːlʔaːn wjwm jʕdˤ aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤm ʕlaː jdjh jqwl jaː ljtnj aːtχðt mʕ aːlrswl sbjlaː hw ʔaχj wlaː tˤʕaʶːm ʔilaː mn ʁsljn ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsˤdqk, ʔant tkðb daːʔimaːan laː jftr ʕnhm whm fjh mblswn wʔaːt ðaː aːlqrbaː ħqh waːlmskjn waːbn aːlsbjl wlaː tbðr tbðjraː waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaaːru fud͡ʒːirat ʔaaqimi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ liduluwki aːlʃːamsi ʔiilaaː ʁasaqi aːllːajli waqurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiinːa qurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri kaaːna maʃhuwdanaː ʔawlʔik mʔawaːhm aːlnaːr bmaː kaːnwaː jksbwn ʔinkm wmaː tʕbdwn mn dwn aːllh ħsˤb d͡ʒhnm ʔantm lhaː waːrdwn aʶːnðˤrˤ kjf dˤrˤbwaʶː lk aːlʔamθaːl fdˤlˤwaʶː flaː jsttˤjʕwn sbjlaː twm laː jrjd mnj aːltħdθ ʕn maː naːqʃnaːh baːlʔams qaaːluwaː taaːllːahi laqad ʕalimtum maaː d͡ʒiʔinaaː linufsida fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaaː kunːaaː saaːriqijna aːlʔaːn bʔimkaːn aːlʃrka ʔan tbrr hðh aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːrˤjf wtlk aːlqraː ʔahlknaːhm lmaː ðˤlˤmwaʶː wd͡ʒʕlnaː lmhlkhm mwʕdaː qaːm aʶːlˤmtðˤaʶːhrˤwn bdˤrˤb aːlʕdjd mn rd͡ʒaːl aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ ħtaː aːlmwt tħqq md͡ʒddaːan hl ldjk ʔaj mʃkla fj ðlk famaaː lahum laaː juʔuminuwna trjd ljlaː ʔan tʕjʃ mʕ saːmj kzwd͡ʒth twm fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mʕ zbwn qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama: walaaː jatad͡ʒaaːwaza bihaaː qadra ħaqːihaaː hðaː jʕd͡ʒbnj kθjraː walajsa haðaaː aːlqawlu minhu tarʁijbanaː linabijːihi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama fijhaaː kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔan tsmʕ bʕnaːja waːldtj laː ttħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaːan kn ljnaːan mn ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan mn ʁjr ʕnf ʔant twaːʕdjn tˤaʶːlˤbaʶnaʶː mn kjʔiw ʔalst kðlk hðh tbdw kaːljwnaːnja lj lkn w baːlnsba lˤlˤnaʶːtˤqjn blʁa aːlʔisbraːntw fhðh tbdw klʁa aːlfwlaːbwk lajsa min aːlrːaʁbaai fij aːldːunjaaː aːktisaaːbu maaː jaʶsˤuʶwnaʶ aʶːlˤʕiʶrˤdˤaʶ fijhaaː wlʔin msthm nfħa mn ʕðaːb rbk ljqwln jaː wjlnaː ʔinaː knaː ðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔinh lqwl fsˤlˤ walaqad sˤaʶrˤːaʶfnaʶaʶː fij haðaaː aːlqurʔaːni lijaðːakːaruwaː wamaaː jazijduhum ʔiilːaaː nufuwranaː tsttˤjʕ aːlbħθ ʕn aːld͡ʒml aːltj tħtwj ʕlaː klma mʕjna waʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː trd͡ʒmaːt ltlk aːld͡ʒml faʔaarsalnaaː ʕalajhimu aʶːlˤtˤːuʶwfaʶaʶːnaʶ waaːld͡ʒaraaːda waaːlqumːala waʶaʶːlˤdˤːaʶfaʶaʶːdiʶʕaʶ waaːldːama ʔaːjaaːtin muʶfaʶsˤːaʶlˤaʶaʶːtiʶn faaːstakbaruwaː wakaaːnuwaː qawmanaː mud͡ʒrimijna hðaː aːlqraːr nhaːʔij hl tqsˤdjnj ʃarːu aːlkitaaːbaai aːlʃːabaqu kamaaː ʔaanːa ʃarːa aːlqiraaːʔaai aːlhaðramaau ʔin aːllh jʕlm ʁjb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waːllh bsˤjrˤ bmaː tʕmlwn ðaːk aːlkrsj aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ ldj laː ʃjʔ jʃtʁl ʔaʶʕtˤjhaʶː frˤsˤaʶ ʔaχraː ʕn ʔamjri aːlmʔumnjna ʔabj ħfsˤiʶn ʕmra bni aʶːlˤχtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːl: waʔiin jarawaː ʔaːjaaan juʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwaʶː wajaquwluwaː siħrun mːustamirːun ʔilaː frʕwn wmlʔih faːtbʕwaː ʔamr frʕwn wmaː ʔamr frʕwn brʃjd waːlðjn d͡ʒaːhdwaː fjnaː lnhdjnhm sblnaː wʔin aːllh lmʕ aːlmħsnjn hw laː jsttˤjʕ ʔan jtklm ħtaː aːlʔind͡ʒljzja naːhjk ʕn aːlʔalmaːnja kðb ʕljnaː kwnwaː mtsaːmħjn lˤiʶʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶnaʶaʶː aːlħaqːa min ʔaanfusinaaː aʶːntˤlˤqaʶ mn tˤwkjw ʔilaː ʔawzaːkaː ʕaːdaan, ʔaj mntdjaːt aːlnqaːʃ aːltj jstχdmhaː aːlfrnsjwn llħdjθ ʕn aːlsjaːsa waːlʔaumwr aːlmmaːθla wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið naːʕma ʕnd aːlʔiʃaːra tkwn aːlsaːʕa aːlwaːħda sˤbaʶːħaʶːaʶn wθmaːnin wχmsjn dqjqja wʔarbʕjn θaːnja ʔanaː msrwr lwd͡ʒwdk hnaː mʕj waraʔaaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna aːlnːaaːra faʶðˤaʶnːuʶwaʶː ʔaanːahum muwaaːqiʕuwhaaː walam jad͡ʒiduwaː ʕanhaaː maʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶnaʶː waːlðjn laː jʃhdwn aːlzwr wʔiðaː mrwaː baːllʁw mrwaː kraːmaː wamaaː bikum min niʕmaain famina aːllːahi θumːa ʔiiðaaː masːakumu aʶːlˤdˤːuʶrˤːuʶ faʔiilajhi tad͡ʒʔaaruwna wjaː qwm maː lj ʔadʕwkm ʔilaː aːlnd͡ʒaːa wtdʕwnnj ʔilaː aːlnaːr faðarhum ħatːaaː julaaːquwaː jawmahumu aːlːaðij fijhi juʶsˤʕaʶquʶwnaʶ waːtl ʕljhm nbʔa aːlðj ʔaːtjnaːh ʔaːjaːtnaː faːnslχ mnhaː fʔatbʕh aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn fkaːn mn aːlʁaːwjn wmaː wd͡ʒdnaː lʔakθrhm mn ʕhd wʔin wd͡ʒdnaː ʔakθrhm lfaːsqjn hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔ juzʕid͡ʒak wajawma naħʃuru min kulːi ʔaumːaain fawd͡ʒanaː mimːan jukaðːibu biʔaːjaaːtinaaː fahum juwzaʕuwna d͡ʒjd ʔan tkwn hnaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waʶaʶːlˤʕaʶsˤrˤiʶ ðlk ʔamr aːllh ʔanzlh ʔiljkm wmn jtq aːllh jkfr ʕnh sjʔiaːth wjʕðˤm lh ʔad͡ʒraː wbdmʕai aːlʁjmai ʔaħbbtk ʕsaː ʔan jhdjnj rbj lʔaqrb mn hðaː rʃdanaː waqijla liχaaːlidi bni sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ waaːlθːaaːliθu aːlðːakaaːʔu aːlːaðij jastaqirːu bihi ħiʶfðˤuʶ maaː taʶsˤaʶwːaʶrˤaʶhuʶ wafahmu maaː ʕalimahu waaːliaːstikθaaːra minhu taχalːufanaː rbwʕu aːlʃːـʔaːmi bـrwd͡ʒu aːlʕaـlaː tuħaːkj aːlsːـmaːʔa bʕـaːlj aːlsaːـnaː lahu maqaaːlijdu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːlːaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna walanuskinanːakumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ min baʕdihim ðalika liman χaaːfa maqaaːmij waχaaːfa waʕijdi hl jwd͡ʒd aːj ʃχsˤ rbmaː jrjd ʔan jʔuðj twm ʔalaː ttbʕn ʔaʶfʕsˤjt ʔamrj ʔauħb td͡ʒrba ʔaʃjaːʔ d͡ʒdjda hm jtwaʶːsˤlˤwn mʕ bʕdˤhm aʶːlˤbʕdˤ baːlʔijmaːʔaːt haðaaː faljaðuwquwhu ħamijmun waʁasːaaːqun ʕndmaː bdʔat lltw fj qraːʔa aːlktaːb tˤrˤq aːħdhm aːlbaːb waaːlʔaːminu min aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʁajru χaaːʔiifin wmaː jnðˤrˤ hʔulaːʔ ʔilaː sˤjħaʶ waːħda maː lhaː mn fwaːq θm ʔin ʕljnaː ħsaːbhm hl twd ʔan tʔatj baːldaːχil θm ltsʔaln jwmʔið ʕn aːlnʕjm waaːstiʕaaːnatuhu sˤiʶfaʶaʶuʶn laaːzimaaun lˤiʶtˤaʶbʕiʶhiʶ waχilqaaun qaaːʔiimaaun fij d͡ʒawharihi ħq mn ktb bmsk ʔan jχtm bʕnbr qm bh bnfsk wbaʶːlˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aʶːlˤsˤħjħaʶ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir tsˤdrˤ aʶːlˤnftˤ bdaː w kʔan ʃjʔiaː lm jħdθ ʔaam ħasibta ʔaanːa ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ aːlkahfi waaːlrːaqijmi kaaːnuwaː min ʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʕad͡ʒabanaː wʔismaːʕjl waːljsʕ wjwns wlˤwtˤaʶː wklaː fdˤlˤnaʶː ʕlaː aːlʕaːlmjn ljs ldj aːlwqt lʃraːʔ rˤbtˤaʶ ʕnq d͡ʒdjda qbl aːlwljma fmaː bkt ʕljhm aːlsmaːʔ waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː kaːnwaː mnðˤrˤjn waʶnaʶsˤaʶrˤnaʶaʶːhuʶ mina aːlqawmi aːlːaðijna kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː qawma sawʔin faʔaaʁraqnaaːhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlknjsa bunjt fj aːlqrn aːlχaːms ʕʃr waaːstakbara huwa wad͡ʒunuwduhu fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ biʁajri aːlħaqːi waʶðˤaʶnːuʶwaʶː ʔaanːahum ʔiilajnaaː laaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna laː td͡ʒʕl mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ftqʕd mðmwmaː mχðwlaː wʕlmnaːh sˤnʕaʶ lbws lkm lˤtħsˤnkm mn bʔaskm fhl ʔantm ʃaːkrwn kaðalika juʔufaku aːlːaðijna kaaːnuwaː biʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi jad͡ʒħaduwna hl ʔistlmta aːlrsaːla aːltj ʔarslthaː lka baːlʔams ʔaħb ʕjd aːlhaːlwjn ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa d͡ʒrjdtjn jwmjaːan ħtaː zrtm aːlmqaːbr kaðalika aːlʕaðaaːbu walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna aːnhi hðaː kaaːnat aːlʔiimaaːmaau ʔaawlaaː walaaː juʔuadːij ðalika ʔilaaː ʔiʶbtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ aːlʔiimaaːmaai aʶːnðˤrˤ ʕlm aːlmħaːsba dˤrˤwrˤj lnd͡ʒaːħ ʔaj ʃrka mlˤaʶːħðˤtk χaːrd͡ʒa ʕn aʶːlˤmwdˤwʕ kaðalika ħaqːat kalimatu rabːika ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna fasaquwaː ʔaanːahum laaː juʔuminuwna jaaː wajlataaː lajtanij lam ʔaatːaχið fulaaːnanaː χalijlanaː lm ʔar ʔaħdaː mθlhaː qblaː hlaːː naːwltnj aːlmaːʔ mn fdˤlˤk ʔanta ln tbtʕd hðh aːlmra waaːllːahu ʔaaʕlamu biʔaaʕdaaːʔiikum wakafaaː biaːllːahi walijːanaː wakafaaː biaːllːahi naʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː maː knt lˤʔaʶtsˤlˤ bk lwlaː ʔan aːlʔamr mhm ʔaʶaʶjaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ kulːu aːmriʔiin mːinhum ʔaan judχala d͡ʒanːaaa naʕijmin laː jhmnj ʔajhm aːχtrt ldj ʔaχwaːn maaː kaaːna ʔiibraaːhijmu jahuwdijːanaː walaaː naʶsˤrˤaʶaʶːniʶjːaʶnaʶː walakin kaaːna ħanijfanaː muslimanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna hl jʕjʃ mʕk lqd aːʕtaːd ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤqs aːlbaːrd bsrʕa ʔinhaː ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ mʕj qaaːluwaː ʔaawalam nanhaka ʕani aːlʕaaːlamijna fasawfa juħaaːsabu ħisaaːbanaː jasijranaː trd͡ʒmt hðh aːld͡ʒmla mrtjn aːdχlwhaː bslaːm ðlk jwm aːlχlwd wʔiðaː rʔajt θm rʔajt nʕjmaː wmlkaː kbjraː aːlʕlm jrfrf qaaːla qaaːʔiilun minhum ʔiinːij kaaːna lij qarijnun waʔiiðaaː buʃːira ʔaaħaduhum biaːlʔaunθaaː ðˤaʶlˤːaʶ wad͡ʒhuhu muswadːanaː wahuwa kaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn twm aːstqaːl nmtu d͡ʒjdaː aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ aʶːħfaʶðˤiʶ aːllha tad͡ʒidhu ʔaamaaːmaka taʕarːaf ʔiilaaː aːllhi fij aːlrːaχaaːʔi jaʕrifka fij aːlʃːidːaai ʔaχʃj ʔanhu ln jkwn shlaːan ʕlm aːlχjaːr aʶːlˤsˤħjħ ʕlm aːlħjwaːn wʕlm aːlʔinsaːn jtfq mʕ draːsa aːlħjaːa maːðaː knta stfʕlu lw knt ʔaʶsˤʁrˤ bʕʃr snjn aːttħdθ aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja ttwjbaː mftwħ aʶːlˤmsˤdrˤ sumjːtu ʕlaː ʕmj ʔinh ujtħdθ aːlbrbrja lmudrsahu traːd͡ʒʕ saːmj waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhuʶ fij χalqihi tabʕaθu ʕalaaː maħabːatihi hl tħbaːn bʕdˤkmaʶː kθjranaː flaː ʔaqsm baːlʃfq ʔahdtnj χaːltj ktaːbanaː fj ʕjd mjlaːd aːlmsjħ waʔaanːa ʔiilaaː rabːika aːlmuntahaaː waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mddnaːhaː wʔalqjnaː fjhaː rwaːsj wʔanbtnaː fjhaː mn kl zwd͡ʒ bhjd͡ʒ ʔanaː lw knt ʁnjaːan, knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶʕtˤjkaʶ maːl waħasbuk ʔaan jakuwna lak min ʔaaχijk ʔaakθaruhu ʔinj wd͡ʒdt aːmrʔaa tmlkhm wʔawtjt mn kl ʃjʔ wlhaː ʕrʃ ʕðˤjm ʔaʔant tˤaʶːlˤb jaːbaːnj "nʕm" ʔin llmtqjn ʕnd rbhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlnʕjm ʔauwlaʔiika aːlːaðijna tˤaʶbaʶʕaʶ aːllːahu ʕalaaː quluwbihim wasamʕihim waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlʁaaːfiluwna flnʁlq aːltlfaːz ʔiðaː kaːn ʔaħd jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː, fhwa twm ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj blda baːlqrb mn rwmaː kaːn jstmʕ ʔilaː aːlmwsjqaː fj ʁrfth ʔiðaː knt bħaːd͡ʒa lmsaːʕdtj fjrd͡ʒaː ʔiχbaːrnaː bðlk mn aːlmmkn ʔan jtʔaχr twm qaaːla ʔiinːamaaː ʔaaʃkuw baθːij waħuznij ʔiilaaː aːllːahi waʔaaʕlamu mina aːllːahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna aːlʔaːn wbʕd ʔan tqaːʕdt ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːlsfr klmaː ʃʔit qaːl twm aːnh aʶːsˤjb bmʁsˤ bʕd aːkl maː tˤbχth maːrj ʔaʃʕr bχjba ʔaml qfwnaː aːlrswl bnhd͡ʒ smaː ʔilaː sdra aːlmd͡ʒd fwq aːlsmaː ʔanaː aːlʕb aːlʔan kra aːlqdm wʔant, maːðaː tfʕl fqaːl aːld͡ʒzaːr sʔaʶʕtˤjk lħmaːan kʔanh aːlzbd jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaʶtˤjrˤ linurijaka min ʔaːjaaːtinaaː aːlkubraaː bilisaaːnin ʕarabijːin mubijnin flst ʕnh btaːʔib ʔiinːaaː qad ʔauwħija ʔiilajnaaː ʔaanːa aːlʕaðaaːba ʕalaaː man kaðːaba watawalːaaː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lˤqdˤaʶːʔ wqt mʕ ʔausrtj tˤmʕ aːlʔinsaːn jhdd ħjaːa kθjr mn aːlʔanwaːʕ aːlħja wlh aːlħmd fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wʕʃjaː wħjn tðˤhrˤwn watudbiru ʔidbaaːra aːlhaaːribi snħmj ħmaːk wnħn fdaːk wnksw rbaːk blwn aːlʔaml faʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlʔauwlaaː aːlːatij hija nafsun muʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶuʶn tbdw maːrj d͡ʒmjla flwlaː ʔalqj ʕljh ʔaswra mn ðhb ʔaw d͡ʒaːʔ mʕh aːlmlaːʔika mqtrnjn aːlnhr wʔasʕ jblʁ mnːaːd sta ʕʃr sna χðwh faːʕtlwh ʔilaː swaːʔ aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiilːaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaː ʔaan jakuwna maʕa aːlsːaaːd͡ʒidijna wʔand͡ʒjnaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wkaːnwaː jtqwn aːlmuʔuminu ʔaːlifun maʔaluwfun ʔin lm jħsˤlˤ aːlmrʔ ʕlaː maː jħb jħb aːlmrʔ maː ħsˤlˤ ʕljh ʔaʶsˤbħnaʶː sˤdjqjn ʕlaː aːlfwr hl ldjk mwʕd θm qjl llðjn ðˤlˤmwaʶː ðwqwaː ʕðaːb aːlχld hl td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː bmaː kntm tksbwn ʔanta kjf ʕlmta ðlk haðaaː baʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶ lilnːaaːsi wahudanaː waraħmaaun liqawmin juwqinuwna wakaðalika nurij ʔiibraaːhijma malakuwta aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walijakuwna mina aːlmuwqinijna kaːn lh aːlwld aːsmh ʃjaːn waaːllːahu χalaqakum wamaaː taʕmaluwna ql ʔin kaːn llrħmn wld fʔanaː ʔawl aːlʕaːbdjn mutːakiʔiijna fijhaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔaaraaːʔiiki laaː jarawna fijhaaː ʃamsanaː walaaː zamharijranaː aːd͡ʒls hnaːk maaː ʔaanta ʔiilːaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː faʔati biʔaːjaain ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ hl ʕndk ħsaːb fj ʔaj mwqʕ tʃbjk aːd͡ʒtmaːʕj fajaħtamilu taʕaba aːldːarsi lijudrika raaːħaaa aːlʕilmi wajanfij ʕanhu maʕarːaaa aːld͡ʒahli hj laː tħb aːlθʕaːbjn w aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt taraaː aːlʕaqla bihaðihi aːlmaθaaːbaai watanfiru min aːlʕuqalaaːʔi haðaaː aːlnːufuwra waqaaːluwaː jaaː wajlanaaː haðaaː jawmu aːldːijni hj tʕml fj aːlmdrsa ʕlmt nfs maː qdmt wʔaχrt bmd͡ʒnwn faʔiin lam taʔatuwnij bihi falaaː kajla lakum ʕindij walaaː taqrabuwni mn ʃbː ʕlaː ʃjʔin ʃaːb ʕljh laː tdʕwaː aːljwm θbwraː waːħdaː waːdʕwaː θbwraː kθjraː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man lam jamut lam jafut waʕalaaː aːllːahi qaʶsˤduʶ aːlsːabijli waminhaaː d͡ʒaaːʔiirun walaw ʃaaːʔa lahadaaːkum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wakilaaːhumaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔilaaː aːlʕadli aːlːaðij bihi salaaːmaau aʶːlˤsːuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ rʔajt qtˤaʶ trˤkdˤ ʕqb aːlklb ʔaajːu ʃajʔin kaaːna χabaruk baʕdij qaaːla jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːabijːu d͡ʒaaːhidi aːlkufːaaːra waaːlmunaaːfiqijna waʶaʶːʁlˤuʶðˤ ʕalajhim aːstkbrwaː ʔinaː kl fjhaː ʔin aːllh qd ħkm bjn aːlʕbaːd waqad ʔaʶaʶfsˤaʶħaʶ aːlmutanabːij biðalika fij qawlihi hl hw jħbnj ʔaʔiðaː mtnaː wknaː traːbaː wʕðˤaʶːmaʶː ʔaʔinaː lmdjnwn χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ʕalaaː aːlkaaːfirijna tlqjt brqja mnhaː twm laː jd͡ʒjd aːlsbaːħa mn naːħja ʔaχraː fhw d͡ʒjd fj lʕba aːlbjsbwl kamaaː naʕuwðu bik min aːlʕud͡ʒbi bimaaː nuħsinu fkðbwh fʔaχðhm ʕðaːb jwm aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶ ʔinh aːlrːaħmani fatakuwna lˤiʶlˤʃːaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ walijːanaː d͡ʒʔit sjraːan ʕlaː aːlʔaqdaːm jamħaqu aːllːahu aːlrːibaaː wajurbij aʶːlˤsˤːaʶdaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶ waaːllːahu laaː juħibːu kulːa kafːaaːrin ʔaaθijmin lqd tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ kwb mn aːlmaːʔ ql ʕsaː ʔan jkwn rdf lkm bʕdˤ aːlðj tstʕd͡ʒlwn lfː saːmj ħblaː ħwl ʕnq ljlaː w χnqhaː ħtːaː aːlmwt wad͡ʒhu fasaaːdihaaː ʔaanːa ʃajχij lam jaðkurhaaː wamaaː lam jaðkurhu aːlʃːajχu laaː χajra fijhi liʔaanːa waaːd͡ʒibaaːti aːlʕuquwli laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔiʶbtˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶhaʶaʶː biaːlʃːarʕi ʕndmaː tswq fj aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶːm tħs w kʔank tħlq fj aːlsmaːʔ wajarawnahu muʶdˤiʶrˤːaʶnaʶː biχalqi aːlwaladi baʕijdanaː min nad͡ʒaaːbatihi ʔaanːahaaː kalimaaun tuðkaru lilmubaaːlaʁaai walaaː juraaːdu bihaaː suwʔun aːlħdjθ aːlʔawl: aːlʔaʕmaːl baːlnjaːt knt mdhʃaː qaːl djmaː: " lˤʔaʶsˤdqk aːlqwl laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ħqaː ʔan ʔatðkr mn kaːnwaː " ʁsl aːlmlaːbs baːljd ʕmlja sˤʕbaʶ wmdˤjʕaʶ llwqt twm laː jsttˤjʕ aːltnfs ʔanaː waːθq ʔanj rʔajthu mn qbl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔiiðaaː zulzilati aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ zilzaaːlahaaː hl tðhb ʔilaː aːlknjsa famaaː lanaaː min ʃaaːfiʕijna waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕabːaaːsi aːlmubarːidu radaaːʔaau aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːiʶ zamaaːnaau aːlʔaadabi laː jʕjʃ fj hðaː aːlmbnaː ʔaħd d͡ʒiʔitu ʔilaː hnaː lʔataʕalːm faʔiini aːntahawaː faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun man lam jaħtamil ðulːa aːltːaʕalːumi saaːʕaaan baqija fij ðulːi aːld͡ʒahli ʔaabadanaː ql ʔin rbj jbstˤ aːlrzq lmn jʃaːʔ wjqdr wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn ðalika waman juʶʕaʶðˤːiʶm ʃaʕaaːʔiira aːllːahi faʔiinːahaaː min taqwaaː aːlquluwbi faθabata ʔaanːa aːltːad͡ʒaaːnusa waʔiin tanawːaʕa ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlʔiiχaaːʔi waqaaːʕidaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi laqad ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶːhuʶm waʕadːahum ʕadːanaː ʔin hðaː ʔilaː χlq aːlʔawljn tʕaːl ʔiðaː aʶːsttˤʕt maaː laaː jankafːuwna ʕanhu ʔilːaaː bimaaːniʕin qawijːin ħbj lhaː kaːn ħqjqjaːan ʔinhm ʔalfwaː ʔaːbaːʔhm dˤaʶːlˤjn bʕd aʶːlˤðˤlˤmaʶːt tðˤhrˤ aʶːlˤdˤwʔ wlqd dˤrˤbnaʶː llnaːs fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mn kl mθl lʕlhm jtðkrwn faʔiin lam tafʕaluwaː walan tafʕaluwaː faaːtːaquwaː aːlnːaaːra aːlːatij waquwduhaaː aːlnːaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕidːat lilkaaːfirijna ʔakfaːrkm χjr mn ʔawlʔikm ʔam lkm braːʔa fj aːlzbr liʔaanːa min aːlkalaaːmi maaː kaaːna masmuwʕanaː laaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu fij fahmihi ʔilaaː taʔaamːuli aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːiʶ bihi waʔiin jatafarːaqaaː juʁni aːllːahu kulːanaː min saʕatihi wakaaːna aːllːahu waaːsiʕanaː ħakijmanaː ʔalaː jsd͡ʒdwaː llh aːlðj jχrd͡ʒ aːlχbʔ fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wjʕlm maː tχfwn wmaː tʕlnwn rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llðjn kfrwaː waːʁfr lnaː rbnaː ʔink ʔant aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔalqjaː fj d͡ʒhnm kl kfaːr ʕnjd lm jraː ʔaħd twm sqtˤ qlmj mn ħaːfa mktbj ʃʕrt sjʔia hðaː md͡ʒrːd maːʔ fqtˤ ʔaljs kðlk jʃwj twm aːllħm twqʕ twm ħdwθ ðlk aːnh mttˤwrˤ ʔink laː tnsˤt mtˤlˤqaʶːaʶn mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ lj ʔan ʔatħdθ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒdaːr faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waman maʕahu fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni ʕlmh ʃdjd aːlqwaː ʔakrh aːlsjaːsa whzj ʔiljk bd͡ʒðʕ aːlnχla tsaʶːqtˤ ʕljk rˤtˤbaʶː d͡ʒnjaː ʕmlt maːrj mrbːja lˤlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ ʕndmaː kaːnt mraːhqa wqaːlwaː rbnaː ʔinaː ʔaʶtˤʕnaʶː saːdtnaː wkbraːʔnaː fʔaʶdˤlˤwnaʶː aːlsbjlaː hl trjd mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔajhaː aːlqaːʔid llʕljaːʔ ʃʕbh faaːljawma aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː mina aːlkufːaaːri jaʶdˤħaʶkuʶwnaʶ aːnhaː χd͡ʒwla waʔiið ʁadawta min ʔaahlika tubawːiʔiu aːlmuʔuminijna maqaaːʕida lilqitaaːli waaːllːahu samijʕun ʕalijmun ʔauwlaʔiika aːlːaðijna laʕanahumu aːllːahu waman jalʕani aːllːahu falan tad͡ʒida lahu naʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː ʔam ʔaːtjnaːhm ktaːbaː mn qblh fhm bh mstmskwn ʔiið qaaːla liʔaabijhi waqawmihi maaː taʕbuduwna wmaː χlqnaː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː laːʕbjn qaaːluwaː laqad ʕalimta maaː lanaaː fij banaaːtika min ħaqːin waʔiinːaka lataʕlamu maaː nurijdu trk lj twm rsaːla ħtaː aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ baːqja hunaː fj aʶːlˤðˤiʶlˤ aːnj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːldkaːn ʔalaːn waaːd͡ʒtabaaːhu linubuwːatihi sabːiħi aːsma rabːika aːlʔaaʕlaaː man taʃabːaha biqawmin fahuwa minhum kʔamθaːl aːllʔulʔu aːlmknwn laː tuħarːik bihi lisaaːnaka litaʕd͡ʒala bihi twm fj frq aːlbjsbwl d͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlħaquː wahuwa fij ʁaaːri ħiraaːʔin fad͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlmalaku faqaaːla: aːqraʔa kaːnt wðˤjfaʶ aːlnsaːʔ aːlrʔijsja ħtaː zmn qrjb hj ʔan jtzwd͡ʒn wjldn aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ wnaːdjnaːh mn d͡ʒaːnb aʶːlˤtˤwrˤ aːlʔajmn wqrbnaːh nd͡ʒjaː mrħbaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔiinːaaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajka aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqːi faaːʕbudi aːllːaha muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː lahu aːldːijna ʔinhaː sˤʁjrˤaʶ wʁjr naʶːdˤiʶd͡ʒaʶ ʔanaː ʔarj aːlftaːa ʕaːʃ mnːaːd fj hðaː aːlmnzl lʕaːm kaːml qaːl hj ʕsˤaʶːj ʔatwkʔa ʕljhaː wʔahʃ bhaː ʕlaː ʁnmj wlj fjhaː mʔaːrb ʔaχraː jaʔaajːuhaaː aːlrːusulu kuluwaː mina aʶːlˤtˤːaʶjːiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶ waaːʕmaluwaː sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʶuʶsˤdq hðaː walaqad ʕalimtumu aːlːaðijna aːʕtadawaː minkum fij aːlsːabti faqulnaaː lahum kuwnuwaː qiradaaan χaaːsiʔiijna ʔanaː ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːlsbaːħa ʕlaː aːltzld͡ʒ hl aːlħljb fʕlaːan mfjdun lˤlˤsˤħaʶ wbʃrnaːh bʔisħaːq nbjaː mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn qljl daːʔim χjr mn kθjr mnqtˤʕ mn sjkwn dˤħjth aːltaːlja waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazːi man aːtːaχaða ʔiχwaaːnanaː kaaːnuwaː lahu ʔaaʕwaaːnanaː ʔarjd aːlslaːm qul limani aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ waman fijhaaː ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna wʔin hðh ʔamtkm ʔama waːħda wʔanaː rbkm faːtqwn jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːtqwaː aːllh waːbtʁwaː ʔiljh aːlwsjla wd͡ʒaːhdwaː fj sbjlh lʕlkm tflħwn hl rʔajt aːlħaːdθ ħqaː jbʃrhm rbhm brħma mnh wrˤdˤwaʶːn wd͡ʒnaːt lhm fjhaː nʕjm mqjm watamtaniʕu min χawfihi aːlnːufuwsu aːlʕaaːdijaau ʔiinːa aːllha kataba aːlʔiiħsaaːna ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin faʔiiðaaː qataltum faʔaaħsinuwaː aːlqitlaaa wʔaʕwð bk rb ʔan jħdˤrˤwn qrr "twm" ʔan jbdʔa btʕlm aːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔin aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt kaːnt lhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlfrdws nzlaː laː ʔaʕtqd ʔan aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs rˤaʶːdˤjn brwaːtbhm wʔalqaː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ rwaːsj ʔan tmjd bkm wʔanhaːraː wsblaː lʕlkm thtdwn faʶaʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶquʶwaʶː wahum jataχaaːfatuwna ln ʔad͡ʒrħ mʃaːʕrk ʔabdaː sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr jaː maːjk hl ʔantm bχjr law maaː taʔatijnaaː biaːlmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ qaaːla rabːi aʶːnsˤuʶrˤniʶj ʕalaaː aːlqawmi aːlmufsidijna maː fʕlth ʔanta kaːn χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶːaʶn ljd͡ʒzj aːllh kl nfs maː ksbt ʔin aːllh srjʕ aːlħsaːb bal hum min aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi aːlmaħðuwrijna fij biʶdˤʕiʶ sinijna lilːahi aːlʔaamru min qablu wamin baʕdu wajawmaʔiiðin jafraħu aːlmuʔuminuwna kalaːːa lamːaaː jaʶqdˤiʶ maaː ʔaamarahu mn aːlshl aːlwqwʕ fj ʕaːdaːt sjʔia tatad͡ʒaaːfaaː d͡ʒunuwbuhum ʕani aʶːlˤmaʶdˤaʶaʶːd͡ʒiʶʕiʶ jadʕuwna rabːahum χawfanaː waʶtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː wamimːaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna ʔatʔatwn aːlðkraːn mn aːlʕaːlmjn waqaaːla sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama liʕadijːi bni ħaaːtimin waqaaːla muʕaaːðu bnu d͡ʒabalin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aːlr tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi aːlmubijni waqaaːla baʶːlˤqstˤ whm laː jðˤlˤmwn aːlħdjθ aːlθaːlθ ʕʃr: mn kmaːl aːlʔijmaːn ʔauwlaʔiika ʕalajhim sˤaʶlˤaʶwaʶaʶːtuʶn min rabːihim waraħmaaun waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmuhtaduwna wanawʕun laaː jumkinu waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶaʶn lilmutːaqijna d͡ʒbl jsmw ʕlaː hðh aːldnaː wahuwa qaaːdirun ʕalaaː aʶːstiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ man juʕaaːdijhi biħusni sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕiʶhiʶ waʔaajaaːdijhi bnsˤrˤ aːllh jnsˤrˤ mn jʃaːʔ whw ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʔaajaħsabu ʔaan lam jarahu ʔaaħadun rkz ʕlaː aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltj thm ħqaː frʃ ʃqa d͡ʒdjda jqtdˤj nfqaːt kbjra waːstʕjnwaː baʶːlˤsˤbrˤ waʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wʔinhaː lkbjra ʔilaː ʕlaː aːlχaːʃʕjn tasmaʕuwna ʔinh laː jqsˤd ʔan jʕaːml aːlʔaːχrjn bqswa ʔinhaː tˤbjʕth fħsb waaːʕlam ʔaanːa maaː ʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶʔaʶkaʶ lam jakun lˤiʶjuʶsˤiʶjbaʶkaʶ wamaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶkaʶ lam jakun lˤiʶjuʶχtˤiʶʔiʶaʶkaʶ laaː jaʁurːanːaka taqalːubu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː fij aːlbilaaːdi ʔaʶħdˤrˤ ʔilaː aːlmdrs baːlħaːfla ʔilaː ħmjmaː wʁsaːqaː wajuʕalːimuhu aːlkitaaːba waaːlħikmaaa waaːltːawraaːaa waaːlʔiind͡ʒijla mn lm rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna ʔaalam jaʕlamuwaː ʔaanːa aːllːaha jaʕlamu sirːahum wanad͡ʒwaaːhum waʔaanːa aːllːaha ʕalːaaːmu aːlʁujuwbi lm ʔarjd aʶːjqaʶːdˤk ffhmnaːhaː sljmaːn wklaː ʔaːtjnaː ħkmaː wʕlmaː wsχrnaː mʕ daːwwd aːld͡ʒbaːl jsbħn waʶːlˤtˤjrˤ wknaː faːʕljn waʔaanːa aːld͡ʒuwda baðlu aːlmawd͡ʒuwdi wahaðaaː takalːufun juʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒahli biħuduwdi aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ ðalika biʔaanːahum ʃaaːqːuwaː aːllːaha warasuwlahu waman juʃaaːqːi aːllːaha faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi wamawaaːdːa ʕumraaːnihaaː waχaraaːbihaaː twm ʔaraːd ʔan jðhb ʔajnmaː kaːnt maːrj tðhb saːmj ʔan tqbl tˤlˤbj maː qdrwaː aːllh ħq qdrh ʔin aːllh lqwj ʕzjz kaːn χaːʔifaː mn aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶːm lm jql lj wlw klma waːħda aːlktaːb ʔaħmr wmaː ʕlaː aːlðjn jtqwn mn ħsaːbhm mn ʃjʔ wlkn ðkraː lʕlhm jtqwn maːðaː tʕtqdwn tˤwm kl jwm ʕndh shra ʃrb jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːllːaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrːasuwla walaaː tuʶbtˤiʶlˤuʶwaʶː ʔaaʕmaaːlakum rabːanaaː ʔaaχrid͡ʒnaaː minhaaː faʔiin ʕudnaaː faʔiinːaaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ aːlm hðaː waʶːdˤħaʶː ʔanaː fχwr d͡ʒdaːan bka bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlljl ʔiðaː jʁʃaː aːldːunjaaː daaːru sˤiʶdqiʶn liman sˤaʶdaʶqaʶhaʶaʶː ʔaʃkrk ʕlaː nsˤjħtk ʔiinːahumaaː min ʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaaw janaaːluhu min nakbaain laː jsmʕwn fjhaː lʁwaː wlaː kðaːbaː waːlnχl baːsqaːt lhaː tˤlˤʕ ndˤjd qaːlwaː kðlk qaːl rbk ʔinh hw aːlħkjm aːlʕljm waːlnd͡ʒm waːlʃd͡ʒr jsd͡ʒdaːn ʔaʶdˤħt aːljwm sqaːla dˤχmaʶ llmaːda waʶːlˤtˤaʶːqaʶ aːthmnj aːlsjnaːtwr btʃwjh aʶːlˤmʕtˤjaʶːt km sjklf ðlk zwd͡ʒa maːrj tˤbjbaʶ aʶːlˤtˤaʶːlˤbaʶ aːltj d͡ʒlst ʔamaːm aːlmdrːsa mn ʔalmaːnjaː walaaː liħaaːðirin raaːħaaun ʔiin ħisaaːbuhum ʔiilːaaː ʕalaaː rabːij law taʃʕuruwna fʔiðaː swjth wnfχt fjh mn rwħj fqʕwaː lh saːd͡ʒdjn fakaaːna haðaaː muʶwaʶdˤːiʶħaʶnaʶː limaʕnaaː maaː ðakarnaaː waʶtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː ðaaː ʁuʶsˤːaʶaʶiʶn waʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː hj tsˤhːrˤ aːlnħaːs laː ʔaʶðˤnh jnwj aːlðhaːb mʕnaː ħaːwlt qtl nfsj mrːtjn ʕqdtu aːlʕzm ʕlaː ʔan ʔakwn ʕaːlmanaː wlqd aːsthzʔi brsl mn qblk fħaːq baːlðjn sχrwaː mnhm maː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmsrħ fj wqt mbkr d͡ʒdaː kj ʔad͡ʒd mqʕdaː d͡ʒjdaː ʔiilːaaː man raħima aːllːahu ʔiinːahu huwa aːlʕazijzu aːlrːaħijmu kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ fj qsˤrˤ fχm baːlqaːhra wabaaːdiraai safijhihim jurijdu biaːlmutaʃabːiʕi bimaaː laaː jamliku aːlmutazajːina bimaaː lajsa fijhi qaːlwaː jaː wjlnaː ʔinaː knaː ðˤaʶːlˤmjn kjf tfʕl ðlk? wahija fijmaaː siwaaːhu min aːlʕuluwmi ʔaajsaru tʕbt mn aːlktaːba wzχrfaː wʔin kl ðlk lmaː mtaːʕ aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra ʕnd rbk llmtqjn wmn ʔaʶʕrˤdˤ ʕn ðkrj fʔin lh mʕjʃa dˤnkaʶː wnħʃrh jwm aːlqjaːma ʔaʕmaː wajaħlifuwna biaːllːahi ʔiinːahum laminkum wamaaː hum minkum walakinːahum qawmun jafraquwna ʔaam ʔaːtajnaaːhum kitaaːbanaː min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikuwna faʔiinːa aːlʔiiχwaaːna ʕalaaː tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶn muχtalifaain waʔaanħaaːʔin mutaʃaʕːibaain laː tʕml aːlʕb fʔaʶʕrˤdˤ ʕnhm waʶːntðˤrˤ ʔinhm mntðˤrˤwn ʔaawalaaː jaðkuru aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaanːaaː χalaqnaaːhu min qablu walam jaku ʃajʔianaː ʔinːhm mʕj rbnaː ʔink mn tdχl aːlnaːr fqd ʔaχzjth wmaː lˤlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn mn ʔaʶnsˤaʶːrˤ jaħsabu ʔaanːa maaːlahu ʔaaχladahu hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕjrnj haːtfk aːlnqaːl lˤlˤħðˤaʶ waman lam juʔumin biaːllːahi warasuwlihi faʔiinːaaː ʔaaʕtadnaaː lilkaaːfirijna saʕijranaː falamːaaː balaʁaaː mad͡ʒmaʕa bajnihimaaː nasijaaː ħuwtahumaaː faaːtːaχaða sabijlahu fij aːlbaħri sarabanaː ʔanaː fχwra d͡ʒdaː bwaːldj faʔiinːa aːldːunjaaː χuliqat lakum waʔaantum χuliqtum lilʔaːχiraai hwaːjtj aːld͡ʒdjda hj aːlmsaːhma fj mwqʕ ttwjbaː wʔiðaː btˤʃtm btˤʃtm d͡ʒbaːrjn aːksib tˤaʶjːiʶbaʶnaʶː bʔajdj sfra twm lm jkn ljʕrf aːlfrq ʔinnj ʔafhm maː tqwl faliðalika ðˤaʶnːaʶ aːld͡ʒaaːhilu aːlmarzuwqu ʔaanːa aːlfaqra waʶaʶːlˤdˤːiʶjqaʶ muʶχtaʶsˤːuʶn biaːlʕilmi waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu ʕabːaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː ðalalt tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbaʶnaʶː faʕazazt maʶtˤlˤuʶwbaʶnaʶː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami wʔinh ltðkra llmtqjn qul biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aːllːahi wabiraħmatihi fabiðalika faljafraħuwaː huwa χajrun mimːaaː jad͡ʒmaʕuwna maː hj rwaːjtk aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤaʶ ʔanaː mθaːlj ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔilj ʔajn ʔaðhb, wlknj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq sˤaʶdaʶaʶːquʶ ʔaumːi kulθuwmin aːbnaai ʔaabij bakrin faqaaːla kmaː ʔanʃʔit ʔawqaːf lˤʔiʶtˤʕaʶːm aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ waʶːlˤʕsˤaʶːfjrˤ hl ldjkn mwʕd faaːstad͡ʒaaːba lahu rabːuhu faʶsˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ ʕanhu kajdahunːa ʔiinːahu huwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu frid blwʁs hw ʔakbr msˤħħ fj ttwjbaː wʔaːtwaː aːlnsaːʔ sˤdqaʶːthn nħla fʔin tˤbn lkm ʕn ʃjʔ mnh nfsaː fklwh hnjʔiaː mrjʔiaː waqaaːluwaː lan nuʔumina laka ħatːaaː tafd͡ʒura lanaaː mina aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ janbuwʕanaː waʔaulqija aːlsːaħaraau saaːd͡ʒidijna ʔinhaː lm tqrʔa hðaː aːlktaːb aːlmaːʔ d͡ʒmjl ʔaʶʕtˤaʶːnj ʔabj saːʕaan ħlwa qaːlwaː nħn ʔawlw qwa wʔawlw bʔas ʃdjd waːlʔamr ʔiljk faʶːnðˤrˤj maːðaː tʔamrjn fj lndn aːlsaːʕa aːlʔaːn aːlsaːbʕa famarːa biaːlmaaːli ʕalaaː ʕumara bni aʶːlˤχaʶtˤːaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːllːahu ʕanhu faqaaːla ʕd aːlj ʕʃra fahija aːldːijnu aːlmutːabaʕu faliʔaanːahu jaʶsˤrˤiʶfuʶ aːlnːufuwsa ʕan ʃahawaaːtihaaː qul law ʔaantum tamlikuwna χazaaːʔiina raħmaai rabːij ʔiiðanaː laʔaamsaktum χaʃjaaa aːlʔiinfaaːqi wakaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu qatuwranaː kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lltːmrːn fijhimaaː min kulːi faaːkihaain zawd͡ʒaaːni wahuwa mimːan d͡ʒaʕalahu aːlmaʔamuwnu min daaːʔi aːlʔiiχwaaːni laaː min dawaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tukθiranːa muʕaaːtabaaa ʔiχwaaːnik fajahuwna ʕalajhim saʶχaʶtˤuʶk aːqraʔa kitaaːbaka kafaaː binafsika aːljawma ʕalajka ħasijbanaː walaqad tːaraknaaːhaaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min mːudːakirin wlaː jmlk aːlðjn jdʕwn mn dwnh aːlʃfaːʕa ʔilaː mn ʃhd baːlħq whm jʕlmwn naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː jaquwluwna wamaaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim bid͡ʒabːaaːrin faðakːir biaːlqurʔaːni man jaχaaːfu waʕijdi klaː ʔinhm ʕn rbhm jwmʔið lmħd͡ʒwbwn tðˤaʶːhrˤ twm bʔanh lm jraː maːrj waʔaamina zalalahu faman tawalːaaː baʕda ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlfaaːsiquwna bimaaː ʁafara lij rabːij wad͡ʒaʕalanij mina aːlmukramijna jd͡ʒb ʕlj ħsaːb kmja aːlmaːl aːlðj swf ʔanfqh aːlaːsbwʕ aːlmqbl jtjmaː ðaː mqrba ʔablʁkm rsaːlaːt rbj wʔanaː lkm naʶːsˤħ ʔamjn wʔið ʔaːtjnaː mwsaː aːlktaːb waːlfrqaːn lʕlkm thtdwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlbaʕijdu qarijbun bimawadːatihi waaːlqarijbu baʕijdun biʕadaaːwatihi fʔin kðbwk fqd kðb rsl mn qblk d͡ʒaːʔwaː baːlbjnaːt waːlzbr waːlktaːb aːlmnjr ʔaʶtsˤlˤ bhaː kl jwm faljabtadiʔi tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi biʔaawaaːʔiilihaaː lijantahija ʔilaaː ʔaawaaːχirihaaː wabimadaaːχilihaaː lˤiʶtuʶfdˤiʶjaʶ ʔilaaː ħaqaaːʔiiqihaaː ln ʔaðhb maː lm tχbrjnj ʔajn ʔad͡ʒd twm aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː wakaaːnuwaː waaːld͡ʒaaːnːa χalaqnaaːhu min qablu min naaːri aːlsːamuwmi flnsʔaln aːlðjn ʔarsl ʔiljhm wlnsʔaln aːlmrsljn kaːnt md͡ʒrd qbla ʕlaː aːlχd mtaː sjnthj aːlʕaːlm wtrknaː bʕdˤhm jwmʔið jmwd͡ʒ fj bʕdˤ wnfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ fd͡ʒmʕnaːhm d͡ʒmʕaː ʔaχbrh bʔan jntðˤrˤ ʔafmn jχlq kmn laː jχlq ʔaflaː tðkrwn wafad͡ʒːarnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʕujuwnanaː faaːltaqaaː aːlmaaːʔ ʕalaaː ʔaamrin qad qudira aːltj lm jχlq mθlhaː fj aːlblaːd faʶwaʶsˤaʶfaʶ nafsahu biaːlkarami χaaːlidijna fijhi wasaaːʔa lahum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai ħimlanaː ʔinhu mn aːlmmtʕ aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕhu lqd drːb saːmj χjwl ljlaː aːlqzma hl tʕlm lmaːðaː brjdj aːlʔilktrwnj haːðaaː ħaaːsibijːun ttwjbaː: lʔan aːllʁa ʔakθr mn md͡ʒrd klmaːt flaː jsttˤjʕwn twsˤjaʶ wlaː ʔilaː ʔahlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn liʔaanːa aːlkalimaaa junabːihu ʕalajhaaː waʶsˤlˤuʶ ħuruwfihaaː wajamnaʕu faʶsˤlˤuʶhaʶaʶː min muʃaaːrakaai ʁajrihaaː kaːnt tlk aːlraːʔiħa krjha kaːn aːlmaːʔ aːzrqaː fʔardnaː ʔan jbdlhmaː rbhmaː χjraː mnh zkaːa wʔaqrb rħmaː tʕlːm aːlʕrbjːa ljs btlk aʶːlˤsˤʕwbaʶ faːlzaːd͡ʒraːt zd͡ʒraː jaː ʕumaru ʔaatadrij mani aːlsːaaːʔiilu qultu: aːllhu warasuwluhu ʔaaʕlamu ʔink ʔin tðrhm jdˤlˤwaʶː ʕbaːdk wlaː jldwaː ʔilaː faːd͡ʒraː kfaːraː bʔimkaːnj aːlʔaːn ʔan ʔaraː ʔajn hm ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj aːlħqjqjwn aːjn wldt ʔanːa aːlnːabjːa sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaːla: ʔanaː ʔatʕlm aːllʁa aːltʃjkja ʔilaː ʔajn hm ðaːhbwn ðlk aːljwm aːlħq fmn ʃaːʔ aːtχð ʔilaː rbh mʔaːbaː wʔinh lhdaː wrħma llmʔumnjn ljs ldj ʃjʔ ʔaːχr ʔaqwlh lilːaðijna juʔuluwna min nisaaːʔiihim taʶrˤaʶbːuʶsˤuʶ ʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaʃhurin faʔiin faaːʔuwaː faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun fstaːnk d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː θm sˤdqnaʶːhm aːlwʕd fʔand͡ʒjnaːhm wmn nʃaːʔ wʔahlknaː aːlmsrfjn aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjwn waːlʔatraːk ʔiχwa lqd χaːb ðˤnj fjk ql kl mtrˤbsˤ ftrˤbsˤwaʶː fstʕlmwn mn ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aʶːlˤsˤrˤaʶːtˤ aːlswj wmn aːhtdaː maː hj frqatuka aːlmwsjqjːa aʶːlˤmfdˤːlˤaʶ qaːlt ʔanaː jkwn lj ʁlaːm wlm jmssnj bʃr wlm ʔak bʁjaː ʔafmn kaːn mʔumnaː kmn kaːn faːsqaː laː jstwwn ʔanaː kbjr bmaː jkfj lʔaʃrb ʕlmt nfs maː ʔaʶħdˤrˤt hl ttħdθ aːltrkja wahuzːij ʔiilajki bid͡ʒiðʕi aːlnːaχlaai tuʶsaʶaʶːqiʶtˤ ʕalajki rˤuʶtˤaʶbaʶnaʶː d͡ʒanijːanaː faraaːʁa ʕalajhim dˤaʶrˤbaʶnaʶː biaːljamijni aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːb jstmʕwn ʔilaː mħaʶːdˤrˤaʶ fj aːltaːrjχ kjfa snsdd djwnnaː aːlʔaːn qdm lh aːlʕmda mftaːħ aːlmdjna saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlmaːʔ wd͡ʒzaːʔ sjʔia sjʔia mθlhaː fmn ʕfaː wʔaʶsˤlˤħ fʔad͡ʒrh ʕlaː aːllh ʔinh laː jħb aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔatwsl ʔiljk ʔan laː tdʕnj qdːm lhaː nsˤjħaʶ tʕrf fj wd͡ʒwhhm ndˤrˤaʶ aːlnʕjm jrjdwn lˤjtˤfʔiʶwaʶː nwr aːllh bʔafwaːhhm waːllh mtm nwrh wlw krh aːlkaːfrwn θm ʔinkm ʔajhaː aʶːlˤdˤaʶːlˤwn aːlmkðbwn hðh aːlmʃkla mzʕd͡ʒa ħqanːaː waminhunːa miʶsˤdaʶʕuʶn tufarːiqu walaaː tad͡ʒmaʕu hl tsttˤjʕ ʔan tχbr twm ʔan maːrj ʔiʶtsˤlˤt bh hl ʔant tħbhaː nðˤrˤt ʔilaː aːlsːqf ʔaːlʔaːn wqd ʕsˤjt qbl wknt mn aːlmfsdjn sʔaχð ʔaʃʕa sjnja lʔasnaːnk ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna ʕinda rabːika laaː jastakbiruwna ʕan ʕibaaːdatihi wajusabːiħuwnahu walahu jasd͡ʒuduwna qaːlwaː tqaːsmwaː baːllh lnbjtnh wʔahlh θm lnqwln lwljh maː ʃhdnaː mhlk ʔahlh wʔinaː lˤsˤaʶːdqwn laː ʔaħd jʕlm mtaː ðˤhrˤt hðh aːlʕaːda waːlðjn kfrwaː ftʕsaː lhm wʔaʶdˤlˤ ʔaʕmaːlhm ʔaalam tarawaː kajfa χalaqa aːllːahu sabʕa samaaːwaaːtin tˤiʶbaʶaʶːqaʶnaʶː faːʕtrfwaː bðnbhm fsħqaː lˤʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlsʕjr aːlʕad͡ʒabu mimːan jaʶtˤrˤaʶħuʶ ʕaaːqilanaː kaaːfijanaː limaaː juʶdˤmiʶrˤuʶhuʶ min ʕadaaːwatihi ʃaaːkiranaː liʔaanʕumihi aːd͡ʒtabaaːhu wud͡ʒuwha aːlnːaːsi lam jataːqi aːllha ʔinhaː tmtˤrˤ lknj ʔarjd aːlχrwd͡ʒ haðihi aːlnːaaːru aːlːatij kuntum bihaaː tukaðːibuwna ðalika min ʔaanbaaːʔi aːlquraaː naʶquʶsˤːuʶhuʶ ʕalajka minhaaː " w mn aːlðjn tlʕb mʕhm " waqaaːla aːlːaðij nad͡ʒaaː minhumaaː waaːdːakara baʕda ʔaumːaain ʔaanaaː ʔaunabːiʔiukum bitaʔawijlihi faʔaarsiluwni ʔinh sˤdwq laː bʔas ʔin wθqtu bh wʔin lnaː llʔaːχra waːlʔawlaː aːlːaðijna jubalːiʁuwna risaaːlaaːti aːllːahi wajaχʃawnahu walaaː jaχʃawna ʔaaħadanaː ʔiilːaaː aːllːaha wakafaaː biaːllːahi ħasijbanaː mwqʕaː aːlʃbktjn aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕjtjn aːlʃhjrtjn fjsbwk wtwjtr jχdˤʕaʶːn ldstwr aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda wqwaːnjn wlaːja kaːljfwrnjaː ʔaflaː jrwn ʔalaː jrd͡ʒʕ ʔiljhm qwlaː wlaː jmlk lhm dˤrˤaʶː wlaː nfʕaː ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin lilmutawasːimijna ʃjχnaː waːlftaː ʕnd sˤـwt aʶːlˤwtˤn qaːl ðlk maː knaː nbʁ faːrtdaː ʕlaː ʔaːθaːrhmaː qsˤsˤaʶː qaːl aːlmlʔa mn qwm frʕwn ʔin hðaː lsaːħr ʕljm fakajfa tatːaquwna ʔiin kafartum jawmanaː jad͡ʒʕalu aːlwildaaːna ʃijbanaː ʔajn jmknnj ʔistlaːm tðkrtj fasubħaaːna aːllːahi ħijna tumsuwna waħijna tuʶsˤbiʶħuʶwnaʶ jqdm qwmh jwm aːlqjaːma fʔawrdhm aːlnaːr wbʔis aːlwrd aːlmwrwd jʕlm maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wjʕlm maː tsrwn wmaː tʕlnwn waːllh ʕljm bðaːt aʶːlˤsˤdwrˤ lasta ʕalajhim biʶmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶrˤiʶn laː jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan ttqn lʁaːt ʕdjda aːlðj ʔaħsn kl ʃjʔ χlqh wbdʔa χlq aːlʔinsaːn mn tˤjn tʔaqlmaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa faːlmdbraːt ʔamraː ʔant dqjq aʶːlˤmlˤaʶːħðˤaʶ walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum muwsaaː biaːlbajːinaaːti θumːa aːtːaχaðtumu aːlʕid͡ʒla min baʕdihi waʔaantum ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ jaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl aːðkrwaː nʕmtj aːltj ʔanʕmt ʕljkm wʔanj fdˤlˤtkm ʕlaː aːlʕaːlmjn qaːl klaː faːðhbaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔinaː mʕkm mstmʕwn maː sbb ʁdˤbhaʶː maθalu aːlʕaduwːi aʶːlˤdˤːaʶaʶːħiʶkiʶ ʔilajk kaʶaʶːlˤħaʶnðˤaʶlˤaʶaʶiʶ aʶːlˤχaʶdˤrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ ʔaawraaːquhaaː ʔaalaaː ʔiinːahum min ʔiifkihim lajaquwluwna whw maː sjslˤːtˤ dˤwʔaʶː ʔakθr ʕn hðh aːlħqba aːllħm njʔ ʔaːn ldjhaː qlb ħnwn waʕalaaːmaaːtin wabiaːlnːad͡ʒmi hum jahtaduwna waqad lˤaʶħaʶðˤaʶ ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aʶːlˤtˤːaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjːuʶ haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fij ʃaʕrihi faqaaːla ftsaːbq aːlrfaːq laːntʃaːlh qaːʔiljn haːt jdk wʔið qaːl ʔibraːhjm lʔabjh ʔaːzr ʔattχð ʔaʶsˤnaʶːmaʶː ʔaːlha ʔinj ʔaraːk wqwmk fj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ mbjn maː hj aːld͡ʒuml aːltj tfdˤlˤhaʶː lˤlˤtˤflˤ aːlħq fj aːltrbja w aːltʕljm θumːa limaaː fij aʶːlˤsːuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ min ħiraaːsaai aːldːijni waaːldːunjaaː waaːlðːabːi ʕanhumaaː wadafʕi aːlʔaahwaaːʔi minhu ʔisħb aːlʔaːχr aːn aːlχlf wqjlh jaː rb ʔin hʔulaːʔ qwm laː jʔumnwn wasumːuwaː ħafadaaan litaħafːudihim fij aːlχidmaai wasurʕatihim fij aːlʕamali faaːliqu aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶsˤbaʶaʶːħiʶ wad͡ʒaʕala aːllːajla sakananaː waaːlʃːamsa waaːlqamara ħusbaaːnanaː ðalika taqdijru aːlʕazijzi aːlʕalijmi mħmd sˤlˤaʶː aːllh ʕljh wslm wld fj mka rkl twm ðlk aʶːlˤsˤndwq kl maː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fʕlh fj aːlwqt aːlħaːlj hw aːld͡ʒlws hnaː waːlʔistmaːʕ aːlmaaːlu waaːlbanuwna zijnaau aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː waaːlbaaːqijaaːtu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtuʶ χajrun ʕinda rabːika θawaaːbanaː waχajrun ʔaamalanaː wamaaː taʃaaːʔuwna ʔiilːaaː ʔaan jaʃaaːʔa aːllːahu rabːu aːlʕaaːlamijna fʔaʶsqtˤ ʕljnaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ ʔin knt mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn jntðˤrˤ twm rdanːaː wħmlt aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waːld͡ʒbaːl fdktaː dka waːħda hl trjd ʔan tðhb ʔilaː ħdjqa aːlħjwaːn bʕd ðˤhrˤ hðaː aːljwm waʔiiðaaː duʕuwaː ʔiilaaː aːllːahi warasuwlihi lijaħkuma bajnahum ʔiiðaaː farijqun minhum muʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ lnrsl ʕljhm ħd͡ʒaːra mn tˤjn aːllːahu jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrːizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu min ʕibaaːdihi wajaqdiru lahu ʔiinːa aːllːaha bikulːi ʃajʔin ʕalijmun qaːla: faʔiinːahu d͡ʒibrijlu ʔaataaːkum juʕalːimukum dijnakum qul ʔaaruwnija aːlːaðijna ʔaalħaqtum bihi ʃurakaaːʔa kalːaaː bal huwa aːllːahu aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu sahlun ʕalaaː man ʕalimahu lqd ʔautuhm bsrqa ʕðˤaʶːm aʶːlˤdjnaʶːsˤwrˤaʶːt waʔiinːa rabːaka lahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlrːaħijmu walahu man fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waman ʕindahu laaː jastakbiruwna ʕan ʕibaaːdatihi walaaː jastaħsiruwna qaːl ʔatʕbdwn maː tnħtwn kajfa laaː jaħtamij min aːlðːunuwbi limaʕarːaaːtihaaː hl trjd tðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlbaːb mʁlq jaaː banij aːlsːaaːʔiibi qad dˤuʶwiʶjtuʶm faaːnkiħuwaː fij aːlʁaraaːʔiibi maaː ʔaaʃhadtuhum χalqa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaaː χalqa ʔaanfusihim wamaaː kuntu mutːaχiða aʶːlˤmuʶdˤiʶlˤːiʶjnaʶ ʕaʶdˤuʶdaʶnaʶː nntðˤrˤuʶ mnka ʔan tunafiːða lnaː maː wʕdtah lnaː ðaːt mra aːllh lˤtˤjf bʕbaːdh jrzq mn jʃaːʔ whw aːlqwj aːlʕzjz ʔalaː tʕbdwaː ʔilaː aːllh ʔinnj lkm mnh nðjr wbʃjr kaːn aːllʕb fj aːlħdjqa mmtʕaː ʔarjd aːlʃraːʔ jsˤwm aːlmslmwn fj ʃhr rˤmdˤaʶːn mn ʃrwq aːlʃms ħtaː ʁrwbhaː waʔiinːij kulːamaaː daʕawtuhum litaʁfira lahum d͡ʒaʕaluwaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbiʶʕaʶhuʶm fij ʔaːðaaːnihim waaːstaʁʃawaː θijaaːbahum waʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶrˤːuʶwaʶː waaːstakbaruwaː ʔarħaːmkm wlaː ʔawlaːdkm jwm aːlqjaːma jfsˤlˤ bjnkm waːllh bmaː tʕmlwn bsˤjrˤ tħqq ħwlhaː ʔanaː lstu fj wdˤʕ jsmħ bʔan ʔaqblhaː fʔinmaː jsrnaːh blsaːnk ltbʃr bh aːlmtqjn wtnðr bh qwmaː ldaː maː hw fnk aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ hl θwb aːlkfaːr maː kaːnwaː jfʕlwn ql ʔinmaː aːlʕlm ʕnd aːllh wʔinmaː ʔanaː nðjr mbjn faqult ʔaalajsa ʔiðaaː suʔiila aʶːlˤħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶ faʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶ baaːna faʶdˤlˤuʶhuʶ qaaːla naʕam wkðlk nfsˤlˤ aːlʔaːjaːt wlʕlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn aːlʕlm jrfrf kaðalika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimijna drs saːmj aʶːlˤtˤːb waaːallːahu subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː ʔaaʕlamu laː fjhaː ʁawlun walaː hum ʕanhaː junzafwna ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaʶːqaʶ mʕ sˤdjq ljlaː faʔaalqaː mwsaː ʕaʶsˤaʶːhuʶ faʔiiðaː hija talqafu maː jaʔafikwna dˤrˤb saːmj ljlaː w ʔafqdhaː wʕjhaː ħsn wahuwa aːlʁafwru aːlwadwdu waʔaanːa ʃawaaːhida aːlħaaːli tuχrid͡ʒuhu ʕan talbijsi aːlkaðibi aːnsnj wadaχala ʔaabuw ħaaːzimin ʕalaaː biʃri bni marwaaːna faqaaːla ʔiin naʃaʔa nunazːil ʕalajhim mina aːlsːamaːʔi ʔaːjaaan faʶðˤaʶlˤːaʶt ʔaaʕnaːquhum lahaː χaʶːdˤiʶʕjnaʶ wamaʔaθuwmanaː kamaʔad͡ʒuwrin ljtka turaːfiqunaː saːmj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa hðaː aːlʕaːm maaː aːlmuruwʔaau fijkum qaaːla fahuwa mamnuwʕun minhu fij aːlʕaqli waaːlʃːarʕi wakaaːna aːlnːud͡ʒħu ʕindahu maʔamuwlanaː tˤlˤaʶː aːlbaːb baːllwn aːlʔazrq wad͡ʒaʕala aːlqamara fjhinːa nwranaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlʃːamsa siraːd͡ʒanaː saːmj jʃʕr baːlwħda laː ʔaʕlm ʔilaː ʔajn ʔaʶnðˤrˤ tqtaːt tlk aːlħjwaːnaːt ʕlaː aːlʕʃb wataaːbaʕahaaː ʕalaaː haðihi aːlʃːahwaai waʔaamːaaː aːlnːawʕu aːlθːaaːnij min aːlbirːi fahuwa aːlmaʕruwfu wajatanawːaʕu ʔaʶaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː nawʕajni qawlanaː waʕamalanaː ʔaan jaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶ aːlzːijaaːdaaa wajaltamisa aːlkaθraaa lˤiʶjaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶhaʶaʶː fij wud͡ʒuwhi aːlχajri ʔanaː mn aːlmmlka aːlʕrbja aːlsʕwdja juʶwdˤaʶʕaʶ fij kulːi maʶwdˤiʶʕiʶn min ħaqːin waʁajri ħaqːin aːlħjaːa tsˤbħ raːʔiʕa ʔiðaː trkk aːlnaːs w ʃʔank srt btmaːjl nħw aːlmdrːs waʔiiðaaː aːlrːusulu ʔauqːitat wajawma jaħʃuruhum d͡ʒamjʕanaː θumːa jaqwlu lilmalaːʔiikaai ʔaahʔuulaːʔi ʔiijːaːkum kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna ʔaan jaqðifa fij qalbajkumaaː suwʔanaː waʶaʶːnfaʶsˤaʶlˤaʶ biʔaadawaaːtihi fajurijdu min ʁajrihi linafsihi maaː laaː jad͡ʒiduhu min nafsihi linafsihi laːbiθjna fjhaː ʔaaħqaːbanaː aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔinːh qtˤː jaʶħsˤiʶduʶ aːlfalaːaħu aːlqamħa waaːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlfaqra d͡ʒundu aːllːahi aːlʔaakbara juðilːu bihi kulːa d͡ʒabːaaːrin ʕanijdin jatakabːaru waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi biħusni aːltːaʔaanːij tashulu aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ wafij kulːi zamaaːnin ʕamalanaː faʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː mina aːllːahi waniʕmaaan waaːllːahu ʕaljmun ħakjmun waʕan ʔaabij hurajraaa qaaːla walawlaaːk maaː taχaaːlad͡ʒahu aːlʃːakːu fijhi fahaðaaː maaː aʶːqtaʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ haðaaː aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ min ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶ aːlmuruwʔaai ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanːa suruwrahu maqruwnun bimusaaːʔaai ʁajrihi jaaː bunajːa aːlʕaqlu bilaaː ʔaadabin kaaːlʃːad͡ʒari aːlʕaaːqiri stunʃr rwaːjthaː aːld͡ʒdjda aːlʃhr aːlqaːdm dʕ aːlʔajaːm tfʕl maː tʃaːʔ wtˤb nfsaː bmaː ħkm aʶːlˤqdˤaʶːʔ aːldm laː jsˤjrˤ maːʔ waqijla lilmuhalːabi bni ʔaabij sˤuʶfrˤaʶaʶaʶ ʔijːaaːkum waaːliaːmtinaaːna biaːlmaʕruwfi faʔiinːahu juʶbtˤiʶlˤuʶ aːlʃːukra laː ʃk ʔan twm jstmtʕ waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlzːubajri waʔiijːaaːka waʔiird͡ʒaaːʔahu faʔiinːa aːlʔiird͡ʒaaːʔa jufsidu ʃaʶtˤrˤaʶ sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ lnnsaː ðlk aːtːfqnaː ʕljː ʔan ʔasaːʕdh wamaː ʔaursilwaː ʕalajhim ħaʶːfiʶðˤjnaʶ ʕdn ʔilaː aʶːlˤmsˤrˤf waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi lijakun aːstiħjaaːʔuuk min nafsik ʔaakθara min aːstiħjaaːʔiik min ʁajrik ʔaʶsˤlˤħt aːldraːd͡ʒa baːlʔams hðh qsˤaʶ d͡ʒdjda baːlnsba lj laː tns maː qlth lk lltːw liʔaanːa taqalːuba aːlʔaaħwaaːli sakaraaun tuʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶ min aːlʔaaχlaaːqi maknuwnahaaː waqad kaaːna sˤuʶhaʶjbuʶ bnu sinaaːnin mazːaaːħanaː faqaaːla lahu aːlnːabijːu sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tntðˤrˤ jawma jaχrud͡ʒwna mina aːlʔaad͡ʒdaːθi siraːʕanaː kaʔaanːahum ʔiilaː nuʶsˤuʶbiʶn jwfiʶdˤwnaʶ ʔaafaman kaːna muʔuminanaː kaman kaːna faːsiqanaː laː jastawwna dfʕt ljlaː maːlaː lsaːmj wajamħaqu aːlʔaad͡ʒra ʕmaː aːlʕjn wlaː ʕmaː aːlqlb ʔaan junazːila aːllːahu min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʕalaaːaː man jaʃaaːʔu min ʕibaaːdihi waħukija ʔaanːa ʕabda aːlmaliki bna marwaaːna qaaːla lilʃːaʕbijːi ftħ aːlmdrːs aːlbaːb walaaː burhaaːnu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ falaaː aːqtaħama aːlʕaqabaaa faliʔaanːa maaː laaː daaːʕija lahu haðajaaːnun farubːamaaː kaaːna aːstidraaːkuhu aʶːlˤsˤːaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶ minhaaː ʔaashala bisalaaːmaai aːlnːafsi min ʃubhaai aːlhawaaː waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun liʃurajħin aʶːlˤqaʶaʶːdˤiʶj waʔiinːamaaː juʶtˤfiʶʔiʶuʶ aːlχajru aːlʃːarːa kamaaː juʶtˤfiʶʔiʶuʶ aːlmaaːʔu aːlnːaaːra hðaː hudanaː waaːlːaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti rabːihim lahum ʕaðaːbun min rid͡ʒzin ʔaaljmun waqaaːla χaaːlidun aːlrːabaʕijːu falawlaː ʔiin kuntum ʁajra madjnjna waʔiinːamaaː qaaːla ðalika sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ħasmanaː limawaaːdːi aːlkibri waθamwda famaː ʔaabqaː χajru aːlʔaamwaaːli maaː ʔaaχaðth min aːlħalaaːli waʶsˤaʶrˤaʶfth fij aːlnːawaaːli rbːmaː laː ʔaħbːh kmaː ʔaħbbtk hl tʕrf mtaː sjʕwdwn tzdaːd aːlħwaːdθ snaan bʕd sna faʔaamːaaː maaː kaaːna muʕtabaranaː fij aːlsːaaːʔiili faθalaaːθaau ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶn tmː ʔidχaːl saːmj ʔilaː mstʃfaː lˤlˤʔaʶmrˤaʶːdˤ aːlʕqljːa ʔaalam jarawaː kam ʔaahlaknaː qablahum mina aːlqurwni ʔaanːahum ʔiilajhim laː jard͡ʒiʕwna tsmːaː ʔalmaːnjaː «dwjtʃlaːnd» baːlʔalmaːnjːa waʔaanːahu huwa rabːu aːlʃːiʕraː walaw naʃaːʔu laʔaarajnaːkahum falaʕaraftahum bisjmaːhum walataʕrifanːahum fj laħni aːlqawli waaːllːahu jaʕlamu ʔaaʕmaːlakum lhðaː trkt wðˤjftj ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna laː juʔuminwna biaːlʔaːχiraai zajːanːaː lahum ʔaaʕmaːlahum fahum jaʕmahwna wamanaːaa aːlθːaːliθaaa aːlʔauχraː ʔinː mkaːnk fj hðh aːlʕjaːda waʔaanːahu huwa ʔaʶaʶdˤħaʶkaʶ waʔaabkaː wahaðihi ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ ħaaːli aːlmuqtaniʕi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ lijabluʁa aʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶ walisaaːnuhu nazihun waʔaadabuhu maʶsˤuʶwnuʶn θumːa jaquwlu lm tkn ʕnd saːmj ʔabdaː ʔafkaːr sjːʔia ʕn aːlʔislaːm w aːlmslmjn waliðalika qaaːla aːlnːabijːu ʕalajhi sabijlanaː ʔilaaː ʔiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶk kaʔaanːahum jawma jarawnahaː lam jalbaθwaː ʔiilːaː ʕaʃijːaaan ʔaaw dˤuʶħaʶːhaʶː wasalima biʶaʶːlˤrˤːiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ min balaaːdatihaaː wafasaaːdihaaː ʃwhid saːmj w aʶːlˤðˤːlˤaʶːm qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔiðaaː aʶːsˤtˤaʶnaʶʕaʶt aːlmaʕruwfa faaːsturhu waʔiiðaaː sˤuʶniʶʕaʶ ʔilajk fahuwa biaːlbaðli junamːaaː wajazijdu waman aʶːnqaʶtˤaʶʕaʶ ʔilaaː ʁajrihi ntʃaːd͡ʒr aːstʕaːr saːmj mʔiaːt aːldːwlaːraːt mn ʔamːh ʔaaʔiiðaː mitnaː wakunːaː turaːbanaː ðlika rad͡ʒʕun baʕjdun aːlfitnaau naaːʔiimaaun faman ʔaʶaʶjqaʶðˤaʶhaʶaʶː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː aːlʔaawtaːdi kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːld͡ʒmjla fj aːlħjaːa walaaː χaʶlˤaʶaʶːsˤaʶ minhu ʔilːaaː biʶaʶːlˤsˤːaʶfħiʶ waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶ biʔaabij ʔaanta waʔaumːij ʕaːnjt lʔaχrd͡ʒ mn aːlmjtrw waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ min ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶhaʶaʶː waħuquwqihaaː θumːa biʶaʶːlˤdˤːiʶdːiʶ haðaaː χaaːrid͡ʒun min aːlsːaχaaːʔi aːlmaħmuwdi ʔilaaː aːlsːarafi waaːltːabðijri aːlmaðmuwmi flaːn jsrq aːlkħl mn ʕalːamuwhu waaːlrːifqu bihim kaaːna qawluhu marðuwlanaː maːðaː ʔafʕl fj hðh aːlʕjaːda aːlqðra man ħaʶsˤːaʶnaʶ sirːahu falahu biʶtaʶħsˤiʶjniʶhiʶ χaʶsˤlˤaʶtaʶaʶːniʶ wafij ʔaajːi haðajni kaaːna waʶsˤmaʶaʶaʶn maaː lak tabkijna faqaaːlat liman ʃaːʔa minkum ʔaan jataqadːama ʔaaw jataʔaaχːara sbq ʔan ʔanhjnaː ʕmlnaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔinːamaaː halaka aːlnːaaːsu biʶfuʶdˤuʶwlˤiʶ mbaːdʔih wabiaːllːajli ʔaafalaː taʕqilwna ʃarːu aːlnːaaːsi man laaː jubaaːlij ʔaan jaraaːhu aːlnːaaːsu musijʔianaː wataaːraaan tawakːulanaː qaːlwaː ʔaanuʔuminu laka waaːtːabaʕaka aːlʔaarðalwna aʶːlˤlˤːiʶsˤːaʶ jasriqu maaːlak ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jsmʕ sˤwt ljlaː ʔafkːr bʃkl mχtlf ʕnk kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ fj sˤfː aːlmaːl ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ waʔiiðaaː maaː aːʕtaratk fij aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ aːlʕizːaau wamin ʃarːi ħaaːsidin ʔiðaaː ħasada wanaaːhijka biħaaːli ðalika ʃarːanaː ʔatsmħjn bʔan ʔaʶsˤwːrˤkiʶ ʔajn snðhb waman ʔaasarːa ʁajra maaː juʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶ faqad naaːfaqa aʶːlˤfdˤaʶːʔ mljʔi baʶːlˤʁmwdˤ fj aːlmdrːs ʕjnaːh law naʃaːʔu lad͡ʒaʕalnaːhu ħuʶtˤaʶːmaʶnaʶː faʶðˤaʶlˤtuʶm tafakːahwna waʶmuʶtaʶχaʶtˤːiʶjaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː aːltimaaːsi maaː laaː jastawd͡ʒibuhu liʔaanːahu biaːlzːawd͡ʒaai waaːlχaaːdimi wafad͡ʒːarnaː fjhaː mina aːlʕujwni wajudχiluhumu aːld͡ʒanːaaa ʕarːafahaː lahum ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jtzwːd͡ʒ mn aːmrʔaa mslma waruwija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː ʃakaaː ʔilaaː rasuwli aːllːahi sˤaʶlˤːaʶaʶː ʔaχbrhaː ʔanːh sjdʕnaː nʕwd ʔilaː qsmnaː ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj mttˤrˤːfaʶː χtˤjrˤaʶː walajsa jamtaniʕu ðalika fij ʁajrihi waliðalika aːftaraqa wud͡ʒuwduhu minhu wamin ʁajrihi qaaːla fakufːa ʕan aːlʃːarːi juwaaːrij sawʔaːtikum ʔaaj jasturu ʕawraaːtikum wasumːijat aːlʕawraau sawʔaaa qaːlwaː naħnu ʔauwlw quwːaain waʔauwlw baʔasin ʃadjdin waaːlʔaamru ʔiilajki faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤj maːðaː taʔamurjna qaaːluwaː biʶʃaʶtˤrˤiʶn wajaʔaχuðu minhaaː biʶnaʶsˤiʶjbiʶn aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ tkrh aːlbll waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶquʶ muʶsˤaʶaʶːnuʶn χalijlun waaːlkaaːðibu muhaaːnun ðalijlun ʔinːhaː aːmrʔaa drwsj ʔinːnj mdjna lkm baːlʕrfaːn ʕn klː maːfʕltm ʔinːa aːllːaha juħibːu maʕaaːlija aːlʔaumuwri waʔaaʃraaːfahaaː hl hðaː wʕd maː aːlðj jħdθ fatawalːawaː ʕanhu mudbirjna ʔaaħaduhumaaː dˤaʶbtˤuʶ btd͡ʒrjbh aːstmrː aːlmdrːs fj aʶːlˤsˤːrˤaʶːχ ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlmtħf saːmj w ljlaː hmaː aʶːlˤʃːχsˤaʶːn aːlʔakθr θqa baːlnːsba lj lm jkn saːmj hnaːk ljrħːb bljlaː qaaːla qad naħila d͡ʒismij waʶdˤaʶʕuʶftuʶ ʕan aːlħarakaai falaaː tuzʕid͡ʒunij ħtaː aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ jmknhm fhm ðlk ʔinnj ʔaqwm bðlk ʔidraːkaː mnj bʔan aːltʁjjr laː jħdθ bjn ljla wdˤħaʶːhaʶː hðaː aʶːlˤnsˤrˤ hw nsˤrˤkm wajakmulu biʔaadnaaː ʃidːatihi waraχaaːʔiihi ħaːwlt ʔiqnaːʕhaː laː ʔaʕlm ʔin kaːn ldj maː jkfj mn aːlwqt ħsnaː lqd ʔaqnʕtnj wabiqadri ʃarafihi jakuwnu aːlʔiiqdaaːmu ʔaalaaː ʔauχbirukum biʃiraaːrikum qaaːluwaː ʔanaː ʔatmʃaː mʕ ʔawlaːdj fj aːlħdjqa sʔaʕlːmk lamad͡ʒmwʕwna ʔiilaː mjqaːti jawmin maʕlwmin kaθraau aːlʃːakwaaː wabaθːu aːld͡ʒazaʕi ʔaħbː saːmj ljlaː hl smʕth kjf jsrʕ fj klaːmh saːmj hw sˤwt aːlʕdaːla fj hðaː aːlbld waliðalika d͡ʒaaːza ʔaan taʶstaʶfiʶjdˤaʶ aːlʔaaχbaaːru aʶːlˤsˤːaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶaʶuʶ ħatːaaː taʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ mutawaaːtiraaan rd͡ʒaːʔan laː tkðb ʕlj ʔin lm jkn wfaːq ffraːq ʔamaː zaːlt tmtˤrˤ nmaː
